original: tatra catasṛṣu śākhāsu śaunakādiṣu kauśiko'yaṃ saṃhitāvidhiḥ /
analyzed: tatra catasṛṣu śākhāsu śaunaka ādiṣu kauśikā uyam saṃhitā vidhiḥ

original: sa ca gopathabrāhmaṇādarthavādādi parityajya vidhimātraṃ kalpayitvā vidhiḥ kṛtaḥ /
analyzed: sa ca gopatha brāhmaṇāt arthavāda ādi parityajya vidhi mātram kalpayitvā vidhiḥ kṛtaḥ
tatra yathopayogam ṭīkā kriyate saṃhitā vidheḥ
śāntika pauṣṭika ābhicārika adbhuta ādīni karmāṇi saṃhitā vidhau uktāni
vidhi karmāṇi avidhi karmāṇi ucchraya karmāṇi
āmnāyaḥ punar mantrāḥ ca brāhmaṇāni ca
tatra āha mantra brāhmaṇam āmnāya śabdena ucyate
tat yathā brāhmaṇa vidhiḥ evam karma liṅgāḥ mantrāḥ

original: yathā saṃhitāvidheḥ karmoktaṃ tathaivaṃliṅgā mantrā api bhavanti /
analyzed: yathā saṃhitā vidheḥ karma uktam tathā evaṃliṅgāḥ mantrāḥ api bhavanti
brahma ha vai idam agre āsīt gobrā
yathā virāj vai idam agre āsīt
ityādi arthavāda arthāḥ api mantrāḥ bhavanti

original: saṃhitāvidhau yannāmnāyate tat sarvaṃ svaśākhānyāyena paramparayā sampradāyena kartavyam /
analyzed: saṃhitā vidhau yat nāmnāyate tat sarvam sva śākhā nyāyena paramparayā sampradāyena kartavyam

original: tathā coktaṃ bhaṭṭapādaiḥ - nyāyena sampradāyena yānti karmāṇi mīmāṃsakā iti /
analyzed: tathā ca uktam bhaṭṭa pādaiḥ nyāyena sampradāyena yānti karmāṇi mīmāṃsakāḥ iti

original: tathā nadīvālukayā vedikaraṇaṃ śāntikakarmasu śāntavṛkṣakāṣṭhena vedimānaṃ ca /
analyzed: tathā nadī vālukayā vedi karaṇam śāntika karmasu śānta vṛkṣa kāṣṭhena vedi mānam ca
tathā mīmāṃsāyām smṛti pāde smṛti ācārāṇām pramāṇam uktam
upavarṣa ācāryeṇa uktam mīmāṃsāyām smṛti pāde kalpasūtra adhikaraṇe
caturthaḥ uṅgirasām kalpaḥ śānti kalpaḥ tu pañcamaḥ

original: iti / 'ete kalpā vedatulyā hi' iti bhagavatopavarṣācāryeṇa pratipāditam /
analyzed: iti ete kalpāḥ veda tulyāḥ hi iti bhagavatā upavarṣa ācāryeṇa pratipāditam

original: yajñaṃ vyākhyāsyāmo devānāṃ pitṝṇāṃ ca // KauśS_1,1.9 //

analyzed: pāka tantram ājya tantram ca yajña śabdena ucyate

original: ekapuruṣāntaraṃ dvitīyaḥ puruṣaḥ śṛṇoti śabdaṃ tadupāṃśvityucyate //
analyzed: eka puruṣa antaram dvitīyaḥ puruṣaḥ śṛṇoti śabdam tat upāṃśu iti ucyate

original: yajñopavītī bhūtvā nityaṃ naimittikaṃ kāmyaṃ ca karma kuryāt /
analyzed: yajña upavītī bhūtvā nityam naimittikam kāmyam ca karma kuryāt
apasavyam kṛtvā pitṛ karma kuryāt piṇḍapitṛyajña ādi

original: prāṅmukho vodaṅmukho vā devakarmāṇi sarvāṇi kuryāt /
analyzed: prāc mukhaḥ vā udak mukhaḥ vā deva karmāṇi sarvāṇi kuryāt
kecid dakṣiṇa pūrvam antardeśam abhimukhaḥ pitṛ karma kuryāt
prāk udak vā karma samāptiḥ daiva karmasu
dakṣiṇā pratyak vā samāptiḥ pitṛ karmasu

original: sakṛt karma pitṝṇāṃ tryavarārdhaṃ devānām // KauśS_1,1.17 //
analyzed: sakṛt karma pitṝṇām tryavara ardham devānām
ācamana prokṣaṇa ādiṣu pitṝṇām sakṛt karma kuryāt

original: devānāṃ caturvā trirvā sarvaṃ karma kuryāt /
analyzed: devānām catuḥ vā tris vā sarvam karma kuryāt
nirvapaṇa paristaraṇa ājya grahaṇa ādi karma
yathā pari tvā agne puram vayam
devānām haviḥ dīyate svāhākāreṇa vaṣaṭkāreṇa vā
svāhā antābhiḥ pratyṛcam homāḥ kauśs sarvatra
uttaratas agneḥ upasādayati idhmam uttaram barhiḥ kauśs
pra yaccha parśum ityādi a hiṃsantaḥ ityantena
iti upari parvaṇām lūtvā tūṣṇīm āhṛtya uttaratas agneḥ upasādayati
oṣadhīḥ dāntu parvan ityādi śeṣeṇa barhiḥ lūtvā tūṣṇīm āhṛtya uttaratas agneḥ upasādayati
kecid vrata upāyana antam kṛtvā barhiḥ lavanam kurvanti

original: agnau yajñapātreṣu brāhmaṇeṣu vyavāyaṃ na kuryāt //
analyzed: agnau yajña pātreṣu brāhmaṇeṣu vyavāyam na kuryāt

original: homakarmakāle dakṣiṇaṃ jānu prapātya tato homaḥ kāryaḥ //
analyzed: homa karma kāle dakṣiṇam jānu prapātya tatas homaḥ kāryaḥ

original: yā pūrvā paurṇamāsī sānumatiryottarā sā rākā // KauśS_1,1.29 //
analyzed: yā pūrvā paurṇamāsī sā anumatiḥ yā uttarā sā rākā

original: yā pūrvāmāvāsyā sā sinīvālī yottarā sā kuhūḥ // KauśS_1,1.30 //
analyzed: yā pūrvā amāvāsyā sā sinīvālī yā uttarā sā kuhūḥ

original: sāṅkhyāyanīye brāhmaṇe uktaṃ 'dve paurṇamāsyau dve amāvāsye' (śāmbrā 4.4) iti /
analyzed: sāṅkhyāyanīye brāhmaṇe uktam dve paurṇamāsyau dve amāvāsye śāmbrāḥ iti
kecid caturdaśī miśrā paurṇamāsī amāvāsyā iti
tithi bhede caturdaśī miśrā upoṣyā pratipad miśrā yājyā
adya upavasathe iti upavatsyat bhaktam aśnāti
yena yāgam karoti tat na aśnāti yajamānaḥ
vrata upāyana antam kṛtvā tatas vrata grahaṇam karoti
vidhi karmāṇi avidhi karmāṇi ucchraya karmāṇi
madhuparka ādi indra mahā antam kauśs

original: yatra sūktaviniyogaṃ kṛtvā punarṛcāṃ viniyogastatrocchrayakarmatvaṃ yathā 'uduttamam' (7.88.3) iti /
analyzed: yatra sūkta viniyogam kṛtvā punar ṛcām viniyogaḥ tatra ucchraya karma tvam yathā ud uttamam iti
paribhāṣā prathame dhyāye sarva arthā vidhi karma artha a vidhi karma arthā ca

original: kulaṃ vā grāmo vā janapado vā tatra rājā bhūmipatirvidvāṃsaṃ bhūgvaṅgirasaṃ vṛṇīyāt ityādi tatroktam /
analyzed: kulam vā grāmaḥ vā janapadaḥ vā tatra rājā bhūmipatiḥ vidvāṃsam bhūgu aṅgirasam vṛṇīyāt ityādi tatra uktam
kauśika uktānām karmaṇām viduṣām hita arthāya anuṣṭhāna paddhatiḥ kriyate
avyasaḥ ca barhiḥ lavana vedi uttaravedi agni pratiṣṭhāpana antam kṛtvā

original: vratena tvaṃ vratapate (7.74.4) iti vā // KauśS_1,1.34 //
'mamāgne varcaḥ' iti samidha ādhāya 'vratena tvaṃ vratapate' ityṛcā bhaktaṃ juhoti /
analyzed: mama agne varcaḥ iti samidhaḥ ādhāya vratena tvam vrata pate iti ṛcā bhaktam juhoti

original: [prātarhute'gnau karmaṇe vāṃ veṣāya vāṃ sukṛtāya vām iti pāṇī prakṣālyāpareṇāgnerdarbhānāstīrya
analyzed: prātar huta ignau karmaṇe vām veṣāya vām sukṛtāya vām iti pāṇī prakṣālya apareṇa agneḥ darbhān āstīrya

original: teṣūttaramānaḍuhaṃ rohitaṃ carma prāggrīvamuttaraloma prastīrya pavitre kurute // KauśS_1,1.36 //
analyzed: teṣu uttaram ānaḍuham rohitam carma prāk grīvam uttara loma prastīrya pavitre kurute

original: darbhāvapracchinnaprāntau prakṣālyānulomamanumārṣṭi viṣṇormanasā pūte sthaḥ iti // KauśS_1,1.37 //]
analyzed: darbha avapracchinna prāntau prakṣālya anulomam anumārṣṭi viṣṇoḥ manasā pūte sthaḥ iti
karmaṇe vām iti mantreṇa hasta prakṣālanam
apareṇa agneḥ darbhān āstīrya teṣu uttaram ānaḍuham rohitam carma stṛṇāti
prakṣālya anulomam anumārṣṭi viṣṇoḥ manasā pūte sthaḥ iti mantreṇa
tvam bhūmim atyeṣi ojasā tvam vedyām sīdasi cāruḥ adhvare
tvām pavitram ṛṣayaḥ bharantaḥ tvam punīhi duritāni asmat

original: iti pavitre antardhāya havirnirvapati devasya tvā savituḥ prasave'śvinorbāhubhyāṃ pūṣṇo hastābhyāmagnaye juṣṭaṃ nirvapāmi iti // KauśS_1,2.1
analyzed: iti pavitre antardhāya haviḥ nirvapati devasya tvā savituḥ prasava īśvinoḥ bāhubhyām pūṣṇaḥ hastābhyām agnaye juṣṭam nirvapāmi iti
sāyam prātar homa vaiśvadeva piṇḍapitṛyajña ādi uddhṛta ignau kāryāṇi

original: 'tvaṃ bhūmim' ityṛcā carmaṇi pavitre nidhāya caturo muṣṭīn nirvapati 'devasya tvā' iti /
analyzed: tvam bhūmim iti ṛcā carmaṇi pavitre nidhāya caturaḥ muṣṭīn nirvapati devasya tvā iti

original: niruptaṃ pavitrābhyāṃ prokṣati amuṣmai tvā juṣṭam iti yathādevatam // KauśS_1,2.5 //]
analyzed: niruptam pavitrābhyām prokṣati amuṣmai tvā juṣṭam iti yathādevatam

original: [ulūkhalamusalaṃ śūrpaṃ prakṣālitaṃ carmaṇyādhāya vrīhīnulūkhala opyāvaghnaṃstrirhaviṣkṛtā vācaṃ visṛjati haviṣkṛdā dravehi iti // KauśS_1,2.6
analyzed: ulūkhala musalam śūrpam prakṣālitam carmaṇi ādhāya vrīhīn ulūkhale opya avaghnan tris haviṣkṛtā vācam visṛjati haviṣkṛtā drava ihi iti
arātīyoḥ iti ṛcā ulūkhala musalam takṣati yat tvā śikvaḥ
iti ṛcā prakṣālayati yat yat kṛṣṇaḥ

original: tataḥ ulūkhale vrīhīnopya 'haviṣkṛdā dravehi' ityanenāvahanti triḥ /
analyzed: tatas ulūkhale vrīhīn opya haviṣkṛdā drava ihi iti anena āvahanti tris

original: [apahatya suphalīkṛtān kṛtvā triḥ prakṣālya taṇḍulān agne caruryajñiyastvādhyarukṣat (11.1.16)
analyzed: apahatya su phalīkṛtān kṛtvā tris prakṣālya taṇḍulān agne caruḥ yajñiyaḥ tvā adhyarukṣat
agne caruḥ iti ṛcā carum adhidadhāti
śuddhāḥ pūtāḥ iti ṛcā udakam āsiñcati

original: 'brahmaṇā śuddhāḥ' ityṛcā taṇḍulānāvapati pavitre antardhānaṃ kṛtvā //
analyzed: brahmaṇā śuddhāḥ iti ṛcā taṇḍulān āvapati pavitre antardhānam kṛtvā

original: 'pari tvāgne puraṃ vayam' ityṛcā triḥ paryagnikaraṇam //
analyzed: pari tvā agne puram vayam iti ṛcā tris paryagnikaraṇam
agnaye tvā juṣṭam prokṣāmi iti idhmam
agnaye tvā juṣṭam prokṣāmi iti idhma prokṣaṇam
pṛthivyai tvā juṣṭam prokṣāmi iti barhiḥ prokṣaṇam

original: [darbhamuṣṭimabhyukṣya paścādagneḥ prāgagraṃ nidadhāti ūrṇamradaṃ prathasva svāsasthaṃ devebhyaḥ iti // KauśS_1,2.17 //]
analyzed: darbha muṣṭim abhyukṣya paścāt agneḥ prāc agram nidadhāti ūrṇamradam prathasva svāsastham devebhyaḥ iti
darbha muṣṭim abhyukṣya paścāt agneḥ stṛṇāti ūrṇamradam iti mantreṇa
ṛṣīṇām prastaraḥ asi iti dakṣiṇatas agneḥ brahmāsanam nidadhati

original: pratyakṣaṃ vā darbhamayaṃ vāsanamudakakamaṇḍaluṃ vā brahmasthāne kuryāt /
analyzed: pratyakṣam vā darbha mayam vā āsanam udaka kamaṇḍalum vā brahma sthāne kuryāt

original: [purastādagnerāstīrya teṣāṃ mūlānyapareṣāṃ prāntairavacchādayan parisarpati dakṣiṇenāgnimā paścārdhāt // KauśS_1,2.19 //]
analyzed: purastāt agneḥ āstīrya teṣām mūlāni apareṣām prāntaiḥ avacchādayan parisarpati dakṣiṇena agnim ā paścā ardhāt

original: [devasya tvā savituḥ prasave'śvinorbāhubhyāṃ pūṣṇo hastābhyāṃ prasūtaḥ praśiṣā paristṛṇāmi iti // KauśS_1,2.21 //]
analyzed: devasya tvā savituḥ prasava aśvinoḥ bāhubhyām pūṣṇaḥ hastābhyām prasūtaḥ praśiṣā paristṛṇāmi iti
yatra samāgacchanti tat dakṣiṇa uttaram karoti

original: stīrṇaṃ prokṣati haviṣāṃ tvā juṣṭaṃ prokṣāmi iti // KauśS_1,2.24 //
analyzed: stīrṇam prokṣati haviṣām tvā juṣṭam prokṣāmi iti
na an abhyukṣitam saṃstīrṇam upayogam labheta

original: vilīnapūtamājyaṃ gṛhītvādhiśṛtya paryagni kṛtvodagudvāsya paścādagnerupasādyodagagrābhyāṃ pavitrābhyāmutpunāti // KauśS_1,2.31 //
analyzed: vilīna pūtam ājyam gṛhītvā adhiśṛtya paryagni kṛtvā udak udvāsya paścāt agneḥ upasādya udak agrābhyām pavitrābhyām utpunāti

original: acchidreṇa tvā pavitreṇa śatadhāreṇa sahasradhāreṇa supvotpunāmi iti tṛtīyam // KauśS_1,2.34 //
analyzed: acchidreṇa tvā pavitreṇa śata dhāreṇa sahasra dhāreṇa supvā utpunāmi iti tṛtīyam

original: śṛtaṃ havirabhighārayati madhvā samañjan ghṛtavat karātha iti // KauśS_1,2.36 //
analyzed: śṛtam haviḥ abhighārayati madhvā samañjan ghṛtavat iti
śṛtam haviḥ abhighārayati madhvā samañjan iti

original: [abhighāryodañcamudvāsayati udvāsayāgneḥ śṛtamakarma havyamā sīda pṛṣṭhamamṛtasya dhāma (PaippS 5.16.3) iti // KauśS_1,2.37 //]
analyzed: abhighārya udañcam udvāsayati udvāsaya agneḥ śṛtam akarma havyam ā sīda pṛṣṭham amṛtasya dhāma paipps  iti
paścāt ājyasya nidhāya alaṅkṛtya samānena utpunāti
tatas paścāt ājyasya nidhāya alaṅkṛtya ājyena carum abhighārya samānena utpunāti

original: yunajmi tvā brahmaṇā daivyena havyāyāsmai voḍhave jātavedaḥ /
analyzed: yunajmi tvā brahmaṇā daivyena havyāya asmai voḍhave jātavedaḥ

original: indhānāstvā suprajasaḥ suvīrā jyog jīvema balihṛto vayaṃ te iti // KauśS_1,3.1 //]
analyzed: indhānāḥ tvā suprajasaḥ su vīrāḥ jyok jīvema bali hṛtaḥ vayam te iti
yunajmi tvā iti ebhiḥ pañcabhiḥ idhmam upasamādadhāti
dakṣiṇatas udapātram upasādya abhimantrayate tathā udapātram dhāraya yathā agre brahmaṇaspatiḥ

original: satyadharmāṃ adīdharaddevasya savituḥ save iti // KauśS_1,3.2 //]
analyzed: satya dharmām adīdharat devasya savituḥ save iti
dakṣiṇatas agneḥ udapātram kāṃsya pātram upasādya abhimantrayate tathā udapātram dhāraye iti ṛcā
atha udakam āsiñcati iha ita devīḥ amṛtam vasānāḥ hiraṇya varṇāḥ anavadya rūpāḥ

original: āpaḥ samudro varuṇaśca rājā sampātabhāgān haviṣo juṣantām //
analyzed: āpaḥ samudraḥ varuṇaḥ ca rājā sampāta bhāgān haviṣaḥ juṣantām
indra praśiṣṭāḥ varuṇa prasūtāḥ apaḥ samudrāt divam udvahantu

original: indrapraśiṣṭā varuṇaprasūtā divaspṛthivyāḥ śriyamā vahantu iti // KauśS_1,3.3 //]
analyzed: indra praśiṣṭāḥ varuṇa prasūtāḥ divaspṛthivyāḥ śriyam ā vahantu iti
iha ita devīḥ iti dvābhyām ṛgbhyām santata dhārayā uda pātram avasiñcati

original: [ṛtaṃ tvā satyena pariṣiñcāmi jātavedaḥ iti saha havirbhiḥ paryukṣya jīvābhirācamyopotthāya
analyzed: ṛtam tvā satyena pariṣiñcāmi jātavedaḥ iti saha havirbhiḥ paryukṣya jīvābhiḥ ācamya upotthāya

original: vedaprapadbhiḥ prapadyate oṃ prapadye bhūḥ prapadye bhuvaḥ prapadye svaḥ prapadye
analyzed: veda prapadbhiḥ prapadyate om prapadye bhūḥ prapadye bhuvaḥ prapadye svar prapadye

original: 'ṛtaṃ tvā satyena' iti saha havirbhiḥ paryukṣya sarvatra sthaṇḍilakarmaṇi hoṣyan 'ṛtaṃ tvā satyena' hutvā 'satyaṃ tvartena' (KauśS 6.20)
analyzed: ṛtam tvā satyena iti saha havirbhiḥ paryukṣya sarvatra sthaṇḍila karmaṇi hoṣyan ṛtam tvā satyena hutvā satyam tvā ṛtena kauśs
jīvāḥ stha iti sūktena tris ācāmati

original: vedaprapadbhiḥ prapadyate 'oṃ prapadye bhūḥ' ityṛcā '...prapadye' iti //
analyzed: veda prapadbhiḥ prapadyate om prapadye bhūḥ iti ṛcā prapadye iti

original: [prapadya paścātstīrṇasya darbhānāstīrya ahe daidhiṣavyodatastiṣṭhānyasya sadane sīda yo'smat pākataraḥ iti brahmāsanamanvīkṣate // KauśS_1,3.5
analyzed: prapadya paścāt stīrṇasya darbhān āstīrya ahe daidhiṣavya udataḥ tiṣṭhāni asya sadane sīda yaḥ usmat pākataraḥ iti brahmāsanam anvīkṣate  /

original: nirastaḥ parāgvasuḥ saha pāpmanā nirastaḥ so'stu yo'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ ca vayaṃ dviṣmaḥ iti dakṣiṇā tṛṇaṃ nirasyati // KauśS_1,3.6 //
analyzed: nirastaḥ parāc vasuḥ saha pāpmanā nirastaḥ saḥ astu yaḥ asmān dveṣṭi yam ca vayam dviṣmaḥ iti dakṣiṇā tṛṇam nirasyati

original: tadanvālabhya japati idamahamarvāgvasoḥ sadane sīdāmi satyasya sadane sīdāmīṣṭasya
analyzed: tat anvālabhya japati idam aham arvāgvasoḥ sadane sīdāmi satyasya sadane sīdāmi iṣṭasya

original: sadane sīdāmi pūrtasya sadane sīdāmi māmṛṣa deva barhiḥ svāsasthaṃ tvādhyāsadeyamūrṇamradamanabhiśokam // KauśS_1,3.7 //
analyzed: sadane sīdāmi pūrtasya sadane sīdāmi mā amṛṣa deva barhiḥ svāsastham tvā adhyāsa deyam ūrṇamradam an abhiśokam

original: ityupaviśyāsanīyaṃ brahmajapaṃ japati bṛhaspatirbrahmā brahmasadana āsiṣyate bṛhaspate yajñaṃ gopāya yadududvata unnivataḥ śakeyam iti // KauśS_1,3.8
analyzed: iti upaviśya āsanīyam brahmajapam japati bṛhaspatiḥ brahmā brahma sadane āsiṣyate bṛhaspate yajñam gopāya yat ududvataḥ unnivataḥ śakeyam iti
āsane darbhān āstīrya ahe daidhiṣavya udataḥ tiṣṭhe iti āsana saṃskāram karoti

original: [darbhaiḥ sruvaṃ nirmṛjya niṣṭaptaṃ rakṣo niṣṭaptā arātayaḥ pratyuṣṭaṃ rakṣaḥ pratyuṣṭā arātayaḥ iti pratapya // KauśS_1,3.9 //]
analyzed: darbhaiḥ sruvam nirmṛjya niṣṭaptam rakṣaḥ niṣṭaptāḥ arātayaḥ pratyuṣṭam rakṣaḥ pratyuṣṭāḥ arātayaḥ iti pratapya

original: darbhaiḥ sruvaṃ nirmṛjya 'niṣṭaptaṃ rakṣaḥ' iti sruvaṃ pratapati //
analyzed: darbhaiḥ sruvam nirmṛjya niṣṭaptam rakṣaḥ iti sruvam pratapati

original: mūle sruvaṃ gṛhītvā japati viṣṇorhasto'si [dakṣiṇaḥ pūṣṇā datto bṛhaspateḥ /
analyzed: mūle sruvam gṛhītvā japati viṣṇoḥ hastaḥ asi dakṣiṇaḥ pūṣṇā dattaḥ bṛhaspateḥ
tam tvā aham sruvam ādade devānām havya vāhanam

original: ayaṃ sruvo vi dadhāti homāñchatākṣaracchandasā jāgatena /
analyzed: ayam sruvaḥ vi dadhāti homān śata akṣara chandasā jāgatena

original: sarvā yajñasya samanakti viṣṭhā bārhaspatyeṣṭiḥ śarmaṇā daivyena] iti // KauśS_1,3.10 //
analyzed: sarvā yajñasya samanakti viṣṭhā bārhaspatyā iṣṭiḥ śarmaṇā daivyena iti

original: oṃ bhūḥ śaṃ bhūtyai tvā gṛhṇe bhūtaye iti prathamaṃ grahaṃ gṛhṇāti // KauśS_1,3.11 //
analyzed: om bhūḥ śam bhūtyai tvā gṛhṇe bhūtaye iti prathamam graham gṛhṇāti

original: oṃ bhuvaḥ śaṃ puṣṭyai tvā gṛhṇe puṣṭaye iti dvitīyam // KauśS_1,3.12 //
analyzed: om bhuvaḥ śam puṣṭyai tvā gṛhṇe puṣṭaye iti dvitīyam

original: oṃ svaḥ śaṃ tvā gṛhṇe sahasrapoṣāya iti tṛtīyam // KauśS_1,3.13 //
analyzed: om svar śam tvā gṛhṇe sahasra poṣāya iti tṛtīyam

original: oṃ janacchaṃ tvā gṛhṇe'parimitapoṣāya iti caturtham // KauśS_1,3.14 //
analyzed: om janat śam tvā gṛhṇe parimita poṣāya iti caturtham

original: rājakarmābhicārikeṣu amuṣya tvā prāṇāya gṛhṇe'pānāya vyānāya samānāyodānāya iti pañcamam // KauśS_1,3.15 //
analyzed: rāja karma ābhicārikeṣu amuṣya tvā prāṇāya gṛhṇa ipānāya vyānāya samānāya udānāya iti pañcamam

analyzed: sruveṇa ājya dhānyām graha grahaṇam karoti om bhūḥ śam bhūtyai tvā iti caturbhiḥ

original: purastāddhoma ājyabhāgaḥ saṃsthitahomaḥ samṛddhiḥ śāntānāmiti // KauśS_1,3.19 //
analyzed: purastāddhomaḥ ājyabhāgaḥ saṃsthita homaḥ samṛddhiḥ śāntānām iti
ājyabhāgau pārśvatas uttaratas dakṣiṇatas ca juhoti

original: vṛṣṇe bṛhate svarvinde agnaye śalkaṃ harāmi tviṣīmate /
analyzed: vṛṣṇe bṛhate svarvinde agnaye śalkam harāmi tviṣīmate

original: sa na sthirān balavataḥ kṛṇotu jyok ca no jīvātave dadhātvagnaye svāhā (PaippS 19.52.6)
analyzed: sa naḥ sthirān balavataḥ kṛṇotu jyok ca naḥ jīvātave dadhātu agnaye svāhā

original: dakṣiṇapūrvārdhe somāya tvaṃ soma divyo nṛcakṣāḥ sugā;
analyzed: dakṣiṇa pūrva ardhe somāya tvam soma divyaḥ nṛ cakṣāḥ sugā

original: abhi no gotraṃ viduṣa iva neṣo'cchā no vācamuśatīṃ jigāsi somāya svāhā (PaippS 1.51.3) iti // KauśS_1,4.2 //
analyzed: abhi naḥ gotram viduṣaḥ iva neṣa ucchā naḥ vācam uśatīm jigāsi somāya svāhā paipps

original: 'vṛṣṇe bṛhate' 'tvaṃ soma divyaḥ' ityājyabhāgāntaṃ kṛtvā tata āgneyaṃ caruṃ juhoti 'udenamuttaraṃ naya' (6.5.1-3)
analyzed: vṛṣṇe bṛhate tvam soma divyaḥ iti ājyabhāga antam kṛtvā tatas āgneyam carum juhoti ud enam uttaram naya
iti tribhiḥ ṛgbhiḥ prajāpate na tvat

original: upastīryājyaṃ saṃhatābhyāmaṅgulibhyāṃ dvirhaviṣo'vadyati madhyāt pūrvārdhācca // KauśS_1,4.4 //
analyzed: upastīrya ājyam saṃhatābhyām aṅgulibhyām dvis haviṣovadyati madhyāt pūrva ardhāt ca

original: [yāmuttarāmagnerājyabhāgasya juhoti rakṣodevatyā sā yāṃ dakṣiṇataḥ somasya pitṛdevatyā sā // KauśS_1,4.12 //
analyzed: yām uttarām agneḥ ājyabhāgasya juhoti rakṣaḥ devatyā sā yām dakṣiṇatas somasya pitṛ devatyā sā

analyzed: tasmāt antarā hotavyāḥ deva loke eva hūyante

analyzed: yām parām parām saṃhatām juhoti sā abhikrāmantī sa vasīyān yajamānaḥ bhavati

analyzed: yām jyotiṣmati juhoti tayā brahmavarcasī bhavati tasmāt jyotiṣmati hotavyam

indra agnī rocanā divaḥ pari vājeṣu bhūṣayaḥ

analyzed: irajyantā vasavyasya bhūreḥ sahastamā sahasā vājayantā

analyzed: āmāvāsyāyām aindrāgnau dvitīyaḥ bhavati indra agnī rocanā iti catasraḥ

original: [prāk sviṣṭakṛtaḥ pārvaṇau homau samṛddhihomāḥ kāmyahomāśca // KauśS_1,5.4 //
analyzed: prāk sviṣṭakṛtaḥ pārvaṇau homau samṛddhi homāḥ kāmya homāḥ ca

analyzed: ākūtyai tvā kāmāya tvā samṛdhe tvā svāhā

analyzed: prajāpate na tvat etāni anyaḥ iti ca

analyzed: pṛthivyām agnaye iti aṣṭabhiḥ sannati homān juhoti prajāpate na tvat etāni iti ca

analyzed: agniḥ vidvān sa yajāt saḥ id hotā sa udhvarān saḥ ṛtūn kalpayāti paipps

analyzed: agnaye sviṣṭakṛte svāhā iti uttara pūrva ardha iva yutam hutvā sarva prāyaścittīyān homān juhoti

original: ayā no dhehi bheṣajaṃ svāhā iti oṃ svāhā bhūḥ svāhā bhuvaḥ svāhā svaḥ svāhoṃ bhūrbhuvaḥ svaḥ svāhā iti // KauśS_1,5.13 //]

original: [barhirājyaśeṣe'nakti pṛthivyai tvā iti mūlam antarikṣāya tvā iti madhyaṃ dive tvā ityagram // KauśS_1,6.5 //]
analyzed: barhiḥ ājya śeṣenakti pṛthivyai tvā iti mūlam antarikṣāya tvā iti madhyam dive tvā iti agram

original: yadājyadhānyāṃ tat saṃsrāvayati saṃsrāvabhāgāstaviṣā bṛhantaḥ prastareṣṭhā barhiṣadaśca devāḥ /

original: imaṃ yajñamabhi viśve gṛṇantaḥ svāhā devā amṛtā mādayantām iti // KauśS_1,6.9 //]

analyzed: antarikṣe sīda pṛthivyām sīda uttarā ūham bhūyāsam adhare mad sapatnāḥ iti sruvam prāk daṇḍam nidadhāti

viṣṇoḥ kramā asi iti tisṛbhiḥ viṣṇukramān kramate
aganma svar iti paryāya dvayena ādityam īkṣate

original: brahmaṇā sthāpitaṃ pātraṃ punarutthāpayāmasi ityapareṇāgnimudapātraṃ parihṛtyottareṇāgnim āpo hi ṣṭhā mayobhuvaḥ (1.5)
analyzed: brahmaṇā sthāpitam pātram punar utthāpayāmasi iti apareṇa agnim udapātram parihṛtya uttareṇa agnim āpaḥ hi stha mayobhuvaḥ

original: iti mārjayitvā barhiṣi patnyā añjalau ninayati samudraṃ vaḥ pra hiṇomi (10.5.23-24)
analyzed: iti mārjayitvā barhiṣi patnyāḥ añjalau ninayati samudram vaḥ pra hiṇomi

original: iti idaṃ janāsaḥ (1.32) iti vā // KauśS_1,6.17 //]

analyzed: indrasya vacasā iti ṛcā uda pātram utthāpayati

original: uttarato'gnerudapātreṇa 'āpo hi ṣṭhā' iti mārjayitvā barhiṣi sruvaṃ ca pavitre ca patnyā añjalau kṛtvodapātraṃ ninayati 'samudraṃ vaḥ pra hiṇomi'  #
analyzed: uttaratas agneḥ uda pātreṇa āpaḥ hi stha iti mārjayitvā barhiṣi sruvam ca pavitre ca patnyāḥ añjalau kṛtvā uda pātram ninayati samudram vaḥ pra hiṇomi  /

original: vīrapatnyahaṃ bhūyāsam iti mukhaṃ vimārṣṭi // KauśS_1,6.18 //
analyzed: vīra patnī aham bhūyāsam iti mukham vimārṣṭi

original: 'nādakṣiṇaṃ haviḥ kurvīta yaḥ kurute kṛtyāmātmanaḥ kurute' iti brāhmaṇam // KauśS_1,6.22 //
analyzed: na a dakṣiṇam haviḥ kurvīta yaḥ kurute kṛtyām ātmanaḥ kurute iti brāhmaṇam
haviḥ śabdena ājya tantram pāka tantram ca ucyate

śaktyā vā dakṣiṇām dadyāt na atiśaktiḥ vidhīyate kauśs
yat vai yajñasya ananvitam bhavati tat anvāhāryeṇa anvāhriyate

original: karmasamāptau sarvatra brāhmaṇān trīn pañca sapta viṃśatiṃ śataṃ sahasramayutaṃ vā bhojayet /
analyzed: karma samāptau sarvatra brāhmaṇān trīn pañca sapta viṃśatim śatam sahasram ayutam vā bhojayet

original: 'īḍyā vā anye devāḥ saparyeṇyā anye devā īḍyā devā brāhmaṇāḥ saparyeṇyāḥ // KauśS_1,6.26 //
analyzed: īḍyāḥ vai anye devāḥ saparyeṇyāḥ anye devāḥ īḍyāḥ devāḥ brāhmaṇāḥ saparyeṇyāḥ

original: te'syobhaye prītā yajñe bhavanti' iti // KauśS_1,6.28 //

analyzed: tasmāt karmaṇi brāhmaṇāḥ bhojayitavyāḥ sva śaktyā catur vedapāragāḥ

atha api gopatha brāhmaṇa paṭhitau ślokau bhavataḥ

analyzed: havīṃṣi yajñaḥ āvāpaḥ yathā tantrasya tantavaḥ

analyzed: eka sviṣṭakṛtaḥ kuryāt nānā api sati daivate iti

original: tasminneva tantra ājyaṃ juhoti śāntasamidho vādadhāti /

sarvatra karma vyatikrame prāyaścittam sarvaprāyaścittam vā

tantra madhye sarve homāḥ iti bhadra matam
ājya tantre haviḥ utsṛjya ājyabhāga ante abhyātānāni bhavanti
ājya tantra pāka tantrayoḥ abhyātānānām kṛtaḥ viśeṣaḥ
atharvavedasya śaunakīyaḥ maṇḍapaḥ sambhāra lakṣaṇaḥ uktaḥ
avyasaḥ ca iti mantrāṇām karmaṇi ādau prayujyate
catur asraḥ maṇiḥ proktaḥ aṅguṣṭha parva mātrataḥ
sūtre protyaḥ ca sampātya bandhyaḥ puṇya aha vācane
śānta vṛkṣa mayī kāryā araṇiḥ śānti karmasu

original: mantreṇaiva pṛthak kuryāt kravyādaṃ ca vidhānataḥ //
analyzed: mantreṇa eva pṛthak kuryāt kravyādam ca vidhānataḥ

original: nābhicāre na sarvānāṃ na sāṅgrāmikeṣu ca /
analyzed: na abhicāre na sarvānām na sāṅgrāmikeṣu ca

original: maṇḍapaṃ ca śāntyudakaṃ ca tatraiva na vidyate /
analyzed: maṇḍapam ca śāntyudakam ca tatra eva na vidyate

original: prārambhaḥ sarvatra pūrṇamāsyamāvāsyayoḥ puṇye nakṣatre vā /
analyzed: prārambhaḥ sarvatra pūrṇamāsī amāvāsyayoḥ puṇye nakṣatre vā

original: ete trayaḥ kālāḥ sarveṣāṃ karmaṇāṃ smṛtāḥ /
analyzed: ete trayaḥ kālāḥ sarveṣām karmaṇām smṛtāḥ
vidhi karma arthāḥ avidhi karma arthāḥ ucchraya karma arthāḥ ucyante
sūktena viniyogam kṛtvā paścāt ṛcām viniyogaḥ tāni ucchraya karmāṇi
yatra gaṇaḥ tatra sarvatra sūktānām vikalpaḥ
yatra oṣadhi gaṇaḥ tatra oṣadhīnām vikalpaḥ

original: 'haviṣāṃ tvā juṣṭaṃ prokṣāmi' iti sarvadravyeṣu prokṣaṇam /
analyzed: haviṣām tvā juṣṭam prokṣāmi iti sarva dravyeṣu prokṣaṇam

original: 'sarvatrotpavanaṃ haviṣām' iti yuvākauśika ācāryo manyate avaśiṣṭāḥ paribhāṣāḥ purata ucyante sarvakarmārthāḥ /
analyzed: sarvatra utpavanam haviṣām iti yuvākauśikaḥ ācāryaḥ manyate avaśiṣṭāḥ paribhāṣāḥ puratas ucyante sarva karma arthāḥ

original: yatrodakena prayojanaṃ tatra sarvatra śāntyudakaṃ kuryāt caturbhirgaṇairekena vā gaṇena /
analyzed: yatra udakena prayojanam tatra sarvatra śāntyudakam kuryāt caturbhiḥ gaṇaiḥ ekena vā gaṇena

original: ājyatantre sarvatra dhenurdakṣiṇā havirucchiṣṭaṃ cādhikaraṇaṃ ca.
analyzed: ājya tantre sarvatra dhenuḥ dakṣiṇā haviḥ ucchiṣṭam ca adhikaraṇam ca
yathā anvaktāḥ prādeśa mātrīḥ ādadhāti kauśs

original: saktūdakaṃ dviśalākayā samidhā mathitaṃ mantha ityucyate /
analyzed: saktu udakam dvi śalākayā samidhā mathitam manthaḥ iti ucyate
pūrvasya mama agne varcaḥ iti kauśs
yatra grāma śabdaḥ na śrūyate tatra araṇyam

original: uttarata udakasamīpe kāryāṇi japahomasnānādīni prayujya karmāṇi //
analyzed: uttaratas udaka samīpe kāryāṇi japa homa snāna ādīni prayujya karmāṇi

original: apāṃ sūktairāplutya pradakṣiṇamāvṛtyāpa upaspṛśyānavekṣamāṇā grāmamudāvrajanti // KauśS_1,7.14 //
analyzed: apām sūktaiḥ āplutya pradakṣiṇam āvṛtya apaḥ upaspṛśya an avekṣamāṇāḥ grāmam udāvrajanti
sarvatra puṃsavana ādiṣu saṃskāreṣu gṛhe prayogaḥ
āśya bandhyā plavana yāna bhakṣyāṇi sampātavanti
eteṣu nityam abhyātāna antam tantram bhavati
āśi ādiṣu yathā mā ādānaka śrṛtam kṣīraudanam aśnāti kauśs
ehi jīvam iti āñjana maṇim badhnāti kauśs
āśi ādiṣu sarvatra sampāta abhimantraṇam bhavati ājya tantre

original: strīvyādhitāvāplutāvasiktau śirastaḥ prakamyā prapadāt pramārṣṭi // KauśS_1,7.17 //
analyzed: strī vyādhitau āpluta avasiktau śirastaḥ prakamyā prapadāt pramārṣṭi

original: strī ca vyādhitaḥ puruṣaḥ vyādhitā strī ca /
analyzed: strī ca vyādhitaḥ puruṣaḥ vyādhitā strī ca

original: taṃ puruṣamagre kṛtvā gṛhe praveśya tato manthaudanau prayacchati /
analyzed: tam puruṣam agre kṛtvā gṛhe praveśya tatas mantha odanau prayacchati
trayodaśī ādayaḥ tisraḥ dadhi madhuni vāsayitvā badhnāti

original: yatra vāsitaṃ badhnāti tatra sarvatra trayodaśyādi bhavati /
analyzed: yatra vāsitam badhnāti tatra sarvatra trayodaśī ādi bhavati
yathā yugma kṛṣṇalam vāsitam badhnāti kauśs
maṇim baddhvā tat dadhi madhu āśayati
yathā āvapati brīhi yava tilān kauśs ityādi
rakta vṛṣabha gomaya piṇḍaḥ iti arthaḥ
iti śakṛt piṇḍa īśmānam nidadhāti kauśs
yathā paścāt agneḥ carmaṇi haviṣām saṃskāraḥ kauśs

original: yatrāplavanamavasecanaṃ ca tatrācamanaṃ bhavati mārjanaṃ ca //
analyzed: yatra āplavanam avasecanam ca tatra ācamanam bhavati mārjanam ca

original: yathā yat sampātyate tat sarvaṃ prāśya tato bandhanādi karoti //
analyzed: yathā yat sampātyate tat sarvam prāśya tatas bandhana ādi karoti
samidh puroḍāśa caru vrīhi yava tila ādīni abhyādheyāni
nitya naimittika kāmyāni karmāṇi snānam kṛtvā prayuñjīt

original: purastāddhomavatsu niśākarmasu pūrvāhṇe yajñopavītī śālāniveśanaṃ samūhayatyupavatsyadbhaktamaśitvā snāto'hatavasanaḥ prayuṅkte // KauśS_1,8.1
analyzed: purastāt homavatsu niśā karmasu pūrvāhṇe yajña upavītī śālā niveśanam samūhayati upavatsyat bhaktam aśitvā snātaḥ ūhata vasanaḥ prayuṅkte
yeṣu niśākarmasu tantram teṣu ayam dharmaḥ

original: kecit 'snāto'hatavasanaḥ prayuṅkte' iti sarvārthāḥ paribhāṣā manyante /
analyzed: kecid snātaḥ ūhata vasanaḥ prayuṅkte iti sarva arthāḥ paribhāṣāḥ manyante
yathā citrā karma niśāyām sambhārān sampātavataḥ karoti kauśs

original: iti sūktena pratidiśaṃ pratyṛcaṃ baliharaṇaṃ karoti /
analyzed: iti sūktena pratidiśam pratyṛcam bali haraṇam karoti
tatra haviḥ ucchiṣṭena bali haraṇam kuryāt

original: havirucchiṣṭamājyadhānyudapātraṃ carma maṇḍapadarbhasamidhaḥ śāntyudakabhājanasruksruvādīni deyāni kartre /
analyzed: haviḥ ucchiṣṭam ājya dhāni uda pātram carma maṇḍapa darbha samidhaḥ śāntyudaka bhājana sruc sruva ādīni deyāni kartre

original: yat kiñcit tantre praviśati tat sarvamadhikaraṇamityucyate //
analyzed: yat kiñcid tantre praviśati tat sarvam adhikaraṇam iti ucyate
prokṣaṇa ācamana paryukṣaṇa ādi tris kartavyam

original: yathā 'ṛtaṃ tvā satyena pariṣiñcāmi iti saha havirbhiḥ paryukṣya' (KauśS 3.4) //
analyzed: yathā ṛtam tvā satyena pariṣiñcāmi iti saha havirbhiḥ paryukṣya kauśs
sarvatra śāntikeṣu śāntam sambhāram darbha samidh ādi
sruc sruva samidh kāṣṭha ādi maṇi dravya kāṣṭhāni kartavyāni
iti mā ādānaka śṛtam kṣīraudanam aśnāti kauśs
phāla camase sarūpa vatsāyāḥ dugdhe kauśs
katham mahe iti uttaram api anena sūktena karma kuryāt
yathā lomāni hasti romāṇi yathā vidma śarasya

original: 'pra yaccha parśum' iti mantreṇa darbhāhārāya dātraṃ prayacchati /
analyzed: pra yaccha parśum iti mantreṇa darbha āhārāya dātram prayacchati
iti upari parvaṇām lūtvā tūṣṇīm āhṛtya uttaratas agneḥ upasādayati
arātīyoḥ iti ṛcā ulūkhala musala kāṣṭham
yat tvā śikvaḥ iti ṛcā kāṣṭhāni prakṣālayati

original: 'yadyatkṛṣṇaḥ' ityṛcā vastreṇa vā hastena volūkhalādīni vimārṣṭi mārjanaṃ karoti pātrāṇām.
analyzed: yat yat kṛṣṇaḥ iti ṛcā vastreṇa vā hastena vā ulūkhala ādīni vimārṣṭi mārjanam karoti pātrāṇām
syandanaḥ himavati narmadāyām ātharvaṇika sthāne prasiddhaḥ

original: sruk sruvaḥ samidho nekṣaṇaṃ darviḥ sāmidhenīḥ prādeśamātrīḥ samidho'gnihotrāvasathyāgniṣṭomādiyajñeṣveteṣāṃ vṛkṣāṇāṃ pātrāṇi śāntikapauṣṭikādiṣu  #
analyzed: sruc sruvaḥ samidhaḥ nekṣaṇam darviḥ sāmidhenīḥ prādeśa mātrīḥ samidhaḥ agnihotra āvasathya agniṣṭoma ādi yajñeṣu eteṣām vṛkṣāṇām pātrāṇi śāntika pauṣṭika ādiṣu
citi prāyaścitti śamī śamakā savaṃśā śāmyavākā talāśā palāśa vāśā śiṃśapā śimbala sipuna darbha apāmārgā
kṛtiloṣṭa valmīka vapā dūrvā prānta vrīhi yavāḥ śāntāḥ

original: prāyaścittiḥ parvaṇi parvaṇi tasyāstrīṇi patrāṇi bhavanti /
analyzed: prāyaścittiḥ parvaṇi parvaṇi tasyāḥ trīṇi patrāṇi bhavanti

original: etāḥ sarvāḥ śāntā oṣadhayaḥ śāntyudakādau prayoktavyā /
analyzed: etāḥ sarvāḥ śāntāḥ oṣadhayaḥ śāntyudaka ādau prayoktavyā

original: etāsāmalābhe yavaḥ pratinidhiḥ kārya iti paiṭhīnasiḥ /
analyzed: etāsām alābhe yavaḥ pratinidhiḥ kāryaḥ iti paiṭhīnasiḥ
pramanda uśīra śalalī upadhāna śaka dhūmāḥ jarantaḥ
yathā pramanda alaṅkārān sampātavataḥ prayacchati kauśs
śakadhūmam kim adya ahar iti pṛcchati kauśs
sīsa nadīsīse ayaḥ rajāṃsi kṛkalāsa śiraḥ sīsāni
yatra sīsāni tatra etāni sarvāṇi pratyetavyāni
iti sannahya sīsa cūrṇāni bhakta ilaṅkāre kauśs
dadhi ghṛtam madhu udakam iti rasāḥ
vrīhi yava godhūma upavāka tila priyaṅgu śyāmākāḥ iti miśra dhānyāni
yatra maiśradhānya śabdaḥ tatra ete pratyetavyāḥ
yathā maiśradhānyam puroḍāśam anya āśāyām vā nidadhāti kauśs
grahaṇam anugrahaṇam tāvat anuvartate yāvat pratīka grahaṇam dvitīyam
ityādi anuvartate tāvat yāvat aham rudrebhiḥ kauśs
iti grahaṇāt vāri dam iti a grahaṇe api grahaṇam bhavati
yathā vidma śarasya pitaram parjanyam śata vṛṣṇyam
laukikam iti bhavati kṛta yāmam kaṅkatam avasṛjāmi iti
tathā mīmāṃsāyām api anuṣaṅgaḥ vākya parisamāptiḥ sarveṣu tulya yogi tvāt jaisū
sūkta ādi sūktam pratīyāt iti vacanāt

original: sarvatra sūktaprayogaḥ yathā 'divyo gandharva iti mātṛnāmabhirjuhuyāt' (KauśS 94.15) //
analyzed: sarvatra sūkta prayogaḥ yathā divyaḥ gandharvaḥ iti mātṛnāmabhiḥ juhuyāt kauśs
uttamam varjayitvā apa naḥ śośucat agham
śam ca naḥ mayaḥ ca naḥ
yatra śānti gaṇaḥ tatra ayam gaṇaḥ pratyetavyaḥ
śambhu mayobhū āpaḥ hi stha śam naḥ devī
tathā vyākaraṇe alpa a c taram pā
uta devāḥ iti sapta ṛcam sūktam
śam ca naḥ mayaḥ ca naḥ iti ekā
punar mā etu indriyam iti ekā
śam naḥ vātaḥ vātu iti ekā
yatra śāntiḥ tatra etāni sarvāṇi pratyetavyāni

original: yatra śāntyudakaṃ kriyate tatra 'pṛthivyai śrotrāya' iti tribhirṛgbhiḥ śāntyudakaṃ śāntyudakamadhye prakṣipet /
analyzed: yatra śāntyudakam kriyate tatra pṛthivyai śrotrāya iti tribhiḥ ṛgbhiḥ śāntyudakam śāntyudaka madhye prakṣipet
anena eva kārayitā prokṣaṇa ācamana ādīni pratyṛcam karoti

original: bṛhadgaṇena vā caturgaṇena vā śāntyudakaṃ karoti /
analyzed: bṛhadgaṇena vā caturgaṇena vā śāntyudakam karoti

original: yatra śantātīyena prayojanaṃ tatrāyaṃ sarvatra prayoktavyaḥ /
analyzed: yatra śantātīyena prayojanam tatra ayam sarvatra prayoktavyaḥ
anyatra sarvatra yathā uktena nyāyena vikalpaḥ
iha punar gaṇa vikalpaḥ na sūkta vikalpaḥ
ubhayatas śānti gaṇasya prārambhe samāptau ca

original: ca bhāṣyaṃ sasāvitrīkasya gaṇasya ubhayataḥ śannodevī bhavati //
analyzed: ca bhāṣyam sa sāvitrīkasya gaṇasya ubhayatas śannodevī bhavati

original: kartā ahatavasano bhūtvā kāṃsyapātre śāntyudakaṃ karoti //
analyzed: kartā ahata vasanaḥ bhūtvā kāṃsya pātre śāntyudakam karoti

original: ityapo'tisṛjya sarvā imā āpa oṣadhayaḥ iti pṛṣṭvā sarvāḥ ityākhyāta oṃ bṛhaspatiprasūtaḥ karavāṇi ityanujñāpya oṃ savitṛprasūtaḥ bhavān ityanujñātaḥ  #
analyzed: iti apotisṛjya sarvāḥ imāḥ āpaḥ oṣadhayaḥ iti pṛṣṭvā sarvāḥ iti ākhyātaḥ om bṛhaspati prasūtaḥ karavāṇi iti anujñāpya om savitṛ prasūtaḥ bhavān iti anujñātaḥ
atisṛṣṭaḥ apām vṛṣabhaḥ iti sūktena apa utisṛjya avakaram visarjayati
sarvāḥ imāḥ āpa oṣadhayaḥ iti pṛṣṭvā
citi ādibhiḥ sarvābhiḥ auṣadhībhiḥ sarvābhiḥ adbhiḥ gaṅgā ādi nadī samudra ādi hrada prabhāsa ādi tīrthebhyaḥ āhṛtābhiḥ adbhi śāntyudakam karoti
kartā bravīti bṛhaspati prasūtaḥ karavāṇi iti
tatas brahmā bravīti savitṛ prasūtaḥ kurutām bhavān

original: 'śaṃ no devī' ityṛcā sāvitryā cāmbayoyantigaṇena ca śāntyudakaṃ karoti /
analyzed: śam naḥ devī iti ṛcā sāvitryā ca ambayā uyanti gaṇena ca śāntyudakam karoti
tatas pṛthivyai śrotrāya iti tris pratyāsiñcati
pūrvayā kurvīta iti gārgya pārthaśravasa bhāgali kāṅkāyana uparibabhrava kauśika jāṭikāyana kaurupathayaḥ
etat śāntyudakam pūrvayā śānti gaṇena kurvīta iti gārgya pārthaśravasa bhāgali kāṅkāyana uparibabhrava kauśika jāṭikāyana kaurupathayaḥ

original: [anyatarayā kurvīteti yuvā kauśiko yuvā kauśikaḥ // KauśS_1,9.11 //]
analyzed: anyatarayā kurvīta iti yuvā kauśikaḥ yuvā kauśikaḥ

original: yatrodakena karma tatra sarvatra śāntyudakaṃ kuryāt /
analyzed: yatra udakena karma tatra sarvatra śāntyudakam kuryāt
ācamana prokṣaṇa avasecana āplavana ādīni sarvāṇi prayojanāni śāntyudakena kāryāṇi
paṭhitam sūtra kāraiḥ ca śrauta smārteṣu karmasu
kārayituḥ prokṣaṇa ācamana dvitayam sarvadā eva hi

original: agnīnāṃ tu tathā kuryāt śraute smārte dvitīyakam //
analyzed: agnīnām tu tathā kuryāt śraute smārte dvitīyakam
kalpasūtraiḥ na dṛṣṭam yat tat ayuktam kadācana

original: yatra punaḥ paṭhitamudakena prayojanaṃ tatra sarvatra karmamadhye kevalaṃ vā kuryāt śāntyartham /
analyzed: yatra punar paṭhitam udakena prayojanam tatra sarvatra karma madhye kevalam vā kuryāt śānti artham

original: yatra śāntyudakaṃ tatra kārayiturnityamācamanaṃ prokṣaṇaṃ ca bhavati /
analyzed: yatra śāntyudakam tatra kārayituḥ nityam ācamanam prokṣaṇam ca bhavati
pramāṇam pārvaṇe ca eva prakṛti tvāt parīkṣite
paribhāṣā ca sarva arthā prathame saṃhitā vidhau
ājya tantram abhyātāna antam kṛtvā ye triṣaptāḥ

original: iti sūktena śukajihvāṃ sampātyābhimantrya puṇyāhānte badhnāti medhākāmaḥ /
analyzed: iti sūktena śuka jihvām sampātya abhimantrya puṇyāha ante badhnāti medhā kāmaḥ

original: athavā'bhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'ye triṣaptāḥ' iti sūktena sārijihvāṃ sampātyābhimantrya puṇyāhānte badhnāti medhākāmaḥ /
analyzed: athavā abhyātāna antam kṛtvā ye triṣaptāḥ iti sūktena sārijihvām sampātya abhimantrya puṇyāha ante badhnāti medhā kāmaḥ

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'ye triṣaptāḥ' iti sūktena kṛśajihvāṃ sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā ye triṣaptāḥ iti sūktena kṛśa jihvām sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti
pratikarma medhā kāmaḥ nuvartate brahmacāri sāmpadebhyaḥ karmabhyaḥ yāvat

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'ye triṣaptāḥ' iti sūktena śukajihvāṃ sampātyābhimantrya prāśayati /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā ye triṣaptāḥ iti sūktena śuka jihvām sampātya abhimantrya prāśayati

original: punastantraṃ kṛtvā 'ye triṣaptāḥ' iti sūktena sārijihvāṃ sampātyābhimantrya prāśayati /
analyzed: punar tantram kṛtvā ye triṣaptāḥ iti sūktena sārijihvām sampātya abhimantrya prāśayati

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'ye triṣaptāḥ' iti sūktena kṛśajihvāṃ sampātyābhimantrya prāśayati /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā ye triṣaptāḥ iti sūktena kṛśa jihvām sampātya abhimantrya prāśayati
ye triṣaptāḥ iti sūktena audumbara samidha ādadhāti
ye triṣaptāḥ iti sūktena palāśa samidhaḥ ādadhāti
ye triṣaptāḥ iti sūktena karkandhū samidhaḥ ādadhāti
ye triṣaptāḥ iti sūktena vrīhīn āvapati
ye triṣaptāḥ iti sūktena yavān āvapati
ye triṣaptāḥ iti sūktena tilān āvapati

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'ye triṣaptāḥ' iti sūktena kṣīraudanaṃ sampātyābhimantrya bhakṣayati /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā ye triṣaptāḥ iti sūktena kṣīraudanam sampātya abhimantrya bhakṣayati

original: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'ye triṣaptāḥ' iti sūktena puroḍāśaṃ sampātyābhimantrya bhakṣayati /
analyzed: tantram kṛtvā ye triṣaptāḥ iti sūktena puroḍāśam sampātya abhimantrya bhakṣayati

original: abhyātānānte 'ye triṣaptāḥ' iti sūktena rasān sampātyābhimantrya bhakṣayati /
analyzed: abhyātāna ante ye triṣaptāḥ iti sūktena rasān sampātya abhimantrya bhakṣayati

original: 'ye triṣaptāḥ' iti sūktenopanayanānantaraṃ dvādaśarātramapakvaṃ pakvaṃ vā pratyahaṃ bahubhaikṣyamekatra kṛtvābhimantryopādhyāyāya dadāti //
analyzed: ye triṣaptāḥ iti sūktena upanayana anantaram dvādaśa rātram apakvam pakvam vā pratyaham bahu bhaikṣyam ekatra kṛtvā abhimantrya upādhyāyāya dadāti

original: 'ye triṣaptāḥ' iti sūktena suptasyopādhyāyasya karṇamanumantrayate brahmacārī /
analyzed: ye triṣaptāḥ iti sūktena suptasya upādhyāyasya karṇam anumantrayate brahmacārī

original: brahmacāriṇaḥ karṇaṃ vā bālasya karṇaṃ vā pitā vābhimantraṇaṃ kuryāt //
analyzed: brahmacāriṇaḥ karṇam vā bālasya karṇam vā pitā vā abhimantraṇam kuryāt

original: 'ye triṣaptāḥ' iti sūktaṃ yadā yadopādhyāyagṛhaṃ yāti tadā tadā japati brahmacārī //
analyzed: ye triṣaptāḥ iti sūktam yadā yadā upādhyāya gṛham yāti tadā tadā japati brahmacārī

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'ye triṣaptāḥ' iti sūktena dhānāḥ sarpirmiśrāḥ sarvā juhoti pratyṛcam /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā ye triṣaptāḥ iti sūktena dhānāḥ sarpiḥ miśrāḥ sarvāḥ juhoti pratyṛcam

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'ye triṣaptāḥ' iti sūktena tilamiśrā hutvā tataḥ prāśnāti /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā ye triṣaptāḥ iti sūktena tila miśrāḥ hutvā tatas prāśnāti

original: [purastādagneḥ kalmāṣaṃ daṇḍaṃ nihatya paścādagneḥ kṛṣṇājine dhānā anumantrayate // KauśS_2,1{10}.12 //
analyzed: purastāt agneḥ kalmāṣam daṇḍam nihatya paścāt agneḥ kṛṣṇājine dhānāḥ anumantrayate

original: sthaṇḍile'gniṃ kṛtvā purastādagneḥ kalmāṣaṃ daṇḍaṃ nihatya paścādagneḥ kṛṣṇājine dhānāḥ kṛtvā 'ye triṣaptāḥ' iti sūktenānumantrya daṇḍadhānājinaṃ  #
analyzed: sthaṇḍila ignim kṛtvā purastāt agneḥ kalmāṣam daṇḍam nihatya paścāt agneḥ kṛṣṇājine dhānāḥ kṛtvā ye triṣaptāḥ iti sūktena anumantrya daṇḍa dhānā ajinam

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā purastādagneḥ kalmāṣaṃ daṇḍaṃ nihatya paścādagneḥ kṛṣṇājine dhānāḥ kṛtvā 'ye triṣaptāḥ' iti sūktena sakṛjjuhoti daṇḍadhānājinaṃ  #
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā purastāt agneḥ kalmāṣam daṇḍam nihatya paścāt agneḥ kṛṣṇājine dhānāḥ kṛtvā ye triṣaptāḥ iti sūktena sakṛt juhoti daṇḍa dhānā ajinam

original: iti śuklapuṣpaharitapuṣpe kiṃstyanābhipippalyau jātarūpaśakalena prākstanagrahāt prāśayati // KauśS_2,1{10}.16 //]
analyzed: iti śukla puṣpa harita puṣpe kiṃstya nābhi pippalyau jātarūpa śakalena prāk stana grahāt prāśayati

original: 'ahaṃ rudrebhiḥ' iti sūktena śuklapuṣpaharitapuṣpe piṣṭvābhimantrya hiraṇyaśakalena prāśayati prāk stanagrahaṇāt /
analyzed: aham rudrebhiḥ iti sūktena śukla puṣpa harita puṣpe piṣṭvā abhimantrya hiraṇya śakalena prāśayati prāk stana grahaṇāt

original: 'ahaṃ rudrebhiḥ' iti sūktena śaṅkhanābhiṃ pippalīṃ ca piṣṭvābhimantrya prāśayati jātarūpaśakalena prāk stanagrahaṇāt /
analyzed: aham rudrebhiḥ iti sūktena śaṅkhanābhim pippalīm ca piṣṭvā abhimantrya prāśayati jātarūpa śakalena prāk stana grahaṇāt
prathama pravadasya mātuḥ upasthe tāluni sampātān ānayati

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'ahaṃ rudrebhiḥ' iti sūktena māṇavakaṃ māturutsaṅge kṛtvā tāluni sampātānānayati /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā aham rudrebhiḥ iti sūktena māṇavakam mātuḥ utsaṅge kṛtvā tāluni sampātān ānayati
samyak vacana kāmaḥ medhā kāmaḥ ca

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'ahaṃ rudrebhiḥ' iti sūktena dadhimadhunī ekatrāsādya sampātyābhimantryāśayati /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā aham rudrebhiḥ iti sūktena dadhi madhunī ekatra āsādya sampātya abhimantrya āśayati

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'ahaṃ rudrebhiḥ' iti sūktaṃ brahmacāriṇaṃ vācayati /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā aham rudrebhiḥ iti sūktam brahmacāriṇam vācayati
daṇḍa pradānam kṛtvā upanayane nityam vācanam

original: 'ahaṃ rudrebhiḥ' iti śuklapuṣpetyādi pañca karmāṇyāyuṣkāmo'pi karoti /
analyzed: aham rudrebhiḥ iti śukla puṣpa ityādi pañca karmāṇi āyuṣkāmaḥ api karoti

original: ājyatantramabhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'tvaṃ no medhe' iti pañcarcena sūktena kṣīraudanaṃ sampātyābhimantrya bhakṣayati /
analyzed: ājya tantram abhyātāna antam kṛtvā tvam naḥ medhe iti pañcarcena sūktena kṣīraudanam sampātya abhimantrya bhakṣayati

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'tvaṃ no medhe' iti sūktena puroḍāśaṃ sampātyābhimantrya bhakṣayati /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā tvam naḥ medhe iti sūktena puroḍāśam sampātya abhimantrya bhakṣayati

original: pūrvatantraṃ kṛtvā 'tvaṃ no medhe' iti sūktena rasān sampātyābhimantrya bhakṣayati / 'tve kratum'
analyzed: pūrva tantram kṛtvā tvam naḥ medhe iti sūktena rasān sampātya abhimantrya bhakṣayati tve kratum

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'dyauśca ma idaṃ pṛthivī ca' (12.1.53)
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā dyauḥ ca me idam pṛthivī ca
iti ekayā kṣīraudanam sampātya abhimantrya bhakṣayati

original: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'dyauśca me' ityṛcā puroḍāśa sampātyābhimantrya bhakṣayati /
analyzed: tantram kṛtvā dyauḥ ca me iti ṛcā puroḍāśa sampātya abhimantrya bhakṣayati

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'dyauśca me' ityṛcā rasān sampātyābhimantrya bhakṣayati /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā dyauḥ ca me iti ṛcā rasān sampātya abhimantrya bhakṣayati
tvam naḥ medhe iti sūktena ādityam upatiṣṭhate
dyauḥ ca me iti ṛcā ādityam upatiṣṭhate

original: āgrahāyaṇyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ tantraṃ kṛtvā 'yadagne tapasā' iti dvābhyāmṛgbhyāṃ raudanaṃ sampātyābhimantrya bhakṣayet /
analyzed: āgrahāyaṇyām paurṇamāsyām tantram kṛtvā yat agne tapasā iti dvābhyām ṛgbhyām raudanam sampātya abhimantrya bhakṣayet

original: mārgaśīrṣapaurṇamāsyāṃ tantraṃ kṛtvā 'yadagne tapasā' iti dvābhyāṃ puroḍāśaṃ sampātyābhimantrya bhakṣayet /
analyzed: mārgaśīrṣa paurṇamāsyām tantram kṛtvā yat agne tapasā iti dvābhyām puroḍāśam sampātya abhimantrya bhakṣayet

original: mārgaśīrṣapaurṇamāsyāṃ tantraṃ kṛtvā 'yadagne tapasā' ityṛgbhyāṃ rasān sampātyābhimantrya bhakṣayati /
analyzed: mārgaśīrṣa paurṇamāsyām tantram kṛtvā yat agne tapasā iti ṛgbhyām rasān sampātya abhimantrya bhakṣayati
yat agne tapasā iti dvābhyām agnim upatiṣṭhate mārgaśīrṣa paurṇamāsyām eva

original: 'prātaragnim' iti sūktena nidrāṃ tyaktvā mukhaṃ prakṣālayati /
analyzed: prātaragnim iti sūktena nidrām tyaktvā mukham prakṣālayati
girāvaragarāṭeṣu iti sūktena suptā utthāya mukham vimārṣṭi
iti sūktābhyām suptā utthāya mukham vimārṣṭi
udaka abhimantraṇam svayam vā anyaḥ api vā karoti

original: medhāvyekaṃ karma kuryād dve vā sarvāṇi vā /
analyzed: medhāvī ekam karma kuryāt dve vā sarvāṇi vā

original: paurṇamāsyāṃ nirṛtikarma kṛtvā sakṛt śvo bhūte sāmpadaṃ kurute //
analyzed: paurṇamāsyām nirṛti karma kṛtvā sakṛt śvas bhūte sāmpadam kurute
ye triṣaptāḥ iti sūktena palāśa samidhaḥ ādadhāti

original: 'ye triṣaptāḥ' iti sūktena brahmacārī gṛhādupastaraṇāni tṛṇānyādadhāti //
analyzed: ye triṣaptāḥ iti sūktena brahmacārī gṛhāt upastaraṇāni tṛṇāni ādadhāti

original: 'ye triṣaptāḥ' iti sūktenāraṇyapipīlikācchidre medomāṃsamadhuśyāmākaśaratūlānyājyaṃ caitāni dravyāṇi juhoti /
analyzed: ye triṣaptāḥ iti sūktena āraṇya pipīlikā chidre medaḥ māṃsa madhu śyāmāka śara tūlāni ājyam ca etāni dravyāṇi juhoti

original: pañca dravyāṇi chidre hutvā tataḥ saṅgṛhyājyasthālyāṃ kṛtvā grāma āgatyābhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'ye triṣaptāḥ' iti sūktena sthālyāḥ

original: bhukte sati 'ye triṣaptāḥ' iti sūktena dhānāḥ tilamiśrā abhimantrya dadāti /
analyzed: bhukte sati ye triṣaptāḥ iti sūktena dhānāḥ tilamiśrāḥ abhimantrya dadāti

ye triṣaptāḥ iti sūktena karkandhū takṣaṇāni ādadhāti
ye triṣaptāḥ iti sūktena sabhānām upastaraṇāni ādadhāti
ye triṣaptāḥ iti sūktena annam abhimantrya grāmīṇebhyaḥ dadāti

original: 'ye triṣaptāḥ' iti sūktena surāmabhimantrya surāpebhyo dadāti /
analyzed: ye triṣaptāḥ iti sūktena surām abhimantrya surā pebhyaḥ dadāti

original: grāmo vā pattanaṃ vā nagaraṃ vā durgāṅgaṃ sarvaṃ grāmaśabdenocyate /
analyzed: grāmaḥ vā pattanam vā nagaram vā durga aṅgam sarvam grāma śabdena ucyate

original: grāmakāmo yadā bhavati tadā grāmasāmpadaṃ kuruta ityarthaḥ //
analyzed: grāma kāmaḥ yadā bhavati tadā grāma sāmpadam kurute iti arthaḥ

ye triṣaptāḥ iti sūktena audumbara samidhaḥ ādadhāti

ye triṣaptāḥ iti sūktena bṛhadbadarī samidhaḥ ādadhāti
ye triṣaptāḥ iti sūktena vrīhinā āvapati
ye triṣaptāḥ iti sūktena yavān āvapati
ye triṣaptāḥ iti sūktena tilān āvapati

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'ye triṣaptāḥ' iti sūktena kṣīraudanaṃ sampātyābhimantrya bhakṣayati /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā ye triṣaptāḥ iti sūktena kṣīraudanam sampātya abhimantrya bhakṣayati

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'ye triṣaptāḥ' iti sūktena puroḍāśaṃ sampātyābhimantrya bhakṣayati /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā ye triṣaptāḥ iti sūktena puroḍāśam sampātya abhimantrya bhakṣayati

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'ye triṣaptāḥ' iti sūktena rasān sampātyābhimantrya bhakṣayati /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā ye triṣaptāḥ iti sūktena rasān sampātya abhimantrya bhakṣayati

original: 'ye triṣaptāḥ' iti sūktena trirahani madhya agniṃ prajvālayati sarvakāmaḥ //
analyzed: ye triṣaptāḥ iti sūktena tris ahani madhya agnim prajvālayati sarva kāmaḥ

analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā ye triṣaptāḥ iti sūktena savyāt pāṇi madhyāt rudhiram rasa miśritam kṛtvā sampātya abhimantrya aśnāti

original: ājyatantramabhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'ye triṣaptāḥ' iti sūktena pṛśnimanthaḥ //
analyzed: ājya tantram abhyātāna antam kṛtvā ye triṣaptāḥ iti sūktena pṛśnimanthaḥ

original: jihvāyā utsādyamakṣyoḥ paristaraṇamastṛhaṇaṃ hṛdayaṃ dūrśa upanahya tisro rātrīḥ palpūlane vāsayati // KauśS_2,1{11}.16 //
analyzed: jihvāyāḥ utsādyam akṣyoḥ paristaraṇam astṛhaṇam hṛdayam dūrśe upanahya tisraḥ rātrīḥ palpūlane vāsayati

original: pṛśnimanthaṃ maiśradhānyaṃ ca dadhimadhumiśraṃ kṛtvā sampātyābhimantryāśnāti /
analyzed: pṛśnimantham maiśradhānyam ca dadhi madhu miśram kṛtvā sampātya abhimantrya aśnāti

original: ājyatantraṃ kṛtvā 'asmin vasu' iti sūktena yugmakṛṣṇalaṃ hiraṇyamaṇiṃ kṛtvā trayodaśyādayastisro dadhimadhuni vāsayitvā sampātyābhimantrya
analyzed: ājya tantram kṛtvā asmin vasu iti sūktena yugma kṛṣṇalam hiraṇya maṇim kṛtvā trayodaśī ādayaḥ tisraḥ dadhi madhuni vāsayitvā sampātya abhimantrya

original: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'yadābadhnan' iti sūktena yugmakṛṣṇalaṃ suvarṇamaṇiṃ vāsitaṃ sampātyābhimantrya puṇyāhānte badhnāti /
analyzed: tantram kṛtvā yat ābadhnan iti sūktena yugma kṛṣṇalam suvarṇa maṇim vāsitam sampātya abhimantrya puṇyāha ante badhnāti

original: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'nava prāṇān' iti sūktena yugmakṛṣṇalaṃ suvarṇamaṇiṃ vāsitaṃ sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: tantram kṛtvā nava prāṇān iti sūktena yugma kṛṣṇalam suvarṇa maṇim vāsitam sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti

original: ājyatantraṃ kṛtvā sārūpavatsa odane puruṣākṛtimālikhya dvādaśarātraṃ 'asmin vasu' iti sūktena pratyahaṃ sampātya dvādaśe'hanyabhimantryānabhimukhamaśnāti
analyzed: ājya tantram kṛtvā sārūpavatse odane puruṣa ākṛtim ālikhya dvādaśa rātram asmin vasu iti sūktena pratyaham sampātya dvādaśa ihani abhimantrya an abhimukham aśnāti

original: prathame'hani tantraṃ kṛtvā 'yadā badhnan' iti sūktena sārūpavatsaṃ puruṣagātraṃ dvādaśarātraṃ sampātavantaṃ kṛtvābhimantryānabhimukhamaśnāti
analyzed: prathamehani tantram kṛtvā yadā badhnan iti sūktena sārūpavatsam puruṣa gātram dvādaśa rātram sampātavantam kṛtvā abhimantrya an abhimukham aśnāti

original: prathame divase tantraṃ kṛtvā 'nava prāṇān' iti sūktena sārūpavatsaṃ puruṣagātraṃ dvādaśarātraṃ sampātavantaṃ kṛtvābhimantryānabhimukhamaśnāti
analyzed: prathame divase tantram kṛtvā nava prāṇān iti sūktena sārūpavatsam puruṣa gātram dvādaśa rātram sampātavantam kṛtvā abhimantrya an abhimukham aśnāti
iti mā ādānaka śṛtam kṣīraudanam aśnāti

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'kathaṃ mahe' iti sūktena mādānakakāṣṭhaśṛtaṃ kṣīraudanaṃ sampātyābhimantryāśnāti /

original: [camase sarūpavatsāyā dugdhe vrīhiyavāvavadhāya mūrcchayitvā madhvāsicyāśayati // KauśS_2,2{12}.2 //]

analyzed: tantram kṛtvā pṛthivyai śrotrāya iti sūktena ājyam juhoti

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'vatso virājaḥ' ityṛcā savyāt pāṇihṛdayāllohitaṃ rasamiśritaṃ sampātyābhimantryāśnāti /

sarva sāmpadāni putra paśu dhana dhānya prajā patnī jaya vijaya lābha lakṣmī aśva hasti nara yānā arāma grāma gṛhak pataḍāga vāpī veda pāṭha kalpa pāṭha veda artha jñāna mīmāṃsā jñāna vyākaraṇa jñāna sūtra jñāna
āvasathya agni tretāgni kāma jyotiṣṭhoma kāma satra kāma dharma artha kāma viśeṣeṣu

pareṣu śatruṣu uccāṭana vaśīkaraṇa gṛha kalaha utpatti vidveṣaṇa stambhana ādi jatu rasāyana dhātuvāda ādi rasa strī bhoga ādi kāma medhya vastu vṛṣabha abhicāra svastyayana āyuṣya caturaṅga bala puṣṭi devatā jñāna ādi sampadaḥ
phala arthinaḥ abhyāsena punar punar kriyā abhyāsena karma siddhiḥ
sarva sāmpadāni iti loka aneka kāma sampad iti ucyate
kapila varṇa gaura varṇa putrāḥ evaṃvidham bhavati iti

analyzed: karmaṇām kramaḥ upi na asti tantreṇa karma paṭhitam

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'prātaragnim' iti sūktena bhaktaṃ sampātyābhimantryāśayati vaiśyaśūdram /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā prātaragnim iti sūktena bhaktam sampātya abhimantrya āśayati vaiśya śūdram

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'girāvaragarāṭeṣu' iti sūktena bhaktaṃ sampātyābhimantryāśayati vaiśyān śūdrān anulomajāṃśca /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā girāvara garāṭeṣu iti sūktena bhaktam sampātya abhimantrya āśayati vaiśyān śūdrān anuloma jān ca
tantram kṛtvā divaḥ pṛthivyāḥ iti artha sūktena bhaktam sampātya abhimantrya āśayati
hasti varcasam iti sūktena hastinam dṛṣṭvā upatiṣṭhate

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'hastivarcasam' iti sūktena hastidantamaṇiṃ sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā hasti varcasam iti sūktena hasti danta maṇim sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'hastivarcasam' iti sūktena hastilomāni jatunā lākṣārasena sandihya hiraṇyena veṣṭayitvā sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā hasti varcasam iti sūktena hasti lomāni jatunā lākṣā rasena sandihya hiraṇyena veṣṭayitvā sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti
iti snātaka siṃha vyāghra basta kṛṣṇa vṛṣabha rājñām nābhi lomāni

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'siṃhe vyāghre' 'yaśo haviḥ' iti sūktābhyāṃ snātakanābhilomāni lākṣāhiraṇyena veṣṭayitvā sampātyābhimantrya puṇyāhānte
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā siṃhe vyāghre yaśaḥ haviḥ iti sūktābhyām snātaka nābhi lomāni lākṣā hiraṇyena veṣṭayitvā sampātya abhimantrya puṇyāha ante

original: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'siṃhe vyāghre' 'yaśo haviḥ' iti sūktābhyāṃ siṃhanābhilomāni lākṣāhiraṇyena veṣṭayitvā sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: tantram kṛtvā siṃhe vyāghre yaśaḥ haviḥ iti sūktābhyām siṃhanābhi lomāni lākṣā hiraṇyena veṣṭayitvā sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti

original: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'siṃhe vyāghre' 'yaśo haviḥ' iti sūktābhyāṃ vyāghranābhilomāni lākṣāhiraṇyena veṣṭayitvā sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: tantram kṛtvā siṃhe vyāghre yaśaḥ haviḥ iti sūktābhyām vyāghra nābhi lomāni lākṣā hiraṇyena veṣṭayitvā sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti

original: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'siṃhe vyāghre' 'yaśo haviḥ' iti sūktābhyāṃ ajanābhilomāni lākṣāhiraṇyena veṣṭayitvā sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: tantram kṛtvā siṃhe vyāghre yaśaḥ haviḥ iti sūktābhyām ajana abhilomāni lākṣā hiraṇyena veṣṭayitvā sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'siṃhe vyāghre' 'yaśo haviḥ' iti sūktābhyāṃ kṛṣṇanābhilomāni gṛhītvā jatunā sandihya jātarūpeṇāpidhāpya sampātyābhimantrya  #
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā siṃhe vyāghre yaśaḥ haviḥ iti sūktābhyām kṛṣṇa nābhi lomāni gṛhītvā jatunā sandihya jātarūpeṇa apidhāpya sampātya abhimantrya

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'siṃhe vyāghre' 'yaśo haviḥ' iti sūktābhyāṃ vṛṣabhanābhiromāṇi lākṣāhiraṇyena veṣṭayitvā sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā siṃhe vyāghre yaśaḥ haviḥ iti sūktābhyām vṛṣabha nābhi romāṇi lākṣā hiraṇyena veṣṭayitvā sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'siṃhe vyāghre' 'yaśo haviḥ' iti sūktābhyāṃ rājñānnābhiromāṇi lākṣāhiraṇyena veṣṭayitvā sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā siṃhe vyāghre yaśaḥ haviḥ iti sūktābhyām rājñā annābhi romāṇi lākṣā hiraṇyena veṣṭayitvā sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti

original: ājyatantraṃ kṛtvā 'siṃhe vyāghre' 'yaśo haviḥ' iti sūktābhyāṃ pālāśādidaśavṛkṣaśakalāni lākṣāhiraṇyena veṣṭayitvā sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti
analyzed: ājya tantram kṛtvā siṃhe vyāghre yaśaḥ haviḥ iti sūktābhyām pālāśa ādi daśa vṛkṣa śakalāni lākṣā hiraṇyena veṣṭayitvā sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti

original: iti sapta marmāṇi sthālīpāke pṛktānyaśnāti // KauśS_2,3{13}.6 //]
analyzed: iti sapta marmāṇi sthālīpāke pṛktāni aśnāti

original: 'prātaragnim' 'girāvaragarāṭeṣu' 'divaspṛthivyāḥ' iti tribhiḥ pratīkaiḥ snātakādisaptamarmāṇi sthālīpāke dattvā tantre sampātyābhimantryāśnāti
analyzed: prātaragnim divaspṛthivyāḥ iti tribhiḥ pratīkaiḥ snātaka ādi sapta marmāṇi sthālīpāke dattvā tantre sampātya abhimantrya aśnāti
sthālīpāke ca idam karma kṣatriya ādīnām

original: akuśalaṃ yo brāhmaṇo lohitamaśnīyāditi gārgyaḥ // KauśS_2,3{13}.7 //
analyzed: akuśalam yaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ lohitam aśnīyāt iti gārgyaḥ

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'prātaragnim' iti sūktena snātakanābhimaṇiṃ lākṣāhiraṇyena veṣṭitaṃ sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā prātaragnim iti sūktena snātaka nābhimaṇim lākṣā hiraṇyena veṣṭitam sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti

original: tantre 'prātaragnim' iti sūktena siṃharomamaṇiṃ saṃskṛtya badhnāti /
analyzed: tantre prātaragnim iti sūktena siṃha roma maṇim saṃskṛtya badhnāti

original: barhirlavanādi tantraṃ kṛtvā 'prātaragnim' iti sūktena vyāghranābhiromamaṇiṃ lākṣāhiraṇyena veṣṭitaṃ kṛtvā sampātyābhimantrya puṇyāhānte badhnāti
analyzed: barhiḥ lavana ādi tantram kṛtvā prātar agnim iti sūktena vyāghranābhi roma maṇim lākṣā hiraṇyena veṣṭitam kṛtvā sampātya abhimantrya puṇyāha ante badhnāti

original: pūrvatantraṃ kṛtvā 'prātaragnim' iti sūktenājanābhiromamaṇiṃ lākṣāhiraṇyena veṣṭitaṃ sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: pūrva tantram kṛtvā prātar agnim iti sūktena aja nābhi roma maṇim lākṣā hiraṇyena veṣṭitam sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti

original: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'prātaragnim' iti sūktena kṛṣṇanābhiromamaṇiṃ lākṣāhiraṇyena veṣṭitaṃ sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: tantram kṛtvā prātaragnim iti sūktena kṛṣṇa nābhi roma maṇim lākṣā hiraṇyena veṣṭitam sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti

original: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'prātaragnim' iti sūktena vṛṣabhanābhiromamaṇiṃ lākṣāhiraṇyena veṣṭitaṃ sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: tantram kṛtvā prātar agnim iti sūktena vṛṣabhanābhi roma maṇim lākṣā hiraṇyena veṣṭitam sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'prātaragnim' iti sūktena rājñāṃ nābhiromamaṇiṃ sampātya lākṣāhiraṇyena veṣṭitaṃ kṛtvābhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā prātaragnim iti sūktena rājñām nābhi roma maṇim sampātya lākṣā hiraṇyena veṣṭitam kṛtvā abhimantrya badhnāti

original: ājyatantraṃ kṛtvā 'girāvaragarāṭeṣu' iti sūktena snātakaromamaṇiṃ lākṣāhiraṇyena veṣṭitaṃ kṛtvā sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: ājya tantram kṛtvā girāvara garāṭeṣu iti sūktena snātaka roma maṇim lākṣā hiraṇyena veṣṭitam kṛtvā sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti

original: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'girāvaragarāṭeṣu' iti sūktena siṃharomamaṇiṃ sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: tantram kṛtvā iti sūktena siṃha roma maṇim sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti

original: pūrvatantraṃ kṛtvā 'girāvara' iti vyāghraromamaṇiṃ sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: pūrva tantram kṛtvā girā avaraḥ iti vyāghra roma maṇim sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti
tantram kṛtvā girā avaraḥ iti aja roma maṇim sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti

original: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'girāvara' iti sūktena meṣaromamaṇiṃ sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: tantram kṛtvā girā avaraḥ iti sūktena meṣa roma maṇim sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti

original: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'girāvara' iti sūktena vṛṣabharomamaṇiṃ sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: tantram kṛtvā girā avaraḥ iti sūktena vṛṣabha roma maṇim sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti

original: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'girāvara' iti rājñāṃ romamaṇiṃ lākṣāhiraṇyena veṣṭitaṃ kṛtvā sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: tantram kṛtvā girā varaḥ iti rājñām roma maṇim lākṣā hiraṇyena veṣṭitam kṛtvā sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti

original: abhyātānānte 'divaspṛthivyāḥ' ityarthasūktena snātakaromamaṇiṃ sampātya lākṣāhiraṇyena veṣṭitamabhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: abhyātāna ante divaspṛthivyāḥ iti artha sūktena snātaka roma maṇim sampātya lākṣā hiraṇyena veṣṭitam abhimantrya badhnāti

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'divaspṛthivyāḥ' iti siṃharomamaṇiṃ sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā divaḥ pṛthivyāḥ iti siṃha roma maṇim sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti

original: abhyānātāntaṃ kṛtvā 'divaspṛthivyāḥ' iti vyāghraromamaṇiṃ sampātya lākṣāsuvarṇena veṣṭitaṃ kṛtvābhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: kṛtvā divaḥ pṛthivyāḥ iti vyāghra roma maṇim sampātya lākṣā suvarṇena veṣṭitam kṛtvā abhimantrya badhnāti

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'divaspṛthivyāḥ' iti sūktenājaromamaṇiṃ sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā divaspṛthivyāḥ iti sūktena aja roma maṇim sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti

original: ājyatantraṃ kṛtvā 'divaspṛthivyāḥ' iti sūktena meṣaromamaṇiṃ sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: ājya tantram kṛtvā divaspṛthivyāḥ iti sūktena meṣa roma maṇim sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti

original: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'divaspṛthivyāḥ' iti vṛṣabharomamaṇiṃ sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: tantram kṛtvā divaḥ pṛthivyāḥ iti vṛṣabha roma maṇim sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'divaspṛthivyāḥ' iti sūktena rājñāṃ romamaṇiṃ sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā divaspṛthivyāḥ iti sūktena rājñām roma maṇim sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'siṃhe vyāghre' 'yaśo haviḥ' 'prātaragnim' 'girāvaragarāṭeṣu' 'divaspṛthivyāḥ' ityetaiḥ sarvaiḥ sūktairudakumbhaṃ sampātyābhimantryāplāvayati
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā siṃhe vyāghre yaśaḥ haviḥ prātar agnim girāvara garāṭeṣu divaḥ pṛthivyāḥ iti etaiḥ sarvaiḥ sūktaiḥ uda kumbham sampātya abhimantrya āplāvayati

original: etadeva nitye snāne naimittike kāmye vā vidhānaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: etat eva nitye snāne naimittike kāmye vā vidhānam bhavati
siṃhe vyāghre yaśaḥ haviḥ prātar agnim girā vara garāṭeṣu divaḥ pṛthivyāḥ iti etaiḥ sūktaiḥ udakam abhimantrya avasiñcati
catur aṅgulam tṛṇam rajoharaṇam bindu nābhiḥ cotya upamathya

original: candanādigandhānāsādya tasmin madhya ākāśodakaṃ prakṣipya caturaṅgulena darbhatṛṇenāloḍya tat tṛṇaṃ gṛhītvā //
analyzed: candana ādi gandhān āsādya tasmin madhye ākāśa udakam prakṣipya catur aṅgulena darbha tṛṇena āloḍya tat tṛṇam gṛhītvā

original: [śuni kilāsamaje palitaṃ tṛṇe jvaro yo'smān dveṣṭiṃ yaṃ ca vayaṃ dviṣmastasmin rājayakṣmaḥ iti dakṣiṇā tṛṇaṃ nirasyati gandhapravādādibhiralaṅkurute
analyzed: śuni kilāsam aje palitam tṛṇe jvaraḥ yaḥ smān dveṣṭim yam ca vayam dviṣmaḥ tasmin rājayakṣmaḥ iti dakṣiṇā tṛṇam nirasyati gandha pravāda ādibhiḥ alaṅkurute

original: 'śuni kilāsamaje' iti mantreṇa dakṣiṇā diśaṃ nirasyati /
analyzed: śuni kilāsam aje iti mantreṇa dakṣiṇā diśam nirasyati
iti tribhiḥ ṛgbhiḥ abhimantrya rājñām samālabhate
dīptiḥ tejaḥ varcaḥ bhavyatāpaśyā abādhyaḥ iti ekaḥ arthaḥ

original: sāṅgrāmikāṇāṃ karmaṇāṃ vidhiṃ vakṣyāmaḥ aśvatthasya badhakasya vāraṇyoragniṃ manthati /
analyzed: sāṅgrāmikāṇām karmaṇām vidhim vakṣyāmaḥ aśvatthasya badhakasya vā araṇyoḥ agnim manthati
iti ardharcena agni patana sthāne kāśa rajjum nidadhāti
avyasaḥ ca barhiḥ lavana ādi samānam

original: pañcagṛhītamājyaṃ abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā lohitāśvatthasya śākhāṃ ropayati /
analyzed: pañca gṛhītam ājyam abhyātāna antam kṛtvā lohitāśvatthasya śākhām ropayati
sannati homa antam kṛtvā ime jayantu svāhebhyaḥ

original: tato badhakakāṣṭhaprajvalite'gnau vāmena hasteneṅgiḍaṃ juhoti 'parāmī jayantāṃ durāhāmībhyaḥ' (8.8.24)
analyzed: tatas badhaka kāṣṭha prajvalita ignau vāmena hastena iṅgiḍam juhoti parā amī jayantām durāhā amībhyaḥ
tatas śākhām dakṣiṇatas prakṣipati nīla lohitena amūn
tantra madhye ye pradhāna mantrāḥ te uccais bhavanti
śatru hasti trāsanānām karmaṇām vidhim vakṣyāmaḥ

original: iti sūktena rathacakraṃ sampātavat kṛtvā hastyabhimukhaṃ rathaṃ pravartayati /
analyzed: iti sūktena ratha cakram sampātavat kṛtvā hasti abhimukham ratham pravartayati
rāja karmāṇi anuvartante ā nirṛti karmabhyaḥ yāvat

original: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'ye triṣaptāḥ' iti sūktena hastyādi yānaṃ sampātyābhimantrya hastyabhimukhaṃ prerayati /
analyzed: tantram kṛtvā ye triṣaptāḥ iti sūktena hasti ādi yānam sampātya abhimantrya hasti abhimukham prerayati

original: 'ye triṣaptāḥ' iti sūktena vāditrāṇi bherīmṛdaṅgetyādi abhimantrya hastino'bhi purato gacchanti //
analyzed: ye triṣaptāḥ iti sūktena vāditrāṇi bherī mṛdaṅga ityādi abhimantrya puratas gacchanti

original: 'ye triṣaptāḥ' iti sūktena carmakhalvāyāṃ śarkarāḥ prakṣipyābhimantrya hastyabhimukhāḥ puruṣāḥ yānti /
analyzed: ye triṣaptāḥ iti sūktena carma khalvāyām śarkarāḥ prakṣipya abhimantrya hasti abhimukhāḥ puruṣāḥ yānti

original: 'ye triṣaptāḥ' iti carmapuṭe śarkarāḥ prakṣipyābhimantrya hastino'bhimukhān preṣayati //
analyzed: ye triṣaptāḥ iti carma puṭe śarkarāḥ prakṣipya abhimantrya hastinā abhimukhān preṣayati

original: 'ye triṣaptāḥ' iti sūktena velukamabhimantrya yatra hastinastatrābhimukho yāti /
analyzed: ye triṣaptāḥ iti sūktena velukam abhimantrya yatra hastinaḥ tatra abhimukhaḥ yāti

original: anena karmaṇā hastinaḥ palāyante paracakrahastinasteṣāṃ trāsanakarma //
analyzed: anena karmaṇā hastinaḥ palāyante para cakra hastinaḥ teṣām trāsana karma
mā naḥ vidan a dāra sṛt svasti dā

original: sāṅgrāmikaṃ tantramabhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'vidmā śarasya pitaraṃ parjanyaṃ bhūridhāyasam' iti sūktenājyaṃ juhoti /
analyzed: sāṅgrāmikam tantram abhyātāna antam kṛtvā vidma śarasya pitaram parjanyam bhūri dhāyasam iti sūktena ājyam juhoti
jaya karmāṇi anuvartante ā rāṣṭrapraveśa karmabhyaḥ yāvat

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'mā no vidan' iti tribhiḥ (1.19-21)
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā mā naḥ vidan iti tribhiḥ
ājya tantram kṛtvā ava manyuḥ iti tribhiḥ
sāṅgrāmikam tantram kṛtvā abhibhūḥ yajñaḥ iti tribhiḥ

original: ājyatantraṃ kṛtvā 'vidmā śarasya' iti sūktena saktūñjuhoti /
analyzed: ājya tantram kṛtvā vidma śarasya iti sūktena saktūn juhoti

original: sāṅgrāmikaṃ tantraṃ kṛtvā 'mā no vidan' iti tribhiḥ sūktaiḥ saktūñjuhoti /
analyzed: sāṅgrāmikam tantram kṛtvā mā naḥ vidan iti tribhiḥ sūktaiḥ saktūn juhoti

original: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'ava manyuḥ' iti tribhiḥ sūktaiḥ saktūñjuhoti /
analyzed: tantram kṛtvā ava manyuḥ iti tribhiḥ sūktaiḥ saktūn juhoti

original: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'abhibhūryajñaḥ' iti tribhiḥ sūktaiḥ saktūñjuhoti /
analyzed: tantram kṛtvā abhibhūḥ yajñaḥ iti tribhiḥ sūktaiḥ saktūn juhoti
idhma samādhāna sthāne dhanuḥ idhmam ādadhāti

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'vidmā śarasya' iti sūktena dhanuḥsamidha ādadhāti /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā vidma śarasya iti sūktena dhanuḥ samidhaḥ ādadhāti

original: sāṅgrāmikaṃ pūrvatantraṃ dhanuridhmaviśiṣṭaṃ kṛtvā 'mā no vidan' iti tribhiḥ sūktaiḥ dhanuḥsamidha ādadhāti /
analyzed: sāṅgrāmikam pūrva tantram dhanuḥ idhma viśiṣṭam kṛtvā mā naḥ vidan iti tribhiḥ sūktaiḥ dhanuḥ samidhaḥ ādadhāti

original: dhanuridhmaviśiṣṭaṃ abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'ava manyuḥ' iti tribhiḥ sūktairdhanuḥsamidha ādadhāti /
analyzed: dhanuḥ idhma viśiṣṭam abhyātāna antam kṛtvā ava manyuḥ iti tribhiḥ sūktaiḥ dhanuḥ samidhaḥ ādadhāti

original: dhanuridhmaviśiṣṭamabhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'abhibhūryajñaḥ' ityetaistribhiḥ sūktaḥ dhanuḥsamidhaḥ prādeśamātrīrādadhāti /
analyzed: dhanuḥ idhma viśiṣṭam abhyātāna antam kṛtvā abhibhūḥ yajñaḥ iti etaiḥ tribhiḥ sūktaḥ dhanuḥ samidhaḥ prādeśa mātrīḥ ādadhāti

original: barhirlavanādi idhmaprokṣaṇaṃ śarairidhmopasamādhānaṃ 'agnirbhūmyām' ityādi abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'vidmā śarasya' iti sūktena śarasamidhaḥ prādeśamātrīḥ  #
analyzed: barhiḥ lavana ādi idhma prokṣaṇam śaraiḥ idhma upasamādhānam agniḥ bhūmyām ityādi abhyātāna antam kṛtvā vidma śarasya iti sūktena śara samidhaḥ prādeśa mātrīḥ

original: śaredhmaviśiṣṭaṃ tantraṃ kṛtvā 'mā no vidan' iti tribhiḥ sūktaiḥ śarasamidha ādadhāti /
analyzed: śara idhma viśiṣṭam tantram kṛtvā mā naḥ vidan iti tribhiḥ sūktaiḥ śara samidhaḥ ādadhāti

original: śaredhmaviśiṣṭaṃ tantraṃ kṛtvā 'ava manyuḥ' iti tribhiḥ sūktaiḥ śarasamidha ādadhāti /
analyzed: śara idhma viśiṣṭam tantram kṛtvā ava manyuḥ iti tribhiḥ sūktaiḥ śara samidhaḥ ādadhāti

original: śaredhmopasamādhānādi tantraṃ kṛtvā 'abhibhūryajñaḥ' ityetaiḥ tribhiḥ sūktaiḥ śarasamidha ādadhāti /
analyzed: śara idhma upasamādhāna ādi tantram kṛtvā abhibhūḥ yajñaḥ iti etaiḥ tribhiḥ sūktaiḥ śara samidhaḥ ādadhāti

original: sāṅgrāmikaṃ tantraṃ kṛtvā 'vidmā śarasya' iti sūktena dhanuḥ sampātyābhimantrya vimṛjya rājñe prayacchati /
analyzed: sāṅgrāmikam tantram kṛtvā vidma śarasya iti sūktena dhanuḥ sampātya abhimantrya vimṛjya rājñe prayacchati

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'mā no vidan' iti tribhiḥ sūktaiḥ dhanuḥ sampātyābhimantrya hastena vimṛjya prayacchati /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā mā naḥ vidan iti tribhiḥ sūktaiḥ dhanuḥ sampātya abhimantrya hastena vimṛjya prayacchati

original: sāṅgrāmikaṃ tantraṃ kṛtvā 'ava manyuḥ' iti tribhiḥ sūktaiḥ dhanuḥ sampātyābhimantrya hastena vimṛjya rājñe samarpayati /
analyzed: sāṅgrāmikam tantram kṛtvā ava manyuḥ iti tribhiḥ sūktaiḥ dhanuḥ sampātya abhimantrya hastena vimṛjya rājñe samarpayati

original: sāṅgrāmikaṃ tantramabhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'abhibhūryajñaḥ' ityetaistribhiḥ sūktaiḥ dhanuḥ sampātyābhimantrya hastena vimṛjya rājñe prayacchati
analyzed: sāṅgrāmikam tantram abhyātāna antam kṛtvā abhibhūḥ yajñaḥ iti etaiḥ tribhiḥ sūktaiḥ dhanuḥ sampātya abhimantrya hastena vimṛjya rājñe prayacchati
kṣetra dāra haraṇe śastra haraṇe ca brāhmaṇa kṣatriya vaiśya śūdra ādi grāma nagara ādi sarvasya adhikāraḥ
ebhiḥ karmabhiḥ dṛṣṭa mātreṇa śatravaḥ palāyante
drughnī ārtnī jyā pāśa tṛṇa mūlāni badhnāti

original: abhyatānāntaṃ sāṅgrāmikaṃ tantraṃ kṛtvā 'vidmā śarasya' iti sūktena drughnyārtnījyāpāśaṃ dvyaṅgulamātraṃ chittvā sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti
analyzed: abhyatāna antam sāṅgrāmikam tantram kṛtvā vidma śarasya iti sūktena drughnī ārtnī jyā pāśam dvi aṅgula mātram chittvā sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti

original: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'vidmā śarasya' iti sūktena dūrvādi tṛṇamūlaṃ sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: tantram kṛtvā vidma śarasya iti sūktena dūrvā ādi tṛṇa mūlam sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti

original: yo yuddhe praviśati tasya maṇibandhanaṃ kriyate /
analyzed: yaḥ yuddhe praviśati tasya maṇibandhanam kriyate

original: athavā rājñe kṛtaṃ sarveṣāṃ kṛtaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: athavā rājñe kṛtam sarveṣām kṛtam bhavati
sarvatra puṇya aha ante bandhanam bhavati

original: anena karmaṇā puruṣaśarīre iṣavo na patanti pārśvato gacchanti /
analyzed: anena karmaṇā puruṣa śarīre iṣavaḥ na patanti pārśvatas gacchanti
yuddha kāle śara nivāraṇāni iti arthaḥ
sarva śastra nivāraṇa karmaṇām vidhim vakṣyāmaḥ
āresau iti etena sūktena kukūlān juhoti senāgnau
ārasau iti sūktam śatrum dṛṣṭvā japati
evam kriyamāṇe sarva śastra nivāraṇa siddhiḥ
khaḍga ādi sarva śastra nivāraṇam samāptam

original: sāṅgrāmikaṃ tantraṃ kṛtvā 'agnirnaḥ śatrūn' 'agnirno dūtaḥ' iti sūktābhyāmodanena phalīkaraṇān piṇḍīkṛtyolūkhalena juhoti /
analyzed: sāṅgrāmikam tantram kṛtvā agniḥ naḥ śatrūn agniḥ naḥ dūtaḥ iti sūktābhyām odanena phalīkaraṇān piṇḍīkṛtya ulūkhalena juhoti

original: abhyātānāntaṃ tantraṃ kṛtvā 'agnirnaḥ' iti sūktābhyāmodanena saha kaṇikāḥ piṇḍīkṛtyolūkhalena juhoti /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam tantram kṛtvā agniḥ naḥ iti sūktābhyām odanena saha kaṇikāḥ piṇḍīkṛtya ulūkhalena juhoti

original: 'agnirnaḥ śatrūn' iti sūktābhyāmekaviṃśatiśarkarāḥ śūrpe kṛtvā śatrūn prati niṣpunāti //
analyzed: agniḥ naḥ śatrūn iti sūktābhyām ekaviṃśati śarkarāḥ śūrpe kṛtvā śatrūn prati niṣpunāti

original: carutantramājyabhāgāntaṃ kṛtvā 'agnirnaḥ śatrūn' iti sūktābhyāṃ caruṃ juhuyāt /
analyzed: caru tantram ājyabhāga antam kṛtvā agniḥ naḥ śatrūn iti sūktābhyām carum juhuyāt

original: 'apvāyai juṣṭaṃ nirvapāmi' 'apvāyai tvā juṣṭaṃ prokṣāmi' 'apvāṃ gacchatu svāhā' iti /
analyzed: apvāyai juṣṭam nirvapāmi apvāyai tvā juṣṭam prokṣāmi apvām gacchatu svāhā iti

original: abhyātānāntaṃ sāṅgrāmikaṃ tantraṃ kṛtvā 'saṃśitaṃ me' iti sūktenājāṃ sitapadīṃ sampātyābhimantrya śatrusenāṃ prati visarjayati /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam sāṅgrāmikam tantram kṛtvā saṃśitam me iti sūktena ajām sitapadīm sampātya abhimantrya śatru senām prati visarjayati
śvetena pādena ajā vā aviḥ vaiṇaḥ vā
hasti aśva padātīnām sarveṣām mohanam acetana tvam bhavati iti arthaḥ
senā agnau mohana ādīni sarvāṇi karmāṇi kāryāṇi
para sainyasya mohanam sthāpanam iti arthaḥ
imam indraḥ iti yuktayoḥ pradāna antāni

original: sāṅgrāmikaṃ tantramabhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'saṃśitaṃ me' iti sūktaṃ 'imamindra' iti dvitīyam /
analyzed: sāṅgrāmikam tantram abhyātāna antam kṛtvā saṃśitam me iti sūktam imam indraḥ iti dvitīyam
imam indra vardhaya iti sūktābhyām pratyṛcam saktūn juhoti

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'saṃśitaṃ me' 'imamindra vardhaya kṣatriyaṃ me' iti sūktābhyāṃ dhanuḥsamidha ādadhāti /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā saṃśitam me imam indra vardhaya kṣatriyam me iti sūktābhyām dhanuḥ samidhaḥ ādadhāti

original: iṣvidhma ājyatantramabhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'saṃśitaṃ me' 'imamindra' iti sūktābhyāmiṣusamidha ādadhāti /
analyzed: iṣu idhme ājya tantram abhyātāna antam kṛtvā saṃśitam me imam indraḥ iti sūktābhyām iṣu samidhaḥ ādadhāti

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'saṃśitaṃ me' 'imamindra' iti sūktābhyāṃ dhanuḥ sampātyābhimantrya hastena vimṛjya rājñe prayacchati /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā saṃśitam me imam indraḥ iti sūktābhyām dhanuḥ sampātya abhimantrya hastena vimṛjya rājñe prayacchati
sva senā rakṣaṇa artham karma ucyate
iti sūktābhyām pratyṛcam mantra uktam pratidiśam upatiṣṭhate
namaḥ deva vadhebhyaḥ iti tṛcena sva senām pratidiśam upatiṣṭhate
jaya kāmaḥ pratidiśam rakṣaṇa artham ca
yaḥ te manyo iti sūkta dvayam
bhāṅga mauñjān pāśān iṅgiḍa alaṅkṛtān sampātavataḥ unūktān senā krameṣu vapati

original: 'yaste manyo' iti sūktābhyāṃ bhāṅgamauñjān pāśāniṅgiḍālaṅkṛtān sampātyābhimantrya parasenāyāṃ prakṣipati /
analyzed: yaḥ te manyo iti sūktābhyām bhāṅga mauñjān pāśān iṅgiḍa alaṅkṛtān sampātya abhimantrya para senāyām prakṣipati

original: tantraṃ kṛtvā mauñjapāśāniṅgiḍālaṅkṛtān sampātyābhimantrya ucchvasan anūktagrahaṇāt kruddhenābhimantraṇamityucyate /
analyzed: tantram kṛtvā mauñja pāśān iṅgiḍa alaṅkṛtān sampātya abhimantrya ucchvasan anūkta grahaṇāt kruddhena abhimantraṇam iti ucyate

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'tvayā manyo' iti sūktābhyām āmapātrāṇi sampātyābhimantrya kruddhaḥ senākrameṣu vapati /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā tvayā manyo iti sūktābhyām āma pātrāṇi sampātya abhimantrya kruddhaḥ senā krameṣu vapati
iṅgiḍena samprokṣya tṛṇāni āṅgirasena agninā dīpayati

original: 'tvayā manyo' 'yaste manyo' iti sūktābhyāṃ śaratṛṇānīṅgiḍena prokṣitānyabhimantrya tata āṅgirasenāgninā dīpayati senayormadhye kṛtvā /
analyzed: tvayā manyo yaḥ te manyo iti sūktābhyām śara tṛṇāni iṅgiḍena prokṣitāni abhimantrya tatas āṅgirasena agninā dīpayati senayoḥ madhye kṛtvā

original: yatra dhūmo gacchati tatra na jayaḥ /
analyzed: yatra dhūmaḥ gacchati tatra na jayaḥ
iti sva senāyāḥ utsāha karaṇam samāptam
āṅgiraḥ agniḥ cāṇḍāla agniḥ sūtīka agniḥ

original: ityāśvatthyāṃ pātryāṃ trivṛti gomayaparicaye hastipṛṣṭhe puruṣaśirasi vāmitrāñjuhvadabhiprakramya nivapati // KauśS_2,5{15}.1 //]
analyzed: iti āśvatthyām pātryām trivṛti gomaya paricaye hasti pṛṣṭhe puruṣa śirasi vā amitrān juhvat abhiprakramya nivapati

original: 'tadidāsa' iti sūktābhyāmāśvatthyāṃ pātryāṃ trivṛti gomayaparicaye'gniṃ prajvālya hastipṛṣṭhe śatrūnabhimukho gacchan ājyaṃ juhoti /
analyzed: tat idāse iti sūktābhyām āśvatthyām pātryām trivṛti gomaya paricaye ignim prajvālya hasti pṛṣṭhe śatrūn abhimukhaḥ gacchan ājyam juhoti

original: puruṣaśirasi vāśvatthyāṃ pātryāṃ trivṛti gomayaparicaye'gniṃ prajvālya śatrūnabhimukho gacchan 'ṛdhaṅmantra',
analyzed: puruṣa śirasi vā āśvatthyām pātryām trivṛti gomaya paricaye ignim prajvālya śatrūn abhimukhaḥ gacchan ṛdhak mantra
tat idāse iti sūktābhyām ājyam juhoti
varāha vihita mṛttikāyāḥ rājānaḥ vedim kurvanti

original: tataḥ kartābhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'ṛdhaṅmantraḥ' 'tadidāsa' iti sūktābhyāmājyaṃ juhoti /
analyzed: tatas kartā abhyātāna antam kṛtvā ṛdhak mantraḥ tadidāsaḥ iti sūktābhyām ājyam juhoti

original: varāhavihitādi pūrvatantraṃ kṛtvā 'ṛdhaṅmantraḥ' 'tadidāsa' iti sūktābhyāṃ saktūñjuhoti /

original: pūrvoktena tantraṃ kṛtvā 'ṛdhaṅmantraḥ' iti sūktābhyāṃ dhanuridhme dhanuḥsamidha ādadhāti /

original: varāhavihitādyabhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'ṛdhaṅmantraḥ' 'tadidāsa' iti sūktābhyāṃ dhanuḥ sampātyābhimantrya vimṛjya rājñe prayacchati /
analyzed: varāha vihita ādi abhyātāna antam kṛtvā ṛdhak mantraḥ tadidāsaḥ iti sūktābhyām dhanuḥ sampātya abhimantrya vimṛjya rājñe prayacchati

original: [ekeṣvāhatasyādahana upasamādhāya dīrghadaṇḍena sruveṇa rathacakrasya khena samayā juhoti // KauśS_2,5{15}.4 //]

original: sruveṇa 'ṛdhaṅmantraḥ' 'tadidāsa' iti sūktābhyāṃ cakracchidreṇājyamagnau juhoti / na tantram //

vacanam śrutvā yuddham yojayet sva senāyāḥ
yadi cit nu tvā iti ṛcam japitvā dveṣyam anvāha
namaḥ deva vadhebhyaḥ iti sūktam japitvā dveṣyam anvāha

original: agnimanthanādi sāṅgrāmikaṃ tantraṃ kṛtvā 'yadi cinnu tvā' ityekayājyaṃ juhoti /

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'yadi cinnu tvā dhanā' ityekayā saktūñjuhoti /

original: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'yadi cinnu tvā' ityṛcā dhanuridhme dhanuḥsamidha ādadhāti /
analyzed: tantram kṛtvā yadi cit nu tvā iti ṛcā dhanuḥ idhme dhanuḥ samidhaḥ ādadhāti

original: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'yadi cinnu tvā' ityṛcā śaredhme śarasamidha ādadhāti /

original: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'namo devavadhebhyaḥ' iti sūktenājyaṃ juhoti /

original: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'namo devavadhebhyaḥ' iti sūktena saktūñjuhoti /
analyzed: tantram kṛtvā namaḥ deva vadhebhyaḥ iti sūktena saktūn juhoti

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'namo devavadhebhyaḥ' iti sūktena dhanuridhme dhanuḥsamidha ādadhāti /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā namaḥ deva vadhebhyaḥ iti sūktena dhanuḥ idhme dhanuḥ samidhaḥ ādadhāti

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'namo devavadhebhyaḥ' iti sūkteneṣvidhma iṣusamidha ādadhāti /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā namaḥ deva vadhebhyaḥ iti sūktena iṣu idhme iṣu samidhaḥ ādadhāti

original: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'namo devavadhebhyaḥ' iti sūktena dhanuḥ sampātyābhimantrya vimṛjya vaiśyāya prayacchati /
analyzed: tantram kṛtvā namaḥ deva vadhebhyaḥ iti sūktena dhanuḥ sampātya abhimantrya vimṛjya vaiśyāya prayacchati

original: sāṅgrāmikaṃ tantramabhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'tvayā vayam' ityekayājyaṃ juhoti /
analyzed: sāṅgrāmikam tantram abhyātāna antam kṛtvā tvayā vayam iti eka yājyam juhoti

original: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'tvayā vayam' ityṛcā dhanuridhme dhanuḥsamidha ādadhāti /

original: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'tvayā vayam' ityṛceṣvidhma iṣusamidha ādadhāti /
analyzed: tantram kṛtvā tvayā vayam iti ṛcā iṣu idhme iṣu samidhaḥ ādadhāti

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'tvayā vayam' ityṛcā dhanuḥ sampātyābhimantrya vimṛjya balādhikṛtāya prayacchati /

original: ni taddadhiṣe ityṛcodapātramabhimantrya tato dvau dvau yoddhārāvavekṣayet //

original: rājā yaṃ na paśyet na yudhyeta na yodhayet /
analyzed: rājā yam na paśyet na yudhyeta na yodhayet

original: atha nave rathe ghaṭite saṃskāra ucyate jayakāmasya -
analyzed: atha nave rathe ghaṭite saṃskāraḥ ucyate jaya kāmasya

original: iti navaṃ rathaṃ rājānaṃ sasārathimāsthāpayati // KauśS_2,5{15}.11 //]
analyzed: iti navam ratham rājānam sa sārathim āsthāpayati
ni tat dadhiṣe iti ṛcā ratham abhimantrya sa sārathim rājānam āsthāpayati

original: 'vanaspate vīḍvaṅgaḥ' iti tṛcena sūktena navarathamabhimantrya sasārathiṃ rājānamāsthāpayati /
analyzed: vanaspate vīḍu aṅgaḥ iti tṛcena sūktena nava ratham abhimantrya sa sārathim rājānam āsthāpayati

original: 'ayā viṣṭhā janayan' iti dvābhyāmṛgbhyāṃ navaṃ rathamabhimantrya sasārathiṃ rājānamāsthāpayati /
analyzed: ayā viṣṭhā janayan iti dvābhyām ṛgbhyām navam ratham abhimantrya sa sārathim rājānam āsthāpayati

original: 'agna indraśca dāśuṣe' iti dvābhyāmṛgbhyāṃ navaṃ rathamabhimantrya sasārathiṃ rājānamāsthāpayati /
analyzed: agne indraḥ ca dāśuṣe iti dvābhyām ṛgbhyām navam ratham abhimantrya sa sārathim rājānam āsthāpayati

original: 'diśaścatasraḥ' iti dvābhyāmṛgbhyāṃ navaṃ rathamabhimantrya rājānaṃ sasārathimāsthāpayati /
analyzed: diśaḥ catasraḥ iti dvābhyām ṛgbhyām navam ratham abhimantrya rājānam sa sārathim āsthāpayati

original: iti sūktena tisraḥ snāvarajjūrabhimantrya tato'ṅgāreṣu nidadhāti //
analyzed: iti sūktena tisraḥ snāva rajjūḥ abhimantrya tatas uṅgāreṣu nidadhāti

original: yadi tā utkṣaranti tata ārogyatā bhavati /
analyzed: yadi tāḥ utkṣaranti tatas ārogya tā bhavati
sāṅgrāmikam etāḥ vyādiśati madhye mṛtyuḥ itare sene

original: iti sūktena tisraḥ snāvarajjūrabhimantrya tataḥ saṅkalpaḥ /
analyzed: iti sūktena tisraḥ snāva rajjūḥ abhimantrya tatas saṅkalpaḥ

original: yasyā upari mṛtyurgacchati tasyāḥ senāyā jayo na bhavati /
analyzed: yasyāḥ upari mṛtyuḥ gacchati tasyāḥ senāyāḥ jayaḥ na bhavati

original: yā mṛtyorupari patati tasyā jayo bhavati /
analyzed: yā mṛtyoḥ upari patati tasyāḥ jayaḥ bhavati

original: parasenāsammukhā yā yāti tasyā api jayo bhavati //
analyzed: para senā sammukhā yā yāti tasyāḥ api jayaḥ bhavati

original: [agreṣūtkucatsu mukhyā hanyante madhyeṣu madhyā anteṣvavare // KauśS_2,5{15}.17 //]
analyzed: agreṣu utkucatsu mukhyāḥ hanyante madhyeṣu madhyāḥ anteṣu avare

original: iti dvitīyena sūktena snāvarajjumekāmabhimantrya tato'ṅgāreṣu nidadhāti /
analyzed: iti dvitīyena sūktena snāva rajjum ekām abhimantrya tatas uṅgāreṣu nidadhāti
agreṣu agreḥ paścima digbhāgeṣu utkucatsu mukhyāḥ hanyante
anteṣu pūrva diśā anteṣu avara padāti vināśaḥ

original: baddhvā rajjūḥ kṛtāḥ 'brahma jajñānam' iti sūktenābhimantrya karoti /
analyzed: baddhvā rajjūḥ kṛtāḥ brahma jajñānam iti sūktena abhimantrya karoti
snāva rajju mukhya madhyama avara vijñāna karma

original: iṣīkāḥ śaramayā vā vīriṇamayā vā kartavyāḥ /
analyzed: iṣīkāḥ śara mayāḥ vā vīriṇa mayāḥ vā kartavyāḥ
atha para senā trāsana vidveṣaṇam ucyate

original: iti sarvavāditrāṇi prakṣālya tagarośīreṇa sandhāvya sampātavanti trirāhatya prayacchati // KauśS_2,6{16}.1 //]
analyzed: iti sarva vāditrāṇi prakṣālya tagara uśīreṇa sandhāvya sampātavanti tris āhatya prayacchati

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'uccairghoṣaḥ' iti sūktena bheryādivāditrāṇi prakṣālya tagarośīreṇa lepayitvā sampātya tataḥ svayaṃ purodhā (vādayitṛbhyaḥ)
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā uccairghoṣaḥ iti sūktena bherī ādi vāditrāṇi prakṣālya tagara uśīreṇa lepayitvā sampātya tatas svayam purodhāḥ vādayitṛbhyaḥ

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā vāditrāṇi prakṣālya tagarośīreṇa sandhāvya 'upa śvāsaya' iti sūktena vāditrāṇi sampātavanti kṛtvā trirāhatya prayacchati
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā vāditrāṇi prakṣālya tagara uśīreṇa sandhāvya upa śvāsayaḥ iti sūktena vāditrāṇi sampātavanti kṛtvā tris āhatya prayacchati
vihṛdayam iti uccaistarām hutvā sruvam udvartayan

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'vihṛdayam' iti sūktena sarvavāditrāṇi prakṣālya tagarośīreṇa lepayitvoccaistarāṃ hutvā sampātavanti trirāhatya prayacchati
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā vihṛdayam iti sūktena sarva vāditrāṇi prakṣālya tagara uśīreṇa lepayitvā uccaistarām hutvā sampātavanti tris āhatya prayacchati
soma aṃśum hariṇa carmaṇi utsīvya kṣatriyāya badhnāti

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'vihṛdayam' iti sūktena somāṅkuramaṇiṃ hariṇacarmaṇāveṣṭitaṃ kṛtvā sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā vihṛdayam iti sūktena soma aṅkura maṇim hariṇa carmaṇā veṣṭitam kṛtvā sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti

original: 'vihṛdayam' iti sūktasya sarvatra uccaistareṇa svareṇa prayogaḥ /
analyzed: vihṛdayam iti sūktasya sarvatra uccaistareṇa svareṇa prayogaḥ

original: iti rājā triḥ senāṃ pariyāti // KauśS_2,6{16}.4 //]
'pari vartmāni sarvataḥ' iti sūktena rājā triḥ senāṃ paribhrāmyati /
analyzed: pari vartmāni sarvatas iti sūktena rājā tris senām paribhrāmyati

original: 'indro jayāti' iti sūktena rājā triḥ kaṭakaṃ bhrāmyet /
analyzed: indraḥ jayāti iti sūktena rājā tris kaṭakam bhrāmyet

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'pari vartmāni' iti sūktena somamaṇiṃ carmaveṣṭitaṃ kṛtvā sampātyābhimantrya rājñe badhnāti /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā pari vartmāni iti sūktena soma maṇim carma veṣṭitam kṛtvā sampātya abhimantrya rājñe badhnāti

original: 'ādānena' iti sūktābhyāṃ bhāṅgapāśān sampātyābhimantrya senākrameṣu vapati /
analyzed: ādānena iti sūktābhyām bhāṅga pāśān sampātya abhimantrya senā krameṣu vapati
jaya karmāṇi anuvartante asmin vasu iti rāṣṭra avagamanam yāvat

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'sandānaṃ vaḥ' 'ādānena' iti sūktābhyāṃ mauñjān pāśāniṅgiḍālaṅkṛtān sampātavato'nūktān abhimantrya senākrameṣu vapati /
