analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā sandānam vaḥ ādānena iti sūktābhyām mauñjān pāśān iṅgiḍa alaṅkṛtān sampātavataḥ unūktān abhimantrya senā krameṣu vapati

original: 'marmāṇi te' ityṛcā sannāhamabhimantrya rājānaṃ sannāhaṃ paridhāpayati /
analyzed: marmāṇi te iti ṛcā sannāham abhimantrya rājānam sannāham paridhāpayati

original: iti sūktena saptarṣīn yajate pratidiśaṃ senāyāḥ /
analyzed: iti sūktena saptarṣīn yajate pratidiśam senāyāḥ

original: 'abhayaṃ dyāvāpṛthivī' iti sūktena pratidiśaṃ senāyā upatiṣṭhate vā /
analyzed: abhayam dyāvāpṛthivī iti sūktena pratidiśam senāyāḥ upatiṣṭhate vā

original: iti sūktena saptarṣīn yajata upatiṣṭhate vā senāyāḥ pratidiśam /
analyzed: iti sūktena saptarṣīn yajate upatiṣṭhate vā senāyāḥ pratidiśam
abhayam dyāvāpṛthivī śyenā usi iti pratidiśam saptarṣīn abhaya kāmaḥ kauśs
ekasmin sthāne karma prayogam vā kuryāt
diśi diśi abhimukhāni tantrāṇi kṛtvā yajate
sva sthāne urdhva sthitaḥ diśi abhimukhaḥ caturṣu dikṣu kuryāt
uktam agni manthanam ādau indraḥ manthatu iti
tasmin araṇye sapatna kṣayaṇīḥ ādadhāti aśvattha badhaka tājada bhaṅgāhva khadira śarāṇām
indraḥ manthatu iti sūktena aśvattha samidhaḥ ādadhāti
indraḥ manthatu iti sūktena kari mālaka samidhaḥ ādadhāti
indraḥ manthatu iti sūktena eraṇḍa samidhaḥ ādadhāti
indraḥ manthatu iti sūktena tirṇi samidhaḥ ādadhāti
indraḥ manthatu iti sūktena khadira samidhaḥ ādadhāti

original: 'indro manthatu' iti sūktena śarasamidha ādadhāti senāgnau /
analyzed: indraḥ manthatu iti sūktena śara samidhaḥ ādadhāti senā agnau

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'indro manthatu' iti sūktena bhāṅgapāśān sampātyābhimantrya senākrameṣu vapati /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā indraḥ manthatu iti sūktena bhāṅga pāśān sampātya abhimantrya senā krameṣu vapati

original: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'indro manthatu' iti sūktena mauñjān pāśān sampātyābhimantrya senākrameṣu vapati / tantraṃ ca //
analyzed: tantram kṛtvā indraḥ manthatu iti sūktena mauñjān pāśān sampātya abhimantrya senā krameṣu vapati tantram ca

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'indro manthatu' iti sūktena āśvatthāni kūṭāni sampātyābhimantrya senākrameṣu vapati tantraṃ ca /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā indraḥ manthatu iti sūktena āśvatthāni kūṭāni sampātya abhimantrya senā krameṣu vapati tantram ca

original: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'indro manthatu' iti sūktena bhāṅgāni jālāni sampātyābhimantrya senākrameṣu vapati /
analyzed: tantram kṛtvā indraḥ manthatu iti sūktena bhāṅgāni jālāni sampātya abhimantrya senā krameṣu vapati

original: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'indro manthatu' iti sūktena bādhakadaṇḍāni sampātyābhimantrya senākrameṣu vapati /
analyzed: tantram kṛtvā indraḥ manthatu iti sūktena bādhaka daṇḍāni sampātya abhimantrya senā krameṣu vapati

original: uttarato'gnerlohitāśvatthasya śākhāṃ nihatya nīlalohitābhyāṃ sūtrābhyāṃ paritatya nīlalohitenāmūn (8.8.24)
analyzed: uttaratas agneḥ lohitāśvatthasya śākhām nihatya nīla lohitābhyām sūtrābhyām paritatya nīla lohitena amūn

original: 'svāhaibhyaḥ' iti mitrebhya ityādi nīlalohitaśākhāntaṃ sarvakarmasu bhavati / ādau uktam //
analyzed: svāhā ebhyaḥ iti mitrebhyaḥ ityādi nīlalohita śākhā antam sarva karmasu bhavati ādau uktam
ye bāhavaḥ iti anuvākam yuddha kāle japati kartā

original: ājyatantraṃ kṛtvā 'ye bāhavaḥ' ityanuvākena pṛṣadājyaṃ juhoti /
analyzed: ājya tantram kṛtvā ye bāhavaḥ iti anuvākena pṛṣadājyam juhoti
abhyātāna antam kṛtvā ye bāhavaḥ iti anuvākena saktūn juhoti

original: sāṅgrāmikaṃ tantraṃ kṛtvā 'ye bāhavaḥ' ityanuvākena dhanuridhme'gnau pṛṣadājyenāktā dhanuḥsamidha ādadhāti /
analyzed: sāṅgrāmikam tantram kṛtvā ye bāhavaḥ iti anuvākena dhanuḥ idhma ignau pṛṣadājyena aktāḥ dhanuḥ samidhaḥ ādadhāti

original: pūrvatantraṃ kṛtvā 'ye bāhavaḥ' ityanuvākeneṣvidhme'gnau pṛṣadājyenāktā iṣusamidha ādadhāti /
analyzed: pūrva tantram kṛtvā ye bāhavaḥ iti anuvākena iṣu idhma ignau pṛṣadājyena aktāḥ iṣu samidhaḥ ādadhāti

original: ājyena pūrvatantraṃ kṛtvā 'ye bāhavaḥ' ityanuvākena pṛṣadājyena dhanuḥ sampātyābhimantrya vimṛjya yoddhre prayacchati /
analyzed: ājyena pūrva tantram kṛtvā ye bāhavaḥ iti anuvākena pṛṣadājyena dhanuḥ sampātya abhimantrya vimṛjya yoddhre prayacchati

original: ājyena pūrvatantraṃ kṛtvā 'ye bāhavaḥ' ityanuvākena bhāṅgapāśān pṛṣadājyena sampātya kruddho'bhimantrya senākrameṣu vapati /
analyzed: ājyena pūrva tantram kṛtvā ye bāhavaḥ iti anuvākena bhāṅga pāśān pṛṣadājyena sampātya senā krameṣu vapati

original: sarvatra pāśeṣu āśvattheṣu kūṭeṣu bhāṅgeṣu jāleṣu bādhakadaṇḍeṣu vajrarūpeṣu pātreṣu ca iṅgiḍālaṅkaraṇaṃ kruddhābhimantraṇaṃ kuryāt /
analyzed: sarvatra pāśeṣu āśvattheṣu kūṭeṣu bhāṅgeṣu jāleṣu bādhaka daṇḍeṣu vajra rūpeṣu pātreṣu ca iṅgiḍa alaṅkaraṇam kruddha abhimantraṇam kuryāt

original: ājyena tantraṃ kṛtvā 'ye bāhavaḥ' ityanuvākena mauñjapāśān pṛṣadājyena sampātyābhimantrya senākrameṣu vapati /
analyzed: ājyena tantram kṛtvā ye bāhavaḥ iti anuvākena mauñja pāśān pṛṣadājyena sampātya abhimantrya senā krameṣu vapati

original: ājyena tantraṃ kṛtvā 'ye bāhavaḥ' ityanuvākena āmapātrāṇi pṛṣadājyena sampātyābhimantrya senāyuddhasthāne vapati /
analyzed: ājyena tantram kṛtvā ye bāhavaḥ iti anuvākena āma pātrāṇi pṛṣadājyena sampātya abhimantrya senā yuddha sthāne vapati
vāpyaiḥ tri sandhīni vajra rūpāṇi arbudi rūpāṇi

original: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'ye bāhavaḥ' ityanuvākena triṣandhīni lohamayāni sampātyābhimantrya senākrameṣu vapati /
analyzed: tantram kṛtvā ye bāhavaḥ iti anuvākena tri sandhīni loha mayāni sampātya abhimantrya senā krameṣu vapati

original: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'ye bāhavaḥ' ityanuvākena vajrarūpāṇi sampātyābhimantrya senākrameṣu vapati /
analyzed: tantram kṛtvā ye bāhavaḥ iti anuvākena vajra rūpāṇi sampātya abhimantrya senā krameṣu vapati

original: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'ye bāhavaḥ' ityanuvākena vajrarūpāṇi lohamayāni arbudirūpāṇi sampātyābhimantrya senākrameṣu vapati /
analyzed: tantram kṛtvā ye bāhavaḥ iti anuvākena vajra rūpāṇi loha mayāni arbudi rūpāṇi sampātya abhimantrya senā krameṣu vapati
śitipadīm sampātavatīm darbha rajjvā kṣatriyāya upāsaṅga daṇḍe badhnāti

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'ye bāhavaḥ' ityanuvākena śitipadīm ajāṃ pṛṣadājyena sampātyābhimantrya rājñe darbharajjvā upāsaṅgadaṇḍe badhnāti /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā ye bāhavaḥ iti anuvākena śitipadīm ajām pṛṣadājyena sampātya abhimantrya rājñe darbha rajjvā upāsaṅga daṇḍe badhnāti

original: sāṅgrāmikaṃ tantraṃ kṛtvā 'ye bāhavaḥ' ityanuvākena dvitīyāṃ śitipadīṃ sampātyābhimantrya śatrusenāṃ prakṣipati /
analyzed: sāṅgrāmikam tantram kṛtvā ye bāhavaḥ iti anuvākena dvitīyām śitipadīm sampātya abhimantrya śatru senām prakṣipati
śiti padyoḥ dvayoḥ api ekam karma
atha rāṣṭra praveśa abhigamana karma vidhim vakṣyāmaḥ

original: svarāṣṭre yo niṣkrāntaḥ śatruṇā punaḥ praveśamicchati tasyedaṃ karma //
analyzed: sva rāṣṭre yaḥ niṣkrāntaḥ śatruṇā punar praveśam icchati tasya idam karma
ānuśūkānām vrīhīṇām āvraska jaiḥ kāmpīlaiḥ śṛtam sārūpavat samāśayati

original: ājyatantramabhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'asmin vasu' iti sūktenānuśūkānāṃ vrīhīṇāmāvraskajaiḥ kāmpīlaiḥ śṛtaṃ sārūpavatsamodanaṃ sampātyābhimantrya
analyzed: ājya tantram abhyātāna antam kṛtvā asmin vasu iti sūktena anuśūkānām vrīhīṇām āvraska jaiḥ kāmpīlaiḥ śṛtam sārūpavat samodanam sampātya abhimantrya
rāṣṭre yaḥ udvāsitaḥ tasya idam karma praveśa artham
anena karmaṇā sva rāṣṭra praveśaḥ bhavati

original: sarvasyāṃ marditāyāṃ bhūmau yadā niṣkrānto rājā tadedaṃ karma karoti /
analyzed: sarvasyām marditāyām bhūmau yadā niṣkrāntaḥ rājā tadā idam karma karoti
iti ratha nemi maṇi mayaḥ sīsa loha rajata tāmra veṣṭitam hema nābhim vāsitam baddhvā

original: sūtrotaṃ barhiṣi kṛtvā sampātavantaṃ pratyṛcaṃ bhṛṣṭīrabhīvartottamābhyāmācṛtati // KauśS_2,6{16}.29 //]
analyzed: sūtra ūtam barhiṣi kṛtvā sampātavantam pratyṛcam bhṛṣṭīḥ abhīvarta uttamābhyām ācṛtati
abhyātāna antam kṛtvā abhīvartena iti caturbhiḥ ṛgbhiḥ ratha cakra nemi maṇi mayaḥ sīsa loha rajata tāmra veṣṭitam

original: hemanābhiṃ trirvāsitaṃ kṛtvā sūtrotaṃ barhiṣi kṛtvā pratyṛcaṃ sampātyābhimantrya
analyzed: hema nābhim tris vāsitam kṛtvā sūtra ūtam barhiṣi kṛtvā pratyṛcam sampātya abhimantrya
atikrānte ardha mardite rāṣṭre idam karma
anena karmaṇā rāṣṭra vṛddhiḥ ca bhavati

original: iti yasmādrāṣṭrādavaruddhastasyāśāyāṃ śayanavidhaṃ puroḍāśaṃ darbheṣūdake ninayati // KauśS_2,6{16}.30 //
analyzed: iti yasmāt rāṣṭrāt avaruddhaḥ tasya āśāyām śayana vidham puroḍāśam darbheṣu udake ninayati

original: tato loṣṭena jyotirāyatanaṃ saṃstīrya kṣīraudanamaśnāti // KauśS_2,6{16}.31 //]
analyzed: tatas loṣṭena jyotiḥ āyatanam saṃstīrya kṣīra odanam aśnāti

original: 'acikradad', 'ā tvā gan' iti sūktābhyāṃ śayanākāraṃ puroḍāśamabhimantrya darbheṣūdake ninayati /
analyzed: acikradat ā tvā gan iti sūktābhyām śayana ākāram puroḍāśam abhimantrya darbheṣu udake ninayati

original: 'ā tvā gan' iti sūktābhyāṃ kṣīraudanaṃ sthālīpākaṃ sampātyābhimantrya rājānamāśayati /
analyzed: ā tvā gan iti sūktābhyām kṣīraudanam sthālīpākam sampātya abhimantrya rājānam āśayati
tasmāt sthānāt sambhāra āharaṇam yasmāt niṣkrāntaḥ rājā

original: tisṛṇāṃ prātaraśite puroḍāśe bhakṣite punaratra rāṣṭre rājā praveśaṃ labhate /
analyzed: tisṛṇām prātar aśite puroḍāśe bhakṣite punar atra rāṣṭre rājā praveśam labhate

original: bhayaṃ vā mṛtyurvā vighnaṃ daivopaghāto vā śatrorbhavati /
analyzed: bhayam vā mṛtyuḥ vā vighnam daiva upaghātaḥ vā śatroḥ bhavati

original: iti rājānamabhiṣekṣyan mahānade śāntyudakaṃ karotyādiṣṭānām // KauśS_2,7{17}.1 //]
analyzed: iti rājānam abhiṣekṣyan mahānade śāntyudakam karoti ādiṣṭānām
abhyātāna antam kṛtvā śāntyudaka vidhānena śāntyudakam karoti

original: mahānadyā udakaṃ vanapuṣkariṇīnāmudakaṃ devavṛṣṭyudakaṃ divyamudakaṃ ca /
analyzed: mahā nadyāḥ udakam vana puṣkariṇīnām udakam deva vṛṣṭi udakam divyam udakam ca
udakānām vikalpaḥ samuccayaḥ vā śāntyudakam ādiṣṭānām

original: [sthālīpākaṃ śrapayitvā dakṣiṇataḥ parigṛhyāyā darbheṣu tiṣṭhantamabhiṣiñcati // KauśS_2,7{17}.2 //]
analyzed: sthālīpākam śrapayitvā dakṣiṇatas parigṛhyāyāḥ darbheṣu tiṣṭhantam abhiṣiñcati
tatas carum śrapayati nadyā udakena samudra udakena vā

original: vedyā dakṣiṇataḥ darbhānāstīrya tatroparyūrdhvaṃ sthitaṃ rājānaṃ 'bhūto bhūteṣu' iti sūktena śāntyudakakalaśamabhimantrya purodhā rājānamabhiṣiñcati
analyzed: vedyāḥ dakṣiṇatas darbhān āstīrya tatra upari ūrdhvam sthitam rājānam bhūtaḥ bhūteṣu iti sūktena śāntyudaka kalaśam abhimantrya purodhāḥ rājānam abhiṣiñcati

original: khaṭvāyāmārṣabhaṃ carmāstīrya tatra rājānamārohayati 'bhūto bhūteṣu' iti sūktena //
analyzed: khaṭvāyām ārṣabham carma āstīrya tatra rājānam ārohayati bhūtaḥ bhūteṣu iti sūktena
uda pātram ubhau api āsiñcataḥ dhārāyāḥ udakena

original: [sahaiva nau sukṛtaṃ saha duṣkṛtam iti brahmā brūyāt // KauśS_2,7{17}.6 //
analyzed: saha eva nau sukṛtam saha duṣkṛtam iti brahmā brūyāt

original: yo duṣkṛtaṃ karavattasya duṣkṛtaṃ sukṛtaṃ nau saha iti // KauśS_2,7{17}.7 //]
analyzed: yaḥ duṣkṛtam karavat tasya duṣkṛtam sukṛtam nau sahaḥ iti
saha eva naḥ iti rājā brūte

original: tataḥ sthālīpākaṃ 'bhūto bhūteṣu' iti sūktena sampātyābhimantryāśayati //
analyzed: tatas sthālīpākam bhūtaḥ bhūteṣu iti sūktena sampātya abhimantrya āśayati
tatas ūśvam ārohayati bhūtaḥ bhūteṣu iti sūktena
vāhena upaniṣkramya punar gṛhe āgatya abhyātāna ādi uttara tantram
sahasram gavām dakṣiṇā grāma varaḥ ca

original: māṇḍalikasya sāmantasya yuvarājasya senāpateranyasya kasyacidabhiṣekaḥ anena vidhānena kāryaḥ /
analyzed: māṇḍalikasya sāmantasya yuvarājasya senāpateḥ anyasya kasyacid abhiṣekaḥ anena vidhānena kāryaḥ
tasya api purohita varaṇe kṛte sati abhiṣekaḥ kāryaḥ

original: abhiṣekādanantaraṃ ghṛtāvekṣaṇamārātrikaṃ rājakarmāṇi piṣṭarātryādīni pratyahaṃ kartavyāni /
analyzed: abhiṣekāt anantaram ghṛta avekṣaṇam ārātrikam rāja karmāṇi piṣṭa rātri ādīni pratyaham kartavyāni
puṣpa abhiṣeka mahānavamī indrotsava vṛṣotsarga janmadina ādi prativarṣam kāryāṇi
abhyātāna antam kṛtvā tatas śāntyudakam karoti

original: caturṇāṃ sāgarāṇāṃ tu mahānadīnāṃ śatasya ca /
analyzed: caturṇām sāgarāṇām tu mahā nadīnām śatasya ca

original: tatra rājani upaviṣṭe 'bhūto bhūteṣu' iti sūktena tena śāntyudakena rājānamabhiṣiñcati //
analyzed: tatra rājani upaviṣṭe bhūtaḥ bhūteṣu iti sūktena tena śāntyudakena rājānam abhiṣiñcati

original: tataḥ khaṭvāyāṃ varṣīyasyāṃ vaiyāghraṃ carma stṛṇāti mañcake /
analyzed: tatas khaṭvāyām varṣīyasyām vaiyāghram carma stṛṇāti mañcake
tatra rājānam ārohayati bhūtaḥ bhūteṣu iti sūktena
rājā brūte saha eva naḥ iti

original: [catvāro rājaputrāstālpāḥ pṛthakpādeṣu śayanaṃ parāmṛśya sabhāṃ prāpayanti // KauśS_2,7{17}.14 //]
analyzed: catvāraḥ rāja putrāḥ tālpāḥ pṛthak pādeṣu śayanam parāmṛśya sabhām prāpayanti

original: catvāro rājaputrāstālpāḥ pṛthakpādeṣu gṛhītvā sabhāmadhye nidadhati //
analyzed: catvāraḥ rāja putrāḥ tālpāḥ pṛthak pādeṣu gṛhītvā sabhā madhye nidadhati

original: dāsaḥ pādau prakṣālayati rājakīyo mahāśūdraḥ prakṣālanaṃ dadāti /
analyzed: dāsaḥ pādau prakṣālayati rājakīyaḥ mahāśūdraḥ prakṣālanam dadāti
purohitaḥ bhūtaḥ bhūteṣu iti sūktam japati

original: punaḥ purohitaḥ 'bhūto bhūteṣu' iti sūktaṃ japati /
analyzed: punar purohitaḥ bhūtaḥ bhūteṣu iti sūktam japati
vaiśyaḥ sarvasvajainam upatiṣṭhate utsṛja āyuṣman iti
vaiśyaḥ rājānam upatiṣṭhate utsṛja āyuṣman iti mantreṇa

original: [utsṛjāmi brāhmaṇāyotsṛjāmi kṣatriyāyotsṛjāmi vaiśyāya dharmo me janapade caryatām iti // KauśS_2,7{17}.19 //]
analyzed: utsṛjāmi brāhmaṇāya utsṛjāmi kṣatriyāya utsṛjāmi vaiśyāya dharmaḥ me janapade caryatām iti

original: tataḥ sthālīpākaṃ 'bhūto bhūteṣu' iti sūktena sampātyābhimantrya rājānamāśayati //
analyzed: tatas sthālīpākam bhūtaḥ bhūteṣu iti sūktena sampātya abhimantrya rājānam āśayati
bhūtaḥ bhūteṣu iti anena aśvam abhimantrya ārohya aparājitām pādayati
tatas madhu miśram miṣṭam annam brāhmaṇān bhojayati

original: tantraṃ kṛtvā tato 'bhūto bhūteṣu' iti sūktena rasān sampātyābhimantrya rājānamāśayati /
analyzed: tantram kṛtvā tatas bhūtaḥ bhūteṣu iti sūktena rasān sampātya abhimantrya rājānam āśayati
sahasram gavām grāma varaḥ ca dakṣiṇā
kuryuḥ gām iti gārgya pārthaśravasau na iti bhāgaliḥ
ghṛta avekṣaṇam purohita karma ārātrikam nakṣatra pūjā graha pūjā ādikam kartavyam
imam indraḥ iti uda pātram samāsiñcete udaka dhārayā
tatas rājā brūyāt saha eva nau iti
tatas purohitaḥ brūyāt yaḥ duṣkṛtam iti

original: iti paurohitye vatsyan vaiśvalopīḥ samidha ādhāya // KauśS_2,7{17}.30 //]
analyzed: iti paurohitye vatsyan vaiśvalopīḥ samidhaḥ ādhāya

original: tataḥ 'savitā prasavānām' iti sūktena paurohitye vatsyan śūdreṇa āhṛtāḥ samidha ādadhāti /
analyzed: tatas savitā prasavānām iti sūktena paurohitye vatsyan śūdreṇa āhṛtāḥ samidha ādadhāti
atharva aṅgirasaḥ purohitaḥ bhavati iti gopathabrāhmaṇe uktam
rāja karmasu pañca gṛhītam ājyam sarvatra
hasti trasana ādīni abhiṣeka antāni rāja karmāṇi
indra kṣatram iti dvābhyām ṛgbhyām upanayanam
tat āhuḥ na kṣatriyam sāvitrīm vācayet iti
katham nu tam upanayīta yat na vācayet
atha vācayet iti vikalpam manyante ācāryāḥ
medhā sāmpada karmāṇi sāmmanasyam ca varcasam
kramāt ca rāja karmāṇi dvitīye smin mahā ṛṣiṇā

original: [pūrvasya pūrvasyāṃ paurṇamāsyāmastamita udakānte kṛṣṇacailaparihito nirṛtikarmāṇi prayuṅkte // KauśS_3,1{18}.1 //]
analyzed: pūrvasya pūrvasyām paurṇamāsyām astamite udaka ante kṛṣṇa caila parihitaḥ nirṛti karmāṇi prayuṅkte

original: kṛṣṇavasanaparihito'gniṃ gṛhītvodakānte gatvā nāvyopari caṭitvāgniṃ prajvālya 'ye triṣaptāḥ' (1.1)
analyzed: kṛṣṇa vasana parihita agnim gṛhītvā udaka ante gatvā nāvyā upari caṭitvā agnim prajvālya ye triṣaptāḥ

original: iti sūktena bhaktaṃ sampātyābhimantryāśnāti / na tantram //
analyzed: iti sūktena bhaktam sampātya abhimantrya aśnāti na tantram
ahata vasanaḥ upamucya upānahau jīvaghātyāyāḥ udāvrajati
ahata vasanaḥ bhūtvā upamucya upānahau tatas gṛhe āgacchati

original: tataḥ sāmpadaṃ vā pauṣṭikaṃ vā kurute /
analyzed: tatas sāmpadam vā pauṣṭikam vā kurute
śāpeṭam ālipya apsu nibadhya tasmin upasamādhāya sampātavantam karoti

original: upamucya jaradupānahau savyena jaracchattraṃ dakṣiṇena śālātṛṇānyādīpya jīrṇaṃ vīriṇamabhinyasyati // KauśS_3,1{18}.10 //
analyzed: upamucya jarat upānahau savyena jarat chattram dakṣiṇena śālā tṛṇāni ādīpya jīrṇam vīriṇam abhinyasyati

original: kṛṣṇavastraparihito vimucya jaradupānahau vāmena hastena jaracchatraṃ gṛhītvā dakṣiṇena
analyzed: kṛṣṇa vastra parihitaḥ vimucya jarat upānahau vāmena hastena jarat chatram gṛhītvā dakṣiṇena

original: hastena śālātṛṇapūlake'gniṃ kṛtvā jīrṇe vīriṇe'gniṃ prajvālyāpradakṣiṇaṃ bhūtvā nirṛtidiśamabhimukho
analyzed: hastena śālā tṛṇa pūlaka ignim kṛtvā jīrṇe vīriṇe ignim prajvālya apradakṣiṇam bhūtvā nirṛti diśam abhimukhaḥ
bhūtvā ye triṣaptāḥ iti sūktena ājyam sakṛt juhoti
ahata vasanaḥ upamucya upānahau tatas gṛhe āgacchati
iti jarat koṣṭhāt vrīhīn śarkarā miśrān āvapati

original: pūrvasyāṃ paurṇamāsyāmastamite kṛṣṇacailaparihito'gniṃ gṛhītvā bahirgatvā vīriṇastambe'gniṃ prajvālya 'ayaṃ te yoniḥ' iti sūktena
analyzed: pūrvasyām paurṇamāsyām astamite kṛṣṇa caila parihita agnim gṛhītvā bahis gatvā vīriṇa stambe agnim prajvālya ayam te yoniḥ iti sūktena

original: 'ā no bhara mā pari ṣṭhā' iti sūktena dhānāḥ śarkarāmiśrāḥ sakṛjjuhoti //
analyzed: ā naḥ bhara mā pari sthāḥ iti sūktena dhānāḥ śarkarā miśrāḥ sakṛt juhoti

original: 'ā no bhara' iti dvābhyāṃ sūktābhyāṃ saha piṭakena tṛtīyāmāhutiṃ juhoti /
analyzed: ā naḥ bhara iti dvābhyām sūktābhyām saha piṭakena tṛtīyām āhutim juhoti
ahata vasanaḥ upamucya upānahau jīvaghātyāyāḥ udāvrajati
kṛṣṇa śakuneḥ savya jaṅghāyām aṅkam anubadhya aṅke puroḍāśam pra pateta

original: pūrvasyāṃ paurṇamāsyāmastamita udakānte kṛṣṇacailaparihito nirṛtikarmāṇi prayuṅkte /
analyzed: pūrvasyām paurṇamāsyām astamite udaka ante kṛṣṇa caila parihitaḥ nirṛti karmāṇi prayuṅkte

original: kākajaṅghāyāṃ lohakaṇṭakaṃ baddhvā kaṇṭake puroḍāśaṃ kṛtvā nirṛtyabhimukho bhūtvā 'pra pateta' ityṛcā kākaṃ visarjayati /
analyzed: kākajaṅghāyām loha kaṇṭakam baddhvā kaṇṭake puroḍāśam kṛtvā nirṛti abhimukhaḥ bhūtvā pra pata itas iti ṛcā kākam visarjayati
ahata vasanaḥ upamucya upānahau tatas gṛhe āgacchati

original: [nīlaṃ sandhāya lohitamācchādya śuklaṃ pariṇahya dvitīyayoṣṇīṣamaṅkenopasādya savyena sahāṅkenāvāṅapsvapavidhyati // KauśS_3,1{18}.17 //]
analyzed: nīlam sandhāya lohitam ācchādya śuklam pariṇahya dvitīyayā uṣṇīṣam aṅkena upasādya savyena saha aṅkena avāṅ apsu apavidhyati

original: pūrvasyāṃ paurṇamāsyāmastamita udakānte kṛṣṇacailaparihito nirṛtikarmāṇi prayuṅkte /
analyzed: pūrvasyām paurṇamāsyām astamite udaka ante kṛṣṇa caila parihitaḥ nirṛti karmāṇi prayuṅkte

original: raktaṃ vastramuparyācchādya śuklaṃ vastramuṣṇīṣaṃ kṛtvā 'yā mā lakṣmīḥ' (7.115.2)
analyzed: raktam vastram upari ācchādya śuklam vastram uṣṇīṣam kṛtvā yā mā lakṣmīḥ

original: ityṛcā lohakhaṇḍena sahoṣṇīṣamudake prakṣipati vāmena hastena //
analyzed: iti ṛcā loha khaṇḍena saha uṣṇīṣam udake prakṣipati vāmena hastena

original: ityṛcā raktaṃ vastraṃ lohakhaṇḍena sahāpsu kṣipati vāmena hastena /
analyzed: iti ṛcā raktam vastram loha khaṇḍena saha apsu kṣipati vāmena hastena

original: ityṛcā nīlaṃ vastraṃ lohakhaṇḍena sahāpsu kṣipati vāmena hastena /
analyzed: iti ṛcā nīlam vastram loha khaṇḍena saha apsu kṣipati vāmena hastena
ahata vasanaḥ bhūtvā upānahau paridhāya gṛhe āgacchati

original: tataḥ karmāṇi kuryāt pauṣṭikāni sāmpadāni ca / samāptāni
analyzed: tatas karmāṇi kuryāt pauṣṭikāni sāmpadāni ca samāptāni

original: evaṃ nirṛtikarma kṛtvā tataḥ sāmpadeṣu pauṣṭikeṣu cādhikāraḥ /
analyzed: evam nirṛti karma kṛtvā tatas sāmpadeṣu pauṣṭikeṣu ca adhikāraḥ

original: pratikarma vā kevalaṃ vā nirṛtikarma pāpakṣayārthaṃ karoti /
analyzed: pratikarma vā kevalam vā nirṛti karma pāpa kṣaya artham karoti
nirṛti karmaṇām kramaḥ api na asti

original: pañcānāṃ madhya ekaṃ kṛtvā tataḥ pauṣṭikānāṃ prayogaḥ sāmpadānāṃ ca /
analyzed: pañcānām madhye ekam kṛtvā tatas pauṣṭikānām prayogaḥ sāmpadānām ca
etāni ucyante ā bhaiṣajyebhyaḥ karmabhyaḥ yāvat
ājya tantre harita darbha āstaraṇam karoti

original: iti sūktena kulāyaśṛtaṃ kṣīraudanaṃ sthālīpākaṃ sampātyābhimantryāśnāti kārayitā /
analyzed: iti sūktena kulāya śṛtam kṣīraudanam sthālīpākam sampātya abhimantrya aśnāti kārayitā

original: 'ye triṣaptāḥ' iti sūktena ghṛtenāktāḥ pālāśādisamidha ādadhāti /
analyzed: ye triṣaptāḥ iti sūktena ghṛtena aktāḥ pālāśa ādi samidhaḥ ādadhāti
etat api citra akarma nityam ca
nāvyayoḥ sāṃvaidye paścāt agneḥ bhūmi parilekhe kīlālam mukhena aśnāti

original: nāvyanadīsaṅgame gatvābhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'ye triṣaptāḥ' iti sūktena bhaktaṃ sampātyābhimantrya paścādagnerbhūmau prakṣipya paśuvanmukhenāśnāti  #
analyzed: nāvya nadī saṅgame gatvā abhyātāna antam kṛtvā ye triṣaptāḥ iti sūktena bhaktam sampātya abhimantrya paścāt agneḥ bhūmau prakṣipya paśu vat mukhena aśnāti  /
abhyātāna antam kṛtvā āpaḥ hi stha
sarvatra āpaḥ hi stha ityādi salila gaṇaḥ jñātavyaḥ
tantre salilaiḥ kṣīraudanam sampātya abhimantrya bhakṣayati
tantre salilaiḥ puroḍāśam sampātya abhimantrya bhakṣayati
tantre salilaiḥ rasān sampātya abhimantrya bhakṣayati
abhyātāna ante salilaiḥ savyāt pāṇi hṛdayāt lohitam rasa miśram aśnāti
an āptāḥ ye sūktena ājyam juhoti

original: tantre 'brahma jajñānam' iti caturdaśena pālāśādisamidha ādadhāti /
analyzed: tantre brahma jajñānam iti caturdaśena pālāśa ādi samidhaḥ ādadhāti

original: yadā grāmaṃ gacchati tadā etat karma kuryāt //
analyzed: yadā grāmam gacchati tadā etat karma kuryāt

original: yathārthaṃ yācate tadā dravyakāma etat karma kuryāt //
analyzed: yathārtham yācate tadā dravya kāmaḥ etat karma kuryāt
tam vyatiṣaktam aṣṭa avaram idhmam sāttrike ignau ādhāya ājyena abhijuhuyāt

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā tataścatvāraḥ pūlakā pālāśamindhanaṃ catvāro darbhapūlakāḥ /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā tatas catvāraḥ pūlakā pālāśam indhanam catvāraḥ darbha pūlakāḥ

original: ekaṃ samidbhārakaṃ dvitīyaṃ tasyopari darbhabhārakaṃ punarapi tathaiva ca /
analyzed: ekam samidh bhārakam dvitīyam tasya upari darbha bhārakam punar api tathā eva ca

original: aṣṭau uparyupari kṛtvā tato 'brahma jajñānam' iti caturdaśenājyaṃ juhoti //
analyzed: aṣṭau upari upari kṛtvā tatas brahma jajñānam iti caturdaśena ājyam juhoti

original: [tamu cenna vindedatha sattrasyāyatane yajñāyatanamiva kṛtvā // KauśS_3,1{18}.37 //
analyzed: tam u ced na vindet atha sattrasya āyatane yajña āyatanam iva kṛtvā

original: athavā tatra sthāne etat karma karoti /
analyzed: athavā tatra sthāne etat karma karoti
dhana dhānya putra lakṣmī yaśaḥ medhā dharma kāmaḥ
āyuḥ bala prajñā sampad grāmakūpa ādi patnī prādhānya abhaya svastyayana vijaya gṛha vara strī hiraṇya ratna ādi sampadyate
samudraḥ iti ācakṣate karma iti vacanāt

original: atha gavāṃ rogeṣu gavāṃ puṣṭiprajananeṣu ca śāntirucyate -
analyzed: atha gavām rogeṣu gavām puṣṭi prajananeṣu ca śāntiḥ ucyate
iti etaiḥ sūktaiḥ lavaṇam abhimantrya gāḥ pāyayati
brahma jajñānena prathamena lavaṇam abhimantrya gāḥ pāyayati

original: 'ā gāvaḥ' iti sūktena lavaṇamabhimantrya gāḥ pāyayati /
analyzed: ā gāvaḥ iti sūktena lavaṇam abhimantrya gāḥ pāyayati

original: 'ekā ca me' iti sūktena lavaṇamabhimantrya gāḥ pāyayati /
analyzed: ekā ca me iti sūktena lavaṇam abhimantrya gāḥ pāyayati
jvara gaṇḍamāla ādi roge etat karma
garbha grahaṇa artham etat karma bhavati

original: 'śanno devīḥ' iti tribhiḥ sūktaiḥ udakamabhimantrya gāḥ pāyayati /
analyzed: śat naḥ devīḥ iti tribhiḥ sūktaiḥ udakam abhimantrya gāḥ pāyayati
brahma jajñānam iti sūktena udakam abhimantrya gāḥ pāyayati
ā gāvaḥ iti sūktena udakam abhimantrya gāḥ pāyayati

original: 'ekā ca me' iti sūktena taḍāgamavarudhya tato gāḥ pāyayati /
analyzed: ekā ca me iti sūktena taḍāgam avarudhya tatas gāḥ pāyayati

original: dvābhyāṃ mahānadībhyāmudakamāhṛtya sarvata upāsicya kūpataḍāgādyudakaṃ tatrava prakṣipati //
analyzed: dvābhyām mahā nadībhyām udakam āhṛtya sarvatas upāsicya kūpa taḍāga ādi udakam prakṣipati

original: tenodakena maiśradhānyaṃ śrapayitvābhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'saṃ saṃ sravantu' iti maiśradhānyaṃ sampātyābhimantryāśnāti /
analyzed: tena udakena maiśradhānyam śrapayitvā abhyātāna antam kṛtvā sam sam sravantu iti maiśradhānyam sampātya abhimantrya aśnāti

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā mahānadībhyāmudakena saktumanthaṃ kṛtvā dadhimadhu nikṣipya 'saṃ saṃ sravantu' iti sūktena sampātyābhimantryāśnāti /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā mahā nadībhyām udakena saktu mantham kṛtvā dadhi madhu nikṣipya sam sam sravantu iti sūktena sampātya abhimantrya aśnāti

original: [yasya śriyaṃ kāmayate tato vrīhyājyapaya āhārya kṣīraudanamaśnāti // KauśS_3,2{19}.7 //]
analyzed: yasya śriyam kāmayate tatas vrīhi ājya payaḥ āhārya kṣīra odanam aśnāti

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā yasya gṛhe lakṣmī asti tasya gṛhāt vrīhyājyapaya āhārya kṣīraudanaṃ śrapayitvā 'saṃ saṃ sravantu' iti sūktena sampātyābhimantryāśnāti
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā yasya gṛhe lakṣmī asti tasya gṛhāt vrīhi ājya payaḥ āhārya kṣīraudanam śrapayitvā sam sam sravantu iti sūktena sampātya abhimantrya aśnāti

original: [tadalābhe haritagomayamāhāryaṃ śoṣayitvā trivṛti gomayaparicaye śṛtamaśnāti // KauśS_3,2{19}.8 //]
analyzed: tad alābhe harita gomayam āhāryam śoṣayitvā trivṛti gomaya paricaye śṛtam aśnāti

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā śrīmato gṛhāt gomayamāhārya tataḥ śoṣayitvā trivṛti gomayaparicaye śṛtaṃ sārūpavatsa odanaṃ 'saṃ saṃ sravantu' iti sūktena  #
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā śrīmataḥ gṛhāt gomayam āhārya tatas śoṣayitvā trivṛti gomaya paricaye śṛtam sārūpavatse odanam sam sam sravantu iti sūktena  /

original: atha samudra idaṃ karma kriyate puṣṭikarma /
analyzed: atha samudre idam karma kriyate puṣṭi karma
śerabhakaḥ iti sāmudram apsu karma vyākhyātam

original: śāpeṭamālipyāpsu nibadhya tatrāgniṃ praṇīya 'śerabhaka' iti sūktena bhaktaṃ sampātyābhimantryāśnāti /
analyzed: śāpeṭam ālipya apsu nibadhya tatra agnim praṇīya śerabhakaḥ iti sūktena bhaktam sampātya abhimantrya aśnāti
an apahata dhānāḥ lohita ajāyāḥ drapsena sannīya aśnāti

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'śerabhaka' iti sūktenākhaṇḍitayavānāṃ saktūn raktājāyā dadhyudakena sannīya sampātyābhimantryāśnāti /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā śerabhakaḥ iti sūktena a khaṇḍita yavānām saktūn rakta ajāyāḥ dadhi udakena sannīya sampātya abhimantrya aśnāti

original: tṛṇānāṃ granthīn kṛtvā tān granthīnudgṛhṇannapakrāmati udāvrajati //
analyzed: tṛṇānām granthīn kṛtvā tān granthīn udgṛhṇan apakrāmati udāvrajati
tān udāvrajan uda pātrasya uda pātreṇa abhiplāvayati mukham vimārṣṭi
śerabhakaḥ iti sūktena uda pātre vicṛtati pratyṛcam
tena uda pātreṇa snānam kṛtvā mukham prakṣālayati

original: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'eha yantu paśavaḥ' iti sūktena gṛṣṭeḥ pīyūṣaṃ śleṣmamiśritaṃ sampātyābhimantryāśnāti /
analyzed: tantram kṛtvā ā iha yantu paśavaḥ iti sūktena gṛṣṭeḥ pīyūṣam śleṣma miśritam sampātya abhimantrya aśnāti

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'saṃ vo goṣṭhena' iti sūktena gṛṣṭeḥ pīyūṣaṃ śleṣmamiśritaṃ kṛtvā sampātyābhimantryāśnāti /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā sam vaḥ goṣṭhena iti sūktena gṛṣṭeḥ pīyūṣam śleṣma miśritam kṛtvā sampātya abhimantrya aśnāti
abhyātāna antam kṛtvā prajāvatīḥ iti ekā

original: ābhyāṃ gṛṣṭeḥ pīyūṣaṃ śleṣmamiśritaṃ kṛtvā sampātyābhimantryāśnāti /
analyzed: ābhyām gṛṣṭeḥ pīyūṣam śleṣma miśritam kṛtvā sampātya abhimantrya aśnāti

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'prajāpatiśca parameṣṭhī ca' iti sūktena prathamaprasūtāyā goḥ pīyūṣaṃ vatsalālāmiśritaṃ sampātyābhimantryāśnāti /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā prajāpatiḥ ca parameṣṭhī ca iti sūktena prathama prasūtāyāḥ goḥ pīyūṣam vatsa lālā miśritam sampātya abhimantrya aśnāti

original: 'eha yantu paśavaḥ' iti sūktena gāmabhimantrya dadāti /
analyzed: ā iha yantu paśavaḥ iti sūktena gām abhimantrya dadāti

original: 'saṃ vo goṣṭhena' iti sūktena gāmabhimantrya dadāti /
analyzed: sam vaḥ goṣṭhena iti sūktena gām abhimantrya dadāti

original: prajāvatīḥ 'padajñā stha' iti dvābhyāmṛgbhyāṃ gāmabhimantrya dadāti /
analyzed: prajāvatīḥ pada jñāḥ stha iti dvābhyām ṛgbhyām gām abhimantrya dadāti
prajāpatiḥ ca iti sūktena gām abhimantrya dadāti
samuhya savyena adhiṣṭhāya ardham dakṣiṇena vikṣipati
ā iha yantu iti sūktena uda pātram abhimantrya goṣṭha madhye ninayati

original: govāṭe pāṃśukūṭaṃ vāmena hastena kṛtvā dakṣiṇena hastena ardhaṃ vikṣipati /
analyzed: go vāṭe pāṃśu kūṭam vāmena hastena kṛtvā dakṣiṇena hastena ardham vikṣipati

original: 'saṃ vo goṣṭhena' iti sūktena udapātramabhimantrya govāṭe ninayati /
analyzed: sam vaḥ goṣṭhena iti sūktena uda pātram abhimantrya go vāṭe ninayati
samuhya savyena adhiṣṭhāya ardham dakṣiṇena vikṣipati
prajāvatīḥ iti dvābhyām ṛgbhyām uda pātram abhimantrya ninayati
samuhya savyena adhiṣṭhāya ardham dakṣiṇena vikṣipati

original: 'prajāpatiśca parameṣṭhī ca' iti sūktena udapātramabhimantrya ninayati /
analyzed: prajāpatiḥ ca parameṣṭhī ca iti sūktena uda pātram abhimantrya ninayati

original: savyena govāṭe pāṃśukūṭaṃ kṛtvārdhaṃ dakṣiṇena vikṣipati //
analyzed: savyena go vāṭe pāṃśu kūṭam kṛtvā ardham dakṣiṇena vikṣipati
sārūpavatse śakṛt piṇḍān guggulu lavaṇe pratinīya paścāt agneḥ nikhanati

original: sārūpavatsa odane śakṛtpiṇḍān guggululavaṇaṃ prakṣipya tataḥ paścādagnernikhanati //
analyzed: sārūpavatse odane śakṛt piṇḍān guggulu lavaṇam prakṣipya tatas paścāt agneḥ nikhanati

original: caturthe utkhātya abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'eha yantu' iti sūktena sampātyābhimantryāśnāti /
analyzed: caturthe utkhātya abhyātāna antam kṛtvā ā iha yantu iti sūktena sampātya abhimantrya aśnāti

original: pūrvavaccaturthe'hani abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'saṃ vo goṣṭhena' iti sūktena sampātyābhimantryāśnāti /
analyzed: pūrvavat caturthe ihani abhyātāna antam kṛtvā sam vaḥ goṣṭhena iti sūktena sampātya abhimantrya aśnāti

original: pūrvavaccaturthe'hani abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'prajāvatīḥ' iti dvābhyāṃ sampātyābhimantryāśnāti /
analyzed: pūrvavat caturthe hani abhyātāna antam kṛtvā prajāvatīḥ iti dvābhyām sampātya abhimantrya aśnāti

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'prajāpatiśca' iti sūktena pūrvavat sārūpavatsaṃ caturthe'hani sampātyābhimantryāśnāti /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā prajāpatiḥ ca iti sūktena pūrvavat sārūpavatsam caturthe hani sampātya abhimantrya aśnāti

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'āyamagan parṇamaṇiḥ' iti sūktena pālāśamaṇiṃ trirvāsitaṃ kṛtvā sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā ā ayam agan parṇa maṇiḥ iti sūktena pālāśa maṇim tris vāsitam kṛtvā sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti

original: 'trayodaśyādayastisro dadhi madhuni vāsayitvā badhnāti' iti paribhāṣāvacanāt /
analyzed: trayodaśī ādayaḥ tisraḥ dadhi madhuni vāsayitvā badhnāti iti paribhāṣā vacanāt

original: pālāśādiṣu caturṣu maṇiṣu sambadhyate puṣṭikāmastejaskāmo balakāma āyuṣkāmo dhanakāmaśca /
analyzed: pālāśa ādiṣu caturṣu maṇiṣu sambadhyate puṣṭi kāmaḥ tejaskāmaḥ bala kāmaḥ āyuṣkāmaḥ dhana kāmaḥ ca

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'ayaṃ pratisaro maṇiḥ' ityarthasūktena tilakamaṇiṃ vāsitaṃ kṛtvā sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā ayam pratisaraḥ maṇiḥ iti artha sūktena tilaka maṇim vāsitam kṛtvā sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti

original: abhicāradoṣe puṣṭidhanakāmārthī dharmavīrya āyuṣyakṛtyāpratiharaṇārthī yaśorthī ca sapatnanāśārthī roge ca jayārthī /
analyzed: abhicāra doṣe puṣṭi dhana kāma arthī dharma vīrye āyuṣya kṛtyā pratiharaṇa arthī yaśaḥ ṛthī ca sapatna nāśa arthī roge ca jaya arthī

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'ayaṃ me varaṇo maṇiḥ' ityarthasūktena varaṇamaṇiṃ vāsitaṃ sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā ayam me varaṇaḥ maṇiḥ iti artha sūktena varaṇa maṇim vāsitam sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti

original: śatrukṣayakāmaḥ rakṣārthī cābhicāre jayakāmo yaśakāmaḥ puṣṭikāmaśca //
analyzed: śatru kṣaya kāmaḥ rakṣā arthī ca abhicāre jaya kāmaḥ yaśa kāmaḥ puṣṭi kāmaḥ ca

original: [uttamasya caturo jātarūpaśakalenānusūtraṃ gamayitvāvabhujya traidhaṃ paryasyati // KauśS_3,2{19}.23 //
analyzed: uttamasya caturaḥ jātarūpa śakalena anu sūtram gamayitvā avabhujya traidham paryasyati

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā khadiraphālamaṇiṃ trirvāsitaṃ kṛtvā hiraṇyaveṣṭitaṃ kṛtvā 'etamidhmam'
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā khadira phāla maṇim tris vāsitam kṛtvā hiraṇya veṣṭitam kṛtvā etam idhmam

original: ityṛcā idhmamupasamādhāya 'tamimaṃ devatāḥ' iti vāsitamullupyāsādya 'arātīyoḥ' ityarthasūktena
analyzed: iti ṛcā idhmam upasamādhāya tam imam devatāḥ iti vāsitam ullupya āsādya arātīyoḥ iti artha sūktena
sampātya abhimantrya brahmaṇā tejasā iti badhnāti khadira phāla maṇim

original: ājyatantramabhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'uttamo asyoṣadhīnām' iti sūktena pālāśamaṇiṃ trirvāsitaṃ kṛtvā sampātyābhimantrya puṇyāhānte badhnāti /
analyzed: ājya tantram abhyātāna antam kṛtvā uttamaḥ asi oṣadhīnām iti sūktena pālāśa maṇim tris vāsitam kṛtvā sampātya abhimantrya puṇyāha ante badhnāti

original: ājyatantramabhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'akṣitāste' ityṛcā yavamaṇiṃ trirvāsitaṃ kṛtvā sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: ājya tantram abhyātāna antam kṛtvā akṣitāḥ te iti ṛcā yava maṇim tris vāsitam kṛtvā sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti
puṣṭi kāma adhikāraḥ anuvartate ā tṛtīya adhyāya parisamāptim yāvat

original: puṣṭikāmo vā nityaṃ vā aṣṭakākarma kuryāt -
analyzed: puṣṭi kāmaḥ vā nityam vai aṣṭakā karma kuryāt

original: ityaṣṭakyāyā vapāṃ sarveṇa sūktena trirjuhoti // KauśS_3,2{19}.28 //
analyzed: iti aṣṭakyāyāḥ vapām sarveṇa sūktena tris juhoti

original: māghāṣṭakāyāṃ 'pūrvāhṇe yajñopavītī śālāniveśanaṃ samūhayatyupavatsyadbhaktamaśitvā snāto'hatavasanaḥ prayuṅkte' (KauśS 8.1) rātrau /
analyzed: māgha aṣṭakāyām pūrvāhṇe yajña upavītī śālā niveśanam samūhayati upavatsyat bhaktam aśitvā snātaḥ ūhata vasanaḥ prayuṅkte kauśs rātrau

original: dhānādīnāṃ śrapaṇaṃ kṛtvā tata ājyabhāgāntaṃ kṛtvā tataḥ 'purastādagneḥ pratīcīṃ gāṃ dhārayati paścādagneḥ prāṅmukha upaviśyānvārabdhāya śāntyudakaṃ  #
analyzed: dhānā ādīnām śrapaṇam kṛtvā tatas ājyabhāga antam kṛtvā tatas purastāt agneḥ pratīcīm gām dhārayati paścāt agneḥ prāc mukhaḥ upaviśya anvārabdhāya śāntyudakam

original: tataḥ 'prathamā ha vyuvāsa sā' iti sarveṇa sūktena ghṛtaṃ juhoti /
analyzed: tatas prathamā ha vyuvāsa sā iti sarveṇa sūktena ghṛtam juhoti

original: tataḥ māṃsahome 'prathamā ha vyuvāsa sā' iti sarveṇa sūktena tisraḥ paśvāhutīrjuhoti /
analyzed: tatas māṃsa home prathamā ha vyuvāsa sā iti sarveṇa sūktena tisraḥ paśu āhutīḥ juhoti

original: tataḥ 'prathamā ha vyuvāsa sā' iti sarveṇa sthālīpākaṃ juhoti /
analyzed: tatas prathamā ha vyuvāsa sā iti sarveṇa sthālīpākam juhoti

original: tasyāṃ havīṣiṃ dhānādīnyājyamiśrāṇyekatra kṛtvā viśatiṃ piṇḍikāḥ kṛtvā /
analyzed: tasyām havīṣim dhānā ādīni ājya miśrāṇi ekatra kṛtvā viśatim piṇḍikāḥ kṛtvā

original: paśordakṣiṇaṃ bāhuṃ nirlomaṃ sacarmaṃ sakhuraṃ prakṣālyāsādya /
analyzed: paśoḥ dakṣiṇam bāhum nirlomam sa carmam sa khuram prakṣālya āsādya

original: tata abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'prathamā ha vyuvāsa sā' (3.10.1-5)
analyzed: tata abhyātāna antam kṛtvā prathamā ha vyuvāsa sā
saha hutān ājya miśrān hutvā paścāt agneḥ vāgyataḥ saṃviśati

original: tato'bhyātānāni hutvā dhānāḥ karambha ityādīni havirucchiṣṭānyājyamiśrāṇi kṛtvā 'prathamā ha vyuvāsa sā' iti sarveṇa sūktena tisra āhutīrjuhoti
analyzed: tatobhyātānāni hutvā dhānāḥ karambhaḥ ityādīni haviḥ ucchiṣṭāni ājya miśrāṇi kṛtvā prathamā ha vyuvāsa sā iti sarveṇa sūktena tisraḥ āhutīḥ juhoti
pṛthivī āpaḥ tejaḥ vāyuḥ ākāśam iti smarati
tatas prabhāte śrāddham mātaram nāndīmukham iti aṣṭakā akarma
puṣṭi kāmaḥ vā nityam vā karoti

original: kṣetre gatvā 'sīrā yuñjanti' iti sūktena yugalāṅgalaṃ badhnāti //
analyzed: kṣetre gatvā sīrā yuñjanti iti sūktena yuga lāṅgalam badhnāti

original: 'sīrā yuñjanti' iti sūktena yugasya dakṣiṇato vṛṣabhaṃ yunakti //
analyzed: sīrā yuñjanti iti sūktena yugasya dakṣiṇatas vṛṣabham yunakti

original: 'ehi pūrṇaka' iti mantreṇa uttarato dvitīyaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ yunakti //
analyzed: ehi pūrṇakaḥ iti mantreṇa uttaratas dvitīyam vṛṣabham yunakti

original: iti pādena hāliko'nyān caturo vṛṣabhān yunakti /
analyzed: iti pādena hālikonyān caturaḥ vṛṣabhān yunakti
yathā asat bahu dhānyam ayakṣmam bahu pūruṣam iti phālam atikarṣati

original: irāvānasi dhārtarāṣṭre tava me sattre rādhyatām iti pratimimīte // KauśS_3,3{20}.6 //
analyzed: irāvān asi dhārtarāṣṭre tava me sattre rādhyatām iti pratimimīte

original: apahatāḥ pratiṣṭhāḥ ityapūpaiḥ pratihatya kṛṣati // KauśS_3,3{20}.7 //]
analyzed: apahatāḥ pratiṣṭhāḥ iti apūpaiḥ pratihatya kṛṣati
aśvinā phālam iti ṛcā loha phālam abhimantrya hale pratikarṣati
irāvān asi iti mantreṇa phālam abhimantrayate
apahatāḥ iti mantreṇa apūpān abhimantrya hale phāla mukhe dadāti

original: tataḥ 'sīrā yuñjanti' iti sūktena kartā halena kṛṣati //
analyzed: tatas sīrā yuñjanti iti sūktena kartā halena kṛṣati

original: sūktaṃ samāpya tato halaṃ hālikāya prayacchati //
analyzed: sūktam samāpya tatas halam hālikāya prayacchati
tisraḥ sītāḥ prācīḥ gamayanti kalyāṇīḥ vācaḥ vadantaḥ
kalyāṇīḥ vācaḥ vadantaḥ puṇya aha ādīni ca
iti āvartayitvā uttarasmin sītā ante puroḍāśena indram yajate
sīte vandāmahe tvā iti ṛcā kartā anumantrayate
tatra ājyabhāga antam pāka tantram kṛtvā
sīrā yuñjanti iti sūktena indra daivatyam puroḍāśam juhoti

original: indradevatāke puroḍāśe carudharmā aviruddhāḥ puroḍāśasya sarve bhavanti //
analyzed: indra devatāke puroḍāśe caru dharmāḥ a viruddhāḥ puroḍāśasya sarve bhavanti

original: aśvinādevatākaṃ caruṃ 'sīrā yuñjanti' iti sūktena juhoti //
analyzed: aśvinā devatākam carum sīrā yuñjanti iti sūktena juhoti

original: tataḥ abhyātānāni hutvā 'sīrā yuñjanti' iti sūktenottarasyāṃ sītāyāṃ sampātānānayati //
analyzed: tatas abhyātānāni hutvā sīrā yuñjanti iti sūktena uttarasyām sītāyām sampātān ānayati

original: tata udapātre havīṃṣi śaṣpaṃ vrīhīn virūḍhaṃ ca nidadhāti //
analyzed: tatas uda pātre havīṃṣi śaṣpam vrīhīn virūḍham ca nidadhāti

original: [yatra sampātānānayati tato loṣṭaṃ dhārayantaṃ patnī pṛcchati akṛkṣata iti // KauśS_3,3{20}.16 //
analyzed: yatra sampātān ānayati tatas loṣṭam dhārayantam patnī pṛcchati akṛkṣata iti

original: vittiṃ bhūtiṃ puṣṭiṃ prajāṃ paśūnannamannādyam iti // KauśS_3,3{20}.19 //]
analyzed: vittim bhūtim puṣṭim prajām paśūn annam annādyam iti

original: yatra sītā sampātitā tasmāt sthānāt mṛttikāṃ patnī gṛhṇāti hastena /
analyzed: yatra sītā sampātitā tasmāt sthānāt mṛttikām patnī gṛhṇāti hastena
tata anyaḥ manuṣyaḥ pṛcchati kim āhārṣīḥ
tatas patnī brūte vittim bhūtim iti

original: tato madhyamāyāṃ sītāyāṃ mṛttikāṃ nidadhāti patnī tūṣṇīm //
analyzed: tatas madhyamāyām sītāyām mṛttikām nidadhāti patnī tūṣṇīm
abhyajya uttara phālam prātar āyojanāya nidadhāti

original: tato lohaphālaṃ ghṛtenābhyajya tatraiva kṣetre nidadhāti tato'bhyātānādyuttaratantram //
analyzed: tatas loha phālam ghṛtena abhyajya tatra eva kṣetre nidadhāti tatas abhyātāna ādi uttara tantram
sītā śiraḥsu darbhān āstīrya plakṣa udumbarasya trīn trīn camasān nidadhāti

original: tataḥ sītāśiraḥsu darbhānāstīrya darbhopari plakṣacamasānaudumbaracamasāṃstrīṃstrīn nidadhāti //
analyzed: tatas sītā śiraḥsu darbhān āstīrya darbha upari plakṣa camasān audumbara camasān trīn trīn nidadhāti

original: [rasavato dakṣiṇe śaṣpavato madhyame puroḍāśavata uttare // KauśS_3,3{20}.23 //]
analyzed: rasavataḥ dakṣiṇe śaṣpavataḥ madhyame puroḍāśavataḥ uttare

original: ekaikasyāḥ sītāyāḥ dakṣiṇeṣu camaseṣu rasān prakṣipya madhyameṣu virūḍhaṃ prakṣipyottareṣu puroḍāśaṃ nidadhāti //
analyzed: ekaikasyāḥ sītāyāḥ dakṣiṇeṣu camaseṣu rasān prakṣipya madhyameṣu virūḍham prakṣipya uttareṣu puroḍāśam nidadhāti

original: tataḥ prabhāte avaśyaṃ tasmin kṣetre dvitīye'hani karṣayitavyam /
analyzed: tatas prabhāte avaśyam tasmin kṣetre dvitīyehani karṣayitavyam
sārūpavatse śakṛt piṇḍān guggulu lavaṇe pratinīya aśnāti

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'sīrā yuñjanti' iti sūktena sārūpavatsa odane śakṛtpiṇḍān prakṣipya guggulu lavaṇaṃ ca prakṣipya tasminnodane sampātyābhimantryāśnāti
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā sīrā yuñjanti iti sūktena odane śakṛt piṇḍān prakṣipya guggulu lavaṇam ca prakṣipya tasmin odane sampātya abhimantrya aśnāti

original: anena karmaṇā kṛtena bahavo vṛṣabhāḥ sampadyante /
analyzed: anena karmaṇā kṛtena bahavaḥ vṛṣabhāḥ sampadyante

original: śāntaphalaśilākṛtiloṣṭavalmīkarāśivāpaṃ trīṇi kūdīprāntāni madhyamapalāśe darbheṇa pariveṣṭya rāśipalyeṣu karoti // KauśS_3,4{21}.2 //]
analyzed: śānta phala śilā ākṛti loṣṭa valmīka rāśi vāpam trīṇi kūdī prāntāni madhyama palāśe darbheṇa pariveṣṭya rāśi palyeṣu karoti

original: śāntaphalaṃ tasyāvasitamākṛtiloṣṭaṃ valmīkamṛttikā tasyāmantaṃ vapā ca /
analyzed: śānta phalam tasya avasitam ākṛtiloṣṭam valmīka mṛttikā tasyām antam vapā ca

original: trīṇi kūdyāḥ prāntānyagrāṇi madhyamapalāśe kṛtvā darbheṇa pariveṣṭya śāntipuṣṭivadvā 'payasvatīḥ' iti sūktenābhimantrya rāśipalyeṣu karotyadhastāt
analyzed: trīṇi kūdyāḥ prāntāni agrāṇi madhyama palāśe kṛtvā darbheṇa pariveṣṭya śānti puṣṭi vat vā payasvatīḥ iti sūktena abhimantrya rāśi palyeṣu karoti adhastāt

original: 'payasvatīḥ' iti sūktena yadā yadā bhaktaṃ rādhyate tadā tadābhimantrayate yadā dīyate /
analyzed: payasvatīḥ iti sūktena yadā yadā bhaktam rādhyate tadā tadā abhimantrayate yadā dīyate

original: kaṇḍane peṣaṇe niṣpavane randhane pariveṣaṇe dāne ca sarvatrābhimantraṇam //
analyzed: kaṇḍane peṣaṇe niṣpavane randhane pariveṣaṇe dāne ca sarvatra abhimantraṇam
iti palyeśmānam samprokṣya anvṛcam kāśīnopya āvāpayati

original: 'ayaṃ no nabhasaspatiḥ' iti sūktenāśmānaṃ abhimantrya palye nidadhāti /
analyzed: ayam naḥ nabhasaspatiḥ iti sūktena aśmānam abhimantrya palye nidadhāti

original: aśmanopari trīn anvṛcaṃ muṣṭiṃ dhānyaṃ nidadhāti /
analyzed: aśmanā upari trīn anvṛcam muṣṭim dhānyam nidadhāti

original: [ā gāvaḥ (4.21) iti gāḥ āyatīḥ pratyuttiṣṭhati // KauśS_3,4{21}.8 //]
analyzed: ā gāvaḥ iti gāḥ āyatīḥ pratyuttiṣṭhati

original: 'ā gāvaḥ' iti sūktena sandhyākāle gā āyatīḥ pratyuttiṣṭhati //
analyzed: ā gāvaḥ iti sūktena sandhyā kāle gāḥ āyatīḥ pratyuttiṣṭhati
prāvṛṣi prathama dhārasya indrāya tris juhoti

original: yadā prathamaṃ homamicchati tadedaṃ karma karoti pākayajñavidhānena /
analyzed: yadā prathamam homam icchati tadā idam karma karoti pākayajña vidhānena

original: tasyā dugdhenendradevatākaṃ caruṃ śrapayitvā 'ā gāvaḥ' iti ṣaḍbhirṛgbhirdvābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ trayo homāḥ kartavyāḥ /
analyzed: tasyāḥ dugdhena indra devatākam carum śrapayitvā ā gāvaḥ iti ṣaḍbhiḥ ṛgbhiḥ dvābhyām dvābhyām trayaḥ homāḥ kartavyāḥ
prajāvatīḥ sū yavasāḥ iti ṛcā araṇye gacchantīḥ gāḥ anumantrayate
karkī pravādānām dvādaśa dāmnyām sampātavatyām ayam ghāsaḥ
abhyātāna antam kṛtvā sūryasya raśmīn anu
iti tisṛbhiḥ dvādaśa dāmnyām sampātitāyām vatsām badhnāti

original: 'iha vatsāṃ nibadhnīmaḥ' iti pādena vatsāṃ badhnāti /
analyzed: iha vatsām nibadhnīmaḥ iti pādena vatsām badhnāti

original: 'ayaṃ ghāsaḥ' iti pādena ghāsaṃ dadāti gobhyo vatsebhyaśca /
analyzed: ayam ghāsaḥ iti pādena ghāsam dadāti gobhyaḥ vatsebhyaḥ ca
tisraḥ kūdī mayīḥ ūrṇanābhi kulāya parihitāḥ anvaktāḥ ādadhāti

original: 'yaste śokāya' ityṛcā tisraḥ kūdīmayīḥ ūmayakulāyasūtreṇāveṣṭya ghūtenāktā ādadhāti /
analyzed: yaḥ te śokāya iti ṛcā tisraḥ kūdī mayīḥ ūmaya kulāya sūtreṇa āveṣṭya ghūtena aktāḥ ādadhāti

original: [atyanteṣīkā mauñjaparihitā madhunā pralipya cikkaśeṣu paryasya // KauśS_3,4{21}.14 //]
analyzed: atyanta iṣīkāḥ mauñja parihitāḥ madhunā pralipya cikkaseṣu paryasya

original: 'yaste śokāya' ityṛcā muñjena saha iṣīkāstisro madhunā praliptā cikkaśeṣvādadhāti /
analyzed: yaḥ te śokāya iti ṛcā muñjena saha iṣīkāḥ tisraḥ madhunā praliptāḥ cikkaseṣu ādadhāti
jyeṣṭhena putreṇa saha bhāga vidhim vakṣyāmaḥ
uta putraḥ iti jyeṣṭham putram avasāyayati

original: 'uta putraḥ' ityṛcā gṛhakāṣṭheṣṭakādyā abhimantrya gṛhaṃ kārayet /
analyzed: uta putraḥ iti ṛcā gṛha kāṣṭha iṣṭakā ādyāḥ abhimantrya gṛham kārayet

original: putro vā sāmpadaṃ karoti pitā vā //
analyzed: putraḥ vā sāmpadam karoti pitā vā
uta putraḥ iti ṛcā sarva sāmpadam kurute
uta putraḥ iti ṛcā audumbara samidhaḥ ādadhāti
uta putraḥ iti ṛcā pālāśa samidhaḥ ādadhāti
uta putraḥ iti ṛcā bṛhadbadarī samidhaḥ ādadhāti
grāma paśu putra dhana dhānya kāmaḥ sarva sāmpadam kurute
iti ārdra pāṇī rasam jñātvā prayacchati

original: 'ardhamardhena' ityṛcā ārdrapāṇirbhūtvā śāntaśākhayā ṛcaṃ japitvā pitā putrasya bhāgaṃ prayacchati prāgbhāgamapākṛtya /
analyzed: ardham ardhena iti ṛcā ārdra pāṇiḥ bhūtvā śānta śākhayā ṛcam japitvā pitā putrasya bhāgam prayacchati prāc bhāgam apākṛtya
tasyāḥ amāvāsyāyām tisraḥ prādeśa mātrīḥ ādadhāti

original: agre yā amāvāsyā bhaviṣyati tasyāmamāvāsyāyām 'ardhamardhena' ityṛcā śākhāṃ bhittvā tisraḥ samidha ādadhāti /
analyzed: agre yā amāvāsyā bhaviṣyati tasyām amāvāsyāyām ardham ardhena iti ṛcā śākhām bhittvā tisraḥ samidhaḥ ādadhāti
putrāḥ ca bhrātaraḥ api anena vidhānena bhāgam kurvanti
tve kratum api iti ṛcā rasa karmāṇi kurute

original: yāni medhājananādīni vihitāni sarvāṇi vikalpenānayā ṛcā bhavanti /
analyzed: yāni medhājanana ādīni vihitāni sarvāṇi vikalpena anayā ṛcā bhavanti
tve kratum iti ṛcā sarvatra rasaprāśanam

original: iti prājāpatyāmāvāsyāyāmastamite valmīkaśirasi darbhāvastīrṇe'dhyadhi dīpaṃ dhārayaṃstrirjuhoti // KauśS_3,4{21}.23 //]
analyzed: iti prājāpatya amāvāsyāyām astamite valmīka śirasi darbha avastīrṇedhi adhi dīpam dhārayan tris juhoti

original: pākayajñavidhānena prajāpataye caruṃ śrapayitvā 'stuṣva varṣman' ityṛcā juhoti /
analyzed: pākayajña vidhānena prajāpataye carum śrapayitvā stuṣva varṣman iti ṛcā juhoti

original: amāvāsyāyāmastamite rātrau valmīkaśirasi darbhāvāstīrya tatra dīpaṃ dadāti /
analyzed: amāvāsyāyām astamite rātrau valmīka śirasi darbhau āstīrya tatra dīpam dadāti
dīpa upari tris ājya āhutīḥ juhoti stuṣva varṣman iti ṛcā
taṇḍula sampātān ānīya rasaiḥ upasicya aśnāti
stuṣva varṣman iti ṛcā tris homaḥ
taṇḍula sampātān ānīya rasaiḥ upasicya aśnāti
punar aneka phala puṣṭi karmāṇi ucyante

original: iti maiśradhānyaṃ bhṛṣṭapiṣṭaṃ lohitālaṅkṛtaṃ rasamiśramaśnāti // KauśS_3,5{22}.1 //]
analyzed: iti maiśradhānyam bhṛṣṭapiṣṭam lohita alaṅkṛtam rasa miśram aśnāti

original: ' 'tadidāsa' iti sūktābhyāṃ maiśradhānyaṃ bhṛṣṭapiṣṭaṃ saktumajālohitamiśraṃ rasamiśritaṃ ca sampātyābhimantryāśnāti /
analyzed: tat idāse iti sūktābhyām maiśradhānyam bhṛṣṭapiṣṭam saktum ajā lohita miśram rasa miśritam ca sampātya abhimantrya aśnāti

original: [abhṛṣṭaṃ plakṣodumbarasyottarato'gnestriṣu camaseṣu pūrvāhṇasya tejasāgramannasya prāśiṣam iti pūrvāhṇe // KauśS_3,5{22}.2 //
analyzed: a bhṛṣṭam plakṣa udumbarasya uttaratas agneḥ triṣu camaseṣu pūrvāhṇasya tejasā agram annasya prāśiṣam iti pūrvāhṇe

original: madhyandinasya tejasā madhyamannasya prāśiṣam iti madhyandine // KauśS_3,5{22}.3 //
analyzed: madhyandinasya tejasā madhyam annasya prāśiṣam iti madhyandine

original: aparāhṇasya tejasā sarvamannasya prāśiṣam ityaparāhṇe // KauśS_3,5{22}.4 //]
analyzed: aparāhṇasya tejasā sarvam annasya prāśiṣam iti aparāhṇe

original: 'tadidāsa' iti sūktābhyāmaudumbaracamaseṣu triṣu maiśradhānyaṃ prakṣipya rasāṃśca sampātyābhimantryāśnāti mantreṇa trikālaṃ ca /
analyzed: tat idāse iti sūktābhyām audumbara camaseṣu triṣu maiśradhānyam prakṣipya rasān ca sampātya abhimantrya aśnāti mantreṇa tri kālam ca

original: 'tadidāsa' iti sūktābhyāmṛtumatyāḥ striyā lohitaṃ rasamiśritaṃ kṛtvā sampātyābhimantryāṅgulibhyāṃ pradeśanīmadhyamābhyāṃ prāśnāti /
analyzed: tat idāse iti sūktābhyām ṛtumatyāḥ striyāḥ lohitam rasa miśritam kṛtvā sampātya abhimantrya aṅgulibhyām pradeśanī madhyamābhyām prāśnāti
yat kṣetram kāmayate tasmin kīlālam dadhi madhu miśram

original: yat kṣetraṃ kāmayate tasmin kṣetra idaṃ karma kuryāt /
analyzed: yat kṣetram kāmayate tasmin kṣetre idam karma kuryāt
ājya tantram barhiḥ lavana ādi abhyātāna antam kṛtvā ṛdhak mantraḥ
tat idāse iti sūktābhyām bhaktam dadhi madhu miśram sampātya abhimantrya aśnāti

original: [saṃvatsaraṃ striyamanupetya śuktyāṃ reta ānīya taṇḍulamiśraṃ saptagrāmam // KauśS_3,5{22}.7 //]
analyzed: saṃvatsaram striyam an upetya śuktyām retaḥ ānīya taṇḍula miśram sapta grāmam

original: saṃvatsaraṃ brahmacaryaṃ kṛtvā tato maithunaṃ kṛtvā śuktyāṃ reta ānīya taṇḍulamiśraṃ kṛtvā 'ṛdhaṅmantraḥ',
analyzed: saṃvatsaram brahmacaryam kṛtvā tatas maithunam kṛtvā śuktyām retaḥ ānīya taṇḍula miśram kṛtvā ṛdhak mantraḥ
tat idāse iti sūktābhyām sampātya abhimantrya aśnāti
idam sapta grāma lābha karma kathyate

original: [dvādaśīmamāvāsyeti kṣīrabhakṣo bhavatyamāvāsyāyāṃ dadhimadhubhakṣastasya mūtra udakadadhimadhupalpūlanānyāsicya // KauśS_3,5{22}.8 //
analyzed: dvādaśīm amāvāsyā iti kṣīra bhakṣaḥ bhavati amāvāsyāyām dadhi madhu bhakṣaḥ tasya mūtre udaka dadhi madhu palpūlanāni āsicya

original: kravyādaṃ nāḍī pra viveśāgniṃ prajābhāṅgirato māyayaitau /
analyzed: kravyādam nāḍī pra viveśa agnim māyayā etau

original: āvāṃ devī juṣāṇe ghṛtācī imamannādyāya pra viśataṃ svāhā iti // KauśS_3,5{22}.9 //]
analyzed: āvām devī juṣāṇe ghṛtācī imam annādyāya pra viśatam svāhā iti
dvādaśīm amāvāsyā iti kṣīra bhakṣaḥ bhavati
pratipadi abhyātāna antam kṛtvā ṛdhak mantraḥ

original: 'tadidāsa' iti sūktābhyāṃ tasya mūtra udakadadhimadhugomayaṃ ca etānyekīkṛtya sampātyābhimantryāśnāti 'kravyādaṃ nāḍī' ityṛcā /
analyzed: tat idāse iti sūktābhyām tasya mūtre udaka dadhi madhu gomayam ca etāni ekīkṛtya sampātya abhimantrya aśnāti kravya adam nāḍī iti ṛcā

original: niśāyāmāgrayaṇataṇḍulānudakyān madhumiśrān nidadhātyā yavānāṃ paṅkteḥ // KauśS_3,5{22}.10 //
analyzed: niśāyām āgrayaṇa taṇḍulān udakyān madhu miśrān nidadhāti ā yavānām paṅkteḥ
tṛtīyam āgrayaṇam kṛtvā abhyātāna antam kṛtvā ṛdhak mantraḥ

original: 'tadidāsa' iti sūktābhyāṃ vrīhiyavānekatra kṛtvā trivṛti gomayaparicaye śrapayitvā sampātyābhimantryāśnāti /
analyzed: tat idāse iti sūktābhyām vrīhi yavān ekatra kṛtvā trivṛti gomaya paricaye śrapayitvā sampātya abhimantrya aśnāti

original: iti sāttrikānagnīn darbhapūtīkabhāṅgābhiḥ paristīrya gārhapatyaśṛtaṃ sarveṣu sampātavantaṃ gārhapatyadeśe'śnāti // KauśS_3,5{22}.14 //]
analyzed: iti sāttrikān agnīn darbha pūtīka bhāṅgābhiḥ paristīrya gārhapatya śṛtam sarveṣu sampātavantam gārhapatya deśe śnāti
śatru deśe gatvā gārhapatya dakṣiṇāgni āhavanīyeṣu karma kuryāt

original: tato gārhapatye'bhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'mamāgne varcaḥ' iti sūktena sārūpavatsamodanaṃ gārhapatyaśṛtaṃ gārhapatye prathamaṃ sampātya /
analyzed: tatas gārhapatya ibhyātāna antam kṛtvā mama agne varcaḥ iti sūktena sārūpavat sama odanam gārhapatya śṛtam gārhapatye prathamam sampātya

original: tato dakṣiṇāgnau tantraṃ kṛtvā pūtīkaiḥ kāśaiḥ staraṇam /
analyzed: tatas dakṣiṇāgnau tantram kṛtvā pūtīkaiḥ kāśaiḥ staraṇam
tatas āhavanīye tantram kṛtvā bhāṅga āstaraṇam

original: tatastameva sārūpavatsaṃ sampātya tenaiva sūktena tataḥ paścāt sakṛdabhimantraṇaṃ kṛtvā tata aśnāti /
analyzed: tatas tam eva sārūpavatsam sampātya tena eva sūktena tatas paścāt sakṛt abhimantraṇam kṛtvā aśnāti

original: dakṣiṇāgnyāhavanīyagārhapatyeṣu yathākramaṃ vratagrahaṇādi abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā sārūpavatsasya
analyzed: dakṣiṇāgni āhavanīya gārhapatyeṣu yathākramam vrata grahaṇa ādi abhyātāna antam kṛtvā sārūpavatsasya

original: dakṣiṇāgnau śrapaṇaṃ kṛtvā 'mamāgne varcaḥ' iti sūktena sārūpavatsaṃ sampātyādiṣu yathākrameṇa /
analyzed: dakṣiṇāgnau śrapaṇam kṛtvā mama agne varcaḥ iti sūktena sārūpavatsam sampāti ādiṣu yathākrameṇa

original: tato gārhapatyaṃ dakṣiṇāgniṃ caikatra kṛtvā tato'bhimantrya dakṣiṇāgnideśa aśnāti yathākrameṇa /
analyzed: tatas gārhapatyam dakṣiṇāgnim ca ekatra kṛtvā dakṣiṇāgni deśe aśnāti yathākrameṇa

original: evamāhavanīyagārhapatyadakṣiṇāgniṣu vratopāyanādyabhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā sārūpavatsasyāhavanīye śrapaṇaṃ kṛtvā 'mamāgne varcaḥ' iti sūktenāhavanīyādi  #
analyzed: evam āhavanīya gārhapatya dakṣiṇāgniṣu vrata upāyana ādi abhyātāna antam kṛtvā sārūpavatsasya āhavanīye śrapaṇam kṛtvā mama agne varcaḥ iti sūktena āhavanīya ādi
sārūpavatsam sampātya gārhapatya āhavanīyam ekatra kṛtvā tatobhimantrya aśnāti

original: gārhapatyadakṣiṇāgnyāhavanīyeṣu yathākrameṇa punareva tantraṃ kṛtvā 'mamāgneḥ varcaḥ' iti sūktena droṇakalaśe rasān kṛtvā
analyzed: gārhapatya dakṣiṇāgni āhavanīyeṣu yathākrameṇa punar eva tantram kṛtvā mama agneḥ varcaḥ iti sūktena droṇakalaśe rasān kṛtvā
tatas rasān prāśnāti gārhapatya ādi krameṇa
iti nava śālāyām sarpiḥ madhu miśram aśnāti

original: agniśālāyāṃ vā gośālāyāṃ vā grāme vā pure vānyatrābhinave gṛhe vā /
analyzed: agni śālāyām vā go śālāyām vā grāme vā pure vā anyatra abhinave gṛhe vā

original: pāṣāṇamaye vā kāṣṭhamaye vā tṛṇamaye vā iṣṭakāmaye vā sarvatra nave vāsitaṃ idaṃ karma /
analyzed: pāṣāṇa maye vā kāṣṭha maye vā tṛṇa maye vā iṣṭakā maye vā sarvatra nave vā asitam idam karma

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'yajūṃṣi yajñe' iti sūktāntena sakṛd ghṛtaṃ madhumiśraṃ juhoti //
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā yajūṃṣi yajñe iti sūkta antena sakṛt ghṛtam madhu miśram juhoti
doṣaḥ gāye iti sūktena dvitīyām āhutim juhoti
doṣaḥ gāye iti sūktābhyām tṛtīyām āhutim juhoti
śālām aṅgulibhyām samprokṣya gṛha patnī āsāde upaviśya uda pātram ninayati

original: tataḥ śālāmaṅgulibhyāṃ samprokṣya tūṣṇīṃ gṛhapatnyāsāda upaviśya udapātraṃ ninayati tūṣṇīm //
analyzed: tatas śālām aṅgulibhyām samprokṣya tūṣṇīm gṛha patnī āsāde upaviśya uda pātram ninayati tūṣṇīm
iha eva staḥ iti vācam visṛjate
iti vārṣmaṇam audumbaram mantha pratirūpam abhijuhoti

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'ūrdhvā asya' iti sūktenāgnau audumbaraṃ dattvājyaṃ juhoti /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā ūrdhvāḥ asya iti sūktena agnau audumbaram dattvā ājyam juhoti
a saṅkhyātāḥ adhiśṛtya sapta āgama śaṣkulīḥ

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvāsaṅkhyātā āgamaśaṣkulīradhiśṛtya 'ūrdhvā asya' iti sūktena sapta śaṣkulīragnau dattvājyaṃ juhoti /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā a saṅkhyātāḥ āgama śaṣkulīḥ adhiśṛtya ūrdhvāḥ asya iti sūktena sapta śaṣkulīḥ agnau dattvā ājyam juhoti
tvaṣṭā me iti prātar vibhuṅkṣyamāṇā uśnāti

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'tvaṣṭā me daivyaṃ vacaḥ' iti sūktena sārūpavatsaṃ śrapayitvā sampātyābhimantryāśnāti /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā tvaṣṭā me daivyam vacaḥ iti sūktena sārūpavatsam śrapayitvā sampātya abhimantrya aśnāti

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'tvaṣṭā me daivyam' iti sūktena dhanurjyāṃ sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā tvaṣṭā me daivyam iti sūktena dhanuḥ jyām sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti
samāptāni vibhāga śānti karmāṇi dāyāda vibhāgānām

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'tvaṣṭā me' iti sūktena daṇḍaṃ sampātyābhimantrya vimṛjya tato dhārayati /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā tvaṣṭā me iti sūktena daṇḍam sampātya abhimantrya vimṛjya tatas dhārayati

original: dhvajadaṇḍaṃ citraṃ dhanurdaṇḍaṃ śailakuntadaṇḍaṃ rājadaṇḍaṃ veṇvādi /
analyzed: dhvaja daṇḍam citram dhanuḥ daṇḍam śaila kunta daṇḍam rāja daṇḍam veṇu ādi
atha citrā karma citrā nakṣatre ucyate

original: [vāyurenāḥ (6.14) iti yuktayościtrākarmaniśāyāṃ sambhārān sampātavataḥ karoti // KauśS_3,6{23}.12 //]
analyzed: vāyuḥ enāḥ iti yuktayoḥ citrā karma niśāyām sambhārān sampātavataḥ karoti
pūrvāhṇe yajña upavītī śālā niveśanam samūhayati upavatsyat bhaktam aśitvā snātaḥ ūhata vasanaḥ prayuṅkte kauśs

original: rātrau abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'tvaṣṭā me' 'vāyurenāḥ' iti sūktābhyāṃ sambhārān sampātayati /
analyzed: rātrau abhyātāna antam kṛtvā tvaṣṭā me vāyuḥ enāḥ iti sūktābhyām sambhārān sampātayati

original: vṛkṣaśākhā udakaṃ audumbaraśakalaṃ tāmrachurikā eteṣu pratidravyaṃ sūktāvṛttiḥ /
analyzed: vṛkṣa śākhāḥ udakam audumbara śakalam tāmra churikā eteṣu pratidravyam sūkta āvṛttiḥ

original: [aparedyuḥ vāyurenāḥ iti śākhayodakadhārayā gāḥ parikrāmati // KauśS_3,6{23}.13 //]
analyzed: aparedyus vāyurenāḥ iti śākhayā udaka dhārayā gāḥ parikrāmati
vāyuḥ enāḥ iti ṛcā śākhayā udaka dhārayā gāḥ parikrāmati
prathama jasya śakalam avadhāya audumbareṇa asinā lohitena

original: prathamajasyekṣukāśakāṇḍyāḥ śakalamavadhāyaudumbareṇāsinā 'lohitena' iti mantreṇa vatsakarṇaṃ chinnati //
analyzed: prathama jasya ikṣukā śakāṇḍyāḥ śakalam avadhāya audumbareṇa asinā lohitena iti mantreṇa vatsa karṇam
iti ikṣu kāśa kāṇḍyā lohitam nirmṛjya rasa miśram aśnāti

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'yathā cakruḥ' ityṛcā ikṣukāśakāṇḍyā karṇalohitaṃ rasamiśritaṃ kṛtvā sampātyābhimantryāśnāti puṣṭikāmaḥ /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā yathā cakruḥ iti ṛcā ikṣu kāśa kāṇḍyā karṇa lohitam rasa miśritam kṛtvā sampātya abhimantrya aśnāti puṣṭi kāmaḥ
yasya idamāḥ rajaḥ yujaḥ iti sūktena uktam sīrā yuñjanti

original: ājyamiśrān yavānurvarāyāṃ kṛṣṭe phālenoduhyānvṛcaṃ kāśīn ninayati nivapati // KauśS_3,7{24}.2 //]
analyzed: ājya miśrān yavān urvarāyām kṛṣṭe phālena uduhya anvṛcam kāśīn ninayati nivapati

original: 'ucchrayasva' iti sūktena yavavrīhyādibījamāsādyājyamiśramabhimantrya kṛṣṭe vā kṣetre nivapati trīn muṣṭīn bījasya /
analyzed: ucchrayasva iti sūktena yava vrīhi ādi bījam āsādya ājya miśram abhimantrya kṛṣṭe vā kṣetre nivapati trīn muṣṭīn bījasya

original: [abhi tyam (7.14) iti mahāvakāśe'raṇya unnate vimite prāgdvārapratyagdvāreṣvapsu sampātānānayati // KauśS_3,7{24}.3 //
analyzed: abhi tyam iti mahā avakāśa iraṇye unnate vimite prāc dvāra pratyak dvāreṣu apsu sampātān ānayati

original: uccasthāne gatvā tato'bhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'abhi tyam' iti caturṛcena sūktenodapātraṃ sampātya kṛṣṇājine somaṃ vicinoti //
analyzed: ucca sthāne gatvā tatobhyātāna antam kṛtvā abhi tyam iti caturṛcena sūktena uda pātram sampātya kṛṣṇājine somam vicinoti

original: tadudapātraṃ somarasamiśraṃ sārūpavatsam odanaṃ śrapayitvā sampātyābhimantryāśnāti /
analyzed: tat uda pātram soma rasa miśram sārūpavatsam odanam śrapayitvā sampātya abhimantrya aśnāti
prāc dvāra pratyak dvāre maṇḍape etat karma
abhyātāna antam kṛtvā tām savitar iti ṛcā
godāma maṇim sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti puṣṭi arthī

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'saṃ mā siñcantu' ityṛcā grāmasya sarvodake maiśradhānyaṃ prakṣipya sampātyābhimantryāśnāti /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā sam mā siñcantu iti ṛcā grāmasya sarva udake maiśradhānyam prakṣipya sampātya abhimantrya aśnāti
iti ṛṣabha daṇḍinaḥ vapayā indram yajate

original: anubaddhaśiraḥpādena gośālāṃ carmaṇāvacchādyāvadānakṛtaṃ brāhmaṇān bhojayati // KauśS_3,7{24}.10 //]
analyzed: anubaddha śiraḥ pādena go śālām carmaṇā avacchādya avadāna kṛtam brāhmaṇān bhojayati

original: 'divyaṃ suparṇam' ityṛcā ṛṣabhasya vapayendraṃ yajate vaśāvidhānena //
analyzed: divyam suparṇam iti ṛcā ṛṣabhasya vapayā indram yajate vaśā vidhānena
atha pravatsyataḥ ekāgnikasya idam karma kathyate
iha eva staḥ iti pravatsyan avekṣate

original: sūyavasād (7.73.11) iti sūyavase paśūn niṣṭhāpayati // KauśS_3,7{24}.17 //]

analyzed: iha eva staḥ iti ṛcā gṛham mānuṣān ca avekṣate
yadā āgacchati tadā idam karma ucyate

original: maunaṃ kṛtvā samidha ādāya gṛhaṃ dṛṣṭvā 'ūrjaṃ bibhrat' iti ṣaḍarcaṃ sūktaṃ japati //
analyzed: maunam kṛtvā samidhaḥ ādāya gṛham dṛṣṭvā ūrjam bibhrat iti ṣaṣ arcam sūktam japati

original: [savyena samidho dakṣiṇena śālāvalīkaṃ saṃstabhya japati // KauśS_3,7{24}.12 //]
analyzed: savyena samidhaḥ dakṣiṇena śālā valīkam saṃstabhya japati

original: vāmena hastena samidhaḥ kṛtvā dakṣiṇena śālāvalīkaṃ saṃstabhya japati 'ūrjaṃ bibhrat' iti //
analyzed: vāmena hastena samidhaḥ kṛtvā dakṣiṇena śālā valīkam saṃstabhya japati ūrjam bibhrat iti

original: [ativrajya samidha ādhāya sumaṅgali prajāvati susīme'haṃ vāṃ gṛhapatirjīvyāsam iti sthūṇe gṛhṇātyupatiṣṭhate // KauśS_3,7{24}.13 //]
analyzed: ativrajya samidhaḥ ādhāya su maṅgali prajāvati su sīmā iham vām gṛhapatiḥ jīvyāsam iti sthūṇe gṛhṇāti upatiṣṭhate

original: tataḥ 'ūrjaṃ bibhrat' iti sūktena samidha ādadhāti agnau /
analyzed: tatas ūrjam bibhrat iti sūktena samidhaḥ ādadhāti agnau
su maṅgali prajāvati kalpa jena sthūṇe gṛhṇāti upatiṣṭhate
yat vadāmi iti ṛcā vāgvisargam karoti
gṛha patnī āsāde upaviśya uda pātram ninayati
dūrvā agraiḥ añjalau apaḥ ānīya darśam dārśībhiḥ upatiṣṭhate
dūrvā agrāṇi añjulikāyām kṛtvā pūrva aparam
iti ṣaṣ arcam sūktam japati amāvāsyāyām

original: retodhāyai tvātisṛjāmi vayodhāyai tvātisṛjāmi yūthatvāyai tvātisṛjāmi gaṇatvāyai tvātisṛjāmi sahasrapoṣāyai tvātisṛjāmyaparimitapoṣāyai tvātisṛjāmi
analyzed: retodhāyai tvā atisṛjāmi vayodhāyai tvā atisṛjāmi yūthatvāyai tvā atisṛjāmi gaṇatvāyai tvā atisṛjāmi sahasrapoṣāyai tvā atisṛjāmi aparimita poṣāyai tvā atisṛjāmi

original: iti purāṇaṃ pravṛtya navamutsṛjate samprokṣati // KauśS_3,7{24}.21 //]
analyzed: iti purāṇam pravṛtya navam utsṛjate samprokṣati

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'indrasya kukṣiḥ' ityṛcā ṛṣabhaṃ sampātya vivāhavat agnipariṇayanaṃ kṛtvā saha vatsatarībhirvisarjayati /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā indrasya kukṣiḥ iti ṛcā ṛṣabham sampātya vivāha vat agni pariṇayanam kṛtvā saha vatsatarībhiḥ visarjayati
etam vaḥ yuvānam iti ṛcā abhimantraṇam

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'sāhasraḥ' ityarthasūktena vṛṣabhaṃ sampātya vivāhavat sarvaṃ kṛtvā visarjayati /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā sāhasraḥ iti artha sūktena vṛṣabham sampātya vivāha vat sarvam kṛtvā visarjayati
etam vaḥ yuvānam iti ṛcā abhimantraṇam vatsasya

original: yadā ekādaśāhe vṛṣotsargaṃ karoti tadā śāntyudakaṃ kṛtvā tato vṛṣotsargaṃ karoti /
analyzed: yadā ekādaśa ahe vṛṣotsargam karoti tadā śāntyudakam kṛtvā tatas vṛṣotsargam karoti
vṛṣabha puccham gṛhītvā deva pitṛ ṛṣibhyaḥ aham dade ṛṣabham uccārayati
uttareṇa puṣṭi kāmaḥ ṛṣabheṇa indram yajate
sāhasraḥ tu eṣaḥ iti artha sūktena ṛṣabheṇa indram yajate vaśā vidhānena
sāhasraḥ iti artha sūktena śvetena ṛṣabheṇa indram yajate vaśā vidhānena

original: rātrau abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā trayaścaravaḥ śrapayitavyāḥ 'satyaṃ bṛhat' ityanuvākena //
analyzed: rātrau abhyātāna antam kṛtvā trayaḥ caravaḥ śrapayitavyāḥ satyam bṛhat iti anuvākena
paścāt agneḥ darbheṣu khadāyām sarva hutam

original: paścādagnerdarbheṣu khadāyāṃ bhūmāvekaṃ caruṃ sakṛt sarvahutaṃ juhoti //
analyzed: paścāt agneḥ darbheṣu khadāyām bhūmau ekam carum sakṛt sarva hutam juhoti
dvitīyam carum anuvākena sampātya abhimantrya aśnāti
iti sapta bhūme mātar ityṛcā juhoti
paścāt agneḥ darbheṣu kaśipu āstīrya vimṛgvarīm
yāḥ te śivāḥ iti ṛcā saṃviśati

original: [udīrāṇāḥ (7.1.28) iti trīṇi padāni prāṅvodaṅvā bāhyenopaniṣkramya yāvatte (12.1.33)
analyzed: udīrāṇāḥ iti trīṇi padāni prāṅ vā udaṅ vā bāhyena upaniṣkramya yāvat te
udīrāṇāḥ iti ṛcā trīṇi padāni niṣkrāmati prāgvā udagvā
bāhyena upaniṣkramya yāvat te iti ṛcā ādityam īkṣate
unnatam āruhya yāvat te iti ṛcā vīkṣate
purastāt agneḥ sīram yuktam uda pātreṇa sampātavatā avasiñcati

original: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'satyaṃ bṛhat' ityanuvākenodapātraṃ sampātya purastādagneḥ sīraṃ yuktaṃ samprokṣati /
analyzed: tantram kṛtvā satyam bṛhat iti anuvākena uda pātram sampātya purastāt agneḥ sīram yuktam samprokṣati
satyam bṛhat iti anuvākena kṛṣi karma

original: iti juhoti varo ma āgamiṣyati iti // KauśS_3,7{24}.37 //]
analyzed: iti juhoti varaḥ me āgamiṣyati iti

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'yasyāṃ sadohavirdhāne' iti tisṛbhirājyaṃ juhoti /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā yasyām sadaḥ havirdhāne iti tisṛbhiḥ ājyam juhoti
utkṛṣṭa putra dhana ādi sarva phala kāmaḥ
yasyām annam iti ṛcā upatiṣṭhate pṛthivīm puṣṭi kāmaḥ
nidhim bibhrati iti dvābhyām upatiṣṭhate pṛthivīm maṇi hiraṇya drava nidhi ratna kāmaḥ
iti vārṣa kṛtasya ācāmati śirasi ānayate

original: vṛṣṭikāle 'yasyāṃ kṛṣṇam' ityṛcā navodakamabhimantryācamanaṃ karoti puṣṭikāmaḥ /
analyzed: vṛṣṭi kāle yasyām kṛṣṇam iti ṛcā nava udakam abhimantrya ācamanam karoti puṣṭi kāmaḥ

original: 'yasyāṃ kṛṣṇam' ityṛcā navodakamabhimantrya snānaṃ karoti puṣṭikāmaḥ /
analyzed: yasyām kṛṣṇam iti ṛcā nava udakam abhimantrya snānam karoti puṣṭi kāmaḥ

original: 'yaṃ tvā pṛṣatī rathaḥ' iti caturbhiḥ raktavarṇāṃ gāmabhimantrya brāhmaṇāya dadāti puṣṭikāmaḥ //
analyzed: yam tvā pṛṣatī rathaḥ iti caturbhiḥ rakta varṇām gām abhimantrya brāhmaṇāya dadāti puṣṭi kāmaḥ

original: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'yaṃ tvā pṛṣatī rathaḥ' iti caturbhiḥ raktavarṇāyāḥ goḥ kṣīraudanaṃ śrapayitvā sarvahutaṃ juhoti /
analyzed: tantram kṛtvā yam tvā pṛṣatī rathaḥ iti caturbhiḥ rakta varṇāyāḥ goḥ kṣīraudanam śrapayitvā sarva hutam juhoti
sarve mantrāḥ puṣṭikarmasu paṭhitāḥ tṛtīya idhyāye
teṣām upadhānam upasthānam bhavati sarveṣām sūktānām ye triṣapta ādīnām
salilaiḥ sarva kāmaḥ salilaiḥ sarva kāmaḥ
iti ete mantrāḥ puṣṭikarma madhye paṭhitāḥ

original: pauṣṭikānāṃ sarveṣāṃ mantrāṇāṃ havirupadhānam upasthānaṃ vā karoti vikalpena puṣṭikarmaṇāmupadhānopasthānam (KauśS 24.45)
analyzed: pauṣṭikānām sarveṣām mantrāṇām haviḥ upadhānam upasthānam vā karoti vikalpena puṣṭi karmaṇām upadhāna upasthānam kauśs

original: puṣṭikarmaṇām upadhānam upasthānaṃ vā karoti puṣṭikāmaḥ /
analyzed: puṣṭikarmaṇām upadhānam upasthānam vā karoti puṣṭi kāmaḥ

original: upadadhītetyanādeśe ājyaṃ samitpuroḍāśapayaodanapāyasapaśuvrīhiyavatilāḥ dhānāḥ karambhaśaṣkulyaḥ etāni havīṃṣi jānīyāt /
analyzed: upadadhīta iti anādeśe ājyam samidh puroḍāśa payaḥ odana pāyasa paśu vrīhi yava tilāḥ dhānāḥ karambha śaṣkulyaḥ etāni havīṃṣi jānīyāt

original: yatra yatra homaḥ kartavyastatra tatra sarvatropadhānaṃ pauṣṭikānāṃ mantrāṇāṃ kartavyam /
analyzed: yatra yatra homaḥ kartavyaḥ tatra tatra sarvatra upadhānam pauṣṭikānām mantrāṇām kartavyam

original: gṛhe bahirvā vṛkṣārthaṃ puruṣārthaṃ paśvarthaṃ hastyartham aśvārthaṃ goarthaṃ mahiṣyartham ajāvikādigṛhapaśudhanadhānyamṛgārtham /
analyzed: gṛhe bahis vā vṛkṣa artham puruṣa artham paśu artham hasti artham aśva artham go artham mahiṣī artham ajāvika ādi gṛha paśu dhana dhānya mṛga artham
yatra nitya naimittika kāmya homaḥ tatra sarvatra pauṣṭika homaḥ kāryaḥ
na asti saṅkhyā jāti niyamaḥ puṣṭi karmaṇām

original: yatrānyaprayojanārthaṃ homaḥ na tatra pauṣṭikahomaḥ kāryaḥ /
analyzed: yatra anya prayojana artham homaḥ na tatra pauṣṭika homaḥ kāryaḥ
yatra yatra ca saṅkīrṇam ātmānam manyate dvijaḥ
tatra tatra tilaiḥ homaḥ nairṛtiḥ na vidhīyate
na tatra nirṛti karma kuryāt iti arthaḥ
puṣṭi śabdena dravya ādi lābhaḥ dravya ādi vṛddhiḥ ca puṣṭi śabdena ucyate
śarīra puṣṭiḥ ca dhana ādi puṣṭiḥ ca bhavati āyuḥ puṣṭiḥ ca
atha salila gaṇaḥ ucyate āpaḥ hi stha

original: asya gaṇasya vā upadhānaṃ ājyādi vā karoti athavā upasthānam /
analyzed: asya gaṇasya vā upadhānam ājya ādi vā karoti athavā upasthānam
putra paśu dhana dhānya ratna gṛha padāti aśva hasti go mahiṣī avi vastra jāta dravya ādi hiraṇya bhojana ārāma deva pūjā ādi uccāṭana vaśīkaraṇa stambhana jambhana ādi
upadhāna upasthānam karoti sarva phala kāmaḥ putra paśu dhānya ādi sarva kāmaḥ
pūrvam nirṛti karmāṇi sarva pāpa apanuttaye
pauṣṭikāni tatas paścāt tṛtīye saṃhitā vidhau
iti bheṣaja śāntiḥ bhaiṣajya śabdena ucyate
tatra dvividhāḥ vyādhayaḥ āhāra nimittāḥ anya janma pāpa nimittāḥ ca

original: tatra āhāranimitteṣu carakabāhaḍasuśrutapraṇīteṣu auṣadheṣu vyādhyupaśamanaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: tatra āhāra nimitteṣu caraka bāhaḍa suśruta praṇīteṣu auṣadheṣu vyādhi upaśamanam bhavati
aśubha nimitteṣu atharvaveda vihiteṣu śāntikeṣu vyādhi upaśamanam bhavati
tathā ca agre vakṣyati anūktāni apratiṣiddhāni bha pajyānām
bandhana pāyana ācamana ādīni ca kāryāṇi
ājya tantram abhyātāna antam kṛtvā ye triṣaptāḥ

original: iti sūktena udapātraṃ sampātya vyādhitasya śarīraṃ sammārṣṭi /
analyzed: iti sūktena uda pātram sampātya vyādhitasya śarīram sammārṣṭi

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'ye triṣaptāḥ' iti sūktenodapātraṃ sampātya mukhavalīrvimārṣṭyaṅgavalīśca /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā ye triṣaptāḥ iti sūktena uda pātram sampātya mukha valīḥ vimārṣṭi aṅga valīḥ ca
taruṇasya yadi valayaḥ tadā etat karma

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'vidmā śarasya' iti sūktena muñjapuṣpamaṇiṃ muñjarajjvā baddhvā sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā vidma śarasya iti sūktena muñja puṣpa maṇim muñja rajjvā baddhvā sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti
jvara bhaiṣajyam atisāre ca ati mūtre ca

original: ājyatantraṃ kṛtvā 'ado yadavadhāvati' iti sūktena muñjaśiro rajjvā baddhvā sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: ājya tantram kṛtvā adaḥ yat avadhāvati iti sūktena muñja śiraḥ rajjvā baddhvā sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti
vidma śarasya iti prathama sūktena kṣetramṛttikām abhimantrya pāyayati
adaḥ yat iti sūktena ākṛtiloṣṭam abhimantrya pāyayati
vidma śarasya iti prathamena valmīka mṛttikām abhimantrya pāyayati
adaḥ yat iti sūktena valmīka mṛttikām abhimantrya pāyayati
vidma śarasya iti prathamena ghṛta mantryā apānam mrakṣati

original: 'ado yad' iti sūktena ghṛtamabhimantryāpānaṃ vā pralimpati / atisāre ca //
analyzed: adaḥ yat iti sūktena ghṛtam abhimantrya apānam vā pralimpati atisāre ca
vidma śarasya iti carma khalva āmukham abhimantrya vraṇa mukham dhamati

original: 'ado yad' iti sūktena mukhena khalvā vābhimantryāpānaṃ śiśnaṃ vā nāḍīṃ vā vraṇamukhaṃ dhamati /
analyzed: adaḥ yat iti sūktena mukhena khalvā vā abhimantrya apānam śiśnam vā nāḍīm vā vraṇa mukham dhamati

original: samāptāni jvarātisāra atimūtra aṅganāḍīpravāhe ca bhaiṣajyāni //
analyzed: samāptāni jvara atisāra atimūtra aṅga nāḍīpravāhe ca bhaiṣajyāni
ati duḥkha mūtre duḥkha purīṣa karaṇe śamana bhaiṣajyāni ucyante

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'vidmā śarasya' iti dvitīyena harītakīṃ karpuraṃ vā sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā vidma śarasya iti dvitīyena harītakīm karpuram vā sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti
ākhu kiri pūtīka mathita jarat pramanda sāvraskān pāyayati
vidma śarasya iti dvitīyena mūṣaka mṛttikām abhimantrya pāyayati

original: 'vidmā śarasya' iti dvitīyena tallagnaṃ laṇḍikātṛṇamabhimantrya pāyayati /
analyzed: vidma śarasya iti dvitīyena tad lagnam laṇḍikā tṛṇam abhimantrya pāyayati
vidma śarasya iti dvitīyena dadhimathitam pāyayati

original: 'vidmā śarasya' iti dvitīyena jaradindukamabhimantrya piṣṭvā pāyayati /
analyzed: vidma śarasya iti dvitīyena jaradindukam abhimantrya piṣṭvā pāyayati

original: 'vidmā śarasya' iti dvitīyena sūktena kāṣṭhatakṣaṇānyudake kṛtvābhimantrya pāyayati /
analyzed: vidma śarasya iti dvitīyena sūktena kāṣṭha takṣaṇāni udake kṛtvā abhimantrya pāyayati
iti dvābhyām ṛgbhyām mūṣaka mṛttikā upari upaveśya abhimantrayate mūtra pratibandhe
viṣitam te vasti bilam iti dvābhyām ṛgbhyām pūtīka tṛṇa upari upaveśya abhimantrayate

original: 'viṣitaṃ te vastibilam' iti dvābhyāṃ dadhimathitoparyupaveśya tato'bhimantrayate /
analyzed: viṣitam te vasti bilam iti dvābhyām dadhi mathita upari upaveśya

original: 'viṣitaṃ te vastibilam' iti dvābhyāṃ jaratpramandasyoparyupaveśyābhimantrayate mūtrapratibandhe.'viṣitaṃ
analyzed: viṣitam te vasti bilam iti dvābhyām jarat pramandasya upari upaveśya abhimantrayate mūtra pratibandhe viṣitam

original: te vastibilam' ityṛgbhyāṃ dārutakṣaśakalānāmuparyupaveśya vyādhitamabhimantrayate mūtrapratibandhe /
analyzed: te vasti bilam iti ṛgbhyām dāru takṣa śakalānām upari upaveśya vyādhitam abhimantrayate mūtra pratibandhe

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'vidmā śarasya' iti dvitīyena hastyādiyānaṃ sampātyābhimantrya tato vyādhitamārohayati /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā vidma śarasya iti dvitīyena hasti ādi yānam sampātya abhimantrya tatas vyādhitam ārohayati
tatas dhāvati vegena mūtra mocana kāmaḥ

original: 'vidmā śarasya' iti dvitīyena dhanuḥśaramabhimantrya tato vyādhitaṃ prati śaraṃ kṣipati śīghraḥ //
analyzed: vidma śarasya iti dvitīyena dhanuḥ śaram abhimantrya tatas vyādhitam prati śaram kṣipati śīghraḥ

original: 'vidmā śarasya' iti dvitīyena śiśnamabhimantrya carma niḥsphoṭati /
analyzed: vidma śarasya iti dvitīyena śiśnam abhimantrya carma niḥsphoṭati

original: 'vidmā śarasya' iti dvitīyena lohaśalākāmabhimantrya śiśnaṃ praveśayati /
analyzed: vidma śarasya iti dvitīyena loha śalākām abhimantrya śiśnam praveśayati

original: [ekaviṃśatiṃ yavān dohanyāmadbhirānīya drughnīṃ jaghane saṃstabhya phalato'vasiñcati // KauśS_4,1{25}.17 //]
analyzed: ekaviṃśatim yavān dohanyām adbhiḥ ānīya drughnīm jaghane saṃstabhya phalataḥ uvasiñcati

original: 'vidmā śarasya' iti dvitīyena drughnīṃ jyādhanuṣaṃ jaghane śiśnadeśa ūrdhvaṃ kṛtvā godohanyāmudakaṃ kṛtvā yavānekaviṃśatiṃ prakṣipya tenodakena  #
analyzed: vidma śarasya iti dvitīyena drughnīm jyā dhanuṣam jaghane śiśna deśe ūrdhvam kṛtvā godohanyām udakam kṛtvā yavān ekaviṃśatim prakṣipya tena udakena
yathā udakam śiśne patati tathā kāryam

original: 'vidmā śarasya' iti dvitīyena yavagodhūmavallī padmamūlaṃ pāṭhikā etāni kvāthayitvābhimantrya vyādhitaṃ pāyayati /
analyzed: vidma śarasya iti dvitīyena yava godhūmavallī padma mūlam pāṭhikāḥ etāni kvāthayitvā abhimantrya vyādhitam pāyayati

original: samāptāni mūtrapratibandhe duḥkhamūtrakaraṇe duḥkhapurīṣakaraṇa udāvartana udarapūrṇanirodhakaraṇe caitāni bhaiṣajyāni kāryāṇi /
analyzed: samāptāni mūtra pratibandhe duḥkha mūtra karaṇe duḥkha purīṣa karaṇe udāvartane udara pūrṇa nirodha karaṇe ca etāni bhaiṣajyāni kāryāṇi

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'ambayo yanti' iti sūktenājyaṃ juhoti /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā ambayaḥ yanti iti sūktena ājyam juhoti
ambayaḥ yanti sūktena pālāśa audumbara ādyāḥ samidhaḥ ādadhāti

original: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'vāyoḥ pūtaḥ' iti sūktena tṛcenājyaṃ juhoti /
analyzed: tantram kṛtvā vāyoḥ pūtaḥ iti sūktena tṛcena ājyam juhoti

original: 'vāyoḥ pūtaḥ' iti tṛcena pālāśādyāḥ samidhaḥ somarasenāktā ādadhāti /
analyzed: vāyoḥ pūtaḥ iti tṛcena pālāśa ādyāḥ samidhaḥ soma rasena aktāḥ ādadhāti

original: somavamane somapāne somābhiṣave ca vyādhyutpanne bhaiṣajyaṃ samāptam //
analyzed: soma vamane soma pāne soma abhiṣave ca vyādhi utpanne bhaiṣajyam samāptam
idam haviḥ iti sūktābhyām kukusān juhoti

original: gṛhe grāme vā pattane kṣetre vā devagṛhe vā yatra kvacit piśācaśaṅkāsti tatra homaṃ kṛtvā dhūmaṃ niyataṃ kuryādityarthaḥ /
analyzed: gṛhe grāme vā pattane kṣetre vā devagṛhe vā yatra kvacid piśāca śaṅkā asti tatra homam kṛtvā dhūmam niyatam kuryāt iti arthaḥ
arāya kṣayaṇam iti tisṛbhiḥ kukusān juhoti
śat naḥ devī pṛśniparṇī iti sūktena kukusān juhoti
ā paśyati iti sūktena kukusān juhoti
purastāt yuktaḥ iti sūktena kukusān juhoti
rakṣaḥ haṇam iti anuvākena kukusān juhoti tantre
stuvānam idam haviḥ iti sūktābhyām tuṣān juhoti
arāya kṣayaṇam iti tisṛbhiḥ tuṣān juhoti
śat naḥ devī pṛśniparṇī iti sūktena tuṣān juhoti
tvayā pūrvam iti sūktābhyām tuṣān juhoti
purastāt yuktaḥ iti sūktena tuṣān juhoti
rakṣaḥ haṇam iti anuvākena tuṣān juhoti
stuvānam idam haviḥ iti sūktābhyām busam juhoti

original: yasmin sthāne piśācastasmin sthāne homaṃ karoti /
analyzed: yasmin sthāne piśācaḥ tasmin sthāne homam karoti

original: yathā dhūmo bhavati tathā kuryāt sthāne ca /
analyzed: yathā dhūmaḥ bhavati tathā kuryāt sthāne ca
arāya kṣayaṇam iti tisṛbhiḥ busam juhoti

original: 'śanno devī pṛśniparṇī' iti sūktena busaṃ juhoti /
analyzed: śat naḥ devī pṛśniparṇī iti sūktena busam juhoti
ā paśyati iti sūktena busam juhoti
tvayā pūrvam iti sūktābhyām busam juhoti
rakṣaḥ haṇam iti anuvākena busam juhoti
stuvānam idam haviḥ iti sūktābhyām kāṣṭha śakalāni juhoti
sarvatra piśāca uccāṭanam sarvatra dhūpanam ca
arāya kṣayaṇam iti tisṛbhiḥ śakalāni juhoti
śat naḥ devī pṛśniparṇī iti śakalāni juhoti
ā paśyati iti sūktena śakalāni juhoti
tvayā pūrvam iti sūktābhyām śakalāni juhoti
rakṣaḥ haṇam iti anuvākena kāṣṭha śakalāni juhoti
sarvatra tantra vikalpaḥ hasta homa tvāt

original: puruṣasya sthāne nagare grāme gṛhe vā yatra śaṅkā vidyate tatra dhūmakaraṇaṃ homena.
analyzed: puruṣasya sthāne nagare grāme gṛhe vā yatra śaṅkā vidyate tatra dhūma karaṇam homena
stuvānam idam haviḥ iti sūktābhyām piśāca gṛhītam puruṣam anvāha
arāya kṣayaṇam iti tisṛbhiḥ puruṣam anvāha
śat naḥ devī iti sūktena piśāca gṛhītam ākrośayet
ā paśyati iti sūktena piśāca gṛhītam puruṣam ākrośayet
tān satya ojāḥ tvayā pūrvam sūktābhyām piśācam anvāha
purastāt yuktaḥ iti sūktam japitvā anvāha
rakṣaḥ haṇam iti anuvākena piśāca gṛhītam puruṣam anvāha

original: yadi grāme nagare vā rathyāyāṃ vā kṣetre vā tadā japaṃ kṛtvā piśācanāmagrahaṇaṃ kuryāditi /
analyzed: yadi grāme nagare vā rathyāyām vā kṣetre vā tadā japam kṛtvā piśāca nāma grahaṇam kuryāt iti
stuvānam idam haviḥ iti sūktābhyām karkaṭikā samidhaḥ ādadhāti
niḥsālām iti sūktena karkaṭikā samidhaḥ ādadhāti
arāya kṣayaṇam iti tisṛbhiḥ trapusa samidhaḥ ādadhāti
śat naḥ devī iti sūktena trapusa samidhaḥ ādadhāti
ā paśyati iti sūktena karkaṭikāsamidhaḥ ādadhāti

sarvatra sūkta ādi grahaṇe sūktam pratīyāt
purastāt yuktaḥ iti trapusa samidhaḥ ādadhāti
rakṣaḥ haṇam iti anuvākena karkaṭikā samidhaḥ ādadhāti
stuvānam idam haviḥ iti sūktābhyām musala samidhaḥ ādadhāti
niḥsālām iti sūktena loka prasiddha musala kāṣṭhāni ādadhāti
arāya kṣayaṇam iti tisṛbhiḥ musala kāṣṭhāni ādadhāti
