purastāt yuktaḥ iti sūktena musala samidhaḥ ādadhāti
rakṣaḥ haṇam iti anuvākena musala samidhaḥ ādadhāti
stuvānam idam haviḥ iti sūktābhyām khadira samidhaḥ ādadhāti
niḥsālām iti sūktena khadira samidhaḥ ādadhāti
arāya kṣayaṇam iti tisṛbhiḥ khadira samidhaḥ ādadhāti
śat naḥ devī iti khadira samidhaḥ ādadhāti
ā paśyati iti sūktena khadira samidhaḥ ādadhāti
tvayā pūrvam iti sūktābhyām khadira samidhaḥ ādadhāti
purastāt yuktaḥ iti khadira samidhaḥ ādadhāti
rakṣaḥ haṇam iti anuvākena khadira samidhaḥ ādadhāti

original: ekaṃ kuryāt dve vā bahūni vā.
analyzed: ekam kuryāt dve vā bahūni vā
stuvānam idam haviḥ iti sūktābhyām sarṣapa samidhaḥ ādadhāti
niḥsālām iti sūktena sarṣapa samidhaḥ ādadhāti
arāya kṣayaṇam iti tisṛbhiḥ sarṣapa samidhaḥ ādadhāti

original: 'śanno devīḥ' iti sūktena tārṣṭāghīḥ samidha ādadhāti /
analyzed: śat naḥ devīḥ iti sūktena tārṣṭāghīḥ samidhaḥ ādadhāti

original: 'ā paśyati' iti sūktena tārṣṭāghīḥ samidha ādadhāti /
analyzed: ā paśyati iti sūktena tārṣṭāghīḥ samidha ādadhāti
tān satya ojāḥ tvayā pūrvam iti sūktābhyām sarṣapa samidhaḥ ādadhāti
purastāt yuktaḥ iti sarṣapa samidhaḥ ādadhāti
rakṣaḥ haṇam iti anuvākena sarṣapa samidhaḥ ādadhāti
musala khadira samidbhyām dvijasya uccāṭanam bhavati
ayugmān khādirān śaṅkūn akṣyau ni vidhya

original: 'stuvānam', 'idaṃ haviḥ' iti sūktābhyāṃ khadiraśaṅkūn sapta nava vābhimantrya paścādagnernikhanati /
analyzed: stuvānam idam haviḥ iti sūktābhyām khadira śaṅkūn sapta nava vā abhimantrya paścāt agneḥ nikhanati

original: 'niḥsālam' iti sūktena sapta khadiraśaṅkūnabhimantrya paścādagnernikhanati 'akṣyau ni vidhya' ityṛcā /
analyzed: niḥsālam iti sūktena sapta khadira śaṅkūn abhimantrya paścāt agneḥ nikhanati akṣyau ni vidhya iti ṛcā

original: 'arāyakṣayaṇam' iti tisṛbhiḥ sapta khadirakīlakānabhimantrya 'akṣyau nividhya' ityṛcā paścādagnernikhanati /
analyzed: arāya kṣayaṇam iti tisṛbhiḥ sapta khadira kīlakān abhimantrya akṣyau nividhya iti ṛcā paścāt agneḥ nikhanati

original: 'śanno devīḥ' iti sūktena ayugmān khādirāñchaṅkūnabhimantrya 'akṣyau ni vidhya' ityṛcā paścādagnernikhanati /
analyzed: śat naḥ devīḥ iti sūktena ayugmān khādirān śaṅkūn abhimantrya akṣyau ni vidhya iti ṛcā paścāt agneḥ nikhanati

original: 'ā paśyati' iti sūktena sapta kīlakānabhimantrya paścādagneḥ 'akṣyau ni vidhya' ityṛcā nikhanati /
analyzed: ā paśyati iti sūktena sapta kīlakān abhimantrya paścāt agneḥ akṣyau ni vidhya iti ṛcā nikhanati

original: 'tvayā pūrvam' iti sūktābhyāṃ sapta kīlakānabhimantrya 'akṣyau ni vidhya' ityṛcā nikhanati agneḥ paścāt /
analyzed: tvayā pūrvam iti sūktābhyām sapta kīlakān abhimantrya akṣyau ni vidhya iti ṛcā nikhanati agneḥ paścāt

original: 'rakṣohaṇam' ityanuvākena khādiramayān sapta kīlakānabhimantrya paścādagnernikhanati 'akṣyau ni vidhya' iti ṛcā /
analyzed: rakṣaḥ haṇam iti anuvākena khādira mayān sapta kīlakān abhimantrya paścāt agneḥ nikhanati akṣyau ni vidhya iti ṛcā

original: 'stuvānam', 'idaṃ haviḥ' iti sūktābhyāṃ lohakīlakān pañca sapta vābhimantrya paścādagnernikhanati 'akṣyau ni vidhya' ityṛcā /
analyzed: stuvānam idam haviḥ iti sūktābhyām loha kīlakān pañca sapta vā abhimantrya paścāt agneḥ nikhanati akṣyau ni vidhya iti ṛcā

original: 'niḥsālām' iti sūktena lohakīlakānabhimantrya paścādagnernikhanati 'akṣyau ni vidhya' iti /
analyzed: niḥsālām iti sūktena loha kīlakān abhimantrya paścāt agneḥ nikhanati akṣyau ni vidhya iti
arāya kṣayaṇam iti tisṛbhiḥ loha kīlakān abhimantrya nikhanati
śat naḥ devīḥ iti sūktena loha maya kīlakān abhimantrya nikhanati
ā paśyati iti sūktena loha maya kīlakān abhimantrya paścāt agneḥ nikhanati

original: 'tvayā pūrvam' iti sūktābhyāṃ pañca sapta vā lohamayakīlakānabhimantrya nikhanati 'akṣyau ni vidhya'
analyzed: tvayā pūrvam iti sūktābhyām pañca sapta vā loha maya kīlakān abhimantrya nikhanati akṣyau ni vidhya

original: iti / 'purastādyuktaḥ' iti sūktena lohamayakīlakānabhimantrya paścādagnernikhanati 'akṣyau ni vidhya' ityṛcā /
analyzed: iti purastāt yuktaḥ iti sūktena loha maya kīlakān abhimantrya paścāt agneḥ nikhanati akṣyau ni vidhya iti ṛcā

original: 'rakṣohaṇam' ityanuvākena lohamayakīlakān pañca sapta vābhimantrya paścādagnernikhanati 'akṣyau ni vidhya' ityṛcā /
analyzed: rakṣaḥ haṇam iti anuvākena loha maya kīlakān pañca sapta vā abhimantrya paścāt agneḥ nikhanati akṣyau ni vidhya iti ṛcā

original: 'stuvānam', 'idaṃ haviḥ' iti sūktābhyāṃ tāmramayakīlakānabhimantrya paścādagnernikhanati 'akṣyau ni vidhya' iti /
analyzed: stuvānam idam haviḥ iti sūktābhyām tāmra maya kīlakān abhimantrya paścāt agneḥ nikhanati akṣyau ni vidhya iti
niḥsālām iti sūktena tāmra mayān kīlakān abhimantrya paścāt agneḥ nikhanati
arāya kṣayaṇam iti tisṛbhiḥ tāmra mayān kīlakān abhimantrya paścāt agneḥ nikhanati

original: 'śanno devī pṛśniparṇī' iti sūktena tāmramayān kīlakānabhimantrya nikhanati /
analyzed: śat naḥ devī pṛśniparṇī iti sūktena tāmra mayān kīlakān abhimantrya nikhanati
ā paśyati iti tāmra mayān kīlakān abhimantrya paścāt agneḥ nikhanati

original: 'tāntsatyaujāḥ' iti sūktena tāmrakīlakānabhimantrya 'akṣyau ni vidhya' iti paścādagnernikhanati /
analyzed: tān satya ojāḥ iti sūktena tāmra kīlakān abhimantrya akṣyau ni vidhya iti paścāt agneḥ nikhanati

original: 'tvayā pūrvam' iti sūktena tāmramayakīlakānabhimantrya 'akṣyau ni vidhya' iti nikhanati /
analyzed: tvayā pūrvam iti sūktena tāmra maya kīlakān abhimantrya akṣyau ni vidhya iti nikhanati
purastāt yuktaḥ iti tāmra maya kīlakān abhimantrya nikhanati
rakṣaḥ haṇam iti anuvākena tāmra maya kīlakān abhimantrya paścāt agneḥ nikhanati
akṣyau ni vidhya iti sarvatra nikhananam
tapta śarkarābhiḥ śayanam rāśi palyāṇi parikirati

original: 'stuvānam', 'idaṃ haviḥ' iti sūktābhyāṃ taptaśarkarā abhimantrya śayanaṃ vāntarāṇi vā gṛhaṃ vā grāmaṃ vā eṣu sthāneṣu parikiret rakṣobhaye
analyzed: stuvānam idam haviḥ iti sūktābhyām tapta śarkarāḥ abhimantrya śayanam vā antarāṇi vā gṛham vā grāmam vā eṣu sthāneṣu parikiret rakṣaḥ bhaye

original: 'niḥsālām' iti sūktena taptaśarkarā abhimantrya gṛhādiṣu parikirati piśācabhaye /
analyzed: niḥsālām iti sūktena tapta śarkarāḥ abhimantrya gṛha ādiṣu parikirati piśāca bhaye

original: 'arāyakṣayaṇam' iti tisṛbhiḥ taptaśarkarā abhimantrya śayanarāśipalyāni parikirati /
analyzed: arāya kṣayaṇam iti tisṛbhiḥ tapta śarkarāḥ abhimantrya śayana rāśi palyāni parikirati

original: 'śanno devī' iti sūktena taptaśarkarā abhimantrya śayanarāśipalyāni parikirati /
analyzed: śat naḥ devī iti sūktena tapta śarkarāḥ abhimantrya śayana rāśi palyāni parikirati
ā paśyati iti tapta śarkarā parikirati

original: 'tvayā pūrvam' iti sūktābhyāṃ taptaśarkarā abhimantrya śayanarāśipalyāni parikirati piśācabhaye /
analyzed: tvayā pūrvam iti sūktābhyām tapta śarkarāḥ abhimantrya śayana rāśi palyāni parikirati piśāca bhaye

original: 'purastādyukto vaha' iti sūktena taptaśarkarā abhimantrya śayanarāśipalyāni parikirati piśācabhaye /
analyzed: purastāt yuktaḥ vahaḥ iti sūktena tapta śarkarāḥ abhimantrya śayana rāśi palyāni parikirati piśāca bhaye

original: 'rakṣohaṇam' ityanuvākena taptaśarkarā abhimantrya śayanarāśipalyāni parikirati piśācabhaye //
analyzed: rakṣaḥ haṇam iti anuvākena tapta śarkarāḥ abhimantrya śayana rāśi palyāni parikirati piśāca bhaye
amāvāsyāyām sakṛt gṛhītān yavān an apahatān a pratīhāra piṣṭān ābhicārikam paristīrya tārṣṭāgha idhme āvapati

original: ya āgacchet taṃ brūyāt śaṇaśulbena jihvāṃ nirmṛjānaḥ śālāyāḥ praskanda iti // KauśS_4,1{25}.28 //
analyzed: yaḥ āgacchet tam brūyāt śaṇa śulbena jihvām nirmṛjānaḥ śālāyāḥ praskande iti
amāvāsyāyām abhyātāna antam kṛtvā śara mayam barhiḥ stṛṇāti
stuvānam idam haviḥ iti sūktābhyām sakṛt gṛhīta yava saktūn juhoti pratyṛcam

original: etasmin tantre yavarāśimadhyānmuṣṭimekāṃ gṛhātvolūkhalena khaṇḍyata apradakṣiṇaṃ piṣyate /
analyzed: etasmin tantre yava rāśi madhyāt muṣṭim ekām gṛhātvā ulūkhalena khaṇḍyate apradakṣiṇam piṣyate

original: tato vyādhitaṃ sampātya śaṇasūtreṇa jihvāmārjanaṃ karoti tato grahaṇamuktaḥ /
analyzed: tatas vyādhitam sampātya śaṇa sūtreṇa jihvāmārjanam karoti tatas grahaṇa muktaḥ

original: yadi na karoti śaṇena jihvāmārjanaṃ tadā na gato graha iti vijānīyāt /
analyzed: yadi na karoti śaṇena jihvā mārjanam tadā na gataḥ grahaḥ iti vijānīyāt

original: amāvāsyāyāmājyatantraṃ śarastṛtaṃ sarṣapedhmamupasamāhitamabhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'niḥsālām' iti sūktena sakṛdgṛhītān yavānanapahatānapratīhāraṃ  #
analyzed: amāvāsyāyām ājya tantram śara stṛtam sarṣapa idhmam upasamāhitam abhyātāna antam kṛtvā niḥsālām iti sūktena sakṛt gṛhītān yavān an apahatān a pratīhāram

original: yadi śaṇasūtreṇa jihvāmārjanaṃ karoti tadā gato grahaḥ /
analyzed: yadi śaṇa sūtreṇa jihvā mārjanam karoti tadā gataḥ grahaḥ

original: amāvāsyāyāṃ śaramayaṃ barhiḥstṛtaṃ sarṣapedhmaviśiṣṭaṃ tantraṃ kṛtvā 'arāyakṣayaṇam' iti tisṛbhiḥ sakṛdgṛhītān yavānanapahatānapratīhāraṃ piṣṭān  #
analyzed: amāvāsyāyām śara mayam barhiḥ stṛtam sarṣapa idhma viśiṣṭam tantram kṛtvā arāya kṣayaṇam iti tisṛbhiḥ sakṛt gṛhītān yavān an apahatān a pratīhāram piṣṭān

original: yadi śaṇasūtreṇa jihvāmārjanaṃ karoti tato gato grahaḥ /
analyzed: yadi śaṇa sūtreṇa jihvā mārjanam karoti tatas gataḥ grahaḥ

original: amāvāsyāyāṃ śaramayaṃ barhiḥstṛtaṃ sarṣapedhmaviśiṣṭaṃ tantraṃ kṛtvā 'arāyakṣayaṇam' iti tisṛbhiḥ yavānapahatānapratīhāraṃ piṣṭān saktūñjuhoti
analyzed: amāvāsyāyām śara mayam barhiḥ stṛtam sarṣapa idhma viśiṣṭam tantram kṛtvā arāya kṣayaṇam iti tisṛbhiḥ yavān apahatān a pratīhāram piṣṭān saktūn juhoti

original: yadi śaṇasūtreṇa jihvāmārjanaṃ karoti tato gato grahaḥ /
analyzed: yadi śaṇa sūtreṇa jihvā mārjanam karoti tatas gataḥ grahaḥ

original: amāvāsyāyāṃ prātarabhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā śaramayaṃ barhiḥstṛtaṃ sarṣapedhmaviśiṣṭaṃ 'śanno devī pṛśniparṇī' iti sūktena yavānanapahatānapratīhāraṃ  #
analyzed: amāvāsyāyām prātar abhyātāna antam kṛtvā śara mayam barhiḥ stṛtam sarṣapa idhma viśiṣṭam śat naḥ devī pṛśniparṇī iti sūktena yavān an apahatān a pratīhāram

original: amāvāsyāyāṃ prātaḥ śaramayaṃ barhiḥstṛtaṃ sarṣapedhmaviśiṣṭaṃ tantraṃ kṛtvā 'ā paśyati' iti sūktena yavānanapahatānapratīhāraṃ piṣṭān saktūñjuhoti
analyzed: amāvāsyāyām prātar śara mayam barhiḥ stṛtam sarṣapa idhma viśiṣṭam tantram kṛtvā ā paśyati iti sūktena yavān an apahatān a pratīhāram piṣṭān saktūn juhoti

original: śaṇena jihvāmārjanam.amāvāsyāyāṃ śaramayaṃ barhiḥstṛtaṃ sarṣapedhmaviśiṣṭaṃ tantraṃ kṛtvā 'tāntsatyaujāḥ',
analyzed: śaṇena jihvā mārjanam amāvāsyāyām śara mayam barhiḥ stṛtam sarṣapa idhma viśiṣṭam tantram kṛtvā tān satya ojāḥ

original: 'tvayā pūrvam' iti sūktābhyāṃ sakṛdgṛhītān yavānanapahatānapratīhāraṃ piṣṭān saktūñjuhotiṭata uttaratantram /
analyzed: tvayā pūrvam iti sūktābhyām sakṛt gṛhītān yavān an apahatān a pratīhāram piṣṭān saktūn juhoti ṭatas uttaratantram

original: amāvāsyāyāṃ prātaḥ śaramayaṃ barhiḥstṛtaṃ sarṣapedhmaviśiṣṭamabhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'purastādyuktaḥ' iti sūktena sakṛdgṛhītān yavānanapahatānapratīhāraṃ  #
analyzed: amāvāsyāyām prātar śara mayam barhiḥ stṛtam sarṣapa idhma viśiṣṭam abhyātāna antam kṛtvā purastāt yuktaḥ iti sūktena sakṛt gṛhītān yavān an apahatān a pratīhāram

original: amāvāsyāyāṃ prātaḥ śaramayaṃ barhiḥstṛtaṃ sarṣapedhmaviśiṣṭamabhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'rakṣohaṇam' ityanuvākena sakṛdgṛhītān yavānanapahatānapratīhāraṃ  #
analyzed: amāvāsyāyām prātar śara mayam barhiḥ stṛtam sarṣapa idhma viśiṣṭam abhyātāna antam kṛtvā rakṣaḥ haṇam iti anuvākena sakṛt gṛhītān yavān an apahatān a pratīhāram

original: yadi na karoti tadā na gato grahaḥ /
analyzed: yadi na karoti tadā na gataḥ grahaḥ
idam karma avaśyasya grahasya vaśīkaraṇam ucyate
ayam abhicāraḥ vaśyā grahasya vaśīkaraṇa arthaḥ
vīriṇa tūla miśram iṅgiḍam prapuṭe juhoti
ājya tantram abhyātāna antam kṛtvā stuvānam

original: 'idaṃ haviḥ' iti sūktābhyāṃ vīriṇatūlamiśramiṅgiḍaṃ pūrṇapuṭena juhoti /
analyzed: idam haviḥ iti sūktābhyām vīriṇa tūla miśram iṅgiḍam pūrṇapuṭena juhoti
niḥsālām iti sūktena vīriṇa puṣpa miśritam iṅgiḍam ājyam juhoti pālāśa puṭena ājya tantre

original: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'arāyakṣayaṇam' iti tisṛbhiḥ vīriṇatūlamiśritamiṅgiḍaṃ palāśapuṭena juhoti /
analyzed: tantram kṛtvā arāya kṣayaṇam iti tisṛbhiḥ vīriṇa tūla miśritam iṅgiḍam palāśa puṭena juhoti

original: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'śanno devī pṛśniparṇī' iti sūktena vīriṇatūlamiśritamiṅgiḍaṃ prapuṭena juhoti /
analyzed: tantram kṛtvā śat naḥ devī pṛśniparṇī iti sūktena vīriṇa tūla miśritam iṅgiḍam prapuṭena juhoti

original: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'ā paśyati' iti sūktena vīriṇatūlamiśritamiṅgiḍaṃ prapuṭena juhoti /
analyzed: tantram kṛtvā ā paśyati iti sūktena vīriṇa tūla miśritam iṅgiḍam prapuṭena juhoti
ājya tantram kṛtvā tān satya ojāḥ

original: 'tvayā pūrvam' iti sūktābhyāṃ vīriṇatūlamiśramiṅgiḍaṃ prapuṭena juhoti /
analyzed: tvayā pūrvam iti sūktābhyām vīriṇa tūla miśram iṅgiḍam prapuṭena juhoti

original: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'purastādyuktaḥ' iti sūktena vīriṇatūlamiśritamiṅgiḍaṃ parṇapuṭena juhoti /
analyzed: tantram kṛtvā purastāt yuktaḥ iti sūktena vīriṇa tūla miśritam iṅgiḍam parṇa puṭena juhoti
rakṣaḥ haṇam iti anuvākena vīriṇa tūla miśritam iṅgiḍam prapuṭena juhoti ājya tantre

original: athāsmin gṛhe piśāco'sti vā na veti saṃśaye idaṃ karma ucyate -
analyzed: atha asmin gṛhe piśācaḥ usti vā na vā iti saṃśaye idam karma ucyate

original: 'stuvānam', 'idaṃ haviḥ' iti sūktābhyāṃ sarṣapedhmaṃ śaramayaṃ barhirabhimantrya śālāyā upari nidadhāti /
analyzed: stuvānam idam haviḥ iti sūktābhyām sarṣapa idhmam śara mayam barhiḥ abhimantrya śālāyāḥ upari nidadhāti

original: 'niḥsālām' iti sūktena tārṣṭāghedhmaṃ śaramayaṃ barhiścābhimantrya śālāyā upari nidadhāti /
analyzed: niḥsālām iti sūktena tārṣṭāgha idhmam śara mayam barhiḥ ca abhimantrya śālāyāḥ upari nidadhāti
yadi tat vikṛtam tadā tat gṛham piśāca gṛhītam
vīriṇa tūla miśritam iṅgiḍam prapuṭena juhoti
arāya kṣayaṇam iti tisṛbhiḥ idhmābarhiḥ abhimantrya śālāyāḥ upari nidadhāti
tatra vīriṇa tūla miśritam iṅgiḍam prapuṭena juhoti
śat naḥ devī iti idhmābarhiḥ abhimantrya śālāyām āsajati
tatas vīriṇa tūla miśritam iṅgiḍam prapuṭena juhoti
ā paśyati iti sūktena idhmābarhiḥ śālāyām āsajati

original: tata idhmābarhiḥ śālāyā gṛhītvā tena tantramabhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā vīriṇatūlamiśramiṅgiḍaṃ prapuṭena juhoti /
analyzed: tatas idhmābarhiḥ śālāyāḥ gṛhītvā tena tantram abhyātāna antam kṛtvā vīriṇa tūla miśram iṅgiḍam prapuṭena juhoti
tvayā pūrvam iti sūktābhyām idhmābarhiḥ abhimantrya śālāyām āsajati
vīriṇa tūla miśram iṅgiḍam prapuṭena juhoti tena eva sūktena
purastāt yuktaḥ iti sūktena idhmābarhiḥ abhimantrya śālāyām āsajati
tatra vīriṇa tūla miśram iṅgiḍam prapuṭena juhoti
rakṣaḥ haṇam iti anuvākena idhmābarhiḥ śālāyām āsajati

original: tantraṃ kṛtvā tenānuvākena vīriṇatūlamiśramiṅgiḍaṃ prapuṭena juhoti /
analyzed: tantram kṛtvā tena anuvākena vīriṇa tūla miśram iṅgiḍam prapuṭena juhoti
vaiśravaṇāya añjalim kṛtvā japan ācāmayati abhyukṣati

original: 'idaṃ haviḥ' iti sūktābhyāmudakamabhimantrya tamācāmayati samprokṣati ca /
analyzed: idam haviḥ iti sūktābhyām udakam abhimantrya tam ācāmayati samprokṣati ca

original: vaiśravaṇāya namaskāraṃ kṛtvā 'niḥsālām' iti sūktenodakamabhimantryācāmayati samprokṣati ca vyādhitam /
analyzed: vaiśravaṇāya namaskāram kṛtvā niḥsālām iti sūktena udakam abhimantrya ācāmayati samprokṣati ca vyādhitam

original: vaiśravaṇāya namaskāraṃ kṛtvā 'arāyakṣayaṇam' iti tisṛbhirudakamabhimantryācāmayati samprokṣati ca piśācagṛhītaṃ puruṣam /
analyzed: vaiśravaṇāya namaskāram kṛtvā arāya kṣayaṇam iti tisṛbhiḥ udakam abhimantrya ācāmayati samprokṣati ca piśāca gṛhītam puruṣam

original: vaiśravaṇāya namaskāraṃ kṛtvā 'śanno devī' iti sūktenodakamabhimantryācāmayati samprokṣati ca /
analyzed: vaiśravaṇāya namaskāram kṛtvā śat naḥ devī iti sūktena udakam abhimantrya ācāmayati samprokṣati ca

original: vaiśravaṇāya namaskāraṃ kṛtvā 'ā paśyati' iti sūktenodakamabhimantryācāmayati samprokṣati ca vyādhitaṃ mānuṣam /
analyzed: vaiśravaṇāya namaskāram kṛtvā ā paśyati iti sūktena udakam abhimantrya ācāmayati samprokṣati ca vyādhitam mānuṣam
vaiśravaṇāya namaskāram kṛtvā tān satya ojāḥ

original: 'tvayā pūrvam' iti sūktābhyāmudakamabhimantrya vyādhitamācāmayati samprokṣati ca /
analyzed: tvayā pūrvam iti sūktābhyām udakam abhimantrya vyādhitam ācāmayati samprokṣati ca

original: vaiśravaṇāyāñjaliṃ kṛtvā 'purastādyuktaḥ' iti sūktenodakamabhimantrya vyādhitamācāmayati samprokṣati ca /
analyzed: vaiśravaṇāya añjalim kṛtvā purastāt yuktaḥ iti sūktena udakam abhimantrya vyādhitam ācāmayati samprokṣati ca

original: vaiśravaṇāyāñjaliṃ kṛtvā 'rakṣohaṇam' ityanuvākenodakamabhimantryācāmayati samprokṣati ca vyādhitam /
analyzed: vaiśravaṇāya añjalim kṛtvā rakṣaḥ haṇam iti anuvākena udakam abhimantrya ācāmayati samprokṣati ca vyādhitam
piśāca gṛhītam manuṣyam anvārabdhe sarvatra homaḥ kāryaḥ

original: 'idaṃ haviḥ' iti sūktābhyāṃ ulmuke dve abhimantrya parasparaṃ ghṛṣyati /
analyzed: idam haviḥ iti sūktābhyām ulmuke dve abhimantrya parasparam ghṛṣyati

original: rātrau 'niḥsālām' iti sūktena ulmuke abhimantrya parasparaṃ ghṛṣyati /
analyzed: rātrau niḥsālām iti sūktena ulmuke abhimantrya parasparam ghṛṣyati

original: tataḥ prabhāte 'svastidāḥ' iti sūktena dakṣiṇena prakrāmati /
analyzed: tatas prabhāte svastidāḥ iti sūktena dakṣiṇena prakrāmati
rātrau arāya kṣayaṇam iti ulmuke abhimantrya parasparam ghṛṣyati

original: tataḥ prabhāte 'svastidāḥ' iti sūktena padāni prakrāmati /
analyzed: tatas prabhāte svastidāḥ iti sūktena padāni prakrāmati

original: rātrau 'śanno devī' ityulmuke abhimantrya parasparaṃ ghṛṣyati /
analyzed: rātrau śat naḥ devī iti ulmuke abhimantrya parasparam ghṛṣyati
tatas prabhāte svastidāḥ iti padāni dadāti

original: rātrau 'ā paśyati' ityulmukadvayaṃ parasparaṃ sarvatrābhimantraṇānte saṅghṛṣyati /
analyzed: rātrau ā paśyati iti ulmuka dvayam parasparam sarvatra abhimantraṇa ante saṅghṛṣyati

original: tataḥ prabhāte 'svastidāḥ' iti sūktaṃ japitvā padāni prakrāmati /
analyzed: tatas prabhāte svasti dāḥ iti sūktam japitvā padāni prakrāmati

original: rātrau 'tāntsatyaujāḥ' 'tvayā pūrvam' iti sūktābhyāmulmuke abhimantrya saṅghṛṣyati /
analyzed: rātrau tān satya ojāḥ tvayā pūrvam iti sūktābhyām ulmuke abhimantrya saṅghṛṣyati

original: tataḥ prabhāte 'svastidāḥ' iti sūktena padāni dadāti /
analyzed: tatas prabhāte svastidāḥ iti sūktena padāni dadāti
rātrau purastāt yuktaḥ iti ulmuke abhimantrya saṅghṛṣyati

original: tataḥ prabhāte 'svastidāḥ' iti sūktaṃ japitvā padāni prakrāmati /
analyzed: tatas prabhāte svasti dāḥ iti sūktam japitvā padāni prakrāmati
rātrau rakṣaḥ haṇam iti anuvākena ulmuke abhimantrya parasparam saṅghṛṣyati

original: tataḥ prabhāte 'svastidāḥ' iti sūktaṃ japitvā padāni prakrāmati /
analyzed: tatas prabhāte svasti dāḥ iti sūktam japitvā padāni prakrāmati
piśāca rākṣasa bhūta apsaraḥ preta yakṣa gandharvāḥ grahāḥ ca

original: ye'nye'pi kṣudrabrāhmaṇajātikāḥ kṣatriyavaiśyaśūdrādayo grahāḥ sarve ebhiḥ karmabhistuṣyanti /
analyzed: kṣudra brāhmaṇa jātikāḥ kṣatriya vaiśya śūdra ādayaḥ grahāḥ sarve ebhiḥ karmabhiḥ tuṣyanti
iti ekaviṃśatyā darbha piñjūlībhiḥ valīkaiḥ sārdham adhiśiras avasiñcati

original: 'ayaṃ devānām' iti sūktena ghaṭe darbhapiñjulīḥ prakṣipyekaviṃśatigṛhatṛṇāni ca prakṣipya taṃ ghaṭamabhimantrya tato vyādhitaṃ siñcati /
analyzed: ayam devānām iti sūktena ghaṭe darbha piñjulīḥ prakṣipya ekaviṃśati gṛha tṛṇāni ca prakṣipya tam ghaṭam abhimantrya tatas vyādhitam siñcati
darbha trayam ekatra baddham piñjūlī iti ucyate
atha vāta pitta śleṣmaṇi bhaiṣajyāni ucyante

original: [jarāyujaḥ (1.12) iti medo madhu sarpistailaṃ pāyayati // KauśS_4,2{26}.1 //]
analyzed: jarāyu jaḥ iti medaḥ madhu sarpiḥ tailam pāyayati
jarāyu jaḥ iti sūktena pāyayati vāta vikāre
jarāyu jaḥ iti sūktena madhu abhimantrya pāyayati śleṣma vikāre
jarāyu jaḥ iti sūktena ghṛtam abhimantrya pāyayati vāta pitta saha vikāre
jarāyu jaḥ iti sūktena tailam abhimantrya pāyayati vāta śleṣma vikāre
ati kāse śīrṣaktau śiraḥ vedanāyām ca karmāṇi ucyante

original: [mauñjapraśnena śirasyapihitaḥ savyena titauni pūlyāni dhārayamāṇo dakṣiṇenāvakiran vrajati // KauśS_4,2{26}.2 //]
analyzed: mauñjapraśnena śirasi apihitaḥ savyena pūlyāni dhārayamāṇaḥ dakṣiṇena avakiran vrajati

original: vyādhitaśiro mauñjaveṣṭitaṃ kṛtvā vāmena hastena pavanaṃ lājasahitaṃ gṛhītvā /
analyzed: vyādhita śiraḥ mauñja veṣṭitam kṛtvā vāmena hastena pavanam lāja sahitam gṛhītvā

original: dakṣiṇena hastena tān lājān pragṛhya 'jarāyujaḥ' iti sūktena lājān prakiran vrajati vyādhideśaṃ yāvat /
analyzed: dakṣiṇena hastena tān lājān pragṛhya jarāyu jaḥ iti sūktena lājān prakiran vrajati vyādhi deśam yāvat
tatra eva muñja praśna lājā pavanānām prakṣepaḥ

original: vāmena hastena pavanaṃ mauñjendukaṃ ca gṛhītvā dakṣiṇena hastena jyāṃ drughnīṃ gṛhītvā vyādhitamagre kṛtvā //
analyzed: vāmena hastena pavanam mauñja indukam ca gṛhītvā dakṣiṇena hastena jyām drughnīm gṛhītvā vyādhitam agre kṛtvā
yatra enam vyādhiḥ gṛhṇāti tatra titaupraśnau nidadhāti

original: yatra vyādhirutpannastatra sthāne gatvā 'jarāyujaḥ' iti sūktaṃ japitvā mauñjapraśnaṃ pavanaṃ ca prakṣipati vyādhitaḥ //
analyzed: yatra vyādhiḥ utpannaḥ tatra sthāne gatvā jarāyu jaḥ iti sūktam japitvā mauñjapraśnam pavanam ca prakṣipati vyādhitaḥ

original: vātajvare kaṭibhaṅge śirīroge ca vātagulme vātavikāre ca sarvaroge dhanurvāte'ṅgakampane vāte śarīrabhaṅge sarvavātavikāre bhaiṣajyam /
analyzed: vāta jvare kaṭi bhaṅge śirī roge ca vāta gulme vāta vikāre ca sarva roge dhanurvāta iṅga kampane vāte śarīra bhaṅge sarva vāta vikāre bhaiṣajyam
jarāyu jaḥ iti sūktena ghṛtam abhimantrya nāsikā nastam dadāti

original: 'jarāyujaḥ' iti sūktena pañcaparvaveṇudaṇḍaṃ lalāṭe saṃstabhya japati /
analyzed: jarāyu jaḥ iti sūktena pañca parva veṇu daṇḍam lalāṭe saṃstabhya japati

original: śiroroge kaṭibhaṅge vā vātagulme vā vātavikāre ca /
analyzed: śiraḥ roge kaṭi bhaṅge vā vāta gulme vā vāta vikāre ca

original: atha lohite vahati śarīramadhye bahiśca śastraghāte pāṣāṇalakuṭeṣṭakādyabhighāte karmāṇyucyante -
analyzed: atha lohite vahati śarīra madhye bahis ca śastra ghāte pāṣāṇa lakuṭa iṣṭakā ādi abhighāte karmāṇi ucyante
amūryāḥ iti pañca parvaṇā pāṃsu sikatābhiḥ parikirati

original: pañcaparvaveṇudaṇḍaṃ rudhiravahanasthāne dattvā 'amūryāḥ' iti sūktaṃ japati /
analyzed: pañca parva veṇu daṇḍam rudhira vahana sthāne dattvā amūryāḥ iti sūktam japati

original: 'amūryāḥ' iti sūktena rathyāyāḥ pāṃsūn gṛhītvābhimantrya rudhiravraṇe vikirati /
analyzed: amūryāḥ iti sūktena rathyāyāḥ pāṃsūn gṛhītvā abhimantrya rudhira vraṇe vikirati

original: 'amūryāḥ' iti sūktena sikatā abhimantrya vyādhideśe kirati //
analyzed: amūryāḥ iti sūktena sikatā abhimantrya vyādhi deśe kirati

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'amūryāḥ' iti sūktenārmakapālikāṃ sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā amūryāḥ iti sūktena arma kapālikām sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti
amūryāḥ iti sūktena arma kapālikām abhimantrya pāyayati
strī rajasā utipravartane bhaiṣajyam rudhira pravāhe ca
caturbhiḥ dūrvā agraiḥ dadhi palalam pāyayati

original: 'amūryāḥ' iti sūktena catvāri dūrvāgrāṇi piṣṭvā taiḥ saha dadhipalalamāṃsādyāloḍya tato'bhimantrya pāyayati /
analyzed: amūryāḥ iti sūktena catvāri dūrvā agrāṇi piṣṭvā taiḥ saha dadhi palala māṃsa ādi āloḍya pāyayati

original: rudhirapravāhe śarīramadhye śastrādyabhighāte bahiśca śoṇitavahane gudavahane mukhavahane nāsikārudhiravahane śiro'ṅgulyādirudhirapravāhe ca
analyzed: rudhira pravāhe śarīra madhye śastra ādi abhighāte bahis ca śoṇita vahane guda vahane mukha vahane nāsikā rudhira vahane śiraḥ uṅguli ādi rudhira pravāhe ca
atha hṛd roge kāmale ca bhaiṣajyāni ucyante
anu sūryam iti mantra uktasya loma miśram ācamayati
anu sūryam iti rakta vṛṣabha roma miśram udakam abhimantrya pāyayati

original: 'anu sūryam' iti sūktena raktavṛṣabhapṛṣṭha udakamānīya tato'bhimantryācāmayati //
analyzed: anu sūryam iti sūktena rakta vṛṣabha pṛṣṭhe udakam ānīya tatobhimantrya ācāmayati
śaṅkudhānam carmaṇi āsīnāya dugdhe sampātavantam badhnāti

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'anu sūryam' iti sūktena go raktacarmachidramaṇiṃ godugdhe dattvā taṃ sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti //
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā anu sūryam iti sūktena goḥ rakta carma chidra maṇim go dugdhe dattvā tam sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti
kāmale hṛd roge ca liṅgi upatāpaḥ

original: [haridraudanabhuktamucchiṣṭānucchiṣṭenā prapadāt pralipya mantroktānadhastalpe haritasūtreṇa savyajaṅghāsu baddhvā'vasnāpayati // KauśS_4,2{26}.18
analyzed: haridrā odana bhuktam ucchiṣṭa an ucchiṣṭena ā prapadāt pralipya mantra uktān adhas talpe harita sūtreṇa savya jaṅghāsu baddhvā avasnāpayati

original: haridraudanaṃ vyādhitasya bhojanaṃ dattvā tasyocchiṣṭaṃ cānucchiṣṭaṃ caikatra kṛtvā tena codvartanaṃ kṛtvā śiraḥprabhṛtyārabhya yāvatpādau
analyzed: haridrā odanam vyādhitasya bhojanam dattvā tasya ucchiṣṭam ca anucchiṣṭam ca ekatra kṛtvā tena ca udvartanam kṛtvā śiraḥ prabhṛti ārabhya yāvat pādau

original: tato vyādhitaṃ ca khaṭvāyāmupaveśya khaṭvāyā adhastāt /
analyzed: tatas vyādhitam ca khaṭvāyām upaveśya khaṭvāyāḥ adhastāt

original: śukaḥ kāṣṭhaśuko gopītilakā caite trayaḥ pakṣiṇaḥ /
analyzed: śukaḥ kāṣṭhaśukaḥ gopītilakā ca ete trayaḥ pakṣiṇaḥ

original: savyajaṅghāyāṃ haritasūtreṇa baddhvā khaṭvāyā adhastād badhnāti /
analyzed: savya jaṅghāyām harita sūtreṇa baddhvā khaṭvāyāḥ adhastāt badhnāti

original: tato 'anu sūryam' iti sūktenodakamabhimantrya vyādhitaṃ snāpayati /
analyzed: tatas anu sūryam iti sūktena udakam abhimantrya vyādhitam snāpayati

original: 'anu sūryam' iti sūktena manthamabhimantrya prapādya prayacchati /
analyzed: anu sūryam iti sūktena mantham abhimantrya prapādya prayacchati

original: sarvatra gṛhadvāre'gre vyādhitaṃ kṛtvā tamagre praveśya svayaṃ praviśya tato bhaktamabhimantrya tato vyādhitāya prayacchati /
analyzed: sarvatra gṛha dvāra igre vyādhitam kṛtvā tam agre praveśya svayam praviśya tatas bhaktam abhimantrya tatas vyādhitāya prayacchati
sarvatra yatra yatra prayacchati śabdaḥ tatra tatra evam
anu sūryam iti sūktena śukam vadantam abhimantrayet
anu sūryam iti sūktena kāṣṭha śukam vadantam abhimantrayet

original: 'anu sūryam' iti sūktena gopītilakāṃ pakṣiṇīṃ yatra kutracid dṛṣṭvā vadantīṃ tatrābhimantrayed vyādhitaḥ /
analyzed: anu sūryam iti sūktena gopī tilakām pakṣiṇīm yatra kutracid dṛṣṭvā vadantīm tatra abhimantrayet vyādhitaḥ
kroḍa lomāni jatunā sandihya jātarūpeṇa apidhāpya

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'anu sūryam' iti sūktena vṛṣabhahṛdayalomabhirlākṣāraktaiḥ suvarṇaveṣṭitaṃ maṇiṃ kṛtvā sampātyābhimantrya vyādhitāya badhnāti
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā anu sūryam iti sūktena vṛṣabha hṛdaya lomabhiḥ lākṣā raktaiḥ suvarṇa veṣṭitam maṇim kṛtvā sampātya abhimantrya vyādhitāya badhnāti

original: sarvatra yatra bahūni karmāṇi vihitāni tatraikaṃ kuryād dve vā kuryāt sarvāṇi vā kuryāt /
analyzed: sarvatra yatra bahūni karmāṇi vihitāni tatra ekam kuryāt dve vā kuryāt sarvāṇi vā kuryāt
apasmāra vismaya hṛd roga kāmalaka rohiṇakāni bhaiṣajyāni samāptāni

original: iti mantroktaṃ śakṛdā lohitaṃ praghṛṣyālimpati // KauśS_4,2{26}.22 //]
analyzed: iti mantra uktam śakṛdā lohitam praghṛṣya ālimpati
śveta kuṣṭham gomayena praghṛṣya yāvat lohitam dṛṣṭvā naktañjātā

original: 'suparṇo jātaḥ' iti sūktābhyāṃ bhṛṅgarājaharindrendravāruṇī nīlikāpuṣpā etāḥ pañca piṣṭvābhimantrya kuṣṭhaṃ pralimpati /
analyzed: suparṇaḥ jātaḥ iti sūktābhyām bhṛṅgarāja harindra indravāruṇī nīlikā puṣpāḥ etāḥ pañca piṣṭvā abhimantrya kuṣṭham pralimpati
tisṛṇām vā catasṛṇām vā oṣadhīnām grahaṇam

original: 'suparṇo jātaḥ' iti sūktābhyāṃ maruto yajate yathā varuṇaṃ pākayajñavidhānena /
analyzed: suparṇaḥ jātaḥ iti sūktābhyām marutaḥ yajate yathā varuṇam pākayajña vidhānena

original: 'suparṇo jātaḥ' iti dvābhyāṃ sūktābhyāṃ kṛṣṇāyā gorājyaṃ juhoti /
analyzed: suparṇaḥ jātaḥ iti dvābhyām sūktābhyām kṛṣṇāyāḥ gorājyam juhoti

original: 'suparṇo jātaḥ' iti sūktābhyāṃ kāsadividhuvakavetasā oṣadhīrekatra kṛtvā sampātyābhimantrya tata udakamadhye praveśyādhomukhaṃ pātraṃ ninayati
analyzed: suparṇaḥ jātaḥ iti sūktābhyām kāsadi vidhuvaka vetasāḥ oṣadhīḥ ekatra kṛtvā sampātya abhimantrya tatas udaka madhye praveśya adhomukham pātram ninayati

original: 'suparṇo jātaḥ' iti sūktābhyāṃ kāsādyoṣadhīrudake kṛtvā sampātyābhimantryāplāvayati /
analyzed: suparṇaḥ jātaḥ iti sūktābhyām kāsa ādya oṣadhīḥ udake kṛtvā sampātya abhimantrya āplāvayati

original: 'suparṇo jātaḥ' iti sūktābhyāṃ śvaśiro meṣaśiro mānuṣakeśarajjvā jaradupānahau ca vaṃśadvayāgre prabadhya yodhayati dhārayatītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: suparṇaḥ jātaḥ iti sūktābhyām śva śiraḥ meṣa śiraḥ mānuṣa keśa rajjvā jarat upānahau ca vaṃśa dvaya agre prabadhya yodhayati dhārayati iti arthaḥ

original: 'suparṇo jātaḥ' iti dvābhyāṃ sūktābhyāmudakaṃ sampātya tenāmapātraṃ prasicya tato'śmānaṃ nidadhāti /
analyzed: suparṇaḥ jātaḥ iti dvābhyām sūktābhyām udakam sampātya tena āma pātram prasicya tatas ūśmānam nidadhāti

original: tata āmapātramaśmānaṃ ca tripāde śikye nidadhāti /
analyzed: tatas āma pātram aśmānam ca tri pāde śikye nidadhāti

original: māruteṣu karmasu sarvatra mārutakṣīraudanaṃ mārutaśṛtaṃ mārutaiḥ paristīrya mārutena sruveṇa mārutenājyeneti bhavati /
analyzed: māruteṣu karmasu sarvatra māruta kṣīraudanam māruta śṛtam mārutaiḥ paristīrya mārutena sruveṇa mārutena ājyena iti bhavati
śveta palita nāśanam durbhaga nāśanam ca
yat agniḥ iti paraśum japan tāpayati kvāthayati avasiñcati

original: nityajvare velājvare satatajvare ekāntarajvare cāturthakajvare śītajvare caturjvare ca 'yadagniḥ' iti sūktena lohakuṭhāramabhimantryāgnau tāpayati
analyzed: nitya jvare velā jvare satata jvare eka antara jvare cāturthaka jvare śīta jvare catur jvare ca yat agniḥ iti sūktena loha kuṭhāram abhimantrya agnau tāpayati

original: tato 'yadagniḥ' iti japitvā taṃ kuṭhāramuṣṇodakamadhye kvāthayati /
analyzed: tatas yat agniḥ iti japitvā tam kuṭhāram uṣṇa udaka madhye kvāthayati

original: tato 'yadagniḥ' iti sūktaṃ japitvā tenodakena vyādhitamavasiñcati /
analyzed: tatas yat agniḥ iti sūktam japitvā tena udakena vyādhitam avasiñcati

original: [upa prāgāt (1.28) ityudvijamānasya śuklaprasūnasya vīriṇasya catasṛṇāmiṣīkāṇāmubhayataḥ pratyuṣṭaṃ badhnāti // KauśS_4,2{26}.26 //]
analyzed: upa prāgāt iti udvijamānasya śukla prasūnasya vīriṇasya catasṛṇām iṣīkāṇām ubhayatas pratyuṣṭam badhnāti

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'upa prāgāt' iti sūktena śuklavīriṇeṣīkācatuṣṭayenobhayataḥ pratyuṣṭamekatra baddhvā maṇiṃ kṛtvā sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti  #
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā upa prāgāt iti sūktena śuklavīriṇā iṣīkā catuṣṭayena ubhayatas pratyuṣṭam ekatra baddhvā maṇim kṛtvā sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti  /

original: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'upa prāgāt' iti sūktena trividagdhaṃ śuklavīraṇakāṇḍamaṇiṃ kṛtvā sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: tantram kṛtvā upa prāgāt iti sūktena tri vidagdham śuklavīraṇa kāṇḍa maṇim kṛtvā sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti
upa prāgāt iti sūktena ulmuka dvayam abhimantrya gharṣayet
rātrau uṣā kāle vā etat karma

original: iti sūktena dakṣiṇena pādena prakrāmati iti svastyayanam /
analyzed: iti sūktena dakṣiṇena pādena prakrāmati iti svastyayanam
vṛddha bāla yuva strī puruṣāṇām akasmāt udvegaḥ pralāpaḥ vā bhavet tadā etat kuryāt
gandharva rākṣasa apsaraḥ bhūta graha ādiṣu bhaiṣajyāni ucyante
mātṛnāmnoḥ sarva surabhi cūrṇāni anvaktāni hutvā śeṣeṇa pralimpati
iti sūktena ghṛta aktāḥ sarva oṣadhīḥ juhoti
iti caturṛcena ājya miśrāḥ sarva oṣadhīḥ juhoti
catuṣpathe ca śirasi darbha iṇḍu eṅgāra kapālenu aktāni

original: catuṣpathe vyādhitaṃ kṛtvā tasya śirasi darbheṇḍukaṃ kṛtvā tasyopari kapālamagnipūrṇaṃ
analyzed: catuṣpathe vyādhitam kṛtvā tasya śirasi darbheṇḍukam kṛtvā tasya upari kapālam agni pūrṇam

original: prajvālitaṃ kṛtvā tatra prajvālite'gnau 'divyo gandharvaḥ' iti sūktena ghṛtāktāḥ
analyzed: prajvālitam kṛtvā tatra prajvālita ignau divyaḥ gandharvaḥ iti sūktena ghṛta aktāḥ

original: catuṣpathe ca śirasi darbheṇḍve'ṅgārakapāle prajvālite'gnau 'imaṃ me agne' iti
analyzed: catuṣpathe ca śirasi darbha iṇḍu eṅgāra kapāle prajvālita ignau imam me agne iti

original: catasṛbhirājyenāktāḥ sarvauṣadhīrjuhoti pratyṛcaṃ śirasi home na tantram //
analyzed: catasṛbhiḥ ājyena aktāḥ sarva oṣadhīḥ juhoti pratyṛcam śirasi home na tantram
pratīpam gāhamānaḥ vapati itaraḥ uvasiñcati paścāt

original: vyādhitasya vallaṇikāṃ sarvauṣadhisahitāṃ haste kṛtvā nadyudakasammukhaṃ praveśya tato'vagāhayati /
analyzed: vyādhitasya vallaṇikām sarva oṣadhi sahitām haste kṛtvā nadī udaka sammukham praveśya tatas uvagāhayati

original: 'davyo gndharvaḥ' iti sūktena sarvauṣadhīrudakamadhye vapati kartā /
analyzed: davyaḥ gndharvaḥ iti sūktena sarva oṣadhīḥ udaka madhye vapati kartā

original: 'divyo gandharvaḥ' iti sūktena paścāt sthito vyādhitaṃ siñcati //
analyzed: divyaḥ gandharvaḥ iti sūktena paścāt sthitaḥ vyādhitam siñcati

original: [āmapātra opyāsicya mauñje tripāde vayoniveśane prabadhnāti // KauśS_4,2{26}.32 //]
analyzed: āma pātre opya āsicya mauñje tri pāde vayaḥ niveśane prabadhnāti

original: tato mṛnmaya āmapātre homaśeṣaḥ sarvauṣadhīḥ kṛtvā pakṣiṇo yasmin vṛkṣe vasanti tatra tripāde śikye kṛtvā badhnāti /
analyzed: tatas mṛd maye āma pātre homa śeṣaḥ sarva oṣadhīḥ kṛtvā pakṣiṇaḥ yasmin vṛkṣe vasanti tatra tri pāde śikye kṛtvā badhnāti

original: 'imaṃ me agne' iti sūktena nadīmadhye vallaṇikāyāṃ sarvauṣadhīrghṛtāktā juhoti pratyṛcam /
analyzed: imam me agne iti sūktena nadī madhye vallaṇikāyām sarva oṣadhīḥ ghṛta aktāḥ juhoti pratyṛcam

original: tataḥ kartā tamavasiñcati vyādhitam 'imaṃ me' iti catasṛbhiḥ /
analyzed: tatas kartā tam avasiñcati vyādhitam imam me iti catasṛbhiḥ

original: paścādāmapātra opyāsicya mauñje tripāde vayoniveśane vṛkṣe badhnāti /
analyzed: paścāt āma pātre opya āsicya mauñje tri pāde vayaḥ niveśane vṛkṣe badhnāti

original: rakṣograhe yakṣagrahe gandharvagrahe'psarograhe rājase grahe tāmase grahe grahabhaiṣajyāni samāptāni //
analyzed: rakṣaḥ grahe yakṣa grahe gandharva graha ipsaraḥ grahe rājase grahe tāmase grahe graha bhaiṣajyāni samāptāni

original: atha laukike śāpe vaidike śāpe ca strīṇāmākrośe puruṣāṇāṃ ca bhaiṣajyamucyate -
analyzed: atha laukike śāpe vaidike śāpe ca strīṇām ākrośe puruṣāṇām ca bhaiṣajyam ucyate
pañcamena varuṇa gṛhītasya mūrdhni sampātān ānayati

original: sarvasmin saṃhitāvidhikarmaṇi pradhānakarmamadhye uttarataḥ udakumbhamāsthāpya tenodakena 'hiraṇyavarṇāḥ' (1.33)
analyzed: sarvasmin saṃhitā vidhi karmaṇi pradhāna karma madhye uttaratas uda kumbham āsthāpya tena udakena hiraṇya varṇāḥ
iti sūktena abhimantritena kārayitā abhiṣecayet sarvatra medhājanana ādi karmasu
tatas paścāt maṇibandhana ādi karma kuryāt

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'aghadviṣṭā devajātā' iti sūktena yavamaṇiṃ sampātyābhimantrya punaḥ sūktaṃ japitvā badhnāti /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā agha dviṣṭāḥ deva jātāḥ iti sūktena yava maṇim sampātya abhimantrya punar sūktam japitvā badhnāti

original: laukika ākrośe vaidike ca brāhmaṇasya śāpe krūracakṣurdṛṣṭinipāte ca piśācarākṣasādiṣu bhaiṣajyaṃ samāptam //
analyzed: laukike ākrośe vaidike ca brāhmaṇasya śāpe krūra cakṣuḥ dṛṣṭi nipāte ca piśāca rākṣasa ādiṣu bhaiṣajyam samāptam

original: ājyatantraṃ kṛtvā 'śaṃ no devī pṛśniparṇī' iti sūktena pṛśniparṇīṃ sampātyābhimantrya ghṛṣṭvā punaḥ sūktaṃ japitvā vyādhitaṃ pralimpati /
analyzed: ājya tantram kṛtvā śam naḥ devī pṛśniparṇī iti sūktena pṛśniparṇīm sampātya abhimantrya ghṛṣṭvā punar sūktam japitvā vyādhitam pralimpati

original: pāpagṛhīte ca strīgarbhastrāve ca mṛtāpatyāyāṃ ca kravyādagṛhīte ca piśācagṛhīte ca rakṣomayabhaiṣajyam samāptam //
analyzed: pāpa gṛhīte ca strī garbha strāve ca mṛta apatyāyām ca kravyāda gṛhīte ca piśāca gṛhīte ca rakṣaḥ maya bhaiṣajyam samāptam

original: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'varaṇo vārayātā' iti tṛcena varaṇavṛkṣakāṣṭhamaṇiṃ sampātyābhimantrya punaḥ sūktaṃ japitvā badhnāti /
analyzed: tantram kṛtvā varaṇaḥ vārayātai iti tṛcena varaṇa vṛkṣa kāṣṭha maṇim sampātya abhimantrya punar sūktam japitvā badhnāti
rājayakṣma ādiṣu ugra vyādhiṣu śveta udumbara kuṣṭha ādi aṣṭādaśa jātiṣu jvara ādi sarva rogeṣu bhaiṣajyam samāptam

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'pippalī kṣiptabheṣajī' iti sūktena pippaladravyaṃ sampātyābhimantrya punaḥ sūktaṃ japitvāśayati /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā pippalī kṣipta bheṣajī iti sūktena pippala dravyam sampātya abhimantrya punar sūktam japitvā āśayati

original: vātavikāre dhanurvāte vātagulme vātaśūle kṣiptavātapradoṣe karmakṛte vāta utpanne sarvavātavikāre bhaiṣajyaṃ samāptam //
analyzed: vāta vikāre dhanurvāte vāta gulme vāta śūle kṣipta vāta pradoṣe karma kṛte vāte utpanne sarva vāta vikāre bhaiṣajyam samāptam

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'vidradhasya balāsasya' iti tṛcena sūktena vyādhitasya mūrdhni sampātānānayati /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā vidradhasya balāsasya iti tṛcena sūktena vyādhitasya mūrdhni sampātān ānayati

original: sarvavyādhivisarpaṇe hṛdayāmaye vā jalodare ca eteṣāṃ bhaiṣajyaṃ samāptam //
analyzed: sarva vyādhi visarpaṇe hṛdaya āmaye vā jalodare ca eteṣām bhaiṣajyam samāptam

original: 'vidradhasya' iti sūktena pālāśaśakalaṃ caturaṅgulamānaṃ piṣṭvābhimantrya punaḥ sūktaṃ japitvā vyādhitaṃ limpati /
analyzed: vidradhasya iti sūktena pālāśa śakalam catur aṅgula mānam piṣṭvā abhimantrya punar sūktam japitvā vyādhitam limpati

original: sarvavyādhivisarpaṇe prakope ca balāse cāntrādivisarpaṇe cākṣivisarpaṇe ca karṇavyādhivisarpaṇe hṛdayāmaye cājñātarājayakṣmaṇi ca /
analyzed: sarva vyādhi visarpaṇe prakope ca balāse ca antra ādi visarpaṇe ca akṣi visarpaṇe ca karṇa vyādhi visarpaṇe hṛdaya āmaye ca ajñāta rājayakṣmaṇi ca

original: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'yā babhravaḥ' iti sūktena daśavṛkṣaśakalāni lākṣāhiraṇyena veṣṭitaṃ maṇiṃ kṛtvā sampātyābhimantrya punaḥ sūktaṃ
analyzed: tantram kṛtvā yā babhravaḥ iti sūktena daśa vṛkṣa śakalāni lākṣā hiraṇyena veṣṭitam maṇim kṛtvā sampātya abhimantrya punar sūktam

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'udagātām' iti sūktena udakaghaṭaṃ sampātyābhimantrya vyādhitaṃ gṛhād bahiḥ kṛtvāplāvayati /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā udagātām iti sūktena udaka ghaṭam sampātya abhimantrya vyādhitam gṛhāt bahis kṛtvā āplāvayati
kṣetriyaḥ vyādhiḥ liṅgī pitṛ pāramparya āgataḥ kṣetriyaḥ rogaḥ
kuṣṭha kṣaya rogaḥ grahaṇī doṣaḥ sarva śarīre visphoṭaka rakta doṣa ādiḥ kṣetriyaḥ

original: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'apeyaṃ rātrī' ityṛcā ghaṭaṃ sampātyābhimantrya gṛhādbahirāplāvayati /
analyzed: tantram kṛtvā apa iyam rātrī iti ṛcā ghaṭam sampātya abhimantrya gṛhāt bahis āplāvayati
apararātre etat karma kuryāt kṣetriya vyādhau

original: [babhroḥ (2.8.3) iti mantroktamākṛtiloṣṭavalmīkau parilikhya jīvakoṣaṇyāmutsīvya badhnāti // KauśS_4,2{26}.43 //]
analyzed: babhroḥ iti mantra uktam ākṛtiloṣṭa valmīkau parilikhya jīva koṣaṇyām utsīvya badhnāti

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'babhrorarjunakāṇḍasya' ityṛcārjunakāṣṭhaṃ yavabusaṃ tilapiñjikāṃ caikatra trīṇi baddhvā sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā babhroḥ arjuna kāṇḍasya iti ṛcā arjuna kāṣṭham yava busam tila piñjikām ca ekatra trīṇi baddhvā sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'babhrorarjuna' ityṛcākṛtiloṣṭaṃ jīvakoṣaṇyāṃ baddhvā sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā babhroḥ arjunaḥ iti ṛcā ākṛti loṣṭam jīva koṣaṇyām baddhvā sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'babhrorarjuna' ityṛcā valmīkamṛttikāṃ carmajīvakoṣaṇyāṃ baddhvā sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā babhroḥ arjunaḥ iti ṛcā valmīka mṛttikām carma jīva koṣaṇyām baddhvā sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti
jīvataḥ paśoḥ carma jīvakoṣaṇī iti ucyate
ajāyāḥ carma aveḥ vāśvāyāḥ vā carma grahaṇam

original: 'namaste lāṅgalebhyaḥ' ityṛcodakaghaṭamabhimantrya vṛṣabhayuktasya halasyādhastāt kṛtvā vyādhitaṃ tato'bhiṣiñcati /
analyzed: namaḥ te lāṅgalebhyaḥ iti ṛcā udaka ghaṭam abhimantrya vṛṣabha yuktasya halasya adhastāt kṛtvā vyādhitam tatas abhiṣiñcati
iti śūnya śālāyām apsu sampātān ānayati
uttaram jarat khāte sa śālā tṛṇe

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'namaḥ sanisrasākṣebhyaḥ' ityṛcodakaghaṭaṃ sampātyābhimantryottarasampātān jaradgartaḥ ānayati /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā namaḥ sanisrasa akṣebhyaḥ iti ṛcā udaka ghaṭam sampātya abhimantrya uttara sampātān jarat gartaḥ ānayati
śālā tṛṇa sahite garte vyādhitam avasiñcati
yatra kvacid snānam tatra sarvatra ācamanam

original: yatra yatra snānaṃ prokṣaṇaṃ ca tatra sarvatra bhaiṣajyeṣu śiraḥprabhati mārjanaṃ kuryāt yāvat pādau /
analyzed: yatra yatra snānam prokṣaṇam ca tatra sarvatra bhaiṣajyeṣu mārjanam kuryāt yāvat pādau

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'daśavṛkṣa' iti sūktena vṛkṣavikalpena palāśādidaśavṛkṣaśakalāni gṛhītvā lākṣāhiraṇyena veṣṭitaṃ maṇiṃ kṛtvā sampātyābhimantrya  #
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā daśa vṛkṣaḥ iti sūktena vṛkṣa vikalpena palāśa ādi daśa vṛkṣa śakalāni gṛhītvā lākṣā hiraṇyena veṣṭitam maṇim kṛtvā sampātya abhimantrya

original: daśa brāhmaṇā atharvāṅgirasaḥ suhṛdo 'daśavṛkṣa' iti sūktaṃ japanto vyādhitaśarīramabhimṛśanti /
analyzed: daśa brāhmaṇāḥ atharva aṅgirasaḥ suhṛdaḥ daśavṛkṣaḥ iti sūktam japantaḥ vyādhita śarīram abhimṛśanti

original: iti catuṣpathe kāmpīlaśakalaiḥ parvasu baddhvā piñjūlībhirāplāvayati // KauśS_4,3{27}.7 //]
analyzed: iti catuṣpathe kāmpīla śakalaiḥ parvasu baddhvā piñjūlībhiḥ āplāvayati

original: catuṣpathe gatvābhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'kṣetriyāttvā' iti sūktenodakaghaṭaṃ sampātyābhimantrya kāmpīlaśakalāni vyādhitaparvaṇi dattvā
analyzed: catuṣpathe gatvā abhyātāna antam kṛtvā kṣetriya attvā iti sūktena udaka ghaṭam sampātya abhimantrya kāmpīla śakalāni vyādhita parvaṇi dattvā

original: 'kṣetriyāttvā' iti sūktenodakaghaṭaṃ saha piñjūlībhirabhimantrya catuṣpathe vyādhitaṃ kṛtvāvasiñcati /
analyzed: kṣetriyāt tvā iti sūktena udaka ghaṭam saha piñjūlībhiḥ abhimantrya catuṣpathe vyādhitam kṛtvā avasiñcati

original: prāṅmukhaṃ vyādhitaṃ pratyaṅmukhamavyādhitaṃ śākhāsūpaveśya vaitase camasa upamanthanībhyāṃ tṛṣṇāgṛhītasya śirasi manthamupamathyātṛṣitāya
analyzed: prāc mukham vyādhitam pratyak mukham a vyādhitam śākhāsu upaveśya vaitase camase upamanthanībhyām tṛṣṇā gṛhītasya śirasi mantham upamathya a tṛṣitāya

original: udita āditye prabhāte pṛṣṭhasaṃhitāvupaveśya dvau puruṣau /
analyzed: udite āditye prabhāte pṛṣṭha saṃhitau upaveśya dvau puruṣau

original: prāṅmukhaṃ vyādhitaṃ pratyaṅmukhamavyādhitaṃ vaitasaśākhāsūpaveśya vaitase camase
analyzed: prāc mukham vyādhitam pratyak mukham a vyādhitam vaitasa śākhāsu upaveśya vaitase camase

original: saktūdakaṃ prakṣipya vaitasaśalākābhyāṃ manthaṃ nirmathya tṛṣṇāgṛhītasya śirasi manthamupamathya
analyzed: saktu udakam prakṣipya vaitasa śalākābhyām mantham nirmathya tṛṣṇā gṛhītasya śirasi mantham upamathya

original: 'pārthivasya' iti sūktena camasamabhimantrya tṛṣitāya prayacchati yasya vyādhirbhavati //
analyzed: pārthivasya iti sūktena camasam abhimantrya tṛṣitāya prayacchati yasya vyādhiḥ bhavati
pārthivasya iti sūktena apsu udakam abhimantrya uddhṛtya pāyayati
sa vāsinau iti sūktena mantham abhimantrya pāyayati
vyādhita a vyādhitau eka vastra parihitau santau
iti khalvaṅga analāṇḍūn hananān ghṛta miśrān juhoti

original: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'indrasya yā mahī' iti sūktena kṛṣṇacaṇakān ghṛtamiśrāñjuhoti /
analyzed: tantram kṛtvā indrasya yā mahī iti sūktena kṛṣṇa caṇakān ghṛta miśrān juhoti

original: [bālān kalmāṣe kāṇḍe savyaṃ pariveṣṭya sambhinatti // KauśS_4,3{27}.15 //]
analyzed: bālān kalmāṣe kāṇḍe savyam pariveṣṭya sambhinatti
indrasya yā mahī iti sūktena govālān

original: citrite śare savyaṃ pariveṣṭya pāṣāṇena cūrṇayati //
analyzed: citrite śare savyam pariveṣṭya pāṣāṇena cūrṇayati
savyena dakṣiṇā mukhaḥ pāṃsūn upamathya parikirati

original: 'indrasya yā mahī' iti sūktena savye haste pāṃsūn kṛtvā dakṣiṇena vimṛjya dakṣiṇāmukhaḥ sthitaḥ sūktaṃ japitvā vyādhitasyopari kirati /
analyzed: indrasya yā mahī iti sūktena savye haste pāṃsūn kṛtvā dakṣiṇena vimṛjya dakṣiṇā mukhaḥ sthitaḥ sūktam japitvā vyādhitasya upari kirati

original: 'indrasya yā mahī' iti sūktena pāṃsūn mardayati hastābhyāṃ vyādhitaḥ //
analyzed: indrasya yā mahī iti sūktena pāṃsūn mardayati hastābhyām vyādhitaḥ

original: 'indrasya yā mahī' iti sūktena pālāśaudumbarādyāḥ samidha ādadhāti /
analyzed: indrasya yā mahī iti sūktena pālāśa audumbara ādyāḥ samidhaḥ ādadhāti
samāptāḥ udara kṛmayaḥ udara gaṇḍulakāḥ ca dṛṣṭa kṛmayaḥ ca
iti udyati go nāmā iti āha asau iti

original: prātaḥ 'udyannādityaḥ' iti sūktaṃ japitvā gonāmoccārayitvā yasya krimayaḥ /
analyzed: prātar udyan ādityaḥ iti sūktam japitvā go nāma uccārayitvā yasya krimayaḥ

original: 'te hatāḥ' iti mantreṇa darbhairāhanti krimīṇāṃ mukham //
analyzed: te hatāḥ iti mantreṇa darbhaiḥ āhanti krimīṇām mukham
go nāma grahaṇam asau iti sthāne
udyan ādityaḥ iti sūktena ghṛta miśrān kṛṣṇa caṇakān juhoti
udyan ādityaḥ iti sūktena kalmāṣam śaram
tatas sūktena japitvā agnau ādadhāti juhoti iti arthaḥ

original: 'udyannādityaḥ' iti sūktena pāṃsūnabhimantrya vāme haste kṛtvā dakṣiṇāmukhaḥ pāṃsunā kṛmivraṇaṃ mardayati /
analyzed: udyan ādityaḥ iti sūktena pāṃsūn abhimantrya vāme haste kṛtvā dakṣiṇā mukhaḥ pāṃsunā kṛmi vraṇam mardayati
udyan ādityaḥ iti sūktena palāśa vṛkṣa ādi samidhaḥ ādadhāti
samāptam sarva kṛmi bhaiṣajyam manuṣya gaja hasti aśva ādi yūka ālikṣa ādiṣu kṛmi bhaiṣajyam

original: ājyatantraṃ kṛtvā vyādhitaṃ parvasu baddhvā 'akṣībhyāṃ te' iti sūktenodapātraṃ sampātya tataḥ punaḥ sūktaṃ japitvāvasicya vyādhitasya parvagranthīn  #
analyzed: ājya tantram kṛtvā vyādhitam parvasu baddhvā akṣībhyām te iti sūktena uda pātram sampātya tatas punar sūktam japitvā avasicya vyādhitasya parva granthīn
samāptam akṣi roga nāsikā karṇa mūla śiraḥ jihvā grīvā rājayakṣma ādi sarva vyādhi bhaiṣajyam
akṣībhyām te iti sūktena abhimantrayate vyādhitam

original: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'hariṇasya' iti sūktena hariṇaśṛṅgamaṇiṃ sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: tantram kṛtvā hariṇasya iti sūktena hariṇa śṛṅga maṇim sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti

original: 'hariṇasya' iti sūktena hariṇaśṛṅgeṇa sahodakamabhimantrya pāyayatyācāmayati ca /
analyzed: hariṇasya iti sūktena hariṇa śṛṅgeṇa saha udakam abhimantrya pāyayati ācāmayati ca

original: hariṇavarma śaṅkudhānaṃ prajvālyodake prakṣipya tato 'hariṇasya' ityabhimantrya vyādhitamavasiñcati /
analyzed: hariṇa varma śaṅku dhānam prajvālya udake prakṣipya tatas hariṇasya iti abhimantrya vyādhitam avasiñcati
amita mātrāyāḥ sakṛt gṛhītān yavān āvapati

original: 'hariṇasya' iti sūktena yavāñjuhoti pratyṛcaṃ rāśeraparimitān madhyāt sakṛd grāhyā yavā ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: hariṇasya iti sūktena yavān juhoti pratyṛcam rāśeḥ aparimitāt madhyāt sakṛt grāhyāḥ yavāḥ iti arthaḥ

original: 'hariṇasya' iti sūktena bhaktamabhimantrya bhojane prapādya prayacchati /
analyzed: hariṇasya iti sūktena bhaktam abhimantrya bhojane prapādya prayacchati

original: 'muñcāmi tvā' iti sūktena pūtigandhamatsyasahitamodanamabhimantrya vyādhitāya prayacchati bhakṣaṇārthaṃ bhojanakāle //
analyzed: muñcāmi tvā iti sūktena pūti gandha matsya sahitam odanam abhimantrya vyādhitāya prayacchati bhakṣaṇa artham bhojana kāle
araṇye tila śaṇa gomaya śāntā jvālena avanakṣatrā iva siñcati

original: 'muñcāmi tvā' iti sūktenāraṇyakatilaiḥ prajvālitamudakaṃ pātre prakṣipati /
analyzed: muñcāmi tvā iti sūktena āraṇyaka tilaiḥ prajvālitam udakam pātre prakṣipati
muñcāmi tvā iti sūktena āraṇya śaṇena avajvālitam udakam abhimantrya avasiñcati
muñcāmi tvā iti sūktena āraṇya gomayena avajvālitam udakam abhimantrya avasiñcati uṣā kāle

original: uṣākāle 'muñcāmi tvā' iti sūktena cityādyābhiḥ prajvālitamudakamabhimantrya vyādhitamavasiñcati /
analyzed: uṣā kāle muñcāmi tvā iti sūktena cityā ādyābhiḥ prajvālitam udakam abhimantrya vyādhitam avasiñcati
kecid tila śaṇa ādi caturṣu karmasu araṇya iva sekam icchanti
muñcāmi tvā iti sūktena vyādhitam abhimantrayate
iti daśabhiḥ sūktaiḥ ghaṭam udaka pūrṇam sampātya abhimantrya vyādhitam āplāvayati

original: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'muñca śīrṣaktyāḥ' ityṛcodakaghaṭaṃ sampātyābhimantryāplāvayati vyādhitam /
analyzed: tantram kṛtvā muñca śīrṣaktyāḥ iti ṛcā udaka ghaṭam sampātya abhimantrya āplāvayati vyādhitam
iti takṣakāya añjalim kṛtvā japan ācamayati abhyukṣati
takṣaka devatāyai namaskāram kṛtvā tatas brāhmaṇaḥ jajñe vāri dam
iti sūktābhyām udakam abhimantrya ācāmayati viṣa karam

original: takṣakāya namaskāraṃ kṛtvā 'brāhmaṇo jajñe' 'vāridam' iti sūktābhyāmudakamabhimantrya samprokṣati viṣaduṣṭam /
analyzed: takṣakāya namaskāram kṛtvā brāhmaṇaḥ jajñe vāri dam iti sūktābhyām udakam abhimantrya samprokṣati viṣa duṣṭam
kṛmuka śakalam saṅkṣudya dūrśa jarat ajina avakara jvālena

original: 'brāhmaṇo jajñe' 'vāridam' iti sūktābhyāṃ kṛmukavṛkṣaśakalaṃ sahodakamabhimantrya tata ācāmayati /
analyzed: brāhmaṇaḥ jajñe vāri dam iti sūktābhyām kṛmuka vṛkṣa śakalam saha udakam abhimantrya tatas ācāmayati
brāhmaṇaḥ jajñe vāri dam iti sūktābhyām kṛmuka vṛkṣa śakalam saha udakam abhimantrya abhyukṣati
tatas mārjanam ācamanam ca sarvam tūṣṇīm
dūrśā avajvālitam udakam abhimantrya vyādhitam avasiñcati

original: 'brāhmaṇo jajñe' iti sūktābhyāṃ jīrṇahariṇacarmāvajvālitamudake prakṣipya tamabhimantrya tato'vasiñcati /
analyzed: brāhmaṇaḥ jajñe iti sūktābhyām jīrṇa hariṇa carma avajvālitam udake prakṣipya tam abhimantrya tatas avasiñcati
brāhmaṇaḥ jajñe vāri dam iti sūktābhyām sammārjanikā vakara tṛṇaiḥ avajvālitam udakam abhimantrya avasiñcati

original: [sampātavatyudapātra ūrdhvaphalābhyāṃ digdhābhyāṃ manthamupamathya rayidhāraṇāpiṇḍānanvṛcaṃ prakīrya chardayate // KauśS_4,4{28}.3 //]
analyzed: sampātavati uda pātre ūrdhva phalābhyām digdhābhyām mantham upamathya rayi dhāraṇā piṇḍān anvṛcam prakīrya chardayate

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'brāhmaṇo jajñe' 'vāridam' iti sūktābhyāmudapātraṃ sampātyābhimantryāplāvayati viṣaduṣṭam /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā brāhmaṇaḥ jajñe vāri dam iti sūktābhyām uda pātram sampātya abhimantrya āplāvayati viṣa duṣṭam

original: 'brāhmaṇo jajñe' 'vāridam' iti sūktābhyāṃ viṣaliptābhyāṃ phalābhyāṃ saktumanthamupamathya tato'bhimantrya pāyayati /
analyzed: brāhmaṇaḥ jajñe vāri dam iti sūktābhyām viṣa liptābhyām phalābhyām saktu mantham upamathya pāyayati

original: 'brāhmaṇo jajñe' 'vāridam' iti sūktābhyāṃ madanaphalāni pratyṛcamabhimantrya bhakṣayati /
analyzed: brāhmaṇaḥ jajñe vāri dam iti sūktābhyām madana phalāni pratyṛcam abhimantrya bhakṣayati

original: 'brāhmaṇo jajñe' 'vāridam' iti sūktābhyāṃ haridrāṃ sarpiṣā sahitāmabhimantrya pāyayati /
analyzed: brāhmaṇaḥ jajñe vāri dam iti sūktābhyām haridrām sarpiṣā sahitām abhimantrya pāyayati
atha śastra ādi abhighāte rudhira pravāhe bhaiṣajyāni ucyante
rohaṇī asi iti sūktena lākṣā udakam kvāthitam abhimantrya vyādhi deśam avasiñcati
asthi bhaṅge rudhira pravāhe daṃśa śastra abhighāta ādau bhaiṣajyam
rohaṇī asi iti pṛṣātakam ghṛta miśram dugdham abhimantrya pāyayati

original: 'rohaṇyasi' iti sūktena kṣīraṃ ghṛtamiśraṃ kṛtvā vyādhideśaṃ mrakṣati /
analyzed: rohaṇī asi iti sūktena kṣīram ghṛta miśram kṛtvā vyādhi deśam mrakṣati
aṅga bhaṅga iṅga cheda iṅga rudhira pravāha iṅga abhighāta iṅga bhagna iṅga mūḍha abhighāta iṅga vṛkṣa abhighāte
muṣṭi loṣṭa iṣṭikā paśu śṛṅga agni pāṣāṇa lakuṭa śastra ādi abhighāte rudhira pravāhe vā śarīra cheda ādau

original: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'ā paśyati' iti sūktena sadampuṣpāmaṇiṃ sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: tantram kṛtvā ā paśyati iti sūktena sadampuṣpā maṇim sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti

original: brahmagrahe kṣatriyagrahe vaiśyagrahe śūdragrahe vānyeṣāṃ vyantarāṇāṃ piśācānāṃ rakṣasāṃ ca bhaiṣajyaṃ samāptam //
analyzed: brahma grahe kṣatriya grahe vaiśya grahe śūdra grahe vā anyeṣām vyantarāṇām piśācānām rakṣasām ca bhaiṣajyam samāptam

original: iti sapta kāmpīlapuṭānapāṃ pūrṇān sampātavataḥ kṛtvā dakṣiṇenāvasicya paścādvidhyati // KauśS_4,4{28}.8 //]
analyzed: iti sapta kāmpīla puṭān apām pūrṇān sampātavataḥ kṛtvā dakṣiṇena avasicya paścāt vidhyati

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'bhavāśarvau manve vām' iti sūktena saptarcenaikaikayarcā kāmpīlasaptapuṭakānudakapūrṇān sampātyarcarcā tataḥ pratyṛcamabhimantrya  #
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā bhavāśarvau manve vām iti sūktena sapta ṛcena ekaikayā ṛcā kāmpīla sapta puṭakān udaka pūrṇān sampātya ṛcā ṛcā tatas pratyṛcam abhimantrya

original: 'tvayā pūrvam' iti sūktena śamīparṇacūrṇaṃ śamīphale kṛtvābhimantrya saktumadhye dadāti bhakṣārtham /
analyzed: tvayā pūrvam iti sūktena śamī parṇa cūrṇam śamī phale kṛtvā abhimantrya saktu madhye dadāti bhakṣa artham

original: 'tvayā pūrvam' iti sūktena śamīparṇacūrṇaṃ śamīphale kṛtvābhimantryālaṅkāre dadāti vyādhitasya /
analyzed: tvayā pūrvam iti sūktena śamī parṇa cūrṇam śamī phale kṛtvā abhimantrya alaṅkāre dadāti vyādhitasya

original: 'tvayā pūrvam' iti sūktena śamīcūrṇaṃ kṛtvābhimantrya śālāṃ cūrṇaiḥ parikirati /
analyzed: tvayā pūrvam iti sūktena śamī cūrṇam kṛtvā abhimantrya śālām cūrṇaiḥ parikirati
rakṣaḥ graha apsaraḥ graha gandharva graha sarva graha bhaiṣajyam samāptam
atha a mati gṛhīte bhaiṣajyam ucyate

original: 'utāmṛtāsuḥ' ityṛcā bhojanakāle bhaktamabhimantrya dadāti bhakṣaṇārtham prajñāpranaṣṭe'jñānagṛhīte'dharmagṛhīte trivarge ca vinaṣṭe dyūtakrīḍādyatipratte  #
analyzed: uta amṛta asuḥ iti ṛcā bhojana kāle bhaktam abhimantrya dadāti bhakṣaṇa artham prajñā pranaṣṭe jñāna gṛhīte dharma gṛhīte trivarge ca vinaṣṭe dyūta krīḍā ādi atipratte
rājayakṣmaṇi śiraḥ roge kuṣṭha āmaye sarva gātra vedanāyām bhaiṣajyam ucyate
kuṣṭha liṅgābhiḥ navanīta miśreṇa apratīhāram pralimpati

original: iti caturṛcena kuṣṭhapiṣṭaṃ navanītamiśraṃ kṛtvābhimantryāpratīhāraṃ vyādhitasya śarīraṃ pralimpati /
analyzed: iti caturṛcena kuṣṭha piṣṭam navanīta miśram kṛtvā abhimantrya a pratīhāram vyādhitasya śarīram pralimpati

original: rājayakṣmaṇi śiroroge kuṣṭhāmaye sarvagātravedanāsu bhaiṣajyaṃ samāptam //
analyzed: rājayakṣmaṇi śiraḥ roge kuṣṭha āmaye sarva gātra vedanāsu bhaiṣajyam samāptam
atha śastra ādi abhighāte bhaiṣajyam ucyate

original: 'rātrī mātā' (5.5) iti sūktena dugdhe lākṣāṃ kvāthayitvābhimantrya pāyayati /
analyzed: rātrī mātā iti sūktena dugdhe lākṣām kvāthayitvā abhimantrya pāyayati
śastra ādi abhighāte pāṣāṇa patana abhighāta agni dāhe sarva śarīra abhighāte bhaiṣajyam samāptam
sūtikā strī ariṣṭakasya ca bhaiṣajyāni ucyante

original: pūrvaṃ strī praveśya tūṣṇīṃ tataḥ paścāt kartā tūṣṇīṃ praviśya sūktena bhaktamabhimantrya dadyāt //
analyzed: pūrvam strī praveśya tūṣṇīm tatas paścāt kartā tūṣṇīm praviśya sūktena bhaktam abhimantrya dadyāt

original: 'brahma jajñānam' 'anāptā ye' 'sahasradhāra eva te' iti sūktena saktumanthamabhimantrya pāyayati /
analyzed: brahma jajñānam an āptāḥ ye sahasra dhāre eva te iti sūktena saktu mantham abhimantrya pāyayati
brahma jajñānam iti sūktena udakam abhimantrya ācāmayati
samāptam strī prasava doṣe sūtikā roge ca bhaiṣajyam
adbhuta darśane doṣa nāśana bhaiṣajyam samāptam
sarva adbhuteṣu bhakta karma vā ācamana karma vā kuryāt

original: yāni carakādivaidyakeṣvadbhutāni paṭhyante'svasthaśārīraviṣaye teṣāṃ sarveṣāmiyaṃ śāntirbhaiṣajyaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: yāni caraka ādi vaidyakeṣu adbhutāni paṭhyante svastha śārīra viṣaye teṣām sarveṣām iyam śāntiḥ bhaiṣajyam bhavati

original: yāni cādbhutāni śarīraroge jyotiṣe paṭhyante teṣāmapīdaṃ karma //
analyzed: yāni ca adbhutāni śarīra roge jyotiṣe paṭhyante teṣām api idam karma
iti caturaḥ uda pātre sampātān ānayati

original: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'dive svāhā' iti sūktena catura udapātre sampātānānayati //
analyzed: tantram kṛtvā dive svāhā iti sūktena caturaḥ uda pātre sampātān ānayati

original: dvau sampātau bhūmau dattvā tataḥ sampātitāṃ bhūmimṛttikāṃ saṅgṛhya tata udapātre prakṣipya tato'bhimantraṇaṃ kṛtvā vyādhitamāplāvayati /
analyzed: dvau sampātau bhūmau dattvā tatas sampātitām bhūmi mṛttikām saṅgṛhya tatas uda pātre prakṣipya tatas abhimantraṇam kṛtvā vyādhitam āplāvayati
dive svāhā iti tribhiḥ svāhākāraiḥ ekaḥ sampātaḥ

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'imaṃ yavam' iti sūktenārdharcenārdharcena homaḥ /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā imam yavam iti sūktena ardharcena ardharcena homaḥ
uda pātre sampātān ānīya dvau bhūmau sampātau
tau gṛhītvā uda pātre prakṣipya tatas abhimantraṇam
sa yave ca uttareṇa yavam badhnāti

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'dive svāhā' iti sūktena ṣaṭ sampātān karoti yavasahita udapātre caturaḥ sampātānānayati /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā dive svāhā iti sūktena ṣaṭ sampātān karoti yava sahite uda pātre caturaḥ sampātān ānayati

original: dvau sampātau bhūmau dattvā mṛttikāmudapātre prakṣipya tato'bhimantraṇamāplāvanaṃ ca /
analyzed: dvau sampātau bhūmau dattvā mṛttikām uda pātre prakṣipya tatobhimantraṇam āplāvanam ca
dive svāhā iti tribhiḥ svāhākāraiḥ ekaḥ sampātaḥ

original: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'imaṃ yavam' iti sūktenārdharcena ṣaḍ homān kṛtvā catura udapātre sampātānānayati /
analyzed: tantram kṛtvā imam yavam iti sūktena ardharcena ṣaṭ homān kṛtvā caturaḥ uda pātre sampātān ānayati
tau uda pātre prakṣipya tatas sūktena abhimantraṇam

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'imaṃ yavam' iti sūktena yavamaṇiṃ sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā imam yavam iti sūktena yava maṇim sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti
śītajvara kṣudrajvara kāma jvara śleṣma jvara grīṣma jvara varṣā jvara dāna dravya tyāga pratigraha yājana adhyayana adhyāpana yājya yājana buddhi dhvānte

original: sarvavyādhibhaiṣajyaṃ yatra ekasmin vyādhau bahūni karmāṇi vihitāni sarvasmin śāstre tatra sarvatra karmaṇāṃ vikalpaḥ /
analyzed: sarva vyādhi bhaiṣajyam yatra ekasmin vyādhau bahūni karmāṇi vihitāni sarvasmin śāstre tatra sarvatra karmaṇām vikalpaḥ
yatra abhiṣeka uvasecanam tatra ācamanam mārjanam ca sarvatra
dadiḥ hi iti takṣakāya iti uktam
takṣakāya namaskāram kṛtvā dadiḥ hi iti ṛcā udakam abhimantrya ācāmayati sarpa ādi viṣa bhaiṣajyam
takṣakāya namaskāram kṛtvā dadiḥ hi iti ṛcā udakam abhimantrya avasiñcati viṣa daṣṭam

original: 'dadirhi' ityṛcā kṛmukavṛkṣaśakalaṃ saṅghṛṣya tata udakaṃ ca prakṣipya tato'bhimantryāvasiñcati viṣadhāritam /
analyzed: dadiḥ hi iti ṛcā kṛmuka vṛkṣa śakalam saṅghṛṣya tatas udakam ca prakṣipya viṣa dhāritam
dadiḥ hi iti ṛcā udakam carma agni prajvālitam abhimantrya vyādhitam avasiñcati
dadiḥ hi iti ṛcā hariṇa jīrṇa carma avajvālitam udakam abhimantrya avasiñcati
dadiḥ hi iti ṛcā mārjanikā avakara tṛṇa avajvālita udakam abhimantryā vasiñcati

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'dadirhi' ityṛcodapātraṃ sampātya tataḥ pāyayati /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā dadiḥ hi iti ṛcā uda pātram sampātya tatas pāyayati

original: 'dadirhi' ityṛcā saktumanthamūrdhvaphalābhyāṃ viṣaliptābhyāṃ mathitvābhimantrya pāyayati sarpadaṣṭam /
analyzed: dadiḥ hi iti ṛcā saktu mantham ūrdhva phalābhyām viṣa liptābhyām mathitvā abhimantrya pāyayati sarpa daṣṭam
dadiḥ hi iti ṛcā madana phalam abhimantrya bhakṣayati chardana artham

original: 'dadirhi' ityṛcā haridrāṃ ghṛtaṃ ca sahābhimantrya pāyayati /
analyzed: dadiḥ hi iti ṛcā haridrām ghṛtam ca saha abhimantrya pāyayati
iti ṛcā a pradakṣiṇam vyādhitam parikrāmati

original: viṣaṃ stambhitaṃ nānyenottārayituṃ śakyate vana vedamantreṇa //
analyzed: viṣam stambhitam na anyena uttārayitum śakyate vana veda mantreṇa
yat te apodakam iti ṛcam japitvā śikhām badhnāti

original: 'yatte apodakam' ityṛcaṃ japitvā śvetavastreṇa granthiṃ badhnāti /
analyzed: yat te apodakam iti ṛcam japitvā śveta vastreṇa granthim badhnāti

original: 'yatte apodakam' ityekāṃ japitvā śaṇastambe granthiṃ badhnāti /
analyzed: yat te apodakam iti ekām japitvā śaṇa stambe granthim badhnāti

original: ityṛcā yasmin sthāne daṣṭaṃ taṃ sthānaṃ pīḍayati ṛcaṃ japitvā /
analyzed: iti ṛcā yasmin sthāne daṣṭam tam sthānam pīḍayati ṛcam japitvā
iti daṃśma tṛṇaiḥ prakarṣya ahim abhinirasyati
iti ṛcā ācāryaḥ tatas pradakṣiṇam parikrāmati

original: 'apehyarirasi' ityṛcaṃ japitvā tṛṇāni prajvālya tato'herabhimukhaṃ kṣipati //
analyzed: apehi ariḥ asi iti ṛcam japitvā tṛṇāni prajvālya tatas heḥ abhimukham kṣipati

original: 'apehyarirasi' ityṛcaṃ japitvā yato daṣṭastato jvalitatṛṇāni kṣipati daśane //
analyzed: apehi a rirasi iti ṛcam japitvā yatas daṣṭaḥ tatas jvalita tṛṇāni kṣipati daśane

original: ityṛcodakaṃ gṛhatṛṇāvajvālitamabhimantrya vyādhitaṃ pāyayati prokṣati ca //
analyzed: iti ṛcā udakam gṛha tṛṇa avajvālitam abhimantrya vyādhitam pāyayati prokṣati ca
asitasya iti ṛcā ārtnī jyā pāśam sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti ājya tantre

original: iti dvābhyāṃ madhumakṣikāṃ madhuvṛkṣamṛttikāṃ cābhimantrya pāyayati //
analyzed: iti dvābhyām madhumakṣikām madhu vṛkṣa mṛttikām ca abhimantrya pāyayati
iti ṛcā śuka sāri kṛśānām purīṣam śvāvidh purīṣam iti ucyate
karṇā śvāvidh tat abravīt iti ṛcā śalalī māṃsam abhimantrya prāśayati
iti ṛcā alābu madhye udakam prakṣipya ācāmayati
iti ṛcā alābu vṛntam sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti ājya tantre

original: sarvatra karmaṇāṃ prayogo vikalpena na samuccayaḥ /
analyzed: sarvatra karmaṇām prayogaḥ vikalpena na samuccayaḥ

original: ekaṃ kuryād dve vā trīṇi vā sarvāṇi vā /
analyzed: ekam kuryāt dve vā trīṇi vā sarvāṇi vā

original: ekavyādhau yatra bahūni karmāṇi vihitāni tatraikaṃ vā kuryāt karmabāhulyād dve vā sarvāṇi vā /
analyzed: eka vyādhau yatra bahūni karmāṇi vihitāni tatra ekam vā kuryāt karma bāhulyāt dve vā sarvāṇi vā
sarvatra hasta home na tantram iti vacanāt
atha duṣṭa vaktṝṇām mukha bandhanam ucyate
madhula vṛṣa liṅgābhiḥ khalatulaparṇī saṅkṣudya madhumanthe pāyayati
ekā ca me yadī eka vṛṣā asi

original: iti sūktābhyāṃ kulapallavān madhūdakaṃ caitat tritayamekatra kṛtvābhimantrya tato vyādhita pāyayati /
analyzed: iti sūktābhyām kulapallavān madhūdakam ca etat tritayam ekatra kṛtvā abhimantrya tatas vyādhita pāyayati
yadi eka vṛṣaḥ iti sūktena bhojanam abhimantrya bhakṣayati
yadi ekavṛṣaḥ iti sūktena gṛha dvāram dadāti apidadhāti iti arthaḥ
duṣṭa vaktṛ mukha bandhane brāhmaṇa śāpe ca bhaiṣajyam
agniḥ takmānam iti sūktena lājān pāyayati
dāve lohita pātreṇa mūrdhni sampātān ānayati

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'agnistakmānam' iti sūktena tāmrasruveṇa mūrdhni sampātānānayati /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā agniḥ takmānam iti sūktena tāmra sruveṇa mūrdhni sampātān ānayati
ote me iti karīra mūlam kāṇḍena eka deśam

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'ote me' iti sūktena karīramūlaṃ sampātyabhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā ote me iti sūktena karīra mūlam sampāti abhimantrya badhnāti

original: 'ote me' iti sūktena govālaiḥ karīrakāṣṭhaṃ veṣṭayitvā /
analyzed: ote me iti sūktena go vālaiḥ karīra kāṣṭham veṣṭayitvā

original: 'ote me' iti sūktena grāmapāṃsūnabhimantrya savyena hastena dakṣiṇābhimukho bhūtvā pāṃsūn parikirati /
analyzed: ote me iti sūktena grāma pāṃsūn abhimantrya savyena hastena dakṣiṇa abhimukhaḥ bhūtvā pāṃsūn parikirati

original: 'ote me' iti sūktena pāṃsūnabhimantrya mathitvā hastena kṛmerupari kṣipati /
analyzed: ote me iti sūktena pāṃsūn abhimantrya mathitvā hastena kṛmeḥ upari kṣipati
ote me iti sūktena śānta vṛkṣa samidhaḥ ādadhāti
mukha kṛmi karṇa kṛmi sarva kṛmi bhaiṣajyam

original: [paścādagnermāturupasthe musalabudhnena navanītānvaktena triḥ pratīhāraṃ tāluni tāpayati // KauśS_4,5{29}.22 //]
analyzed: paścāt agneḥ mātuḥ upasthe musala budhnena navanīta anvaktena tris pratīhāram tāluni tāpayati

original: 'ote me' iti sūktena paścādagnermāturutsaṅge bālakaṃ kṛtvā navanītānvaktena musalabudhnena tāluni tāpayati /
analyzed: ote me iti sūktena paścāt agneḥ mātuḥ utsaṅge bālakam kṛtvā navanīta anvaktena musala budhnena tāluni tāpayati

original: 'ote me' iti sūktena śigrubījairnavanītamiśritairabhimantrya vyādhideśaṃ pralimpati kṣatadeśam /
analyzed: ote me iti sūktena śigru bījaiḥ navanīta miśritaiḥ abhimantrya vyādhi deśam pralimpati kṣata deśam

original: 'ote me' iti sūktenaikaviṃśatyuśīramūlānyabhimantrya tataḥ pāṣāṇena kuṭṭayati /
analyzed: ote me iti sūktena ekaviṃśati uśīra mūlāni abhimantrya tatas pāṣāṇena kuṭṭayati
tatas sūktam japitvā uśīrāṇi agninā dahati
ote me iti sūktena ekaviṃśati uśīrāṇi abhimantrya vyādhitāya samarpayati
ote me iti sūktena udaka ghaṭam ekaviṃśati uśīra piñjūlī sahitam sampātya abhimantrya tatas vyādhitam āplāvayati ājya tantre
kṛmi jātānām akṣi karṇa mukha śiraḥ nāsikā danta kṛmīṇām kṛṣma śveta pīta dṛṣṭānām adṛṣṭānām ca sarveṣām kṛmīṇām bhaiṣajyam
iti vayaḥ niveśana śṛtam kṣīraudanam aśnāti

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'ā yaṃ viśanti' ityṛcā vayoniveśanakāṣṭhaśṛtaṃ kṣīraudanaṃ sampātyābhimantryāśnāti /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā ā yam viśanti iti ṛcā vayaḥ niveśana kāṣṭha śṛtam kṣīraudanam sampātya abhimantrya aśnāti

original: 'pari dyāmiva' iti tṛcena sūktena madhuśībhamabhimantrya pāyayati /
analyzed: pari dyām iva iti tṛcena sūktena madhuśībham abhimantrya pāyayati
pari dyām ivaḥ iti sūktena udakam abhimantrya ācāmayati
pari dyām iva iti sūktena udakam abhimantrya samprokṣati
pari dyām iva iti sūktena dullaka avajvālitam udakam abhimantrya avasiñcati vyādhitam
pari dyām iva iti sūktena avakara tṛṇāni avajvālitam udakam abhimantrya avasiñcati

original: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'pari dyāmiva' iti sūktenodapātraṃ sampātyābhimantrya pāyayati /
analyzed: tantram kṛtvā pari dyām iva iti sūktena uda pātram sampātya abhimantrya pāyayati

original: 'pari dyāmiva' iti sūktenordhvaphalābhyāṃ viṣadigdhābhyāṃ manthamupamathya tato'bhimantrya pāyayati /
analyzed: pari dyām iva iti sūktena ūrdhva phalābhyām viṣa digdhābhyām mantham upamathya pāyayati

original: 'pari dyāmiva' iti sūktena madanaphalānyabhimantrya bhakṣayati chardanārtham /
analyzed: pari dyām iva iti sūktena madana phalāni abhimantrya bhakṣayati chardana artham
pari dyām iva iti haridrām sarpiṣi abhimantrya pāyayati
iti śakalena apsu iṭe sampātavatā avasiñcati

original: apsviṭaṃ kṛtvā tatrāgniṃ prajvālya 'asthisraṃsam' iti sūktena kāṣṭhaśakalaṃ sampātya tena śakalena vyādhitamavasiñcati /
analyzed: apsu iṭam kṛtvā tatra agnim prajvālya asthi sraṃsam iti sūktena kāṣṭha śakalam sampātya tena śakalena vyādhitam avasiñcati

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'ābayo anābayo' iti sūktena caturṛcena sarṣapakāṇḍamaṇiṃ sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā ābayo anābayo iti sūktena caturṛcena sarṣapa kāṇḍa maṇim sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'ābayo anābayoḥ' iti sūktena sarṣapakāṇḍamaṇiṃ sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā ābayoḥ anābayoḥ iti sūktena sarṣapa kāṇḍa maṇim sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti

original: 'ābayo' iti sūktena sarṣapaśākaṃ sarṣapatailenābhyaktamabhimantrya vyādhitāya prayacchati / akṣiroge //
analyzed: iti sūktena sarṣapa śākam sarṣapa tailena abhyaktam abhimantrya vyādhitāya prayacchati akṣi roge

original: 'ābayo' iti sūktena catvāri śākavṛkṣaphalānyabhimantrya prayacchati vyādhitāya / akṣiroge //
analyzed: iti sūktena catvāri śāka vṛkṣa phalāni abhimantrya prayacchati vyādhitāya akṣi roge

original: 'ābayo' iti sūktena mūlakṣīraṃ mukhena prāśya tato'bhimantryākṣiṇī āṅkte vyādhitasya /
analyzed: iti sūktena mūla kṣīram mukhena prāśya tatobhimantrya akṣiṇī āṅkte vyādhitasya

original: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'ābayo' iti sūktena mūlakṣīraṃ sampātyābhimantrya bhakṣayati /
analyzed: tantram kṛtvā iti sūktena mūla kṣīram sampātya abhimantrya bhakṣayati

original: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'agnerivāsya dahata eti śuṣmiṇaḥ' iti tṛcena tāmrasruveṇa mūrdhni sampātānānayati /
analyzed: tantram kṛtvā agneḥ iva asya dahataḥ eti śuṣmiṇaḥ iti tṛcena tāmra sruveṇa mūrdhni sampātān ānayati

atha keśa vṛddhi karaṇe keśa patane ca bhaiṣajyam ucyate
imāḥ yāḥ tisraḥ iti tṛcena sūktena vṛkṣa bhūmi jāta oṣadhibhiḥ avajvālitam udakam abhimantrya uṣā kālā iva siñcati
keśa vṛddhau keśa patane ca bhaiṣajyam
imāḥ yāḥ tisraḥ iti sūktena madhu sikthakam kvāthayitvā abhimantrya avasiñcati

original: uṣākāle 'imā yāstisraḥ' iti sūktena bibhītakāni kvāthayitvābhimantrya vyādhitamavasiñcati /
analyzed: uṣā kāle imāḥ yāḥ tisraḥ iti sūktena vibhītakāni kvāthayitvā abhimantrya vyādhitam avasiñcati

original: uṣākāle 'imā yāstisraḥ' iti dāruharidrāharidre ca dvābhyāṃ kvāthayitvābhimantryāvasiñcati /
analyzed: uṣā kāle imāḥ yāḥ tisraḥ iti dāruharidrā haridre ca dvābhyām kvāthayitvā abhimantrya avasiñcati

original: samāptaṃ keśavardhanārthaṃ bhaiṣajyaṃ keśapatane ca kṣaye ca //

original: iti sūktābhyāṃ cittyādyauṣadhyā sahitamudakamabhimantrya tato vyādhitamavasiñcati /

original: 'kṛṣṇaṃ niyānam' 'sasruṣīḥ' iti sūktābhyāṃ maruto yajate pākayajñavidhānena yathā varuṇam /

analyzed: mārutam kṣīraudanam māruta śṛtam mārutaiḥ paristīya mārutena sruveṇa mārutena ājyena varuṇāya tris juhoti kauśs
kṛṣṇam niyānam sasruṣīḥ iti sūktābhyām ājyam juhoti

original: 'kṛṣṇaṃ niyānam' 'sasruṣīḥ' iti sūktābhyāṃ cittyādyoṣadhīḥ sampātya viplāvayetodakamadhye /

original: 'kṛṣṇaṃ niyānam' 'sasruṣīḥ' iti sūktābhyāṃ keśajaradupānahau vaṃśāgre baddhvābhimantrya yodhayati /

original: atha hṛdayadāghe jalodare kāmale ca bhaiṣajyānyucyante -
analyzed: atha hṛdaya dāghe jalodare kāmale ca bhaiṣajyāni ucyante

analyzed: himavataḥ iti sūktena nadī udakam anulomam āhārya tatra valīka tṛṇāni prakṣipya tatas abhimantrya tatas vyādhitam avasiñcati

original: hṛdayadoṣe jalodare kāmale ca bhaiṣajyaṃ samāptam //

original: tataḥ sūktaṃ japitvā tenaiva kāṣṭhena gaṇḍamālāṃ limpati //
analyzed: tatas sūktam japitvā tena eva kāṣṭhena gaṇḍamālām limpati

original: 'pañca ca yāḥ' iti sūktena śaṅkhaṃ ghṛṣṭvā tato'bhimantrya gaṇḍamālāṃ pralimpati /

original: 'pañca ca yāḥ' iti sūktena śvānakuvakuralālāmabhimantrya pralimpati /
analyzed: pañca ca yāḥ iti sūktena śvāna ku vakura lālām abhimantrya pralimpati

original: 'pañca ca yāḥ' iti sūktena jalaukāmabhimantrya gaṇḍamālāyāṃ saṃsarjayati /
analyzed: pañca ca yāḥ iti sūktena jalaukām abhimantrya gaṇḍamālāyām saṃsarjayati

original: 'pañca ca yāḥ' iti sūktena gṛhagodhikādi matsyādi abhimantrya gaṇḍamālāyāṃ saṃsarjayati //

original: 'vaiśvānaro na' 'ṛtāvānam' iti sūktābhyāṃ haridrāṃ sarpiṣyabhimantrya pāyayati /
analyzed: vaiśvānaraḥ naḥ ṛtāvānam iti sūktābhyām haridrām sarpiṣi abhimantrya pāyayati

original: ityapavātāyāḥ svayaṃsrastena gośṛṅgeṇa sampātavatā japan // KauśS_4,7{31}.6 //]
analyzed: iti apavātāyāḥ svayam srastena go śṛṅgeṇa sampātavatā japan

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'asthād dyauḥ' iti sūktena pūrveṇa svayampatitaṃ gośṛṅgaṃ sampātya tataḥ śṛṅga udakaṃ kṛtvābhimantryācāmayatyabhyukṣati  #

original: athodare vā hṛdaye vāṅge vā sarvāṅge vā śūla utpanne bhaiṣajyamucyate -
