original: 'dyauśca me idaṃ pṛthivī' iti tṛcena sūktena tailamabhimantrya gaṇḍamabhyajya hastena vyādhitamavamārṣṭi /
analyzed: dyauḥ ca me idam pṛthivī iti tṛcena sūktena tailam abhimantrya gaṇḍam abhyajya hastena vyādhitam avamārṣṭi

original: 'dyauśca me' iti sūktaṃ japan vyādhideśaṃ hastena mārṣṭi /
analyzed: dyauḥ ca me iti sūktam japan vyādhi deśam hastena mārṣṭi
duṣṭa gaṇḍe duṣṭa vraṇe ca bhaiṣajyam

original: 'dyauśca me' iti sūktena sthūṇāyāṃ vraṇaṃ nikarṣati /
analyzed: dyauḥ ca me iti sūktena sthūṇāyām vraṇam nikarṣati
rudhira kṛte duṣṭavraṇe duṣṭa gaṇḍe bhaiṣajyam samāptam
idam id vai iti akṣatam mūtra phenena abhyudya
idam id vai u bheṣajam iti sūktena go mūtram abhimantrya

original: 'idamidvā u bheṣajam' iti sūktena mūtreṇa vraṇaṃ kṣipati //
analyzed: idam id vai u bheṣajam iti sūktena mūtreṇa vraṇam kṣipati
tena eva sūktena mūtreṇa vraṇam prakṣālayati
yasya vraṇasya mukham na asti akṣatavraṇam ucyate

original: 'idamidvā u bheṣajam' iti sūktena dantamalamabhimantrya pralimpati /
analyzed: idam id vai u bheṣajam iti sūktena danta malam abhimantrya pralimpati

original: 'idamidvā u bheṣajam' iti sūktena tṛṇarajasya phenamabhimantrya vraṇa pralimpati /
analyzed: idam id vai u bheṣajam iti sūktena tṛṇarajasya phenam abhimantrya vraṇa pralimpati

original: yasya vraṇasya rudhiraṃ na vahati tasya /
analyzed: yasya vraṇasya rudhiram na vahati tasya

original: 'apacitaḥ pra patata' iti sūktena śaṅkhaṃ ghṛṣṭvābhimantrya gaṇḍamālāṃ pralimpati /
analyzed: apacitaḥ pra patataḥ iti sūktena śaṅkham ghṛṣṭvā abhimantrya gaṇḍamālām pralimpati
apacitaḥ iti sūktena śvāna lālām abhimantrya gaṇḍamālām pralimpati
apacitaḥ iti sūktena jalaukām abhimantrya gaṇḍamālāyām saṃśleṣayati
apacitaḥ iti sūktena gṛhagodhikām abhimantrya gaṇḍamālāyām āsajati

original: 'ā susrasaḥ' iti dvābhyāṃ śaṅkhaṃ ghṛṣṭvābhimantrya tato gaṇḍamālāṃ pralimpati /
analyzed: ā susrasaḥ iti dvābhyām śaṅkham ghṛṣṭvā abhimantrya tatas gaṇḍamālām pralimpati

original: 'ā susrasaḥ' iti dvābhyāṃ śvānalālāṃ kurkaralālāmabhimantrya gaṇḍamālāṃ pralimpati /
analyzed: ā susrasaḥ iti dvābhyām śvāna lālām kurkara lālām abhimantrya gaṇḍamālām pralimpati

original: 'ā susrasaḥ' iti dvābhyāṃ jalaukāmabhimantrya gaṇḍamālāyāṃ saṃsarjayati rudhirapravāhaṇārtham /
analyzed: ā susrasaḥ iti dvābhyām jalaukām abhimantrya gaṇḍamālāyām saṃsarjayati rudhira pravāhaṇa artham

original: 'ā susrasaḥ' iti dvābhyāṃ gṛhagodhikāṃ maśakādīmabhimantrya gaṇḍamālāyāṃ saṃsarjayati rudhirapravāhaṇārtham //
analyzed: ā susrasaḥ iti dvābhyām gṛhagodhikām maśaka ādīm abhimantrya gaṇḍamālāyām saṃsarjayati rudhira pravāhaṇa artham

original: 'apacitaḥ' iti sūktena saindhavalavaṇaṃ cūrṇayitvābhimantrya gaṇḍamālāyāṃ upari prakirati /
analyzed: apacitaḥ iti sūktena saindhava lavaṇam cūrṇayitvā abhimantrya gaṇḍamālāyām upari prakirati

original: 'ā susrasaḥ' iti dvābhyāṃ saindhavalavaṇaṃ cūrṇayitvābhimantrya vyādhyupari prakirati /
analyzed: ā susrasaḥ iti dvābhyām saindhava lavaṇam cūrṇayitvā abhimantrya vyādhi upari prakirati
iti pakṣa hatam mantra uktam caṅkramayā

original: 'antarikṣeṇa patati' iti sūktena śvānapadasthānamṛttikāmabhimantrya pakṣahataṃ deśaṃ pralimpati /
analyzed: antarikṣeṇa patati iti sūktena śvānapada sthāna mṛttikām abhimantrya pakṣa hatam deśam pralimpati

original: 'antarikṣeṇa patati' iti sūktena śuno makṣikāmabhimantryāgnau prakṣipya tato dhūpayati vyādhipradeśam /
analyzed: antarikṣeṇa patati iti sūktena śunaḥ makṣikām abhimantrya agnau prakṣipya tatas dhūpayati vyādhi pradeśam
kāka gṛdhra kapota śyena ādīnām pakṣiṇām abhighāte bhaiṣajyam samāptam

original: 'glauritaḥ pra patiṣyati' ityardharcena gomūtramabhimantrya gaṇḍaṃ mardayati gaṇḍabhaiṣajyam /
analyzed: glauḥ itas pra patiṣyati iti ardharcena go mūtram abhimantrya gaṇḍam mardayati gaṇḍabhaiṣajyam

original: 'glauritaḥ pra patiṣyati' ityardharcena gomūtramabhimantrya gaṇḍaṃ prakṣālayati /
analyzed: glauḥ itas pra patiṣyati iti ardharcena go mūtram abhimantrya gaṇḍam prakṣālayati

original: 'glauritaḥ pra patiṣyati' ityardharcena dantamalamabhimantrya gaṇḍaṃ pralimpati /
analyzed: glauḥ itas pra patiṣyati iti ardharcena danta malam abhimantrya gaṇḍam pralimpati

original: 'glauritaḥ pra patiṣyati' ityardharcena tṛṇarajaphenamabhimantrya gaṇḍaṃ pralimpati /
analyzed: glauḥ itas pra patiṣyati iti ardharcena tṛṇa raja phenam abhimantrya gaṇḍam pralimpati
gardabha śvāna ādi urugaṇḍe bhaiṣajyam ucyate

original: [vīhi svām (6.83.4) ityajñātāruḥ śāntyudakena samprokṣya manasā sampātavatā // KauśS_4,7{31}.21 //]
analyzed: vīhi svām iti a jñāta aruḥ śāntyudakena samprokṣya manasā sampātavatā

original: 'vīhi svāmāhutiṃ juṣāṇaḥ' iti sūktena śāntyudakamabhimantrya tataḥ kṣataṃ prokṣati /
analyzed: vīhi svām āhutim juṣāṇaḥ iti sūktena śāntyudakam abhimantrya tatas kṣatam prokṣati

original: tata ājyatantraṃ kṛtvā 'vīhi svāmāhutim' iti sūktenājyaṃ juhoti /
analyzed: tatas ājya tantram kṛtvā vīhi svām āhutim iti sūktena ājyam juhoti
samāptam gardabha daśana kṣata gaṇḍa bhaiṣajyam
pāpa gṛhīte jalodare ca bhaiṣajyam ucyate

original: 'yā oṣadhayaḥ somarājñīḥ' iti sūktena tṛcena somalatā agnau prakṣipya vyādhitaṃ dhūpayati //
analyzed: yāḥ oṣadhayaḥ soma rājñīḥ iti sūktena tṛcena soma latāḥ agnau prakṣipya vyādhitam dhūpayati

original: 'yā oṣadhayaḥ' iti tṛcena madhu takraṃ cābhimantrya pāyayati /
analyzed: yāḥ oṣadhayaḥ iti tṛcena madhu takram ca abhimantrya pāyayati

original: 'yā oṣadhayaḥ somarājñīḥ' iti tṛcena kṣīraṃ takreṇa miśrayitvābhimantrya pāyayati //
analyzed: yāḥ oṣadhayaḥ soma rājñīḥ iti tṛcena kṣīram takreṇa miśrayitvā abhimantrya pāyayati

original: 'yā oṣadhayaḥ' iti sūktena madhu takraṃ kṣīraṃ dadhyetaccatuṣṭayamekatra kṛtvābhimantrya pāyayati /
analyzed: yāḥ oṣadhayaḥ iti sūktena madhu takram kṣīram dadhi etat catuṣṭayam ekatra kṛtvā abhimantrya pāyayati

original: brāhmaṇākrośe pāpagṛhīte jalodare ca bhaiṣajyaṃ samāptam //
analyzed: brāhmaṇa ākrośe pāpa gṛhīte jalodare ca bhaiṣajyam samāptam

original: viṣa upaviṣe sthāvare jaṅgame ca bhaiṣajyamucyate /
analyzed: viṣe upaviṣe sthāvare jaṅgame ca bhaiṣajyam ucyate
devāḥ aduḥ iti valmīkena bandhana pāyana ācamana pradehanam uṣṇena

original: 'devā aduḥ' iti tṛcena valmīkapoṭṭalikāṃ kṛtvā sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: devāḥ aduḥ iti tṛcena valmīka poṭṭalikām kṛtvā sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti

original: 'devā aduḥ' iti tṛcena valmīkamṛttikāmudakamadhye prakṣipya tato'bhimantrya pāyayati /
analyzed: devāḥ aduḥ iti tṛcena valmīka mṛttikām udaka madhye prakṣipya pāyayati

original: 'devā aduḥ' iti tṛcena valmīkamṛdamudake prakṣipya tato'bhimantryācāmayati /
analyzed: devāḥ aduḥ iti tṛcena valmīka mṛdam udake prakṣipya tatas abhimantrya ācāmayati

original: 'devā aduḥ' iti tṛcena valmīkamṛttikāmuṣṇodake prakṣipya tato'bhimantrya pralimpati viṣadaṣṭavraṇam /
analyzed: devāḥ aduḥ iti tṛcena valmīka mṛttikām uṣṇa udake prakṣipya pralimpati viṣa daṣṭa vraṇam
atha kāse śleṣma patane ca bhaiṣajyam ucyate

original: 'yathā mano manasketaiḥ' iti sūktena bhojanamabhimantrya dadāti bhakṣaṇārthaṃ prathamaṃ prapādya /
analyzed: yathā manaḥ manasketaiḥ iti sūktena bhojanam abhimantrya dadāti bhakṣaṇa artham prathamam prapādya
yathā manaḥ iti saktu mantham abhimantrya bhakṣayati
yathā manaḥ manaḥ iti sūktena udakam abhimantrya ācāmayati

original: 'ava divastārayanti' ityṛcā prapādya gṛhe praveśya tato bhojanamabhimantrya dadāti bhakṣaṇārtham /
analyzed: ava divaḥ tārayanti iti ṛcā prapādya gṛhe praveśya tatas bhojanam abhimantrya dadāti bhakṣaṇa artham

original: 'ava divastārayanti' ityṛcā saktumabhimantrya dadāti bhakṣaṇārthamupasthānaṃ ca /
analyzed: ava divaḥ tārayanti iti ṛcā saktum abhimantrya dadāti bhakṣaṇa artham upasthānam ca
iti ṛcā udakam abhimantrya ācāmayati upasthānam ādityasya
keśa dṛḍhīkaraṇe keśa vṛddhi karaṇe ca bhaiṣajyam ucyate

original: iti mantroktāphalaṃ jīvyalākābhyāmamāvāsyāyāṃ kṛṣṇavasanaḥ kṛṣṇabhakṣaḥ purā kākasampātādavanakṣatre'vasiñcati // KauśS_4,7{31}.28 //]
analyzed: iti mantra ukta aphalam jīvi alākābhyām amāvāsyāyām kṛṣṇa vasanaḥ kṛṣṇa bhakṣaḥ purā kāka sampātāt avanakṣatrā iva siñcati

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'devī devyām' 'yāṃ jamadagniḥ' iti sūktābhyāṃ kācamācīphalamaṇiṃ sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā devī devyām yām jamadagniḥ iti sūktābhyām kācamācī phala maṇim sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti

original: 'devī devyām' 'yāṃ jamadagniḥ' iti sūktābhyāṃ jīvantīphalamaṇiṃ badhnāti /
analyzed: devī devyām yām jamadagniḥ iti sūktābhyām jīvantī phala maṇim badhnāti

original: 'devī devyām' 'yāṃ jamadagniḥ' iti sūktābhyāṃ bhṛṅgarājaṃ sampātyābhimantrya badhnātyājyatantre /
analyzed: devī devyām yām jamadagniḥ iti sūktābhyām bhṛṅgarājam sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti ājya tantre
keśa dṛḍhīkaraṇe keśa janane hrasva keśeṣu vṛddhi karaṇe bhaiṣajyam

original: kṛṣṇavastraparihito bhūtvā māṣatilakṛṣṇamannaṃ bhaikṣayitvā kartā 'devī devyām' 'yāṃ
analyzed: kṛṣṇa vastra parihitaḥ bhūtvā māṣa tila kṛṣṇam annam bhaikṣayitvā kartā devī devyām yām

original: jamadagniḥ' iti sūktābhyāṃ kācamācīphalabhṛṅgarājābhyāṃ sahodakamabhimantrya rātrau
analyzed: jamadagniḥ iti sūktābhyām kācamācī phala bhṛṅgarājābhyām saha udakam abhimantrya rātrau
tena udakena purā kāka sampātāt avanakṣatrā iva siñcati

original: samāptaṃ keśavṛddhikaraṇaṃ keśajananaṃ khalatikeśajananaṃ keśadṛḍhīkaraṇaṃ palitanāśanaṃ bhaiṣajyam //
analyzed: samāptam keśa vṛddhi karaṇam keśa jananam khalati keśa jananam keśa dṛḍhīkaraṇam palita nāśanam bhaiṣajyam

original: 'yaste stanaḥ' ityṛcā stanamabhimantrya bālakāya prayacchati pānārtham patiḥ karoti kartā vā karoti /
analyzed: yaḥ te stanaḥ iti ṛcā stanam abhimantrya bālakāya prayacchati pāna artham patiḥ karoti kartā vā karoti
yaḥ te stanaḥ iti ṛcā priyaṅgu taṇḍulān abhyavadugdhān abhimantrya pāyayati
jambha gṛhīte duḥkha nāśe ca bhaiṣajyam

original: iti mauñjeḥ parvasu baddhvā piñjūlībhirāplāvayati // KauśS_4,8{32}.3 //]
analyzed: iti mauñjeḥ parvasu baddhvā piñjūlībhiḥ āplāvayati

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'agnāviṣṇū' iti dvābhyāṃ mauñjeḥ pāśairvyādhitaṃ baddhvā śarapiñjūlībhiḥ sahodakaghaṭaṃ sampātyābhimantryāplāvayati /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā agnāviṣṇū iti dvābhyām mauñjeḥ pāśaiḥ vyādhitam baddhvā śara piñjūlībhiḥ saha udaka ghaṭam sampātya abhimantrya āplāvayati

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'somārudrā vi vṛhatam' iti dvābhyāmudakaghaṭaṃ sampātyābhimantrya tato mauñjeḥ parvasu vyādhita baddhvā darbhapiñjūlībhiḥ  #
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā somārudrā vi vṛhatam iti dvābhyām udaka ghaṭam sampātya abhimantrya tatas mauñjeḥ parvasu baddhvā darbha piñjūlībhiḥ

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'sinīvāli' iti navabhirṛgbhirudakaghaṭaṃ sampātyābhimantrya mauñjeḥ parvasu baddhvā piñjūlībhirāplāvayati /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā sinīvāli iti navabhiḥ ṛgbhiḥ udaka ghaṭam sampātya abhimantrya mauñjeḥ parvasu baddhvā piñjūlībhiḥ āplāvayati
mārjana ācamane ca smartavye sarvatra sarva bhaiṣajyam

original: 'vi te muñcāmi raśanām' iti dvābhyāmudakaghaṭaṃ sampātyābhimantrya mauñjeḥ parvasu baddhvā piñjūlībhirāplāvayati /
analyzed: vi te muñcāmi raśanām iti dvābhyām udaka ghaṭam sampātya abhimantrya mauñjeḥ parvasu baddhvā piñjūlībhiḥ āplāvayati
abhyātāna antam kṛtvā śumbhanī muñcantu mā

original: iti dvābhyāmudakaghaṭaṃ sampātyābhimantrya mauñjeḥ pāśaiḥ parvasu baddhvā piñjūlībhirāplāvayati /
analyzed: iti dvābhyām udaka ghaṭam sampātya abhimantrya mauñjeḥ pāśaiḥ parvasu baddhvā piñjūlībhiḥ āplāvayati
agnāviṣṇū iti dvābhyām piñjūlībhiḥ saha udakam abhimantrya vyādhitam avasiñcati
somārudrāḥ iti dvābhyām udakam abhimantrya vyādhitam avasiñcati
sinīvāli iti navabhiḥ ṛgbhiḥ udakam abhimantrya avasiñcati
vi te muñcāmi iti dvābhyām udakam abhimantrya avasiñcati
śumbhanī iti dvābhyām udakam abhimantrya avasiñcati

original: sarvatra mauñjaiḥ pāśairaṅgulītrayaṃ baddhvā tat āplāvanamavasevanaṃ ca sarvatra kuryāt /
analyzed: sarvatra mauñjaiḥ pāśaiḥ aṅgulī trayam baddhvā tat āplāvanam avasevanam ca sarvatra kuryāt

original: asminnadhikāre āplāvane'vasecane ca mārjanamācamanaṃ ca sarvatra /
analyzed: asmin adhikāre āplāvana ivasecane ca mārjanam ācamanam ca sarvatra
tiraścirājeḥ iti aṣṭa ṛcena jyeṣṭhī madhu piṣṭvā abhimantrya pāyayati

original: 'tiraścirājeḥ' iti sūktena kṣetramṛttikāṃ jīvakoṣaṇyāṃ sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: tiraścirājeḥ iti sūktena kṣetramṛttikām jīva koṣaṇyām sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti

original: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'tiraścirājeḥ' ityaṣṭarcena valmīkamṛttikāṃ sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: tantram kṛtvā tiraścirājeḥ iti aṣṭa ṛcena valmīka mṛttikām sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti
jīvat paśu carma jīvakoṣaṇī iti ucyate
tiraścirājeḥ iti aṣṭa ṛcena uda pātram abhimantrya pāyayati

original: 'tiraścirājeḥ' ityaṣṭarcena haridrāṃ sarpiṣā saha miśritāṃ kṛtvābhimantrya pāyayati /
analyzed: tiraścirājeḥ iti aṣṭa ṛcena haridrām sarpiṣā saha miśritām kṛtvā abhimantrya pāyayati
tiraścirājeḥ iti aṣṭa ṛcena uda pātram saha madhu dugdha caru abhimantrya pāyayati
tiraścirājeḥ iti aṣṭa ṛcena valmīka mṛttikām abhimantrya pāyayati

original: yāni pāyanānyuktāni tāni 'tiraścirājeḥ' ityasya sūktasya bhavanti /
analyzed: yāni pāyanāni uktāni tāni tiraścirājeḥ ityasya sūktasya bhavanti
samāptam vṛścika pipīlikā maśaka daṃśa śarkoṭa jalūkā bhaiṣajyam

original: [apacitām (7.74) iti vaiṇavena dārbhyūṣeṇa kṛṣṇorṇājyena kālabundaiḥ stukāgrairiti mantroktam // KauśS_4,8{32}.8 //]
analyzed: apacitām iti vaiṇavena dārbhyūṣeṇa kṛṣṇa ūrṇā ājyena kāla bundaiḥ stukā agraiḥ iti mantra uktam

original: etābhistisṛbhirvaṃśadhanuṣā kṛṣṇorṇāmayīṃ jyāṃ kṛtvā citritena śareṇa gaṇḍamālāṃ vidhyati pratyṛcam /
analyzed: etābhiḥ tisṛbhiḥ vaṃśadhanuṣā kṛṣṇa ūrṇā mayīm jyām kṛtvā citritena śareṇa gaṇḍamālām vidhyati pratyṛcam

original: iti caturthyā ṛcā caturthena śareṇa gaṇḍamālāmabhinidhāya vidhyatyāhanti /
analyzed: iti caturthyā ṛcā caturthena śareṇa gaṇḍamālām abhinidhāya vidhyati āhanti

original: 'apacitām' iti dve 'ā susrasaḥ' iti tṛtīyā 'yā graivyāḥ' iti caturthī etābhiścatasṛbhiḥ śarakṛṣṇorṇājyāvajvālitamudakamabhimantryoṣākāle rātriśeṣe  #
analyzed: apacitām iti dve ā susrasaḥ iti tṛtīyā yāḥ graivyāḥ iti caturthī etābhiḥ catasṛbhiḥ śara kṛṣṇa ūrṇā ājya avajvālitam udakam abhimantrya uṣā kāle rātri śeṣe  /
iti tṛcena vīṇā tantrī khaṇḍam sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti

original: pūrvatantraṃ kṛtvā 'yaḥ kīkasāḥ' iti tṛcena vādyavīṇā tasyāḥ khaṇḍaṃ viṣṇīvādyavīṇākaṇṭhaṃ śaṅkhakhaṇḍaṃ vīṇātantrīṃ baddhvā sampātyābhimantrya  #
analyzed: pūrva tantram kṛtvā yaḥ kīkasāḥ iti tṛcena vādya vīṇā tasyāḥ khaṇḍam viṣṇī vādya vīṇā kaṇṭham śaṅkha khaṇḍam vīṇā tantrīm baddhvā sampātya abhimantrya
vīriṇa vadhrīm svayam mlānam tris samasya

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'yaḥ kīkasāḥ' iti tṛcena svayampatitamlānavīriṇakhaṇḍatrayamekatra baddhvā sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā yaḥ kīkasāḥ iti tṛcena svayam patita mlāna vīriṇa khaṇḍa trayam ekatra baddhvā sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti

original: sarvatra yatra bahūni karmāṇi vihitāni tatraikaṃ kuryāt dve vā sarvāṇi vā kuryāt /
analyzed: sarvatra yatra bahūni karmāṇi vihitāni tatra ekam kuryāt dve vā sarvāṇi vā kuryāt

original: [apsu te (7.83) iti vahantyormadhye vimite piñjūlībhirāplāvayati // KauśS_4,8{32}.14 //]
analyzed: apsu te iti vahantyoḥ madhye vimite piñjūlībhiḥ āplāvayati

original: vahantyornadyormadhye maṇḍapaṃ kṛtvā tatrājyatantraṃ kṛtvā 'apsu te rājan varuṇa' iti caturṛcenoṣṇodakaghaṭaṃ sampātyābhimantrya piñjūlībhiḥ  #
analyzed: vahantyoḥ nadyoḥ madhye maṇḍapam kṛtvā tatra ājya tantram kṛtvā apsu te rājan varuṇaḥ iti caturṛcena uṣṇa udaka ghaṭam sampātya abhimantrya piñjūlībhiḥ

original: nadīdvayorvahantyoḥ saṅgame maṇḍapaṃ kṛtvā 'apsu te rājan' iti caturṛcenodakamabhimantrya darbhapiñjūlībhiḥ sahodakaṃ gṛhītvā vyādhitamavasiñcati
analyzed: nadī dvayoḥ vahantyoḥ saṅgame maṇḍapam kṛtvā apsu te rājan iti caturṛcena udakam abhimantrya darbha piñjūlībhiḥ saha udakam gṛhītvā vyādhitam avasiñcati
āplavanam uṣṇa udakena avasecanam śīta udakena

original: iti śakunīniveṣīkāñjimaṇḍūkaṃ nīlalohitābhyāṃ sūtrābhyāṃ sakakṣaṃ baddhvā // KauśS_4,8{32}.17 //]
analyzed: iti śakunīn iva īṣīkā añji maṇḍūkam nīla lohitābhyām sūtrābhyām sa kakṣam baddhvā

original: 'namo rūrāya' iti sūktadvayena khaṭvāyāṃ vyādhitaṃ kṛtvā maṇḍūkamiṣīkāñji nīlalohitābhyāṃ sūtrābhyāṃ sakakṣaṃ baddhvā /
analyzed: namaḥ rūrāya iti sūkta dvayena khaṭvāyām vyādhitam kṛtvā maṇḍūkam iṣīkā añji nīla lohitābhyām sūtrābhyām sa kakṣam baddhvā

original: tataḥ khaṭvāyāmadho maṇḍūkaṃ kṛtvā khaṭvāyāṃ vyādhitamupaveśya tata udakamabhimantrya vyādhitamavasiñcati /
analyzed: tatas khaṭvāyām adhas maṇḍūkam kṛtvā khaṭvāyām vyādhitam upaveśya tatas udakam abhimantrya vyādhitam avasiñcati

original: vyādhite sicyamāne yathā maṇḍūko'vasicyate tathā kuryāt /
analyzed: vyādhite sicyamāne yathā maṇḍūkā uvasicyate tathā kuryāt
śīrṣaktim śīrṣa āmayam iti artha sūktena vyādhita śarīram abhimṛśati

original: śiroroge karṇaroge'ṅgaroge śūle lohitamūtre lohitapurīṣe yakṣmaṇi mukharoge'kṣiroge'ṅgabhede'ṅgajvare
analyzed: śiraḥ roge karṇa roga iṅga roge śūle lohita mūtre lohita purīṣe yakṣmaṇi mukha roga ikṣi roga iṅga bheda iṅga jvare

original: vyādhisarpaṇa uroroge śarīrābhyantararoge hṛdayaroge kāse śleṣmaṇi guhyādibhaiṣajyam /
analyzed: vyādhi sarpaṇe uraḥ roge śarīra abhyantara roge hṛdaya roge kāse śleṣmaṇi guhya ādi bhaiṣajyam
takṣakāya namaskāram kṛtvā indrasya prathamaḥ iti artha sūktena udakam abhimantrya ācāmayati

original: takṣakāya namaskāraṃ kṛtvā 'indrasya prathamaḥ' ityarthasūktenodakamabhimantrya vyādhitamavasiñcati /
analyzed: takṣakāya namaskāram kṛtvā indrasya prathamaḥ iti artha sūktena udakam abhimantrya vyādhitam avasiñcati
indrasya prathamaḥ iti artha sūktena udake kṛmuka vṛkṣa śakalam saṅkṣudya abhimantrya pāyayati
indrasya prathamaḥ iti artha sūktena dullaka śakṛt gomayena ava jvālitam udakam abhimantrya avasiñcati
indrasya prathamaḥ iti artha sūktena kṛṣṇājina avajvālitam udakam abhimantrya viṣa daṣṭam avasiñcati
indrasya prathamaḥ iti artha sūktena mārjanikā tṛṇa avajvālitam udakam abhimantrya ācāmayati
indrasya prathamaḥ iti artha sūktena uda pātram sampātya abhimantrya tatas pāyayati
indrasya prathamaḥ iti artha sūktena saktu mantham ardhva phala kāṇḍābhyām upamathya pāyayati
indrasya prathamaḥ iti artha sūktena madana phalāni abhimantrya bhakṣayati chardana artham

original: 'indrasya prathamaḥ' ityarthasūktena haridrāṃ ghṛtena sahābhimantrya vyādhitaṃ pāyayati //
analyzed: indrasya prathamaḥ iti artha sūktena haridrām ghṛtena saha abhimantrya vyādhitam pāyayati
paidvam prakarṣya dakṣiṇena aṅguṣṭhena dakṣiṇasyām nastas

original: 'indrasya prathamaḥ' ityarthasūktena padvaṃ kīṭakaṃ taliṇīti loke prasiddhā taṃ piṣṭvābhimantrya nastaṃ dadāti /
analyzed: indrasya prathamaḥ iti artha sūktena padvam kīṭakam taliṇī iti loke prasiddhā tam piṣṭvā abhimantrya naḥ tam dadāti

original: 'indrasya prathamaḥ' iti sūktena paidvaṃ śvetavastraveṣṭitamabhimantrya yatra sarpabhayaṃ tatra nikhanati / paidvaṃ
analyzed: indrasya prathamaḥ iti sūktena paidvam śveta vastra veṣṭitam abhimantrya yatra sarpa bhayam tatra nikhanati paidvam

original: hiraṇyavarṇasadṛśaḥ kīṭaścitrito vā sa paidva ityucyate /
analyzed: hiraṇya varṇa sadṛśaḥ kīṭaḥ citritaḥ vā sa paidvaḥ iti ucyate
badhnāti vā upari gṛhe sarpa darśana adarśane vā
aṅgāt aṅgāt pracyāvaya iti ṛcā prapada antam śiraḥ prabhṛti hastena mārṣṭi

original: 'āre abhūt' (10.4.26) ityṛcāntenolmukaṃ pratāpyābhimantrya tato viṣavraṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā tatsammukhaṃ kṣipati /
analyzed: āre abhūt iti ṛcā antena ulmukam pratāpya abhimantrya tatas viṣa vraṇam dṛṣṭvā tad sammukham kṣipati
sarpa adarśane yatas daṣṭaḥ tatas prakṣipati ulmukam

original: athānūkteṣu kauśikīyeṣu sarvavyādhibhaiṣajyeṣūkteṣvanūkteṣu vā paṭhiteṣu tatra sarvatra bhaiṣajyamucyate /
analyzed: atha anūkteṣu kauśikīyeṣu sarva vyādhi bhaiṣajyeṣu ukteṣu anūkteṣu vā paṭhiteṣu tatra sarvatra bhaiṣajyam ucyate
oṣadhi vanaspatīnām anūktāni a pratiṣiddhāni bhaiṣajyānām
yāḥ oṣadhayaḥ soma rājñīḥ iti akā

original: yāni ca pañcapratīkāni sūktāni tānyābhimantraṇana sarvavyādhibhaiṣajyāni bhavanti /
analyzed: yāni ca pañca pratīkāni sūktāni sarva vyādhi bhaiṣajyāni bhavanti
etaiḥ pañca pratīkaiḥ sarva vyādhīnām abhimantraṇam kriyate
pañca pratīkānām anyatamena ekena abhimantraṇam kuryāt iti arthaḥ
atha aṃhaḥ liṅga gaṇena sarva vyādhi bhaiṣajyam kriyate
aṃhaḥ liṅga gaṇena uda pātram sampātya abhimantrya sarva vyādhiṣu āplāvayati
aṃhaḥ liṅga gaṇena udakam abhimantrya vyādhitam avasiñcati
aṃhaḥ liṅga gaṇena mṛttikām abhimantrya pāyayati sarva vyādhiṣu
aṃhaḥ liṅga gaṇena mṛttikām abhimantrya vyādhitam ālimpati
aṃhaḥ liṅga gaṇena prameha maṇim badhnāti sarva vyādhiṣu
aṃhaḥ liṅga gaṇena ākhu mṛttikām abhimantrya pāyayati sarva vyādhi bhaiṣajyeṣu

original: aṃholiṅgena gaṇena pūtīkān piṣṭvābhimantrya pāyayati sarvavyādhiṣu /
analyzed: aṃhaḥ liṅgena gaṇena pūtīkān piṣṭvā abhimantrya pāyayati sarva vyādhiṣu

original: aṃholiṅgena gaṇena pramandaṃ piṣṭvābhimantrya pāyayati sarvavyādhiṣu /
analyzed: aṃhaḥ liṅgena gaṇena pramandam piṣṭvā abhimantrya pāyayati sarva vyādhiṣu
aṃhaḥ liṅgena gaṇena avatakṣaṇāni piṣṭvā abhimantrya pāyayati
aṃhaḥ liṅgena gaṇena eteṣām dravyāṇām āsthāpayati pāyayati ca
aṃhaḥ liṅgena gaṇena yānam sampātya abhimantrya ārohayati
atra sarvatra iṣum visṛjati iti ca yojanīyam

original: ājyatantramabhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvāṃholiṅgena gaṇenodapātraṃ sampātavantaṃ kṛtvā tena vyādhideśaṃ sammārṣṭi /
analyzed: ājya tantram abhyātāna antam kṛtvā aṃhaḥ liṅgena gaṇena uda pātram sampātavantam kṛtvā tena vyādhi deśam sammārṣṭi
aṃhaḥ liṅgena gaṇena pālāśa ādayaḥ samidhaḥ ādadhāti
aṃhaḥ liṅgena gaṇena pālāśa samidhaḥ soma rasa aktāḥ ādadhāti

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvāṃholiṅgena gaṇenodapātraṃ sampātya tenodakena samprokṣati /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā aṃhaḥ liṅgena gaṇena uda pātram sampātya tena udakena samprokṣati

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvāṃholiṅgena saptabhiḥ pratīkairudapātraṃ sampātyābhimantrya vyādhitamāplāvayati /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā aṃhaḥ liṅgena saptabhiḥ pratīkaiḥ uda pātram sampātya abhimantrya vyādhitam āplāvayati

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvāṃholiṅgena gaṇena sapta kāmpīlapuṭānudakena pūrayitvā sampātyābhimantrya pratyṛcaṃ vyādhitamavasiñcati paścādapavidhyati  #
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā aṃhaḥ liṅgena gaṇena sapta kāmpīla puṭān udakena pūrayitvā sampātya abhimantrya pratyṛcam vyādhitam avasiñcati paścāt apavidhyati  /

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvāṃholiṅgena gaṇena catura udapātre sampātānānayati dvau pṛthivyāmāvapati tau pratyāhṛtyāplāvayati /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā aṃhaḥ liṅgena gaṇena caturaḥ uda pātre sampātān ānayati dvau pṛthivyām āvapati tau pratyāhṛtya āplāvayati
abhyātāna antam kṛtvā aṃhaḥ liṅgena gaṇena uda pātram sampātya abhimantrya āplāvayati

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvāṃholiṅgena gaṇenodapātre yavān prakṣipya sampātyābhimantryāplāvayati pūrvavat /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā aṃhaḥ liṅgena gaṇena uda pātre yavān prakṣipya sampātya abhimantrya āplāvayati pūrvavat

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvāṃholiṅgena gaṇenodapātre sayave caturaḥ sampātānānayati dvau pṛthivyāṃ tau pratyāhṛtyāplāvayati /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā aṃhaḥ liṅgena gaṇena uda pātre sa yave caturaḥ sampātān ānayati dvau pṛthivyām tau pratyāhṛtya āplāvayati

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā aṃholiṅgena yavamaṇiṃ sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā aṃhaḥ liṅgena yava maṇim sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti
ākṛtiloṣṭa valmīke uddhṛtam udakam lājāḥ evamādi abhimantrya pāyayati
abhyātāna antam kṛtvā aṃhaḥ liṅgena uda pātram sampātya abhimantrya piñjūlībhiḥ āplāvayati

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvāṃholiṅgena gaṇenodapātraṃ sampātyābhimantrya mauñjaiḥ pāśaiḥ parvasu
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā aṃhaḥ liṅgena gaṇena uda pātram sampātya abhimantrya mauñjaiḥ pāśaiḥ parvasu
abhyātāna antam kṛtvā aṃhaḥ liṅga gaṇena dvābhyām uda pātram sampātya abhimantrya āplāvayati

original: aṃholiṅgena mauñjaiḥ parvasu baddhvā darbhamaṇiṃ sahodakamabhimantryāvasiñcati /
analyzed: aṃhaḥ liṅgena mauñjaiḥ parvasu baddhvā darbha maṇim saha udakam abhimantrya avasiñcati
aṃhaḥ liṅgena gaṇena udakam abhimantrya ācamayati
aṃhaḥ liṅgena gaṇena āla bisolam phāṇṭam pāyayati
aṃhaḥ liṅgena trapusa musala khadira tārṣṭāghānām samidhaḥ ādadhāti
aṃhaḥ liṅgena khādirān āyasa lohān ca śaṅkūn abhimantrya nikhanati
yavān sakṛt gṛhītān an apahatān a pratīhāra piṣṭān ābhicārikam paristīrya juhoti
aṃhaḥ liṅgena medaḥ madhu sarpiḥ tailam abhimantrya pāyayati
aṃhaḥ liṅgena vīriṇa tūla miśram iṅgiḍam prapuṭena juhoti
aṃhaḥ liṅgena yava maṇim varaṇa maṇim pṛśniparṇī mūrdhnisampāta śākala maṇim āplāvanam bahis visarjanam

original: kāṇḍamaṇiṃ yavapalālamaṇiṃ tilapiñjikāmaṇimākṛtiloṣṭavalmīka- jīvakoṣaṇyā veṣṭitamaṇiṃ badhnātītyādi /
analyzed: kāṇḍa maṇim yava palāla maṇim tila piñjikā maṇim ākṛtiloṣṭa valmīka jīva koṣaṇyā veṣṭita maṇim badhnāti ityādi
apsaraḥ gandharva yakṣa rākṣasa piśāca asureṣu jvareṣu
putra duhituḥ asajāta asagotrāṇām ākrośa roge
go aśva puruṣeṣu rogeṣu saha utpanneṣu
śarīra puruṣa strīṇām śva aja avi hasti nādiṣu kṛmi rogeṣu
putra duhituḥ asajāta asagotrāṇām ākrośa roge
sada asthi naja śva ābādha maṇi pāṇima vāta rogeṣu
dharma artha kāmeṣu śūnya buddhiṣu trivarga śūnyeṣu puruṣeṣu roge
graha nakṣatra vivakṣā artham bandha hiraṇyaḥ ca tatra ariṣṭa abhighāta roge

original: dāne dravyatyāge pratigrahe yājane adhyayane'dhyāpane'yājyayājane rogeṣūtpanneṣu /
analyzed: dāne dravya tyāge pratigrahe yājane adhyayane dhyāpane yājya yājane rogeṣu utpanneṣu
sarpa viṣa aupaviṣa kanda viṣa ādiṣu
sarpa kṛkavāku mayūra cakravāka kāka kapota śyena gṛdhra hariṇa vyāghra citraka tarakṣa ṛkṣa mahiṣa go śva mārjāra sarveṣu mṛgeṣu sarveṣu pakṣiṣu abhighāteṣu
udare nābhyām kaṇṭhe grīvāyām cāru gṛhīte
nābhi grīvā nāsikā pāda karṇa danta ādi vṛddhiṣu
visphoṭaka apāpa roga kuṣṭha kṣaya śvitra udumbara ādiṣu kuṣṭheṣu
phala mūla patra śāka ārdra māṃsa taila ghṛta vyañjanam iṣṭa anna bhojaneṣu rogeṣu

original: atha bhaiṣajyāni paṭhitāni tāni sarvāṇyaṃholiṅgena sarvavyādhiṣu kartavyāni /
analyzed: atha bhaiṣajyāni paṭhitāni tāni sarvāṇi aṃhaḥ liṅgena sarva vyādhiṣu kartavyāni
abhyātāna antam kṛtvā aṃhaḥ liṅgena gaṇena uda pātram sampātya udakena valīḥ vimārṣṭi

original: tantraṃ kṛtvāṃholiṅgena gaṇena muñjaśiro rajjvā badhnāti /
analyzed: tantram kṛtvā aṃhaḥ liṅgena gaṇena muñja śiraḥ rajjvā badhnāti
abhyātāna antam kṛtvā aṃhaḥ liṅgena pramehaṇam badhnāti
athavā aṃhaḥ liṅgena gaṇena kartavyāni sarvāṇi
ājyam juhoti iti evamādi sarva bhaiṣajyam

original: yānīha karmāṇi paṭhitāni tāni sarvāṇyaṃholiṅgena kartavyāni /
analyzed: yāni iha karmāṇi paṭhitāni tāni sarvāṇi aṃhaḥ liṅgena kartavyāni

original: yāni vaidyakeṣvajīrṇaprabhavāni rogajātāni carakabāhaḍasuśruteṣu paṭhyante teṣu tatpaṭhitāni sarvāṇi vyādhiṣvauṣadhāni /
analyzed: yāni vaidyakeṣu ajīrṇa prabhavāni roga jātāni caraka bāhaḍa suśruteṣu paṭhyante teṣu tad paṭhitāni sarvāṇi vyādhiṣu auṣadhāni
ajīrṇa prabhavāḥ rogāḥ iti sambhave kāryāṇi
dhūpana snāna abhyañjana mardana pathya bhojana vilepana vipula añjana avasecana śayana ādīni tāni aṃhaḥ liṅgena saṃskartavyāni
abhimantraṇam saṃskāraḥ sarvatra kartavyaḥ iti arthaḥ
yāni sva śāstra paṭhitāni tāni aṃhaḥ liṅgena kartavyāni

original: paraśāstrapaṭhitāni vaidyakapaṭhitāni ca tāni sarvāṇi kartavyāni /
analyzed: para śāstra paṭhitāni vaidyaka paṭhitāni ca tāni sarvāṇi kartavyāni
oṣadhibandhanam paṭhitam tat aṃhaḥ liṅgena gaṇena kartavyam
ājya tantra madhye sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti

original: tatraivoktaṃ khananavidhānena bandhanaṃ ca sarvatra 'āśyabandhyāplavanayānabhakṣyāṇi sampātavanti' 'sarvāṇyabhimantryāṇi' (KauśS 7.15-16)
analyzed: tatra eva uktam khanana vidhānena bandhanam ca sarvatra āśya bandhyā plavana yāna bhakṣyāṇi sampātavanti sarvāṇi abhimantryāṇi kauśs
tathā ca uktam srajena oṣadhi khananam vyākhyātam kauśs
vaidyaka jyotiṣa purāṇeṣu bandhana pāyana snāna ādiṣu aṃhaḥ liṅgaḥ sarvatra prayoktavyaḥ
hasti vaidyaka aśva vaidyakeṣu uktam etat eva bhaiṣajyam
anyathā kriyamāṇe dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭeṣu upakāraḥ na asti
śūdreṇa eva jyotiṣṭome na dṛṣṭam na api a dṛṣṭam
dvividhāḥ vyādhayaḥ āhāra nimittāḥ adharma nimittāḥ ca
āhāreṇa vyādhiḥ utpadyate yaḥ tatra vaidyakam
adharmeṇa utpanne vyādhau veda uktena vidhānena adharma śamanam bhavati

original: iti yāni sūktāni bhaiṣajyāni kānicitpaṭhitāni tāni sarvāṇyupadhāne upasthāne ca viniyojyāni tatra tatra vyādhau rudrabhāṣyamate /
analyzed: iti yāni sūktāni bhaiṣajyāni kānicid paṭhitāni tāni sarvāṇi upadhāne upasthāne ca viniyojyāni tatra tatra vyādhau rudrabhāṣya mate
upadadhīta iti anādeśe ājya samidh puroḍāśa payaḥ oda odana pāyasa paśu vrīhi yava tila dhānā karambha śaṣkulyaḥ etāni havīṃṣi jānīyāt
pūrvasya putra kāma avatokayoḥ udaka ante śāntāḥ adhiśiras uvasiñcati

original: putrakāmāyai striyai mṛtāpatyāyai ca rajonāśe ca śāntirucyate /
analyzed: putra kāmāyai striyai mṛta apatyāyai ca rajaḥ nāśe ca śāntiḥ ucyate
iti sūktena śānta oṣadhim saha udakam abhimantrya strīm avasiñcati
āvrajitāyai puroḍāśa pramanda alaṅkārān sampātavataḥ prayacchati

original: tato'bhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'ye triṣaptāḥ' iti sūktena puroḍāśapramandālaṅkārān sampātavataḥ kṛtvā prayacchati bhakṣaṇārthaṃ krīḍanārthaṃ bandhanārtham
analyzed: tatobhyātāna antam kṛtvā ye triṣaptāḥ iti sūktena puroḍāśa pramanda alaṅkārān sampātavataḥ kṛtvā prayacchati bhakṣaṇa artham krīḍana artham bandhana artham
putra kāma amṛta apatyayoḥ rajaḥ nāśe ca samāptam idam karma
atha prasava kāle idam karma kriyate
yathā sukhena eva prasavaḥ bhavati iti arthaḥ

original: iti catura udapātre sampātānānīya caturo muñjān mūrdhni vivṛhati prācaḥ // KauśS_4,9{33}.1 //]
analyzed: iti caturaḥ uda pātre sampātān ānīya caturaḥ muñjān mūrdhni vivṛhati prācaḥ

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'vaṣaṭ te pūṣan' iti sūktenoṣṇodake caturo'psu sampātānānayati /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā vaṣaṭ te pūṣan iti sūktena uṣṇa udake caturaḥ upsu sampātān ānayati

original: caturo muñjajātāniṣīkān garbhiṇyā mūrdhni tatra pṛthak vivṛhati / tata
analyzed: caturaḥ muñja jātān iṣīkān garbhiṇyāḥ mūrdhni tatra pṛthak vivṛhati tata
tatas paścāt eva abhimukhaḥ iṣīkāḥ niḥsārayati

original: chidyamānāsu muñjeṣīkāsu garbhasya maraṇaṃ bhavet / ekaṃ karma //
analyzed: chidyamānāsu muñja iṣīkāsu garbhasya maraṇam bhavet ekam karma

original: 'vaṣaṭ te pūṣan' iti sūktaṃ japitvā śālāgranthīn vicṛtati mocayati /
analyzed: vaṣaṭ te pūṣan iti sūktam japitvā śālā granthīn vicṛtati mocayati

original: 'vaṣaṭ te pūṣan' iti sūktena yoktramabhimantrya kaṭipradeśe badhnāti /
analyzed: vaṣaṭ te pūṣan iti sūktena yoktram abhimantrya kaṭi pradeśe badhnāti

original: kecit 'vaṣaṭ te pūṣan' iti sūktena tailamabhimantryābhyañjanaṃ kurvanti prasavakāle / caturthī //
analyzed: kecid vaṣaṭ te pūṣan iti sūktena tailam abhimantrya abhyañjanam kurvanti prasava kāle caturthī

original: [yadi somasyāsi rājñaḥ somāttvā rājño'dhi krīṇāmi yadi varuṇasyāsi rājño varuṇāttvā rājño'dhi krīṇāmi ityekaviṃśatyā yavaiḥ srajaṃ parikirati
analyzed: yadi somasya asi rājñaḥ somāt tvā rājñaḥ adhi krīṇāmi yadi varuṇasya asi rājñaḥ varuṇāt tvā rājñaḥ adhi krīṇāmi iti ekaviṃśatyā yavaiḥ srajam parikirati

original: 'yadi somasyāsi rājñaḥ' iti mantreṇaikaviṃśatyā yavairoṣadhyupari prakirati //
analyzed: yadi somasya asi rājñaḥ iti mantreṇa ekaviṃśatyā yavaiḥ oṣadhi upari prakirati
anyā vaḥ anyām avatu anyā anyasyai upāvata

original: sadhrīcīḥ savratā bhūtvāsyā avata vīryam iti sannayati // KauśS_4,9{33}.8 //]
analyzed: sadhrīcīḥ savratāḥ bhūtvā asyāḥ avata vīryam iti san nayati
anyā vaḥ anyām avaḥ iti oṣadhyā sa yavam ekatra badhnāti

original: [mā te riṣatkhanitā yasmai ca tvā khanāmasi /
analyzed: mā te riṣat khanitā yasmai ca tvā khanāmasi
dvipād catuṣpād asmākam mā riṣat devi oṣadhe
prajāpatiḥ tvā amakhanat ātmane śalya sraṃsanam

original: tāṃ tvā vayaṃ khanāmasyamuṣmai tvā śalyasraṃsanam ityastamite chatreṇa cāntardhāya phālena khanati // KauśS_4,9{33}.9 //]
analyzed: tām tvā vayam khanāmasi amuṣmai tvā śalya sraṃsanam iti astamite chatreṇa ca antardhāya phālena khanati

original: 'mā te riṣatkhanitā' iti mantreṇa lohaphālena khanati //
analyzed: mā te riṣat khanitā iti mantreṇa loha phālena khanati
atra tava rādhyatām iti agram avadadhāti

original: 'atra tava rādhyatām' iti mantreṇauṣadhyagraṃ tatraiva dadhāti //
analyzed: atra tava rādhyatām iti mantreṇa oṣadhi agram tatra eva dadhāti

original: 'iha mama rādhyatām' iti mantreṇa mūlaṃ gṛhṇāti /
analyzed: iha mama rādhyatām iti mantreṇa mūlam gṛhṇāti

original: gṛhītvā 'vaṣaṭ te pūṣan' iti sūktenauṣadhīmabhimantrya garbhiṇyāḥ śirasi nidadhāti //
analyzed: gṛhītvā vaṣaṭ te pūṣan iti sūktena oṣadhīm abhimantrya garbhiṇyāḥ śirasi nidadhāti
darbheṇa veṣṭayitvā rātrau oṣadhi khananam karoti
sarvatra oṣadhi khananam anena vidhānena kartavyam

original: yatra kvacidoṣadhikhananaṃ tatra sarvatrānena vidhānena kartavyam /
analyzed: yatra kvacid oṣadhi khananam tatra sarvatra anena vidhānena kartavyam
sva śāstre para śāstre ca vaidyaka ādyeṣu sarvatra
srajena oṣadhi khananam vyākhyātam iti vacanāt

original: ekaṃ vā dve vā sarvāṇi vā kuryāt /
analyzed: ekam vā dve vā sarvāṇi vā kuryāt

original: oṣadhivat srajamūlaṃ khātvā 'vaṣaṭ te pūṣan' ityabhimantrya śirasi vicṛtati /
analyzed: oṣadhi vat sraja mūlam khātvā vaṣaṭ te pūṣan iti abhimantrya śirasi vicṛtati

original: oṣadhivad vrīhimūlaṃ khātvā 'vaṣaṭ te pūṣan' ityabhimantrya dadāti /
analyzed: oṣadhi vat vrīhi mūlam khātvā vaṣaṭ te pūṣan iti abhimantrya dadāti

original: oṣadhivat kākajaṅghāmūlaṃ khātvā 'vaṣaṭ te' ityabhimantrya śirasyupari dadāti //
analyzed: oṣadhi vat kākajaṅghā mūlam khātvā vaṣaṭ te iti abhimantrya śirasi upari dadāti

original: 'vaṣaṭ te' iti sūktena catvāryaudumbaraphalāni haste kṛtvā tata udakaṃ prakṣipya tato nirīkṣate //
analyzed: vaṣaṭ te iti sūktena catvāri audumbara phalāni haste kṛtvā tatas udakam prakṣipya tatas nirīkṣate

original: yadi tānyekatra bhavati tadā putro jāyate /
analyzed: yadi tāni ekatra bhavati tadā putraḥ jāyate

original: 'vaṣaṭ te pūṣan' iti sūktena brāhmaṇamabhimantrya tataḥ sa garbhiṇyā aṅgānyabhimṛśati //
analyzed: vaṣaṭ te pūṣan iti sūktena brāhmaṇam abhimantrya tatas sa garbhiṇyāḥ aṅgāni abhimṛśati

original: yadi punnāmadheyaṃ spṛśati tadā kumāro jāyate /
analyzed: yadi put nāmadheyam spṛśati tadā kumāraḥ jāyate

original: ebhiḥ karmabhiḥ kṛtaiḥ garbhiṇyāḥ sukhena prasavo bhavatītyarthaḥ //
analyzed: ebhiḥ karmabhiḥ kṛtaiḥ garbhiṇyāḥ sukhena prasavaḥ bhavati iti arthaḥ
iti asyai śiṃśapā śākhāsu udaka ante śāntāḥ adhiśiras uvasiñcati

original: 'idaṃ janāsaḥ' iti sūktena śiṃśapāśākhāsūpaviṣṭāyai śāntyauṣadhisahitamudakamabhimantrya vandhyāmavasiñcati //
analyzed: idam janāsaḥ iti sūktena śiṃśapā śākhāsu upaviṣṭāyai śāntya oṣadhi sahitam udakam abhimantrya vandhyām avasiñcati

original: tato gṛhe'bhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'idaṃ janāsaḥ' iti sūktena puroḍāśapramandālaṅkārān sampātavataḥ prayacchati /
analyzed: tatas gṛhebhyātāna antam kṛtvā idam janāsaḥ iti sūktena puroḍāśa pramanda alaṅkārān sampātavataḥ prayacchati
samāptam vandhyā kākavandhyā ca prajanana karma
atha mṛta apatyāyāḥ stryāḥ tasyāḥ śāntiḥ ucyate

original: [niḥsālām (2.14) ityavatokāyai kṛṣṇavasanāyai triṣu vimiteṣu prāgdvārapratyagdvāreṣvapsu sampātānānayati // KauśS_4,10{34}.3 //]
analyzed: niḥsālām iti avatokāyai kṛṣṇa vasanāyai triṣu vimiteṣu prāc dvāra pratyak dvāreṣu apsu sampātān ānayati

original: garbhāstrāve jātamātre mṛte vā stryāṃ vā puruṣe vā bāle vā yūni vā mṛte idaṃ karma /
analyzed: garbhāstrāve jāta mātre mṛte vā stryām vā puruṣe vā bāle vā yūni vā mṛte idam karma

original: trīṇi maṇḍapāni prāgdvārāṇi kṛtvaikasmin maṇḍape'bhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'niḥsālām' iti sūktena tataḥ strī kṛṣṇaṃ vāsaḥ paridhāya //
analyzed: trīṇi maṇḍapāni prāc dvārāṇi kṛtvā ekasmin maṇḍapebhyātāna antam kṛtvā niḥsālām iti sūktena tatas strī kṛṣṇam vāsaḥ paridhāya

original: tata udapātre sampātyābhimantrya palāśapatre sīsaṃ kṛtvā sīseṣūttarasampātānānayati //
analyzed: tatas uda pātre sampātya abhimantrya palāśa patre sīsam kṛtvā sīseṣu uttara sampātān ānayati
sīseṣu upari strīm adhiṣṭhāpya tena uda pātreṇa āplāvayati
tatas uttara tantram kṛtvā maṇḍapam agninā jvālayati

original: tata dvitīyamaṇḍapa evaṃ kṛtvā śvetavastraṃ paridhānaṃ kṛtvā śiṃśapāśākhāsūpaveśya strīṃ 'niḥsālām' iti sūktena śāntauṣadhibhistadudakamabhimantryāvasiñcati  #
analyzed: tata dvitīya maṇḍape evam kṛtvā śveta vastram paridhānam kṛtvā śiṃśapā śākhāsu upaveśya strīm niḥsālām iti sūktena śānta oṣadhibhiḥ tat udakam abhimantrya avasiñcati  /

original: tato gṛha āgatyājyatantraṃ kṛtvā 'niḥsālām' iti sūktena puroḍāśapramandālaṅkārān sampātavataḥ prayacchati /
analyzed: tatas gṛhe āgatya ājya tantram kṛtvā niḥsālām iti sūktena puroḍāśa pramanda alaṅkārān sampātavataḥ prayacchati

original: [paścādagnerabhitaḥ kāṇḍe iṣīke nidhāyādhyadhi dhāyine audumbarīrādhāpayati // KauśS_4,10{34}.10 //]
analyzed: paścāt agneḥ abhitas kāṇḍe iṣīke nidhāya adhi adhi dhāyine audumbarīḥ ādhāpayati

original: ekaṃ maṇḍapaṃ kṛtvā prākpaścimadvāre iṣīkāṃ dvāryopari baddhvā tato 'niḥsālām' iti sūktenaudumbarīḥ samidho mṛtāpatyāyai ādadhāti /
analyzed: ekam maṇḍapam kṛtvā prāc paścima dvāre iṣīkām dvāryā upari baddhvā tatas niḥsālām iti sūktena audumbarīḥ samidhaḥ mṛta apatyāyai ādadhāti
tatas niḥsālām iti sūktena udaka ante śānta oṣadhi saha udakam abhimantrya avasiñcati

original: tato gṛhe'bhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'niḥsālām' iti sūktena puroḍāśapramandālaṅkārān sampātavataḥ prayacchati /
analyzed: tatas gṛhebhyātāna antam kṛtvā niḥsālām iti sūktena puroḍāśa pramanda alaṅkārān sampātavataḥ prayacchati

original: garbhapatite bālamaraṇe yuvāne vā mṛte ekasmin vā mṛte bahuṣu vā mṛteṣu strīṇāṃ śāntiḥ kartavyā //
analyzed: garbha patite bāla maraṇe yuvāne vā mṛte ekasmin vā mṛte bahuṣu vā mṛteṣu strīṇām śāntiḥ kartavyā
ā naḥ agne iti āgama kṛsaram āśayati

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'ā no agne' iti sūktenāgamakṛśaraṃ sampātyābhimantryāśayati kumārīm /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā ā naḥ agne iti sūktena āgama kṛsaram sampātya abhimantrya āśayati kumārīm
mṛga ākharāt vedyām mantra uktāni sampātavanti dvāre prayacchati
mṛga ākhara mṛttikāyāḥ vedim kṛtvā abhyātāna antam samānam

original: 'ā no agne' iti sūktena hiraṇyālaṅkārān guggulamaukṣaṃ ca yathoktān sampātya bandhanaṃ dhūpanaṃ pralepanaṃ karoti kumāryāḥ /
analyzed: ā naḥ agne iti sūktena hiraṇya alaṅkārān guggula maukṣam ca yathā uktān sampātya bandhanam dhūpanam pralepanam karoti kumāryāḥ
āvapet surabhiḥ gandhān kṣīre sarpiḥ tathā udake
etat āyanam iti āhuḥ aukṣam tu madhunā saha

original: [udakaṃse vrīhiyavau jāmyai niśi hutvā dakṣiṇena prakrāmati // KauśS_4,10{34}.15 //]
analyzed: uda kaṃse vrīhi yavau jāmyai niśi hutvā dakṣiṇena prakrāmati

original: 'ā no agne' iti sūktena kāṃsyapātre udakasahite vrīhiyavau gṛhītvā pratyṛcaṃ juhoti rātrau /
analyzed: ā naḥ agne iti sūktena kāṃsya pātre udaka sahite vrīhi yavau gṛhītvā pratyṛcam juhoti rātrau

original: tato dakṣiṇāmukhīṃ kumārīṃ prakrāmati / tantraṃ vā //
analyzed: tatas dakṣiṇā mukhīm kumārīm prakrāmati tantram vā
paścāt agneḥ prakṣālya sandhāvya sampātavatīm bhagasya nāvam

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'ā no agne' iti sūktena nāvaṃ sampātyodake kṛtvā kumārīṃ caṭāpayitvā 'bhagasya nāvam' ityṛcā
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā ā naḥ agne iti sūktena nāvam sampātya udake kṛtvā kumārīm caṭāpayitvā bhagasya nāvam iti ṛcā

original: [saptadāmnyāṃ sampātavatyāṃ vatsān pratyantān pracṛtanto vahanti // KauśS_4,10{34}.17 //]
analyzed: sapta dāmnyām sampātavatyām vatsān pratyantān pracṛtantaḥ vahanti

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'ā no agne' iti sūktena saptadāmatantryāṃ sampātavatyāṃ vatsān bandhayitvābhimantrya kumārī mocayati svayaṃ na kartā /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā ā naḥ agne iti sūktena sapta dām a tantryām sampātavatyām vatsān bandhayitvā abhimantrya kumārī mocayati svayam na kartā
yadi pradakṣiṇam mocayati tadā pati lābhaḥ

original: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'ā no agne' iti sūktenāhatavastreṇa veṣṭitaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ sampātyābhimantrya visarjayati /
analyzed: tantram kṛtvā ā naḥ agne iti sūktena ahata vastreṇa veṣṭitam vṛṣabham sampātya abhimantrya visarjayati
pra yat ete prataram iti ṛcā āgama kṛsaram sampātya abhimantrya āśayati
imāḥ brahma iti ṛcā āgama kṛsaram sampātya abhimantrya āśayati

original: [ayamā yāti (6.60) iti purā kākasampātādaryamṇe juhoti // KauśS_4,10{34}.22 //]
analyzed: ayamā yāti iti purā kāka sampātāt aryamṇe juhoti
ayamā yāti iti sūktena ājyam juhoti

original: tataḥ 'aryamṇe' ityardharcena gṛhābhyantare koṇe baliharaṇaṃ karoti /
analyzed: tatas aryamṇe iti ardharcena gṛha abhyantare koṇe bali haraṇam karoti

original: yataḥ kāka āgacchati tata āgacchati varaḥ /
analyzed: yatas kākaḥ āgacchati tatas āgacchati varaḥ

original: [yena vehat (3.23) iti bāṇaṃ mūrdhni vivṛhati badhnāti // KauśS_4,11{35}.3 //]
analyzed: yena vehat iti bāṇam mūrdhni vivṛhati badhnāti

original: 'yena vehat' iti sūktena bāṇamabhimantrya strīmūrdhni vivṛhati puṇyāhānte /
analyzed: yena vehat iti sūktena bāṇam abhimantrya strī mūrdhni vivṛhati puṇyāha ante

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'yena vehat' iti sūktena śaramaṇiṃ sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti puṇyāhānte /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā yena vehat iti sūktena śara maṇim sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti puṇyāha ante

original: [phālacamase sarūpavatsāyā dugdhe vrīhiyavāvavadhāya mūrchayitvādhyaṇḍe bṛhatīpalāśavidaryau vā pratinīya paidvamiva // KauśS_4,11{35}.4 //]
analyzed: phāla camase sarūpa vatsāyāḥ dugdhe vrīhi yavau avadhāya mūrchayitvā adhyaṇḍe bṛhatī palāśa vidaryau vā pratinīya paidvam iva

original: 'yena vehat' iti sūktena phālacamase sārūpavatsāyā dugdhe vrīhiyavāvavadhāya mūrcchayitvādhyaṇḍe
analyzed: yena vehat iti sūktena phāla camase sārūpavatsāyāḥ dugdhe vrīhi yavau avadhāya mūrcchayitvā adhyaṇḍe

original: bṛhatīpalāśavidaryau vā ekatra piṣṭvābhimantrya dakṣiṇenāṅguṣṭhena dakṣiṇasyāṃ nāsikāyāṃ nastaṃ dadāti /
analyzed: bṛhatī palāśa vidaryau vai ekatra piṣṭvā abhimantrya dakṣiṇena aṅguṣṭhena dakṣiṇasyām nāsikāyām nastam dadāti
putra artham karma puṃsavanam iti ucyate

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'parvatāddivaḥ' iti sūktenāgamakṛśaraṃ carudvayaṃ śrapayitvaikaṃ caruṃ sampātyābhimantrya dvitīyaṃ caruṃ yugachidreṇa sampātyābhimantrya  #
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā parvatāt divaḥ iti sūktena āgama kṛśaram caru dvayam śrapayitvā ekam carum sampātya abhimantrya dvitīyam carum yuga chidreṇa sampātya abhimantrya

original: [khe lūnāṃśca palāśatsarūn nivṛtte nighṛṣyādhāya śiśne grāmaṃ praviśati // KauśS_4,11{35}.7 //]
analyzed: khe lūnān ca palāśa tsarūn nivṛtte nighṛṣya ādhāya śiśne grāmam praviśati

original: kelūnāṃśca palāśatsarūn nivṛtte nighṛṣya 'parvatāddivaḥ' iti sūktenābhimantrya śiśne ādhāya /
analyzed: kelūnān ca palāśa tsarūn nivṛtte nighṛṣya parvatāt divaḥ iti sūktena abhimantrya śiśne ādhāya

original: iti mantrokte'gniṃ mathitvā puṃsyāḥ sarpiṣi paidvamiva // KauśS_4,11{35}.8 //]
analyzed: iti mantra ukta ignim mathitvā puṃsyāḥ sarpiṣi paidvam iva

original: 'śamīmaśvatthaḥ' iti sūktenāgniṃ mathitvā tato'gniṃ sarpiṣi nikṣipya ghṛtamabhimantrya stryā dakṣiṇanāsikāyāṃ nastaṃ dadāti dakṣiṇenāṅguṣṭhena
analyzed: śamīm aśvatthaḥ iti sūktena agnim mathitvā tatas agnim sarpiṣi nikṣipya ghṛtam abhimantrya stryāḥ dakṣiṇa nāsikāyām nastam dadāti dakṣiṇena aṅguṣṭhena

original: tato'gniṃ mathitvā tato madhumanthe'gniṃ nikṣipya 'śamīmaśvatthaḥ' iti sūktenābhimantrya pāyayati strīm //
analyzed: tatas agnim mathitvā tatas madhumanthe ignim nikṣipya śamīm aśvatthaḥ iti sūktena abhimantrya pāyayati strīm

original: 'śamīmaśvatthaḥ' iti sūktena śamīgarbhāśvatthasyāgniṃ kṛṣṇorṇayā veṣṭayitvā sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: śamīm aśvatthaḥ iti sūktena śamīgarbha aśvatthasya agnim kṛṣṇa ūrṇayā veṣṭayitvā sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti

original: 'yantāsi' iti sūktena hastāvartaṃ kaṅkaṇādikaṃ sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: yantāsi iti sūktena hasta āvartam kaṅkaṇa ādikam sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti

original: jambhagṛhītāya prathamāvarjaṃ jyāṃ trirudgrathya badhnāti // KauśS_4,11{35}.13 //]
analyzed: jambha gṛhītāya prathama varjam jyām tris udgrathya badhnāti
ṛdhak mantraḥ iti ekayā dhanuḥ jyām tris udgrathya sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti

original: dvābhyāṃ dhanurjyāṃ trirudgrathya sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti striyāḥ /
analyzed: dvābhyām dhanuḥ jyām tris udgrathya sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti striyāḥ
ṛdhak mantraḥ iti ekayā kṣetra loṣṭa mṛttikām abhimantrya prāśayati

original: 'yatheyaṃ pṛthivī' 'acyutā' iti sūktābhyāṃ kṣetraloṣṭamṛttikāmabhimantrya prāśayati garbhiṇīṃ pratyṛcam //
analyzed: yathā iyam pṛthivī acyutā iti sūktābhyām kṣetra loṣṭa mṛttikām abhimantrya prāśayati garbhiṇīm pratyṛcam

original: 'ṛdhaṅmantraḥ' ityekayā kṛṣṇasikatā abhimantrya garbhiṇyāḥ śayanaṃ parikirati /
analyzed: ṛdhak mantraḥ iti ekayā kṛṣṇa sikatāḥ abhimantrya garbhiṇyāḥ śayanam parikirati

original: 'yatheyaṃ pṛthivī' 'acyutā' iti sūktābhyāṃ śyāmasikatā abhimantrya pratyṛcaṃ garbhiṇyāḥ śayanaṃ parikirati /
analyzed: yathā iyam pṛthivī acyutā iti sūktābhyām śyāma sikatāḥ abhimantrya pratyṛcam garbhiṇyāḥ śayanam parikirati
yām icchet vīram janayet iti dhātarvyābhiḥ udaram abhimantrayate
brāhmaṇa kṣatriya vaiśya śūdrāṇām jāti adharma sva jāti adharma bala vīrya ādi yuktāḥ putrāḥ bhavanti

original: 'prajāpatirjanayatu' iti sūktena prajākāmāyāḥ striya utsaṅge ājyaṃ juhoti /
analyzed: prajāpatiḥ janayatu iti sūktena prajā kāmāyāḥ striyaḥ utsaṅge ājyam juhoti
abhyātāna antam kṛtvā prajāpatiḥ janayatu iti ṛcā rakta chāga māṃsam sampātya abhimantrya aśnāti

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'prajāpatiḥ' ityṛcodakulijaṃ sampātavantaṃ kṛtvā garbhiṇīṃ parihṛtya madhye ninayati /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā prajāpatiḥ iti ṛcā uda kulijam sampātavantam kṛtvā garbhiṇīm parihṛtya madhye ninayati
surā kulijam sampātya strīm parihṛtya agre ninayati

original: bhaktaṃ surāṃ prapāṃ sampātyābhimantrya prajākāmāyai prayacchati tantre / samāptaṃ
analyzed: bhaktam surām prapām sampātya abhimantrya prajā kāmāyai prayacchati tantre samāptam

original: [yau te mātā (8.6) iti mantroktau badhnāti // KauśS_4,11{35}.20 //]
analyzed: yau te mātā iti mantra uktau badhnāti

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'yau te mātā' ityarthasūktena śvetapītasarṣapān sampātyābhimantrya puṇyāhānte badhnāti /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā yau te mātau iti artha sūktena śveta pīta sarṣapān sampātya abhimantrya puṇyāha ante badhnāti
iti saṃspṛṣṭayoḥ vṛkṣa libujayoḥ śakalau antara iṣu sthakara añjana kuṣṭha madugha reṣma mathita tṛṇam ājyena sannīya saṃspṛśati

original: vṛkṣatvak śarakhaṇḍaṃ tagaramañjanaṃ kuṣṭhaṃ jyeṣṭhīmadhu śleṣmavātasaṃśrayagatatṛṇametāni
analyzed: vṛkṣa tvac śara khaṇḍam tagaram añjanam kuṣṭham jyeṣṭhī madhu śleṣma vāta saṃśraya gata tṛṇam etāni

original: dravyāṇyājyamadhye peṣayitvā 'yathedaṃ bhūmyāḥ' iti sūktenābhimantrya striyā aṅgaṃ samālabhate /
analyzed: dravyāṇi ājya madhye peṣayitvā yathā idam bhūmyāḥ iti sūktena abhimantrya striyāḥ aṅgam samālabhate

original: 'yathā vṛkṣaṃ libujā' 'vāñcha me tanvam' iti sūktābhyāṃ vṛkṣatvak tagaramañjanaṃ kuṣṭhaṃ jyeṣṭhīmadhu vātasambhramatṛṇānyetāni dravyāṇyājyenāloḍyābhimantrya  #
analyzed: yathā vṛkṣam libujā vāñcha me tanvam iti sūktābhyām vṛkṣa tvac tagaram añjanam kuṣṭham jyeṣṭhī madhu vāta sambhrama tṛṇāni etāni dravyāṇi ājyena āloḍya abhimantrya

original: 'yathāyaṃ vāhaḥ' ityetāni dravyāṇyāloḍya ghṛtena tato'bhimantrya jāyāṃ pralimpati /
analyzed: yathā ayam vāhaḥ iti etāni dravyāṇi āloḍya ghṛtena jāyām pralimpati

original: 'uttudastvā' iti sūktaṃ japitvā aṅgulyā nudati bhāryām udare pṛṣṭau rucyarthī //
analyzed: uttudaḥ tvā iti sūktam japitvā aṅgulyā nudati bhāryām udare pṛṣṭau ruci arthī
ekaviṃśatim prācīna kaṇṭakān alaṅkṛtān anūktān ādadhāti
uttudaḥ tvā iti sūktena ekaviṃśati badarī kaṇṭakān ādadhāti

original: ekaviṃśatibadarīprāntāni sūtreṇa veṣṭayitvā 'uttudastvā' iti sūktena sakṛt juhoti / rucyarthī //
analyzed: ekaviṃśati badarī prāntāni sūtreṇa veṣṭayitvā uttudaḥ tvā iti sūktena sakṛt juhoti ruci arthī
navanīta anvaktam kuṣṭham tris ahanaḥ pratapati tri rātre

original: 'uttudastvā' iti sūktena kuṣṭhaṃ navanītenābhyajyāgnau prakṣipati prātarmadhyandine sāyaṃ ca /
analyzed: uttudaḥ tvā iti sūktena kuṣṭham navanītena abhyajya agnau prakṣipati prātar madhyandine sāyam ca

original: 'uttudastvā' iti sūktena khaṭvādhomukhapaṭṭikāṃ gṛhītvā saṃviśati svapiti /
analyzed: uttudaḥ tvā iti sūktena khaṭvā adhomukha paṭṭikām gṛhītvā saṃviśati svapiti
uṣṇa udakam tri pāde pattas prabaddha aṅguṣṭhābhyām ardayan śete

original: 'uttudastvā' iti sūktenoṣṇodakaṃ tripāde śikye prabaddhāṅguṣṭhābhyāmardayañchete / rucyarthī //
analyzed: uttudaḥ tvā iti sūktena uṣṇa udakam tri pāde śikye prabaddha aṅguṣṭhābhyām ardayan śete ruci arthī

original: [pratikṛtimāvalekhanīṃ dārbhyūṣeṇa bhāṅgajyena kaṇṭakaśalyayolūkapatrayāsitālakāṇḍayā hṛdaye vidhyati // KauśS_4,11{35}.28 //]
analyzed: pratikṛtim ā avalekhanīm dārbhyūṣeṇa bhāṅga jyena kaṇṭaka śalyayā ulūka patrayā asita ala kāṇḍayā hṛdaye vidhyati

original: pratikṛtimāvalekhanīṃ dārbhyaṣeṇa bhāṅgajyena kaṇṭakaśalyayolūkapatrayāsitālakāṇḍayā 'uttudastvā' iti sūktena hṛdaye vidhyati /
analyzed: pratikṛtim ā avalekhanīm dārbhyaṣeṇa bhāṅga jyena kaṇṭaka śalyayā ulūka patrayā asita ala kāṇḍayā uttudaḥ tvā iti sūktena hṛdaye vidhyati

original: tathā ca yasya kāmo nāsti tasya kāmo'tiśayena kāmakaraṇamityarthaḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca yasya kāmaḥ na asti tasya kāma utiśayena kāma karaṇam iti arthaḥ

original: udapātreṇa sampātavatā śālāṃ samprokṣyāparasmin dvārapakṣe nyubjati // KauśS_4,12{36}.2 //]
analyzed: uda pātreṇa sampātavatā śālām samprokṣya aparasmin dvāra pakṣe nyubjati

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'sahasraśṛṅgaḥ' iti sūktenodapātraṃ sampātya śālāṃ samprokṣati /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā sahasra śṛṅgaḥ iti sūktena uda pātram sampātya śālām samprokṣati
ulūkhalam uttarām sraktim dakṣiṇa śayana pādam tantūn abhimantrayate
sahasra śṛṅgaḥ iti sūktena nagnaḥ bhūtvā ulūkhalam abhimantrayate
sahasra śṛṅgaḥ iti sūktena gṛhasya uttaram koṇam abhimantrayate

original: 'sahasraśṛṅgaḥ' iti sūktena striyāḥ khaṭavāyā dakṣiṇaṃ pādamabhimantrayate /
analyzed: sahasra śṛṅgaḥ iti sūktena striyāḥ khaṭavāyāḥ dakṣiṇam pādam abhimantrayate
sahasra śṛṅgaḥ iti sūktena khaṭvāyāḥ rajjum abhimantrayate
lajjā pracchādanam na bhavati iti arthaḥ

original: svāpanaṃ sarveṣāṃ mānuṣāṇāṃ nidrākāmānāṃ nidrā bhavati /
analyzed: svāpanam sarveṣām mānuṣāṇām nidrā kāmānām nidrā bhavati
maithunāt nidrā icchā bhavati iti arthaḥ

original: atha palāyinyāḥ striyo bandhanakarma tantrakrameṇa kriyate /
analyzed: atha palāyinyāḥ striyaḥ bandhana karma tantra krameṇa kriyate
āveṣṭanena vaṃśa agram avabadhya madhyamāyām badhnāti

original: 'asthād dyauḥ' iti sūktena dvitīyena rajjuveṣṭanamabhimantrya vaṃśāgre baddhvā madhyamasthūṇe badhnāti //
analyzed: asthāt dyauḥ iti sūktena dvitīyena rajju veṣṭanam abhimantrya vaṃśa agre baddhvā madhyama sthūṇe badhnāti

original: 'asthād dyauḥ' iti sūktena śayanapādamabhimantryotpale ca badhnāti /
analyzed: asthāt dyauḥ iti sūktena śayana pādam abhimantrya utpale ca badhnāti
asthāt dyauḥ iti sūktena aṅkuśena tilān juhoti

original: 'idaṃ yatpreṇyaḥ śiraḥ' iti sūktena strīśiraḥkarṇaṃ cānumantrayate /
analyzed: idam yat preṇyaḥ śiraḥ iti sūktena strī śiraḥ karṇam ca anumantrayate

original: 'idaṃ yatpreṇyaḥ śiraḥ' iti sūktena keśān dhārayati /
analyzed: idam yat preṇyaḥ śiraḥ iti sūktena keśān dhārayati

original: iti sauvarcalamoṣadhivacchuklaprasūnaṃ śirasyupacṛtya grāmaṃ praviśati // KauśS_4,12{36}.12 //]
analyzed: iti sauvarcalam oṣadhi vat śukla prasūnam śirasi upacṛtya grāmam praviśati

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'bhagena mā śāṃśapena' iti sūktena śaṅkhapuṣpīmūlamoṣadhivat khātvā sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā bhagena mā śāṃśapena iti sūktena śaṅkhapuṣpī mūlam oṣadhi vat khātvā sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti

original: 'bhagena mā' iti sūktena sauvacalapuṣpamabhimantrya yasya saubhāgyamicchati tasya śirasi baddhvā sa maithunaṃ karoti /
analyzed: bhagena mā iti sūktena sauvacala puṣpam abhimantrya yasya saubhāgyam icchati tasya śirasi baddhvā sa maithunam karoti

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'nyastikā rurohitha' iti sūktena sauvarcalamūlaṃ sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti puṣpaṃ ca śirasi dadāti /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā nyastikā rurohitha iti sūktena sauvarcala mūlam sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti puṣpam ca śirasi dadāti

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'idaṃ khanāmi' iti sūktena sauvarcalamūlaṃ sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā idam khanāmi iti sūktena sauvarcala mūlam sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti
idam khanāmi iti sūktena sauvarcala mūlam abhimantrya badhnāti
ratha jitām iti sūktaiḥ tribhiḥ māṣān abhimantrya striyāḥ ākrameṣu vapati

original: 'rathajitām' iti tribhiḥ sūktaiścaṇakānabhimantrya striyā ākrameṣu vapati /
analyzed: ratha jitām iti tribhiḥ sūktaiḥ caṇakān abhimantrya striyāḥ ākrameṣu vapati
khaṭvā sthāne vā gṛhe śayana deśe vā
śara bhṛṣṭīḥ ādīptāḥ pratidiśam abhyasyati arvācyāḥ āvalekhanyāḥ

original: 'rathajitām' iti tribhiḥ sūktaiḥ śarabhṛṣṭīrādīptā abhimantrya pratidiśamabhyasyati /
analyzed: ratha jitām iti tribhiḥ sūktaiḥ śara bhṛṣṭīḥ ādīptāḥ abhimantrya pratidiśam abhyasyati

original: eṣu patiḥ pratikṛtiṃ kṛtvā 'rathajitām' iti tribhisūktaiḥ hṛdaye vidhyati dārbhyūṣeṇa bhāṅgajyena /
analyzed: eṣu patiḥ pratikṛtim kṛtvā ratha jitām iti tribhiḥ sūktaiḥ hṛdaye vidhyati dārbhyūṣeṇa bhāṅga jyena

original: atha striyo vā puruṣasya vā daurbhāgyakaraṇamucyate -
analyzed: atha striyaḥ vā puruṣasya vā daurbhāgya karaṇam ucyate

original: iti mālāniṣpramandadantadhāvanakeśamīśānahatāyā anustaraṇyā vā kośamulūkhaladaraṇe triśile nikhanati // KauśS_4,12{36}.15 //]
analyzed: iti mālā niṣpramanda dantadhāvana keśam īśāna hatāyāḥ anustaraṇyāḥ vā kośam ulūkhala daraṇe tri śile nikhanati
striyāḥ puṣpa mālā niṣpramanda dantadhāvana keśāḥ tān ekīkṛtya
jvara hata go carmaṇā āveṣṭya bhagam asyāḥ iti sūktena abhimantrya ulūkhala daraṇe tri śile nikhanati
mālā niṣpramanda dantadhāvana keśāḥ tān ekīkṛtya bhagam asyāḥ iti sūktena abhimantrya
dahana ghātitā gauḥ anustaraṇī iti ucyate
īśāna hatā jvara hatā iti ucyate
tasyāḥ carmaṇā āveṣṭya tatas ulūkhala daraṇe tri śile nikhanati
yasya daurbhāgyam kriyate tasya etāni gṛhṇīyāt

original: 'bhagamasyā varcaḥ' iti sūktena strīpuṣpamālāṃ hastena mathitvā strīṃ dṛṣṭvānvāha /
analyzed: bhagam asyāḥ varcaḥ iti sūktena strī puṣpa mālām hastena mathitvā strīm dṛṣṭvā anvāha

original: [trīṇi keśamaṇḍalāni kṛṣṇasūtreṇa vigrathya triśile'śmottarāṇi vyatyāsam // KauśS_4,12{36}.17 //]
analyzed: trīṇi keśa maṇḍalāni kṛṣṇa sūtreṇa vigrathya tri śilā iśma uttarāṇi vyatyāsam

original: 'bhagamasyā varcaḥ' iti sūktena trīṇi keśamaṇḍalāni kṛṣṇasūtreṇa veṣṭayitvābhimantrya triśile'śmottarāṇi vyatyāsamaśmānaṃ śālāyā upari dadāti
analyzed: bhagam asyāḥ varcaḥ iti sūktena trīṇi keśa maṇḍalāni kṛṣṇa sūtreṇa veṣṭayitvā abhimantrya tri śilā īśma uttarāṇi vyatyāsam aśmānam śālāyāḥ upari dadāti

original: [athāsyai bhagamutkhanati yaṃ te bhagaṃ nicakhnustriśile yaṃ catuḥśile /
analyzed: atha asyai bhagam utkhanati yam te bhagam nicakhnuḥ tri śile yam catur śile

original: idaṃ tamutkhanāmi prajayā ca dhanena ca iti // KauśS_4,12{36}.18 //]
analyzed: idam tam utkhanāmi prajayā ca dhanena ca iti

original: 'yaṃ te bhagaṃ nicakhnuḥ' ityṛcā śilā utkhanati /
analyzed: yam te bhagam nicakhnuḥ iti ṛcā śilāḥ utkhanati
bhagam asyāḥ iti anena sūktena yat kṛtam tat anayā vinaśyati

original: samāptaṃ yasyā daurbhāgyaṃ kṛtaṃ tasyāḥ saubhāgyakaraṇam //
analyzed: samāptam yasyāḥ daurbhāgyam kṛtam tasyāḥ saubhāgya karaṇam
bhartrā saha vidveṣaḥ bhavati iti arthaḥ

original: iti bāṇāparṇīṃ lohitājāyā drapsena sannīya śayanamanu parikirati // KauśS_4,12{36}.19 //]
analyzed: iti bāṇāparṇīm lohita ajāyāḥ drapsena sannīya śayanam anu parikirati

original: 'imāṃ khanāmi' iti sūktena bāṇāparṇīṃ raktavarṇāyā ajāyā dadhyudakena sannīya tato'bhimantrya sapatnīśayane parikirati /
analyzed: imām khanāmi iti sūktena bāṇāparṇīm rakta varṇāyāḥ ajāyāḥ dadhi udakena sannīya tatas abhimantrya sapatnī śayane parikirati

original: 'abhi te'dhām' iti pādena bāṇāparṇīpatrāṇyabhimantrya śayanādhastāt prakṣipati /
analyzed: abhi tedhām iti pādena bāṇāparṇī patrāṇi abhimantrya śayana adhastāt prakṣipati

original: 'upa te'dhām' iti pādena bāṇāparṇī-oṣadhipatrāṇyabhimantrya sapatnīśayana upari kṣipati /
analyzed: upa tedhām iti pādena bāṇāparṇī oṣadhi patrāṇi abhimantrya sapatnī śayane upari kṣipati
bhartrā saha vidveṣaḥ bhavati iti arthaḥ
atha strī viṣaye kāmaḥ utpanne kāma vināśakāni ucyante
kāmam vineṣyamāṇa upāghena asaṅkhyātāḥ śarkarāḥ parikiran vrajati

original: iti sūktenāsaṅkhyātāḥ śarkarā abhimantrya parikiran vrajati /
analyzed: iti sūktena asaṅkhyātāḥ śarkarāḥ abhimantrya parikiran vrajati

original: 'apa naḥ śośucat' iti sūktenāsaṅkhyātāḥ śarkarā haste gṛhītvā parikiran vrajati /
analyzed: apa naḥ śośucat iti sūktena asaṅkhyātāḥ śarkarāḥ haste gṛhītvā parikiran vrajati
strī gṛham yāvat kāma utpatti deśam

original: 'apa naḥ śośucat' iti sūktenāsaṅkhyātāḥ śarkarā haste gṛhītvā japati /

original: 'venastat' iti sūktena pañcagranthiveṇudaṇḍamabhimantryāyācya same dhārayatyabhīṣṭadiśi patanenārthasiddhiḥ /

original: 'namaste astu' iti sūktena somadarbhakeśānīkuṣṭhalākṣāmañjiṣṭhībadaraharidrametāni dravyāṇi bhūrje kṛtvā manthaśirasi kṛtvābhimantrya kṣetramadhye  #

original: avadīryamāṇe grāme vāvasāne vāgniśaraṇe vā samajyāyāṃ vā gṛhe vā prākāre vā yānyavātarakṣārthaṃ karma vakṣyāmaḥ -

original: 'necchatruḥ' iti sūktena pāṭāpuṣpamālāmabhimantrya śirasi dhārayati kecijjātyādigandhapuṣpāṇi /

analyzed: na id śatruḥ iti sūktena pāṭā palāśīm sapta palāśīm saptaparṇī mālām abhimantrya dhārayati

original: 'ye bhakṣayantaḥ' iti sūktena bhaktamabhimantrya bhaktaṃ śākādi ca tato bhuñjati /
analyzed: ye bhakṣayantaḥ iti sūktena bhaktam abhimantrya bhaktam śāka ādi ca tatas bhuñjati

original: 'brahma jajñānam' iti prathamena kāṇḍādinā sūktena vedaṃ vā anuvākaṃ vā sūktaṃ vā kalpaṃ vā brāhmaṇaṃ vā'dhyayanaṃ kartumicchati tadā tadā  #
analyzed: brahma jajñānam iti prathamena kāṇḍa ādinā sūktena vedam vā anuvākam vā sūktam vā kalpam vā brāhmaṇam vā adhyayanam kartum icchati tadā tadā

original: 'brahma jajñānam' iti sūktaṃ japati vivāde jayārtham //
analyzed: brahma jajñānam iti sūktam japati vivāde jaya artham

original: 'brahma jajñānam' iti sūktaṃ japitvā mīmāṃsāvyākaraṇādiśāstravādaṃ karoti /
analyzed: brahma jajñānam iti sūktam japitvā mīmāṃsā vyākaraṇa ādi śāstra vādam karoti

original: 'mamāgne varco vihaveṣu' iti sūktena cākrikasya rajjumabhimantrya dhārayati hastena /
analyzed: mama agne varcaḥ vihaveṣu iti sūktena cākrikasya rajjum abhimantrya dhārayati hastena
iti vivāda kartuḥ vadane kalahaḥ na bhavati
tadā sabhāsad adharma adhikaraṇa ādi jīyate

original: ājyatantraṃ kṛtvā 'sabhā ca mā samitiḥ' iti pañcarcena sūktena kṣīraudanaṃ sampātyābhimantrya bhakṣayati /
analyzed: ājya tantram kṛtvā sabhā ca mā samitiḥ iti pañcarcena sūktena kṣīraudanam sampātya abhimantrya bhakṣayati

original: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'sabhā ca mā' iti puroḍāśaṃ sampātyābhimantrya
analyzed: tantram kṛtvā sabhā ca mā iti puroḍāśam sampātya abhimantrya

original: 'sabhā ca mā' iti pañcarcena rasān sampātyābhimantrya bhakṣayati ājyatantre //
analyzed: sabhā ca mā iti pañcarcena rasān sampātya abhimantrya bhakṣayati ājya tantre

original: 'sabhā ca mā' iti pañcarcaṃ sūktaṃ japitvā sthūṇāṃ gṛhṇāti /
analyzed: sabhā ca me iti pañca ṛcam sūktam japitvā sthūṇām gṛhṇāti

yat vadāmi iti ṛcam japitvā sabhām nirīkṣate
yat vadāmi iti ṛcam japitvā anvāha

original: yadvadati tat tathaiva vadati yaccakṣuṣā paśyati tadvadan /
analyzed: yat vadati tat tathā eva vadati yat cakṣuṣā paśyati tat vadan
aham asmi iti aparājitāt pariṣadam āvrajati
aham asmi sahamānaḥ iti ṛcam japitvā aparājitāt parṣadam āvrajati jaya kāmaḥ

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'dūṣyā dūṣirasi' iti sūktena tilakamaṇiṃ sampātyābhimantrya puṇyāhānte badhnāti /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā dūṣyāḥ dūṣiḥ asi iti sūktena tilaka maṇim sampātya abhimantrya puṇyāha ante badhnāti

original: strīkṛte śūdrakṛte rājakṛte brāhmaṇakṛte kapālikakṛte śākinīkṛte'ntyajādikṛte'nyeṣāṃ vā duḥsiddhiḥ /
analyzed: strī kṛte śūdra kṛte rāja kṛte brāhmaṇa kṛte kapālika kṛte vā duḥsiddhiḥ

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'dūṣyā dūṣirasi' iti sūktena tilakamaṇiṃ sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā dūṣyāḥ dūṣiḥ asi iti sūktena tilaka maṇim sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti

original: purastādagneḥ piśaṅgaṃ gāṃ dhārayitvā paścādagnerlohitājaṃ dhārayitvā tataḥ śāntyudakaṃ karoti /
analyzed: purastāt agneḥ piśaṅgam gām dhārayitvā paścāt agneḥ lohita ajam dhārayitvā tatas śāntyudakam karoti

original: darbhā apāmārgā sahadevī āṭarūṣakaḥ kāmpīlaṃ sitīvārasadampuṣpā etā mantroktāḥ bhājana ānayati śāntigaṇena //
analyzed: darbhāḥ apāmārgā sahadevī āṭarūṣakaḥ kāmpīlam sitīvāra sadampuṣpāḥ etāḥ mantra uktāḥ bhājane ānayati śānti gaṇena
yat mātalī varjam kṛtyā dūṣaṇa gaṇam
yām kalpayanti iti artha sūktam kṛtyā pratihara gaṇaḥ

original: bṛhacchāntigaṇa ete pañca gaṇāḥ śāntyudaka āvāpyante /
analyzed: bṛhat śānti gaṇe ete pañca gaṇāḥ śāntyudake āvāpyante

original: tato mātalīṃ kṛtvā 'sarvā imāḥ' ityādi karoti //
analyzed: tatas mātalīm kṛtvā sarvāḥ imāḥ ityādi karoti

original: yatāyai yatāyai śāntāyai śāntivāyai bhadrāyai bhadrāvati syonāyai śagmāyai śivāyai sumaṅgali prajāvati susīme'haṃ vāmābhūḥ iti // KauśS_5,3{39}.9
analyzed: yatāyai yatāyai śāntāyai śāntivāyai bhadrāyai bhadrāvati syonāyai śagmāyai śivāyai su maṅgali prajāvati su sīmā iham vām ābhūḥ iti

original: tena śāntyudakena prokṣan vrajati kṛtyānikhananasthānaṃ ca /
analyzed: tena śāntyudakena prokṣan vrajati kṛtyā nikhanana sthānam ca

original: upānahau paridhāyoṣṇīṣaṃ kṛtvā'gre bhūtvā kartā śāntyudakena prokṣati /
analyzed: upānahau paridhāya uṣṇīṣam kṛtvā agre bhūtvā kartā śāntyudakena prokṣati

original: vālāgamapātreṣu kṛtyādiṣu ca sarveṣvidaṃ karma bhavati //
analyzed: vāla āgama pātreṣu kṛtyā ādiṣu ca sarveṣu idam karma bhavati

original: yadi kṛtyā duṣṭā bhavati tadā vakṣyamāṇaṃ karma karoti /
analyzed: yadi kṛtyā duṣṭā bhavati tadā vakṣyamāṇam karma karoti

original: atha na bhavati tadā na kuryāt /
analyzed: atha na bhavati tadā na kuryāt

original: kṛtyādiṣu ca sarveṣu idaṃ karma bhavati amitracakṣuṣā iti /
analyzed: kṛtyā ādiṣu ca sarveṣu idam karma bhavati amitra cakṣuṣā iti
kṛtavyadhani iti ṛcā kṛtyām avalepanam karoti
kṛtavyadhani iti ṛcā kartā kāṇḍena vidhyati

original: dhanuṣāthavā dārbhyūṣeṇa kāryotpannena vidhyavidhinā kāṇḍena vidhyati //
analyzed: dhanuṣā athavā dārbhyūṣeṇa kārya utpannena vidhi avidhinā kāṇḍena vidhyati

original: iti darvyā triḥ sārūpavatsenāpodakena mathitena gulphān pariṣiñcati // KauśS_5,3{39}.13 //]
analyzed: iti darvyā tris sārūpavatsena apodakena mathitena gulphān pariṣiñcati

original: 'dūṣyā dūṣirasi' ityṛcā darvyā triḥ sārūpavatsasya vinodakena manthena gulphān pariṣiñcati /
analyzed: dūṣyāḥ dūṣiḥ asi iti ṛcā darvyā tris sārūpavatsasya vinodakena manthena gulphān pariṣiñcati

original: [yaṣṭibhiścarma pinahya praiṣakṛt parikramya bandhānmuñcati sandaṃśena // KauśS_5,3{39}.15 //]
analyzed: yaṣṭibhiḥ carma pinahya praiṣa kṛt parikramya bandhān muñcati sandaṃśena

analyzed: māṃsāni śakale nidhāya kartā lakuṭaiḥ carmaṇā baddhvā praiṣa kṛt parikramya bandhān muñcati sandaṃśena

uttiṣṭha eva parehi iti ardharcena darbha rajjvā sannahya utthāpayati

original: dakṣiṇenālābūdakapūrṇamādāya tato'raṇye gacchanti saha kartrā sarve //
analyzed: dakṣiṇena alābu udaka pūrṇam ādāya tatas uraṇye gacchanti saha kartrā sarve

original: dakṣiṇāpravaṇe vā svayandīrṇe vā svakṛte veriṇe'nyāśāyāṃ vā nidadhāti // KauśS_5,3{39}.25 //]
analyzed: dakṣiṇā pravaṇe vā svayam dīrṇe vā sva kṛte vā iriṇenya āśāyām vā nidadhāti

original: anāvṛte vā'goṣpadadeśe vā'nudakakhāte vā dakṣiṇāpravaṇe vā svayamavadīrṇe vā svakṛte veriṇe'nyāśāyāṃ vā tatra kṛtyāṃ

original: abhicāradeśā mantreṣu vijñāyante tāni marmāṇi // KauśS_5,3{39}.31 //]
analyzed: abhicāra deśāḥ mantreṣu vijñāyante tāni marmāṇi

original: daśa gāvo dakṣiṇā vṛṣabhairyuktaṃ halaṃ ca āṅgirasakalpe kṛtāṃ kṛtyāṃ śamayati /

original: yena kṛto'bhicārastasyaiva gacchati yataḥ pratyabhicāro bhavati /
analyzed: yena kṛta ubhicāraḥ tasya eva gacchati yatas pratyabhicāraḥ bhavati

original: iti yenecchennadī pratipadyeteti prasiñcan vrajati // KauśS_5,4{40}.1 //]
analyzed: iti yena icchet nadī pratipadyeta iti prasiñcan vrajati

original: nadīpravāhaṃ khātvā 'yadadaḥ samprayatīḥ' iti sūktena prasiñcan vrajati /
analyzed: nadī pravāham khātvā yat adaḥ samprayatīḥ iti sūktena prasiñcan vrajati

original: nadīpravāhaṃ khātvā tasmin pravāha idaṃ karoti //
analyzed: nadī pravāham khātvā tasmin pravāhe idam karoti

original: 'yadadaḥ samprayatīḥ' iti sūktena kāśamabhimantrya tatra khāte ropayati /
analyzed: yat adaḥ samprayatīḥ iti sūktena kāśam abhimantrya tatra khāte ropayati

original: 'yadadaḥ samprayatīḥ' iti sūktena divi sevālaparṇīmabhimantrya ropayati nadīpravāhe /
analyzed: yat adaḥ samprayatīḥ iti sūktena divi sevā ālaparṇīm abhimantrya ropayati nadī pravāhe

analyzed: yat adaḥ samprayatīḥ iti sūktena dhuvaka paṭerakam abhimantrya nadī pravāhe nikhanati

original: 'idaṃ va āpaḥ' iti pādena hiraṇyamabhimantrya nadīmārgakhāte nidadhāti //
analyzed: idam vaḥ āpaḥ iti pādena hiraṇyam abhimantrya nadī mārga khāte nidadhāti

original: 'ayaṃ vatsaḥ' iti pādeneṣīkāñjimaṇḍūkaṃ nīlalohitābhyāṃ sūtrābhyāṃ baddhvābhimantrya nidadhāti khātapravāhe //
analyzed: ayam vatsaḥ iti pādena iṣīkā añji maṇḍūkam nīla lohitābhyām sūtrābhyām baddhvā abhimantrya nidadhāti khāta pravāhe
iha ittham ete iti pādena avakām abhimantrya maṇḍūka upari nidadhāti

original: [mārutaṃ kṣīraudanaṃ mārutaśṛtaṃ mārutaiḥ paristīrya mārutena sruveṇa mārutenājyena varuṇāya trirjuhoti // KauśS_5,4{40}.7 //]
analyzed: mārutam kṣīraudanam māruta śṛtam mārutaiḥ paristīrya mārutena sruveṇa mārutena ājyena varuṇāya tris juhoti

original: varuṇadevatāpākayajñavidhānenājyabhāgāntaṃ kṛtvā 'yadadaḥ samprayatīḥ' iti sūktena trirvibhajya juhoti /
analyzed: varuṇa devatā pākayajña vidhānena ājyabhāga antam kṛtvā yat adaḥ samprayatīḥ iti sūktena tris vibhajya juhoti

original: kṛṣṇavrīhiḥ kṛṣṇāyā goḥ payaḥ ghṛtaṃ ca vetasakāṣṭhasruva indhanaṃ ca vetasapatraiḥ staraṇaṃ paṭerakena vā /

original: udake pravāha udakapravāhabhaye nadībhaye grāme nagare vā yatrodakanadībhayaṃ bhavati tatra sarvatra vāruṇo homaḥ kartavyaḥ /
analyzed: udake pravāhe udaka pravāha bhaye nadī bhaye grāme nagare vā yatra udaka nadī bhayam bhavati tatra sarvatra vāruṇaḥ homaḥ kartavyaḥ

original: dadhimanthaṃ baliṃ hṛtvā samprokṣaṇībhyāṃ prasiñcan vrajati // KauśS_5,4{40}.9 //]
analyzed: dadhimantham balim hṛtvā samprokṣaṇībhyām prasiñcan vrajati

original: 'yadadaḥ samprayatīḥ' iti sūktena dadhisaktumanthaṃ baliharaṇaṃ kṛtvā vaitase camase vaitasābhyāmupamanthanībhyāmupamathya baliṃ haret /
analyzed: yat adaḥ samprayatīḥ iti sūktena dadhi saktu mantham bali haraṇam kṛtvā vaitase camase vaitasābhyām upamanthanībhyām upamathya balim haret

original: iti dvābhyāṃ samprokṣaṇībhyāṃ mantrodakaṃ nadīpravāhe prasiñcan vrajati /
analyzed: iti dvābhyām samprokṣaṇībhyām mantra udakam nadī pravāhe prasiñcan vrajati

original: yadi na vahati nadī tadā vakṣyamāṇamidaṃ karma -
analyzed: yadi na vahati nadī tadā vakṣyamāṇam idam karma

original: 'yadadaḥ samprayatīḥ' iti sūktena hastena nadīṃ vahanti /
analyzed: yat adaḥ samprayatīḥ iti sūktena hastena nadīm vahanti

original: 'yadadaḥ samprayatīḥ' iti sūktaṃ japitvā svayaṃ patati /
analyzed: yat adaḥ samprayatīḥ iti sūktam japitvā svayam patati

original: yadi dūraṃ gatā punarnivartate tadedaṃ karma /
analyzed: yadi dūram gatā punar nivartate tadā idam karma

original: eka ācāryāḥ 'yadadaḥ samprayatīḥ' ityādi sarvamekaṃ karma manyante /
analyzed: eke ācāryāḥ yat adaḥ samprayatīḥ ityādi sarvam ekam karma manyante

original: anye prasiñcanakarma hiraṇyamaṇḍūkakarma yogakarma manthanakarma pāṇikarmaiteṣāṃ vikalpaṃ manyante /
analyzed: anye prasiñcana karma hiraṇyamaṇḍūka karma yoga karma manthana karma pāṇi karma eteṣām vikalpam manyante

original: anena vidhānena samāropaṇaṃ kṛtvā pathi gacchatāṃ doṣo na bhavati /
analyzed: anena vidhānena samāropaṇam kṛtvā pathi gacchatām doṣaḥ na bhavati

original: [upāvaroha jātavedaḥ punardevo devebhyo havyaṃ vahatu prajānan /
analyzed: upāvaroha jātavedaḥ punar devaḥ devebhyaḥ havyam vahatu prajānan

original: ānandino modamānāḥ suvīrā indhīmahi tvā śaradāṃ śatāni ityupāvarohayati // KauśS_5,4{40}.13 //]
analyzed: ānandinaḥ modamānāḥ su vīrāḥ indhīmahi tvā śaradām śatāni iti upāvarohayati

original: ekāgnau vā tretāyāṃ vā śāntikapauṣṭikādau ca sarvatra samāropaṇamupāvarohaṇaṃ bhavati /

vṛṣā asi vṛṣṇyāvati vṛṣaṇe tvā khanāmasi paipps
dugdhe phāṇṭau adhijya upasthe ādhāya pibati

original: kapikacchumūlaṃ oṣadhivat khātvā 'yāṃ tvā gandharvo akhanat' iti sūktena 'vṛṣaṇaste
analyzed: kapikacchu mūlam oṣadhi vat khātvā yām tvā gandharvaḥ akhanat iti sūktena vṛṣaṇaḥ te

original: khanitā' iti mantreṇa dugdhe śrapayitvopaviṣṭaṃ dhanurutsaṅge kṛtvā dugdhe prakṣipya
analyzed: khanitā iti mantreṇa dugdhe śrapayitvā upaviṣṭam dhanuḥ utsaṅge kṛtvā dugdhe prakṣipya

original: tato dugdhaṃ 'yāṃ tvā gandharvo akhanat' iti sūktena 'vṛṣaṇaste' ityabhimantrya pāyayati /
