original: upaviṣṭaṃ dhanurutsaṅge kṛtvā 'yāṃ tvā gandharvo akhanat' iti sūktena 'vṛṣaṇaste khanitāraḥ' iti dugdhamabhimantrya pāyayati //
analyzed: upaviṣṭam dhanuḥ utsaṅge kṛtvā yām tvā gandharvaḥ akhanat iti sūktena vṛṣaṇaḥ te khanitāraḥ iti dugdham abhimantrya pāyayati

original: 'yāṃ tvā gandharvo akhanat' iti 'vṛṣaṇaste khanitāraḥ' ityṛcā kapikacchvoṣadhivat khātvā dugdhe śrapayitvā kīlaka upaviśya 'yāṃ tvā' iti dugdhamabhimantrya  #
analyzed: yām tvā gandharvaḥ akhanat iti vṛṣaṇaḥ te khanitāraḥ iti ṛcā kapikacchvā oṣadhi vat khātvā dugdhe śrapayitvā kīlake upaviśya yām tvā iti dugdham abhimantrya

original: 'yāṃ tvā gandharvo akhanat' iti sūktena 'vṛṣaṇaste khanitāraḥ' ityṛcaibhirmantraiḥ
analyzed: yām tvā gandharvaḥ akhanat iti sūktena vṛṣaṇaḥ te khanitāraḥ iti ṛcā ebhiḥ mantraiḥ

original: suravālakamoṣadhivat khātvā dugdhe kvāthayitvā muśala upaviśya dugdhamabhimantrya
analyzed: sura vālakam oṣadhi vat khātvā dugdhe kvāthayitvā muśale upaviśya dugdham abhimantrya
iti eka arka sūtra mārkam badhnāti

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'yathāsitaḥ' iti sūktenaikaśākhākarmaṇiṃ sampātyābhimantryārkasūtreṇa badhnāti /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā yathā asitaḥ iti sūktena eka śākhā karmaṇim sampātya abhimantrya arka sūtreṇa badhnāti

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'yāvadaṅgīnam' ityṛcā kṛṣṇamṛgacarmamaṇiṃ sampātyābhimantrya kṛṣṇavālena badhnāti /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā yāvadaṅgīnam iti ṛcā kṛṣṇa mṛga carma maṇim sampātya abhimantrya kṛṣṇa vālena badhnāti

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'ā vṛṣāyasva' iti sūktenaikārkasūtramārkaṃ sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā ā vṛṣāyasva iti sūktena eka arka sūtram ārkam sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'ā vṛṣāyasva' iti sūktena hariṇaskandhacarmamaṇiṃ kṛtvā kṛṣṇavālena badhnāti sampātyābhimantrya ca /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā ā vṛṣāyasva iti sūktena hariṇa skandha carma maṇim kṛtvā kṛṣṇa vālena badhnāti sampātya abhimantrya ca
vīrya karaṇam utthāpanam sthūla karaṇam ca bhavati
iti varṣa kāmaḥ dvādaśa rātram anuśuṣyet

original: maruto yajate yathā varuṇaṃ juhoti // KauśS_5,5{41}.3 //]
trayodaśe'hani pākayajñavidhānena vratopāyanāntaṃ kṛtvā tato 'devasya tvā savituḥ'
analyzed: trayodaśe hani pākayajña vidhānena vrata upāyana antam kṛtvā tatas devasya tvā savituḥ

original: ityādi 'marudbhyo juṣṭaṃ nirvapāmi marudbhyastvā juṣṭaṃ prokṣāmi' ityanena yajuṣā
analyzed: ityādi marudbhyaḥ juṣṭam nirvapāmi marudbhyaḥ tvā juṣṭam prokṣāmi iti anena yajuṣā
tatas kṣīraudanam juhoti samutpatantu iti sūktena

original: pākayajñiyaṃ tantramājyabhāgāntaṃ kṛtvā tataḥ kṣīraudanaṃ juhoti /
analyzed: pākayajñiyam tantram ājyabhāga antam kṛtvā tatas kṣīraudanam juhoti
pra nabhasva iti ṛcā ekām āhutim na ghraṃs tatāpa
iti ṛcā dvitīyām āhutim yuktābhyām tṛtīyām āhutim
barhiḥ home marudbhyaḥ gacchatu haviḥ svāhā iti

original: sarveṣu vṛṣṭikarmasu kṛṣṇāyā gorājyaṃ kṛṣṇāyā goḥ payaḥ /
analyzed: sarveṣu vṛṣṭi karmasu kṛṣṇāyāḥ go rājyam kṛṣṇāyāḥ goḥ payaḥ

original: ājyabhāgāntaṃ kṛtvā 'samutpatantu' iti sūktena pratyṛcamājyaṃ juhoti /
analyzed: ājyabhāga antam kṛtvā samutpatantu iti sūktena pratyṛcam ājyam juhoti

original: ājyatantraṃ kṛtvā 'pra nabhasva' iti sūktena pratyṛcamājyaṃ juhoti /
analyzed: ājya tantram kṛtvā pra nabhasvas iti sūktena pratyṛcam ājyam juhoti

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'samutpatantu' iti sūktena kāśadividhuvakavetasānekatra kṛtvā sampātyābhimantrya tata udakamadhye pātramadhomukhaṃ ninayati
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā samutpatantu iti sūktena kāśa dividhuvaka vetasān ekatra kṛtvā sampātya abhimantrya tatas udaka madhye pātram adhomukham ninayati

original: ājyabhāgāntamabhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'pra nabhasva' iti sūktena kāśādyoṣadhīḥ pātre kṛtvā sampātyābhimantrya pātramudakamadhye'dhomukhaṃ ninayati
analyzed: ājyabhāga antam abhyātāna antam kṛtvā pra nabhasvas iti sūktena kāśa ādi oṣadhīḥ pātre kṛtvā sampātya abhimantrya pātram udaka madhye adhomukham ninayati

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'samutpatantu' iti sūktena kāśadividhuvakavetasānekatra kṛtvā sampātyābhimantryodakamadhye viplāvayati /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā samutpatantu iti sūktena kāśa dividhuvaka vetasān ekatra kṛtvā sampātya abhimantrya udaka madhye viplāvayati

original: 'pra nabhasva' iti dvyarcena sūktena kāśādyekatra kṛtvā sampātyābhimantryodake viplāvayati /
analyzed: pra nabhasvas iti dvi arcena sūktena kāśa ādi ekatra kṛtvā sampātya abhimantrya udake viplāvayati
śva śiraḥ eṭaka śiraḥ keśa jarat upānahaḥ vaṃśa agre prabadhya yodhayati
samutpatantu iti sūktena kukkura śiram abhimantrya udake prakṣipati
pra nabhasva iti sūktena kukkura śiram abhimantrya udake viplāvayati
samutpatantu iti sūktena meṣa śiram abhimantrya udake prakṣipati
pra nabhasvas iti sūktena meṣa śiram abhimantrya udake prakṣipati

original: 'samutpatantu' iti sūktena mānuṣakeśajaradupānahau vaṃśāgre prabadhya yodhayati /
analyzed: samutpatantu iti sūktena mānuṣa keśa jarat upānahau vaṃśa agre prabadhya yodhayati

original: 'pra nabhasva' iti sūktena keśajaradupānahau vaṃśāgre prabadhya yodhayati japan //
analyzed: pra nabhasvas iti sūktena keśa jarat upānahau vaṃśa agre prabadhya yodhayati japan
uda pātreṇa sampātavatā samprokṣya āma pātram tripād īśmānam avadhāya apsu nidadhāti

original: 'samutpatantu' iti sūktenodapātraṃ sampātya tenodakena tuṣasahitamāmapātraṃ tripāde śikye'śmānamavadhāya sūktaṃ japtvā samprokṣyāpsu nidadhāti
analyzed: samutpatantu iti sūktena uda pātram sampātya tena udakena tuṣa sahitam āma pātram tri pāde śikya īśmānam avadhāya sūktam japtvā samprokṣya apsu nidadhāti

original: 'pra nabhasva' iti sūktenodapātreṇa sampātavatā samprokṣyāmapātraṃ tripāde'śmānamavadhāyāpsu nidadhāti /
analyzed: pra nabhasvas iti sūktena uda pātreṇa sampātavatā samprokṣya āma pātram tripād īśmānam avadhāya apsu nidadhāti

original: ekaṃ vā dve vā sarvān vā karoti /
analyzed: ekam vā dve vā sarvān vā karoti
artha utthāpane vighna śamana vidhim vakṣyāmaḥ
ayam te yoniḥ iti sūktena haviṣām upadadhīta ājya samidh ādi
ayam te yoniḥ iti sūktam japati

original: arthakāma udyamaṃ yadā karoti tadedaṃ karoti /
analyzed: artha kāmaḥ udyamam yadā karoti tadā idam karoti
ā naḥ bhara iti sūktena ājya samidh puroḍāśa ādi juhoti
ā naḥ bhara iti sūktam japati

original: dravyahastyaśvaratnadhanadhānyādyevaṅkāmo yadodyamaṃ vaṇijādi karoti tadedaṃ karma karoti /
analyzed: dravya hasti aśva ratna dhana dhānya ādi evaṅkāmaḥ yadā udyamam vaṇija ādi karoti tadā idam karma karoti

original: yasminnārambho gṛhādi na sidhyati tadedaṃ karma /
analyzed: yasmin ārambhaḥ gṛha ādi na sidhyati tadā idam karma
dhītī vā ye iti dvābhyām ṛgbhyām ājya ādi upadadhīta
dhītī vai iti dvi arcam sūktam japati
samāptam artha vighna śamanam dravya utthāpanam

original: tatra dyūtasthānaṃ kṛtvā trayodaśyādayastisro dadhimadhuni vāsayitvā akṣayati tān pāśān vākṣān vā kapardikān vā /
analyzed: tatra dyūta sthānam kṛtvā trayodaśī ādayaḥ tisraḥ dadhi madhuni vāsayitvā akṣayati tān pāśān vā akṣān vā kapardikān vā
udbhindantīm sañjayantīm iti sūktena abhimantrya dyūta krīḍām kuryāt
pūrvāṣāḍhāsu gartam khanati uttarāsu samminoti pūrayati

original: kapardakān dadhimadhuni vāsayitvā 'yathā vṛkṣamaśaniḥ' iti navarcena sūktenābhimantrya dyūtakrīḍāṃ karoti /
analyzed: kapardakān dadhi madhuni vāsayitvā yathā vṛkṣam aśaniḥ iti nava ṛcena sūktena abhimantrya dyūta krīḍām karoti

original: dadhimadhuni akṣān vāsayitvā 'idamugrāya babhrave' iti saptarcena sūktenābhimantrya dyūtakrīḍāṃ karoti /
analyzed: dadhi madhuni akṣān vāsayitvā idam ugrāya babhrave iti sapta ṛcena sūktena abhimantrya dyūta krīḍām karoti
dyūta krīḍām karoti tasya abhimantrya dadāti dyūtakārāya
atha artha utthāpana udyama kara vighna śamana karmā ucyate
śam ca naḥ mayaḥ ca naḥ

original: iti tribhiḥ sūktairmaruto yajate pākayajñavidhānena yathā varuṇam /
analyzed: iti tribhiḥ sūktaiḥ marutaḥ yajate pākayajña vidhānena yathā varuṇam
mārutam kṣīraudanam māruta śṛtam ityādi bhavati
hiraṇya varṇāḥ iti marutaḥ yajate yathā varuṇam

original: 'yadadaḥ samprayatīḥ' iti sūktena maruto yajate yathā varuṇam /
analyzed: yat adaḥ samprayatīḥ iti sūktena marutaḥ yajate yathā varuṇam

original: 'punantu mā' iti sūktena maruto yajate yathā varuṇam /
analyzed: punantu mā iti sūktena marutaḥ yajate yathā varuṇam

original: 'sasruṣīḥ' iti sūktena maruto yajate yathā varuṇam /
analyzed: sasruṣīḥ iti sūktena marutaḥ yajate yathā varuṇam

original: 'himavataḥ' iti sūktena maruto yajate yathā varuṇam /
analyzed: himavataḥ iti sūktena marutaḥ yajate yathā varuṇam

original: 'vāyoḥ pūtaḥ' iti tṛcena maruto yajate yathā varuṇam /
analyzed: vāyoḥ pūtaḥ iti tṛcena marutaḥ yajate yathā varuṇam

original: 'śaṃ ca no mayaśca naḥ' iti maruto yajate yathā varuṇam /
analyzed: śam ca naḥ mayaḥ ca naḥ iti marutaḥ yajate yathā varuṇam

original: 'anaḍudbhyastvaṃ prathamam' iti sūktena maruto yajate yathā varuṇam /
analyzed: anaḍudbhyaḥ tvam prathamam iti sūktena marutaḥ yajate yathā varuṇam

original: 'mahyamāpaḥ' iti sūktena maruto yajate yathā varuṇam /
analyzed: mahyam āpaḥ iti sūktena marutaḥ yajate yathā varuṇam

original: 'vaiśvānaro raśmibhiḥ' iti sūktena maruto yajate yathā varuṇam /
analyzed: vaiśvānaraḥ raśmibhiḥ iti sūktena marutaḥ yajate yathā varuṇam

original: evamādyā oṣadhīḥ sampātyābhinyubjanaṃ viplāvanaṃ śvaśira eḍakaśiraḥ keśajaradupānahayuddha udapātrakarma etānyabhivarṣaṇāni karmāṇi bhavanti
analyzed: evamādyāḥ oṣadhīḥ sampātya abhinyubjanam viplāvanam śva śiraḥ eḍaka śiraḥ keśa jarat upānaha yuddhe udapātra karma etāni abhivarṣaṇāni karmāṇi bhavanti

original: eke ācāryā marutayāgasthāne mantroktādevatāyāgaṃ kuryāt yathā varuṇam /
analyzed: eke ācāryāḥ maruta yāga sthāne mantra ukta devatā yāgam kuryāt yathā varuṇam

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'ambayo yanti' iti 'āpo hi ṣṭhāḥ',
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā ambayaḥ yanti iti āpaḥ hi stha
sūktaiḥ udaka ghaṭam sampātya abhimantrya tatas āplāvayati

original: pūrvatantraṃ kṛtvā 'hiraṇyavarṇāḥ' iti sūktenodakapūrṇaṃ ghaṭaṃ sampātyābhimantrya tata āplāvayati /
analyzed: pūrva tantram kṛtvā hiraṇya varṇāḥ iti sūktena udaka pūrṇam ghaṭam sampātya abhimantrya tatas āplāvayati

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'yadadaḥ samprayatīḥ' iti sūktenodapātraṃ sampātyābhimantryāplāvayati /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā yat adaḥ samprayatīḥ iti sūktena uda pātram sampātya abhimantrya āplāvayati

original: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'punantu mā' iti sūktenodapātraṃ sampātyābhimantryāplāvayati /
analyzed: tantram kṛtvā punantu mā iti sūktena uda pātram sampātya abhimantrya āplāvayati
himavataḥ iti sūktābhyām udaka ghaṭam sampātya abhimantrya āplāvayati

original: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'vāyoḥ pūtaḥ' iti sūktenodakaghaṭaṃ sampātyābhimantryāplāvayati /
analyzed: tantram kṛtvā vāyoḥ pūtaḥ iti sūktena udaka ghaṭam sampātya abhimantrya āplāvayati

original: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'śaṃ ca no mayaśca naḥ' ityṛcodapātraṃ sampātyābhimantryāplāvayati /
analyzed: tantram kṛtvā śam ca naḥ mayaḥ ca naḥ iti ṛcā uda pātram sampātya abhimantrya āplāvayati

original: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'anaḍadbhyastvaṃ prathamam' iti sūktanodapātraṃ sampātyābhimantryāplāvayati /
analyzed: tantram kṛtvā anaḍadbhyaḥ tvam prathamam iti sūkta noda pātram sampātya abhimantrya āplāvayati

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'mahyamāpaḥ' 'vaiśvānaro raśmibhiḥ' iti sūktābhyāmudapātraṃ sampātyābhimantryāplāvayati /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā mahyam āpaḥ vaiśvānaraḥ raśmibhiḥ iti sūktābhyām uda pātram sampātya abhimantrya āplāvayati

original: 'ambayo yanti' 'āpo hi ṣṭhāḥ' 'śaṃ no devīḥ' iti tribhiḥ sūktairudakaghaṭamabhimantryāvasiñcati /
analyzed: ambayaḥ yanti āpaḥ hi stha śam naḥ devīḥ iti tribhiḥ sūktaiḥ udaka ghaṭam abhimantrya avasiñcati
yat adaḥ samprayatīḥ iti sūktena udaka ghaṭam abhimantrya puruṣam avasiñcati
vidyā dhana viṣaye vighnam na bhavati
punantu mā iti sūktena udakam abhimantrya avasiñcati puruṣam
sasruṣīḥ himavataḥ iti sūktābhyām udakam abhimantrya avasiñcati
vāyoḥ pūtaḥ iti udakam abhimantrya avasiñcati
śam ca naḥ mayaḥ ca naḥ iti ṛcā udakam abhimantrya avasiñcati
anaḍudbhyaḥ tvam prathamam iti udakam abhimantrya avasiñcati
mahyam āpaḥ vaiśvānaraḥ raśmibhiḥ iti sūktābhyām udakam abhimantrya avasiñcati
iti viṃśatibhiḥ ṛgbhiḥ ca udyantam upatiṣṭhate
snātaḥ ūhata vasanaḥ niktvā ahatam ācchādayati

original: 'vaiśvānaro raśmibhiḥ' iti sūktena 'udehi vājin' iti viṃśatibhirṛgbhiśca snānaṃ kṛtvopatiṣṭhate /
analyzed: vaiśvānaraḥ raśmibhiḥ iti sūktena udehi vājin iti viṃśatibhiḥ ṛgbhiḥ ca snānam kṛtvā upatiṣṭhate

original: ahatavastraparidhānaṃ kṛtvā 'vaiśvānaro raśmibhiḥ' iti sūktena 'udehi vājin' iti viṃśatibhirṛgbhiścopatiṣṭhate /
analyzed: ahata vastra paridhānam kṛtvā vaiśvānaraḥ raśmibhiḥ iti sūktena udehi vājin iti viṃśatibhiḥ ṛgbhiḥ ca upatiṣṭhate

original: 'vaiśvānaro raśmibhiḥ' 'udehi vājin' iti viṃśatibhirṛgbhiśca vastramabhimantrya paridhāpayati /
analyzed: vaiśvānaraḥ raśmibhiḥ udehi vājin iti viṃśatibhiḥ ṛgbhiḥ ca vastram abhimantrya paridhāpayati

original: 'vaiśvānaro raśmibhiḥ' 'udehi vājin' iti viṃśatirṛgbhiśca vastramabhimantrya dadāti /
analyzed: vaiśvānaraḥ raśmibhiḥ udehi vājin iti viṃśatiḥ ṛgbhiḥ ca vastram abhimantrya dadāti
atha go vatsa dveṣa virodhe sāmmanasyam ucyate

original: vatsaṃ sandhāvya gomūtreṇāvasicya triḥ pariṇīyopacṛtati // KauśS_5,5{41}.19 //]
analyzed: vatsam sandhāvya go mūtreṇa avasicya tris pariṇīya upacṛtati

original: 'yathā māṃsam' iti sūktena vatsaṃ snānaṃ kārayitvā gomūtreṇāvasicya tato vatsaṃ triḥ paribhrāmayitvā tato'bhimantrya tataḥ pānārthaṃ muñcati
analyzed: yathā māṃsam iti sūktena vatsam snānam kārayitvā go mūtreṇa avasicya tatas vatsam tris paribhrāmayitvā tatas pāna artham muñcati

original: 'yathā māṃsam' iti sūktena goḥ śiraḥ karṇaṃ cābhimantrayate /
analyzed: yathā māṃsam iti sūktena goḥ śiraḥ karṇam ca abhimantrayate
vāta raṃhāḥ iti snāta īśve sampātān abhyatinayati

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā aśvān snāpayitvā agrekṛtya svāśvaṃ 'vātaraṃhā bhava' iti sūktenodapātraṃ sampātyābhimantrya //
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā aśvān snāpayitvā agrekṛtya sva aśvam vāta raṃhāḥ bhava iti sūktena uda pātram sampātya abhimantrya
tatas palāśa patre sarva oṣadhīḥ kṛtvā uttara sampātān auṣadhau ānayati

original: aśvāḥ śāntāstejasvino nirupadravā vegavanta ārogyavanto bhavanti /
analyzed: aśvāḥ śāntāḥ tejasvinaḥ nirupadravāḥ vegavantaḥ ārogyavantaḥ bhavanti
bhadrādadhi śreyaḥ iti ṛcā samidhaḥ ādadhāti śāntāḥ
bhadrāt adhi śreyaḥ iti ṛcā puroḍāśam juhoti
bhadrāt adadhi śreyaḥ iti ṛcā uda odana ādi haviṣām upadhānam kuryāt

original: pravāse gatvā caurabhayamudakabhayaṃ gamane vighnaṃ na bhavati /
analyzed: pravāse gatvā caura bhayam udaka bhayam gamane vighnam na bhavati

original: 'bhadrādadhi' ityṛcā yānaṃ sampātyābhimantryājyatantre grāme gatvā tata udakena samprokṣati vimocayati /
analyzed: bhadrādadhi iti ṛcā yānam sampātya abhimantrya ājya tantre grāme gatvā tatas udakena samprokṣati vimocayati

original: yadi yānena yāti tadā idaṃ karma /
analyzed: yadi yānena yāti tadā idam karma
ājya tantre sampātya abhimantrya ārohaṇam kuryāt

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'bhadrādadhi' ityṛcā vaṇijadravyaṃ vastravalayāśvādi sarvadravyaṃ sampātyābhimantrya /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā bhadrādadhi iti ṛcā vaṇija dravyam vastra valaya aśva ādi sarva dravyam sampātya abhimantrya
vastra ādi dravyam vikraya artham nayati
yadā dravyam gṛhṇāti tadā idam karma
bhadrāt adhi iti ṛcā abhimantrya gṛhṇāti

original: pathi gṛhe'nyatra vā vaṇijavighāto na bhavati //
analyzed: pathi vā vaṇija vighātaḥ na bhavati

original: yadā viśiṣṭo gṛha āgacchati tadedaṃ maitrīkarma kriyate /
analyzed: yadā viśiṣṭaḥ gṛhe āgacchati tadā idam maitrī karma kriyate

original: mitraṃ tveṣāṃ darśane āgatānāṃ yadā gṛha āgacchati tadedaṃ kuryāt //
analyzed: mitram tu eṣām darśane āgatānām yadā gṛhe āgacchati tadā idam kuryāt

original: ājyatantraṃ kṛtvā 'ubhā jigyathuḥ' ityṛcā hastyādi yānaṃ sampātyābhimantrya tata uttaratantram /
analyzed: ājya tantram kṛtvā ubhā jigyathuḥ iti ṛcā hasti ādi yānam sampātya abhimantrya tatas uttara tantram
tatas paścima digbhāge gatvā punar gṛhe āgacchanti
tatas ubhā jigyathuḥ iti ṛcā udanam abhimantrya prayacchati bhojana artham
ekasmin yuddhe kriyamāṇe sahāya gatasya karma

original: yo yuddhe sāhāyatvaṃ karoti tasyedaṃ karma /
analyzed: yaḥ yuddhe sāhāya tvam karoti tasya idam karma

original: prathamaṃ pādau prakṣālya tataḥ karma ceti /
analyzed: prathamam pādau prakṣālya tatas karma ca iti
samāptam sāmmanasyam artha utthāpanam vighna śamanam yuddha ādi
atha gṛhe viruddhe sati sāmmanasyam ucyate
iti a saṅkalpayan etya sakṛt ādadhāti

original: kartāraṇye gatvā samidho gṛhītvā tūṣṇīṃ gṛha āgatya tataḥ 'ūrjaṃ bibhrat' iti sūktena tāḥ samidhaḥ sakṛtsarvāḥ sūktāntenādadhāti /
analyzed: kartā araṇye gatvā samidhaḥ gṛhītvā tūṣṇīm gṛhe āgatya tatas ūrjam bibhrat iti sūktena tāḥ samidhaḥ sakṛt sarvāḥ sūkta antena ādadhāti
samāptam gṛha sāmmanasyam vighna śamanam ca
mantra brāhmaṇayoḥ dravyam icchati tasya idam karma pratigraha ādi ucyate
abhyātāna antam kṛtvā ṛcam sāma iti ṛcā ājyam juhoti
ṛcam sāma yat aprākṣam iti ṛcā ājyam juhoti
ṛcam sāma iti dvābhyām tṛtīyām āhutim juhoti
anumataye svāhā iti caturthīm āhutim juhoti
veda pāṭhena śāstra pāṭhena artha utthāpanam icchan idam karoti
samāptam vedena śāstreṇa artha utthāpane vighna śamanam

original: apo divyāḥ (7.89) iti paryavetavrata udakānte śāntyudakamabhimantrayate // KauśS_5,6{42}.13 //
analyzed: apaḥ divyāḥ iti paryaveta vrataḥ udaka ante śāntyudakam abhimantrayate

original: astamite samitpāṇiretya tṛtīyāvarjaṃ samidha ādadhāti // KauśS_5,6{42}.14 //
analyzed: astamite samidh pāṇiḥ etya tṛtīyā varjam samidhaḥ ādadhāti

original: yadvrateṣu duritaṃ nijagmimo durhārdaṃ tena śamalenāñjmaḥ //
analyzed: yat vrateṣu duritam nijagmima u durhārdam tena śamalena añjmaḥ

original: yanme vrataṃ vratapate lulobhāhorātre samādhātāṃ ma enat /
analyzed: yat me vratam vrata pate lulobha ahar rātre samādhātām me enat
udyan purastāt bhiṣaj astu candramāḥ sūryaḥ raśmibhiḥ abhigṛṇātu enat
yat vratam atipede cittyā manasā hṛdā
ādityāḥ rudrāḥ tat mayi vasavaḥ ca samindhatām

original: sa me dyumnaṃ bṛhadyaśo dīrghamāyuḥ kṛṇotu me iti vratasamāpanīrādadhāti // KauśS_5,6{42}.17 //]
analyzed: sa me dyumnam bṛhat yaśaḥ dīrgham āyuḥ kṛṇotu me iti vrata samāpanīḥ ādadhāti

original: godānikaṃ tantramājyabhāgāntaṃ kṛtvā tataḥ śāntyudakaṃ kṛtvābhimantrayate /
analyzed: godānikam tantram ājyabhāga antam kṛtvā tatas śāntyudakam kṛtvā abhimantrayate

original: tato'bhyātānādi paridhāpanāntaṃ kṛtvā kecit paridānānte tato'bhyātānaṃ hutvā tata 'idāvatsarāya' iti kalpajaiścaturbhirṛgbhirājyaṃ juhuyāt
analyzed: tatobhyātāna ādi paridhāpana antam kṛtvā kecid paridāna ante tatobhyātānam hutvā tatas idāvatsarāya iti kalpa jaiḥ caturbhiḥ ṛgbhiḥ ājyam juhuyāt
punar idāvatsarāya iti catasraḥ samidha ādadhīta

original: tata 'ṛcaṃ sāma' iti prathamayarcājyāhutiṃ hutvā 'ṛcaṃ sāma yadaprākṣam' iti dvitīyām /
analyzed: tatas ṛcam sāma iti prathamayā ṛcā ājya āhutim hutvā ṛcam sāma yat aprākṣam iti dvitīyām
tri rātram a rasa āśī snāta vratam carati
doṣaḥ gāya iti sūktena bhaktam sampātya abhimantrya aśnāti

original: vedavrataṃ kalpavrataṃ mṛgāravrataṃ viṣāsahivrataṃ yamavrataṃ śirovratam aṅgirovratam ityevamādiṣvabhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'idāvatsarāya' iti vratavisarjanaṃ  #
analyzed: veda vratam kalpa vratam mṛgāra vratam viṣāsahi vratam yama vratam śiraḥ vratam aṅgiraḥ vratam iti evamādiṣu abhyātāna antam kṛtvā idāvatsarāya iti vrata visarjanam

original: yatra kvacid vrataṃ vaidikaṃ laukikaṃ ca tatra sarvatra vratādānaṃ vratavisarjanaṃ ca bhavati vidhānena /
analyzed: yatra kvacid vratam vaidikam laukikam ca tatra sarvatra vrata ādānam vrata visarjanam ca bhavati vidhānena

original: yatra vapanaṃ tatra sarvatra godānikaṃ kuryāt /
analyzed: yatra vapanam tatra sarvatra godānikam kuryāt

original: astamite 'apo divyāḥ' iti tisṛbhiḥ samidha ādadhāti /
analyzed: astamite apaḥ divyāḥ iti tisṛbhiḥ samidhaḥ ādadhāti

atha pāpa lakṣaṇa strī tasyāḥ śāntiḥ ucyate

original: iti pāpalakṣaṇāyā mukhamukṣatyanvṛcaṃ dakṣiṇāt keśastukāt // KauśS_5,6{42}.19 //]
analyzed: iti pāpa lakṣaṇāyāḥ mukham ukṣati anvṛcam dakṣiṇāt keśa stukāt

original: 'nirlakṣmyam' iti sūktena sā strī mukhaṃ pratyṛcaṃ prakṣālayati /
analyzed: nirlakṣmyam iti sūktena sā strī mukham pratyṛcam prakṣālayati

original: tasyā mukhe hastayormaśakaśigruvārakāvasthānatilakaṃ hrasvakeśādipāpalakṣaṇaṃ sāmudrike strīlakṣaṇaṃ vyākhyātam /
analyzed: tasyāḥ mukhe hastayoḥ maśaka śigru vāraka avasthāna tilakam hrasva keśa ādi pāpa lakṣaṇam sāmudrike strī lakṣaṇam vyākhyātam
niḥ lakṣmyam iti sūktena udaka ghaṭam abhimantrya strīm
pāpa lakṣaṇām abhiṣiñcati dakṣiṇāt keśāt ārabhya yāvat uttaram pārśvam
phalīkaraṇa tuṣa busa avatakṣaṇāni savyāyām pāda pārṣṇyām nidadhāti

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'nirlakṣmyam' iti sūktena pālāśaparṇena kukusāñjuhoti /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā nirlakṣmyam iti sūktena pālāśa parṇena kukusān juhoti
homa śeṣān kukusān savyāyām pāda pārṣṇyām nidadhāti
nirlakṣmyam iti sūktena vrīhi tuṣān juhoti
homa śeṣān vrīhi tuṣān savyāyām pāda pārṣṇyām nidadhāti
nirlakṣmyam iti sūktena kāṣṭha avatakṣaṇāni juhoti
iti pāpa lakṣaṇa doṣa śamana śāntiḥ samāptā

original: eko vā yadi vā trīṇi pañca sapta navastathā.
analyzed: ekaḥ vā yadi vā trīṇi pañca sapta navaḥ tathā

original: kākamaithune puruṣasya maithune śyenamaithunadarśane nagnāstrīdarśane nagnapuruṣasya napuṃsakasya darśane puṃścalīcandramaṇḍalaśyāmasya ca
analyzed: kāka maithune puruṣasya maithune śyena maithuna darśane nagna astrī darśane nagna puruṣasya napuṃsakasya darśane puṃścalī candra maṇḍala śyāmasya ca

analyzed: śrutau smṛtau vā paṭhitāḥ a dṛṣṭavyāḥ teṣām sarveṣām darśana idbhutānām darśaneṣu ayam japaḥ kartavyaḥ
anvīkṣam prasiddham adṛṣṭavyāḥ teṣām ayam japaḥ

original: atha puruṣo strī vā kāryakaraṇe vighnaśamane ca karmocyate -
analyzed: atha puruṣaḥ strī vā kārya karaṇe vighna śamane ca karma ucyate

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'dīrghāyutvāya' iti sūktena jaṅgiḍamaṇiṃ śaṇasūtreṇa baddhvā sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti /

iti piśaṅga sūtra maralu daṇḍam yat āyudham

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'karśaphasya' iti sūktena piśaṅgavarṇasūtre'ralumaṇiṃ sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā karśaphasya iti sūktena sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti

original: citradaṇḍe dhvajadaṇḍe cihnadaṇḍe vedayaṣṭau lakuṭādidaṇḍaṃ sarvaṃ sampātya yo dhārayati tasya sarpaśṛṅgidaṃṣṭrādi vighnaṃ na bhavati /

a jñāte jñāte teja vṛddhiḥ ca bhavati

original: 'karśaphasya' iti sūktena phalīkaraṇānagnau prakṣipya vighnagṛhītaṃ puruṣaṃ dhūpayati /

iti uda kumbham agnim ādāya prapadyante

original: tataḥ puṇyāhavācanaṃ kṛtvā 'pūrṇaṃ nārī' ityṛcodakumbhasahitāṃ patnīmabhimantrya bāhyato gṛhaṃ praveśayanti /
analyzed: tatas puṇyāha vācanam kṛtvā pūrṇam nārī iti ṛcā udakumbha sahitām patnīm abhimantrya bāhyatas gṛham praveśayanti

original: [vāstoṣpate prati jānīhyasmān svāveśo anamīvo na edhi /
analyzed: vāstoṣpate prati jānīhi asmān su āveśaḥ anamīvaḥ naḥ edhi

analyzed: yat tvā īmahe prati naḥ tat juṣasva catuṣpadaḥ dvipadaḥ ā veśaya iha

original: 'ye agnayaḥ' iti saptarcena sūktena pālāśyudañcanenodakaṃ juhoti agnau /
analyzed: ye agnayaḥ iti sapta ṛcena sūktena pālāśī udañcanena udakam juhoti agnau

original: 'ye agnayaḥ' iti saptarcenodadhānyāstadudakaṃ codakapātryāṃ pālāśyāṃ yavān prakṣipya tataḥ pratyṛcaṃ juhotyagnau /
analyzed: ye agnayaḥ iti saptarcena uda dhānyāḥ tat udakam ca udaka pātryām pālāśyām yavān prakṣipya tatas pratyṛcam juhoti agnau
kule kalaha kumāra vatsa maraṇa go maraṇa ādi dhana dhānya vināśa ādi cintita udvega ādi kravyāda cihnāni

original: [ye agnayaḥ (3.21) iti pālāśyā darvyā manthamupamathya kāmpīlībhyāmupamanthanībhyām // KauśS_5,7{43}.20 //]
analyzed: ye agnayaḥ iti pālāśyā darvyā mantham upamathya kāmpīlībhyām upamanthanībhyām

original: 'ye agnayaḥ' iti daśarcena sūktena saktūdakaṃ kāmpīlasamiddvayena manthamāloḍya tataḥ pālāśyā darvyā juhoti pratyṛcam /
analyzed: ye agnayaḥ iti daśarcena sūktena saktu udakam kāmpīla samidh dvayena mantham āloḍya tatas pālāśyā darvyā juhoti pratyṛcam

original: laukike vāgnau gṛha āvasathye vā śāntikapauṣṭikārthe manthane vā yatra vā kravyādopahatirdṛśyate tatra sarvatra kuryāditi //
analyzed: laukike vā agnau gṛhe āvasathye vā śāntika pauṣṭika arthe manthane vā yatra vā kravyāda upahatiḥ dṛśyate tatra sarvatra kuryāt iti

original: 'ye agnayaḥ' iti daśarcena sūktena vaśāmabhimantrya tato brāhmaṇāya dadāti /
analyzed: ye agnayaḥ iti daśarcena sūktena vaśām abhimantrya tatas brāhmaṇāya dadāti

original: yasya gṛhe vaśā bhavati jāyate tad gṛhaṃ daivahataṃ jānīyāt /
analyzed: yasya gṛhe vaśā bhavati jāyate tat gṛham daiva hatam jānīyāt
yaḥ ātma dāḥ iti vaśā śamanam

original: paścādagneḥ prāṅmukha upaviśyānvārabdhāyai śāntyudakaṃ karoti // KauśS_5,8{44}.3 //]
analyzed: paścāt agneḥ prāc mukhaḥ upaviśya anvārabdhāyai śāntyudakam karoti

original: pākatantramājyabhāgāntaṃ kṛtvā purastādagneḥ pratīcīṃ gāṃ dhārayitvā paścādagneḥ prāṅmukha upaviśya kartā śāntyudakaṃ
analyzed: pāka tantram ājyabhāga antam kṛtvā purastāt agneḥ pratīcīm gām dhārayitvā paścāt agneḥ prāc mukhaḥ upaviśya kartā śāntyudakam

original: kāṣṭhena tṛṇena vā 'ya ātmadā' iti sūktaṃ śāntyudake'nuyojayet //
analyzed: kāṣṭhena tṛṇena vā yaḥ ātma dāḥ iti sūktam śāntyudakena uyojayet
tena enām ācāmayati ca samprokṣati ca

original: mātalyantena śāntyudakenācāmayati ca samprokṣati ca vaśām //
analyzed: mātali antena śāntyudakena ācāmayati ca samprokṣati ca vaśām
vāstoṣpati ādi catur gaṇī mahāśāntim uccais abhinigadati

original: iti hutvā vaśāmanakti śirasi kakude jaghanadeśe // KauśS_5,8{44}.7 //]
analyzed: iti hutvā vaśām anakti śirasi kakude jaghana deśe

original: 'ya īśe paśupatiḥ' iti sūktenājyaṃ hutvā tato vaśāyā śirasi anakti kakude skandhe jaghanadeśe //
analyzed: yaḥ īśe paśupatiḥ iti sūktena ājyam hutvā tatas vaśāyāḥ śirasi anakti kakude skandhe jaghana deśe

original: dakṣiṇe pārśve darbhābhyāmadhikṣipati amuṣmai tvā juṣṭam iti yathādevatam // KauśS_5,8{44}.10 //
analyzed: dakṣiṇe pārśve darbhābhyām adhikṣipati amuṣmai tvā juṣṭam iti yathādevatam

original: niḥsālām (2.14) ityulmukena triḥ prasavyaṃ pariharatyanabhipariharannātmānam // KauśS_5,8{44}.11 //]
analyzed: niḥsālām iti ulmukena tris prasavyam pariharati an abhipariharan ātmānam

original: dakṣiṇe pārśve darbhābhyāṃ dvābhyāmadhikṣipati 'prajāpataye tvādhikṣipāmi' ityanena mantreṇa /
analyzed: dakṣiṇe pārśve darbhābhyām dvābhyām adhikṣipati prajāpataye tvā adhikṣipāmi iti anena mantreṇa

original: 'niḥsālām' iti sūktenolmukena triḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ paribhrāmayitvā paśuṃ madhye kṛtvātmānaṃ hi //
analyzed: niḥsālām iti sūktena ulmukena tris pradakṣiṇam paribhrāmayitvā paśum madhye kṛtvā ātmānam hi
paścāt uttaratas agneḥ pratyak śīrṣīm udak pādīm nividhyati

original: samasyai tanvā bhava ityanyataraṃ darbhamavāsyati // KauśS_5,8{44}.14 //]
analyzed: sam asyai tanvā bhave iti anyataram darbham avāsyati

original: paścāduttarato'gnervaśāṃ nītvā tata ekaṃ darbhaṃ 'samasyai' iti mantreṇa bhūmau kṛtvā tata upari vaśāṃ pātayati pratyakśīrṣīmudakpādīṃ nividhyati
analyzed: paścāt uttaratas agneḥ vaśām nītvā tatas ekam darbham samasyai iti mantreṇa bhūmau kṛtvā tatas upari vaśām pātayati pratyak śīrṣīm udak pādīm nividhyati

original: tataḥ samidādhvaryurvaśāmukhaṃ nirodhayati nirucchvāsaṃ karoti mārayati 'prajānantaḥ' ityṛcā //
analyzed: tatas samidhā adhvaryuḥ vaśā mukham nirodhayati nirucchvāsam karoti mārayati prajānantaḥ iti ṛcā
sañjñaptāyām juhoti yat vaśā māyum akrata uraḥ vā paḍbhiḥ āhata
agniḥ mā tasmāt enasaḥ viśvāt muñcatu aṃhasaḥ iti
yat vaśā māyum iti ṛcā kalpa jayā ājyam juhoti sañjñaptāyām
tatas patnī uda pātram gṛhītvā paśu samīpam gacchati
uda pātreṇa patnī abhivrajya mukha ādīni gātrāṇi prakṣālayate
tatas paśoḥ mukha ādīni gātrāṇi prakṣālayati

original: yatte krūraṃ yadāsthitam iti samantaṃ rajjudhānam // KauśS_5,8{44}.23 //
analyzed: yat te krūram yat āsthitam iti samantam rajjudhānam

original: 'mukhaṃ śundhasva devayajyāyai' iti mantraṃ kartā brūyāt /
analyzed: mukham śundhasva deva yajyāyai iti mantram kartā brūyāt
prāṇān śundhasva deva yajyāyai iti prāṇān
yat te krūram yat āsthitam iti samantam rajjudhānam
nābhim śundhasva deva yajyāyai iti nābhim
pāyum śundhasva iti pāyum pratimantram gātra prakṣālanam

original: [yatte krūraṃ yadāsthitaṃ tacchundhasva ityavaśiṣṭāḥ pārśvadeśe'vasicya yathārthaṃ vrajati // KauśS_5,8{44}.28 //]
analyzed: yat te krūram yat āsthitam tat śundhasva iti avaśiṣṭāḥ pārśva deśā iva sicya yathārtham vrajati

original: śeṣamudakaṃ pārśvadeśe nikṣipya 'yatte krūraṃ yadāsthitaṃ tacchundhasva' iti mantreṇa tato patnī yathārthaṃ vrajati //
analyzed: śeṣam udakam pārśva deśe nikṣipya yat te krūram yat āsthitam tat śundhasva iti mantreṇa patnī yathārtham vrajati

original: [vapāśrapaṇyāvājyaṃ sruvaṃ svadhitiṃ darbhamādāyābhivrajyottānāṃ parivartmānulomaṃ nābhideśe darbhamāstṛṇāti // KauśS_5,8{44}.29 //]
analyzed: vapāśrapaṇyau ājyam sruvam svadhitim darbham ādāya abhivrajya uttānām parivartma anulomam nābhi deśe darbham āstṛṇāti

original: tato vapāśrapaṇyāvājyaṃ sruvaṃ svadhitiṃ darbhamādāya paśusthāne gacchati /
analyzed: tatas vapāśrapaṇyau ājyam sruvam svadhitim darbham ādāya paśu sthāne gacchati

original: auṣadhe trāyasvainaṃ svadhite mainaṃ hiṃsīḥ iti śastraṃ prayacchati // KauśS_5,8{44}.30 //
analyzed: auṣadhe trāyasva enam svadhite mā enam hiṃsīḥ iti śastram prayacchati

idam aham āmuṣyāyaṇasya amuṣyāḥ putrasya prāṇa apānau apakṛntāmi iti apakṛtya

original: 'idamahaṃ mahumadasya bhūtikarṇaputrasya' ityanena mantreṇa darbhasahitaṃ nābhideśaṃ chinatti //
analyzed: idam aham mahumadasya bhūtikarṇa putrasya iti anena mantreṇa darbha sahitam nābhi deśam chinatti

original: idamahamāmuṣyāyaṇasyāmuṣyāḥ putrasya prāṇāpānau nikhanāmi ityāsye nikhanati // KauśS_5,8{44}.33 //]
analyzed: idam aham āmuṣyāyaṇasya amuṣyāḥ putrasya prāṇa apānau nikhanāmi iti āsye nikhanati
idam aham iti mantreṇa avara darbha khaṇḍam lohita liptam āsya sthāne ipahanti

original: [vapayā dyāvāpṛthivī prorṇuvāthām iti vapāśrapaṇyau vapayā pracchādya // KauśS_5,8{44}.34 //
analyzed: vapayā dyāvāpṛthivī prorṇuvāthām iti vapāśrapaṇyau vapayā pracchādya

original: 'vapayā dyāvāpṛthivī' ityanena vapāśrapaṇyau vapayā pracchādya svadhitinā prakṛtyotkṛtya tataśchedanasthānaṃ ghṛtenābhighārya /
analyzed: vapayā dyāvāpṛthivī iti anena vapāśrapaṇyau vapayā pracchādya svadhitinā prakṛtya utkṛtya tatas chedana sthānam ghṛtena abhighārya

devaḥ tvā savitā śrapayatu iti śrapayati

original: [yadyaṣṭāpadī syād garbhañjalau sahiraṇyaṃ sayavaṃ vā ya ātmadā (4.3)
analyzed: yadi aṣṭāpadī syāt garbhañjalau sa hiraṇyam sa yavam vā yaḥ ātma dāḥ
iti khadāyām tri aratnau agnau sakṛt juhoti

original: yadyaṣṭāpadī syād garbhañjalau sahiraṇyaṃ sayavaṃ vā 'ya ātmadā' iti sūktena khadāyāṃ tryaratnāvagnau sakṛjjuhoti //
analyzed: yadi aṣṭāpadī syāt garbhañjalau sa hiraṇyam sa yavam vā yaḥ ātma dāḥ iti sūktena khadāyām tri aratnau agnau sakṛt juhoti

original: hṛdayaṃ jihvā śyenaśca doṣī pārśve ca tāni ṣaṭ /
analyzed: hṛdayam jihvā śyenaḥ ca doṣī pārśve ca tāni ṣaḍ

original: etāni trīṇi tryaṅgāni sviṣṭakṛdbhāga eva // KauśS_5,9{45}.4 //
analyzed: etāni trīṇi tri aṅgāni sviṣṭakṛt bhāgaḥ eva

original: 'ūrdhvā asya' iti sūktena dvitīyaṃ khaṇḍaṃ juhoti //
analyzed: ūrdhvāḥ asya iti sūktena dvitīyam khaṇḍam juhoti

original: 'samiddho adya' 'ūrdhvā asya' iti sūktābhyāṃ tṛtīyaṃ khaṇḍaṃ juhoti //
analyzed: samiddhaḥ adya ūrdhvā asya iti sūktābhyām tṛtīyam khaṇḍam juhoti

original: [jātavedo vapayā gaccha devāṃstvaṃ hi hotā prathamo babhūtha /
analyzed: jātavedaḥ vapayā gaccha devān tvam hi hotā prathamaḥ babhūtha

original: ghṛtasyāgne tanvā saṃ bhava satyāḥ santu yajamānasya kāmāḥ svāhā // KauśS_5,9{45}.11 //]
analyzed: ghṛtasya agne tanvā sam bhava satyāḥ santu yajamānasya kāmāḥ svāhā

analyzed: tatas jātavedaḥ vapayā gaccha devān iti mantreṇa ājyam juhoti

original: [ūrdhvaṃ nabhasaṃ mārutaṃ gacchatam iti vapāśrapaṇyāvanupraharati // KauśS_5,9{45}.12 //
analyzed: ūrdhvam nabhasam mārutam gacchatam iti vapāśrapaṇyau anupraharati

original: 'ūrdhvaṃ nabhasaṃ mārutaṃ gacchatam' ityanena mantreṇa vapāśrapaṇyau dve saha juhoti /

original: [pitryeṣu vaha vapāṃ jātavedaḥ pitṛbhyo yatraitān vettha nihitān parāke /
analyzed: pitryeṣu vaha vapām jātavedaḥ pitṛbhyaḥ yatra etān vettha nihitān parāke

original: medasaḥ kulyā upa tān sravantu satyā
analyzed: medasaḥ kulyāḥ upa tān sravantu satyā

original: eṣāmāśiṣaḥ santu kāmāḥ svāhā svadhā iti vapāyāstrirjuhoti // KauśS_5,9{45}.14 //
analyzed: eṣām āśiṣaḥ santu kāmāḥ svāhā svadhā iti vapāyāḥ tris juhoti

original: punaḥ 'ya ātmadā' iti sūktena caruṃ juhoti //
analyzed: punar yaḥ ātma dāḥ iti sūktena carum juhoti

original: [sthālīpākasya samrāḍasyadhiśrayaṇaṃ nāma sakhīnāmabhyahaṃ viśvā āśāḥ sākṣīya /
analyzed: sthālīpākasya samrāj asi adhiśrayaṇam nāma sakhīnām abhi aham viśvāḥ āśāḥ sākṣīya

original: kāmo'si kāmāya tvā sarvavīrāya sarvapuruṣāya sarvagaṇāya sarvakāmāya juhomi //
analyzed: kāmaḥ asi kāmāya tvā sarva vīrāya sarva puruṣāya sarva gaṇāya sarva kāmāya juhomi
anu adya nonumatiḥ pūṣā sarasvatī mahī

original: yat karomi tadṛdhyatāmanumataye svāhā iti juhoti // KauśS_5,9{45}.16 //]
analyzed: yat karomi tat ṛdhyatām anumataye svāhā iti juhoti
samrāj asi adhi iti mantreṇa ājyam juhoti

original: 'sarvavīrāya svāhā sarvapuruṣāya svāhā sarvagaṇāya svāhā sarvakāmāya svāhā' catasra āhutīrjuhoti /
analyzed: sarva vīrāya svāhā sarva puruṣāya svāhā sarva gaṇāya svāhā sarva kāmāya svāhā catasraḥ āhutīḥ juhoti

original: pūṣā sarasvatī mahī yatkaromi tadṛdhyatāmanumataye svāhā' juhoti /
analyzed: pūṣā sarasvatī mahī yat karomi tat ṛdhyatām anumataye svāhā juhoti

original: pārvaṇādi prajāpatiṃ ca hutvā tataḥ sakṛnmāṃsaṃ caruṃ cāvadya sviṣṭakṛtaṃ yajati /

original: daivahataṃ tasya gṛhaṃ yasya gṛhe vaśā jāyate /

original: abhimantrya vā dadāti śamanaṃ vā vidhānena kuryāt /
analyzed: abhimantrya vā dadāti śamanam vā vidhānena kuryāt

original: dhātāraṃ ca paśunā ca purohitapariśiṣṭeṣu paṭhyate /
analyzed: dhātāram ca paśunā ca purohita pariśiṣṭeṣu paṭhyate

original: 'chāgena svahutena trayodaśamāsān' ityādi puṣṭikarmaṇāmupadhānamadhye paśuḥ paṭhitaḥ /
analyzed: chāgena sva hutena trayodaśa māsān ityādi puṣṭikarmaṇām upadhāna madhye paśuḥ paṭhitaḥ

original: tathā vaitānasūtre aindrāgnaḥ paśurāyuḥprajāpaśukāmasyetyādayaḥ kāmyāḥ paśavaḥ /
analyzed: tathā vaitānasūtre aindrāgnaḥ paśuḥ āyuḥ prajā paśu kāmasya ityādayaḥ kāmyāḥ paśavaḥ

original: pākayajñamājyabhāgāntaṃ kṛtvā śāntyudakābhivādanaparyantaṃ kṛtvā 'ya īśe paśupatiḥ paśūnām' ityādi bhavati /
analyzed: pākayajñam ājyabhāga antam kṛtvā śāntyudaka abhivādana paryantam kṛtvā yaḥ īśe paśupatiḥ paśūnām ityādi bhavati
samiddhaḥ adya iti ūrdhvā asya iti vapā homaḥ

original: atha pitryeṣu kāmyeṣu viśeṣaḥ tatra 'vaha vapām' ityṛcā trirāvṛttiḥ /
analyzed: atha pitryeṣu kāmyeṣu viśeṣaḥ tatra vaha vapām iti ṛcā tris āvṛttiḥ
tathā carum vaha vapām iti tris juhoti

original: atha duṣṭe pratigrahe saumye vā kṛte yājane vā dakṣiṇāpratigrahaṇe yena karmaṇā pāpaṃ vinaśyati taducyate-
analyzed: atha duṣṭe pratigrahe saumye vā kṛte yājane vā dakṣiṇā pratigrahaṇe yena karmaṇā pāpam vinaśyati tat ucyate
kaḥ idam iti dvābhyām ṛgbhyām pratigraham abhimantrya gṛhṇāti
kāmaḥ tat agre iti sūktena pratigraham abhimantrya gṛhṇāti
yat annam iti tṛcena sūktena pratigraham abhimantrya gṛhṇāti
punar mā etu indriyam iti ṛcā pratigraham abhimantrya gṛhṇāti

original: sarvāṇi karmāṇi kṛtvā 'punarmaitvindriyam' ityṛcā karma samāpya tata ātmānamanumantrayate /
analyzed: sarvāṇi karmāṇi kṛtvā punar mā etu indriyam iti ṛcā karma samāpya tatas ātmānam anumantrayate

original: sandhyāvandana ājyatantre pākatantre'smin karmaṇi nityanaimittikakāmyeṣu 'punarmaitvindriyam' ityṛcātmahṛdayamanumantrayate //
analyzed: sandhyā vandane ājya tantre pāka tantre smin karmaṇi nitya naimittika kāmyeṣu punar mā etu indriyam iti ṛcā ātma hṛdayam anumantrayate

original: atha akṛte pāpe loke pāpavacanamutpadyate tatra śāntirucyate -
analyzed: atha akṛte pāpe loke pāpa vacanam utpadyate tatra śāntiḥ ucyate

original: 'utāmṛtāsuḥ' ityṛcābhyākhyātamagre kṛtvā gṛhe praviśya tūṣṇīṃ tataḥ saktumanthamabhimantryābhyākhyātāya dadāti /
analyzed: uta amṛta asuḥ iti ṛcā abhyākhyātam agre kṛtvā gṛhe praviśya tūṣṇīm tatas saktu mantham abhimantrya abhyākhyātāya dadāti

original: prathamamagre kṛtvābhyākhyātaṃ gṛhe praveśya kartā paścāt praviśati /
analyzed: prathamam agre kṛtvā abhyākhyātam gṛhe praveśya kartā paścāt praviśati
śivāḥ te santu oṣadhayaḥ iti ṛcā saktu mantham abhimantrya tatobhyākhātāya dadāti
uta amṛta asuḥ iti ṛcā bhaktam abhimantrya dadāti
śivāḥ te santu oṣadhayaḥ iti ṛcā bhaktam abhimantrya dadāti

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'utāmṛtāsuḥ' ityṛcā drughaṇamaṇiṃ sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā uta amṛta asuḥ iti ṛcā drughaṇa maṇim sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti

original: ājyatantraṃ kṛtvā 'śivāste santvoṣadhayaḥ' ityṛcā drughaṇamaṇiṃ sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: ājya tantram kṛtvā śivāḥ te santu oṣadhayaḥ iti ṛcā drughaṇa maṇim sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti

original: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'utāmṛtāsuḥ' ityṛcā pālāśamaṇiṃ drughaṇasadṛśaṃ kṛtvā tataḥ sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: tantram kṛtvā uta amṛta asuḥ iti ṛcā pālāśa maṇim drughaṇa sadṛśam kṛtvā tatas sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti

original: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'śivāste' ityṛcā pālāśakāṣṭhamaṇiṃ drughaṇapratirūpaṃ kṛtvā sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: tantram kṛtvā śivāḥ te iti ṛcā pālāśa kāṣṭha maṇim drughaṇa pratirūpam kṛtvā sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'utāmṛtāsuḥ' ityṛcā lohamaṇiṃ drughaṇasadṛśaṃ kṛtvā sampātyābhimantryābhiśaste badhnāti /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā uta amṛta asuḥ iti ṛcā loha maṇim drughaṇa sadṛśam kṛtvā sampātya abhimantrya abhiśaste badhnāti

original: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'śivāste' ityṛcā kṛṣṇalohamaṇiṃ drughaṇasadṛśaṃ kṛtvā sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: tantram kṛtvā śivāḥ te iti ṛcā kṛṣṇaloha maṇim drughaṇa sadṛśam kṛtvā sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti

original: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'utāmṛtāsuḥ' ityṛcā tāmramaṇiṃ drughaṇasadṛśaṃ kṛtvā sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: tantram kṛtvā uta amṛta asuḥ iti ṛcā tāmra maṇim drughaṇa sadṛśam kṛtvā sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti

original: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'śivāste' ityṛcā tāmramayadrughaṇapratirūpaṃ maṇiṃ kṛtvā sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: tantram kṛtvā śivāḥ te iti ṛcā tāmra maya drughaṇa pratirūpam maṇim kṛtvā sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'utāmṛtāsuḥ' ityṛcā hiraṇyamaṇiṃ drughaṇapratirūpaṃ kṛtvā sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā uta amṛta asuḥ iti ṛcā hiraṇya maṇim drughaṇa pratirūpam kṛtvā sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'śivāste' ityṛcā hiraṇyamayamaṇiṃ kṛtvā drughaṇapratirūpaṃ sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā śivāḥ te iti ṛcā hiraṇya maya maṇim kṛtvā drughaṇa pratirūpam sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti

original: akṛte pāpe nindā yasya bhavati tasyedaṃ karma /
analyzed: akṛte pāpe nindā yasya bhavati tasya idam karma
yadi pāpa śravaṇam bhavati tadā idam karma

original: ekasmin viṣaye yatra bahūni karmāṇi paṭhitāni tatraikaṃ kuryād dve vā sarvāṇi vā //
analyzed: ekasmin viṣaye yatra bahūni karmāṇi paṭhitāni tatra ekam kuryāt dve vā sarvāṇi vā

original: atha yāge kriyamāṇe yena karmaṇā vighnaśamanaṃ bhavati taducyate -
analyzed: atha yāge kriyamāṇe yena karmaṇā vighna śamanam bhavati tat ucyate
yena somaḥ iti yājayiṣyan sārūpavatsam aśnāti

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'yena soma' iti sūktena sārūpavatsaṃ pāyasaṃ sampātyābhimantrya ṛtvijo yajamānaṃ cāśayati /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā yena somaḥ iti sūktena sārūpavatsam pāyasam sampātya abhimantrya ṛtvijaḥ yajamānam ca āśayati

original: somadevatyaṃ caruṃ pākayajñavidhānenājyabhāgāntaṃ kṛtvā 'yena soma' iti tṛcena caruṃ juhoti /
analyzed: soma devatyam carum pākayajña vidhānena ājyabhāga antam kṛtvā yena somaḥ iti tṛcena carum juhoti
samāptam soma yāge yājana doṣa śamanam vighna śamanam ca
anena karmaṇā a yājya yājana doṣāt mucyate
atha dhana dhānya ādi pratigraha ādi yācanam icchan idam karma kṛtvā yācati

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'yaṃ yācāmi' ityṛcā sārūpavatsaṃ pāyasaṃ śrapayitvā sampātyābhimantryāśnāti /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā yam yācāmi iti ṛcā sārūpavatsam pāyasam śrapayitvā sampātya abhimantrya aśnāti

original: ājyatantraṃ kṛtvā 'yadāśasā' iti dvābhyāmṛgbhyāṃ sārūpavatsaṃ pāyasaṃ sampātyābhimantryāśnāti /
analyzed: ājya tantram kṛtvā yat āśasā iti dvābhyām ṛgbhyām sārūpavatsam pāyasam sampātya abhimantrya aśnāti

original: atha kapota ulūke vā gṛhe praviṣṭe'nyatrābhīṣṭadeśe'pi tatra śāntirucyate -
analyzed: atha kapote ulūke vā gṛhe tatra śāntiḥ ucyate

original: śāntyudakaṃ vidhānena kṛtvā tato mātalīṃ na karoti /
analyzed: śāntyudakam vidhānena kṛtvā tatas mātalīm na karoti

original: 'devāḥ kapotaḥ' 'ṛcā kapotam' 'amūn hetiḥ' iti sūktatrayaṃ vāstoṣpatyaṃ cātanaṃ mātṛnāmā śāntigaṇaḥ ete catvāro gaṇāḥ /
analyzed: devāḥ kapotaḥ ṛcā kapotam amūn hetiḥ iti sūkta trayam vāstoṣpatyam cātanam mātṛnāmā śānti gaṇaḥ ete catvāraḥ gaṇāḥ

original: rātrau tena śāntyudakena tatsthānaṃ prokṣati 'yatāyai' ityetairmantraiḥ /
analyzed: rātrau tena śāntyudakena tad sthānam prokṣati yatāyai iti etaiḥ mantraiḥ

original: ityagniṃ gāmādāya niśi kārayamāṇastriḥ śālāṃ pariṇayati // KauśS_5,10{46}.8 //]
analyzed: iti agnim gām ādāya niśi kārayamāṇaḥ tris śālām pariṇayati

original: 'parīme'gnim' ityṛcā gāmagniṃ gṛhītvā triḥ śālāṃ pariṇayati /
analyzed: pari imā ignim iti ṛcā gām agnim gṛhītvā tris śālām pariṇayati

original: araṇyake pakṣiṇi praviṣṭa idaṃ karma kuryāt /
analyzed: araṇyake pakṣiṇi praviṣṭe idam karma kuryāt
dvipada catuṣpada vināśaḥ vede śrūyate tasya doṣa śamanam

original: atha svapnādhyāye paṭhita ugre svapnadarśane śāntirucyate /
analyzed: atha svapnādhyāye paṭhite ugre svapna darśane śāntiḥ ucyate
svapnādhyāya paṭhitam duḥsvapnam rudra bhāṣyakāra matena

original: pakvamāṃse pretadamane pariṣvaṅgamarkaṭaśakaṭe dṛṣṭvā tailābhyaṅge nagnapuruṣadarśane nagnastrīdarśane ca kālasūtretyādi svapnādhyāyapaṭhitā  #
analyzed: pakva māṃse pretadamane pariṣvaṅgam arkaṭa śakaṭe dṛṣṭvā taila abhyaṅge nagna puruṣa darśane nagna strī darśane ca kālasūtra ityādi svapna adhyāya paṭhitā

original: iti svapnaṃ dṛṣṭvā mukhaṃ vimārṣṭi // KauśS_5,10{46}.9 //
atighoraṃ dṛṣṭvā maiśradhānyaṃ puroḍāśamanyāśāyāṃ vā nidadhāti // KauśS_5,10{46}.10 //]
analyzed: ati ghoram dṛṣṭvā maiśradhānyam puroḍāśam anya āśāyām vā nidadhāti

original: 'paro'pehi' 'yo na jīvaḥ' iti sūktābhyāṃ svapnaṃ kutsitaṃ dṛṣṭvā mukhaṃ prakṣālayati /
analyzed: paropehi yaḥ na jīvaḥ iti sūktābhyām svapnam kutsitam dṛṣṭvā mukham prakṣālayati

original: 'paro'pehi' 'yo na jīvaḥ' iti sūktābhyāṃ maiśradhānyaṃ puroḍāśaṃ śrapayitvāgnau juhoti /
analyzed: paropehi yaḥ na jīvaḥ iti sūktābhyām maiśradhānyam puroḍāśam śrapayitvā agnau juhoti

original: 'paro'pehi' 'yo na jīvaḥ' iti sūktābhyāṃ dvitīyaṃ puroḍāśaṃ śrapayitvā'bhimantrya śatrukṣetre nidadhāti /
analyzed: paropehi yaḥ na jīvaḥ iti sūktābhyām dvitīyam puroḍāśam śrapayitvā abhimantrya śatru kṣetre nidadhāti
annam svapne bhakṣayati tadā idam karoti
atha punar ghora duḥsvapna nāśana karma ucyate

original: 'vidma te svapna' iti ekena paryāyeṇa duḥsvapnaṃ dṛṣṭvā mukhaṃ vimārṣṭi /
analyzed: vidma te svapne iti ekena paryāyeṇa duḥsvapnam dṛṣṭvā mukham vimārṣṭi

original: 'vidma te svapna' iti sūktena svapnaṃ dṛṣṭvā pārśveṇa dvitīyena bhayate /
analyzed: vidma te svapne iti sūktena svapnam dṛṣṭvā pārśveṇa dvitīyena bhayate

original: 'vidma te svapna' iti sūktenānnaṃ svapne dṛṣṭvā nirīkṣate /
analyzed: vidma te svapne iti sūktena annam svapne dṛṣṭvā nirīkṣate

original: 'vidma te svapna' iti sūktena maiśradhānyaṃ puroḍāśaṃ juhoti /
analyzed: vidma te svapne iti sūktena maiśradhānyam puroḍāśam juhoti

original: atha ācārye mṛte brahmacārīdaṃ karma karoti śreyaskāmaḥ -
analyzed: atha ācārye mṛte brahmacārī idam karma karoti śreyaskāmaḥ

original: iti brahmacāryācāryasyādahana upasamādhāya triḥ parikramya puroḍāśaṃ juhoti // KauśS_5,10{46}.14 //
analyzed: iti brahmacārī ācāryasya ādahane upasamādhāya tris parikramya puroḍāśam juhoti

original: ityādi pañca sāmidhenīhutvā tato dahanaṃ triḥ paribhrāmya tato 'na hi te agne tanvaḥ' iti sūktāntena puroḍāśaṃ juhoti tasmin dahane /
analyzed: ityādi pañca sāmidhenī hutvā tatas dahanam tris paribhrāmya tatas na hi te agne tanvaḥ iti sūkta antena puroḍāśam juhoti tasmin dahane
tri rātram tasya dahana samīpe śeta abhimukha sthitaḥ

original: 'apo divyāḥ' (7.94) iti catasṛbhirṛgbhiḥ snānaṃ kṛtvā trirātraṃ gṛha āgatya tataḥ śayīteti kauśikamatam /
analyzed: apaḥ divyāḥ iti catasṛbhiḥ ṛgbhiḥ snānam kṛtvā tri rātram gṛhe āgatya tatas śayīta iti kauśika matam

original: prāyaścittaṃ kṛtvā tataḥ samāvartanaṃ kuryāt ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: prāyaścittam kṛtvā tatas samāvartanam kuryāt iti arthaḥ

original: atha brahmacārī striyā maithunasaṃyoga idaṃ karoti so'vakīrṇītyucyate /
analyzed: atha brahmacārī striyā maithuna saṃyoge idam karoti sā uvakīrṇī iti ucyate
avakīrṇine darbha śulbam āsajya yat te devī

original: brahmacāriṇaṃ darbharajjvā kaṇṭhe baddhvā 'yatte devī nirṛtiḥ' iti sūktena tilāñjuhoti /
analyzed: brahmacāriṇam darbha rajjvā kaṇṭhe baddhvā yat te devī nirṛtiḥ iti sūktena tilān juhoti

original: brahmacāriṇaṃ darbharajjvā kaṇṭhe baddhvā tato 'yatte devī nirṛtiḥ' iti sūktena vrīhiñjuhoti /
analyzed: brahmacāriṇam darbha rajjvā kaṇṭhe baddhvā tatas yat te devī nirṛtiḥ iti sūktena vrīhin juhoti

original: avakīrṇinaṃ darbharajjvā kaṇṭhe baddhvā abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'yatte devī' iti sūktenodapātraṃ sampātya tato darbharajjvā samprokṣya tato 'yatte  #
analyzed: avakīrṇinam darbha rajjvā kaṇṭhe baddhvā abhyātāna antam kṛtvā yat te devī iti sūktena uda pātram sampātya tatas darbha rajjvā samprokṣya tatas yat te

original: darbharajjvāvakīrṇinaṃ kaṇṭhe baddhvā tataḥ śāntyudakaṃ kṛtvā tato 'yatte devī' iti sūktena prokṣya tataḥ sūktenaiva darbharajjuṃ muñcati /
analyzed: darbha rajjvā avakīrṇinam kaṇṭhe baddhvā tatas śāntyudakam kṛtvā tatas yat te devī iti sūktena prokṣya tatas sūktena eva darbha rajjum muñcati
atha svayam prajvalita ignau prāyaścittam ucyate
sam samidh iti svayam prajvalita ignau
sam samidh iti ṛcā yavān juhoti
sam samidh iti ṛcā tilān juhoti
yadi jvalati svayam agniḥ tadā idam karma
atha agni śabda karaṇe śāntiḥ ucyate
agniḥ rakṣāṃsi iti ṛcā agnim upatiṣṭhate igni sedhane eṣā śāntiḥ
yat asmṛti iti sandeśam a paryāpya
atha sandeśe vismṛte yat asmṛti iti ṛcā agnim upatiṣṭhate

original: yadi grāme vā gṛhe vā sandeśaṃ na kathayati tadā idaṃ prāyaścittam //
analyzed: yadi grāme vā gṛhe vā sandeśam na kathayati tadā idam prāyaścittam

original: atha pāpanakṣatre jāte strī vā puruṣo vā yo jātastasya śāntirucyate -
analyzed: atha pāpa nakṣatre jāte strī vā puruṣaḥ vā yaḥ jātaḥ tasya śāntiḥ ucyate

original: [pratno hi (6.110) iti pāpanakṣatre jātāya mūlena // KauśS_5,10{46}.25 //]
analyzed: pratnaḥ hi iti pāpa nakṣatre jātāya mūlena

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā tasya muñjarajjvā kaṇṭhe ca pāde ca baddhvā tataḥ 'pratno hi' iti sūktenodakaghaṭaṃ sampātyābhimantrya darbhapiñjūlī ghaṭe  #
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā tasya muñja rajjvā kaṇṭhe ca pāde ca baddhvā tatas pratnaḥ hi iti sūktena udaka ghaṭam sampātya abhimantrya darbha piñjūlī ghaṭe
grīvām pāśam nadī pheneṣu nidadhāti nadīnām phenān
iti ardharcena kaṭi pāśam udaka madhye prakṣipati

original: mātṛpitṛbhrātṛṣu doṣaḥ śrūyate tasmāt pāpanakṣatre śāntiḥ kartavyeti /
analyzed: mātṛ pitṛ bhrātṛṣu doṣaḥ śrūyate tasmāt pāpa nakṣatre śāntiḥ kartavyā iti

original: ārdrāśleṣā maghā citrā svāti viśākhā jyeṣṭhā mūlaṃ śatabhiṣak bharaṇī etāni pāpanakṣatrāṇi /
analyzed: ārdrā āśleṣā maghā citrā svāti viśākhā jyeṣṭhā mūlam śatabhiṣaj bharaṇī etāni pāpa nakṣatrāṇi

original: eteṣu yo jāyate tasyedaṃ karma gaṇḍena sandhau ca /
analyzed: eteṣu yaḥ jāyate tasya idam karma gaṇḍena sandhau ca
yaḥ nakṣatrakalpa uktam karma kuryāt tat ucyate

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'pratno hi' iti sūktenāgamakṣīraudanaṃ sampātyābhimantryāśnāti /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā pratnaḥ hi iti sūktena āgama kṣīra odanam sampātya abhimantrya aśnāti

original: etasmin tantre samūlaṃ barhi stṛṇāti samūlamidhmamupasamādhāyaiṣa viśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: etasmin tantre sa mūlam barhiḥ stṛṇāti sa mūlam idhmam upasamādhāya eṣa viśeṣaḥ
āplāvana avasecane ca kṣīraudana prāśanam ca etāni trīṇi

original: athavā 'pratno hi' iti sūktenodakamabhimantrya pāpanakṣatrajātamavasiñcati śirasi /
analyzed: athavā pratnaḥ hi iti sūktena udakam abhimantrya pāpa nakṣatra jātam avasiñcati śirasi

original: atha jyeṣṭhe bhrātari jīvati vivāhamādhānaṃ dīkṣāṃ ca karoti tasya śāntirucyate -
analyzed: atha jyeṣṭhe bhrātari jīvati vivāham ādhānam dīkṣām ca karoti tasya śāntiḥ ucyate

original: iti parivittiparivividānāvudakānte mauñjaiḥ parvasu baddhvā piñjūlībhirāplāvayati // KauśS_5,10{46}.26 //
analyzed: iti parivitti parivividānau udaka ante mauñjaiḥ parvasu baddhvā piñjūlībhiḥ āplāvayati
pheneṣu uttarān pāśān ādhāya nadīnām phenān

original: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'mā jyeṣṭham' 'trite devāḥ' iti sūktābhyāmudakaghaṭaṃ sampātyābhimantrya tato mauñjaiḥ pāśairbaddhvā tato darbhasahitena ghaṭenāplāvayati
analyzed: tantram kṛtvā mā jyeṣṭham trite devāḥ iti sūktābhyām udaka ghaṭam sampātya abhimantrya tatas mauñjaiḥ pāśaiḥ baddhvā tatas darbha sahitena ghaṭena āplāvayati
uttara pāśam nadīnām phenān iti ardharcena nadī phene nidadhāti

original: adharapāśān gṛhītvā nadīmadhye praviśya tūṣṇīṃ prakṣipati //
analyzed: adhara pāśān gṛhītvā nadī madhye praviśya tūṣṇīm prakṣipati

original: 'mā jyeṣṭham' 'trite devāḥ' iti sūktābhyāmudakamabhimantrya tato bandhanaṃ kṛtvā tato'vasiñcati /
analyzed: mā jyeṣṭham trite devāḥ iti sūktābhyām udakam abhimantrya tatas bandhanam kṛtvā tatas uvasiñcati

original: abhyātānāntaṃ tantraṃ kṛtvā 'ambayo yanti' ityādibhiḥ sarvairapāṃ sūktairghaṭaṃ sampātyābhimantryāplāvayati /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam tantram kṛtvā ambayaḥ yanti ityādibhiḥ sarvaiḥ apām sūktaiḥ ghaṭam sampātya abhimantrya āplāvayati
ambayaḥ yanti ityādibhiḥ sarvaiḥ apām sūktaiḥ udakam abhimantrya avasiñcati

original: mṛta ācārya āhitāgnau idaṃ karma bhavati //
analyzed: mṛte ācārye āhitāgnau idam karma bhavati

original: atha devapitṛvarjitakhadāśayahitasyānnasya yājñikena karmaṇā bhavati taducyate -
analyzed: atha deva pitṛ varjita khadā śaya hitasya annasya yājñikena karmaṇā bhavati tat ucyate

original: 'yaddevā devaheḍanam' ityanuvākena khadāyā annāduddhṛtya setikāmekāṃ juhoti /
analyzed: yat devāḥ deva heḍanam iti anuvākena khadāyāḥ annāt uddhṛtya setikām ekām juhoti

original: vaivasvatadevatākaṃ pākayajñamājyabhāgāntaṃ kṛtvā 'yaddevā devaheḍanam' ityanuvākena caruṃ juhoti /
analyzed: vaivasvata devatākam pākayajñam ājyabhāga antam kṛtvā yat devāḥ deva heḍanam iti anuvākena carum juhoti

original: yaddevā devaheḍanamityanuvākena khadānnaṃ catuḥśarāvaparimitamabhimantrya tato brāhmaṇāya dadāti /
analyzed: yat devāḥ deva heḍanam iti anuvākena khada annam catur śarāva parimitam abhimantrya tatas brāhmaṇāya dadāti
khadā śaya anna saṃskāra śāntiḥ samāptā
atha mṛte dhanike ṛṇikasya ṛṇa dāna śāntiḥ ucyate
iti tribhiḥ sūktaiḥ dravyam abhimantrya putrāya dadāti
apamityam apratīttam iti tribhiḥ sūktaiḥ dravyam abhimantrya gotriṇe dadāti

original: 'apamityamapratīttam' iti tribhiḥ sūktaiḥ dravyamabhimantrya dhanikasya śmaśāne nikṣipati /
analyzed: apamityam apratīttam iti tribhiḥ sūktaiḥ dravyam abhimantrya dhanikasya śmaśāne nikṣipati
apamityam apratīttam iti tribhiḥ sūktaiḥ dravyam abhimantrya grāma catuṣpathe nikṣipet

original: 'apamityamapratīttam' iti tribhiḥ sūktairdravyamabhimantryāgnau prajvalite prakṣipya tato'nṛṇo bhavati /
analyzed: apamityam apratīttam iti tribhiḥ sūktaiḥ dravyam abhimantrya agnau prajvalite prakṣipya tatonṛṇaḥ bhavati

original: ākāśodakena śarīrāplavane doṣo bhavati tasya śāntirucyate -
analyzed: ākāśa udakena śarīra āplavane doṣaḥ bhavati tasya śāntiḥ ucyate

original: [divo nu mām (6.124) iti vīdhrabindūn prakṣālayati // KauśS_5,10{46}.41 //
analyzed: divaḥ nu mām iti vīdhra bindūn prakṣālayati

original: 'divo nu māṃ bṛhataḥ' iti sūktenodakamabhimantrya śarīraṃ prakṣālayati /
analyzed: divaḥ nu mām bṛhataḥ iti sūktena udakam abhimantrya śarīram prakṣālayati

original: 'divo nu māṃ bṛhataḥ' iti sūktenaikatra tailaṃ sarvauṣadhiḥ gandhaṃ hiraṇyaṃ vāsa etānyabhimantrya śarīramudvartayet /
analyzed: divaḥ nu mām bṛhataḥ iti sūktena ekatra tailam sarva oṣadhiḥ gandham hiraṇyam vāsaḥ etāni abhimantrya śarīram udvartayet

original: atha kumārasya kumāryā vā yasyottamadantau pūrvau jātau tatra mātāpitrormaraṇaśaṅkā bhavati tatra śāntirucyate -
analyzed: atha kumārasya kumāryāḥ vā yasya uttama dantau pūrvau jātau tatra mātā pitroḥ maraṇa śaṅkā bhavati tatra śāntiḥ ucyate
yasya uttama dantau pūrvau jāyete yau vyāghrau
yau vyāghrau iti sūktena vrīhin juhoti
yau vyāghrau iti sūktena yavān juhoti
yau vyāghrau iti sūktena tilān juhoti
yau vyāghrau iti sūktena vrīhi yava tila māṣān ekīkṛtvā abhimantrya uttama jāta dantābhyām daṃśayati

original: athājyabhāgāntaṃ kṛtvā vrīhiyavatilamāṣānekīkṛtya tataḥ śāntyudakaṃ kṛtvā sthālīpākaṃ
analyzed: atha ājyabhāga antam kṛtvā vrīhi yava tila māṣān ekīkṛtya tatas śāntyudakam kṛtvā sthālīpākam

original: śrapayitvā tato'bhyātānāni hutvā 'yau vyāghrau' iti sūktena sthālīpākaṃ sampātyābhimantrya
analyzed: śrapayitvā tatobhyātānāni hutvā yau vyāghrau iti sūktena sthālīpākam sampātya abhimantrya
ājyabhāga ante sarvatra śāntyudaka kriyā kartavyā
uttama danta jāta doṣa śāntiḥ samāptā

original: atha śirasi aṅge vā kākopaviṣṭadoṣaḥ śrūyate tasya śāntirucyate -
analyzed: atha śirasi aṅge vā kāka upaviṣṭa doṣaḥ śrūyate tasya śāntiḥ ucyate
idam yat kṛṣṇaḥ iti dvābhyām ṛgbhyām udakam abhimantrya śarīram prakṣālayati

original: 'idaṃ yatkṛṣṇaḥ' iti dvābhyāmṛgbhyāmulmukamabhimantrya kākamukhenopamṛṣṭaṃ puruṣaṃ paryagni karoti /
analyzed: idam yat kṛṣṇaḥ iti dvābhyām ṛgbhyām ulmukam abhimantrya kāka mukhena upamṛṣṭam puruṣam paryagni karoti

original: barhirlavanādyājyatantra idhmasthāne'pāmārgedhmamupasamādhāya tato'bhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'pratīcīnaphalaḥ' iti tisṛbhirṛgbhirapāmārgasamidha ādadhāti
analyzed: barhiḥ lavana ādi ājya tantre idhma sthāne ipāmārga idhmam upasamādhāya tatobhyātāna antam kṛtvā pratīcīna phalaḥ iti tisṛbhiḥ ṛgbhiḥ apāmārga samidhaḥ ādadhāti
athavā apāmārga kāṣṭha prajvalita ignau pratīcīna phalaḥ iti tisṛbhiḥ apāmārga samidhaḥ ādadhāti

original: sarveṣu rogeṣu śyāvadatā kunakhinā ṣaṇḍena jvareṇāpāmārgādi sarveṣu rogeṣu saṃsargeṣu sarvadoṣānmucyate /
analyzed: sarveṣu rogeṣu śyāva datā kunakhinā ṣaṇḍena jvareṇa apāmārga ādi sarveṣu rogeṣu saṃsargeṣu sarva doṣāt mucyate
yat arvācīnam iti ṛcā udakam abhimantrya ācāmayati
anṛta vacana doṣa śamana śāntiḥ samāptā

original: yatra kvacit khanati tatra sarvatra 'yatte bhūme' ityṛcā khanati gṛhanidhau vā sthūṇāgarte vā snānārthaṃ mṛttikāgrahaprakaraṇārthaṃ sarvatra  #
analyzed: yatra kvacid khanati tatra sarvatra yat te bhūme iti ṛcā khanati gṛha nidhau vā sthūṇā garte vā snāna artham mṛttikā graha prakaraṇa artham sarvatra

original: 'yatta ūnam' ityṛcā gṛhādi pūrayati sarvatrānena vidhānena pūraṇam /
analyzed: yat te ūnam iti ṛcā gṛha ādi pūrayati sarvatra anena vidhānena pūraṇam

original: [prehi pra hara iti kāpiñjalāni svastyayanāni bhavanti // KauśS_5,10{46}.53 //
analyzed: prehi pra haraḥ iti kāpiñjalāni svastyayanāni bhavanti

original: prehi pra hara vā dāvān gṛhebhyaḥ svastaye /
analyzed: prehi pra hara vā dāvān gṛhebhyaḥ svastaye
kapiñjala pradakṣiṇam śata patra abhi naḥ vada
bhadram vada dakṣiṇatas bhadram uttaratas vada

original: bhadraṃ purastānno vada bhadraṃ paścāt kapiñjala //
analyzed: bhadram purastāt naḥ vada bhadram paścāt kapiñjala
śunam vada dakṣiṇatas śunam uttaratas vada

original: śunaṃ purastānno vada śunaṃ paścāt kapiñjala //
analyzed: śunam purastāt naḥ vada śunam paścāt kapiñjala

original: bhadraṃ vada putrairbhadraṃ vada gṛheṣu ca /
analyzed: bhadram vada putraiḥ bhadram vada gṛheṣu ca

original: bhadramasmākaṃ vada bhadraṃ no abhayaṃ vada //
analyzed: bhadram asmākam vada bhadram naḥ abhayam vada

original: āvadaṃstvaṃ śakune bhadramā vada tūṣṇīmāsīnaḥ sumatiṃ cikiddhi naḥ /
analyzed: āvadan tvam śakune bhadramāḥ vada tūṣṇīm āsīnaḥ sumatim cikiddhi naḥ

original: yadutpatan vadasi karkariryathā bṛhadvadema vidathe suvīrāḥ //
analyzed: yat utpatan vadasi karkariḥ yathā bṛhat vadema vidathe su vīrāḥ

original: kapiñjala pradakṣiṇaṃ śatapatrābhi no vada iti kāpiñjalāni svastyayanāni bhavanti // KauśS_5,10{46}.54 //]
analyzed: kapiñjala pradakṣiṇam śata patra abhi naḥ vada iti kāpiñjalāni svastyayanāni bhavanti

original: 'prehi pra hara vā dāvān' iti sūktena ṣaḍarcenāpaśabdaṃ śrutvā japati kapiñjalavāsitaṃ
analyzed: prehi pra hara vā dāvān iti sūktena ṣaḍarcena apaśabdam śrutvā japati kapiñjala vāsitam

original: śrutvā grāme'raṇye pakṣivāsitaṃ śrutvā vā svayaṃ vā kruddhabhāṣaṇaṃ kṛtvānyasyāsadvacanaṃ
analyzed: śrutvā grāma iraṇye pakṣi vāsitam śrutvā vā svayam vā kruddha bhāṣaṇam kṛtvā anyasya asat vacanam

original: śrutvā sāgovāse vā ulūkavāsane kapotavāsane pūrvato vottarato vā loke ninditaḥ /
analyzed: śrutvā sā a go vāse vā ulūka vāsane kapota vāsane pūrvatas vā uttaratas vā loke ninditaḥ

original: yatkiñcillokaviruddhaṃ dṛṣṭvā śrutvā vā sarvatra japane svastyayanaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: yat kiñcid loka viruddham dṛṣṭvā śrutvā vā sarvatra japane svastyayanam bhavati

original: 'prehi pra hara' iti sūktaṃ nityaṃ japati /
analyzed: prehi pra haraḥ iti sūktam nityam japati
yaḥ abhi u babhruṇā āyasi svapantam atsi puruṣam śayānam agat svalam

original: ayasmayena brahmaṇāśmamayena varmaṇā paryasmān varuṇo dadhat ityabhyavakāśe saṃviśatyabhyavakāśe saṃviśati // KauśS_5,10{46}.55 //]
analyzed: ayasmayena brahmaṇā aśma mayena varmaṇā pari asmān varuṇaḥ dadhat iti abhyavakāśe saṃviśati abhyavakāśe saṃviśati

original: ākāśe yaddhi svapiti araṇye vā gṛhe vā śūnye gṛhe vā parvate vā tadā 'yo abhyu babhruṇā' ityṛcaṃ japitvā svapiti /
analyzed: ākāśe yat hi svapiti araṇye vā gṛhe vā śūnye gṛhe vā parvate vā tadā yaḥ abhi u babhruṇā iti ṛcam japitvā svapiti

original: rājasenā ākāśe svapiti araṇye tadedaṃ karma kuryāt /
analyzed: rājasenā ākāśe svapiti araṇye tadā idam karma kuryāt
akaraṇe dhana dhānya paśu ādi vināśaḥ
jarāyu jaḥ iti durdinam āyan kauśs ityādīni

original: athādbhutāni varṣe yakṣaṣvādīni naimittikāni tānyavaśyaṃ kāryāṇi /
analyzed: atha adbhutāni varṣe yakṣaṣva ādīni naimittikāni tāni avaśyam kāryāṇi

original: akaraṇe gṛhe grāme vā nagare vā janapade vā doṣa utpadyate /
analyzed: akaraṇe gṛhe grāme vā nagare vā janapade vā doṣaḥ utpadyate
medhā janana grāma sampadā sarva sampadā sāmmanasya varcasya vijaya rāja karma pauṣṭika strī karma svastyayana āyuṣya kāmya ādīni ijyāyāḥ pravṛttiḥ
yadi kāmyā icchā tadā tadā pravṛttiḥ
athavā na icchā tadā na prayuñjyāt
mantra krameṇa naimittikāni uktāni saṃhitā vidhau
sarva jñāna prabodha artham vijñānam proktavān ṛṣiḥ
atha krama prāpta utharvaveda vihita abhicāraḥ ucyate

original: manusmṛtau ca vihito'bhicāro 'na brāhmaṇo vedayitā kadācit' ityādinā /
analyzed: manusmṛtau ca vihitaḥ abhicāraḥ na brāhmaṇaḥ vedayitā kadācid ityādinā
tasmāt śrutiḥ atharva āṅgirasī kuryāt abhicārakam iti
ubhayatas paricchinnam śara mayam barhiḥ ābhicārikeṣu

original: kṛttikānakṣatre prayogaḥ kṛṣṇapakṣe vā rātrau nirodhi vā.
analyzed: kṛttikā nakṣatre prayogaḥ kṛṣṇa pakṣe vā rātrau nirodhi vā
maṇḍapam kārayet tatra yathā ukta vidhinā guruḥ
patākā toraṇaiḥ yuktam dvāram vā dakṣiṇam smṛtam
dakṣiṇā pravaṇe īriṇe dakṣiṇā mukhaḥ prayuṅkte
tathā tat agne ityādi smartavyam sarvatra
abhyātāna antam kṛtvā dūṣyāḥ dūṣiḥ asi
iti sūktena tilaka maṇim sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti
kārayitā kartā sadasyāḥ ca sarveṣām bandhanam ātma rakṣā artham

original: śuklapakṣe trayodaśyāṃ pūrvāhṇe'bhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'dyāvāpṛthivī urvantarikṣam' (2.12) iti sūktam /
analyzed: śukla pakṣe trayodaśyām pūrvāhṇebhyātāna antam kṛtvā dyāvāpṛthivī uru antarikṣam iti sūktam
dvābhyām veṇu daṇḍam vṛścati chinatti kartā
mṛtyoḥ aham iti ṛcā bādhakīḥ ādadhāti samidhaḥ

original: iti dviguṇāmekavīrāṃ sannahya pāśānnimuṣṭitṛtīyaṃ daṇḍaṃ sampātavat // KauśS_6,1{47}.14 //
analyzed: iti dviguṇām ekavīrām sannahya pāśān nimuṣṭi tṛtīyam daṇḍam sampātavat

original: 'ya imāṃ devo mekhalām' iti pañcarcena sūktena mekhalāṃ sampātya /
analyzed: yaḥ imām devaḥ mekhalām iti pañcarcena sūktena mekhalām sampātya

original: 'ayaṃ vajraḥ' iti tṛcena sūktena daṇḍaṃ sampātya 'ya imām' iti tṛcena mekhalāṃ badhnāti //
analyzed: ayam vajraḥ iti tṛcena sūktena daṇḍam sampātya yaḥ imām iti tṛcena mekhalām badhnāti
vajrā asi sapatna hā tvayā adya vṛtram sākṣīya

original: sa na indra purohito viśvataḥ pāhi rakṣasaḥ /
analyzed: sa naḥ indra purohitaḥ viśvatas pāhi rakṣasaḥ
abhi gāvaḥ anūṣata abhi dyumnam bṛhaspate
prāṇa prāṇam trayasva aso asave mṛḍa

original: nirṛte nirṛtyā naḥ pāśebhyo muñca iti daṇḍamādatte // KauśS_6,1{47}.16 //]
analyzed: nirṛte nirṛtyāḥ naḥ pāśebhyaḥ muñca iti daṇḍam ādatte

original: 'vajro'si sapatnahā' iti tṛcena sūktena daṇḍaṃ gṛhṇāti /
analyzed: vajrā asi sapatna hā iti tṛcena sūktena daṇḍam gṛhṇāti

original: 'namo namaskṛdbhyaḥ' iti saptarṣibhya upasthānaṃ karoti śālāyā bahiḥ /
analyzed: namaḥ namaskṛdbhyaḥ iti saptarṣibhyaḥ upasthānam karoti śālāyāḥ bahis

original: tataḥ śālāyāṃ praviśya tato vratādānīyāḥ samidha ādadhāti śāntāḥ /
analyzed: tatas śālāyām praviśya tatas vratādānīyāḥ samidhaḥ ādadhāti śāntāḥ

original: trirātre nivṛtte kṛṣṇapakṣe pratipadi karma bhaviṣyati.
analyzed: tri rātre nivṛtte kṛṣṇa pakṣe pratipadi karma bhaviṣyati

original: 'namo namaskṛdbhyaḥ sumati prayuñje na me prasūta taṃ vadheyaṃ taṃ stṛṣīyānena brahmaṇānena karmaṇā nayāmenyā' ityupasthānamantraḥ.
analyzed: namaḥ namaskṛdbhyaḥ sumati prayuñje na me prasūta tam vadheyam tam stṛṣīya anena brahmaṇā anena karmaṇā nayāma inyāḥ iti upasthāna mantraḥ

original: 'agne vratapate vrataṃ cariṣyāmi tacchakeyaṃ tatsamāpeyaṃ tasmin me ṛddhiḥ /
analyzed: agne vratapate vratam cariṣyāmi tat śakeyam tat samāpeyam tasmin me ṛddhiḥ

original: prajāṃ tasya paśūṃśca ete agne āvṛścāmyahan nyudito jane /
analyzed: prajām tasya paśūn ca ete agne āvṛścāmi ahan nyuditaḥ jane
gṛhān ca tasya vināśana kāme kāmavān aham ca
anvā vṛścāmi devebhyaḥ anvā vṛścāmi agnaye

original: anvā pṛthivyai vṛścāmi anvā vṛścāmi mṛtyave //
analyzed: anvā pṛthivyai vṛścāmi anvā vṛścāmi mṛtyave

original: āvṛkte asi devebhyo dṛṣṭvā oṣadhīṣu ca.
analyzed: āvṛkte asi devebhyaḥ dṛṣṭvā oṣadhīṣu ca
anu ā vṛścāmi deva manuṣyebhyaḥ bhūtaye

original: anvā nirṛtyāḥ pāśebhyo vṛścāmi yathā mṛtyo na mocchiṣat' /
analyzed: anu ā nirṛtyāḥ pāśebhyaḥ vṛścāmi yathā mṛtyo na mā ucchiṣat
bhaktasya a hutena mekhalāyāḥ granthim ālimpati

original: pratidinaṃ bhaktaṃ gṛhītvā mekhalāyā granthimālimpati 'āhutāsyabhihuta' (6.133.2) ityṛcā //
analyzed: pratidinam bhaktam gṛhītvā mekhalāyāḥ granthim ālimpati āhutā asi abhihutaḥ iti ṛcā

original: iti bāhyato daṇḍamūrdhvamavāgagraṃ tisṛbhiranvṛcaṃ nihanti // KauśS_6,1{47}.18 //
analyzed: iti bāhyatas daṇḍam ūrdhvam avāc agram tisṛbhiḥ anvṛcam nihanti

original: 'ayaṃ vajraḥ' iti tisṛbhirṛgbhiḥ bāhyato daṇḍamardhamavāgagraṃ kṛtvānvṛcaṃ nihanti //
analyzed: ayam vajraḥ iti tisṛbhiḥ ṛgbhiḥ bāhyatas daṇḍam ardham avāc agram kṛtvā anvṛcam nihanti
yat pātram āhanti phaṭ hataḥ asau iti
idam aham āmuṣyāyaṇasya amuṣyāḥ putrasya prāṇa apānau api āyacchāmi iti āyacchati
yat aśnāmi yat girāmi iti dvābhyām ṛgbhyām bhojanam karoti
yat pibāmi iti ṛcā udakam pibati
amuṣya sthāne śatru nāma grahaṇam amuṃsthāne ca
phaṭ hataḥ mahu madaḥ iti etena mantreṇa bhojana pātram bhinatti

original: 'idamahaṃ mahumadasya turaṣkasya sūtikarṇaputrasya prāṇāpānāvapyāyacchāmi' ityanena mantreṇa mekhalāgranthiṃ badhnāti gāḍhaṃ karoti /
analyzed: idam aham mahumadasya turaṣkasya sūtikarṇa putrasya prāṇa apānau apyāyacchāmi iti anena mantreṇa mekhalā granthim badhnāti gāḍham karoti
iti sannahya sīsa cūrṇāni bhakta ilaṅkāre

original: 'ye'māvāsyām' iti sūktena sīsacūrṇāni kṛtvābhimantrya bhakte dadāti dveṣasya /
analyzed: yā imāvāsyām iti sūktena sīsa cūrṇāni kṛtvā abhimantrya bhakte dadāti dveṣasya
yā imāvāsyām iti sūktena alaṅkārān samālabhate dveṣasya
parābhūta veṇoḥ yaṣṭyā bāhu mātryā alaṅkṛtayā āhanti
yā imā avāsyām iti sūktena veṇu yaṣṭyā alaṅkṛtayā śatrum āhanti
bāhu mātrā lohita viṣa miśrā svayañchinnā yaṣṭi saṃskāraḥ

original: iti paraśupalāśena dakṣiṇā dhāvataḥ padaṃ vṛścati // KauśS_6,1{47}.25 //]
analyzed: iti paraśu palāśena dakṣiṇā dhāvataḥ padam vṛścati

original: 'dyāvāpṛthivī uru' iti sūktena paraśuṃ vṛkṣapatraṃ ca gṛhītvā dakṣiṇā dhāvataḥ śatroḥ padaṃ rajaṃ chinatti //
analyzed: dyāvāpṛthivī uru iti sūktena paraśum vṛkṣa patram ca gṛhītvā dakṣiṇā dhāvataḥ śatroḥ padam rajam chinatti
āvraskān pāṃśūn palāśam upanahya bhraṣṭebhyaḥ asyati

original: tasmācchedāt pāṃsūṃśca gṛhītvā badhakapatre baddhvā sūktenābhimantrya bhraṣṭe'bhyasyati kṣipati //

atha uttara tantram ucyate sviṣṭakṛt ādi uttara tantram

original: paścādagneḥ karṣvāṃ kūdyupastīrṇāyāṃ dvādaśarātramaparyāvartamānaḥ śayīta // KauśS_6,1{47}.30 //

analyzed: trayodaśe hani śayyāyāḥ utthāya uttara tantram kṛtvā brāhmaṇān paricārakān ca kṣīra odanam bhojayitvā pātra stham ucchiṣṭam ekadhā kṛtvā dyāvāpṛthivī

original: uttamāḥ pratāpyādharāḥ pradāya enamenānadharācaḥ parāco'vācastapasastamunnayata devāḥ pitṛbhiḥ saṃvidānaḥ prajāpatiḥ prathamo devatānām ityatisṛjati
analyzed: uttamāḥ pratāpya adharāḥ pradāya enam enān adharācaḥ parācaḥ uvācaḥ tapasaḥ tam unnayata devāḥ pitṛbhiḥ saṃvidānaḥ prajāpatiḥ prathamaḥ devatānām iti atisṛjati

original: idamahaṃ yo mā prācyā diśo'ghāyurabhidāsādapavādīdiṣūguhaḥ tasyemau prāṇāpānāvapakrāmāmi brahmaṇā // KauśS_6,3{49}.7 //
analyzed: idam aham yaḥ mā prācyāḥ diśā ughāyuḥ abhidāsāt apavādīt iṣūguhaḥ tasya imau prāṇa apānau apakrāmāmi brahmaṇā

original: dakṣiṇāyāḥ pratīcyā udīcyā dhruvāyā vyadhvāyā ūrdhvāyāḥ // KauśS_6,3{49}.8 //
analyzed: dakṣiṇāyāḥ pratīcyāḥ udīcyāḥ dhruvāyāḥ vyadhvāyāḥ ūrdhvāyāḥ

original: idamahaṃ yo mā diśāmantardeśebhyaḥ iti apakrāmāmi iti // KauśS_6,3{49}.9 //
analyzed: idam aham yaḥ mā diśām antardeśebhyaḥ iti apakrāmāmi iti
na apohana niveṣṭanāni sarvāṇi khalu śaśvat bhūtāni

original: brāhmaṇādvajramudyacchamānācchaṅkante māṃ haniṣyasi māṃ haniṣyasi iti tebhyo'bhayaṃ vadet
analyzed: brāhmaṇāt vajram udyacchamānāt śaṅkante mām haniṣyasi mām haniṣyasi iti tebhyaḥ ubhayam vadet

original: śamagnaye śaṃ pṛthivyai śamantarikṣāya śaṃ vāyave śaṃ dive śaṃ sūryāya śaṃ candrāya
analyzed: śam agnaye śam pṛthivyai śam antarikṣāya śam vāyave śam dive śam sūryāya śam candrāya

original: śaṃ nakṣatrebhyaḥ śaṃ gandharvāpsarobhyaḥ śaṃ sarpetarajanebhyaḥ śivaṃ mahyam iti // KauśS_6,3{49}.12 //
analyzed: śam nakṣatrebhyaḥ śam gandharva apsarobhyaḥ śam sarpa itarajanebhyaḥ śivam mahyam iti

original: 'idamahaṃ yo mā prācyā diśaḥ' ityaṣṭarcena kalpajena sūktenodakamadhye ghaṭaṃ nidadhāti /
analyzed: idam aham yaḥ mā prācyāḥ diśaḥ iti aṣṭa ṛcena kalpa jena sūktena udaka madhye ghaṭam nidadhāti
idam aham iti ghaṭam udaka idhaḥ mukham karoti
idam aham iti sūktena ghaṭam udaka pūrṇam kṛtvā apakrāmati

original: 'idamahaṃ yo mā prācyā diśaḥ' sūktenodakapūrṇaṃ ghaṭaṃ maṇḍape sthāpayati /
analyzed: idam aham yaḥ mā prācyāḥ diśaḥ sūktena udaka pūrṇam ghaṭam maṇḍape sthāpayati
yena vidhānena vajra praharaṇam kriyate tat ucyate

original: ityādi sarvaṃ kṛtvā 'idamaham' iti sthāpanāntaṃ kṛtvā 'agnerbhāgaḥ stha' (10.5.8-14)
analyzed: ityādi sarvam kṛtvā idam aham iti sthāpana antam kṛtvā agneḥ bhāgaḥ stha
ardham ghaṭe kṛtvā ardham bhājane karoti
agneḥ bhāgaḥ iti aṣṭau tāpane mantrāḥ

original: barhirāsane dakṣiṇāmukha upaviśya bhājanamagnau kṛtvā 'vātasya raṃhitasyāmṛtasya
analyzed: barhiḥ āsane dakṣiṇā mukhaḥ upaviśya bhājanam agnau kṛtvā vātasya raṃhitasya amṛtasya

original: yoniḥ' iti mantreṇodakaṃ gṛhītvā 'śamagnaye' iti sūktena kalpajena sarvebhyo bhūtebhyo'bhayaṃ vadet /
analyzed: yoniḥ iti mantreṇa udakam gṛhītvā śam agnaye iti sūktena kalpa jena sarvebhyaḥ bhūtebhyaḥ ubhayam vadet
yaḥ vaḥ āpa upām bhāga upsvantaḥ iti ṛcā uda vajra prakṣepaḥ

original: punarapi 'vātasya raṃhitasya' ityudakaṃ saṅgṛhya 'śamagnaye' ityabhayaṃ dattvā 'yo va āpo'pāmūrmirapsvantaḥ' ityṛcā vajraprakṣepaḥ /
analyzed: punar api vātasya raṃhitasya iti udakam saṅgṛhya śam agnaye iti abhayam dattvā yaḥ vaḥ āpa upām ūrmiḥ apsu antar iti ṛcā vajra prakṣepaḥ

original: punarapi 'vātasya raṃhitasya' ityudakaṃ saṅgṛhya 'śamagnaye' ityabhayaṃ dattvā 'yo va āpo'pāṃ vatso'psvantaḥ' iti vajraṃ prakṣipet /
analyzed: punar api vātasya raṃhitasya iti udakam saṅgṛhya śam agnaye iti abhayam dattvā yaḥ vaḥ āpa upām vatsa upsu antaḥ iti vajram prakṣipet

original: 'vātasya raṃhitasya' ityudakaṃ saṅgṛhya 'śamagnaye' ityabhayaṃ dattvā 'yo va āpo'pāṃ vṛṣabho'psvantaḥ' ityṛcā vajraṃ prakṣipet /
analyzed: vātasya raṃhitasya iti udakam saṅgṛhya śam agnaye iti abhayam dattvā yaḥ vaḥ āpa upām vṛṣabha upsu antaḥ iti ṛcā vajram prakṣipet

original: punaḥ 'vātasya raṃhitasya' ityudakaṃ gṛhītvā 'śamagnaye' ityabhayaṃ dattvā 'yo va āpo'pāṃ hiraṇyagarbho'psvantaḥ' ityṛcā vajraṃ prakṣipet /
analyzed: punar vātasya raṃhitasya iti udakam gṛhītvā śam agnaye iti abhayam dattvā yaḥ vaḥ āpa upām hiraṇya garbha upsu antaḥ iti ṛcā vajram prakṣipet

original: punaḥ 'vātasya raṃhitasya' ityudakaṃ saṅgṛhya 'śamagnaye' ityabhayaṃ dattvā 'yo va āpo'pāmaśmā pṛśniḥ' ityṛcā vajraṃ prakṣipet /
analyzed: punar vātasya raṃhitasya iti udakam saṅgṛhya śam agnaye iti abhayam dattvā yaḥ vaḥ āpaḥ upām aśmā pṛśniḥ iti ṛcā vajram prakṣipet

original: punaḥ 'vātasya raṃhitasyāmṛtasya yoniḥ' iti mantreṇodakaṃ saṅgṛhya 'śamagnaye' ityabhayaṃ dattvā 'yo va āpo'pāmagnayo'psvantaḥ' ityṛcā vajraṃ  #
analyzed: punar vātasya raṃhitasya amṛtasya yoniḥ iti mantreṇa udakam saṅgṛhya śam agnaye iti abhayam dattvā yaḥ vaḥ āpaḥ upām agnayā upsu antaḥ iti ṛcā vajram

original: 'enamenānadharācaḥ parācaḥ' iti kalpajayarcā bhājanasthamudakaṃ bhūmau ninayati /
analyzed: enam enān adharācaḥ parācaḥ iti kalpa jayā ṛcā bhājana stham udakam bhūmau ninayati
yam vayam iti sūktena evam apām asmai vajram
prakṣālanam tathā yogaḥ apsu pātra nidhāpanam
apohanam anena eva tam niveṣṭya pātra pūraṇam
apakrāmaḥ tadā ayam tu sūktena idam aham tatas
nidhāpana ādi tena eva sarvatra ānīya sādayet
vibhāga dāna santāpāḥ grahaṇam śāntayaḥ ca yāḥ
vajra atisargau iti ete sapta vajrasya kevalāḥ
grahaṇam prativajram ca abhaya dānam tathā eva ca

original: ete ślokāḥ / 'viṣṇoḥ kramo'si' iti dvādaśabhiḥ pratyṛcaṃ viṣṇukramān kramate śatrorabhimukham //
analyzed: ete ślokāḥ viṣṇoḥ kramaḥ asi iti dvādaśabhiḥ pratyṛcam viṣṇukramān kramate śatroḥ abhimukham
iti bṛhaspati śirasam pṛṣātakena upasicya abhimantrya upanidadhāti
sava vidhānena bṛhaspati śirasam odanam dveṣyāya dadāti

original: 'mamāgne varcaḥ' iti sūktena taṃ pṛṣātakenopasicya 'tasyaudanasya' ityarthasūktenābhimantrya dadāti /
analyzed: mama agne varcaḥ iti sūktena tam pṛṣātakena upasicya tasya odanasya iti artha sūktena abhimantrya dadāti
udehi vājin iti ardharcena na avacaṭitam dveṣyam anvāha

original: adhipāśān bādhakāñchaṅkūṃstān saṅkṣudya sannahya bhraṣṭe'bhyasyati // KauśS_6,3{49}.21 //]
analyzed: adhipāśān bādhakān śaṅkūn tān saṅkṣudya sannahya bhraṣṭebhyaḥ asyati

original: 'samiddho agniḥ samidhāno ghṛtavṛddhaḥ' iti pañcarcena śaṅkusahitān pāśānabhimantryāraṇye nidadhāti /
analyzed: samiddhaḥ agniḥ samidhānaḥ ghṛta vṛddhaḥ iti pañcarcena śaṅku sahitān pāśān abhimantrya araṇye nidadhāti

original: 'samiddho agniḥ' iti sūktena pañcarcena pāśānabhimantrya dveṣyasya padaṃ vṛścati vidhānena /
analyzed: samiddhaḥ agniḥ iti sūktena pañcarcena pāśān abhimantrya dveṣyasya padam vṛścati vidhānena

original: 'samiddho agniḥ' iti sūktena pañcarcena śaṅkusahitān pāśān pade'vacchinatti /
analyzed: samiddhaḥ agniḥ iti sūktena pañcarcena śaṅku sahitān pāśān

original: 'ya ime dyāvāpṛthivī' ityanuvākena śaṅkusahitāñchatruṣu pāśān baddhvābhimantrya vṛścati padepade /
analyzed: ye ime dyāvāpṛthivī iti anuvākena śaṅku sahitān śatruṣu pāśān baddhvā abhimantrya vṛścati pade pade

original: 'ya ime dyāvāpṛthivī' ityanuvākenādhipāśān bādhakāñchaṅkūṃstān saṅkṣudya sannahya bhraṣṭe'bhyasyati /
analyzed: ye ime dyāvāpṛthivī iti anuvākena adhipāśān bādhakān śaṅkūn tān saṅkṣudya sannahya bhraṣṭebhyaḥ asyati
ajaiṣma iti sūkta catuṣṭayena aganma svar
iti avasāna dvaya varjitena śatruṣu pāśān baddhvā abhimantrya araṇye nidadhāti

original: 'ajaiṣma' iti sūktacatuṣṭayenottamāvasānadvayavarjitena pāśānabhimantrya pade pade vṛścati /
analyzed: ajaiṣma iti sūkta catuṣṭayena uttama avasāna dvaya varjitena pāśān abhimantrya pade pade vṛścati

original: 'ajaiṣma' iti sūktacatuṣṭayena 'aganma svaḥ' iti varjitenādhipāśān bādhakāñchaṅkūṃstān saṅkṣudya sannahya bhraṣṭe'bhyasyati //
analyzed: ajaiṣma iti sūkta catuṣṭayena aganma svar iti varjitena adhi pāśān bādhakān śaṅkūn tān saṅkṣudya sannahya bhraṣṭebhyaḥ asyati

original: 'samiddho agniḥ samidhānaḥ' iti pañcarcenāmapātrasyopari dveṣyāya hastaprakṣālanaṃ dadāti /
analyzed: samiddhaḥ agniḥ samidhānaḥ iti pañcarcena āma pātrasya upari dveṣyāya hasta prakṣālanam dadāti

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'samiddho agniḥ' iti pañcarcena vṛṣabhaṃ sampātyātisṛjati /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā samiddhaḥ agniḥ iti pañcarcena vṛṣabham sampātya atisṛjati

original: 'ya ime dyāvāpṛthivī' ityanuvākena raktaśālikṣīraudanaṃ sampātyābhimantrya dveṣyāya dadāti /
analyzed: ye ime dyāvāpṛthivī iti anuvākena raktaśāli kṣīra odanam sampātya abhimantrya dveṣyāya dadāti

original: 'ya ime dyāvāpṛthivī' ityanuvākenāmapātrasyopari dveṣyāya hastaprakṣālanaṃ dadāti /
analyzed: ye ime dyāvāpṛthivī iti anuvākena āma pātrasya upari dveṣyāya hasta prakṣālanam dadāti

original: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'ya ime dyāvāpṛthivī' ityanuvākena vṛṣabhaṃ sampātavantaṃ kṛtvā śatrumabhimukhaṃ visṛjati /
analyzed: tantram kṛtvā ye ime dyāvāpṛthivī iti anuvākena vṛṣabham sampātavantam kṛtvā śatrum abhimukham visṛjati

original: 'ajaiṣma' iti caturbhiḥ paryāyaiḥ 'aganma svaḥ' ityavasānadvayavarjyaṃ raktaśālikṣīraudanamabhimantrya dadāti /
analyzed: ajaiṣma iti caturbhiḥ paryāyaiḥ aganma svar iti avasāna dvaya varjyam raktaśāli kṣīra odanam abhimantrya dadāti
āma pātrasya upari dveṣyāya hasta prakṣālanam dadāti

original: 'ajaiṣma' iti pūrvaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ sampātavantaṃ kṛtvā śatrugṛhānabhimṛśati /
analyzed: ajaiṣmaḥ iti pūrvam vṛṣabham sampātavantam kṛtvā śatru gṛhān abhimṛśati
garta idhmau antareṇa avalekhanīm sthāṇau nibadhya dvādaśa rātram sampātān abhyatininayati

original: prathame divase'bhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā śatrupratikṛtiṃ ca mṛnmayāṃ kṛtvā vedimadhya ūrdhvaṃ sthāṇau nibadhya 'samiddho agniḥ' iti pañcarcena mūrdhni  #
analyzed: prathame divasebhyaḥ ātāna antam kṛtvā śatru pratikṛtim ca mṛd mayām kṛtvā vedi madhye ūrdhvam sthāṇau nibadhya samiddhaḥ agniḥ iti pañcarcena mūrdhni

original: ābhicārikaṃ tantraṃ kṛtvā 'ya ime dyāvāpṛthivī' ityanuvākena śatrupratikṛtiṃ mṛnmayāṃ paścādagneḥ sthāṇau baddhvā tasya mūrdhni sampātānānayati
analyzed: ābhicārikam tantram kṛtvā ye ime dyāvāpṛthivī iti anuvākena śatru pratikṛtim mṛd mayām paścāt agneḥ sthāṇau baddhvā tasya mūrdhni sampātān ānayati
dvādaśame divasebhya ātāna ādi uttara tantram

original: abhicāraṃ tantraṃ kṛtvā 'ajaiṣma' iti caturbhiḥ sūktairgartedhmāvantareṇāvalekhanīṃ sthāṇau nibadhya dvādaśarātraṃ sampātānānayati /
analyzed: abhicāram tantram kṛtvā ajaiṣma iti caturbhiḥ sūktaiḥ garta idhmau antareṇa avalekhanīm sthāṇau nibadhya dvādaśa rātram sampātān ānayati

original: ityṛcodakamabhimantrya dveṣyaṃ manasā cādhyāyan sa cācāmati /
analyzed: iti ṛcā udakam abhimantrya dveṣyam manasā ca adhyāyan sa ca ācāmati

original: 'yaśca gāṃ padā sphurati' ityardharcena dveṣyaṃ dṛṣṭvānvāha japati /
analyzed: yaḥ ca gām padā sphurati iti ardharcena dveṣyam dṛṣṭvā anvāha japati

original: pārvaṇau samṛddhiḥ sannatirete homā na bhavanti /
analyzed: pārvaṇau samṛddhiḥ sannatiḥ ete homāḥ na bhavanti
abhyātānāni hutvā tatas sviṣṭakṛt ādi uttara tantram bhavati
niḥ amum nudaḥ iti saṃsthita homaḥ
abhyātāna antam kṛtvā idāvatsarāya iti vrata visarjanam ājyam juhuyāt
avabhṛtham snātvā nirdurmaṇyaḥ iti sūktena sarva oṣadhiḥ ātmānam abhimṛśati
abhicāram kṛtvā kartā imām śāntim karoti

original: maraṇaṃ bandhanaṃ vā vyasanaṃ vā praṇipāto vonmattatābhāvo vā bhavati /
analyzed: maraṇam bandhanam vā vyasanam vā praṇipātaḥ vā unmatta tā bhāvaḥ vā bhavati
bhadra matena bhāṣyakāra tathā dārila matena ca
ebhiḥ tribhiḥ bhāṣya kāraiḥ kauśikīyaḥ vicāritaḥ

original: maraṇaṃ vā bandhanaṃ vā vyasanaṃ vā praṇipāto vonmattatā vā daivopahatirvā putradhanādivināśo bhavati /
analyzed: maraṇam vā bandhanam vā vyasanam vā praṇipātaḥ vā unmatta tā vā daiva upahatiḥ vā putra dhana ādi vināśaḥ bhavati

original: maraṇaṃ vyasanaṃ caiva bandhanaṃ ca viśeṣataḥ.
analyzed: maraṇam vyasanam ca eva bandhanam ca viśeṣataḥ
praṇipāta unmatta tā vā daiva upahatiḥ eva ca
putra ādi dhana nāśaḥ ca gṛhe doṣān bahūn api
upādhyāya kavi īśvareṇa nāmatobhicāraḥ kṛtaḥ turuṣka mahu madasya upari kāritaḥ

original: pṛthivyāṃ duṣṭa utpannaḥ sarvadā ca vināśayet.
analyzed: pṛthivyām duṣṭaḥ utpannaḥ sarvadā ca vināśayet
adharma sambhavaḥ duṣṭaḥ prajā hiṃsana tatparaḥ
turuṣka nāmnā pāpiṣṭhāḥ deva brāhmaṇa hiṃsakāḥ
pṛthivyām śrī bhojadevaḥ dharma saṃrakṣaṇāya ca
deśe mālavakaḥ utpannaḥ śrī rāja gṛheṣu ca

original: śrībhojadevo jagadvikhyāto rājñāṃ sarveṣāṃ ca mūrdhani //
analyzed: śrī bhojadevaḥ jagat vikhyātaḥ rājñām sarveṣām ca mūrdhani

original: na ca tulyo jagatpatirna bhūto na bhaviṣyati.
analyzed: na ca tulyaḥ jagatpatiḥ na bhūtaḥ na bhaviṣyati
deva brāhmaṇa bhaktaḥ ca guru śuśrūṣaṇe rataḥ
kārā pitāḥ yathā uktāḥ tena yathā vihita dakṣiṇāḥ
brahma kṣatriya rakṣaṇa arthāḥ abhicārāḥ mahā ṛṣiṇā
krameṇa sūtritāḥ ṣaṣṭhe saṃhitā krama kāraṇāt

original: yadā grāme gacchati tadācamanaṃ kṛtvā 'svastidāḥ' iti sūktaṃ japitvā dakṣiṇena pādena prakrāmatyadhvānam /
analyzed: yadā grāme gacchati tadā ācamanam kṛtvā svasti dāḥ iti sūktam japitvā dakṣiṇena pādena prakrāmati adhvānam

original: 'ye te panthāno'va divaḥ' ityṛcaṃ japitvādhvānaṃ dakṣiṇena pādena prakrāmati /
analyzed: ye te panthānaḥ uva divaḥ iti ṛcam japitvā adhvānam dakṣiṇena pādena prakrāmati

original: 'svastidāḥ' iti sūktena śarkarā abhimantrya gṛhe kṣetre'nyatra vā prakṣipati /
analyzed: svasti dāḥ iti sūktena śarkarāḥ abhimantrya gṛhe kṣetrenyatra vā prakṣipati

original: 'ye te panthānaḥ' ityekarcena sūktenāsaṅkhyātāḥ śarkarā abhimantrya gṛhādiṣu prakṣipati /
analyzed: ye te panthānaḥ iti ekarcena sūktena asaṅkhyātāḥ śarkarāḥ abhimantrya gṛha ādiṣu prakṣipati
idam karma sarva artha svastyayana kāmaḥ
dvipada catuṣpada ādīnām svastyayanam bhavati iti arthaḥ

original: 'svastidāḥ' iti sūktena darbhādīni tṛṇānyabhimantrya gṛhe vā kṣetre vā prakṣipati svastyayanakāmaḥ /
analyzed: svasti dāḥ iti sūktena darbha ādīni tṛṇāni abhimantrya gṛhe vā kṣetre vā prakṣipati svastyayana kāmaḥ

original: 'ye te panthāno'va divaḥ' ityṛcā tṛṇānyabhimantrya prakṣipati /
analyzed: ye te panthānaḥ uva divaḥ iti ṛcā tṛṇāni abhimantrya prakṣipati
svasti dāḥ iti sūktena indram upatiṣṭhate svastyayana kāmaḥ
ye te panthānaḥ uva divaḥ iti ṛcā indram upatiṣṭhate svastyayana kāmaḥ

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'āre'sau' iti sūktena śastraṃ sampātyābhimantrya prayacchatyabhyātānādyuttaratantram /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā iti sūktena śastram sampātya abhimantrya prayacchati abhyātāna ādi uttara tantram

original: ājyatantraṃ kṛtvā 'amūḥ pāre' iti sūktena khaḍgādiśastraṃ sampātya hastena vimṛjyābhimantrya dhārayati /
