annaprāśana cūḍākarma nāmakaraṇa gṛha praveśa vastrāya alaṅkāra dhāraṇam
rāja darśana aśva hasti ādi yāna ratha ārohaṇam puṇya karme nitya naimittika kāmya ādīni karmāṇi

original: yadā śīghre prayojane kāryaṃ kartumicchatīdaṃ karma kṛtvā tataḥ śāntikapuṇyakarma karoti /
analyzed: yadā śīghre prayojane kāryam kartum icchati idam karma kṛtvā tatas śāntika puṇya karma karoti
sarpa vṛścika dvidaṃśaka maśaka bhramara bhūmikīṭaka kṛmayaḥ eteṣām bhayam na bhavati

original: 'ye'syām' 'prācī dik' iti sūktābhyāṃ sikatāmabhimantrya śayanaṃ parikirati /
analyzed: prācī diś iti sūktābhyām sikatām abhimantrya śayanam parikirati

original: 'ye'syāṃ stha' iti sūktena sikatāmabhimantrya śālāṃ paritaḥ kirati /
analyzed: iti sūktena sikatām abhimantrya śālām paritas kirati

original: 'ye'syāṃ stha' iti sūktena sikatāmabhimantrya kṣetre parikirati /
analyzed: sthaḥ iti sūktena sikatām abhimantrya kṣetre parikirati
prācī diś iti sūktena śālām parikirati

original: 'prācī dik' iti sūktena sikatāmabhimantrya kṣetre parikirati /
analyzed: prācī diś iti sūktena sikatām abhimantrya kṣetre parikirati

original: 'mā no devāḥ' iti sūktena śarkarāmabhimantrya śayanaṃ śālāṃ vā kṣetre vā parikirati /
analyzed: mā naḥ devāḥ iti sūktena śarkarām abhimantrya śayanam śālām vā kṣetre vā parikirati

original: iti sūktena śarkarāmabhimantrya gṛhe kṣetre vā prakirati svastyayanakāmaḥ /
analyzed: iti sūktena śarkarām abhimantrya gṛhe kṣetre vā prakirati svastyayana kāmaḥ

original: 'yaste sarpo vṛścikaḥ' ityṛcā śarkarāmabhimantrya śayane vā śālāyāṃ vorvarāyāṃ vā gṛhe vā vane vā grāme vā pattane vā tatra parikirati /
analyzed: yaḥ te sarpaḥ vṛścikaḥ iti ṛcā śarkarām abhimantrya śayane vā śālāyām vā urvarāyām vā gṛhe vā vane vā grāme vā pattane vā tatra parikirati
tṛṇāni yuga tardmanā sampātavanti dvāre pracṛtati

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'ye'syāṃ stha prācyām' iti sūktena tṛṇamālāṃ sampātyābhimantrya dvāre badhnāti /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā ye syām stha prācyām iti sūktena tṛṇamālām sampātya abhimantrya dvāre badhnāti

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'prācī dik' iti sūktena tṛṇamālāṃ yugacchidreṇa sampātyābhimantrya dvāre pracṛtati /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā prācī diś iti sūktena tṛṇamālām yuga chidreṇa sampātya abhimantrya dvāre pracṛtati

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'yaste sarpaḥ' ityṛcā tṛṇamālāṃ yugacchidreṇa sampātyābhimantrya abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'namo devavadhebhyaḥ' (6.13)
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā yaḥ te sarpaḥ iti ṛcā tṛṇamālām yuga chidreṇa sampātya abhimantrya abhyātāna antam kṛtvā namaḥ deva vadhebhyaḥ

original: iti tṛcena sūktena tṛṇāni yugachidreṇa sampātya dvāre badhnāti /
analyzed: iti tṛcena sūktena tṛṇāni yuga chidreṇa sampātya dvāre badhnāti

original: pathi vā gṛhadvāre vā pattanadvāre vā pracṛtati /
analyzed: pathi vā gṛha dvāre vā pattana dvāre vā pracṛtati

original: ahibhaye vṛścikabhaye maśakabhaye bhramarasaṅghe kṛmibhaye idaṃ karma //
analyzed: ahi bhaye vṛścika bhaye maśaka bhaye bhramara saṅghe kṛmi bhaye idam karma

original: 'ye'syām' 'prācī dik' iti sūktābhyāṃ gomayamabhimantrya gṛhe visṛjati /
analyzed: prācī diś iti sūktābhyām gomayam abhimantrya gṛhe visṛjati

original: 'mā no devāḥ' iti sūktena gomayamabhimantrya dvāre visṛjati /
analyzed: mā naḥ devāḥ iti sūktena gomayam abhimantrya dvāre visṛjati
yaḥ te sarpaḥ iti ṛcā gomayam abhimantrya dvāre sambhinatti

original: 'ye'syām' 'prācī dik' iti sūktābhyāṃ gomayamabhimantrya dvāre nikhanati /
analyzed: prācī diś iti sūktābhyām gomayam abhimantrya dvāre nikhanati

original: 'mā no devāḥ' iti sūktena śuṣkagomayamabhimantrya gṛhe nikhanati /
analyzed: mā naḥ devāḥ iti sūktena śuṣka gomayam abhimantrya gṛhe nikhanati
yaḥ te sarpaḥ iti ṛcā gomayam abhimantrya gṛhe nikhanati
prācī diś iti sūktābhyām śuṣka gomayam ādadhāti agnau

original: 'mā no devāḥ' iti sūktena gomayamagnau juhoti /
analyzed: mā naḥ devāḥ iti sūktena gomayam agnau juhoti
yaḥ te sarpaḥ iti ṛcā gomayam agnau juhoti

original: gṛhe kṣetre grāme nagare vā svastyayanakāmaḥ //
analyzed: gṛhe kṣetre grāme nagare vā svastyayana kāmaḥ
apāmārga prasūnān kudrīcī śaphān parācīna mūlān
iti sūktena apāmārga mañjarīm abhimantrya dvāre sambhinatti
stha iti sūktena apāmārga mañjarīm abhimantrya dvāre nikhanati
sthaḥ iti sūktena apāmārgamañjarīm abhimantrya agnau juhoti
prācī diś iti sūktena apāmārga mañjarīm abhimantrya gṛhe stṛṇāti
prācī diś iti sūktena apāmārga prasūnam abhimantrya dvāre nikhanati
prācī diś iti sūktena apāmārga mañjarīm juhoti

original: 'mā no devāḥ' iti sūktenāpāmārgamabhimantrya gṛhe stṛṇāti /
analyzed: mā naḥ devāḥ iti sūktena apāmārgam abhimantrya gṛhe stṛṇāti

original: 'mā no devāḥ' iti sūktenāpāmārgamabhimantrya bhūmau nikhanati svastyayanakāmaḥ /
analyzed: mā naḥ devāḥ iti sūktena apāmārgam abhimantrya bhūmau nikhanati svastyayana kāmaḥ

original: 'mā no devāḥ' iti sūktenāpāmārgamañjarīmabhimantrya agnau juhoti /
analyzed: mā naḥ devāḥ iti sūktena apāmārgamañjarīm abhimantrya agnau juhoti
yaḥ te sarpaḥ iti apāmārga mañjarīm abhimantrya sambhinatti

original: 'yaste sarpaḥ' iti apāmārgamañjarīṃ nikhanati grāmamadhye svastyayanakāmaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ te sarpaḥ iti apāmārga mañjarīm nikhanati grāma madhye svastyayana kāmaḥ
yaḥ te sarpaḥ iti ṛcā apāmārgam juhoti

original: 'ye'syāṃ stha' iti sūktena guḍūcīmabhimantrya nānā karoti /
analyzed: yā isyām stha iti sūktena guḍūcīm abhimantrya nānā karoti
iti sūktena guḍūcī pādān abhimantrya agnau juhoti
prācī diś iti guḍūcī pādān abhimantrya gṛhe stṛṇāti

original: 'prācī dik' iti guḍūcīpādā ye adhomukhāstānabhimantrya nikhanati /
analyzed: prācī diś iti guḍūcī pādāḥ ye adhomukhāḥ tān abhimantrya nikhanati
prācī diś iti guḍūcīm agnau juhoti

original: 'mā no devāḥ' iti guḍūcīmabhimantrya grāme stṛṇāti /
analyzed: mā naḥ devāḥ iti guḍūcīm abhimantrya grāme stṛṇāti
mā naḥ devāḥ iti guḍūcīm abhimantrya nikhanati
mā naḥ devāḥ iti guḍūcīm agnau juhoti
yaḥ te sarpaḥ iti ṛcā guḍūcīm abhimantrya stṛṇāti
yaḥ te sarpaḥ iti ṛcā guḍūcīm abhimantrya nikhanati
yaḥ te sarpaḥ iti ṛcā guḍūcīm agnau juhoti
maśaka kīṭaka sarpa vṛścika ādi svastyayanāni bhavanti
atha vyāghra caura vṛka caraka siṃha araṇyaka ādīnām bhaye svastyayanāni ucyante

original: [uditaḥ (4.3) iti khādiraṃ śaṅkuṃ sampātavantamudgṛhṇan nikhanan gā anuvrajati // KauśS_7,2{51}.1 //]
analyzed: uditaḥ iti khādiram śaṅkum sampātavantam udgṛhṇan nikhanan gāḥ anuvrajati

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'uditastrayo akraman' iti sūktena khadirakīlakaṃ sampātya tata uttaratantraṃ kṛtvā kīlakaṃ nikhanannutpāṭayan gṛhādaraṇyaṃ  #
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā uditaḥ trayaḥ akraman iti sūktena khadira kīlakam sampātya tatas uttara tantram kṛtvā kīlakam nikhanan utpāṭayan gṛhāt araṇyam
ninayanam samuhya cāre sārūpavatsasya indrāya tris juhoti
uditaḥ iti sūktena udaka ghaṭam abhimantrya go pracāre ninayati

original: tataḥ pāṃśukūṭaṃ tatra kṛtvārddhaṃ dakṣiṇena hastena vikṣipati /
analyzed: tatas pāṃśu kūṭam tatra kṛtvā arddham dakṣiṇena hastena vikṣipati

original: indrāya pākayajñavidhānenājyabhāgāntaṃ kṛtvā 'uditaḥ' iti sūktena saptarcena dvābhyāṃ dve āhutī tisṛbhirṛgbhistṛtīyā /
analyzed: indrāya pākayajña vidhānena ājyabhāga antam kṛtvā uditaḥ iti sūktena saptarcena dvābhyām dve āhutī tisṛbhiḥ ṛgbhiḥ tṛtīyā

original: sārūpavatsena dugdhe caruśrapaṇaṃ havirucchiṣṭena baliharaṇaṃ kuryāt //
analyzed: sārūpavatsena dugdhe caru śrapaṇam haviḥ ucchiṣṭena bali haraṇam kuryāt
a nirdiṣṭam śeṣam haviḥ bhūmau ninayati iti pañcamam

original: parvatadevatāyā araṇye pākayajñavidhānenājyabhāgāntaṃ kṛtvā 'brahma jajñānam' 'anāptā ye' (5.6.1-2)
analyzed: parvata devatāyāḥ araṇye pākayajña vidhānena ājyabhāga antam kṛtvā brahma jajñānam an āptāḥ ye
anyasmin bhava śarva paśupati ugra rudra mahādeva īśānānām pṛthak āhutīḥ

original: parvatadevatāyai pākayajñamājyabhāgāntaṃ kṛtvā 'bhavāśarvau mṛḍatam' ityarthasūktena caruṃ juhoti /
analyzed: parvata devatāyai pākayajñam ājyabhāga antam kṛtvā bhavāśarvau mṛḍatam iti artha sūktena carum juhoti
pākayajña tantram kṛtvā bhavāya juṣṭam nirvapāmi ityādi
devatā nirvāpam kṛtvā ekasmin bhāṇḍake śrapaṇam
brahma jajñānam iti sūktasya sapta āvṛttiḥ

original: bhavāśarvādibhyo devatābhyo nirvāpaṃ kṛtvā bṛhadbhāṇḍake śrapaṇam /
analyzed: bhavāśarva ādibhyaḥ devatābhyaḥ nirvāpam kṛtvā bṛhat bhāṇḍake śrapaṇam

original: ājyabhāgāntaṃ kṛtvā 'bharvāśarvau mṛḍatam' iti sūktasya saptāvṛttiḥ /
analyzed: ājyabhāga antam kṛtvā bharvāśarvau mṛḍatam iti sūktasya sapta āvṛttiḥ
vyāghra caura vṛścika hasti āraṇyaka mahiṣa āraṇyaka go iti ādi bhaye svastyayanam
go śāntiḥ pākayajña tantram kṛtvā indra devatāyai brahma jajñānam an āptāḥ ye

original: tantraṃ kṛtvā bhavāśarvādibhyo nirvāpaṃ kṛtvaikasmin bhāṇḍe śrapaṇaṃ kṛtvā tato brahmajajñānena juhoti /
analyzed: tantram kṛtvā bhavāśarva ādibhyaḥ nirvāpam kṛtvā ekasmin bhāṇḍe śrapaṇam kṛtvā tatas brahma ja jñānena juhoti

original: parvatadevatāyai pākayajñavidhānamājyabhāgāntaṃ kṛtvā 'bhavāśarvau mṛḍatam' iti sūktena caruṃ juhoti /
analyzed: parvata devatāyai pākayajña vidhānam ājyabhāga antam kṛtvā bhavāśarvau mṛḍatam iti sūktena carum juhoti

original: tantraṃ kṛtvā bhava-śarva-paśupati-ugra-rudra-mahādeva-īśānāntaṃ nirvāpaṃ kṛtvaikasmin bhāṇḍake śrapaṇaṃ kṛtvā 'bhavāśarvau' iti sūktena juhoti
analyzed: tantram kṛtvā bhava śarva paśupati ugra rudra mahādeva īśāna antam nirvāpam kṛtvā ekasmin bhāṇḍake śrapaṇam kṛtvā bhavāśarvau iti sūktena juhoti
rudra devasya caroḥ haviḥ ucchiṣṭam yajamāna uśnāti
agnau darbhān ādhāya yajamānaḥ dhūmam niyacchati
bhūtyai vaḥ puṣṭyai vaḥ iti mantreṇa
dvitīya caroḥ haviḥ ucchiṣṭa bhakṣaṇam dhūma pānam ca
indrayāgaḥ bhava ādi yāgaḥ ca ekam karma dvi tantram
brahma jajñānam sahasra dhāreṇa ghṛtam abhimantrya vatsa vātsikā mukham anakti

original: evaṃ 'bhavāśarvau mṛḍatam' ityarthasūktena ghṛtamabhimantrya vatsasya vatsikāyā vā mukhaṃ mrakṣati /
analyzed: evam bhavāśarvau mṛḍatam iti artha sūktena ghṛtam abhimantrya vatsasya vatsikāyāḥ vā mukham

original: 'brahma jajñānam' iti sūktena tisro naladaśākhāḥ piṣṭvābhimantrya vatsikāṃ pāyayati /
analyzed: brahma jajñānam iti sūktena tisraḥ nalada śākhāḥ piṣṭvā abhimantrya vatsikām pāyayati

original: 'bhāvāśarvau' ityarthasūktena tisro naladaśākhā udakena piṣṭvābhimantrya vatsikāṃ pāyayati /
analyzed: bhāvāśarvau iti artha sūktena tisraḥ nalada śākhāḥ udakena piṣṭvā abhimantrya vatsikām pāyayati

original: gavāṃ prathamaprasave 'brahma jajñānam' iti mahatkāṇḍikena sūktena śākhāmudakamabhimantrya gobhyo bahirudakadhārāṃ ninayati /
analyzed: gavām prathama prasave brahma jajñānam iti mahatkāṇḍikena sūktena śākhām udakam abhimantrya gobhyaḥ bahis udaka dhārām ninayati
bhavāśarvau iti artha sūktena śākhām udakam abhimantrya tatas udaka dhārām goḥ bahis ninayati
atha pattana grāmasya gṛhasya śāntiḥ ucyate

original: iti ṣaḍaśmanaḥ sampātavataḥ sraktiṣu paryadhastānnikhanati // KauśS_7,2{51}.14 //]
analyzed: iti ṣaṭ aśmanaḥ sampātavataḥ sraktiṣu pari adhastāt nikhanati

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'aśmavarma me' iti ṣaḍarcena sūktena saptamyṛcā sarvāsāṃ dvitīyā kartavyā /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā aśma varma me iti ṣaḍarcena sūktena saptamyṛcā sarvāsām dvitīyā kartavyā
ye diśām antardeśebhyaḥ iti ṣaṭsu ṛkṣu dvitīyā

original: ṣaḍaśmanaḥ sampātavato'bhimantrya tato gṛhakoṇeṣu nikhanati caturaḥ /
analyzed: ṣaṭ aśmanaḥ sampātavataḥ abhimantrya tatas gṛha koṇeṣu nikhanati caturaḥ
ekam gṛha madhye ekam gṛha upari nidadhāti
gṛha grāma nagara pattanānām sarvatra svastyayanam samāptam
trīṇi silān jāla agrāṇi urvarā madhye nikhanati
alasālāḥ iti ṛcā tisraḥ sasya vallīḥ abhimantrya kṣetra madhye nikhanati
atha mūṣaka pataṅga śalabha hariṇa roru śalya ādīni sasya vināśakāni teṣām śāntiḥ ucyate
iti ayasā sīsam karṣan urvarām parikrāmati

original: 'hataṃ tardam' iti sūktena sīsaṃ lohamudgharṣan sūktaṃ japitvābhiprakrāmati /
analyzed: hatam tardam iti sūktena sīsam loham udgharṣan sūktam japitvā abhiprakrāmati

original: 'hataṃ tardam' iti sūktena śarkarānabhimantrya yatra mūṣakādīni tatra parikirati //
analyzed: hatam tardam iti sūktena śarkarān abhimantrya yatra mūṣaka ādīni tatra parikirati
tardam avaśirasam vadanāt keśena samuhya urvarā madhye nikhanati

original: mūṣakādimukhaṃ keśena bandhayitvā 'hataṃ tardam' iti sūktenābhimantrya kṣetramadhye nikhanati //
analyzed: mūṣaka ādi mukham keśena bandhayitvā hatam tardam iti sūktena abhimantrya kṣetra madhye nikhanati

original: aśvinadevatāyai pākayajñamājyabhāgāntaṃ kṛtvā 'hataṃ tardam' iti sūktena sārūpavatsaṃ caruṃ juhoti /
analyzed: aśvina devatāyai pākayajñam ājyabhāga antam kṛtvā hatam tardam iti sūktena sārūpavatsam carum juhoti
balīn harati āśāyai āśā pataye aśvibhyām kṣetra pataye

original: haviḥśeṣeṇa baliharaṇaṃ karoti pratidiśam 'āśāyai baliṃ harāmi vaṣaṭ' /
analyzed: haviḥ śeṣeṇa bali haraṇam karoti pratidiśam āśāyai balim harāmi vaṣaṭ
yadā etebhyaḥ kurvīta vāgyataḥ tiṣṭhet ā astamayāt
tasmin ahani maunam kuryāt astamanam yāvat
samāptam mūṣaka śalabha pataṅga ṭiṭṭibha kīṭaka kīṭikā hariṇa roru śalyaka godhā sedhā kṛmi ādi bhaye svastyayanam
atha deśa antara gamanasya svastyayanam ucyate

original: 'ye panthāno bahavo devayānāḥ' iti tṛcena sūktenājyaṃ juhoti /
analyzed: ye panthānaḥ bahavaḥ deva yānāḥ iti tṛcena sūktena ājyam juhoti

original: 'ye panthānaḥ' iti sūktena tṛcena manthamabhimantrya pathikāya prayacchati svastyayanakāmaḥ /
analyzed: ye panthānaḥ iti sūktena tṛcena mantham abhimantrya pathikāya prayacchati svastyayana kāmaḥ

original: 'ye panthānaḥ' iti tṛcena bhaktamabhimantrya prayacchati bhojanārtham /
analyzed: ye panthānaḥ iti tṛcena bhaktam abhimantrya prayacchati bhojana artham

original: anena karmaṇā kalahādi doṣo na bhavati //
analyzed: anena karmaṇā kalaha ādi doṣaḥ na bhavati

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'yasyāste' iti sūktena caturṛcena yena baddhaḥ tatsadṛśaṃ sampātavantaṃ kṛtvā sūktasadṛśaṃ dvitīyaṃ ca sampātavantaṃ karoti
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā yasyāḥ te iti sūktena caturṛcena yena baddhaḥ tad sadṛśam sampātavantam kṛtvā sūkta sadṛśam dvitīyam ca sampātavantam karoti

original: ājyatantraṃ kṛtvā 'yatte devī nirṛtiḥ' iti tṛcena sūktena bandhasadṛśaṃ nigaḍayugaladvayaṃ ca sampātavantaṃ karoti /
analyzed: ājya tantram kṛtvā yat te devī nirṛtiḥ iti tṛcena sūktena bandha sadṛśam nigaḍa yugala dvayam ca sampātavantam karoti

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'viṣāṇā pāśān' iti caturṛcena nigaḍayugaladvayaṃ sampātyaikaṃ muktaṃ nigaḍaṃ carmamayaṃ vā lohamayaṃ vā yena baddhastanmayaṃ  #
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā viṣāṇā pāśān iti caturṛcena nigaḍa yugala dvayam sampātya ekam muktam nigaḍam carma mayam vā loha mayam vā yena baddhaḥ tad mayam

original: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'yasyāste' iti sūktena bhūmilekhāṃ sampātya /
analyzed: tantram kṛtvā yasyāḥ te iti sūktena bhūmilekhām sampātya

original: baddho anena karmaṇā kṛtena mucyate bandhanāt //
analyzed: baddhaḥ anena karmaṇā kṛtena mucyate bandhanāt

original: 'āyane te parāyaṇe' iti sūktenodakamabhimantrya garte prakṣipati madhye dāghe /
analyzed: āyane te parāyaṇe iti sūktena udakam abhimantrya garte prakṣipati madhye dāghe
adāghe ca kṛtvā udaka pūraṇam karoti

original: 'āyane te' iti sūktena śālāmadhye dvayorudakamabhimantrya garte prakṣipati /
analyzed: āyane te iti sūktena śālā madhye dvayoḥ udakam abhimantrya garte prakṣipati

original: 'āyane te' iti sūktena avakāmabhimantrya śālāmupari paritanoti dāgharakṣārthī /
analyzed: āyane te iti sūktena avakām abhimantrya śālām upari paritanoti dāgha rakṣā arthī

original: 'āyane te' iti sūktena divyamabhimantrya śapyamānāya prayacchati /
analyzed: āyane te iti sūktena divyam abhimantrya śapyamānāya prayacchati

original: 'āyane te' iti sūktenodakamabhimantrya aṅgaṃ dagdhaṃ prakṣālayati /
analyzed: āyane te iti sūktena udakam abhimantrya aṅgam dagdham prakṣālayati
nāvā peṭaka paṭikā ādi svastyayana artha udaka taraṇa rakṣā artham ucyate

original: 'mahīmū ṣu' iti tṛcena sūktena nāvādyabhimantrya tataścaṭanti /
analyzed: mahi īmū su iti tṛcena sūktena nāvā ādi abhimantrya tatas caṭanti

original: udakarakṣārthe dūradeśagamana abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'mahīmū ṣu' iti tṛcena nāvaṃ sampātya tataścaṭanti /
analyzed: udaka rakṣā arthe dūra deśa gamana abhyātāna antam kṛtvā mahī mū su iti tṛcena nāvam sampātya tatas caṭanti

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'mahīmū ṣu' iti tṛcena naumaṇiṃ sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā mahīmū su iti tṛcena nau maṇim sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti

atha naṣṭe dravye lābha karma ucyate

analyzed: prapathe iti naṣṭa eṣiṇām prakṣālita abhyakta pāṇi pādānām dakṣiṇān pāṇīn nimṛjya utthāpayati

original: naṣṭaiṣiṇāṃ prakṣālitābhyaktapāṇipādānāṃ 'prapathe pathām' iti caturṛcaṃ japitvā dakṣiṇaṃ pāṇimugmṛjyotthāpayati /
analyzed: naṣṭa eṣiṇām prakṣālita abhyakta pāṇi pādānām prapathe pathām iti caturṛcam japitvā dakṣiṇam pāṇim ugmṛjya utthāpayati

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'prapathe pathām' iti caturṛcena sūktena naṣṭaiṣiṇāṃ prakṣālitābhyaktapāṇipādānāṃ tataḥ pāṇī sampātya vimṛjyotthāpayati
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā prapathe pathām iti caturṛcena sūktena naṣṭa eṣiṇām prakṣālita abhyakta pāṇi pādānām tatas pāṇī sampātya vimṛjya utthāpayati
nimṛjya ekaviṃśatim śarkarāḥ catuṣpathā iva kṣipya avakirati

original: 'prapathe pathām' iti caturṛcena sūktena ekaviṃśatiśarkarānabhimantrya catuṣpathe prakṣipati /
analyzed: prapathe pathām iti caturṛcena sūktena ekaviṃśati śarkarān abhimantrya catuṣpathe prakṣipati

analyzed: ekaikasya pratīkasya trayodaśahavirbhiḥ homaḥ pratyetavyaḥ vikalpena

yāḥ oṣadhayaḥ iti bhaktam abhimantrya bhakṣayati

agnim brūmaḥ iti sūktena udakam abhimantrya pibati

agnim brūmaḥ iti sūktena haviḥ ājya samidh ādi juhoti

original: pāpasaṃsarge vyādhisaṃsarge varṇasaṃsarge anyasmin pāpe svastyayanam /
analyzed: pāpa saṃsarge vyādhi saṃsarge varṇa saṃsarge anyasmin pāpe svastyayanam

original: aṃholiṅgena vikalpena etena sūktena hṛdayamālabhya japaṃ kṛtvā upasthānamādityasya kuryāt tenaiva sūktena /
analyzed: aṃhaḥ liṅgena vikalpena etena sūktena hṛdayam ālabhya japam kṛtvā upasthānam ādityasya kuryāt tena eva sūktena
hasti aśva vṛkṣa gṛha strī puruṣa ādīnām svastyayanam kriyate

pāka tantre ājya tantre ca sarvatra abhimantraṇam
agneḥ manve iti saptabhiḥ sūktaiḥ haviḥ abhimantrya bhakṣayati

aṃhaḥ liṅgena pratīkena haviḥ hutvā tatobhimantraṇam karoti

aṃhaḥ liṅgena haviḥ ucchiṣṭa bhakṣaṇam vā niyame kuryāt

original: yatra kvacicchāntiḥ kriyate tatra sarvatra svastyayanahomaṃ kuryāt /
analyzed: yatra kvacid śāntiḥ kriyate tatra sarvatra svastyayana homam kuryāt

original: gṛhe nagare vane vā bahirvā pattane vā grāme pure vā sarvatra svastyayanaṃ kṛtvā sarveṣu kāmyeṣu svastyayanahomaḥ /
analyzed: gṛhe nagare vane vā bahis vā pattane vā grāme pure vā sarvatra svastyayanam kṛtvā sarveṣu kāmyeṣu svastyayana homaḥ

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'viśve devā' iti sūktena sthālīpākaṃ śrapayitvā tatsthālīpāke ghṛtapiṇḍatrayaṃ pratinīya sampātyābhimantrya ghṛtena saha  #
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā viśve devāḥ iti sūktena sthālīpākam śrapayitvā tad sthālīpāke ghṛta piṇḍa trayam pratinīya sampātya abhimantrya ghṛtena saha

original: iti yugmakṛṣṇalamādiṣṭānāṃ sthālīpāka ādhāya badhnāti // KauśS_7,3{52}.20 //
analyzed: iti yugma kṛṣṇalam ādiṣṭānām sthālīpāke ādhāya badhnāti

original: 'asmin vasu' iti sūktena hiraṇyamaṇiṃ yugmakṛṣṇalaṃ sthālīpāke sthāpayitvā sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: asmin vasu iti sūktena hiraṇya maṇim yugma kṛṣṇalam sthālīpāke sthāpayitvā sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti
abhyātāna antam kṛtvā yat ābadhnan iti sūktena hiraṇya maṇim

original: ājyatantraṃ kṛtvā 'nava prāṇān' iti sūktena hiraṇyarajatalohayugmakṛṣṇalamaṇiṃ triguṇaṃ kṛtvā sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: ājya tantram kṛtvā nava prāṇān iti sūktena hiraṇya rajata loha yugma kṛṣṇala maṇim triguṇam kṛtvā sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti
badhnāti sthālīpāke sthāpayitvā sthālīpākam ca aśnāti

original: kecit sthālīpāke sampātaṃ na kurvanti / āyuṣkāmaḥ //
analyzed: kecid sthālīpāke sampātam na kurvanti āyuṣkāmaḥ

original: 'yathā dyauśca' iti sūktena sthālīpākaṃ mahāvrīhimayaṃ śrapayitvā tataḥ śāntyudakena samprokṣya tato'bhimantryāśnāti /
analyzed: yathā dyauḥ ca iti sūktena sthālīpākam mahāvrīhi mayam śrapayitvā tatas śāntyudakena samprokṣya tatobhimantrya aśnāti

original: iti sūktena mahāvrīhīṇāṃ sthālīpākaṃ śrapayitvā śāntyudakena prokṣya tamabhimantrya prāśnāti /
analyzed: iti sūktena mahāvrīhīṇām sthālīpākam śrapayitvā śāntyudakena prokṣya tam abhimantrya prāśnāti

original: [āyurdā (2.13) iti godānaṃ kārayiṣyan sambhārān sambharati // KauśS_7,4{53}.1 //
analyzed: āyuḥ dāḥ iti godānam kārayiṣyan sambhārān sambharati

original: amamrimojomānīṃ dūrvāmakarṇamaśmamaṇḍalamānaḍuhaśakṛtpiṇḍaṃ ṣaḍ darbhaprāntāni kaṃsamahate vasane śuddhamājyaṃ śāntā oṣadhīrnavamudakumbham
analyzed: a mamrim ojaḥ mānīm dūrvām akarṇam aśma maṇḍalam ānaḍuha śakṛt piṇḍam ṣaḍ darbha prāntāni kaṃsam ahate vasane śuddham ājyam śāntāḥ oṣadhīḥ navam uda kumbham

original: parisamuhya paryukṣya paristīrya barhirudapātramupasādya paricaraṇenājyaṃ paricarya // KauśS_7,4{53}.4 //
analyzed: parisamuhya paryukṣya paristīrya barhiḥ uda pātram upasādya paricaraṇena ājyam paricarya

original: paścādagneḥ prāṅmukha upaviśyānvārabdhāya śāntyudakaṃ karoti // KauśS_7,4{53}.6 //]
analyzed: paścāt agneḥ prāc mukhaḥ upaviśya anvārabdhāya śāntyudakam karoti

ājya tantram kṛtvā idhma homa ante yat agne tapasā

tris eva agnim samprokṣati tris paryukṣati

tris kārayamāṇam ācāmayati ca samprokṣati ca

original: māṇavakaṃ trirācāmayati ca samprokṣati ca mantreṇa /
analyzed: māṇavakam tris ācāmayati ca samprokṣati ca mantreṇa

original: tato'bhyātānāni hutvā 'āyurdā' iti sūktenājyaṃ juhvan mūrdhi sampātānānayati //
analyzed: tatobhyātānāni hutvā āyuḥ dāḥ iti sūktena ājyam juhvan mūrdhi sampātān ānayati

original: [śakṛtpiṇḍasya sthālarūpaṃ kṛtvā suhṛde brāhmaṇāya prayacchati // KauśS_7,4{53}.10 //
analyzed: śakṛt piṇḍasya sthāla rūpam kṛtvā suhṛde brāhmaṇāya prayacchati

original: āyurdā (2.13) ityanena sūktenājyaṃ juhvan mūrdhni sampātānānayati // KauśS_7,4{53}.13 //
analyzed: āyuḥ dāḥ iti anena sūktena ājyam juhvan mūrdhni sampātān ānayati

analyzed: dakṣiṇe pāṇau aśma maṇḍale uda pātre uttara sampātān sthāla rūpe ānayati

original: uttarasampātān dakṣiṇataḥ suhṛdo haste śakṛtpiṇḍa ānayati /
analyzed: uttara sampātān dakṣiṇatas suhṛdaḥ haste śakṛt piṇḍe ānayati

original: śāntyudakamuṣṇodakaṃ caikadhābhisamāsicya 'āyamagan savitā kṣureṇa' iti tṛcenodapātramanumantrayate //
analyzed: śāntyudakam uṣṇa udakam ca ekadhā abhisamāsicya ā ayam agan savitā kṣureṇa iti tṛcena uda pātram anumantrayate

original: 'aditiḥ śmaśru' ityṛcā udapātrodakena śirasi keśān kledayet //
analyzed: aditiḥ śmaśru iti ṛcā uda pātra udakena śirasi keśān kledayet

original: ityudakpatraṃ kṣuramadbhi ścotya triḥ pramārṣṭi // KauśS_7,4{53}.19 //]
analyzed: iti udak patram kṣuram adbhiḥ ścotya tris pramārṣṭi

original: [yenāvapat (6.68.3) iti dakṣiṇasya keśapakṣasya darbhapiñjūlyā keśānabhinidhāya pracchidya sthālarūpe karoti // KauśS_7,4{53}.20 //
analyzed: yena avapat iti dakṣiṇasya keśapakṣasya darbha piñjūlyā keśān abhinidhāya pracchidya sthāla rūpe karoti

original: 'yenāvapat' ityṛcā darbhapiñjūlīṃ gṛhītvā dakṣiṇapārśve keśachedanaṃ piñjūlyā saha karoti /
analyzed: yena avapat iti ṛcā darbha piñjūlīm gṛhītvā dakṣiṇa pārśve keśa chedanam piñjūlyā saha karoti

original: saha piñjūlyā ekasmin pārśve trīṇi vapanāni karoti //
analyzed: saha piñjūlyāḥ ekasmin pārśve trīṇi vapanāni karoti

original: [atha nāpitaṃ samādiśati akṣaṇvan vapa keśaśmaśru roma parivapa nakhāni ca kuru iti // KauśS_7,5{54}.1 //]
analyzed: atha nāpitam samādiśati akṣaṇvan vapa keśa śmaśru roma parivapa nakhāni ca kuru iti

original: 'akṣaṇvan vapa keśaśmaśru roma parivapa nakhāni ca kuru' iti //
analyzed: akṣaṇvan vapa keśaśmaśru roma parivapa nakhāni ca kuru iti

original: tvayi mahimānaṃ sādayāmi ityantato yojayet // KauśS_7,5{54}.3 //]
analyzed: tvayi mahimānam sādayāmi iti antatas yojayet

original: 'punarmaitvindriyam' iti dvābhyāmṛgbhyāṃ trirnimṛjya kṣuraṃ 'somadevaśarmaṇi tvayi mahimānaṃ sādayāmi' iti kṣuraṃ mārjayitvā nāpitāya prayacchati
analyzed: punar mā etu indriyam iti dvābhyām ṛgbhyām tris nimṛjya kṣuram somadeva śarmaṇi tvayi mahimānam sādayāmi iti kṣuram mārjayitvā nāpitāya prayacchati
atha enam upta keśa śmaśrum kṛtta nakham āplāvayati
iti etena sūktena gandha pravādābhiḥ alaṅkṛtya

original: tato 'hiraṇyavarṇāḥ' iti sūktena śāntikalaśamabhimantrya tena kumāramāplāvayati /
analyzed: tatas hiraṇya varṇāḥ iti sūktena śānti kalaśam abhimantrya tena kumāram āplāvayati

original: iti tisṛbhiḥ ṛgbhiḥ puṣpaṃ kuṅkumaṃ candanādyabhimantrya kumāramalaṅkaroti hiraṇyālaṅkārān //
analyzed: iti tisṛbhiḥ ṛgbhiḥ puṣpam kuṅkumam candana ādi abhimantrya kumāram alaṅkaroti hiraṇya alaṅkārān
su āktam me iti ṛcā añjana abhimantrya akṣiṇī aṅkte
atha enam ahatena vasanena paridhāpayati pari dhatta
pari dhatte iti dvābhyām vastram abhimantrya prayacchet
iti dakṣiṇena pādena aśma maṇḍalam āsthāpya pradakṣiṇam agnim anupariṇīya

original: 'ehyaśmānamā tiṣṭha' ityṛcā dakṣiṇena pādenāśmamaṇḍalamāsthāpya vedyupari pradakṣiṇamagnimanupariṇīya //
analyzed: ehi aśmānam ā tiṣṭha iti ṛcā dakṣiṇena pādena aśma maṇḍalam āsthāpya vedi upari pradakṣiṇam agnim anupariṇīya
atha asya vāsaḥ nirmuṣṇāti yasya te vāsaḥ

original: 'yasya te vāsaḥ' ityṛcoparitanaṃ vastraṃ gṛhṇāti kartā //
analyzed: yasya te vāsaḥ iti ṛcā uparitanam vastram gṛhṇāti kartā
atha enam apareṇa ahatena vasanena ācchādayati ayam vaste garbham pṛthivyāḥ

original: 'ayaṃ vaste garbhaṃ pṛthivyāḥ' iti pañcabhirṛgbhiḥ paridhānavastreṇopaparyācchādayati māṇavakam //
analyzed: ayam vaste garbham pṛthivyāḥ iti pañcabhiḥ ṛgbhiḥ paridhāna vastreṇa upaparyācchādayati māṇavakam

original: iti mahāvrīhīṇāṃ sthālīpākaṃ śrapayitvā śāntyudakenopasicyābhimantrya prāśayati // KauśS_7,5{54}.11 //
analyzed: iti mahāvrīhīṇām sthālīpākam śrapayitvā śāntyudakena upasicya abhimantrya prāśayati

original: 'yathā dyauśca' 'manase cetase dhiyaḥ' ityādi prathamato vyākhyānaṃ kṛtvā tato godānaṃ prārabdham /
analyzed: yathā dyauḥ ca manase cetase dhiyaḥ ityādi prathamatas vyākhyānam kṛtvā tatas godānam prārabdham
āyuṣya mantrāḥ āyuṣya karma madhye paṭhitāḥ
prāṇa apānau iti evam antam vyākhyātam prathamatas
iha na bhavanti para prakaraṇa paṭhita tvāt

original: iti kumāraṃ mātāpitarau triḥ samprayacchete // KauśS_7,5{54}.13 //]
analyzed: iti kumāram mātā pitarau tris samprayacchete

original: 'tubhyameva jariman' iti sūktena putraṃ mātāpitarau triḥ samprayacchete /
analyzed: tubhyam eva jariman iti sūktena putram mātā pitarau tris samprayacchete
punar mantram japitvā mātā pituḥ samarpayati

original: trīn ghṛtapiṇḍān kṛtvā pratyekaṃ sampātyābhimantrya tataḥ kumāraṃ prāśayataḥ /
analyzed: trīn ghṛta piṇḍān kṛtvā pratyekam sampātya abhimantrya tatas kumāram prāśayataḥ
etābhiḥ ṛgbhiḥ vrīhi yava śamīm abhimantrya kumārasya mūrdhni dadāti
etābhiḥ ṛgbhiḥ vrīhi yava śamīm abhimantrya mūrdhni dadāti

original: [amamrimojomānīṃ ca dūrvāṃ ca keśāṃśca śakṛtpiṇḍaṃ caikadhābhisamāhṛtya // KauśS_7,5{54}.19 //
analyzed: amamrim ojomānīm ca dūrvām ca keśān ca śakṛt piṇḍam ca ekadhā abhisamāhṛtya
adhikaraṇam brahmaṇaḥ kaṃsa vasanam gauḥ dakṣiṇā

original: dvisaṃvatsare vā godānavat cūḍākaraṇaṃ kāryaṃ pūrvatantraṃ kṛtvā /
analyzed: dvi saṃvatsare vā godāna vat cūḍākaraṇam kāryam pūrva tantram kṛtvā
cūḍākaraṇam ca godānena vyākhyātam paridhāpana aśma maṇḍala varjam
tathā ca yājñavalkyaḥ cūḍā kāryā yathākulam yāsmṛ
punar upanayane godāna vidhānena vapanam kartavyam

original: anyatra yatra vapanaṃ paṭhyate tatra sarvatra godānavidhānena vapanaṃ kuryāt iti dārilamatam /
analyzed: anyatra yatra vapanam paṭhyate tatra sarvatra godāna vidhānena vapanam kuryāt iti dārila matam
punar upanayana ādiṣu eteṣām tat eva śāntyudakam uṣṇa udakam kṛtvā uda pātre viśeṣaḥ
garbha pañcame garbha aṣṭame varṣe kuryāt iti paiṭhīnasiḥ
vasante brāhmaṇam upanayīta iti ca mīmāṃsāyām

original: ājyatantre godānikamājyabhāgāntaṃ kṛtvā tataḥ śāntyudake 'ā yātu mitraḥ' (3.8)
analyzed: ājya tantre godānikam ājyabhāga antam kṛtvā tatas śāntyudake ā yātu mitraḥ
śāntyudakam uṣṇa udakam kṛtvā tasmin uda pātre sampātān ānayati
ā ayam agan iti mantra uktam
ā ayam agan savitā kṣureṇa iti pādena uda pātram anumantrayate
yat kṣureṇa iti ṛcā kṣuram mārjayati tris
uṣṇena vāyo iti pādena uda pātram anumantrayate
ādityāḥ rudrāḥ vasavaḥ iti pādena aditiḥ śmaśru

original: 'somasya rājño vapata pracetasaḥ' iti pādena 'yenāvapad' ityṛcā vapanaṃ karoti /
analyzed: somasya rājñaḥ vapata pracetasaḥ iti pādena yena avapat iti ṛcā vapanam karoti

original: evamuttare śiraḥpārśve vapanaṃ sakṛt piñjūlīvarjaṃ ca //
analyzed: evam uttare śiraḥ pārśve vapanam sakṛt piñjūlī varjam ca

original: upetapūrvasya niyataṃ savān dāsyato'gnīnādhāsyamānaḥ paryavetavratadīkṣiṣyamāṇānām // KauśS_7,6{55}.6 //]
analyzed: upeta pūrvasya niyatam savān dāsyataḥ agnīn ādhāsyamānaḥ paryaveta vrata dīkṣiṣyamāṇānām

original: laukikaṃ ca samānaṃ godānena vyākhyātamā paridhānāt /
analyzed: laukikam ca samānam godānena vyākhyātam ā paridhānāt
sa uṣṇa udakam śāntyudakam pradakṣiṇam anupariṇīya purastāt agneḥ pratyak mukham avasthāpya

original: tataḥ pradakṣiṇamagnimanupariṇīya purastādagneḥ pratyaṅmukhamavasthāpya svayaṃ prāṅmukhaḥ //
analyzed: tatas pradakṣiṇam agnim anupariṇīya purastāt agneḥ pratyak mukham avasthāpya svayam prāc mukhaḥ
brahmacaryam āgām upa mā nayasva iti
āha brūhi brahmacaryam āgām upa mā nayasva iti

original: [ko nāmāsi kiṅgotraḥ iti asau iti yathā nāmagotre bhavatastathā prabrūhi // KauśS_7,6{55}.10 //]
analyzed: kaḥ nāma asi kiṅgotraḥ iti asau iti yathā nāma gotre bhavataḥ tathā prabrūhi

original: tata ācāryo bravīti - 'ko nāmāsi kiṅgotraḥ' iti /
analyzed: tatas ācāryaḥ bravīti kaḥ nāma asi kiṅgotraḥ iti
punar brahmacārī bravīti somadevadattaśarma nāmā aham

original: punaḥ brahmacārī vadati - 'ārṣeyaṃ mā kṛtvā bandhumantamupanaya' //
analyzed: punar brahmacārī vadati ārṣeyam mā kṛtvā bandhumantam upanaya
ārṣeyam tvā kṛtvā bandhumantam upanayāmi iti

original: tataḥ punarācārya āha - 'ārṣeyaṃ tvā kṛtvā bandhumantamupanayāmi' iti //
analyzed: tatas punar ācāryaḥ āha ārṣeyam tvā kṛtvā bandhumantam upanayāmi iti
om bhūḥ bhuvaḥ svarjanadā ūm iti añjalau udakam āsiñcati
om bhūḥ bhuvaḥ svar janadā ūm iti mantreṇa udaka añjalim ādityāya dadāti brahmacārī
uttarā ūsāni brahmacāribhyaḥ iti uttamam pāṇim anvādadhāti
uttara ūsāni iti mantreṇa dakṣiṇa pāṇim gṛhṇāti ācāryaḥ

original: [eṣa ma ādityaputrastanme gopāyasva ityādityena samīkṣate // KauśS_7,6{55}.15 //]
analyzed: eṣa me āditya putraḥ tat me gopāyasva iti ādityena samīkṣate
eṣa me āditya putraḥ iti mantreṇa ādityam nirīkṣate

original: ityenaṃ bāhugṛhītaṃ prāñcamavasthāpya dakṣiṇena pāṇinā nābhideśe'bhisaṃstabhya japati // KauśS_7,6{55}.16 //
analyzed: iti enam bāhu gṛhītam prāñcam avasthāpya dakṣiṇena pāṇinā nābhi deśebhiḥ saṃstabhya japati

original: 'apakrāman' ityṛcā paścādagneḥ pūrvābhimukhaṃ brahmacāriṇamupaveśya tato dakṣiṇena pāṇinā nābhideśaṃ saṃspṛśya tataḥ 'asmin vasu vasavo dhārayantu'  #
analyzed: apakrāman iti ṛcā paścāt agneḥ pūrva abhimukham brahmacāriṇam upaveśya tatas dakṣiṇena pāṇinā nābhi deśam saṃspṛśya tatas asmin vasu vasavaḥ dhārayantu
athā api paritvaramāṇaḥ ā yātu mitra
iti api khalu etāvatā eva upanītaḥ bhavati

original: athavā 'ā yātu mitra' iti sūktaṃ japati //
analyzed: athavā ā yātu mitraḥ iti sūktam japati

original: [pracchādya trīn prāṇāyāmān kṛtvāvacchādya vatsatarīmudapātre samavekṣayet // KauśS_7,6{55}.19 //]
analyzed: pracchādya trīn prāṇāyāmān kṛtvā avacchādya vatsatarīm uda pātre samavekṣayet

original: brahmacāriṇaṃ vastreṇa pracchādya tatastrīn prāṇāyāmān kṛtvā /
analyzed: brahmacāriṇam vastreṇa pracchādya tatas trīn prāṇāyāmān kṛtvā
tata avacchādya brahmacāriṇam uda pātre vatsikā mukham avekṣayet
sam indra naḥ sam varcasā iti dvābhyām ṛgbhyām gām utsṛjati

original: iti dvābhyāṃ bhādramauñjīṃ mekhalāṃ badhnāti // KauśS_7,7{56}.1 //]
'śraddhāyā duhitā' iti dvābhyāṃ mauñjīṃ mekhalāṃ tripravarāṃ catuḥpravarāṃ vābhimantrya brahmacāriṇaḥ kaṭipradeśe badhnāti //
analyzed: śraddhāyāḥ duhitā iti dvābhyām mauñjīm mekhalām tri pravarām catur pravarām vā abhimantrya brahmacāriṇaḥ kaṭi pradeśe badhnāti

original: [mitrāvaruṇayostvā hastābhyāṃ prasūtaḥ praśiṣā prayacchāmi iti pālāśaṃ daṇḍaṃ prayacchati // KauśS_7,7{56}.2 //
analyzed: mitrāvaruṇayoḥ tvā hastābhyām prasūtaḥ praśiṣā prayacchāmi iti pālāśam daṇḍam prayacchati
mitrāvaruṇayoḥ tvā hastābhyām prasūtaḥ praśiṣā pratigṛhṇāmi

original: suśravaḥ suśravasaṃ mā kurvavakro'vithuro'haṃ bhūyāsam iti pratigṛhṇāti // KauśS_7,7{56}.3 //
analyzed: suśravaḥ suśravasam mā bhūyāsam iti pratigṛhṇāti

original: tato 'mitrāvaruṇayostvā hastābhyām' iti mantreṇa 'śyeno'si' iti ca sūktena pālāśadaṇḍamabhimantrya brahmacāriṇe prayacchati /
analyzed: tatas mitrāvaruṇayoḥ tvā hastābhyām iti mantreṇa śyenā asi iti ca sūktena pālāśa daṇḍam abhimantrya brahmacāriṇe prayacchati

original: 'mitrāvaruṇayostvā' iti 'śyeno'si' iti ca paṭhitvā brahmacārī daṇḍaṃ gṛhṇāti /
analyzed: mitrāvaruṇayoḥ tvā iti śyenā asi iti ca paṭhitvā brahmacārī daṇḍam gṛhṇāti
iti ṛcā yajñopavītam abhimantrya paridhatte manu ādi vihitam

original: 'ahaṃ rudrebhiḥ' iti sūktaṃ pratyṛcaṃ brahmacāriṇaṃ vācayati / atha
analyzed: aham rudrebhiḥ iti sūktam pratyṛcam brahmacāriṇam vācayati atha

original: 'brahmacārivrataṃ dvādaśavārṣikaṃ ṣaḍvārṣikaṃ vā trivārṣikaṃ vā yathāśāstravihitaṃ yathāsmaryamāṇadharmakam' ityādyuktamāṅgirasakalpe vrataśrāvaṇam
analyzed: brahmacāri vratam dvādaśa vārṣikam ṣaṣ vārṣikam vā tri vārṣikam vā yathā śāstra vihitam yathā smaryamāṇa dharmakam ityādi uktam āṅgirasa kalpe vrata śrāvaṇam

original: agnaye gurave ca brahmacārī vrataṃ nivedayet //
analyzed: agnaye gurave ca brahmacārī vratam nivedayet

original: agne vratapate vrataṃ cariṣyāmi tacchakeyaṃ tatsamāpeyaṃ tanme rādhyatāṃ tanme samṛdhyatāṃ
analyzed: agne vratapate vratam cariṣyāmi tat śakeyam tat samāpeyam tat me rādhyatām tat me samṛdhyatām

original: tanme mā vyanaśattena rādhyāsaṃ tatte prabravīmi tadupākaromi agnaye vratapataye
analyzed: tat me mā vyanaśat tena rādhyāsam tat te prabravīmi tat upākaromi agnaye vratapataye

original: vratānāṃ vratapatayo vratamacāriṣaṃ tadaśakaṃ tatsamāptaṃ tanme rāddhaṃ tanme samṛddhaṃ
analyzed: vratānām vrata patayaḥ vratam acāriṣam tat aśakam tat samāptam tat me rāddham tat me samṛddham

original: tanme mā vyanaśattena rāddho'smi tadvaḥ prabravīmi tadupākaromi vratebhyo vratapatibhyaḥ
analyzed: tat me mā vyanaśat tena rāddhaḥ asmi tat vaḥ prabravīmi tat upākaromi vratebhyaḥ vrata patibhyaḥ

original: 'agne vratapate' iti pratyṛcaṃ brahmacārī aṣṭau samidha ādadhāti /
analyzed: agne vratapate iti pratyṛcam brahmacārī aṣṭau samidhaḥ ādadhāti
atha enam baddha mekhalam āhitasamitkam sāvitrīm vācayati

original: tataḥ sāvitrīṃ vācayati pādaṃ pādaṃ prathamam /
analyzed: tatas sāvitrīm vācayati pādam pādam prathamam

original: [athainaṃ saṃśāsti agneścāsi brahmacārinmama cāpo'śāna karma kurūrdhvastiṣṭhanmā divā svāpsīḥ samidha ādhehi // KauśS_7,7{56}.12 //]
analyzed: atha enam saṃśāsti agneḥ ca asi brahmacārin mama ca apośāna karma kuru ūrdhvaḥ tiṣṭhan mā divā svāpsīḥ samidhaḥ ādhehi

original: mā yajñaṃ kuru' ityevamādi ācārān kathayati //
analyzed: mā yajñam kuru iti evamādi ācārān kathayati

original: [athainaṃ bhūtebhyaḥ paridadāti agnaye tvā paridadāmi brahmaṇe tvā paridadāmyudṅkyāya
analyzed: atha enam bhūtebhyaḥ paridadāti agnaye tvā paridadāmi brahmaṇe tvā paridadāmi udṅkyāya

original: tvā śūlvāṇāya paridadāmi śatruñjayāya tvā kṣātrāṇāya paridadāmi mārtyuñjayāya tvā
analyzed: tvā śūlvāṇāya paridadāmi śatruñjayāya tvā kṣātrāṇāya paridadāmi mārtyuñjayāya tvā

original: mārtyavāya paridadāmyaghorāya tvā paridadāmi takṣakāya tvā vaiśāleyāya paridadāmi
analyzed: mārtyavāya paridadāmi aghorāya tvā paridadāmi takṣakāya tvā vaiśāleyāya paridadāmi

original: hāhāhūhūbhyāṃ tvā gandharvābhyāṃ paridadāmi yogakṣemābhyāṃ tvā paridadāmi bhayāya
analyzed: hāhā hūhūbhyām tvā gandharvābhyām paridadāmi yogakṣemābhyām tvā paridadāmi bhayāya

original: ca tvābhayāya ca paridadāmi viśvebhyastvā devebhyaḥ paridadāmi sarvebhyastvā devebhyaḥ
analyzed: ca tvā abhayāya ca paridadāmi viśvebhyaḥ tvā devebhyaḥ paridadāmi sarvebhyaḥ tvā devebhyaḥ

original: paridadāmi viśvebhyastvā bhūtebhyaḥ paridadāmi sarvebhyastvā bhūtebhyaḥ paridadāmi
analyzed: paridadāmi viśvebhyaḥ tvā bhūtebhyaḥ paridadāmi sarvebhyaḥ tvā bhūtebhyaḥ paridadāmi
atha enam bhūtebhyaḥ ityādibhiḥ vrīhi yava śamīm abhimantrya mūrdhni dadyāt

original: [svasti caratādiha iti mayi ramantāṃ brahmacāriṇaḥ ityanugṛhṇīyāt // KauśS_7,7{56}.14 //
analyzed: svasti caratāt iha iti mayi ramantām brahmacāriṇaḥ iti anugṛhṇīyāt
mayi ramantām brahmacāriṇaḥ iti etena mantreṇa brahmacāriṇam anugṛhṇīyāt
praṇītīḥ abhyāvartasva iti ardharcena brahmacāriṇam ātma sammukham karoti
yathā āpaḥ pravatā yanti māsāḥ aharjaram

original: evā mā brahmacāriṇo dhātarāyantu sarvadā svāhā ityācāryaḥ samidhamādadhāti // KauśS_7,7{56}.17 //]
analyzed: eva mā brahmacāriṇaḥ dhātar āyantu sarvadā svāhā iti ācāryaḥ samidham ādadhāti

original: iti dvābhyāṃ bhādramauñjīṃ mekhalāṃ brāhmaṇāya badhnāti // KauśS_7,8{57}.1 //
analyzed: iti dvābhyām bhādramauñjīm mekhalām brāhmaṇāya badhnāti

original: mitrāvaruṇayostvā hastābhyāṃ prasūtaḥ praśiṣā prayacchāmi iti pālāśaṃ daṇḍaṃ brāhmaṇāya prayacchati // KauśS_7,8{57}.4 //
analyzed: mitrāvaruṇayoḥ tvā hastābhyām prasūtaḥ praśiṣā prayacchāmi iti pālāśam daṇḍam brāhmaṇāya prayacchati

original: yadyasya daṇḍo bhajyeta ya ṛte cidabhiśriṣa (14.2.47)
analyzed: yadi asya daṇḍaḥ bhajyeta yaḥ ṛte cit abhiśriṣa

analyzed: sarvatra śīrṇe bhinne naṣṭenyam kṛtvā punar mā etu indriyam

analyzed: sarvam grāmam caret bhaikṣam stena patita varjam

original: 'OM bhavati bhikṣāṃ dehi' iti brāhmaṇaścaredityādi sūtram //
analyzed: om bhavati bhikṣām dehi iti brāhmaṇaḥ caret ityādi sūtram

dvādaśa rātram a rasa āśī bhavati

analyzed: avyasaḥ ca iti ṛcam japitvā sam mā siñcantu iti tris paryukṣaṇam
yat agre tapasā tapaḥ ugne tapaḥ tapyāmahe
yat agre tapasā iti dvābhyām agnim prajvālayati
idam āpaḥ pravahataḥ iti ṛcā hastau prakṣālayati

original: punaḥ 'saṃ mā siñcantu' iti triḥ paryukṣati //
analyzed: punar sam mā siñcantu iti tris paryukṣati

analyzed: agne samidham āhārṣam iti catasṛbhiḥ ṛgbhiḥ catasraḥ samidhaḥ ādadhāti

tvam naḥ medhe iti pañcabhiḥ ṛgbhiḥ agnim upatiṣṭhate

tri āyuṣam iti bhūtinā rakṣām karoti
tatas satyam tvā ṛtena iti paryukṣaṇam
ahar ahar samidhaḥ āhṛtya evam sāyam prātar abhyādadhyāt
atha vrata ādeśāḥ uttama paṭale vyākhyātāḥ
sāṃvatsaram vedavratam kalpānām tu tad ardhakam

atha kauśika ukta vrata vidhānam ucyate
daṇḍa mekhalā yajñopavītam ca dattvā tatas vrata śrāvaṇam

original: nityanaimittikakāmyeṣu etena vidhānena vratagrahaṇaṃ vratavisarjanaṃ ca kuryāt /
analyzed: nitya naimittika kāmyeṣu etena vidhānena vrata grahaṇam vrata visarjanam ca kuryāt
kṛcchra cāndrāyaṇa ādiṣu vrata grahaṇam vrata visarjanam ca bhavati

original: sarvatra laukike ca vrate vaidike ca sarvatra /
analyzed: sarvatra laukike ca vrate vaidike ca sarvatra
yathākāmam dvādaśa rātram a rasa āśī bhavati
atha brahmacārī upanayana anantaram medhājanana mantraiḥ āyuṣya mantraiḥ ca ājyam juhuyāt

original: anyo vā brahmacārī vā sarvasya karmaṇo'dhikāraḥ /
analyzed: anyaḥ vā brahmacārī vā sarvasya karmaṇā adhikāraḥ
viśve devāḥ asmin vasu yat ābadhnan nava prāṇān iti ājyam juhuyāt
bhadrāya karṇaḥ krośatu bhadrāya akṣi vi vepatām

original: parā duḥṣvapnyaṃ suva yadbhadraṃ tanna ā suva //
analyzed: parā duḥṣvapnyam suva yat bhadram tat naḥ ā suva
akṣi vepam duḥṣvapnyam ārtim puruṣa reṣiṇīm
tat asmat aśvinā yuvam apriye prati muñcatam
yat pārśvāt urasaḥ me aṅgāt aṅgāt avavepate

original: aśvinā puṣkarasrajā tasmānnaḥ pātamaṃhasaḥ iti karṇaṃ krośantamanumantrayate // KauśS_7,9{58}.1 //]
analyzed: aśvinā puṣkara srajā tasmāt naḥ pātam aṃhasaḥ iti karṇam krośantam anumantrayate

original: 'bhadrāya karṇaḥ krośatu' iti sūktena karṇaṃ krośantamanumantrayate //
analyzed: bhadrāya karṇaḥ krośatu iti sūktena karṇam krośantam anumantrayate
vi devāḥ jarasā iti sūktena puruṣa śarīram abhimantrayate

original: kartre dakṣiṇā dhenuḥ brahmaṇaśca dhenuḥ sarvatra /
analyzed: kartre dakṣiṇā dhenuḥ brahmaṇaḥ ca dhenuḥ sarvatra
uta devāḥ iti sūktena śarīram abhimantrayate
āvataḥ te iti sūktena puruṣasya aṅgam anumantrayate
upa priyam iti ṛcā aṅgam abhimantrayate
antakāya ā rabhasva iti sūktābhyām śarīram abhimantrayate
prāṇāya namaḥ iti artha sūktena śarīram abhimantrayate
sarve uta devāḥ iti sūktena abhimṛśanti puruṣa śarīram
antakāya mṛtyave iti sūktena nābheḥ ūrdhvam adhastāt abhimantrayate
āvataḥ te prāṇāya namaḥ iti sūktābhyām dakṣiṇam karṇam abhimantrayate

original: [karmaṇe vāṃ veṣāya vāṃ sukṛtāya vām iti pāṇī prakṣālya // KauśS_7,9{58}.5 //]
analyzed: karmaṇe vām veṣāya vām sukṛtāya vām iti pāṇī prakṣālya

original: āyuṣkāmasya 'karmaṇe vām' iti hastau prakṣālya 'vi devā' ityāyuṣārthinamabhimantrayate /
analyzed: āyuṣkāmasya karmaṇe vām iti hastau prakṣālya vi devāḥ iti āyuṣā arthinam abhimantrayate

original: 'karmaṇe vām' iti hastau prakṣālya 'uta devāḥ' ityabhimantrayate /
analyzed: karmaṇe vām iti hastau prakṣālya uta devāḥ iti abhimantrayate
karmaṇe vām iti hastau prakṣālya āvataḥ te iti abhimantrayate

original: 'karmaṇe vām' iti hastau prakṣālya śarīraṃ 'upa priyam' ityabhimantrayate /
analyzed: karmaṇe vām iti hastau prakṣālya śarīram upa priyam iti abhimantrayate
karmaṇe vām iti pāṇī prakṣālya antakāya

original: 'karmaṇe vām' iti hastau prakṣālya 'prāṇāya namaḥ' ityabhimantrayate /
analyzed: karmaṇe vām iti hastau prakṣālya prāṇāya namaḥ iti abhimantrayate
karmaṇe vām iti pāṇī prakṣālya viṣāsahim iti abhimantrayate
kuṅkuma candana sarva oṣadhi ādi śarīram samālabhya ātmānam abhimantrayate
śuddhāḥ naḥ āpaḥ iti ṛcā śleṣmam tyaktvā ātmānam anumantrayate
jīvāḥ stha iti sūktena ācamya anumantrayate
vi devāḥ iti gaṇaḥ punar vikalpena āyuṣkāmaḥ
ehi jīvam iti āñjana maṇim badhnāti

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'ehi jīvam' iti sūktenāñjanamaṇiṃ sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā ehi jīvam iti sūktena añjana maṇim sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti
ehi jīvam iti sūktena añjana tucchakam abhimantrya pāyayati

original: nainaṃ prāpnoti śapatho na kṛtyā nābhiśocanam //
analyzed: na enam prāpnoti śapathaḥ na kṛtyā na abhiśocanam

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'vātājjāta' iti sūktena śaṅkhamaṇiṃ sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā vātāt jātaḥ iti sūktena śaṅkha maṇim sampātya abhimantrya badhnāti

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'nava prāṇān' iti sūktena suvarṇarajatalohatrīṇi śakalānyekatra kṛtvā navaśālākaṃ maṇiṃ trivṛtaṃ kṛtvā sampātyābhimantrya  #
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā nava prāṇān iti sūktena suvarṇa rajata loha trīṇi śakalāni ekatra kṛtvā nava śālākam maṇim trivṛtam kṛtvā sampātya abhimantrya
trayodaśī ādayaḥ tisraḥ dadhi madhu madhyāt uddhṛtya trivṛtam aṇim ghṛtāt ulluptam iti ṛcā
anyatra sarvatra puṇya aha ante bandhanam
muñcāmi tvā iti sūktena abhimantrayate āyuṣkāmaḥ
rājayakṣmaṇi jvare ca anya sarva vyādhau ca
uta devāḥ iti sūktena abhimṛśati dvābhyām hastābhyām
upa priyam iti ṛcā bāla śarīram abhimantrayate
antakāya ā rabhasva iti sūktābhyām śarīram abhimantrayate
prāṇāya namaḥ iti sūktena puruṣam abhimantrayate

original: kṣubhitvā kāsitvā khāsitvā pītvā suptvā bhuktvā japati /
analyzed: kṣubhitvā kāsitvā khāsitvā pītvā suptvā bhuktvā japati
sumati kāmaḥ sa kāma jātiḥ āsāra tva kāmaḥ
iti sarva surabhi cūrṇaiḥ araṇye pratīhāram pralimpati

original: 'nirdurarmaṇya' iti sūktena sarvauṣadhimabhimantrya puruṣaṃ pralimpati puruṣasyāraṇye /
analyzed: nirdurarmaṇyaḥ iti sūktena sarva oṣadhim abhimantrya puruṣam pralimpati puruṣasya araṇye

original: śrotraṃ vāk manaḥ cakṣurdantaḥ nāsikā anyacca sarvaṃ vikalendriyaṃ dṛḍhaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: śrotram vāc manaḥ cakṣuḥ dantaḥ nāsikā anyat ca sarvam vikala indriyam dṛḍham bhavati
yaḥ vikala indriyaḥ tasya idam karma

original: ekādaśe'hani nāma dvādaśe'hani nāma śatarātrau vā puṇye nakṣatre vā yathākuladharmeṇa vā /
analyzed: ekādaśa ihani nāma dvādaśa ihani nāma śata rātrau vā puṇye nakṣatre vā yathā kula dharmeṇa vā

original: ājyatantramabhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'ā rabhasvemām' ityarthasūktena kumārasya dakṣiṇe hasta udakadhārāmavicchinnāṃ ninayati //
analyzed: ājya tantram abhyātāna antam kṛtvā ā rabhasva imām iti artha sūktena kumārasya dakṣiṇe haste udaka dhārām avicchinnām ninayati

original: tata 'ā rabhasva' iti sūktena devadārumaṇiṃ sampātyābhimantrya puṇyāhānte badhnāti /
analyzed: tatas ā rabhasva iti sūktena devadāru maṇim sampātya abhimantrya puṇyāha ante badhnāti

original: atha ācāryo vā dakṣiṇe karṇe śrāvayati kṛttikādaivataṃ someśvaradattaśarmā nāma athavā agnidaivataṃ somadevadattaśarmā nāma nakṣatrakalpoktaṃ  #
analyzed: atha ācāryaḥ vā dakṣiṇe karṇe śrāvayati kṛttikā daivatam someśvaradattaśarmā nāma athavā agni daivatam somadevadattaśarmā nāma nakṣatra kalpa uktam
nāma dvi akṣaram catur akṣaram ityādi
yat te vāsaḥ iti ṛcā ahatena uttara sicā pracchādayati
ityādi paridānāni siṃhāvalokana nyāyena go dāna madhye uktāni

original: 'śive te stām' iti dvābhyāṃ kumāraṃ puṇyāhānte niṣkrāmayati tataḥ pūrvoktāni paridānāni dadāti /
analyzed: śive te stām iti dvābhyām kumāram puṇyāha ante niṣkrāmayati tatas pūrva uktāni paridānāni dadāti
ṣaṣṭhe māsi prāśanam kuryāt iti paiṭhīnasiḥ
iti ādityam darśayitvā tatas unnaprāśanam kuryāt puṇya aha ante

original: tataḥ 'śivau te stāṃ vrīhiyavau' iti dvābhyāmṛgbhyāṃ vrīhiyavau piṣṭvābhimantrya kumāraṃ prāśayati /
analyzed: tatas śivau te stām vrīhi yavau iti dvābhyām ṛgbhyām vrīhi yavau piṣṭvā abhimantrya kumāram prāśayati

original: iti dve etābhiḥ ṛgbhirvrīhyādi mūrdhni dadāti /
analyzed: iti dve etābhiḥ ṛgbhiḥ vrīhi ādi mūrdhni dadāti
ahne ca tvā iti ahar rātrābhyām paridadāti
ahne ca tvā iti ahar rātrābhyām paridadāmi

original: nāmakaraṇe niṣkramaṇe annaprāśane ca godānikāni paridānāni bhavati /
analyzed: nāmakaraṇe niṣkramaṇe annaprāśane ca godānikāni paridānāni bhavati

original: ūno vātirikto vā yaḥ svaśākhodito vidhiḥ.
analyzed: ūnaḥ vā atiriktaḥ vā yaḥ sva śākhā uditaḥ vidhiḥ

original: tenaiva sarvaṃ sampūrṇaṃ syānna kuryāt pāratantrikam //
analyzed: tena eva sarvam sampūrṇam syāt na kuryāt pāratantrikam

original: paścāt śrāddhaṃ sarveṣu saṃskāreṣu kuryāt iti dārilabhāṣyakārasyābhiprāyeṇa vyākhyāta iti /
analyzed: paścāt śrāddham sarveṣu saṃskāreṣu kuryāt iti dārila bhāṣyakārasya abhiprāyeṇa vyākhyātaḥ iti

original: tathā ca manuḥ - 'akṛtvā mātaraḥ śrāddhaṃ na kuryāt karma vaidikam' /
analyzed: tathā ca manuḥ a kṛtvā mātaraḥ śrāddham na kuryāt karma vaidikam

original: vaidikeṣu karmasu nityanaimittikakāmyeṣu śrāddhaṃ kṛtvā tataḥ karma kuryāt /
analyzed: vaidikeṣu karmasu nitya naimittika kāmyeṣu śrāddham kṛtvā tatas karma kuryāt

original: sarvatra śrāddhaṃ kṛtvā śāntikapauṣṭikābhicārakādbhutāni atharvavedavihitāni kartavyāni /
analyzed: sarvatra śrāddham kṛtvā śāntika pauṣṭika abhicāraka adbhutāni atharvaveda vihitāni kartavyāni

original: puṃsavanādisaṃskārāḥ svaśākhāvihitāḥ kartavyā na kuryāt pāratantrikāḥ / punaḥ-
analyzed: puṃsavana ādi saṃskārāḥ sva śākhā vihitāḥ kartavyāḥ na kuryāt pāratantrikāḥ punar
sva śākhām tu parityajya para śākhām upāsate

original: sa śūdravad bahiḥ kāryo havyakavyeṣu garhitaḥ //
analyzed: sa śūdra vat bahis kāryaḥ havya kavyeṣu garhitaḥ
udasya ketanaḥ iti anuvākena ādityam upatiṣṭhate

agneḥ manve iti saptabhiḥ sūktaiḥ haviḥ upadadhīta

original: svayaṅkartṛke anyasmai dakṣiṇāṃ dadāti śubhaṃ vā bahavo'pi kurvanti /

original: puruṣastrīṇāmapi vṛddhabālataruṇānāṃ sarveṣāṃ mānuṣapaśumṛgapakṣiṇa aśvādīnāmāyuṣyaṃ karma bhavati /

original: iti sūktasya 'yanmātalī rathakrītam' iti sarvāsāṃ dvitīyā /
analyzed: iti sūktasya yat mātalī ratha krītam iti sarvāsām dvitīyā

original: 'agniṃ brūmaḥ' ityasya sūktasya pratyṛcaṃ mātalī kāryā /
analyzed: agnim brūmaḥ ityasya sūktasya pratyṛcam mātalī kāryā

original: yadā svayaṃ karoti tadā'nyasmai dakṣiṇāṃ dadyāt //
analyzed: yadā svayam karoti tadā anyasmai dakṣiṇām dadyāt

original: 'viśvān devān gacchatu haviḥ svāhā' iti viśeṣaḥ /

original: athavā 'viśve devā' iti sūktenopatiṣṭhate viśvān devān //
analyzed: athavā viśve devāḥ iti sūktena upatiṣṭhate viśvān devān

original: pākayajñatantramājyabhāgāntaṃ kṛtvā 'idaṃ janāsa' itisūkte na dyāvāpṛthivīyaṃ caruṃ juhoti /
analyzed: pākayajña tantram ājyabhāga antam kṛtvā idam janāsaḥ iti sūkte na dyāvāpṛthivīyam carum juhoti

original: putrakāmaḥ dhanakāmaḥ paśukāmaḥ dhānyakāmaḥ hiraṇyakāmaḥ ratnakāmaḥ hastikāmaḥ aśvakāmaḥ
analyzed: putra kāmaḥ dhana kāmaḥ paśu kāmaḥ dhānya kāmaḥ hiraṇya kāmaḥ ratna kāmaḥ hasti kāmaḥ aśva kāmaḥ

original: puṣṭikāmaḥ phalakāmaḥ āyuṣyakāmaḥ vaśīkaraṇakāmaḥ cakṣurādīnīndriyāṇi vikale sati
analyzed: puṣṭi kāmaḥ phala kāmaḥ āyuṣya kāmaḥ vaśīkaraṇa kāmaḥ cakṣuḥ ādīni indriyāṇi vikale sati

original: dṛṣṭikāmaḥ patnīkāmaḥ gṛhakāmaḥ saubhāgyakāmaḥ parasya daurbhāgyakāmaḥ /
analyzed: dṛṣṭi kāmaḥ patnī kāmaḥ gṛha kāmaḥ saubhāgya kāmaḥ parasya daurbhāgya kāmaḥ

original: pākatantre 'indra juṣasva' iti sūktena aindraṃ caruṃ juhoti /
analyzed: pākatantre indra juṣasva iti sūktena aindram carum juhoti

original: tantramājyabhāgāntaṃ kṛtvā 'indramaham' iti sūktena aindraṃ caruṃ juhoti /

original: 'udenamuttaraṃ naya' 'yo asmān brahmaṇaspate' iti sūktābhyāṃ karkandhūsamidha ādadhāti /
analyzed: ud enam uttaram naya yaḥ asmān brahmaṇaspate iti sūktābhyām karkandhū samidhaḥ ādadhāti

original: 'udenamuttaraṃ naya' 'yo asmān brahmaṇaspate' iti sūktābhyāṃ sabhānāmupastaraṇāni juhoti /
analyzed: ud enam uttaram naya yaḥ asmān brahmaṇaspate iti sūktābhyām sabhānām upastaraṇāni juhoti

analyzed: indra daivatam carum ājyabhāga antam kṛtvā yaśasam mā indraḥ iti sūktena indrāya carum juhoti
athavā yaśasam mā indraḥ iti tṛcena sūktena indram upatiṣṭhate

analyzed: brāhmaṇānām madhye brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyāṇām madhye kṣatriyaḥ iti arthaḥ
