original: gṛhe grāme vā sarvatra śāntiṃ kuryāt /
analyzed: gṛhe grāme vā sarvatra śāntim kuryāt
ā mandraiḥ iti dvābhyām indram upatiṣṭhate
go śva aja hasti puruṣa ādi svastyayanam bhavati
samā astvā iti sūktena agnim yajate pāka tantreṇa
manasā cintita kāmaḥ sampad iti ucyate
samā astvā agne iti sūktena agnim upatiṣṭhate
abhyarcate iti sūktena ṣaḍarcena agnim yajate
abhyarcate iti sūktena ṣaḍarcena agnim upatiṣṭhate
pṛthivyām agnaye iti daśarcena pṛthivī ādi devatāḥ upatiṣṭhate

original: 'tadidāsa' iti sūktenandrāgnī yajate vā upatiṣṭhate vā /
analyzed: tat idāse iti sūktena andra agnī yajate vai upatiṣṭhate vā

original: 'dhītī vā ye' iti dvābhyāmindrāgnī yajate vā upatiṣṭhate vā /
analyzed: dhītī vā ye iti dvābhyām indra agnī yajate vai upatiṣṭhate vā

original: 'yasyedamā rajaḥ' iti sūktena tṛcenendraṃ yajata upatiṣṭhate vā /
analyzed: yasya idam ā rajaḥ iti sūktena tṛcena indram yajate upatiṣṭhate vā

original: 'atharvāṇaṃ pitaram' ityaṣṭabhiratharvāṇaṃ yajate vā upatiṣṭhate vā /
analyzed: atharvāṇam pitaram iti aṣṭabhiḥ atharvāṇam yajate vai upatiṣṭhate vā
aditiḥ dyauḥ iti catasṛbhiḥ aditim yajate upatiṣṭhate vā

original: 'diteḥ putrāṇām' ityṛcā devān yajata upatiṣṭhate vā /
analyzed: diteḥ putrāṇām iti ṛcā devān yajate upatiṣṭhate vā

original: 'bṛhaspate savitaḥ' ityekayā bṛhaspatiṃ yajate vā upatiṣṭhate vā /
analyzed: bṛhaspate savitar iti ekayā bṛhaspatim yajate vā upatiṣṭhate vā

original: 'bṛhaspate savitaḥ' ityekayā suptaṃ brahmacāriṇamutthāpayati āditye udite sati /
analyzed: bṛhaspate savitar iti ekayā suptam brahmacāriṇam utthāpayati āditye udite sati

original: 'dhātā dadhātu' iti caturṛcena dhātāraṃ yajata upatiṣṭhate vā /
analyzed: dhātā dadhātu iti caturṛcena dhātāram yajate upatiṣṭhate vā
prajāpatiḥ janayati iti ṛcā prajāpatim yajate upatiṣṭhate vā

original: 'anvadya no'numatiḥ' iti ṣaḍarcenānumatiṃ yajata upatiṣṭhate vā /
analyzed: anu adya nonumatiḥ iti ṣaḍarcena anumatim yajate upatiṣṭhate vā

original: 'yanna indro akhanat' ityekayā indrādyā nava devatā mantroktā ekacaruṇā yajate /
analyzed: yat naḥ indraḥ akhanat iti ekayā indra ādyāḥ nava devatāḥ mantra uktāḥ eka caruṇā yajate

original: 'yayorojasā' iti dvābhyāmṛgbhyāṃ viṣṇuṃ yajata upatiṣṭhate vā /
analyzed: yayoḥ ojasā iti dvābhyām ṛgbhyām viṣṇum yajate upatiṣṭhate vā

original: 'viṣṇornu kam' ityaṣṭarcena viṣṇuṃ yajata upatiṣṭhate vā /
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ nu kam iti aṣṭa ṛcena viṣṇum yajate upatiṣṭhate vā

original: 'agnāviṣṇū mahi' iti dvābhyāmṛgbhyāṃ agnāviṣṇū yajata upatiṣṭhate vā /
analyzed: agnāviṣṇū mahi iti dvābhyām ṛgbhyām agnāviṣṇū yajate upatiṣṭhate vā

original: 'somārudrā vi vṛhatam' iti dvābhyāmṛgbhyāṃ somārudrau yajata upatiṣṭhate vā /
analyzed: somārudrā vi vṛhatam iti dvābhyām ṛgbhyām somārudrau yajate upatiṣṭhate vā

original: 'sinīvāli pṛthu ṣṭuke' iti navabhirṛgbhiḥ sinīvālī kuhū rākā devapatnī iti catasro devatāḥ yajata upatiṣṭhate vā /
analyzed: sinīvāli pṛthu stuke iti navabhiḥ ṛgbhiḥ sinīvālī kuhū rākā deva patnī iti catasraḥ devatāḥ yajate upatiṣṭhate vā
sarvatra paryāyeṇa sarva kāma avāptiḥ bhavati
bṛhaspatiḥ naḥ iti ṛcā bṛhaspatim yajate upatiṣṭhate vā

original: 'yatte devā akṛṇvan' iti catasṛbhiramāvāsyāṃ yajata upatiṣṭhate vā /
analyzed: yat te devāḥ akṛṇvan iti catasṛbhiḥ amāvāsyām yajate upatiṣṭhate vā

original: 'pūrṇā paścāt' iti tisṛbhiḥ paurṇamāsīṃ yajata upatiṣṭhate vā /
analyzed: pūrṇā paścāt iti tisṛbhiḥ paurṇamāsīm yajate upatiṣṭhate vā

original: 'prajāpate na tvat' ityṛcā prajāpatiṃ yajata upatiṣṭhate vā /
analyzed: prajāpate na tvat iti ṛcā prajāpatim yajate upatiṣṭhate vā
abhyarcate iti ṣaḍbhiḥ ṛgbhiḥ agnim yajate upatiṣṭhate vā

original: 'ko asyā naḥ' iti dvābhyāmṛgbhyāṃ prajāpatiṃ yajata upatiṣṭhate vā /
analyzed: kaḥ asyāḥ naḥ iti dvābhyām ṛgbhyām prajāpatim yajate upatiṣṭhate vā

original: 'agna indraśca' iti catasṛbhirṛgbhiḥ agnimindraṃ yajata upatiṣṭhate vā /
analyzed: agne indraḥ ca iti catasṛbhiḥ ṛgbhiḥ agnim indram yajate upatiṣṭhate vā

original: tathā yogamityadhikaraṇe na kramaḥ kāmyānāṃ karmaṇām /
analyzed: tathā yogam iti adhikaraṇe na kramaḥ kāmyānām karmaṇām

original: 'ya īśe', 'ye bhakṣayantaḥ' iti dvābhyāṃ sūktābhyāmindrāgnī yajata upatiṣṭhate vā /
analyzed: yaḥ īśe ye bhakṣayantaḥ iti dvābhyām sūktābhyām indra agnī yajate upatiṣṭhate vā

original: 'ya īśe', 'ye bhakṣayantaḥ' iti dvābhyāṃ sūktābhyāṃ bhaktādyannamabhimantrya bhikṣukebhyo dadāti /
analyzed: yaḥ īśe ye bhakṣayantaḥ iti dvābhyām sūktābhyām bhakta ādi annam abhimantrya bhikṣukebhyaḥ dadāti

original: 'ya īśe paśupatiḥ' iti sūktena paśūpākaraṇaṃ karoti //
analyzed: yaḥ īśe paśupatiḥ iti sūktena paśu upākaraṇam karoti
ye bhakṣayantaḥ iti sūktena sava purastāddhomāḥ yujyante
doṣaḥ gāya iti atharvāṇam samāvṛtya aśnāti

original: 'doṣo gāya' iti tṛcena sūktena atharvāṇaṃ yajata upatiṣṭhate vā /
analyzed: doṣaḥ gāyaḥ iti tṛcena sūktena atharvāṇam yajate upatiṣṭhate vā
paridhāpana antam kṛtvā tatobhyātānāni idāvatsarāya iti

original: tato'bhyātānāni hutvā 'doṣo gāya' iti sūktena bhaktaṃ sampātyābhimantrāśnāti /
analyzed: tatobhyātānāni hutvā doṣaḥ gāyaḥ iti sūktena bhaktam sampātya abhimantra aśnāti

original: 'abhayaṃ dyāvāpṛthivī' iti tṛcena sūktena pratidiśaṃ saptarṣīn yajata upatiṣṭhate vā /
analyzed: abhayam dyāvāpṛthivī iti tṛcena sūktena pratidiśam saptarṣīn yajate upatiṣṭhate vā

original: yasya grāmasya nagarasya vā'bhayamicchati tasya pratidiśam /
analyzed: yasya grāmasya nagarasya vā abhayam icchati tasya pratidiśam

original: 'śyeno'si' tṛcena pratidiśaṃ saptarṣīn yajata upatiṣṭhate vā /
analyzed: śyena ūsi tṛcena pratidiśam saptarṣīn yajate upatiṣṭhate vā

original: digabhimukhāni tantrāṇi kṛtvā pratidiśaṃ vā grāmasya /
analyzed: diś abhimukhāni tantrāṇi kṛtvā pratidiśam vā grāmasya

original: [uttareṇa dīkṣitasya vā brahmacāriṇo vā daṇḍapradānam // KauśS_7,10{59}.27 //]
analyzed: uttareṇa dīkṣitasya vā brahmacāriṇaḥ vā daṇḍa pradānam
śyenaḥ usi tṛcena sūktena brahmacāriṇe daṇḍa pradānam karoti

original: 'śyeno'si' iti jyotiṣṭome dīkṣitāya daṇḍapradānaṃ karoti brahmā //
analyzed: śyenā asi iti jyotiṣṭome dīkṣitāya daṇḍa pradānam karoti brahmā
dyauḥ ca me iti dyāvāpṛthivyau viriṣyati

original: 'dyauśca ma idaṃ pṛthivī ca' iti tṛcena dyāvāpṛthivī yajata upatiṣṭhate vā /
analyzed: dyauḥ ca me idam pṛthivī ca iti tṛcena dyāvāpṛthivī yajate upatiṣṭhate vā

original: viriṣyati yadi vināśopasthitaḥ tata idaṃ karma kuryāt /
analyzed: viriṣyati yadi vināśa upasthitaḥ tatas idam karma kuryāt

original: yadi vināśe vā vartamāne vināśabhaye vā tadā idaṃ karma kuryāt /
analyzed: yadi vināśe vā vartamāne vināśa bhaye vā tadā idam karma kuryāt

original: dravyanāśe putranāśe prajānāśe paśunāśe aśvanāśe hastināśe vṛṣabhanāśe gṛhanāśe samutpanne kuryāt /
analyzed: dravya nāśe putra nāśe prajā nāśe paśu nāśe aśva nāśe hasti nāśe vṛṣabha nāśe gṛha nāśe samutpanne kuryāt

original: athavā śāntike doṣāḥ sarve vilayaṃ yānti iti brahmavido vadanti /
analyzed: athavā śāntike doṣāḥ sarve vilayam yānti iti brahma vidaḥ vadanti

original: [yo agnau (7.87) iti rudrān svastyayanakāmaḥ svastyayanakāmaḥ // KauśS_7,10{59}.29 //]
analyzed: yaḥ agnau iti rudrān svastyayana kāmaḥ svastyayana kāmaḥ

original: 'yo agnau' ityṛcā rudrān yajata upatiṣṭhate vā /
analyzed: yaḥ agnau iti ṛcā rudrān yajate upatiṣṭhate vā
śāntika pauṣṭika abhicāreṣu na uṣṇīṣam kārayet
maṇḍapasya uttare pārśve śānti kalaśam sthāpayet sarva karmasu
eka rātra ādi upavāsam kuryāt ādau puraścaraṇam kārayitvā
paurṇamāsī amāvāsye puṇye nakṣatre prayogaḥ sarva karmasu
āyuḥ vṛddhiḥ dvaye proktaḥ āyuṣya karma saṅgrahaḥ
nānā phala samāyuktaḥ kāmya yāgaḥ ca saptame
sambhṛteṣu sāvikeṣu sambhāreṣu brāhmaṇam ṛtvijam vṛṇīta
ṛṣi mārṣeyam sudhātu dakṣiṇam a naimittikam

original: eṣa ha vā ṛṣirārṣeyaḥ sudhātudakṣiṇo yasya tryavarārdhyāḥ pūrvapuruṣā vidyācaraṇavṛttaśīlasampannāḥ //
analyzed: eṣa ha vai ṛṣiḥ ārṣeyaḥ sudhātu dakṣiṇaḥ yasya tryavara ardhyāḥ pūrvapuruṣāḥ vidyā caraṇa vṛtta śīla sampannāḥ
ṛṣīn ārṣeya guṇa yuktān ṛtvijaḥ vṛṇīte
atha atas odanasavānām upācāra kalpam vyākhyāsyāmaḥ
māsa parārdhyā dīkṣā dvādaśa rātraḥ vā

original: kartṛdātārāvā samāpanāt kāmaṃ na bhuñjīran santatāścet syuḥ //
analyzed: kartṛ dātārau vā samāpanāt kāmam na bhuñjīran santatāḥ ced syuḥ

original: yātrārthaṃ dātārau vā dātā keśaśmaśruromanakhāni vāpayīta //
analyzed: yātrā artham dātārau vā dātā keśa śmaśru roma nakhāni vāpayīta
snātau ahata vasanau surabhiṇau vratavantau karmaṇyau upavasataḥ

original: ekādaśyāṃ varaṇaṃ kṛtvā godānikena vidhānena keśaśmaśraromanakhāni vāpayitvā //
analyzed: ekādaśyām varaṇam kṛtvā godānikena vidhānena keśa śmaśra roma nakhāni vāpayitvā
snātau ahata vāsasau surabhiṇau bhūtvā dātā
tri rātram dīkṣā grahaṇam saha patnyā

original: agnaye brahmaṇe gurave vrataśrāvaṇaṃ kṛtvā tato vratādānīyā aṣṭau samidha ādadhāti /
analyzed: agnaye brahmaṇe gurave vrata śrāvaṇam kṛtvā tatas vratādānīyāḥ aṣṭau samidhaḥ ādadhāti
tatas kartā abhyātāna ādi uttara tantram karoti

original: haviṣyabhakṣaṇādi kartā kārayitā patnī ca karoti //
analyzed: haviṣya bhakṣaṇa ādi kartā kārayitā patnī ca karoti

original: [śvo bhūte yajñopavītī śāntyudakaṃ kṛtvā yajñavāstu ca samprokṣya brahmaudanikamagniṃ mathitvā //
analyzed: śvas bhūte yajña upavītī śāntyudakam kṛtvā yajña vāstu ca samprokṣya brahmaudanikam agnim mathitvā

original: ityetaistribhiḥ sūktairanvārabdhe dātari pūrṇahomaṃ juhuyāt // KauśS_8,8{67}.18-19 //]
analyzed: iti etaiḥ tribhiḥ sūktaiḥ anvārabdhe dātari pūrṇahomam juhuyāt

original: tadyat samaṃ samūlamavidagdhaṃ pratiṣṭhitaṃ prāgudakpravaṇamākṛtiloṣṭavalmīkenāstīrya darbhaiśca lomabhiḥ paśūnām // KauśS_8,1{60}.17-18 //]
analyzed: tat yat samam sa mūlam a vidagdham pratiṣṭhitam prāc udak pravaṇam ākṛtiloṣṭa valmīkena āstīrya darbhaiḥ ca lomabhiḥ paśūnām

original: atha caturdaśyāṃ prātaryajñopavītī śāntyudakaṃ kṛtvā devayajanaṃ samprokṣya ākṛtiloṣṭavalmīkenāstīrya devayajanaṃ darbhaiśca go-aśva-aja-avilomāni  #
analyzed: atha caturdaśyām prātaryajña upavītī śāntyudakam kṛtvā devayajanam samprokṣya ākṛtiloṣṭa valmīkena āstīrya devayajanam darbhaiḥ ca go aśva aja avilomāni
pālāśa mayī araṇi dvayena agnim manthayet yajamānaḥ
agne jāyasva iti ṛcā manthantau anumantrayate
agne jāyasva araṇikā nāthitā iyam brahmaudanam pacati putra kāmā

original: agne jāyasva keśavadattaśarmā nāthito'yaṃ brahmaudanaṃ pacati putrakāmaḥ' /
analyzed: agne jāyasva keśava datta śarmā nāthi toyam brahmaudanam pacati putra kāmaḥ
evam patnīnām a yajamāna nāma grahaṇam kṛtvā prathama irdharce
tatas kṛṇuta dhūmam iti ṛcā dhūmam anumantrayate
agni janiṣṭhāḥ iti tribhiḥ pādaiḥ jātam
asyai rayim iti pādena patnīm anumantrayate

original: 'samiddho agne samidhā' iti tribhiḥ pādaiḥ samidhyamānamanumantrayate /
analyzed: samiddhaḥ agne samidhā iti tribhiḥ pādaiḥ samidhyamānam anumantrayate
uttamam nākam iti pādam dātāram vācayati

original: evaṃ brahmaudanikamagniṃ mathitvā sthaṇḍile'gniṃ kṛtvā abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'yaddevā devaheḍanam' (6.114)
analyzed: evam brahmaudanikam agnim mathitvā sthaṇḍile ignim kṛtvā abhyātāna antam kṛtvā yat devāḥ deva heḍanam
iti etaiḥ tribhiḥ sūktaiḥ anvārabdhe dātari pūrṇahomam juhuyāt

original: [agnīnādhāsyamānaḥ savān vā dāsyan saṃvatsaraṃ brahmaudanikamagniṃ dīpayati //
analyzed: agnīn ādhāsyamānaḥ savān vā dāsyan saṃvatsaram brahmaudanikam agnim dīpayati
sava agni senā agnī tādarthikau nirmathyau vā bhavataḥ

original: tasmin yathākāmaṃ savān dadātyekaṃ dvau sarvān vā //
analyzed: tasmin yathākāmam savān dadāti ekam dvau sarvān vā
api vā ekaikam ātma āśiṣaḥ dātāram vācayati
para āśiṣaḥ unumantraṇam anirdiṣṭa āśiṣaḥ ca
ubhaya liṅgaiḥ ubhau pum liṅgaiḥ dātāram strī liṅgaiḥ patnīm

original: evaṃ brahmaudanikamagniṃ mathitvā sthaṇḍile'gniṃ kṛtvābhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā dīpayati ahorātraṃ vā yāthākāmī vā /
analyzed: evam brahmaudanikam agnim mathitvā sthaṇḍile ignim kṛtvā abhyātāna antam kṛtvā dīpayati ahar rātram vā yāthākāmī vā
iti uda hṛtam sampreṣyati anuguptām alaṅkṛtām
atha amāvāsyāyām prātar udaka āharaṇam karoti

original: brāhmaṇīmalaṅkṛtvā tāṃ sādhuvādinīmudakaghaṭaṃ haste gṛhītāṃ 'parehi nāri' ityṛcodakagatāṃ preṣayati //
analyzed: brāhmaṇīm alaṅkṛtvā tām sādhu vādinīm udaka ghaṭam haste gṛhītām parehi nāri iti ṛcā udaka gatām preṣayati
ā imāḥ aguḥ iti āyatīm anumantrayate
ā imāḥ aguḥ iti pādena udaka pūrṇām nārīm anumantrayate

original: 'uttiṣṭha nāri' ityādi 'ā tvāgan yajñaḥ' ityantena dātrīṃ preṣayati //
analyzed: uttiṣṭha nāri ityādi ā tvā agan yajñaḥ ityantena dātrīm preṣayati

original: 'prati kumbhaṃ gṛbhāya' iti pādārdhena jalakumbhaṃ gṛhadvāre pratigrāhayati dātrī //
analyzed: prati kumbham gṛbhāye iti pāda ardhena jala kumbham gṛha dvāre pratigrāhayati dātrī

original: 'ūrjo bhāgaḥ' iti pādena bhūmau nidadhāti uttarataḥ.
analyzed: ūrjaḥ bhāgaḥ iti pādena bhūmau nidadhāti uttaratas

original: tatra dve udapātre nihite bhavato vedimadhye agnerdakṣiṇataḥ /
analyzed: tatra dve uda pātre nihite bhavataḥ vedi madhye agneḥ dakṣiṇatas

original: ahatavāsāḥ sahiraṇyāṃ vastraghaṭikāṃ kṛtvā stṛṇāti tadupari dakṣiṇārtham /
analyzed: ahata vāsāḥ sa hiraṇyām vastra ghaṭikām kṛtvā stṛṇāti tad upari dakṣiṇā artham
dakṣiṇatas dakṣiṇatas uda pātra dvayam sthāpayati
pūrvāhṇe bāhyatas śānta vṛkṣasya idhmam prāñcam upasamādhāya

original: parisamuhya paryukṣya paristīrya barhirudapātramupasādya paricaraṇenājyaṃ paricarya //
analyzed: parisamuhya paryukṣya paristīrya barhiḥ uda pātram upasādya paricaraṇena ājyam paricarya

original: tataḥ prakṛtamudapātraṃ jāṅmāyanaṃ vedyāṃ bahirbrahmāgrataḥ dakṣiṇamanyadantaramanyadantaraṃ yato'dhicariṣyan bhavati /
analyzed: tatas prakṛtam udapātram vedyām bahis brahma agratas dakṣiṇam anyat antaram anyat antaram yatas adhicariṣyan bhavati

original: bāhyaṃ jāṅmāyanaṃ kṛtvā paricaraṇenājyaṃ paricarya nityān purastāddhomān hutvājyabhāgau ca hutvā //
analyzed: bāhyam kṛtvā paricaraṇena ājyam paricarya nityān purastāddhomān hutvā ājyabhāgau ca hutvā

original: [paścādagneḥ palpūlitavihitamaukṣaṃ vānaḍuhaṃ vā rohitaṃ carma prāggrīvamuttaraloma paristīrya //
analyzed: paścāt agneḥ palpūlita vihita maukṣam vā ānaḍuham vā rohitam carma prāk grīvam uttara loma paristīrya
darbha avapracchinna prāntau prakṣālya anulomam anumārṣṭi
iyam mahī iti carma āstṛṇāti prāk grīvam uttara loma

original: tataḥ paścādagneḥ palpūlitavihitamaukṣaṃ vānaḍuhaṃ vā rohitaṃ carma prastṛṇantaṃ 'iyaṃ mahī' ityṛcā yajamānaṃ vācayati /
analyzed: tatas paścāt agneḥ palpūlita vihita maukṣam vā ānaḍuham vā rohitam carma prastṛṇantam iyam mahī iti ṛcā yajamānam vācayati

original: 'ṛṣipraśiṣṭā' iti pādena patnī udakaghaṭaṃ carmaṇi nidhāpayati //
analyzed: ṛṣi praśiṣṭāḥ iti pādena patnī udaka ghaṭam carmaṇi nidhāpayati
iti avarohya bhūmim tena udaka arthān kurvanti

original: etena dātā patnī apatyāni ca pavitreṇa samprokṣayet //
analyzed: etena dātā patnī apatyāni ca pavitreṇa samprokṣayet

original: dātā muṣṭiprasṛtāñjalidvayaparimite triguṇān vrīhīṃścarmaṇi kṛtvā darbhapavitrābhyāṃ tūṣṇīṃ carmahaviḥ samprokṣati /
analyzed: dātā muṣṭi prasṛta añjali dvaya parimite triguṇān vrīhīn carmaṇi kṛtvā darbha pavitrābhyām tūṣṇīm carma haviḥ samprokṣati

original: tato devapitṛmanuṣyatrayaṃ patnī anajānatyai prayattaiḥ prayacchati /
analyzed: tatas deva pitṛ manuṣya trayam patnī an a jānatyai prayattaiḥ prayacchati

original: teṣāṃ yaḥ pitṝṇāṃ taṃ śrāddhaṃ karoti //
analyzed: teṣām yaḥ pitṝṇām tam śrāddham karoti

original: iti dakṣiṇaṃ jānvācyāparājitābhimukhaḥ prahvo vā muṣṭiprasṛtāñjalibhiḥ kumbhyāṃ nirvapati // KauśS_8,2{61}.8-11 //]
analyzed: iti dakṣiṇam jānu ācya aparājitā abhimukhaḥ prahvaḥ vā muṣṭi prasṛta añjalibhiḥ kumbhyām nirvapati

original: vrīhīn vibhāgeṣu kartā 'tredhā bhāgo nihitaḥ' iti tribhiḥ pādairvibhāgān devapitṛmanuṣyasambandhānanumantrayate /
analyzed: vrīhīn vibhāgeṣu kartā tredhā bhāgaḥ nihitaḥ iti tribhiḥ pādaiḥ vibhāgān deva pitṛ manuṣya sambandhān anumantrayate
yaḥ devānām iti pādena patnīm anumantrayate
yaḥ pitṛ bhāgaḥ tena avabhṛtha ante vṛddhiśrāddham karoti
yaḥ manuṣyāṇām bhāgaḥ tam brāhmaṇān bhojayati
yaḥ devānām iti etena vakṣyamāṇam karma kuryāt

original: [dakṣiṇaṃ jānvācyāparājitābhimukhaḥ prahvo vā muṣṭinā prasṛtināñjalinā yasyāṃ śrapayiṣyan syāt tayā caturtham //
analyzed: dakṣiṇam jānu ācya aparājitā abhimukhaḥ prahvaḥ vā muṣṭinā prasṛtinā añjalinā yasyām śrapayiṣyan syāt tayā caturtham

original: śarāveṇa catuḥśarāvaṃ devasya tvā savituḥ prasava ṛṣibhyastvārṣeyebhyastvaikarṣaye tvā juṣṭaṃ nirvapāmi // KauśS_8,8{67}.26-27 //]
analyzed: śarāveṇa catur śarāvam devasya tvā savituḥ prasave ṛṣibhyaḥ tu ārṣeyebhyaḥ tvā eka ṛṣaye tvā juṣṭam nirvapāmi

original: tato nirvapati 'devasya tvā savituḥ prasave'śvinorbāhubhyāṃ pūṣṇo hastābhyāmṛṣibhyastvārṣeyebhyastvaikaṛṣaye tvā juṣṭaṃ nirvapāmi' //
analyzed: tatas nirvapati devasya tvā savituḥ prasava īśvinoḥ bāhubhyām pūṣṇaḥ hastābhyām ṛṣibhyaḥ tu ārṣeyebhyaḥ tvā eka ṛṣaye tvā juṣṭam nirvapāmi
ūrjam a kṣitam a kṣīyamāṇam upajīvyāsam iti dātāram vācayati

original: viśve tvā devā ānuṣṭubhena chandasā nirvapantu /
analyzed: viśve tvā devāḥ ānuṣṭubhena chandasā nirvapantu
ūrjam a kṣitam a kṣīyamāṇam upajīvyāsam iti dātāram vācayati
iti ṛcā dātāram anumantrya ūrjam akṣitam akṣīyamāṇam upajīvyāsam iti dātāram vācayati
evam caturṇām ekaikam prati nirvāpam anuyojayet

original: niruptānanyasyāṃ kumbhyāṃ kṛtvā tasyāṃ śrapaṇakumbhyāvaśeṣāccaturthaṃ nirvapati /
analyzed: niruptān anyasyām kumbhyām kṛtvā tasyām śrapaṇa kumbhya avaśeṣāt caturtham nirvapati
athavā śrapaṇa kumbhya avaśeṣāt caturtham nirvapati

original: anaḍuhi kṛtvā niruptaṃ haviḥ savasūktenābhimṛśati kartā //
analyzed: anaḍuhi kṛtvā niruptam haviḥ sava sūktena abhimṛśati kartā

original: iti trīn varān vṛṇīṣva iti // KauśS_8,2{61}.15 //]
'trīn varān vṛṇīṣva' iti dātṛpraiṣaṃ dattvā evaṃ patnyai dadāti /
analyzed: trīn varān vṛṇīṣva iti dātṛ praiṣam dattvā evam patnyai dadāti
tau vṛṇantau trayaḥ varāḥ iti ardharcena pratipratyanumantrayate

original: [anena karmaṇā dhruvān iti prathamaṃ vṛṇīte // KauśS_8,2{61}.16 //]
analyzed: anena karmaṇā dhruvān iti prathamam vṛṇīte
dātā sava karmaṇām samṛddhīḥ prathamam vṛṇīte
yau aparau varau manyeta tau vṛṇīte
iti ulūkhala musalam śūrpam prakṣālitam carmaṇi ādhāya
iti ṛcā śūrpam adhas gomayena lepayati

original: tāni 'etau grāvāṇau' iti pādena dātā carmaṇi nidadhāti //
analyzed: tāni etau grāvāṇau iti pādena dātā carmaṇi nidadhāti
gṛhāṇa grāvāṇau iti ardharcena ulūkhala musalam grāhayati
sākam sajātaiḥ iti ardharcena patnī vrīhīn ulūkhale āvapati
ūrdhvaḥ nākasya iti ardharcena musalam ucchrayantīm anumantrayate
nirbhindhi aṃśūn iti pāda dvayena avaghnatīm anumantrayate
iyam te dhītiḥ iti ardharcena śūrpam gṛhṇāti
ūrdhvam prajām iti pādena ulūkhalāt udūhantīm
śriyā samānān iti ardharcam dātāram vācayati
iti ardharcena kumbhīm mṛdā ālimpatīm anumantrayate
iti ṛcā agnau kāṣṭhāni paryādadhantam vācayati
ṛṣi praśiṣṭāḥ iti pādena uda kumbhāt patnīm udakam apakarṣatīm anumantrayate
sannipāte brahmaudana mitam udakam āsecaya udvibhāgam
yāvantaḥ taṇḍulāḥ syuḥ na avasiñcet na pratiṣiñcet
yadi avasiñcet mayi varcaḥ atha u yaśaḥ

original: ā pyāyasva, saṃ te payāṃsi iti dvābhyāṃ pratiṣiñcet //
analyzed: ā pyāyasva sam te payāṃsi iti dvābhyām pratiṣiñcet

original: ā pyāyasva sametu te viśvataḥ soma vṛṣṇyam /
analyzed: ā pyāyasva sametu te viśvatas soma vṛṣṇyam

original: saṃ te payāṃsi samu yantu vājāḥ saṃ vṛṣṇyānyabhimātiṣāhaḥ /
analyzed: sam te payāṃsi samu yantu vājāḥ sam vṛṣṇyāni abhimātiṣāhaḥ

original: āpyāyamāno amṛtāya soma divi śravāṃsyuttamāni dhiṣva iti // KauśS_8,9{68}.4-10 //]
analyzed: āpyāyamānaḥ amṛtāya soma divi śravāṃsi uttamāni dhiṣvaḥ iti

original: 'śuddhāḥ pūtāḥ' iti tribhiḥ pādaiḥ kumbhyāṃ pavitre antardhāyodakamāsiñcantaṃ vācyam /
analyzed: śuddhāḥ pūtāḥ iti tribhiḥ pādaiḥ kumbhyām pavitre antardhāya udakam āsiñcantam vācyam
paktā odanasya iti pādena dātāram anumantrayate
yāvantaḥ taṇḍulāḥ syuḥ na avasiñcet na pratiṣiñcet

original: yadyavasiñcet 'mayi varco atho yaśaḥ' iti brahmā yajamānaṃ vācayet /
analyzed: yadi avasiñcet mayi varcaḥ atha u yaśaḥ iti brahmā yajamānam vācayet

original: atha pratiṣiñcet 'ā pyāyasva' 'saṃ te payāṃsi' iti dvābhyāṃ pratiṣiñcet //
analyzed: atha pratiṣiñcet ā pyāyasva sam te payāṃsi iti dvābhyām pratiṣiñcet
iti āpaḥ tāsu niktvā taṇḍulān āvapati

original: 'brahmaṇā śuddhāḥ' ityṛcā āpastāsu niktvā dātā taṇḍulān kumbhyāṃ nivapati //
analyzed: brahmaṇā śuddhāḥ iti ṛcā āpaḥ tāsu niktvā dātā taṇḍulān kumbhyām nivapati
uruḥ prathasva iti ardharcena śrapayantam yajamānam anumantrayate
pitāmahāḥ pitaraḥ iti ardharcena dātāram vācayati
upari parvaṇām lūtvā tūṣṇīm āhṛtya uttaratas agneḥ upasādayati
tad ādau āstṛtasya upari paścāt agneḥ tūṣṇīm stṛṇāti kartā
udehi vedim iti ṛcā patnyā kumbhīm udvāsyamānām anumantrayate
prajayā vardhaya enām iti mantreṇa patnīm anumantrayate
śriyā samānān iti ardharcena dātāram vācayati
iti ardharcena nave barhiṣi pātrīm nidadhatīm anumantrayate
aṃsadhrīm śuddhām iti ardharcena upadadhāti kumbhīm
kartā aditeḥ hastām iti ṛcā patnyā darvīm grāhayati

original: dātā tūṣṇīṃ sruveṇa sakṛdantarād udapātrādudakamādāya pātryāmānayati /
analyzed: dātā tūṣṇīm sruveṇa sakṛt antarāt uda pātrāt udakam ādāya pātryām ānayati
darvyā uttamam apādāya tad suhṛd dakṣiṇatas agneḥ udak mukhaḥ āsīnaḥ dhārayati

original: suhṛdāyavanena amuṣyodanasya uttamamādāya dakṣiṇato'gnerudaṅmukha āsīno dhārayati /
analyzed: suhṛd āyavanena amuṣya odanasya uttamam ādāya dakṣiṇatas agneḥ udak mukhaḥ āsīnaḥ dhārayati

original: tasmin darvīkṛte śeṣamantarodapātra eva pātryāṃ kṛtsnamodanamuddharati //
analyzed: tasmin darvīkṛte śeṣam antarā uda pātre eva pātryām kṛtsnam odanam uddharati
uddhṛte yat apādāya dhārayati tat uttara ardhe ādadhāti
anuttara adhara tāyāḥ odanasya yat uttaram tat uttaram odanaḥ eva odanaḥ
babhreḥ adhvaryo mukham iti ardharcena dātrā preṣitaḥ

original: 'babhreradhvaryo mukham' ityardharcena dātrā preṣitaḥ odanasyopari gartaṃ karoti //
analyzed: babhreḥ adhvaryo mukham iti ardharcena dātrā preṣitaḥ odanasya upari gartam karoti
babhreḥ brahman iti brūyāt an adhvaryum
iti uttaratas agneḥ dhenu ādīni anumantrayate

original: tām atyāsarat prathamā iti yathoktaṃ dohayitvopasiñcati //
analyzed: tām atyāsarat prathamā iti yathā uktam dohayitvā upasiñcati

original: atyāsarat prathamā dhokṣyamāṇā sarvān yajñān bibhratī vaiśvadevī /
analyzed: atyāsarat prathamā dhokṣyamāṇā sarvān yajñān bibhratī vaiśvadevī

original: upa vatsaṃ sṛjata vāśyate gaurvyasṛṣṭa sumanā hiṅkṛṇoti /
analyzed: upa vatsam sṛjata vāśyate gauḥ vyasṛṣṭa sumanāḥ hiṅkṛṇoti

original: badhāna vatsamabhidhehi bhuñjatī nijya godhugupa sīda dugdhi /
analyzed: badhāna vatsam abhidhehi bhuñjatī nijya go duh upa sīda dugdhi

original: irāmasmā odanaṃ pinvamānā kīlālaṃ ghṛtaṃ madamannabhāgam /
analyzed: irām asmai odanam pinvamānā kīlālam ghṛtam madam anna bhāgam

original: sā dhāvatu yamarājñaḥ savatsā sudughāṃ pathā prathameha dattā /
analyzed: sā dhāvatu yama rājñaḥ sa vatsā sudughām pathā prathamā iha dattā

original: atūrṇadattā prathamedamāgan vatsena gāṃ saṃ sṛja viśvarūpām iti // KauśS_8,3{62}.18-21 //]
analyzed: a tūrṇa dattā prathamā idam āgan vatsena gām sam sṛja viśva rūpām iti
atyāsarat prathamā dhokṣyamāṇā iti ardharcena abhisarantīm gām anumantrayate

original: 'upa vatsaṃ sṛjata' iti pādena vatsaṃ saṃsarjayati /
analyzed: upa vatsam sṛjate iti pādena vatsam saṃsarjayati
vyasṛṣṭa sumanāḥ hiṅkṛṇoti iti hiṅkurvatīm anumantrayate
badhāna vatsam abhi dhehi iti vatsam bandhayati
go duh upa sīdaḥ iti brāhmaṇam dohāya upasādayati
dugdhi ityādi pada sahitena ardharcena dohayati
sā dhāvatu iti ardharcena vimucyamānām gām anumantrayate
a tūrṇa dattā iti ardharcena punar vatsena saṃsarjayati

original: 'idaṃ me jyotiḥ' iti pādaṃ dātāraṃ vācayati /
analyzed: idam me jyotiḥ iti pādam dātāram vācayati

original: [eṣā tvacām (12.3.51) ityamotaṃ vāso'grataḥ sahiraṇyaṃ nidadhāti // KauśS_8,3{62}.23 //]
analyzed: eṣā tvacām iti amā ūtam vāsaḥ ugrataḥ sa hiraṇyam nidadhāti
śrāmyataḥ iti prabhṛtibhiḥ vā dātṛ patnī apatyāni anvārambham karoti

original: [tatra cedupādhimātrāyāṃ nakhena na lavaṇasya kuryāt tenaivāsya tadvṛthānnaṃ sampadyate //
analyzed: tatra ced upādhi mātrāyām nakhena na lavaṇasya kuryāt tena eva asya tat vṛthānnam sampadyate
tatra dve uda pātre nihite bhavataḥ
darvyā uttamam apādāya tad suhṛd dakṣiṇatas agneḥ udak mukhaḥ āsīnaḥ dhārayati

original: uddhṛte yadapādāya dhārayati taduttarārdha ādhāya rasairupasicya pratigrahītre dātopavahati // KauśS_8,9{68}.11-23 //]
analyzed: uddhṛte yat apādāya dhārayati tat uttara ardhe ādhāya rasaiḥ upasicya pratigrahītre dātā upavahati
anvārabdheṣu dātṛ patnī apatyeṣu atas ūrdhvam karoti
tasmin anvārabdham dātāram kartā sūktam vācayati

original: [tantraṃ sūktaṃ pacchaḥ snānena yau te pakṣau yadatiṣṭhaḥ //
analyzed: tantram sūktam pacchas snānena yau te pakṣau yat atiṣṭhaḥ

original: yau te pakṣāvajarau patatriṇau yābhyāṃ rakṣāṃsyapahaṃsyodana /
analyzed: yau te pakṣau ajarau patatriṇau yābhyām rakṣāṃsi apahaṃsya odana

original: tābhyāṃ pathyāsma sukṛtasya lokaṃ yatra ṛṣayaḥ prathamajāḥ purāṇāḥ /
analyzed: tābhyām pathyā āsma sukṛtasya lokam yatra ṛṣayaḥ prathama jāḥ purāṇāḥ
anvāyan satya dharmāṇaḥ brāhmaṇāḥ rādhasā saha
yat akṣeṣu iti samāna vasanau bhavataḥ

original: dvitīyaṃ tatpāpacailaṃ bhavati tanmanuṣyādhamāya dadyādityeke // KauśS_8,4{63}.1-2 //]
analyzed: dvitīyam tat pāpa cailam bhavati tat manuṣya adhamāya dadyāt iti eke

original: tantraṃ sūktaṃ pacchaḥ snānena sarvaṃ vācayati /
analyzed: tantram sūktam pacchas snānena sarvam vācayati
tatas pūrva tantram ucyate yau te pakṣau iti ekā
svar yantaḥ na apekṣante iti ekā
idam me jyotiḥ iti ekā etat sarvam tantram

original: 'satyāya ca' iti tisraḥ 'samagnayaḥ' ityṛcā 'eṣā tvacām' ityardharcaḥ /
analyzed: satyāya ca iti tisraḥ samagnayaḥ iti ṛcā eṣā tvacām iti ardharcaḥ

original: atha pāṇitantramucyate-dātā 'karmaṇe vām' iti pāṇī prakṣālya jīvābhirācamya 'ahe daidhiṣavya' ityādi 'vimṛgvarīm' (12.1.29)
analyzed: atha pāṇitantram ucyate dātā karmaṇe vām iti pāṇī prakṣālya jīvābhiḥ ācamya ahe daidhiṣavya ityādi vimṛgvarīm

original: ityetayā codaṅmukha upaviśya antarādudapātrāt sruveṇa karturhastena juhoti //
analyzed: iti etayā ca udak mukhaḥ upaviśya antarāt uda pātrāt sruveṇa kartuḥ hastena juhoti

original: agne tvaṃ no antama uta trātā śivo bhavā varūthyaḥ /
analyzed: agne tvam naḥ antamaḥ uta trātā śivaḥ bhava varūthyaḥ

original: taṃ tvā śociṣṭha dīdivaḥ sumnāya nūnamīmahe sakhibhyaḥ //
analyzed: tam tvā śociṣṭha dīdivas sumnāya nūnam īmahe sakhibhyaḥ
gaya sphānaḥ amīva hā vasu vid puṣṭi vardhanaḥ
su mitraḥ sumanaḥ bhava iti ājyabhāgau

original: 'ye bhakṣayantaḥ' iti sūktena purastāddhomān hutvā 'agne tvaṃ no antamaḥ' 'gayasphāno amīvahā' iti dve ājyabhāgau ca //
analyzed: ye bhakṣayantaḥ iti sūktena purastāddhomān hutvā agne tvam naḥ antamaḥ gaya sphānaḥ amīva hā iti dve ājyabhāgau ca

original: athāmuṣyaudanasyāvadānānāṃ ca madhyāt pūrvārdhācca dviravadāyopariṣṭādudakenābhighārya juhoti somena pūto jaṭhare sīda brahmaṇām (11.1.25)
analyzed: atha amuṣya odanasya avadānānām ca madhyāt pūrva ardhāt ca dvis avadāya upariṣṭāt udakena abhighārya juhoti somena pūtaḥ jaṭhare sīda brahmaṇām

original: ārṣeyeṣu ni dadha odana tvā (11.1.33-35) iti // KauśS_8,6{65}.11-12 //]
analyzed: ārṣeyeṣu ni dadhe odana tvā iti
sva pāṇau udakam ānīya atha amuṣya odanasya avadānānām ca madhyāt pūrva ardhāt ca dvis avadāya upariṣṭāt udakena abhighārya juhoti
hasta madhye somena pūtaḥ iti ardharcena

original: 'ārṣeyeṣu ni dadha odana tvā' iti tribhirṛgbhirekāmāhutiṃ hastamadhye juhoti //
analyzed: ārṣeyeṣu ni dadhe odana tvā iti tribhiḥ ṛgbhiḥ ekām āhutim hasta madhye juhoti
agneḥ tvā āsyena prāśnāmi bṛhaspateḥ mukhena

original: indrasya tvā jaṭhare sādayāmi varuṇasyodare / tadyathā
analyzed: indrasya tvā jaṭhare sādayāmi varuṇasya udare tat yathā

original: hutamiṣṭaṃ prāśnīyād devātmā tvā prāśnāmyātmāsyātmannātmānaṃ me mā hiṃsīḥ iti prāśitamanumantrayate //
analyzed: hutam iṣṭam prāśnīyāt deva ātmā tvā prāśnāmi ātmā asi ātman ātmānam me mā hiṃsīḥ iti prāśitam anumantrayate
yā ugniḥ nṛmaṇāḥ nāma brāhmaṇeṣu praviṣṭaḥ

original: tasmin ma eṣa suhuto'stvodanaḥ sa mā mā hiṃsīt parame vyoman //
analyzed: tasmin me eṣa su hutoḥ tu odanaḥ sa mā mā hiṃsīt parame vyoman

original: so asmabhyamastu parame vyoman iti dātāraṃ vācayati //
analyzed: saḥ asmabhyam astu parame vyoman iti dātāram vācayati
tatas kartā agneḥ tvā āsyena iti dvābhyām prāśnāti
yaḥ ugniḥ nṛmaṇāḥ iti prāśitam anumantrayate

original: 'so asmabhyamastu parame vyoman' iti pādaṃ dātāraṃ vācayati //
analyzed: saḥ asmabhyam astu parame vyoman iti pādam dātāram vācayati
vāc me āsan iti mantra uktāni abhimantrayate
vāc me āsan iti mantra uktāni abhimṛśate indriyāṇi
dyauḥ ca me iti tṛcam sūktam
punar mā etu indriyam iti ṛcā etābhiḥ pratimantraṇam kuryāt

original: iti catura ārṣeyān bhṛgvaṅgirovida upasādayati // KauśS_8,4{63}.3 //]
analyzed: iti caturaḥ ārṣeyān bhṛgu aṅgiraḥ vidaḥ upasādayati

original: ityṛcā catura ārṣeyān bhṛgvaṅgirovida āhūya 'śṛtaṃ tvā havyam' ityardharcena tāneva āsanenopaveśayati //
analyzed: iti ṛcā caturaḥ ārṣeyān bhṛgu aṅgiraḥ vidaḥ āhūya śṛtam tvā havyam iti ardharcena tān eva āsanena upaveśayati

original: 'śuddhāḥ pūtā yoṣito yajñiyā imā brahmaṇā hasteṣu' ityṛcā teṣāṃ hastaprakṣālanaṃ dattvā 'pakvaṃ kṣetrāt' pādatrayeṇa odanapātraṃ brāhmaṇasamīpe  #
analyzed: śuddhāḥ pūtāḥ yoṣitaḥ yajñiyāḥ imāḥ brahmaṇā hasteṣu iti ṛcā teṣām hasta prakṣālanam dattvā pakvam kṣetrāt pāda trayeṇa odana pātram brāhmaṇa samīpe

original: te tasyāṃ pātryāṃ svayamevaudanaṃ gṛhītvā prāśnanti /
analyzed: te tasyām pātryām svayam eva odanam gṛhītvā prāśnanti
dātā puṇya aham dīrgham āyuḥ astu iti evamādi vācanam
sampātavataḥ abhimantrya abhinigadya dadyāt dātā vācyamānaḥ

original: ata ūrdhvaṃ vācite hute saṃsthite amūṃ te dadāmi iti nāmagrāhamupaspṛśet //
analyzed: atas ūrdhvam vācite hute saṃsthite amūm te dadāmi iti nāma grāham upaspṛśet

original: 'sahiraṇyāṃ dhenuṃ dakṣiṇāṃ brahmaudanaṃ tubhyamahaṃ sampradade' iti sarveṣu saveṣu savanāmagrahaṇaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇāṃ dadāti /
analyzed: sa hiraṇyām dhenum dakṣiṇām brahmaudanam tubhyam aham sampradade iti sarveṣu saveṣu sava nāma grahaṇam kṛtvā dakṣiṇām dadāti

original: dātā karturhaste 'etaṃ bhāgam' 'etaṃ sadhasthāḥ' iti dvābhyāṃ sūktābhyāṃ,
analyzed: dātā kartuḥ haste etam bhāgam etam sadhasthāḥ iti dvābhyām sūktābhyām
ulūkhale musale iti ṛcā etābhiḥ saṃsthita homān juhoti
kartā ulūkhale iti ṛcā vrīhīn juhoti

original: 'agnau tuṣān' iti pādena dātā tuṣānagnau ca juhoti //
analyzed: agnau tuṣān iti pādena dātā tuṣān agnau ca juhoti

original: 'paraḥ kambūkān' iti tribhiḥ pādairdātā savyena pādena phalīkaraṇānudūhati tūṣṇīm //
analyzed: paras kambūkān iti tribhiḥ pādaiḥ dātā savyena pādena phalīkaraṇān udūhati tūṣṇīm

original: dātā 'agne prehi' ityṛcā 'samācinuṣva' ityṛcā dve etābhirājyaṃ juhuyāt //
analyzed: dātā agne prehi iti ṛcā samācinuṣva iti ṛcā dve etābhiḥ ājyam juhuyāt
idāvatsarāya iti vrata visarjanam ājyam juhuyāt
savān dattvā sava agneḥ tu katham utsarjanam bhavet
hutvā sannatibhiḥ tatra utsargam kauśikaḥ bravīt
prāñcā uparājitām vā diśam avabhṛthāya vrajanti
apām sūktaiḥ āplutya pradakṣiṇam āvṛtya apaḥ upaspṛśya an avekṣamāṇāḥ pratyudāvrajanti
yathā uktā dakṣiṇā yathā uktā dakṣiṇā

original: atha dātā vrataṃ nivedya sāvitravrataṃ trirātraṃ yathāśāstravihitamityādi vrataśrāvaṇam /
analyzed: atha dātā vratam nivedya sāvitra vratam tri rātram yathā śāstra vihitam ityādi vrata śrāvaṇam
idāvatsarāya iti vrata visarjanam ājyam juhuyāt
prāñcā uparājitām vā diśam avabhṛthāya vrajanti

original: ityapāṃ sūktairāplutya snātvā pradakṣiṇamāvṛtyācamanaṃ kṛtvā'napekṣamāṇāḥ pratyudāvrajanti /
analyzed: iti apām sūktaiḥ āplutya snātvā pradakṣiṇam āvṛtya ācamanam kṛtvā an apekṣamāṇāḥ pratyudāvrajanti

original: liṅgaṃ parihitasyānantaraṃ karma karmānupūrveṇa liṅgaṃ parīkṣeta //
analyzed: liṅgam parihitasya anantaram karma karma ānupūrveṇa liṅgam parīkṣeta

original: śrāmyataḥ (11.1.30) itiprabhṛtirvā sūktenābhimantryābhinigadya dadyād dātā vācyamānaḥ //
analyzed: śrāmyataḥ iti prabhṛtiḥ vā sūktena abhimantrya abhinigadya dadyāt dātā vācyamānaḥ
iti prabhṛtibhiḥ vā anuvākena abhimantrya abhinigadya dadyāt dātā vācyamānaḥ
yathāsavam anyān pṛthak vā iti prakṛtiḥ
sarve yathotpatti ācāryāṇām pañca odana varjam
iti brahmaudana prakṛti sarva sava vidhānam samāptam

original: yaḥ ekaṃ savayajñaṃ karoti tasyaikakratuphalaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: yaḥ ekam sava yajñam karoti tasya eka kratu phalam bhavati

original: yo bahūni savayajñāni karoti tasya bahukratuphalaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: yaḥ bahūni sava yajñāni karoti tasya bahu kratu phalam bhavati
āvasathya ādhāne sava yajñān kṛtvā tatas agnyādhānam kuryāt
athavā phala kāmaḥ api sava yajñam kuryāt
trividhāḥ sava yajñāḥ nitya naimittika kāmyāḥ bhavanti

original: sarveṣāṃ savānāṃ brahmaudanatantraṃ svargaudanatantraṃ vā bhavati /
analyzed: sarveṣām savānām brahmaudana tantram svargaudana tantram vā bhavati
sava tantre ājyabhāga ante paśu ālambhaḥ
yat rājānaḥ iti ṣaḍbhiḥ a vimīkṣate
pada snātasya pṛthak pādeṣu apūpān nidadhāti
pañcamam apūpam nābhyām vasanena bandhanam karoti

original: tataḥ 'yad rājānaḥ' iti sūktena sahiraṇyamaviṃ sampātavantaṃ karoti //
analyzed: tatas yat rājānaḥ iti sūktena sa hiraṇya mavim sampātavantam karoti
ā naya etam iti aparājitāt ajam ānīyamānam anumantrayate
ā naya etam iti ṛcā a vimānīyamānam anumantrayate
indrāya bhāgam iti ardharcena agnim pariṇīyamānam anumantrayate
ye naḥ dviṣanti iti ardharcena sañjñapyamānam anumantrayate
tatas pra padaḥ iti ṛcā pāda prakṣālanam karoti
anu chya śyāmena iti ardharcena viśasantam anumantrayate
ṛcā kumbhīm iti pādena kumbhīm adhiśrayaṇam karoti
ā siñca udakam iti anena kumbhyām udakam siñcati
ava dhehi enam iti anena māṃsāni avadadhatam
śṛtaḥ gacchatu iti pādena udvāsanam karoti
utkrāma atas iti ṛcā paścāt agneḥ darbheṣu uddharantam karoti
tad upari ajam anajmi iti ṛcā ājyena anakti

original: iti carmāstṛṇātītyādi odanasavavihitaṃ bhāgādi karma karoti /
analyzed: iti carma āstṛṇāti ityādi odanasava vihitam bhāga ādi karma karoti
yathā eka vāram sahaodana māṃsānām udvāsanam bhavati tathā kāryam
śṛtam ajam iti anubaddha śiraḥ pādam tu etasya carma

original: ajo hi (4.14) iti sūktena sampātavantaṃ yathoktam //
analyzed: ajaḥ hi iti sūktena sampātavantam yathoktam
uttara ūma ūtam tasya agratas sa hiraṇyam nidadhāti
dhenu ādīni uttaratas sa upadhānam āstaraṇam vāsaḥ hiraṇyam ca
ā naya etam iti sūktena sampātavantam
āñjana antam śataudanāyāḥ pañca odanena vyākhyātam
ā naya etam iti artha sūktena pañca odanam savam
aghāyatām iti atra mukham apinahyamānam anumantrayate
viṃśati odanāsu śrayaṇīṣu śatam avadānāni vadhrī sannaddhāni pṛthak odaneṣu upari ādadhati

original: madhyamāyāḥ prathame randhriṇyāmikṣāṃ daśame'bhitaḥ saptasaptāpūpān pariśrayati //
analyzed: madhyamāyāḥ prathame randhriṇī āmikṣām daśamebhitas sapta sapta apūpān pariśrayati
apaḥ devīḥ iti agratas uda kumbhān
pradakṣiṇam agnim anupariṇīya upaveśana prakṣālana ācamana an uktam
aghāyatām iti artha sūktena śata odanam savam
brahma asya iti odane hradān pratidiśam karoti

original: pṛthivyāṃ surayādbhirāṇḍīkādivanti mantroktāni pratidiśaṃ nidhāya // KauśS_8,7{66}.6-10 //]
analyzed: pṛthivyām surayā adbhiḥ āṇḍīka ādivanti mantra uktāni pratidiśam nidhāya
brahma asya śīrṣam iti sūktena brahmā asya odanam savam
yama odanam iti sūktena atimṛtyum savam
anaḍvān dādhāra iti sūktena anaḍvāham savam
sūryasya raśmīn iti tisṛbhiḥ ṛgbhiḥ karkīm savam

original: 'āyaṃ gauḥ pṛśniḥ' iti tisṛbhirṛgbhiḥ pṛśniṃ savam /
analyzed: ā ayam gauḥ pṛśniḥ iti tisṛbhiḥ ṛgbhiḥ pṛśnim savam

original: 'ayaṃ sahasram' iti dvābhyāṃ pṛśniṃ gāṃ savam //
analyzed: ayam sahasram iti dvābhyām pṛśnim gām savam

original: iti paunaḥśilaṃ madhumanthaṃ sahiraṇyaṃ sampātavantam // KauśS_8,7{66}.15 //]
analyzed: iti paunaḥśilam madhumantham sa hiraṇyam sampātavantam
devāḥ imam iti ṛcā paunaḥśilam savam
punantu mā iti sūktena pavitram savam
kaḥ pṛśnim iti ṛcā urvarām savam
sāhasraḥ tvā eṣaḥ iti artha sūktena ṛṣabham savam
prajāpatiḥ ca iti sūktena anaḍvāham savam

original: iti vaśāmudapātreṇa sampātavatā samprokṣyābhimantryābhinigadya dadyād dātā vācyamānaḥ //
analyzed: iti vaśām uda pātreṇa sampātavatā samprokṣya abhimantrya abhinigadya dadyāt dātā vācyamānaḥ
namaḥ te jāyamānāyai iti artha sūktena vaśām savam

original: [upamitām (9.3) iti yacchālayā saha dāsyan bhavati tadantarbhavatyapihitam //
analyzed: upamitām iti yat śālayā saha dāsyan bhavati tat antarbhavati apihitam
iti uda pātram agnim ādāya prapadyante
tat antar eva sūktena sampātavat karoti

original: udapātreṇa sampātavatā śālāṃ samprokṣyābhimantryābhinigadya dadyād dātā vācyamānaḥ //
analyzed: uda pātreṇa sampātavatā śālām samprokṣya abhimantrya abhinigadya dadyāt dātā vācyamānaḥ
iti adbhiḥ pūrṇe garte pravidhya saṃvapati
upamitām iti artha sūktena śālām savam
adhyātma vimukhaḥ homāt eva atharva aṅgirasa pārage
atha kravyācchamanena saha āvasathya ādhānam vyākhyāsyāmaḥ
pitryam agnim śamayiṣyan jyeṣṭhasya ca a vibhaktinaḥ eka agnim ādhāsyan

original: araṇilakṣaṇe araṇiḥ uktā tatra manthane yo vidhiśca /
analyzed: araṇi lakṣaṇe araṇiḥ uktā tatra manthane yaḥ vidhiḥ ca

original: [amāvāsyāyāṃ pūrvasminnupaśāle gāṃ dvihāyanīṃ rohiṇīmekarūpāṃ bandhayati // KauśS_9,1{69}.2 //]
analyzed: amāvāsyāyām pūrvasmin upaśāle gām dvi hāyanīm rohiṇīm eka rūpām bandhayati
amāvāsyāyām pūrvasmin upaśāle gām dvi varṣām bandhayati
adhrigo śamīdhvam iti kartā mantram bravīti uṣasi

original: ityanuvākaṃ mahāśāntiṃ ca śāntyudaka āvapate // KauśS_9,1{69}.7 //]
analyzed: iti anuvākam mahāśāntim ca śāntyudake āvapate

original: 'ayamagniḥ satpatiḥ' ityṛcā 'naḍamā roha' ityanuvākaḥ vāstoṣpatyo mātṛnāmā cātanaḥ śāntigaṇaśca /
analyzed: ayam agniḥ sat patiḥ iti ṛcā naḍamā roha iti anuvākaḥ vāstoṣpatyaḥ mātṛ nāmā cātanaḥ śānti gaṇaḥ ca

original: tataḥ paścād yanmātalīṃ kṛtvā śāntyudakaṃ samāpayet /
analyzed: tatas paścāt yat mātalīm kṛtvā śāntyudakam samāpayet

original: tataḥ kartā ācāmayati samprokṣati ca / patnīṃ ca //
analyzed: tatas kartā ācāmayati samprokṣati ca patnīm ca

original: 'agne akravyād' ityṛcā ekāvasānā bhrāṣṭrāt ambarīṣānmahānasād vāgnimānīyāvasathyāśālāyā madhye /
analyzed: agne a kravya ad iti ṛcā eka avasānā bhrāṣṭrāt ambarīṣāt mahānasāt vā agnim ānīya āvasathyā śālāyāḥ madhye
yavāḥ yatra sthāpitam tat sthānam bhrāṣṭram iti ucyate
tasmāt agnim visṛjya bhūmeḥ dīpam dhārayati
tasyām vrīhī yava avopya ityādi sarvam bhavati
tatas paścāt lakṣaṇasya abhimanthanam nidhāya manthana sthāne

original: [go'śvājāvīnāṃ puṃsāṃ lomabhirāstīrya vrīhiyavaiśca śakṛtpiṇḍamabhivimṛjya prāñcau darbhau nidadhāti // KauśS_9,1{69}.16 //]
analyzed: go śva aja avīnām puṃsām lomabhiḥ āstīrya vrīhi yavaiḥ ca śakṛt piṇḍam abhivimṛjya prāñcau darbhau nidadhāti

original: vṛṣabharomāṇyaśvaromāṇyajaromāṇi meṣaromāṇi puruṣaromāṇi agnipatanasthāna āstīrya vrīhiyavaiśca śuṣkagomayāni ca /
analyzed: vṛṣabha romāṇi aśva romāṇi aja romāṇi meṣa romāṇi puruṣa romāṇi agnipatana sthāne āstīrya vrīhi yavaiḥ ca śuṣka gomayāni ca
āyuḥ asi iti mūlataḥ uttarāraṇim upasandhāya

original: 'vṛṣaṇau sthaḥ' ityanena mantreṇa tatropari araṇī dattvā tasyopari ucchvāsaṃ dadāti /
analyzed: vṛṣaṇau sthaḥ iti anena mantreṇa tatra upari araṇī dattvā tasya upari ucchvāsam dadāti
āyuḥ asi iti anena mantreṇa uttarāraṇi mūlam adharāraṇinā saha saṃyojyam
pṛtanā jitam iti ṛcā agnim āhvayati

original: [abhidakṣiṇaṃ jyeṣṭhastrirabhimanthati oṃ bhūrgāyatraṃ chando'nuprajāyasva traiṣṭubhaṃ jāgatamānuṣṭubhamo bhūrbhuvaḥ svarjanadom iti // KauśS_9,1{69}.23
analyzed: abhidakṣiṇam jyeṣṭhaḥ tris abhimanthati om bhūḥ gāyatram chandaḥ nuprajāyasva traiṣṭubham jāgatam ānuṣṭubham o bhūḥ bhuvaḥ svar janadā ūm iti
om bhūḥ gāyatram chandaḥ nu prajāyasva ityādi adhikṛtaḥ mantraḥ
manthāmi tvā jātavedaḥ su jātam jātavedasam

original: sa no jīveṣvā bhaja dīrghamāyuśca dhehi naḥ //
analyzed: sa naḥ jīva iṣvā bhaja dīrgham āyuḥ ca dhehi naḥ

original: jāto'janiṣṭhā yaśasā sahāgne prajāṃ paśūṃstejo rayimasmāsu dhehi /
analyzed: jātaḥ janiṣṭhāḥ yaśasā saha agne prajām paśūn tejaḥ rayim asmāsu dhehi
ānandinaḥ modamānāḥ su vīrāḥ anāmayāḥ sarvam āyuḥ gamema

original: uddīpyasva jātavedo'va sediṃ tuṣṇāṃ kṣudhaṃ jahi /
analyzed: uddīpyasva jātavedaḥ iva sedim tuṣṇām kṣudham jahi

original: apāsmattama uchatvapa hrītamukho jahyapa durhārddiśo jahi //
analyzed: apa asmattamaḥ uchatu apa hrīta mukhaḥ jahi apa durhārd diśaḥ jahi
iha eva edhi dhana saniḥ iha tvā samidhīmahi

original: ihaidhi puṣṭivardhana iha tvā samidhīmahi iti // KauśS_9,2{70}.1 //
analyzed: iha edhi puṣṭi vardhanaḥ iha tvā samidhīmahi iti

original: iti ca oṃ bhūrbhuvaḥ svarjanadom iti aṅgirasāṃ tvā devānāmādityānāṃ vratenā dadhe /
analyzed: iti ca om bhūḥ bhuvaḥ svar jana da ūm iti aṅgirasām tvā devānām ādityānām vratena ā dadhe

original: dyaurmahūnāsi bhūmirbhūmnā tasyāste devyaditirupasthe'nnādāyānnapatyāyā dadhat iti // KauśS_9,2{70}.6 //]
analyzed: dyauḥ mahūnā asi bhūmiḥ bhūmnā tasyāḥ te devī aditiḥ upasthā innā ādāya annapatyāyai dadhat iti
manthāmi tvā jātavedaḥ iti ṛcā manthati

original: 'ihaivaidhi dhanasaniḥ' ityṛcā 'yattvā kruddhāḥ' ityṛcā ca dvābhyāmagnau kāṣṭhānyādadhāti //
analyzed: iha eva edhi dhana saniḥ iti ṛcā yat tvā kruddhāḥ iti ṛcā ca dvābhyām agnau kāṣṭhāni ādadhāti

original: agne gṛhapate sugṛhapatirahaṃ tvayāgne gṛhapatinā bhūyāsam /
analyzed: agne gṛhapate su gṛhapatiḥ aham tvayā agne gṛhapatinā bhūyāsam
su gṛhapatiḥ tvam mayā agne gṛhapatinā bhūyāḥ

original: asthūri ṇau gārhapatyāni dīdihi śataṃ samāḥ iti // KauśS_9,2{70}.9 //]
analyzed: asthūri nau gārhapatyāni dīdihi śatam samāḥ iti

original: 'OM bhūrbhuvaḥ svaḥ' ityādimantreṇa lakṣaṇe pratiṣṭhāpya tata upatiṣṭhate /
analyzed: om bhūḥ bhuvaḥ svar ityādi mantreṇa lakṣaṇe pratiṣṭhāpya tatas upatiṣṭhate
iti dvābhyām agne gṛhapate iti ṛcā vaitānāgnim upatiṣṭhate

original: tataḥ kravyādaṃ manthanāt pṛthakkṛtya 'vyākaromi' ityṛcā gārhapatyakravyādau ca samīkṣate //
analyzed: tatas kravyādam manthanāt pṛthakkṛtya vyākaromi iti ṛcā gārhapatya kravyādau ca samīkṣate

original: tata ājyasaṃskāraṃ kṛtvā srucaṃ ca sammṛjya pratapya sravaṃ sruci grahaṇaṃ kṛtvā ūrdhvasthitaḥ samiduttarāṃ 'upa tvā namasā' ityṛcānte oṃkāraṃ  #
analyzed: tatas ājya saṃskāram kṛtvā srucam ca sammṛjya pratapya sravam sruci grahaṇam kṛtvā ūrdhva sthitaḥ samidh uttarām upa tvā namasā iti ṛca ante oṃkāram

original: viśvāhā te (3.15.8) iti pūrṇāhutiṃ juhoti // KauśS_9,2{70}.14 //

analyzed: asmin kāle puṇyāha vācanam sāyaṃhoma dānam
brāhmaṇa bhojanam utsargaḥ śata ādi yathāśakti vā

original: [yo no agniḥ (12.2.33) iti saha kartrā hṛdayānyabhimṛśante // KauśS_9,2{70}.15 //]
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ agniḥ iti saha kartrā hṛdayāni abhimṛśante

original: 'yo no agniḥ' ityṛcā saha kartrā sarve hṛdayānyabhimṛśanti //
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ agniḥ iti ṛcā saha kartrā sarve hṛdayāni abhimṛśanti

analyzed: apāvṛtya iti ṣaḍbhiḥ ṛgbhiḥ kravyādam gṛhītvā eka agnim pradakṣiṇam kṛtvā dakṣiṇasyām diśi niṣkramya tatas gṛha dvāre bhūmau nidadhāti kravyādam

original: etābhiḥ purāṇī iṣīkā śaravīriṇatilpiñjikānalāścaitāni kāṣṭhānyādadhāti sakṛdvāmena hastena //

huta adaḥ anye a huta adaḥ anye

original: te samyañca iha mādayantāmiṣamūrjaṃ yajamānā yamichata.
analyzed: te samyañcaḥ iha mādayanta āmiṣam ūrjam yajamānāḥ yam ichata
viśve devāḥ idam haviḥ ādityāsaḥ saparyata

original: asmin yajñe mā vyathiṣyamṛtāya haviṣkṛtam // KauśS_9,5{73}.15 //
analyzed: asmin yajñe mā vyathiṣi amṛtāya haviṣkṛtam
sāyamāśa prātarāśau yajñau etau smṛtau ubhau

original: apratibhuktau śucikāryau ca nityaṃ vaiśvadevau jānatā yajñaśreṣṭhau.
analyzed: a pratibhuktau śuci kāryau ca nityam vaiśvadevau jānatā yajña śreṣṭhau
na a śrotriyaḥ na an avanikta pāṇiḥ na a mantra vid juhuyāt na a vipaścit

original: bībhatsavaḥ śucikāmā hi devā nāśraddadhānasya havirjuṣante.
analyzed: bībhatsavaḥ śuci kāmāḥ hi devāḥ na a śraddadhānasya haviḥ juṣante

original: brāhmaṇena brahmavidā tu hāvayenna strīhutaṃ śūdrahutaṃ ca devagam // KauśS_9,5{73}.18 //
analyzed: brāhmaṇena brahma vidā tu hāvayet na strī hutam śūdra hutam ca deva gam
yaḥ tu vidyāt ājyabhāgau yajñān mantra parikramān

original: devatājñānamāvṛta āśiṣaśca karma striyā apratiṣiddhamāhuḥ // KauśS_9,5{73}.19 //]
analyzed: devatā jñānam āvṛtaḥ āśiṣaḥ ca karma striyāḥ a pratiṣiddham āhuḥ
atha madhyāhne sāyam ca vaiśvadeva vidhānam ucyate

original: 'avyasaśca' (19.69.1) iti japitvā prokṣaṇaṃ dviḥ kṛtvā siddhasya pākasyotpavanaṃ 'ṛtaṃ tvā satyena' iti paryukṣaṇam /
analyzed: avyasaḥ ca iti japitvā prokṣaṇam dvis kṛtvā siddhasya pākasya utpavanam ṛtam tvā satyena iti paryukṣaṇam

original: 'hutādo'nye' 'viśve devā idaṃ haviḥ' iti dvābhyāṃ havirjuhoti /
analyzed: viśve devāḥ idam haviḥ iti dvābhyām haviḥ juhoti

original: agnaya indrāgnibhyāṃ vāstoṣpataye prajāpataye'numataye iti hutvā // KauśS_9,6{74}.2 //]
analyzed: agnaye indra agnibhyām vāstoṣpataye prajāpataye numataye iti hutvā

original: [niṣkramya bahiḥ prācīnaṃ brahmaṇe vaiśravaṇāya viśvebhyo devebhyaḥ sarvebhyo devebhyo viśvebhyo bhūtebhyaḥ sarvebhyo bhūtebhyaḥ iti bahuśo  #
analyzed: niṣkramya bahis prācīnam brahmaṇe vaiśravaṇāya viśvebhyaḥ devebhyaḥ sarvebhyaḥ devebhyaḥ viśvebhyaḥ bhūtebhyaḥ sarvebhyaḥ bhūtebhyaḥ iti bahuśas

original: niḥṣkramya bahiḥ prācīnamudakena maṇḍalaṃ prokṣya tato baliharaṇaṃ karoti /
analyzed: niḥṣkramya bahis prācīnam udakena maṇḍalam prokṣya tatas bali haraṇam karoti
dvis prokṣan pradakṣiṇam āvṛtya antar upātītya dvāre

original: dviḥ prokṣan pradakṣiṇamāvṛtyāntarupātītya tata agnigṛhe praviśya madhye dadāti //
analyzed: dvis prokṣan pradakṣiṇam āvṛtya antar upātītya agni gṛhe praviśya madhye dadāti
uda dhāne dhanvantaraye samudrāya oṣadhi vanaspatibhyaḥ dyāvāpṛthivībhyām iti
caturṣu koṇeṣu agre bali catuṣṭayam dadāti

original: [sraktiṣu vāsukaye citrasenāya citrarathāya takṣopatakṣābhyām iti // KauśS_9,6{74}.8 //]
analyzed: sraktiṣu vāsukaye citrasenāya citrarathāya takṣa upatakṣābhyām iti
pūrva ādi catur dikṣu bali catuṣṭayam dadāti

original: [samantamagneḥ āśāyai śraddhāyai meghāyai śriyai hriyai vidyāyai iti // KauśS_9,6{74}.9 //]
analyzed: samantam agneḥ āśāyai śraddhāyai meghāyai śriyai hriyai vidyāyai iti
prācīnam agneḥ gṛhyābhyaḥ deva jāmibhyaḥ iti

original: agneḥ prācīnaṃ 'gṛhyābhyo devajāmibhyo baliṃ harāmi vaṣaṭ' /
analyzed: agneḥ prācīnam gṛhyābhyaḥ deva jāmibhyaḥ balim harāmi vaṣaṭ

original: apasavyaṃ 'svadhā prapitāmahebhyaḥ svadhā pitāmahebhyaḥ svadhā pitṛbhyaḥ sapatnīkebhyaḥ svadhā' ityanena mantreṇa pātrasthaṃ sarvaṃ bhaktaṃ  #
analyzed: apasavyam svadhā prapitāmahebhyaḥ svadhā pitāmahebhyaḥ svadhā pitṛbhyaḥ sa patnīkebhyaḥ svadhā iti anena mantreṇa pātra stham sarvam bhaktam

original: tato hantakāraṃ manuṣyebhyo gavādikebhyaśca vāyasebhyo'nnaṃ dadyāt /
analyzed: tatas hantakāram manuṣyebhyaḥ gavādikebhyaḥ ca vāyasebhyaḥ unnam dadyāt
mā a brāhmaṇa agratas kṛtam aśnīyāt viṣavat annam anna kāmyā

original: devānāṃ devo brāhmaṇo bhāvo nāmaiṣa devateti // KauśS_9,6{74}.12 //]
analyzed: devānām devaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ bhāvaḥ nāma eṣa devatā iti
tatra ślokaḥ mā brāhmaṇa agratas kṛtam aśnīyāt viṣavat annam anna kāmyā

original: devānāṃ devo brāhmaṇo bhāvo nāmaiṣa devateti //
analyzed: devānām devaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ bhāvaḥ nāma eṣa devatā iti

original: kevalādhāna araṇipradānādi māṣāśitavarjyaṃ pūrṇāhutyantaṃ kṛtvā tatraitat ṣaṭsampātaṃ bhaktamaśanaṃ śāntirbhavati /
analyzed: kevala ādhāna araṇi pradāna ādi māṣa aśita varjyam pūrṇāhuti antam kṛtvā tatra etat ṣaṣ sampātam bhaktam aśanam śāntiḥ bhavati
yasya punarādhānam tasya kevala ādhāna adhikāraḥ
na kevalam punarādhāne api kravyācchamana vikalpena
tatas pūrṇāhuti antam kṛtvā ṣaṣ sampātānām bhavati
āgrayaṇe śāntyudakam kṛtvā yathartu taṇḍulān upasādya

original: indrāgnibhyāṃ dyāvāpṛthivībhyāṃ viśvebhyo devebhyo vrīhibhirvā eteṣāṃ nirvāpakāryaṃ ca /
analyzed: indra agnibhyām dyāvāpṛthivībhyām viśvebhyaḥ devebhyaḥ vrīhibhiḥ vai eteṣām nirvāpa kāryam ca
somāya iti pañcamam carum śyāmākena kurvan

original: tataḥ abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā śāntyudakaṃ karoti uktena vidhānena /
analyzed: tatas abhyātāna antam kṛtvā śāntyudakam karoti uktena vidhānena
āgrayaṇe śārade vrīhīn śyāmākāḥ ca a śaradi vā
śāli śyāmāka abhāve tad sthāne yavān upasādya
sajūs ṛtubhiḥ sajūs vidhābhiḥ sajūs agnaye svāhā

original: sajūrindrāgnibhyāṃ sajūrdyāvāpṛthivībhyāṃ sajūrviśvebhyo devebhyaḥ sajūrṛtubhiḥ sajūrvidhābhiḥ sajūḥ somāya svāhā ityekahavirvā syānnānāhavīṃṣi  #
analyzed: sajūs indra agnibhyām sajūs dyāvāpṛthivībhyām sajūs viśvebhyaḥ devebhyaḥ sajūs ṛtubhiḥ sajūs vidhābhiḥ sajūs somāya svāhā iti eka haviḥ vā syāt nānā havīṃṣi  /

original: pañcamaṃ caruṃ saumyaṃ śyāmākaṃ pañcamayā ṛcā juhoti /
analyzed: pañcamam carum saumyam śyāmākam pañcamayā ṛcā juhoti

original: pārvaṇādisviṣṭakṛdantaṃ kṛtvā tataḥ caruprāśanaṃ karoti yajamānaḥ /
analyzed: pārvaṇa ādi sviṣṭakṛt antam kṛtvā tatas caruprāśanam karoti yajamānaḥ

original: sarveṣāṃ pratihaviṣāṃ samuddhṛtya prāśitraharaṇe kṛtvā yajamānāya prayacchati //
analyzed: sarveṣām pratihaviṣām samuddhṛtya prāśitraharaṇe kṛtvā yajamānāya prayacchati

original: mahyaṃ bhūtyai mahyaṃ puṣṭhyai mahyaṃ śriye mahyaṃ hriyai mahyaṃ yaśase mahyamāyuṣe
analyzed: mahyam bhūtyai mahyam puṣṭhyai mahyam śriye mahyam hriyai mahyam yaśase mahyam āyuṣe

original: mahyamannāya mahyamannādyāya mahyaṃ sahasrapoṣāya mahyamaparimitapauṣāya iti // KauśS_9,6{74}.18 //]
analyzed: mahyam annāya mahyam annādyāya mahyam sahasra poṣāya mahyam aparimita pauṣāya iti

original: atha yajamānaḥ prāśitraṃ gṛhṇīte 'prajāpateṣṭvā grahaṃ gṛhṇāmi' iti mantreṇa //
analyzed: atha yajamānaḥ prāśitram gṛhṇīte prajāpateḥ tvā graham gṛhṇāmi iti mantreṇa

original: [atha prāśnāti bhadrānnaḥ śreyaḥ samanaiṣṭa devāstvayāvasena samaśīmahi tvā /
analyzed: atha prāśnāti bhadra annaḥ śreyaḥ samanaiṣṭa devāḥ tvayā avasena samaśīmahi tvā

original: m ā viveśa śivastokāya tanvo na ehi iti // KauśS_9,6{74}.19 //]
analyzed: ā viveśa śiva stokāya tanvaḥ naḥ ehi iti
bhadra annaḥ śreyaḥ iti mantreṇa prāśitram prāśnāti
dvis ācamanam kṛtvā tatas karma kuryāt

original: [prāśitamanumantrayate amo'si prāṇa tadṛtaṃ bravīmyamāsi sarvāṅasi praviṣṭaḥ /
analyzed: prāśitam anumantrayate amā asi prāṇa tat ṛtam bravīmi amā asi sarva aṅasi praviṣṭaḥ

original: sa me jarāṃ rogamapanudya śarīrādanāmayaidhi mā riṣāma indo iti // KauśS_9,6{74}.20 //]
analyzed: sa me jarām rogam apanudya śarīrāt anāmayā edhi mā riṣāma indo iti

original: tataḥ hṛdayamanvālabhya japati 'amo'si prāṇa' iti mantreṇa /
analyzed: tatas hṛdayam anvālabhya japati amā asi prāṇaḥ iti mantreṇa

original: vatsaḥ prathamajo grīṣme vāsaḥ śaradi dakṣiṇā // KauśS_9,6{74}.21 //
analyzed: vatsaḥ prathama jaḥ grīṣme vāsaḥ śaradi dakṣiṇā
na atiśaktiḥ vidhīyate na atiśaktiḥ vidhīyate iti
sarva nitya naimittika kāmyeṣu yathāśakti dakṣiṇā dānam

original: pitṛbhrātrāgnisadanaṃ navame ko ti kena tvā.
analyzed: pitṛ bhrātrā agni sadanam navame kaḥ ti kena tvā
avaśiṣṭāni kārya artham agnyādheyam ca kīrtitam

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'satyenottabhitā' iti ṣoḍaśabhirṛgbhiḥ 'pūrvāparam' iti dvābhyāmājyaṃ juhoti //
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā satyena uttabhitāḥ iti ṣoḍaśabhiḥ ṛgbhiḥ pūrva aparam iti dvābhyām ājyam juhoti

original: 'ā no agne' (2.36) iti sūktenāgamakṛśaraṃ tilamiśraṃ sampātyābhimantrya kumārīmāśayati //
analyzed: ā naḥ agne iti sūktena āgama kṛsaram tila miśram sampātya abhimantrya kumārīm āśayati

original: 'yuvaṃ bhagam' ityardharcena puruṣaṃ śarāvasampuṭahastagṛhītaṃ sānucaraṃ varaṃ prati preṣayati //
analyzed: yuvam bhagam iti ardharcena puruṣam śarāva sampuṭa hasta gṛhītam sa anucaram varam prati preṣayati
tad vivṛhāt śaṅkamānaḥ niśi kumārī kulāt valīkāni ādīpya

original: devā agne (14.2.32-36) iti pañcabhiḥ sakṛtpūlyānyāvāpayati // KauśS_10,1{75}.11 //]
analyzed: devāḥ agne iti pañcabhiḥ sakṛt pūlyāni āvāpayati
anṛkṣarāḥ iti ṛcā kumārī rakṣā artham pālam preṣayati
udāhārasya pratihita iṣuḥ agratas jaghanatas brahmā
yaḥ an idhmaḥ iti ṛcā apsu loṣṭam prakṣipati
idam aham iti ardharcena avagāhya yaḥ bhadraḥ iti ardharcena udaka ghaṭam pūrayati
ā asyai brāhmaṇāḥ iti ardharcena ghaṭam udaka hārāya prayacchati
bāhyatas plakṣa udumbarasya uttaratas agneḥ śākhāyām āsajati
uttaratas agneḥ bāhyatas plakṣa śākhāyām upari nidadhāti
antar upātītya aryamaṇam iti ṛcā ājyam juhoti
pra tvā muñcāmi iti ṛcā kumārī keśān vicṛtati
uśatīḥ iti ṛcā tris samidhaḥ ādadhāti kumārī
uśatīḥ iti saptabhiḥ ṛgbhiḥ uṣṇa udakam sampātya
iti pūrvayoḥ uttarasyām sraktyām tiṣṭhantīm āplāvayati
yat āsandyām iti ṛcā īśāna koṇe kumārīm snāpayati

original: 'yathā sindhuḥ' iti dvābhyām anyena śītodakenotkramamāṇāṃ kumārīmavasiñcati //
analyzed: yathā sindhuḥ iti dvābhyām anyena śīta udakena utkramamāṇām kumārīm avasiñcati

original: iti vāsasāṅgāni pramṛjya kumārīpālāya prayachati // KauśS_10,2{76}.1 //]
analyzed: iti vāsasā aṅgāni pramṛjya kumārī pālāya prayacchati

original: 'yadduṣkṛtam' iti dvābhyāmṛgbhyāṃ vāsasāṅgāni pramṛjya kumārīpālāya prayacchati //
analyzed: yat duṣkṛtam iti dvābhyām ṛgbhyām vāsasā aṅgāni pramṛjya kumārī pālāya prayacchati

original: tad vāsaḥ tumbaradaṇḍena gṛhītvā gopāṭe prakṣipati //
analyzed: tat vāsaḥ tumbaradaṇḍena gṛhītvā gopāṭe prakṣipati
yāḥ akṛntan tvaṣṭā vāsaḥ iti dvābhyām ahata vastreṇa ācchādayati

original: [kṛtrimaḥ (14.2.68) iti śatadataiṣīkeṇa kaṅkatena sakṛt pralikhya // KauśS_10,2{76}.5 //]
analyzed: kṛtrimaḥ iti śatadatā aiṣīkeṇa kaṅkatena sakṛt pralikhya

original: 'kṛtrimaḥ' ityṛcā śatadanteṣīkena kaṅkatena keśān pratilikhya sakṛt //
analyzed: kṛtrimaḥ iti ṛcā śata danta iṣīkena kaṅkatena keśān pratilikhya sakṛt
kṛta yāmam iti anena mantreṇa kaṅkatam avasṛjati

original: 'āśāsānā', 'saṃ tvā nahyāmi' iti dvābhyām ubhayataḥpāśaṃ yoktraṃ kaṭipradeśe badhnāti //
analyzed: āśāsānā sam tvā nahyāmi iti dvābhyām ubhayatas pāśam yoktram kaṭi pradeśe badhnāti

original: [iyaṃ vīrud (1.34) iti madughamaṇiṃ lākṣāraktena sūtreṇa vigrathyānāmikāyāṃ badhnāti // KauśS_10,2{76}.8 //]
analyzed: iyam vīrudh iti madugha maṇim lākṣā raktena sūtreṇa vigrathya anāmikāyām badhnāti

original: 'iyaṃ vīrud' iti sūktena jyeṣṭhīmadhumaṇiṃ sampātyābhimantrya raktasūtreṇānāmikāyāṃ badhnāti //
analyzed: iyam vīrudh iti sūktena jyeṣṭhī madhumaṇim sampātya abhimantrya rakta sūtreṇa anāmikāyām badhnāti
antatas ha maṇiḥ bhavati bāhyaḥ granthiḥ

original: vara āgate sati brāhmaṇān svasti vācayitvā varāya madhuparkaṃ dattvā kautukāni kārayet /
analyzed: vare āgate sati brāhmaṇān svasti vācayitvā varāya madhuparkam dattvā kautukāni kārayet
kaṅkaṇa bandhana yava madhūka mālā darpaṇa grahaṇa ādi kautukam ca sarvam tūṣṇīm loka ācārāt

original: upādhyāyaḥ kautukagṛhe praviśya kumārīṃ haste gṛhītvā nirṇayati 'bhagastvetaḥ' ityṛcā //
analyzed: upādhyāyaḥ kautuka gṛhe praviśya kumārīm haste gṛhītvā nirṇayati bhagaḥ tvā itas iti ṛcā
śākhāyām yugam ādhāya dakṣiṇatas anyaḥ dhārayati
anyaḥ dakṣiṇatas śākhāyām yugam ādhāya agratas dhārayati

original: [dakṣiṇasyāṃ yugadhuryuttarasmin yugatardmani darbheṇa vigrathya śaṃ te (14.1.40-41)
analyzed: dakṣiṇasyām yuga dhuri uttarasmin yuga tardmani darbheṇa vigrathya śam te

original: iti lalāṭe hiraṇyaṃ saṃstabhya japati // KauśS_10,2{76}.12 //
lalāṭapradeśe 'śaṃ te hiraṇyam' iti dvābhyāṃ yugacchidre hiraṇyaṃ darbheṇa baddhvā tata udakaṃ chidreṇāvasiñcati tūṣṇīm //
analyzed: lalāṭa pradeśe śam te hiraṇyam iti dvābhyām yuga chidre hiraṇyam darbheṇa baddhvā tatas udakam chidreṇa avasiñcati tūṣṇīm
yuga chidra udakam gṛhītvā aṅgāt aṅgāt iti ṛcā uttaratas agneḥ ninayati
syonam iti śakṛt piṇḍa īśmānam nidadhāti
syonam dhruvam iti ardharcena śakṛt piṇḍa īśmānam nidadhāti
tiṣṭhe iti ardharcena aśmanā upari kumārīm sthāpayati

original: [iyaṃ nārī (14.2.63) iti dhruvāṃ tiṣṭhantīṃ pūlyānyāvāpayati // KauśS_10,2{76}.17 //]
analyzed: iyam nārī iti dhruvām tiṣṭhantīm pūlyāni āvāpayati

original: 'iyaṃ nārī' ityṛcā tiṣṭhantī kumārī trīn lājāñjalīn juhoti //
analyzed: iyam nārī iti ṛcā tiṣṭhantī kumārī trīn lāja añjalīn juhoti
tatas pitā dāna kāle nāma gotram kurute

original: amukaprapautrāya amukapautrāya amukaputrāya amukaprapautrīṃ amukapautrīṃ amukaputrīṃ amukīṃ sahiraṇyāṃ savasrālaṅkārāṃ tubhyaṃ sampradade //
analyzed: amuka prapautrāya amuka pautrāya amuka putrāya amuka prapautrīm amuka pautrīm amuka putrīm amukīm sa hiraṇyām sa vasra alaṅkārām tubhyam sampradade
tatas yena agniḥ pañcabhiḥ varaḥ pāṇigrahaṇam karoti
iti anuvākam vi hi sotoḥ asṛkṣata
aryamṇaḥ iti ardharcena agnim tris pariṇayati

original: ityuttarato'gneḥ sapta lekhā likhati prācyaḥ // KauśS_10,2{76}.21 //]
analyzed: iti uttaratas agneḥ sapta lekhāḥ likhati prācyaḥ

original: tataḥ 'sapta maryādāḥ' ityṛcottarato'gneḥ sapta lekhā likhati prācyaḥ //
analyzed: tatas sapta maryādāḥ iti ṛcā uttaratas agneḥ sapta lekhāḥ likhati prācyaḥ

original: iṣe tvā sumaṅgali prajāvati susīme iti prathamam // KauśS_10,2{76}.23 //
analyzed: iṣe tvā su maṅgali prajāvati su sīme iti prathamam

original: ūrje tvā rāyaspoṣāya tvā saubhāgyāya tvā sāmrājyāya tvā sampade tvā jīvātave tvā sumaṅgali prajāvati susīme iti saptamaṃ sakhā saptapadī bhava  #
analyzed: ūrje tvā rāyaspoṣāya tvā saubhāgyāya tvā sāmrājyāya tvā sampade tvā jīvātave tvā su maṅgali prajāvati su sīme iti saptamam sakhā saptapadī bhava  /

original: 'iṣe tvā sumaṅgali' iti saptabhirmantraiḥ tāsu lekhāsūpari kumārī padāni dadāti //
analyzed: iṣe tvā su maṅgali iti saptabhiḥ mantraiḥ tāsu lekhāsu upari kumārī padāni dadāti
bhagaḥ tatakṣa iti dvābhyām ṛgbhyām talpe upaveśayati

original: [prakṣālyamānāvanumantrayate imau pādau subhagau suśevau saubhāgyāya kṛṇutāṃ no aghāya /
analyzed: prakṣālyamānau anumantrayate imau pādau subhagau su śevau saubhāgyāya kṛṇutām naḥ aghāya

original: prakṣālyamānau subhagau supatnyāḥ prajāṃ paśūn dīrghamāyuśca dhattām iti // KauśS_10,2{76}.27 //]
analyzed: prakṣālyamānau subhagau su patnyāḥ prajām paśūn dīrgham āyuḥ ca dhattām iti
prakṣālyamānau anumantrayate imau pādau iti ṛcā

original: 'pra tvā muñcāmi' iti dvābhyāṃ kumārī kaṭiveṣṭitaṃ yoktraṃ vicṛtati //
analyzed: pra tvā muñcāmi iti dvābhyām kumārī kaṭi veṣṭitam yoktram vicṛtati

original: ye jayanti te balīyāṃsa eva manyate // KauśS_10,2{76}.30 //
analyzed: ye jayanti te balīyāṃsaḥ eva manyate
iti sarva surabhi cūrṇāni ṛcā ṛcā kāmpīla palāśena mūrdhni āvapati

original: tataḥ 'bṛhaspatinā' iti ṣaḍbhirṛgbhiḥ sarvauṣadhiṃ pratyṛcaṃ kāmpīlapalāśena mūrdhniṃ āvapati //
analyzed: tatas bṛhaspatinā iti ṣaḍbhiḥ ṛgbhiḥ sarva oṣadhim pratyṛcam kāmpīla palāśena āvapati
a bhrātṛ ghnīm iti ekaikayā ṛcā utthāpayati kumārīm

original: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'sukiṃśukam' 'rukmaprastaraṇam' iti dvābhyāmṛgbhyāṃ yānamaśvādi sampātyābhimantrya tata uttaratantram /
analyzed: abhyātāna antam kṛtvā su kiṃśukam rukma prastaraṇam iti dvābhyām ṛgbhyām yānam aśva ādi sampātya abhimantrya tatas uttara tantram

original: 'brahmāparam' iti dve ṛcau japitvā pathi gacchatoḥ varavadhvoḥ agre kartā vrajati //
analyzed: brahma aparam iti dve ṛcau japitvā pathi gacchatoḥ varavadhvoḥ agre kartā vrajati

original: 'mā vidan' 'anṛkṣarāḥ' iti dvābhyāmadhvānaṃ dakṣiṇena prakrāmati kartā //
analyzed: mā vidan anṛkṣarāḥ iti dvābhyām adhvānam dakṣiṇena prakrāmati kartā

original: iti tenānyasyāmūḍhāyāṃ vādhūyasya daśāṃ catuṣpathe dakṣiṇairabhitiṣṭhati // KauśS_10,3{77}.4 //]
analyzed: iti tena anyasya a mūḍhāyām vādhūyasya daśām catuṣpathe dakṣiṇaiḥ abhitiṣṭhati

original: yenaiva yānena sā ūḍhā tenaiva yadā anyā ūḍhā bhavati tadā idaṃ prāyaścittaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: yena eva yānena sā ūḍhā tena eva yadā anyā ūḍhā bhavati tadā idam prāyaścittam bhavati

original: 'yedaṃ pūrvā' ityṛcā kartā vādhūyasya daśākhaṇḍaṃ gṛhītvā catuṣpathe dattvā dakṣiṇena pādena tiṣṭhati //
analyzed: yā idam pūrvāḥ iti ṛcā kartā vādhūyasya daśā khaṇḍam gṛhītvā catuṣpathe dattvā dakṣiṇena pādena tiṣṭhati

original: sa cedubhayoḥ śubhakāmo bhavati sūryāyai devebhyaḥ (14.2.46)
analyzed: sa ced ubhayoḥ śubha kāmaḥ bhavati sūryāyai devebhyaḥ

original: samṛchata svapatho'navayantaḥ susīmakāmāvubhe virājāvubhe suprajasau ityatikramayato'ntarā brahmāṇam // KauśS_10,3{77}.6 //
analyzed: samṛchata sva pathaḥ ūna vayantaḥ su sīma kāmau ubhe virājau ubhe suprajasau iti atikramayataḥ untarā brahmāṇam

original: tata 'ya ṛte cidabhiśriṣaḥ' ityṛcā yānaṃ yānaṃ samprokṣya viniṣkārayati //
analyzed: tata yaḥ ṛte cit abhiśriṣaḥ iti ṛcā yānam yānam samprokṣya viniṣkārayati

original: 'sā mandasānā' ityṛcā nadyāṃ loṣṭaṃ prakṣipya tata uttaranti //
analyzed: sā mandasānā iti ṛcā nadyām loṣṭam prakṣipya tatas uttaranti

original: [idaṃ su me (14.2.9) iti mahāvṛkṣeṣu japati // KauśS_10,3{77}.9 //]
analyzed: idam su me iti mahāvṛkṣeṣu japati
idam su me iti ṛcā mahāvṛkṣeṣu japati
sumaṅgalīḥ iti vadhvī kṣīḥ prati japati
dvaibhede yāḥ oṣadhayaḥ iti ṛcam japati

original: vrīhiyavādikṣetraṃ dṛṣṭvā vane vṛkṣādi nadyādikaṃ ca //
analyzed: vrīhi yava ādi kṣetram dṛṣṭvā vane vṛkṣa ādi nadī ādikam ca
ye pitaraḥ iti ṛcam śmaśāneṣu japati
pra budhyasva iti ṛcā suptām prabodhayet
sam kāśayāmi iti sva pitṛ gṛha saṅkāśe samīpe japati

original: [udva ūrmiḥ (14.2.16) iti yānaṃ samprokṣya vimocayati // KauśS_10,3{77}.15 //]
analyzed: udvaḥ ūrmiḥ iti yānam samprokṣya vimocayati
udvaḥ ūrmiḥ iti ṛcā yānam samprokṣya vimocayati
uttiṣṭha itas kim icchantī iti ṛcā patnī śālām samprokṣati

original: [syonam (14.1.47) iti dakṣiṇato valīkānāṃ śakṛtpiṇḍe'śmānaṃ nidadhāti // KauśS_10,3{77}.17 //]
analyzed: syonam iti dakṣiṇatas valīkānām śakṛt piṇḍa īśmānam nidadhāti

original: 'syonam' ityardharcena dakṣiṇataḥ gṛhapārśve valīkānāṃ śakṛtpiṇḍe'śmānaṃ nidadhāti //
analyzed: syonam iti ardharcena dakṣiṇatas gṛha pārśve valīkānām śakṛt piṇḍa īśmānam nidadhāti
tasya upari madhyama palāśe sarpiṣi catvāri dūrvā agrāṇi

original: tasyopari madhyamapalāśe ghṛte catvāri dūrvāgrāṇi muñcati //
analyzed: tasya upari madhyama palāśe ghṛte catvāri dūrvā agrāṇi muñcati
tasya upari vadhūm āsthāpayati tiṣṭha iti ardharcena
brahma aparam iti ṛcā etābhiḥ catasṛbhiḥ vadhū varau gṛham praveśayati

original: pṛṣṭhataḥ suhṛt pūrṇakalaśaṃ phala-akṣatasahitaṃ haste kṛtvā vadhūṃ praveśayati //
analyzed: pṛṣṭhatas suhṛd pūrṇa kalaśam phala akṣata sahitam haste kṛtvā vadhūm praveśayati

original: 'aghoracakṣuḥ' iti dvābhyāmṛgbhyāmagniṃ prajvālya tato hastagrahaṇaṃ kṛtvā varaḥ pariṇayati /
analyzed: aghora cakṣuḥ iti dvābhyām ṛgbhyām agnim prajvālya tatas hasta grahaṇam kṛtvā varaḥ pariṇayati
tatas gṛha devatā namaskārān kurvatīm vadhūm anumantrayate yadā gārhapatyam
śarma varmaḥ iti ṛcā rohita carma anumantrayate
carma ca upastṛṇīthana iti pādena upastṛṇantam

original: 'yaṃ balbajam' iti pādena carmopari balbajaṃ stṛṇāti //
analyzed: yam balbajam iti pādena carma upari balbajam stṛṇāti
upa stṛṇīhi balbajam iti ardharcena anumantrayate balbajam stṛṇantam
tadā rohatu iti ardharcena balbaja stṛte carmaṇi vadhūm ārohayati
tatra upaviśya iti ardharcena tatra carmaṇi upaveśayati
iti kalyāṇa nāmānam brāhmaṇāyanam upasthe upaveśayati

original: 'sujyaiṣṭhyaḥ' iti pādena brāhmaṇāyanaṃ kumāraṃ vadhvā upastha upaveśayati //
analyzed: su jyaiṣṭhyaḥ iti pādena brāhmaṇāyanam kumāram vadhvāḥ upasthe upaveśayati

original: 'vi tiṣṭhantām' ityṛcā kumārāya phalaṃ modakādi dattvā tata utthāpayati //
analyzed: vi tiṣṭhantām iti ṛcā kumārāya phalam modaka ādi dattvā tatas utthāpayati

original: agnirjanavinmahyaṃ jāyāmimāmadāt somo vasuvinmahyaṃ jāyāmimāmadāt pūṣā jātivinmahyaṃ
analyzed: agniḥ jana vid mahyam jāyām imām adāt somaḥ vasu vid mahyam jāyām imām adāt pūṣā jāti vid mahyam

original: jāyāmimāmadādindraḥ sahīyānmahyaṃ jāyāmimāmadādagnaye janavide svāhā somāya vasuvide
analyzed: jāyām imām adāt indraḥ sahīyān mahyam jāyām imām adāt agnaye jana vide svāhā somāya vasu vide

original: svāhā pūṣṇe jātivide svāhendrāya sahīyase svāhā iti āgachataḥ (6.82)
analyzed: svāhā pūṣṇe jāti vide svāhā indrāya sahīyase svāhā iti āgacchataḥ
tatobhyātāna antam kṛtvā tena bhūtena iti sūktam
agniḥ jana vid mahyam iti eka avasānam pūrvam kalpa jam sūktam

original: 'savitā prasavānām' iti sūktaṃ etaiḥ sūktairājyaṃ juhvat varavadhvoḥ krameṇa mūrdhnoḥ sampātānānayati //
analyzed: savitā prasavānām iti sūktam etaiḥ sūktaiḥ ājyam juhvat vara vadhvoḥ krameṇa mūrdhnoḥ sampātān ānayati
tatas uda pātram vara vadhvoḥ añjalyoḥ ninayati śumbhanī iti ṛcā

original: 'tena bhūtena haviṣā' iti sūktena rasaṃ sampātyābhimantrya tataḥ sthālīpākaṃ sampātyābhimantrya tenaiva sūktena tato rasaṃ sthālīpākaṃ ca jāyāpatī  #
analyzed: tena bhūtena haviṣā iti sūktena rasam sampātya abhimantrya tatas sthālīpākam sampātya abhimantrya tena eva sūktena tatas rasam sthālīpākam ca jāyā patī

original: ekasmin bhājane sahopaviśya miṣṭamannaṃ sahāśanaṃ kuryāt //
analyzed: ekasmin bhājane saha upaviśya miṣṭam annam saha aśanam kuryāt
yavānām ājya miśrāṇām pūrṇa añjalim juhoti

original: 'tena bhūtena' iti sūktena yavānāmājyamiśrāṇāṃ pūrvāñjaliṃ juhoti /
analyzed: tena bhūtena iti sūktena yavānām ājya miśrāṇām pūrva añjalim juhoti
śarma varma ityādi vidhiḥ pitṛ gṛhe vivāha agnau kartavyaḥ

original: 'sapta maryādāḥ' ityṛcā varaḥ vrīhīn juhoti vivāhāgnau /
analyzed: sapta maryādāḥ ityṛcā varaḥ vrīhīn juhoti vivāhāgnau
yavān vā iti tilān vā iti

original: 'akṣyau nau' ityṛcā parasparaṃ varavadhvau akṣiṇī aṅkte /
analyzed: akṣyau nau iti ṛcā parasparam vara vadhvau akṣiṇī aṅkte
mahī mū su iti talpam ālambhayati
mahī mū su iti ṛcā talpam khaṭvām ālambhayati

original: 'ā roha talpam' ityṛcā varavadhū tasmin śayana upaveśayati //
analyzed: ā roha talpam iti ṛcā vara vadhū tasmin śayane upaveśayati

original: 'devā agre' ityṛcā varavadhū saṃveśayati tasmin talpe //
analyzed: devāḥ agre iti ṛcā vara vadhū saṃveśayati tasmin talpe
abhi tvā manu jātena iti ṛcā vara vadhū vastreṇa ācchādayati
sam pitarau iti catasṛbhiḥ ṛgbhiḥ abhimukhau karoti
iha imau iti tris san udati
iha imau iti ṛcā varaḥ vadhū kaṇṭha grahaṇam karoti tris
madugha maṇi mau kṣepanīyaḥ iyam vīrudh

original: 'amo'hamasmi' iti dve ṛcau etairṛgbhirabhimantrya madughamaṇimaukṣe prakṣipya parasparaṃ varavadhvau samālambhataḥ /
analyzed: a moham asmi iti dve ṛcau etaiḥ ṛgbhiḥ abhimantrya madugha maṇi maukṣe prakṣipya parasparam vara vadhvau samālambhataḥ
āvapet surabhiḥ gandhān kṣīre sarpiṣi atha udake
etat āyatanam iti āhuḥ aukṣam tu madhunā saha

original: 'brahma jajñānam' ityṛcā varaḥ aṅguṣṭhena prajananadeśaṃ tudati //
analyzed: brahma jajñānam iti ṛcā varaḥ aṅguṣṭhena prajanana deśam tudati
syonāt yoneḥ iti ṛcā khaṭvāyāḥ utthāpayati
iti dvābhyām ahata vastram abhimantrya paridhāpayati varaḥ vadhūm

original: iti śaṣpeṇābhighārya vrīhiyavābhyāmabhinidhāya darbhapiñjūlyā sīmantaṃ vicṛtati // KauśS_10,5{79}.14 //]
analyzed: iti śaṣpeṇa abhighārya vrīhi yavābhyām abhinidhāya darbha piñjūlyā sīmantam vicṛtati

original: 'bṛhaspatiḥ prathamaḥ sūryāyāḥ' iti dvābhyāṃ vadhūsīmante śaṣpaṃ nidadhāti /
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ prathamaḥ sūryāyāḥ iti dvābhyām vadhū sīmante śaṣpam nidadhāti
ājyena saha darbha piñjūlyā sīmantam vicṛtati

original: [śaṇaśakalena pariveṣṭya tisro rātrīḥ prati suptāste // KauśS_10,5{79}.15 //]
analyzed: śaṇa śakalena pariveṣṭya tisraḥ rātrīḥ prati suptāḥ te

original: śaṇaśakalena vadhūkeśān veṣṭya tisro rātrīḥ prati suptaḥ //
analyzed: śaṇa śakalena vadhū keśān veṣṭya tisraḥ rātrīḥ prati suptaḥ

original: ājyaṃ vā samidho vā puroḍāśaṃ vā /
analyzed: ājyam vā samidhaḥ vā puroḍāśam vā
anuvākābhyām anvārabdhābhyām upadadhīte iti prāyaścittam etat

original: yadi caturthikākarmamadhye rajasvalā vadhūḥ bhavati tadedaṃ prāyaścittam /
analyzed: yadi caturthikā karma madhye rajasvalā vadhūḥ bhavati tadā idam prāyaścittam
iha idam atha iti etayā śulka dravyam pṛthak karoti

original: [dvābhyāṃ nivartayati iha mama rādhyatāmatra tava iti // KauśS_10,5{79}.18 //]
analyzed: dvābhyām nivartayati iha mama rādhyatām atra tava iti
idam dravyam tava idam mama rādhyatām

original: parā dehi (14.1.25-30) iti vādhūyaṃ dadatamanumantrayate // KauśS_10,5{79}.20 //]
analyzed: parā dehi iti vādhūyam dadatam anumantrayate
parā dehi iti ṣaḍbhiḥ ṛgbhiḥ vādhūyam dadatam anumantrayate
devaiḥ dattam iti dvābhyām vādhūyam kartā pratigṛhṇāti
apa asmattamaḥ iti ṛcā sthūṇe āsajati

original: tadvastraṃ gṛhītvā 'yāvatīḥ kṛtyāḥ' ityṛcā vastraṃ visarjayati //
analyzed: tat vastram gṛhītvā yāvatīḥ kṛtyāḥ iti ṛcā vastram visarjayati

original: 'yā me priyatamā' ityṛcā vṛkṣaṃ praticchādayati kartā //
analyzed: yāḥ me priyatamāḥ iti ṛcā vṛkṣam praticchādayati kartā
śumbhanī iti ṛcā snānam sarve kurvanti
tatas ye antāḥ iti ṛcā vādhūyena ācchādayati
pūrva aparam yatra na adhigacchet brahma aparam
navam vasānaḥ iti ṛcam japitvā kartā
vivāhe udvāhe sati ekā gauḥ dakṣiṇā

original: yadi mantrapramāṇaṃ na jānāti tadā 'brahmāparam' ityṛcā sarvaṃ kartavyam //
analyzed: yadi mantra pramāṇam na jānāti tadā brahma aparam iti ṛcā sarvam kartavyam

original: kumāryāṃ nīyamānāyāṃ pitṛgṛhādyadi rodanaṃ bhavati tadedaṃ prāyaścittam /
analyzed: kumāryām nīyamānāyām pitṛ gṛhāt yadi rodanam bhavati tadā idam prāyaścittam
abhyātāna antam kṛtvā jīvam rudanti iti ekayā
yadi ime keśinaḥ iti catasṛbhiḥ etābhiḥ ājyam juhoti
śūdrasya vivāhe sarvam tūṣṇīm kāryam ājya ādi
agnyādheyam ca yātrā artham dharmaputra artham eva ca

original: bhāryā saṃskāramudvāhaṃ daśame prāha no guruḥ //
analyzed: bhāryā saṃskāram udvāham daśame prāha no guruḥ
atha anta iṣṭi pitṛ medham vyākhyāsyāmaḥ
dahana nidhāna deśe parivṛkṣāṇi nidhāna kāle iti brāhmaṇa uktam
vṛkṣa varjite deśe dahana nidhānam kartavyam iti brāhmaṇena uktam
durbalībhavantam śālā tṛṇeṣu darbhān āstīrya syonā asmai bhava

original: durbalībhavantaṃ mumūrṣantamagnihotraśālāyāmāvasathyaśālāyāṃ vā śālātṛṇānyāstīrya teṣūpari darbhān stṛṇāti /
analyzed: durbalībhavantam mumūrṣantam agnihotra śālāyām āvasathya śālāyām vā śālā tṛṇāni āstīrya teṣu upari darbhān stṛṇāti

original: 'syonāsmai bhava' iti tisṛbhirṛgbhiḥ taṃ puruṣaṃ darbheṣu svāpayati /
analyzed: syonā asmai bhava iti tisṛbhiḥ ṛgbhiḥ tam puruṣam darbheṣu svāpayati

original: atha yadi kākapipīlikāsarpavyāghraśṛṅgiśvāpadādiṣu daṃṣṭrādaṃśadoṣānmriyeta tadedaṃ prāyaścittamucyate-
analyzed: atha yadi kāka pipīlikā sarpa vyāghra śṛṅgi śvāpada ādiṣu daṃṣṭrā daṃśa doṣāt mriyeta tadā idam prāyaścittam ucyate

original: 'yatte kṛṣṇaḥ śakunaḥ' ityṛcā tasya daṣṭavraṇamagninā dahati //
analyzed: yat te kṛṣṇaḥ śakunaḥ iti ṛcā tasya daṣṭa vraṇam agninā dahati

original: ājyaṃ ca pṛṣadājyaṃ cājaṃ ca gāṃ ca // KauśS_11,1{80}.7 //
analyzed: ājyam ca pṛṣadājyam ca ajam ca gām ca

original: āhitāgnerekāgneśca mṛte sati gṛhe karma ucyate /
analyzed: āhitāgneḥ ekāgneḥ ca mṛte sati gṛhe karma ucyate

original: kecid vanaṃ nītvā vakṣyamāṇaṃ karma kurvanti //
analyzed: kecid vanam nītvā vakṣyamāṇam karma kurvanti
śāntyudakam karoti a sakalam cātanānām ca anvāvapate
śāntyudaka udakena keśa śmaśru roma nakhāni saṃhārayanti
anena śāntyudakena udaka miśritena keśa śmaśru roma nakhāni saṃhārayati
sarvam pretasya kuryuḥ gotriṇaḥ na kartā
evam snātam alaṅkṛtam ahatena avāc daśena vasanena prachādayati etat te devaḥ

original: etattvā vāsaḥ prathamaṃ nvāgan (18.2.57) iti // KauśS_11,1{80}.17 //]
analyzed: etat tvā vāsaḥ prathamam nu āgan iti
evam snātam alaṅkṛtam ahatena avāc daśena vasanena pādau pracchādayati

original: 'etat tvā vāsaḥ' ityṛcā etābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ vāsamabhimantrayate /
analyzed: etat tvā vāsaḥ iti ṛcā etābhyām dvābhyām vāsam abhimantrayate

original: yat lokāḥ smaranti tat sarvaṃ kuryāt //
analyzed: yat lokāḥ smaranti tat sarvam kuryāt

original: tataḥ 'apemam' ityṛcā triṣvagniṣvājyaṃ juhoti ekāgnau ca //
analyzed: tatas apa imam iti ṛcā triṣu agniṣu ājyam juhoti eka agnau ca

original: [tāḥ śakṛdābhyantaraṃ limpanti śuṣkeṇa vā pūrayanti // KauśS_11,1{80}.20 //
analyzed: tāḥ śakṛdā abhyantaram limpanti śuṣkeṇa vā pūrayanti
tāḥ pṛthak agnibhiḥ santāpayantyā śakṛt ādīpanāt

original: śuṣkeṇa pūrayitvā''havanīye gārhapatye dakṣiṇāgnau ca pṛthagagnibhiḥ santāpayatyā śakṛdādīpanāt //
analyzed: śuṣkeṇa pūrayitvā āhavanīye gārhapatye dakṣiṇāgnau ca pṛthak agnibhiḥ santāpayati ā śakṛt ādīpanāt

original: [teṣāṃ haraṇānupūrvamāhavanīyaṃ prathamaṃ tato dakṣiṇāgniṃ tato gārhapatyam // KauśS_11,1{80}.22 //]
analyzed: teṣām haraṇa anupūrvam āhavanīyam prathamam tatas dakṣiṇāgnim tatas gārhapatyam

original: tāḥ ukhā evaṃ nīyante pretena saha rathena puruṣairvā agnisahitāḥ /
analyzed: tāḥ ukhāḥ evam nīyante pretena saha rathena puruṣaiḥ vā agni sahitāḥ

original: agne āhavanīyaṃ kṛtvā tato dakṣiṇāgniṃ tato gārhapatyamevaṃ haraṇānupūrvyā nīyante /
analyzed: agne āhavanīyam kṛtvā tatas dakṣiṇāgnim tatas gārhapatyam evam haraṇa ānupūrvyā nīyante
atha deśa antaram ṛte āhitāgneḥ ekāgneḥ ca karma ucyate

original: [atha videśe pretasya ā rohata janitrīṃ jātavedasaḥ (18.4.1)
analyzed: atha videśe pretasya ā rohata janitrīm jātavedasaḥ

original: 'ā rohata janitrīṃ jātavedasaḥ' ityṛcā'raṇidvayaṃ pratāpayati triṣvagniṣu /
analyzed: ā rohata janitrīm jātavedasaḥ iti ṛcā araṇi dvayam pratāpayati triṣu agniṣu
yojana śate pi samāropaṇe na apanīyante
manthanam kṛtvā anta iṣṭi karma kuryāt

original: atha deśāntaramṛte śarīranāśe vā laukikāgnidagdhe vā asthīni kṛṣṇājine kṛtvā pātracayanādi karma kuryāt /
analyzed: atha deśa antara mṛte śarīra nāśe vā laukika agni dagdhe vā asthīni kṛṣṇājine kṛtvā pātra cayana ādi karma kuryāt

original: asthināśe palāśavṛntatrīṇi śatāni ṣaṣṭi cāṅkurāṇāṃ kṛṣṇājine kṛtvā anteṣṭikarma kuryāt /
analyzed: asthi nāśe palāśa vṛnta trīṇi śatāni ṣaṣṭi ca aṅkurāṇām kṛṣṇājine kṛtvā anta iṣṭi karma kuryāt
athavā mṛta śarīram agni samīpe ānīyate tatra saṃskāraḥ

original: yasmin pakṣe samāropaṇaṃ kriyate sa pakṣa ucyate /
analyzed: yasmin pakṣe samāropaṇam kriyate sa pakṣaḥ ucyate

original: [api vānyavatsāyā vā sandhinīkṣīreṇaikaśalākena vā manthenāgnihotraṃ juhotyā dahanāt // KauśS_11,1{80}.25 //]
analyzed: api vā anya vatsāyāḥ vā sandhinī kṣīreṇa eka śalākena vā manthena agnihotram juhoti ā dahanāt

original: api vānyavatsāyāḥ sandhinīkṣīreṇa vā agnihotraṃ juhoti ā dahanāt /
analyzed: api vā anya vatsāyāḥ sandhinī kṣīreṇa vā agnihotram juhoti ā dahanāt
uktam homa vidhānam āhitāgneḥ ekāgneḥ ca
eka śalākena vā manthena agnihotram juhvati

original: [darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ kṛṣṇakataṇḍulānāṃ tasyā ājyena nāntaṃ na bahiḥ // KauśS_11,1{80}.26 //]
analyzed: darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ kṛṣṇaka taṇḍulānām tasyāḥ ājyena na antam na bahis
tasyāḥ ājyena na antar na bahis
grahān ājyabhāgau purastāddhoma saṃsthita homān uddhṛtya
ājyabhāgayoḥ purastāddhoma saṃsthita homeṣu svāhākāram kuryāt sarvatra
brāhmaṇāḥ vā prāṇa apānau avarudhya nidhanābhiḥ svāhā homaḥ
svāhākāra vaṣaṭkāra varjam anta iṣṭi pitṛ medhe sarvatra api vinā kartavyam
deśa antara mṛtasya darbha ājya agnihotram vā samāropaṇam samāptam
ukhā pradīpana anantaram preta utthāpana karma ucyate
atha ubhayoḥ ekam vihitam karma ucyate
iti ekā etāḥ trayodaśa utthāpanī sañjñāḥ

original: utthāpanībhirṛgbhiḥ pretamutthāpya śakaṭe karoti śayane vā //
analyzed: utthāpanībhiḥ ṛgbhiḥ pretam utthāpya śakaṭe karoti śayane vā
iti tris saṃhāpayatim yāvatkṛtvas ca utthāpayati
pra cyavasva iti ṛcā pra itasya gātrāṇi itas ca itas ca karoti
paścāt kaṭi pradeśe rajjvām baddhvā nibadhya gacchati

original: iti gāvau yunakti puruṣau vā // KauśS_11,1{80}.34 //]
'imau yunajmi' ityṛcā vṛṣabhau abhimantrya śakaṭe yunakti anyaḥ śayane puruṣān vā anayarcā //
analyzed: imau yunajmi iti ṛcā vṛṣabhau abhimantrya śakaṭe yunakti anyaḥ śayane puruṣān vā anayā ṛcā
ati drave iti aṣṭau ṛcaḥ hariṇī iti ucyate

original: dahanadeśe nīyamānaṃ hariṇībhirabhimantrayet pretaṃ dūrasthaḥ kartā //
analyzed: dahana deśe nīyamānam hariṇībhiḥ abhimantrayet pretam dūra sthaḥ kartā

original: 'idaṃ ta ekam' ityṛcā agnayaḥ pretasyāgre kṛtvābhimantrayate /
analyzed: idam te ekam iti ṛcā agnayaḥ pretasya agre kṛtvā abhimantrayate

original: 'prajānatyaghnye jīva' ityṛcā gāṃ laukikāgniṃ sārasvatahomārthaṃ pariṇīya edhamagniṃ pariṇīya dahanadeśe gatvā //
analyzed: prajānati aghnye jīvaḥ iti ṛcā gām laukika agnim sārasvata homa artham pariṇīya edham agnim pariṇīya dahana deśe gatvā

original: 'syonāsmai bhava' ityṛcā uttarato'gneḥ pretasya śarīraṃ nidadhāti adhaḥ /
analyzed: syonā asmai bhava iti ṛcā uttaratas agneḥ pretasya śarīram nidadhāti adhas
tasyām yathādevatam purastāddhoma saṃsthita homān uddhṛtya

original: yadi anteṣṭiḥ kṛtā bhavati tataḥ prayogasamāptiḥ asmin sthāne.
analyzed: yadi anteṣṭiḥ kṛtā bhavati tatas prayoga samāptiḥ asmin sthāne

original: iti śāntyudakaṃ kṛtvā samprokṣaṇībhyāṃ kāmpīlaśākhayā dahanaṃ samprokṣya // KauśS_11,1{80}.42 //]
analyzed: iti śāntyudakam kṛtvā samprokṣaṇībhyām kāmpīla śākhayā dahanam samprokṣya

original: 'apeta vīta', 'dadāmyasmai' iti dvābhyāṃ kāmpīlaśākhayā dahanasthānaṃ samprokṣya //
analyzed: apeta vīta dadāmi asmai iti dvābhyām kāmpīla śākhayā dahana sthānam samprokṣya

original: [udīratām (18.1.44) ityuddhṛtyābhyukṣya lakṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā punarabhyukṣya prāgdakṣiṇamedhaścinvanti // KauśS_11,1{80}.43 //]
analyzed: udīratām iti uddhṛtya abhyukṣya lakṣaṇam kṛtvā punar abhyukṣya prāc dakṣiṇam edhaḥ cinvanti

original: 'udīratām' ityṛcā uddhṛtyābhyukṣya lakṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā punarabhyukṣya dahanasthānam /
analyzed: udīratām iti ṛcā uddhṛtya abhyukṣya lakṣaṇam kṛtvā punar abhyukṣya dahana sthānam
pūrva dakṣiṇa koṇa abhimukhāni kāṣṭhāni cinvanti

original: anyaḥ 'iyaṃ nārī' ityṛcā patnīṃ pretena saha saṃveśayati sahagamanārtham /
analyzed: anyaḥ iyam nārī iti ṛcā patnīm pretena saha saṃveśayati sahagamana artham
patinā saha maraṇe loka ānantyam avāpnuyāt
ṣaṣṭi varṣa sahasrāṇi svarga loke mahīyate
atha yadi uttiṣṭhati tadā udīrṣva iti ṛcā abhimantrya utthāpayati

original: [yaddhiraṇyaṃ bibharti taddakṣiṇe pāṇāvādāyājyenābhighārya jyeṣṭhena putreṇādāpayati idaṃ hiraṇyam (18.4.56) iti // KauśS_11,1{80}.46 //]
analyzed: yat hiraṇyam bibharti tat dakṣiṇe pāṇau ādāya ājyena abhighārya jyeṣṭhena putreṇa ādāpayati idam hiraṇyam iti

original: 'idaṃ hiraṇyam' ityardharcena yaddhiraṇyaṃ bibharti tad dakṣiṇe pāṇāvādāyājyenābhighāryābhimantrya jyeṣṭhena putreṇā''dāpayati //
analyzed: idam hiraṇyam iti ardharcena yat hiraṇyam bibharti tat dakṣiṇe pāṇau ādāya ājyena abhighārya abhimantrya jyeṣṭhena putreṇa ādāpayati
svargam yataḥ iti ardharcena preta hastam mārjayati putraḥ

original: 'daṇḍaṃ hastāt' ityṛcā veṇuyaṣṭiṃ pretahastād gṛhṇāti putraḥ /
analyzed: daṇḍam hastāt iti ṛcā veṇuyaṣṭim preta hastāt gṛhṇāti putraḥ
dhanuḥ hastāt iti ṛcā kṣatriya hastāt dhanuḥ gṛhṇāti

original: 'āṣṭraṃ hastāt' iti mantravikāraṃ kṛtvā saha viśā varcasā balena pretāddaṇḍaṃ gṛhṇāti vaiśyaputraḥ //
analyzed: āṣṭram hastāt iti mantra vikāram kṛtvā saha viśā varcasā balena pretāt daṇḍam gṛhṇāti vaiśya putraḥ
idam pitṛbhyaḥ iti ardharcena citā upari darbhān stṛṇāti
tatra enam uttānam ādadhīte ījānaḥ cittam ārukṣat agnim iti
ījānaḥ cittam ārukṣat agnim iti dvābhyām ṛgbhyām dūra sthaḥ kartā anumantrayate
prācyām tvā diśi iti etābhiḥ ṛgbhiḥ pretam abhimantrayate sthāna sthitam

original: athāsya saptasu prāṇeṣu sapta hiraṇyaśakalānyavāsyati amṛtamasyamṛtatvāyāmṛtasmin dhehi iti // KauśS_11,1{80}.56 //
analyzed: atha asya saptasu prāṇeṣu sapta hiraṇya śakalāni avāsyati amṛtam asi amṛta tvāya amṛtasmin dhehi iti
atha āhitāgneḥ darbheṣu kṛṣṇājinam antar loma āstīrya

original: cakṣuṣī śrotre nāsike mukhaṃ ca sapta prāṇāḥ /
analyzed: cakṣuṣī śrotre nāsike mukham ca sapta prāṇāḥ
āhitāgneḥ darbheṣu kṛṣṇājinam antar loma āstīrya

original: athāsya yajñapātrāṇi pṛṣadājyena pūrayitvānurūpaṃ nidadhāti // KauśS_11,2{81}.3 //
analyzed: atha asya yajña pātrāṇi pṛṣadājyena pūrayitvā anurūpam nidadhāti
kaṇṭhe dhruvām mukhe ignihotrahavaṇīm nāsikayoḥ sruvam
nāsikayoḥ agnihotra sruvam pṛṣadājyena pūrayitvā nidhāya

original: iḍāpātrīṃ śirasi nidhāya 'imamagne camasam' iti dvābhyāmanumantrayate //
analyzed: iḍā pātrīm śirasi nidhāya imam agne camasam iti dvābhyām anumantrayate

original: 'devā yajñam' iti tisṛbhirhṛdaye puroḍāśamanumantrayate yadi puroḍāśo bhavati //
analyzed: devāḥ yajñam iti tisṛbhiḥ hṛdaye puroḍāśam anumantrayate yadi puroḍāśaḥ bhavati

original: dakṣiṇe pārśve sphyaṃ savya upaveṣam // KauśS_11,2{81}.11 //

analyzed: aṣṭhīvataḥ jānuḥ prasiddhaḥ tatra ulūkhalam musalam ca
antareṇa ūrū anyāni yajña pātrāṇi jaṅghyoḥ madhye anyāni praṇītā camasa hotṛ camasa brahma camasa yajamāna camasa antardhāna kaṭa
pūrṇapātra ṣaḍavatta ādīni pṛṣadājyena pūrayitvā nidadhyāt tūṣṇīm
aśma mayāni svadhiti dātra parśu ādi dṛṣad upalakam bhūmau nidadhyāt

original: iti jaghanyāṃ gāṃ prasavyaṃ pariṇīyamānāmanumantrayate // KauśS_11,2{81}.20 //]
analyzed: iti jaghanyām gām prasavyam pariṇīyamānām anumantrayate

original: 'apaśyaṃ yuvatim' iti dvābhyāmṛgbhyāṃ citau pārśvataḥ apasavyaṃ gāṃ pariṇīyamānāmanumantrayate //
analyzed: apaśyam yuvatim iti dvābhyām ṛgbhyām citau pārśvatas apasavyam gām pariṇīyamānām anumantrayate

original: gāṃ nirṛtideśe jaghanapradeśe lakuṭena ghātayitvā mārayanti /
