analyzed: gām nirṛti deśe jaghana pradeśe lakuṭena ghātayitvā mārayanti

original: yathā hanyamānā gauḥ upaviśati tathā kartavyam /
analyzed: yathā hanyamānā gauḥ upaviśati tathā kartavyam

original: [tasyāḥ pṛṣṭhato vṛkkāvuddhārya pāṇyorasyādadhati ati drava śvānau (18.2.11-13) iti // KauśS_11,2{81}.22 //
analyzed: tasyāḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ vṛkkau uddhārya pāṇyoḥ asya ādadhati ati drava śvānau iti

original: goṣṭhadeśād vṛkkāvuddhārya pretahastayordadāti dakṣiṇe dakṣiṇaṃ savye savyam /
analyzed: goṣṭha deśāt vṛkkau uddhārya preta hastayoḥ dadāti dakṣiṇe dakṣiṇam savye savyam
ati drave iti tisṛbhiḥ anumantrayate kartā dūra sthaḥ

original: iti vapayā saptachidrayā mukhaṃ prachādayanti // KauśS_11,2{81}.25 //]
analyzed: iti vapayā sapta chidrayā mukham prachādayanti
agneḥ varmaḥ iti ṛcā vapayā sapta chidrayā preta mukham chādayati
anubaddha śiraḥ pādena go śālām carmaṇā avachādya
anubaddha śiraḥ pādena carmaṇā pretam avacchādya

original: tataḥ 'ajo bhāgaḥ' iti dve 'uttvā vahantu' ityekā etābhistisṛbhirdakṣiṇapārśve citau ajaṃ paśuṃ badhnāti /
analyzed: tatas ajaḥ bhāgaḥ iti dve uttvā vahantu iti ekā etābhiḥ tisṛbhiḥ dakṣiṇa pārśve citau ajam paśum badhnāti

original: tathā ca māhakiḥ ajo hanyate dahyate //
analyzed: tathā ca māhakiḥ ajaḥ hanyate dahyate

original: [asmādvai tvamajāyathā ayaṃ tvadadhi jāyatāmasau svāhā ityurasi gṛhye juhoti // KauśS_11,2{81}.30 //]
analyzed: asmāt vai tvam ajāyathāḥ ayam tvat adhi jāyatām asau svāhā iti urasi gṛhye juhoti

original: ekāgniṃ pretahṛdaye kṛtvā 'asmādvai tvamajāyathā ayaṃ tvadadhi jāyatāmasau svāhā' ityanena mantreṇājyaṃ juhoti kartā'spṛṣṭaḥ san athavā gotriṇaḥ
analyzed: eka agnim preta hṛdaye kṛtvā asmāt vai tvam ajāyathāḥ ayam tvat adhi jāyatām asau svāhā iti anena mantreṇa ājyam juhoti kartā a spṛṣṭaḥ san athavā gotriṇaḥ

original: [tathāgniṣu juhoti agnaye svāhā kāmāya svāhā lokāya svāhā iti // KauśS_11,2{81}.31 //]
analyzed: tathā agniṣu juhoti agnaye svāhā kāmāya svāhā lokāya svāhā iti

original: athāhavanīyādiṣu juhoti 'agnaye svāhā kāmāya svāhā lokāya svāhā' iti /
analyzed: atha āhavanīya ādiṣu juhoti agnaye svāhā kāmāya svāhā lokāya svāhā iti
agnaye svāhā iti tribhiḥ svāhākāraiḥ ājyam juhoti
pretam vedi madhye yathā dikṣu agnayaḥ

original: pretasya piṇḍadānaṃ kṛtvā apradakṣiṇamudakadhārāṃ bhrāmayitvā karakaiḥ prete triḥ śabdaṃ kṛtvā bhūmau prakṣipati tato'gniṃ dadāti /
analyzed: pretasya piṇḍa dānam kṛtvā a pradakṣiṇam udaka dhārām bhrāmayitvā karakaiḥ prete tris śabdam kṛtvā bhūmau prakṣipati tatas agnim dadāti
etaiḥ mantraiḥ svayam paṭhitvā na kartā

original: 'śaṃ tapa mātitapa' ityṛcā 'ā rabhasva jātavedaḥ' iti tribhiḥ 'prajānantaḥ prati gṛhṇantu' ityekā,
analyzed: śam tapa mā atitapa iti ṛcā ā rabhasva jātavedaḥ iti tribhiḥ prajānantaḥ prati gṛhṇantu iti ekā

original: etābhirṛgbhiḥ kaniṣṭhaputro gotriṇo vā anyo vā ādīpayati /
analyzed: etābhiḥ ṛgbhiḥ kaniṣṭha putraḥ gotriṇaḥ vai anyaḥ vai ādīpayati
tatas deva heḍanena anuvākena sruveṇa ājyam juhoti

original: [ādīpte sruveṇa yāmān homāñjuhoti pareyivāsaṃ pravato mahīḥ (18.1.49) iti // KauśS_11,2{81}.34 //
analyzed: ādīpte sruveṇa yāmān homān juhoti pareyivāsam pravataḥ mahīḥ iti

original: ye naḥ pituḥ pitaro ye pitāmahāḥ (18.2.49)
analyzed: ye naḥ pituḥ pitaraḥ ye pitāmahāḥ

original: prajvalite citau kartā ādīpte sati sruveṇa khādireṇa yāmyān homān juhoti /
analyzed: prajvalite citau kartā ādīpte sati sruveṇa khādireṇa yāmyān homān juhoti

original: 'yamo no gātum' iti dve iti prathamaḥ pakṣaḥ /
analyzed: yamaḥ naḥ gātum iti dve iti prathamaḥ pakṣaḥ

original: 'aṅgiraso naḥ pitaro navagvāḥ' iti saṃhatāḥ sapta iti dvitīyaḥ pakṣaḥ /
analyzed: aṅgirasaḥ naḥ pitaraḥ navagvāḥ iti saṃhatāḥ sapta iti dvitīyaḥ pakṣaḥ

original: 'pareyivāṃsam' iti dve 'aṅgiraso naḥ pitaraḥ' iti sapta 'ye naḥ pituḥ pitaro ye pitāmahāḥ' iti dve etāḥ samastā ekādaśa tṛtīyaḥ pakṣaḥ /
analyzed: pareyivāṃsam iti dve aṅgirasaḥ naḥ pitaraḥ iti sapta ye naḥ pituḥ pitaraḥ ye pitāmahāḥ iti dve etāḥ samastāḥ ekādaśa tṛtīyaḥ pakṣaḥ

original: atha sapta nava ekādaśādi brāhmaṇāḥ pūrvābhimukhopaviṣṭāḥ 'o cit sakhāyam' (18.1-4)
analyzed: atha sapta nava ekādaśa ādi brāhmaṇāḥ pūrva abhimukha upaviṣṭāḥ ā u cit sakhāyam
sarasvati yā sa ratham iti ekā

original: 'indro mā marutvān' iti pañcabhiḥ etairājyaṃ juhoti citau /
analyzed: indraḥ mā marutvān iti pañcabhiḥ etaiḥ ājyam juhoti citau
dakṣiṇatas kaniṣṭha putraḥ yāma sārasvatān homān karoti
karma vā sārasvatam yajña upavītinā kartavyam

original: athavā 'mainamagne vi daha' ityādi 'ava sṛja' ityekāṃ varjayitvā 'sahasraṇīthāḥ' ityantam /
analyzed: athavā mā enam agne vi dahaḥ ityādi ava sṛja iti ekām varjayitvā sahasraṇīthāḥ iti antam

original: 'ā rohata janitrīṃ jātavedasaḥ' iti pañcadaśabhirṛgbhirāhitāgniṃ citau upatiṣṭhante /
analyzed: ā rohata janitrīm jātavedasaḥ iti pañcadaśabhiḥ ṛgbhiḥ āhitāgnim citau upatiṣṭhante

original: 'mitrāvaruṇā pari māmadhātām' ityṛcā sarve pāṇī prakṣālayante //
analyzed: mitrāvaruṇā pari māmadhātām iti ṛcā sarve pāṇī prakṣālayante
varcasā mām iti ṛcā sarve ācāmayanti

original: tataḥ kartā 'vivasvānaḥ' iti dvābhyāmuttarataḥ anyasminnanuṣṭhātā juhoti /
analyzed: tatas kartā vivasvānaḥ iti dvābhyām uttaratas anyasmin anuṣṭhātā juhoti
atha prathame divase putra gotriṇām śāntiḥ ucyate
yavīyaḥ prathamāni karmāṇi prāc mukhānām yajña upavītinām dakṣiṇa āvṛtām

original: udakāñjaliṃ pretāya dattvā snānaṃ ca kṛtvā tataḥ karma kuryāt /
analyzed: udaka añjalim pretāya dattvā snānam ca kṛtvā tatas karma kuryāt
prāc mukhānām yajña upavītinām sarveṣām bhavanti
atha eṣām sapta sapta śarkarāḥ pāṇiṣu āvapate
tāsām ekaikām savyena avācīna hastena avakirantaḥ ūna avekṣamāṇāḥ vrajanti

original: striyo vā puruṣasya ca kaniṣṭhādi tāsāmekaikāṃ savyena vā dakṣiṇena vā'vācīnahastenāvakiranti /
analyzed: striyaḥ vā puruṣasya ca kaniṣṭha ādi tāsām ekaikām savyena vā dakṣiṇena vā avācīna hastena avakiranti

original: mā pra gāma (13.1.59) iti japanta udakānte vyaghāpāghe japanti // KauśS_11,3{82}.6 //
analyzed: mā pra gāma iti japantaḥ udaka ante vyagha apāghe japanti

original: sarve bāndhavā agre vrajantaḥ 'mā pra gāma' ityṛcaṃ japantaḥ /
analyzed: sarve bāndhavāḥ agre vrajantaḥ mā pra gāma iti ṛcam japantaḥ

original: 'apa naḥ śośucat' iti sūktadvayaṃ brahmā japati /
analyzed: apa naḥ śośucat iti sūkta dvayam brahmā japati

original: 'uduttamam' iti brāhmaṇāḥ sarve svayamavasiñcati snānaṃ kurvanti //
analyzed: ud uttamam iti brāhmaṇāḥ sarve svayam avasiñcati snānam kurvanti
payasvatīḥ oṣadhayaḥ iti ṛcā brāhmaṇāḥ sarve snānam kurvanti

original: tataḥ ekaviṃśā darbhapiñjūlīḥ nadyāṃ hrade vāvapati brahmā //
analyzed: tatas ekaviṃśāḥ darbha piñjūlīḥ nadyām hrade vā āvapati brahmā
abhyukṣya aśvāvatīm iti ṛcā nadīm tarataḥ unumantrayate

original: [nakṣatraṃ dṛṣṭvopatiṣṭhate nakṣatrāṇāṃ mā saṅkāśaśca pratīkāśaścāvatām iti // KauśS_11,3{82}.11 //]
analyzed: nakṣatram dṛṣṭvā upatiṣṭhate nakṣatrāṇām mā saṅkāśaḥ ca pratīkāśaḥ ca avatām iti

original: bahiḥ sthitvā nakṣatraṃ dṛṣṭvopatiṣṭhate 'nakṣatrāṇāṃ mā saṅkāśaśca' iti mantreṇa //
analyzed: bahis sthitvā nakṣatram dṛṣṭvā upatiṣṭhate nakṣatrāṇām mā saṅkāśaḥ ca iti mantreṇa
śāmyākīḥ samidhaḥ ādhāya agratas brahmā japati

original: yasya trayā gatamanuprayanti devā manuṣyāḥ paśavaśca sarve /
analyzed: yasya trayāḥ gatam anuprayanti devāḥ manuṣyāḥ paśavaḥ ca sarve

original: taṃ no devaṃ mano adhi bravītu sunītirno nayatu dviṣate mā radhāma iti śāntyudakenācamyābhyukṣya // KauśS_11,3{82}.13 //]
analyzed: tam naḥ devam manaḥ adhi bravītu su nītiḥ naḥ nayatu dviṣate mā radhāmaḥ iti śāntyudakena ācamya abhyukṣya

original: śāmyākīḥ samidha ādāya tataḥ sarve āgacchanti /
analyzed: śāmyākīḥ samidhaḥ ādāya tatas sarve āgacchanti

original: tato'gre brahmā bhūtvā 'yasya trayā gatam' iti mantraṃ japati /
analyzed: tatas ugre brahmā bhūtvā yasya trayāḥ gatam iti mantram japati
tatas śāntyudakena ācamanam kurvanti gṛha samīpe sarve

original: 'niḥsālām' iti śālāṃ samprokṣya kartā 'ūrjaṃ bibhrat' iti ṣaḍarcena bāndhavān gṛhe praveśayati //
analyzed: niḥsālām iti śālām samprokṣya kartā ūrjam bibhrat iti ṣaḍarcena bāndhavān gṛhe praveśayati
nadīm ālambhayati gām agnim aśmānam ca
yavaḥ asi yavaya asmadūdveṣaḥ yavaya arātim iti yavān
yavaḥ asi yavayaḥ iti mantreṇa yavān ālambhante sarve
khalvaka āsyaḥ iti khalvān khalakulān ca
khalvaka āsyaḥ iti mantreṇa khalvakān kulatthān ca ālabhante
vi devāḥ apa naḥ śośucat agham

original: iti sūktābhyāṃ śāmyākīḥ samidha ādadhāti kartā laukike vā ekāgnau vā /
analyzed: iti sūktābhyām śāmyākīḥ samidhaḥ ādadhāti kartā laukike vā eka agnau vā
yadi putrasya agniḥ tadā ekāgnau athavā laukike
yat yat kravyād gṛhyet yadi kravyādā na ante paredyus

original: divo nabhaḥ śukraṃ payo duhānā iṣamūrjaṃ pinvamānāḥ //
analyzed: divaḥ nabhaḥ śukram payaḥ duhānāḥ iṣam ūrjam pinvamānāḥ

original: apāṃ yonimapādhvaṃ svadhā yāścakṛṣe jīvaṃstāste santu madhuśrutaḥ ityagnau sthālīpākaṃ nipṛṇāti // KauśS_11,3{82}.21 //]
analyzed: apām yonim apādhvam svadhāḥ yāḥ cakṛṣe jīvan tāḥ te santu madhu śrutaḥ iti agnau sthālīpākam nipṛṇāti

original: 'divo namaḥ' ityṛcāgniṃ prajvālya sthālīpākaṃ sakṛt sarvahutaṃ karoti dahanasannidhau /
analyzed: divaḥ namaḥ iti ṛcā agnim prajvālya sthālīpākam sakṛt sarva hutam karoti dahana sannidhau

original: dahane vā sakṛt sarvahutaṃ karoti sthālīpākam //
analyzed: dahane vā sakṛt sarva hutam karoti sthālīpākam

original: [ādahane cāpivānyavatsāṃ dohayitvā tasyāḥ pṛṣṭhe juhoti vaiśvānare haviridaṃ juhomi (18.4.35) iti // KauśS_11,3{82}.22 //]
analyzed: ādahane ca apivānya vatsām dohayitvā tasyāḥ pṛṣṭhe juhoti vaiśvānare haviḥ idam juhomi iti

original: athavā anyavatsāṃ gāṃ dohayitvā tasyāḥ pṛṣṭhe juhoti 'vaiśvānare haviḥ' ityekayā //
analyzed: athavā anya vatsām gām dohayitvā tasyāḥ pṛṣṭhe juhoti vaiśvānare haviḥ iti ekayā

original: [ye agnayaḥ (3.21) iti pālāśyā darvyā manthamupamathya kāmpīlībhyāmupamanthanībhyāṃ tṛtīyasyāmasthīnyabhijuhoti // KauśS_11,3{82}.25 //]
analyzed: ye agnayaḥ iti pālāśyā darvyā mantham upamathya kāmpīlībhyām upamanthanībhyām tṛtīyasyām asthīni abhijuhoti

original: 'ye agnayaḥ' iti daśarcena sūktena pālāśyā darvyā manthaṃ saktumanthamupamathya kāmpīlībhyāmupamanthanībhyāṃ pratyṛcam asthīnyupari homaṃ kuryāt
analyzed: ye agnayaḥ iti daśarcena sūktena pālāśyā darvyā mantham saktu mantham upamathya kāmpīlībhyām upamanthanībhyām pratyṛcam asthīni upari homam kuryāt

original: kṣīrotsiktena brāhmaṇasyāvasiñcati madhūtsiktena kṣatriyasyodakena vaiśyasya // KauśS_11,3{82}.27 //]
analyzed: kṣīra utsiktena brāhmaṇasya avasiñcati madhu utsiktena kṣatriyasya udakena vaiśyasya

original: 'śaṃ te nīhāraḥ' ityekā etābhirṛgbhirmantroktānāmoṣadhīnāmudakaṃ kṣīraṃ caikatra kṛtvābhimantrya brāhmaṇasyāsthīni niṣiñcati /
analyzed: śam te nīhāraḥ iti ekā etābhiḥ ṛgbhiḥ mantra uktānām oṣadhīnām udakam kṣīram ca ekatra kṛtvā abhimantrya brāhmaṇasya asthīni niṣiñcati
madhūdakena kṣatriyasya tena eva mantreṇa mantra uktāḥ ca
udakena oṣadhi sahitena tena eva mantreṇa vaiśyasya
eka agneḥ ca āhitāgneḥ ca dahanam ava sṛja iti ṛcā anumantrayate
mā te manaḥ yat te aṅgam

original: atha piṇḍapradānaṃ sañcayanaśrāddhamekoddiṣṭaṃ ca kṛtvā tataḥ sañcayanaṃ karoti /
analyzed: atha piṇḍa pradānam sañcayana śrāddham ekoddiṣṭam ca kṛtvā tatas sañcayanam karoti

original: 'mā te manaḥ' ityṛcā 'yatte aṅgam' ityṛcā etābhyāmasthīnyabhimantrya kalaśe nidadhāti /
analyzed: mā te manaḥ iti ṛcā yat te aṅgam iti ṛcā etābhyām asthīni abhimantrya kalaśe nidadhāti
pālāśa patreṇa vā gṛhītvā pacchas pādataḥ
paścāt kalaśe samopya sarva surabhi cūrṇaiḥ avakīrya utthāpanībhiḥ utthāpya hariṇībhiḥ hareyuḥ

original: paścāt sarvauṣadhicūrṇāni ca kalaśe nidadhāti utthāpanībhiḥ kalaśamutthāpya hariṇībhirhareyuḥ /
analyzed: paścāt sarva oṣadhi cūrṇāni ca kalaśe nidadhāti utthāpanībhiḥ kalaśam utthāpya hariṇībhiḥ hareyuḥ
mā tvā vṛkṣaḥ iti ṛcā asthi kalaśam mūle nikhanati

original: iti bhūmau trirātramarasāśinaḥ karmāṇi kurvate // KauśS_11,3{82}.33 //]
analyzed: iti bhūmau tri rātram a rasa āśinaḥ karmāṇi kurvate

original: athavā 'syonāsmai bhava' ityṛcābhimantrya yadi bhūmau nikhanati tadānayā /
analyzed: athavā syonā asmai bhava iti ṛcā abhimantrya yadi bhūmau nikhanati tadā anayā

original: tathā ca māhakiḥ - 'āvasathyāgnihotṛkayoḥ samānaṃ sarvaṃ karma bhavati' /
analyzed: tathā ca māhakiḥ āvasathya agnihotṛkayoḥ samānam sarvam karma bhavati
caturthehani kecid yavīyaḥ prathamāni karmāṇi kauśs

original: 'dvāre upaviśya nimbapatrāṇi' ityādi śucirbhūtvā tataḥ karmādhikāraḥ /
analyzed: dvāre upaviśya nimba patrāṇi ityādi śuciḥ bhūtvā tatas karma adhikāraḥ

original: kecid yathāpaṭhitaṃ sūtraṃ tathā sarvameva kurvanti /
analyzed: kecid yathā paṭhitam sūtram tathā sarvam eva kurvanti

original: āvasathyāgniśeṣaṃ gṛhe dhārayitvā araṇirvā nidhāyāmāvāsyāyāṃ kravyācchamanaṃ kuryāt putro yadyāhitāgnirbhavati /
analyzed: āvasathya agni śeṣam gṛhe dhārayitvā araṇiḥ vā nidhāya amāvāsyāyām kravyācchamanam kuryāt putraḥ yadi āhitāgniḥ bhavati

original: atha gotriṇaḥ trirātramarasāśinaḥ karmāṇi nityanaimittikakāmyāni kurvanti //
analyzed: atha gotriṇaḥ tri rātram a rasa āśinaḥ karmāṇi nitya naimittika kāmyāni kurvanti
ūrdhvam tṛtīyasyāḥ vaivasvatam sthālīpākam śrapayitvā vivasvan naḥ

original: caturthe'hani asthisañcayanaṃ kṛtvā gṛhe āgatya tataḥ kartā vaivasvatadevatākaṃ sthālīpākaṃ śrapayitvājyabhāgāntaṃ kṛtvā 'vivasvānnaḥ' iti  #
analyzed: caturthehani asthisañcayanam kṛtvā gṛhe āgatya tatas kartā vaivasvata devatākam sthālīpākam śrapayitvā ājyabhāga antam kṛtvā vivasvān naḥ iti

original: śāntyudakaṃ kṛtvā hutaśeṣaṃ sthālīpākaṃ śāntyudakenopasicya 'vivasvānnaḥ' iti dvābhyāmabhimantrya prāśayati /
analyzed: śāntyudakam kṛtvā huta śeṣam sthālīpākam śāntyudakena upasicya vivasvān naḥ iti dvābhyām abhimantrya prāśayati

original: samānodakā gotriṇaḥ daśapuruṣāt saptapuruṣādvā yathā te samānodakāḥ //
analyzed: samāna udakāḥ gotriṇaḥ daśa puruṣāt sapta puruṣāt vā yathā te samāna udakāḥ

original: 'ā pra cyavethām' ityṛcā pretavahanavṛṣabhau abhimantrya gṛhṇāti kartā /
analyzed: ā pra cyavethām iti ṛcā preta vahana vṛṣabhau abhimantrya gṛhṇāti kartā
ā iyam agan iti daśa gavā avarārdhyā dakṣiṇā
ā iyam agan iti ṛcā dakṣiṇāḥ abhimantrya gṛhṇāti
sāyam prātar yajña upavītī bhūtvā karma kuryāt
iti ekā svasti naḥ astu abhayam naḥ

original: yamakāṇḍapaṭhane anteṣṭipitṛmedhakaraṇe etasmin prakaraṇe sarvatrāyaṃ svastyayanāni /
analyzed: yama kāṇḍa paṭhane anta iṣṭi pitṛ medha karaṇe etasmin prakaraṇe sarvatra ayam svastyayanāni

original: śatātṛṇṇasahasrātṛṇṇau ca pāśīmūṣaṃ sikatāḥ śaṅkhaṃ śālūkaṃ sarvasurabhiśamīcūrṇakṛtaṃ śāntavṛkṣasya nāvaṃ tripādakam // KauśS_11,4{83}.3 //]
analyzed: śata ātṛṇṇa sahasra ātṛṇṇau ca pāśīmūṣam sikatāḥ śaṅkham śālūkam sarva surabhi śamī cūrṇa kṛtam śānta vṛkṣasya nāvam tri pādakam

original: mṛṇmayaṃ śatacchidraṃ sahasracchidraṃ ca dvitīyaṃ mṛṇmaye dve kuryāt /
analyzed: mṛṇmayam śata chidram sahasra chidram ca dvitīyam mṛṇmaye dve kuryāt

original: [dve niḥśīyamāne nīlalohite sūtre savyarajjuṃ śāntavṛkṣasya caturaḥ śaṅkūṃścaturaḥ paridhīn vāraṇaṃ śāmīlamaudumbaraṃ pālāśaṃ vṛkṣasya śāntauṣadhīḥ
analyzed: dve niḥśīyamāne nīlalohite sūtre savya rajjum śānta vṛkṣasya caturaḥ śaṅkūn caturaḥ paridhīn vāraṇam śāmīlam audumbaram pālāśam vṛkṣasya śānta oṣadhīḥ

original: vāraṇaṃ śāmīlamaudumbaraṃ pālāśam eteṣāṃ vṛkṣāṇāṃ śaṅkvaḥ paridhayaśca /
analyzed: vāraṇam śāmīlam audumbaram pālāśam eteṣām vṛkṣāṇām śaṅkvaḥ paridhayaḥ ca
māghe nidadhyāt mā agham bhūt iti

original: amāvāsyāyāṃ nidaghyādamā hi pitaro bhavanti // KauśS_11,4{83}.8 //]
analyzed: amāvāsyāyām nidaghyāt amāḥ hi pitaraḥ bhavanti
tat yat samam sa mūlam a vidagdham pratiṣṭhitam prāc udak pravaṇam
yatra a kaṇṭakāḥ vṛkṣāḥ ca oṣadhayaḥ ca
yatra śānta vṛkṣāḥ oṣadhayaḥ ca tatra kuryāt

original: [tasyāḥ savyaṃ cāpaghanaṃ prapākaṃ ca nidhāya // KauśS_11,4{83}.14 //
analyzed: tasyāḥ savyam ca apaghanam prapākam ca nidhāya

original: tasyāḥ savyasakthijaghanaraktapittaudaramāṃsāni varjayitvā śeṣāṇi māṃsāni sthāpayitvā vaśāvidhānena /
analyzed: tasyāḥ savya sakthi jaghana raktapitta audara māṃsāni varjayitvā śeṣāṇi māṃsāni sthāpayitvā vaśā vidhānena

original: grāmamadhye maṇḍapaṃ kṛtvā tatraikāgneryāmasārasvatān homān hutvā araṇībhyāmagniṃ mathitvā /
analyzed: grāma madhye maṇḍapam kṛtvā tatra ekāgneḥ yāma sārasvatān homān hutvā araṇībhyām agnim mathitvā
kecid go māraṇa karma varjayanti tantram vā
samprokṣaṇībhyām kāmpīla śākhayā niveśana sthānam śodhayitvā apeta vīta

original: iti dvābhyāṃ śāntyudakaṃ kṛtvā niveśanaṃ samprokṣati //
analyzed: iti dvābhyām śāntyudakam kṛtvā niveśanam samprokṣati

original: [prāgdakṣiṇaṃ śākhāṃ pravidhya sīreṇa karṣayitvā śākhābhiḥ parivārya // KauśS_11,4{83}.18 //]
analyzed: prāc dakṣiṇam śākhām pravidhya sīreṇa karṣayitvā śākhābhiḥ parivārya

original: tataḥ sīreṇa karṣayitvā śākhābhiḥ parivārya veṣṭayitvā /
analyzed: tatas sīreṇa karṣayitvā śākhābhiḥ parivārya veṣṭayitvā
punar dehi iti vṛkṣa mūlāt ādatte
punar dehi vanaspate iti ṛcā vṛkṣa mūlāt ādatte
iti bhūmeḥ vasane samopya sarva surabhi cūrṇaiḥ avakīrya utthāpanībhiḥ utthāpya hariṇībhiḥ hareyuḥ
yadi bhūmau yat te kṛṣṇaḥ iti ṛcā bhūmeḥ ādatte

original: asthīni vasane samopya bandhanaṃ kṛtvā sarvasurabhicūrṇairavakīrya tato granthiṃ kṛtvā tata utthāpanībhirutthāpya hariṇībhirhareyuḥ /
analyzed: asthīni vasane samopya bandhanam kṛtvā sarva surabhi cūrṇaiḥ avakīrya tatas granthim kṛtvā tatas utthāpanībhiḥ utthāpya hariṇībhiḥ hareyuḥ
atha asthi nāśe prāyaścitta karma ucyate

original: asthināśe taddeśāt pāṃsuṃ gṛhītvā vasane samopya tata utthāpanībhirutthāpya hariṇībhirhareyuḥ /
analyzed: asthi nāśe tad deśāt pāṃsum gṛhītvā vasane samopya tatas utthāpanībhiḥ utthāpya hariṇībhiḥ hareyuḥ

original: [api vodakānte vasanamāstīrya asau iti hvayet // KauśS_11,4{83}.22 //]
analyzed: api vā udaka ante vasanam āstīrya asau iti hvayet
athavā udaka ante vasanam āstīrya asau iti vapet

original: tatra yo janturnipatet tamutthāpanībhirutthāpya hariṇībhirhareyuḥ // KauśS_11,4{83}.23 //
analyzed: tatra yaḥ jantuḥ nipatet tam utthāpanībhiḥ utthāpya hariṇībhiḥ hareyuḥ
api vā trīṇi ṣaṣṭiśatāni palāśa tsarūṇām

original: athavā trīṇi śatāni ṣaṣṭiśca pālāśatsarūṇāṃ taiḥ puruṣaṃ kalpayitvā tamutthāpanībhirutthāpya hariṇībhirhareyuḥ /
analyzed: athavā trīṇi śatāni ṣaṣṭiḥ ca pālāśa tsarūṇām taiḥ puruṣam kalpayitvā tam utthāpanībhiḥ utthāpya hariṇībhiḥ hareyuḥ
śarīra dagdha isthi nāśe ca etat prāyaścittam bhavati
samāptam deśa antara mṛta isthi nāśe ca
grāme dakṣiṇa udga dvāram vimitam darbhaiḥ āstārayati

original: grāmamadhye yo maṇḍapaḥ pūrvaṃ kṛtaḥ tasyottaradvāraṃ dakṣiṇadvāraṃ ca kuryāt /
analyzed: grāma madhye yaḥ maṇḍapaḥ pūrvam kṛtaḥ tasya uttara dvāram dakṣiṇa dvāram ca kuryāt
uttaram jīva sañcaraḥ dakṣiṇam pitṛ sañcaraḥ

original: tasmin maṇḍapa anastamita āditya idaṃ karma kuryāt /
analyzed: tasmin maṇḍape an astamite āditye idam karma kuryāt

original: 'ā yāta pitaraḥ' ityṛcāsthīni maṇḍape praveśayati dakṣiṇadvāre //
analyzed: ā yāta pitaraḥ iti ṛcā asthīni maṇḍape praveśayati dakṣiṇa dvāre

original: 'ācyā jānu' ityṛcā tripāde piṭake upaveśayati asthiputtalakam //
analyzed: ācyā jānu iti ṛcā tri pāde piṭake upaveśayati asthiputtalakam

original: [etadvaḥ pitaraḥ pātram iti trīṇyudakaṃsān ninayati // KauśS_11,4{83}.30 //]
analyzed: etat vaḥ pitaraḥ pātram iti trīṇi uda kaṃsān ninayati

original: 'etadvaḥ pitaraḥ pātram' iti mantreṇa trīnudakapūrṇān kaṃsapātrān asthyabhimukho ninayet /
analyzed: etat vaḥ pitaraḥ pātram iti mantreṇa trīn udaka pūrṇān kaṃsa pātrān asthi abhimukhaḥ ninayet
trīn snāta anuliptān brāhmaṇān madhumantham pāyayati

original: tasyā dakṣiṇamardhaṃ brāhmaṇān bhojayati savyaṃ pitṝn // KauśS_11,4{83}.35 //]
analyzed: tasyāḥ dakṣiṇam ardham brāhmaṇān bhojayati savyam pitṝn
brahmaṇe madhuparkam āhārayati kartā pūrvam go vikalpena

original: yadi gāṃ karoti tasyā dakṣiṇamardhaṃ brāhmaṇān bhojayati /
analyzed: yadi gām karoti tasyāḥ dakṣiṇam ardham brāhmaṇān bhojayati
vaśā vidhānena pitṛbhyaḥ svadhā iti pradhāna mantraḥ

original: [vaha vapāṃ jātavedaḥ pitṛbhyo yatraitān vettha nihitān parāke /
analyzed: vaha vapām jātavedaḥ pitṛbhyaḥ yatra etān vettha nihitān parāke

original: medasaḥ kulyā upa tān sravantu satyā eṣāmāśiṣaḥ santu kāmāḥ svāhā svadhā iti vapāyāstrirjuhoti // KauśS_11,5{84}.1 //]
analyzed: medasaḥ kulyāḥ upa tān sravantu satyāḥ eṣām āśiṣaḥ santu kāmāḥ svāhā svadhā iti vapāyāḥ tris juhoti
vaha vapām iti vapāyāḥ tris juhoti
imam yamaḥ iti ṛcā yamāya caturthīm

original: [ekaviṃśatyā yavaiḥ kṛśaraṃ randhayati yutamanyat prapākaṃ ca // KauśS_11,5{84}.3 //]
analyzed: ekaviṃśatyā yavaiḥ kṛśaram randhayati yutam anyat prapākam ca

original: tataḥ carudvayaṃ sayavamayavaṃ ca kartā śrapayati /
analyzed: tatas caru dvayam sa yavam ayavam ca kartā śrapayati
sa yavasya caroḥ sva gotra jāḥ bhojanam kurvanti
yathāśakti prapāka ādi a yava kṛsareṇa asthi samīpe piṇḍa dānam kurvanti
tad udgata ūṣma hartāraḥ dāsāḥ bhuñjate

original: [mahayata pitṝn iti riktakumbhaṃ vimitamadhye nidhāya taṃ jaradupānahāghnanti // KauśS_11,5{84}.9 //]
analyzed: mahayata pitṝn iti rikta kumbham vimita madhye nidhāya tam jarat upānahā āghnanti

original: riktakumbham asthyagre maṇḍapamadhye nidhāpayet sarve taṃ drutya jaradupānadbhyāmāghnanti saha kartā //
analyzed: rikta kumbham asthi agre maṇḍapa madhye nidhāpayet sarve tam drutya jarat upānadbhyām āghnanti saha kartā

original: iti triḥ prasavyaṃ prakīrṇakeśyaḥ pariyanti dakṣiṇānūrūnāghnānāḥ // KauśS_11,5{84}.10 //]
analyzed: iti tris prasavyam prakīrṇa keśyaḥ pariyanti dakṣiṇān ūrūn āghnānāḥ
kasye mṛjānāḥ iti ṛcā kartā mantram brūyāt
tris apasavyam parikīrṇa keśāḥ mukta keśāḥ iti arthaḥ

original: iti grāmamadhye maṇḍape caturdaśyāṃ rātryāmetat karma kartavyam //
analyzed: iti grāma madhye maṇḍape caturdaśyām rātryām etat karma kartavyam
tāni asthīni maṇḍapāt utthāpya utthāpanībhiḥ hariṇībhiḥ hareyuḥ
atha avasāya iti paścāt pūrva kṛtebhyaḥ pūrvāṇi pūrvebhyaḥ uparāṇi yavīyasām
paścāt pūrva kṛtebhyaḥ pitṛbhyaḥ cayanam kartavyam
prāc dakṣiṇām diśam abhi uttarām aparām diśam abhi tiṣṭhanti
śmaśānāni prāc dakṣiṇām diśam abhimukhāni ārabhyāṇi

original: [yathā citiṃ tathā śmaśānaṃ dakṣiṇāparāṃ diśamabhi pravaṇam // KauśS_11,5{84}.16 //]
analyzed: yathā citim tathā śmaśānam dakṣiṇa aparām diśam abhi pravaṇam

original: yathā citiṃ tathā śmaśāne dharmā bhavanti /
analyzed: yathā citim tathā śmaśāne dharmāḥ bhavanti
ati dhanvāni iti avasā kauśs iti uktam
dakṣiṇā pravaṇa deśe śma āśānāni kāryāṇi
diṣṭi kudiṣṭi vitasti nimuṣṭi aratni pada prakramāḥ

original: prādeśena dhanuṣā ca imāṃ mātrāṃ mimīmahe (18.2.38-44) iti // KauśS_11,6{85}.3 //]
analyzed: prādeśena dhanuṣā ca imām mātrām mimīmahe iti
khātasya diṣṭi kudiṣṭi vitasti nimuṣṭi aratni pada prakramāḥ prādeśena dhanuṣā vā

original: 'imāṃ mātrāṃ mimīmahe' iti saptabhirṛgbhiḥ pratidiśaṃ mīyamānamanumantrayate //
analyzed: imām mātrām mimīmahe iti saptabhiḥ ṛgbhiḥ pratidiśam mīyamānam anumantrayate

original: sapta dakṣiṇato mimīte saptottarataḥ pañca purastāt trīṇi paścāt // KauśS_11,6{85}.4 //
analyzed: sapta dakṣiṇatas mimīte sapta uttaratas pañca purastāt trīṇi paścāt

original: nava dakṣiṇato mimīte navottarataḥ sapta purastāt pañca paścāt // KauśS_11,6{85}.5 //
analyzed: nava dakṣiṇatas mimīte nava uttaratas sapta purastāt pañca paścāt

original: ekādaśa dakṣiṇato mimīta ekādaśottarato nava purastāt sapta paścāt // KauśS_11,6{85}.6 //
analyzed: ekādaśa dakṣiṇatas mimīte ekādaśa uttaratas nava purastāt sapta paścāt
ayugma mānāni parimaṇḍalāni caturasrāṇi vā śaunakinām

original: parimaṇḍalāni vartulāni caturasrāṇi vā śmaśānāni kāryāṇi vikalpena śaunakinām //
analyzed: parimaṇḍalāni vartulāni caturasrāṇi vā śmaśānāni kāryāṇi vikalpena śaunakinām
yāvān puruṣaḥ ūrdhva bāhuḥ tāvān agniḥ citaḥ
yāvān puruṣaḥ ūrdhva bāhuḥ tāvān agni citaḥ ūrdhvacayanam
dvi puruṣam vai ūrdhva bāhuḥ kuryāt
savyāni dakṣiṇā dvārāṇi ayugma śilāni ayugma iṣṭikāni ca

original: vārayatāmagham iti vāraṇaṃ paridhiṃ paridadhāti śaṅkuṃ ca nicṛtati // KauśS_11,6{85}.13 //]
analyzed: vārayatām agham iti vāraṇam paridhim paridadhāti śaṅkum ca nicṛtati

original: tasmin bhūmau 'imāṃ mātrāṃ mimīmahe' iti saptabhirdakṣiṇataḥ savyarajjuṃ mītvā 'vārayatāmagham' iti mantreṇa vāraṇaṃ paridhiṃ paridadhāti /
analyzed: tasmin bhūmau imām mātrām mimīmahe iti saptabhiḥ dakṣiṇatas savya rajjum mītvā vārayatām agham iti mantreṇa vāraṇam paridhim paridadhāti

original: [purastānmītvā śamebhyo'stvagham iti śāmīlaṃ paridhiṃ paridadhāti śaṅkuṃ ca nicṛtati // KauśS_11,6{85}.14 //
analyzed: purastāt mītvā śamebhyaḥ tu agham iti śāmīlam paridhim paridadhāti śaṅkum ca nicṛtati

original: uttarato mītvā śāmyatvagham ityaudumbaraṃ paridhiṃ paridadhāti śaṅkuṃ ca nicṛtati // KauśS_11,6{85}.15 //
analyzed: uttaratas mītvā śāmyatu agham iti audumbaram paridhim paridadhāti śaṅkum ca nicṛtati

original: paścānmītvā śāntamagham iti pālāśaṃ paridhiṃ paridadhāti śaṅkuṃ ca nicṛtati // KauśS_11,6{85}.16 //]
analyzed: paścāt mītvā śāntam agham iti pālāśam paridhim paridadhāti śaṅkum ca nicṛtati
śamebhyaḥ tu agham iti śāmīlam purastāt
tatas amāsi mātrām iti tisṛbhiḥ śmaśānam anumantrayate

original: iti madhye gartaṃ khātvā pāśisikatoṣodumbaraśaṅkhaśālūkasarvasurabhiśamīcūrṇāni nivapati // KauśS_11,6{85}.19 //]
analyzed: iti madhye gartam khātvā pāśi sikatā ūṣa udumbara śaṅkha śālūka sarva surabhi śamī cūrṇāni nivapati

original: tataḥ tasmin śmaśāne'kṣṇayā lohitasūtreṇa nibadhya 'stuhi śrutam' iti gartaṃ khanati /
analyzed: tatas tasmin śmaśāna īkṣṇayā lohita sūtreṇa nibadhya stuhi śrutam iti gartam khanati
tad garte pāśi sikatā ākhu kira śaṅkha śālūka udumbara sarva surabhi śamī cūrṇāni nivapati

original: 'niḥśīyatāmagham' iti mantreṇa niḥśīyamānaṃ jīrṇavastraṃ garte stṛṇāti //
analyzed: niḥśīyatām agham iti mantreṇa niḥśīyamānam jīrṇa vastram garte stṛṇāti

original: [vi lumpatāmagham iti paricailaṃ dūrśaṃ vilumpati // KauśS_11,6{85}.22 //]
analyzed: vi lumpatām agham iti paricailam dūrśam vilumpati

original: 'vi lumpatāmagham' iti mantreṇa dvitīyaṃ paricailaṃ tatraiva bahirdhārayati /
analyzed: vi lumpatām agham iti mantreṇa dvitīyam paricailam tatra eva bahis dhārayati

original: dhārayitvā agre karma bhaviṣyati tena vastreṇa //
analyzed: dhārayitvā agre karma bhaviṣyati tena vastreṇa

original: ukto homo dakṣiṇata staraṇaṃ ca // KauśS_11,6{85}.23 //
'etadā roha' 'dadāmyasmai' iti dvābhyāṃ kaniṣṭhaputraḥ tasmin garte asthīni nivapati nidadhāti /
analyzed: etadā roha dadāmi asmai iti dvābhyām kaniṣṭha putraḥ tasmin garte asthīni nivapati nidadhāti

original: 'edaṃ barhiḥ' ityṛcā kule jyeṣṭho'sthīni yathāparu sañcinoti /
analyzed: ā idam barhiḥ iti ṛcā kule jyeṣṭha usthīni yathāparu sañcinoti
mā te manaḥ yat te aṅgam

original: 'mā te manaḥ' 'yatte aṅgam' 'indro mā marutvān' iti 'udapūḥ' ityātaḥ etābhiranumantrayate //
analyzed: mā te manaḥ yat te aṅgam indraḥ mā marutvān iti udapūḥ iti ā atas etābhiḥ anumantrayate
iti ekāḥ etāḥ te asau dhenavaḥ
iti ekā yāḥ te dhānāḥ anu
iti ekā etābhiḥ tila miśrāḥ dhānāḥ tasmin asthiṣu upari ādadhāti

original: 'idaṃ kasāmbu' ityṛcā tānyasthīni gartasthitāni sarve gotriṇaḥ avekṣante /
analyzed: idam kasāmbu iti ṛcā tāni asthīni garta sthitāni sarve gotriṇaḥ avekṣante

original: [ye ca jīvāḥ (18.4.57) ye te pūrve parāgatāḥ (18.3.72)
analyzed: ye ca jīvāḥ ye te pūrve parāgatāḥ

original: iti sarpirmadhubhyāṃ caruṃ pūrayitvā śīrṣadeśe nidadhāti // KauśS_11,7{86}.2 //]
analyzed: iti sarpiḥ madhubhyām carum pūrayitvā śīrṣa deśe nidadhāti

original: 'ye te pūrve parāgatāḥ' ityekā iti dvābhyāṃ dvau carū sarpirmadhubhyāṃ pūrayitvābhimantrya śīrṣadeśe nidadhāti asthisamīpe //
analyzed: ye te pūrve parāgatāḥ iti ekā iti dvābhyām dvau carū sarpiḥ madhubhyām pūrayitvā abhimantrya śīrṣa deśe nidadhāti asthi samīpe
apūpavān iti mantra uktam dikṣu aṣṭama deśeṣu nidadhati

original: 'apūpavān' iti navabhirṛgbhiḥ paścimadiśi prabhṛti aṣṭau caravaḥ /
analyzed: apūpavān iti navabhiḥ ṛgbhiḥ paścima diśi prabhṛti aṣṭau caravaḥ

original: pratimantraṃ kṣīrādipūrṇāḥ mantroktā apūpāpidhānāḥ sarve kartavyāḥ /
analyzed: pratimantram kṣīra ādi pūrṇāḥ mantra uktāḥ apūpa apidhānāḥ sarve kartavyāḥ

original: 'śatadhāram' iti dve etābhiḥ śatacchidre sahasracchidre carupātramadhye nidhāyopari tata udakamabhimantrya tenodakenāplāvayatyasthīni //
analyzed: śatadhāram iti dve etābhiḥ śata chidre sahasra chidre caru pātra madhye nidhāya upari tatas udakam abhimantrya tena udakena āplāvayati asthīni
parṇaḥ rājā iti madhyama palāśaiḥ abhinidadhāti

original: 'parṇo rājā' ityṛcā madhyamapalāśapatraiḥ śatacchidrasahasracchidrādi caravaśca sarvam ācchādayanti /
analyzed: parṇaḥ rājā iti ṛcā madhyama palāśa patraiḥ śata chidra sahasra chidra ādi caravaḥ ca sarvam ācchādayanti
ūrjaḥ bhāgaḥ iti ṛcā aśmabhiḥ pāṣāṇaiḥ vā iṣṭakābhiḥ vā ācchādayati

original: 'utte stabhnāmi' ityṛcā loṣṭena ca carumasthīni ca pūrayati nidhānakrameṇa //
analyzed: utte stabhnāmi iti ṛcā loṣṭena ca carum asthīni ca pūrayati nidhāna krameṇa
niḥśīyatām agham iti niḥśīyamānena avachādya darbhaiḥ avastīrya
niḥśīyatām agham iti mantreṇa jīrṇa vastram ācchādayati
darbhaiḥ avastīrya śmaśānam asthi upari dvitīyam vastram stṛṇāti

original: 'asau hā iha te' iti dve etābhirṛgbhiḥ śmaśānaṃ pitṛgṛhaṃ śilābhirviṣamābhiḥ iṣṭakābhirvā prasavyaṃ cinvanti /
analyzed: asau hā iha te iti dve etābhiḥ ṛgbhiḥ śmaśānam pitṛgṛham śilābhiḥ viṣamābhiḥ iṣṭakābhiḥ vā prasavyam cinvanti
yathā yamāya iti ṛcā śmaśānam ghnanti kuṭayanti
śṛṇātu agham iti upari śara stambam ādadhāti
śṛṇātu agham iti mantreṇa śmaśāna upari śara stambam ādadhāti

original: [akalmāṣāṇāṃ kāṇḍānāmaṣṭāṅgulīṃ tejanīm antarhitamagham iti grāmadeśāducchrayati // KauśS_11,7{86}.14 //]
analyzed: a kalmāṣāṇām kāṇḍānām aṣṭa aṅgulīm tejanīm antarhitam agham iti grāma deśāt ucchrayati

original: 'antarhitamagham' iti mantreṇa kalmāṣāṇāṃ kāṣṭhānāmaṣṭāṅgulāṃ kaṭikāmabhimantrya grāmaśmaśānayorantardhānaṃ karoti //
analyzed: antarhitam agham iti mantreṇa kalmāṣāṇām kāṣṭhānām aṣṭa aṅgulām kaṭikām abhimantrya grāma śmaśānayoḥ antardhānam karoti

original: kuśena prasavyaṃ triḥ pariṣicya kumbhān bhindanti /
analyzed: kuśena prasavyam tris pariṣicya kumbhān bhindanti
sametaḥ iti aparasyām śmaśāna sraktyām dhuvanāni upayacchante

original: 'sameta viśve' ityanayā ṛcā sarve bāndhavāḥ aparasyāṃ śmaśānasraktyāṃ dhuvanānyupayacchanti /
analyzed: sameta viśve iti anayā ṛcā sarve bāndhavāḥ aparasyām śmaśāna sraktyām dhuvanāni upayacchanti

original: 'triḥ prasavyaṃ parikīrṇakeśāḥ pariyanti dakṣiṇānūrūnādhnānāḥ' iti dhuvanāni sarve bāndhavāḥ kurvanti //
analyzed: tris prasavyam parikīrṇa keśāḥ pariyanti dakṣiṇān ūrūn ādhnānāḥ iti dhuvanāni sarve bāndhavāḥ kurvanti

original: tataḥ 'varcasā mām' iti dve 'vivasvānaḥ' ityādi 'indra kratuṃ naḥ' ityantam etaiḥ paścāt sthita upatiṣṭhante kartā gotriṇaśca //
analyzed: tatas varcasā mām iti dve vivasvānaḥ ityādi indra kratum naḥ ityantam etaiḥ paścāt sthitaḥ upatiṣṭhante kartā gotriṇaḥ ca

original: 'samindhate amartyam' iti dvābhyāmṛgbhyāṃ grāmamadhye yanmaṇḍapaṃ kṛtaṃ tat ānīya śmaśānapaścāddeśe prajvālayati dahati /
analyzed: samindhate amartyam iti dvābhyām ṛgbhyām grāma madhye yat maṇḍapam kṛtam tat ānīya śmaśāna paścāt deśe prajvālayati dahati

original: saṅkasukaśabdena yāmasārasvatān hutvā uttaraṃ jīvaśarade dakṣiṇaṃ yajjunaṃ tat saṅkasukaśabdenocyate /
analyzed: saṅkasuka śabdena yāmasārasvatān hutvā uttaram jīvaśarade dakṣiṇam yat junam tat saṅkasuka śabdena ucyate

original: putro vā gotriṇo vā idaṃ karma kārayati svargamicchatā //
analyzed: putraḥ vā gotriṇaḥ vai idam karma kārayati svargam icchatā

original: triḥ sapta (12.2.29) iti kūdyā padāni yopayitvā śmaśānāt // KauśS_11,7{86}.22 //
analyzed: tris sapta iti kūdyā padāni yopayitvā śmaśānāt
sapta nadī rūpāṇi kārayitvā udakena pūrayitvā
iti sa hiraṇyām sa yavām nāvam ārohayati

original: uttarato gartaḥ iti kravyācchamanaṃ ca kṛtvā /
analyzed: uttaratas gartaḥ iti kravyācchamanam ca kṛtvā
tatas yavīyaḥ prathamāni karmāṇi prāc mukhānām yajña upavītinām dakṣiṇa āvṛtām kauśs

original: athaiṣāṃ sapta śarkarāḥ pāṇiṣvāvapati ityādi sarvaṃ kuryāt /
analyzed: atha eṣām sapta śarkarāḥ pāṇiṣu āvapati ityādi sarvam kuryāt
iti evam antam sarvam kurvanti gotriṇaḥ
vṛṣabha dvayam daśa gavā avarārdhyā ācārya dakṣiṇā
dvādaśa rātram kartā yamavrata antam kauśs

original: prāpya gṛhān samāna ekaḥ piṇḍapitṛyajñaḥ kāryaḥ sarveṣāṃ gotriṇāṃ vidhānena /
analyzed: prāpya gṛhān samānaḥ ekaḥ piṇḍapitṛyajñaḥ kāryaḥ sarveṣām gotriṇām vidhānena
tatas sa amāvāsyāyām nidhānam amāvāsyāyām kravyād śamanam kuryāt iti
ekāgni āhitāgnyoḥ ubhayoḥ pitṛ medhaḥ adhikāraḥ
anta iṣṭiḥ pātra cayanam deśa antara vidhānam pitṛ medhaḥ ca

original: iti japitvā 'mitrāvaruṇā pari māmadhātām' ityṛcā pāṇī prakṣālayate //
analyzed: iti japitvā mitrāvaruṇā pari māmadhātām iti ṛcā pāṇī prakṣālayate
punar savyena ācamanāt apasavyam kṛtvā praiṣa kṛtam samādiśati
tatas tūṣṇīm punar savyena ācamanam karoti

original: tataḥ pitryupavītī bhūtvā vakṣyamāṇaṃ karma karoti /
analyzed: tatas pitryupavītī bhūtvā vakṣyamāṇam karma karoti

original: [ulūkhalamusalaṃ śūrpaṃ caruṃ kaṃsaṃ prakṣālya barhirudakumbhamāhara iti // KauśS_11,8{87}.6 //]
analyzed: ulūkhala musalam śūrpam carum kaṃsam prakṣālya barhiḥ uda kumbham āhara iti

original: ulūkhalamusalaṃ śūrpaṃ caruṃ kāṃsyapātramudakumbhaṃ darbhān vrīhīn samidhaḥ nekṣaṇādikamāhareti //
analyzed: ulūkhala musalam śūrpam carum kāṃsya pātram uda kumbham darbhān vrīhīn samidhaḥ nekṣaṇa ādikam āhara iti

original: [yajñopavītī dakṣiṇapūrvamantardeśamabhimukhaḥ śūrpa ekapavitrāntarhitān haviṣyān nirvapati // KauśS_11,8{87}.7 //
analyzed: yajña upavītī dakṣiṇa pūrvam antardeśam abhimukhaḥ śūrpe eka pavitra antarhitān haviṣyān nirvapati

original: idamagnaye kavyavāhanāya svadhā pitṛbhyaḥ pṛthiviṣadbhyaḥ iti idaṃ somāya pitṛmate
analyzed: idam agnaye kavyavāhanāya svadhā pitṛbhyaḥ pṛthiviṣadbhyaḥ iti idam somāya pitṛmate

original: svadhā pitṛbhyaḥ somavadbhyaḥ pitṛbhyaḥ vā antarikṣasadbhyaḥ iti idaṃ yamāya pitṛmate
analyzed: svadhā pitṛbhyaḥ somavadbhyaḥ pitṛbhyaḥ vā antarikṣa sadbhyaḥ iti idam yamāya pitṛmate

original: svadhā pitṛbhyaśca diviṣadbhyaḥ iti trīnavācīnakāśīn nirvapati // KauśS_11,8{87}.8 //]
analyzed: svadhā pitṛbhyaḥ ca diviṣadbhyaḥ iti trīn avācīna kāśīn nirvapati

original: tataḥ yajñopavītī dakṣiṇapūrvamantardeśamabhimukhaḥ śūrpa ekapavitraṃ nidhāya tato nirvapati taṇḍulamuṣṭim /
analyzed: tatas yajña upavītī dakṣiṇa pūrvam antardeśam abhimukhaḥ śūrpe eka pavitram nidhāya tatas nirvapati taṇḍula muṣṭim
idam agnaye kavyavāhanāya iti etaiḥ mantraiḥ trīn adhas muṣṭīn nirvapati

original: tataḥ pitryupavītī 'idamagnaye kavyavāhanāya' iti triḥ samprokṣaṇam //
analyzed: tatas pitryupavītī idam agnaye kavyavāhanāya iti tris samprokṣaṇam

original: [ulūkhala opya triravahanti idaṃ vaḥ pitaro haviḥ iti // KauśS_11,8{87}.9 //
analyzed: ulūkhale opya tris avahanti idam vaḥ pitaraḥ haviḥ iti

original: tata ulūkhala opya triravahanti 'idaṃ vaḥ pitaro haviḥ' iti mantreṇa /
analyzed: tatas ulūkhale opya tris avahanti idam vaḥ pitaraḥ haviḥ iti mantreṇa

original: [praiṣakṛtaṃ samādiśati caruṃ prakṣālayādhiśrayāpa opya taṇḍulānāvapasva nekṣaṇena yodhayannāsva mā śiro grahīḥ // KauśS_11,8{87}.12 //]
analyzed: praiṣa kṛtam samādiśati carum prakṣālaya adhiśraya apaḥ opya taṇḍulān āvapasva nekṣaṇena yodhayan āsva mā śiraḥ grahīḥ
bāhyena upaniṣkramya yajña upavītī dakṣiṇa pūrvam antardeśam abhimukhaḥ udīratām

original: iti karṣūṃ khanati prādeśamātrīṃ tiryagaṅgurim // KauśS_11,8{87}.14 //]
analyzed: iti karṣūm khanati prādeśa mātrīm tiryak aṅgurim

original: agniśālāyā bāhyenopaniṣkramya yajñopavītī bhūtvā dakṣiṇapūrvamantardeśābhimukha 'udīratām' ityṛcā karṣūṃ khanati prādeśamātrīṃ tiryagaṅgurim
analyzed: agniśālāyāḥ bāhyena upaniṣkramya yajña upavītī bhūtvā dakṣiṇa pūrvam antardeśa abhimukhaḥ udīratām iti ṛcā karṣūm khanati prādeśa mātrīm tiryak aṅgurim
avāc aṅgurim parva mātrīm iti eke

original: [apahatā asurā rakṣāṃsi ye pitṛṣadaḥ iti prāgdakṣiṇaṃ pāṃsūnudūhati // KauśS_11,8{87}.16 //]
analyzed: apahatāḥ asurāḥ rakṣāṃsi ye pitṛṣadaḥ iti prāc dakṣiṇam pāṃsūn udūhati

original: 'apahatā asurā rakṣāṃsi ye pitṛṣadaḥ' iti yajuṣā prāgdakṣiṇaṃ pāṃsūn udūhati //
analyzed: apahatāḥ asurāḥ rakṣāṃsi ye pitṛṣadaḥ iti yajuṣā prāc dakṣiṇam pāṃsūn udūhati

original: [karṣūṃ ca pāṇī ca prakṣālya etad vaḥ pitaraḥ pātram iti karṣūm udakena pūrayitvā // KauśS_11,8{87}.17 //]
analyzed: karṣūm ca pāṇī ca prakṣālya etat vaḥ pitaraḥ pātram iti karṣūm udakena pūrayitvā

original: karṣūṃ ca pāṇī ca prakṣālya tato nirvāpapavitraṃ gṛhītvā kāṃsyodakapātraṃ kalpayitvā karṣūmadhye ninayati 'etad vaḥ pitaraḥ pātram' iti mantreṇa
analyzed: karṣūm ca pāṇī ca prakṣālya tatas nirvāpa pavitram gṛhītvā kāṃsya udaka pātram kalpayitvā karṣū madhye ninayati etat vaḥ pitaraḥ pātram iti mantreṇa

original: [antarupātītya mastunā navanītena vā pratinīya dakṣiṇāñcamudvāsya // KauśS_11,8{87}.18 //]
analyzed: antar upātītya mastunā navanītena vā pratinīya dakṣiṇāñcam udvāsya

original: tato madhye praviśya mastunā navanītena vā pratinīya carau prakṣipet /
analyzed: tatas madhye praviśya mastunā navanītena vā pratinīya carau prakṣipet
dve kāṣṭhe gṛhītvā uśantaḥ iti dvābhyām ṛgbhyām ādīpayati

original: ekaṃ dīptakāṣṭhaṃ gṛhītvā 'ihaivaidhi' ityṛcā pāṃsūpari nidadhāti //
analyzed: ekam dīpta kāṣṭham gṛhītvā iha eva edhi iti ṛcā pāṃsu upari nidadhāti

original: ye tātṛṣuḥ, ye satyāsaḥ (18.3.47-48) iti // KauśS_11,8{87}.22 //]

analyzed: ye nikhātāḥ iti dve samindhate iti ekā

original: 'ye satyāsaḥ' ityekā etaiḥ pañcabhiḥ pañca samidha ādadhāti / tataḥ //
analyzed: ye satyāsaḥ iti ekā etaiḥ pañcabhiḥ pañca samidhaḥ ādadhāti tatas

original: [paryukṣaṇīṃ barhirudakumbhaṃ kaṃsaṃ darvimājyamāyavanaṃ caruṃ vāsāṃsyāñjanamabhyañjanamiti // KauśS_11,8{87}.24 //]
analyzed: paryukṣaṇīm barhiḥ uda kumbham kaṃsam darvim ājyam āyavanam carum vāsāṃsi āñjanam abhyañjanam iti
paryukṣaṇīm barhiḥ uda kumbham kāṃsya bhājanam
yat atra upasamāhāryam bhavati tat upasamāhṛtya

original: ato yajñopavītī pitryupavītī barhirgṛhītvā vicṛtya sannahanaṃ dakṣiṇāparamaṣṭamadeśamabhyavāsyet // KauśS_11,8{87}.26 //]
analyzed: atas yajña upavītī pitryupavītī barhiḥ gṛhītvā vicṛtya sannahanam dakṣiṇa aparam aṣṭama deśam abhyavāsyet

original: tataḥ pitryupavītī sakṛdācchinnaṃ barhirgṛhītvā vicṛtya sannahanaṃ dakṣiṇāparadeśe nirasyati tūṣṇīm //
analyzed: tatas pitryupavītī sakṛdācchinnam barhiḥ gṛhītvā vicṛtya sannahanam dakṣiṇa apara deśe nirasyati tūṣṇīm
barhiḥ udakena samprokṣya barhiṣadaḥ pitaraḥ iti ṛcā
upahūtāḥ naḥ pitaraḥ iti ṛcā agniṣvāttāḥ pitaraḥ iti ekā
ye naḥ pituḥ pitaraḥ iti ekā
ye smākam pitaraḥ iti arddharcaḥ etābhiḥ barhiḥ stṛṇāti
udīratām iti tisṛbhiḥ uda pātrāṇi anvṛcam ninayet
udīratām iti tisṛbhiḥ uda pātrāṇi ekaikayā ṛcā barhiṣi ninayati
atas pitryupavītī yajña upavītī ye dasyavaḥ

original: ityubhayata ādīptamulmukaṃ triḥ prasavyaṃ parihṛtya nirasyati // KauśS_11,8{87}.30 //
analyzed: iti ubhayatas ādīptam ulmukam tris prasavyam parihṛtya nirasyati

original: tato yajñopavītī 'ye dasyavaḥ' ityubhayata ādīptamulmukaṃ parihṛtya nirasyati /
analyzed: tatas yajña upavītī ye dasyavaḥ iti ubhayatas ādīptam ulmukam parihṛtya nirasyati

original: [ye rūpāṇi pratimuñcamānā asurāḥ santaḥ svadhayā caranti /
analyzed: ye rūpāṇi pratimuñcamānāḥ asurāḥ santaḥ svadhayā caranti

original: tva tānagne apa sedha dūrān satyā naḥ pitṝṇāṃ santvāśiṣaḥ svāhā svadhā iti hutvā kumbhīpākamabhighārayati // KauśS_11,9{88}.1 //]
analyzed: tva tān agne apa sedha dūrān satyāḥ naḥ pitṝṇām santu āśiṣaḥ svāhā svadhā iti hutvā kumbhīpākam abhighārayati
ye rūpāṇi iti ṛcā ājyam sruveṇa juhoti

original: tataḥ 'agnaye kavyavāhanāya svadhā pitṛbhyaḥ' iti caruṃ juhoti //
analyzed: tatas agnaye kavyavāhanāya svadhā pitṛbhyaḥ iti carum juhoti

original: [yamāya pitṛmate svadhā pitṛbhyaḥ iti tṛtīyām // KauśS_11,9{88}.4 //]
analyzed: yamāya pitṛmate svadhā pitṛbhyaḥ iti tṛtīyām
yat vaḥ agniḥ iti sa āyavanān taṇḍulān juhoti
sam barhiḥ iti sa darbhān taṇḍulān paryukṣya
sam barhiḥ iti ṛcā sa darbhān taṇḍulān juhoti
atas yajña upavītī pitryupavītī darvyā uddharati

original: [dyaurdarvirakṣitāparimitānupadastā sā yathā dyaurdarvirakṣitāparimitānupadastaivā pratatāmahasyeyaṃ darvirakṣitāparimitānupadastā // KauśS_11,9{88}.8
analyzed: dyauḥ darvī rakṣitā a parimitā an upadastā sā yathā dyauḥ darvī rakṣitā a parimitā an upadastā eva pratatāmahasya iyam darvī rakṣitā a parimitā an upadastā

original: antarikṣaṃ darvirakṣitāparimitānupadastā sā yathāntarikṣaṃ darvirakṣitāparimitānupadastaivā tatāmahasyeyaṃ darvirakṣitāparimitānupadastā //
analyzed: antarikṣam darvi rakṣitā a parimitā an upadastā sā yathā antarikṣam darvi rakṣitā a parimitā an upadastā eva tatāmahasya iyam darvi rakṣitā a parimitā an upadastā

original: pṛthivī darvirakṣitāparimitānupadastā sā yathā pṛthivī darvirakṣitāparimitānupadastaivā tatasyeyaṃ darvirakṣitāparimitānupadastā iti // KauśS_11,9{88}.10
analyzed: pṛthivī darvi rakṣitā a parimitā an upadastā sā yathā pṛthivī darvi rakṣitā a parimitā an upadastā eva tatasya iyam darvi rakṣitā a parimitā an upadastā iti
dyauḥ darvī akṣitā aparimitāḥ iti tribhiḥ

original: [uddhṛtyājyena sannīya trīn piṇḍān saṃhatān nidadhāti etatte pratatāmaha (18.4.75-77) iti // KauśS_11,9{88}.11 //]
analyzed: uddhṛtya ājyena sannīya trīn piṇḍān saṃhatān nidadhāti etat te pratatāmahe iti

original: tataḥ uddhṛtyājyena sannīya 'etatte pratatāmaha' iti tribhirṛgbhiḥ trīn piṇḍān saṃhitān nidadhāti barhiṣi //
analyzed: tatas uddhṛtya ājyena sannīya etat te pratatāmahe iti tribhiḥ ṛgbhiḥ trīn piṇḍān saṃhitān nidadhāti barhiṣi

original: dakṣiṇataḥ patnībhyaḥ idaṃ vaḥ patnyaḥ iti // KauśS_11,9{88}.12 //
analyzed: dakṣiṇatas patnībhyaḥ idam vaḥ patnyaḥ iti

original: [idamāśaṃsūnāmidamāśaṃsamānānāṃ strīṇāṃ puṃsāṃ prakīrṇāvaśīrṇānāṃ yeṣāṃ vayaṃ dātāro ye cāsmākamupajīvanti /
analyzed: idam āśaṃsūnām idam āśaṃsamānānām strīṇām puṃsām prakīrṇa avaśīrṇānām yeṣām vayam dātāraḥ ye ca asmākam upajīvanti

original: tebhyaḥ sarvebhyaḥ sapatnīkebhyaḥ svadhāvadakṣayyamastu iti triḥ prasavyaṃ taṇḍulaiḥ parikirati // KauśS_11,9{88}.13 //]
analyzed: tebhyaḥ sarvebhyaḥ sa patnīkebhyaḥ svadhāvat akṣayyam astu iti tris prasavyam taṇḍulaiḥ parikirati
idam āśaṃsūnām iti tris prasavyam taṇḍulaiḥ parikirati

original: [piñjūlīrāñjanaṃ sarpiṣi paryasya aṅdhvaṃ pitaraḥ iti nyasyati // KauśS_11,9{88}.14 //]
analyzed: piñjūlīrāñjanam sarpiṣi paryasya aṅdhvam pitaraḥ iti nyasyati

original: 'aṅdhvaṃ pitaraḥ' iti mantreṇa piñjūlīrāñjanaṃ ghṛtāktaṃ kṛtvā piṇḍeṣu nidadhāti //
analyzed: aṅdhvam pitaraḥ iti mantreṇa piñjūlīḥ āñjanam ghṛta aktam kṛtvā piṇḍeṣu nidadhāti

original: [vaddhvaṃ pitaro mā vo'to'nyat pitaro yoyuvata iti sūtrāṇi // KauśS_11,9{88}.15 //]
analyzed: pitaraḥ mā vā uta unyat pitaraḥ yoyuvate iti sūtrāṇi
añjate vyañjate iti ṛcā ghṛtena abhighārayati
ājyena avichinnam piṇḍān abhighārayati ye ca jīvāḥ

original: , ye te pūrve parāgatāḥ (18.3.72) iti // KauśS_11,9{88}.17 //]

analyzed: ye ca jīvāḥ iti ghṛtena abhighārayati piṇḍān

original: 'ye te pūrve parāgatāḥ' ityṛcā piṇḍopari dhārāṃ ninayati //
analyzed: ye te pūrve parāgatāḥ iti ṛcā piṇḍa upari dhārām ninayati

original: [atra pitaro mādayadhvaṃ yathābhāgaṃ yathālokamāvṛṣāyadhvam iti // KauśS_11,9{88}.18 //]
analyzed: atra pitaraḥ mādayadhvam yathābhāgam yathālokam āvṛṣāyadhvam iti

original: [atra patnyo mādayadhvaṃ yathābhāgaṃ yathālokamāvṛṣāyadhvam iti // KauśS_11,9{88}.19 //]
analyzed: atra patnyaḥ mādayadhvam yathābhāgam yathālokam āvṛṣāyadhvam iti
atra patnyaḥ iti patnī piṇḍe japati
yaḥ asau antaragniḥ bhavati tam pradakṣiṇam avekṣya tisraḥ tāmīḥ tāmyati

original: yo'sāvantaragnirbhavati taṃ pradakṣiṇamavekṣya trīn prāṇāyāmān kuryāt //
analyzed: yaḥ asau antaragniḥ bhavati tam pradakṣiṇam avekṣya trīn prāṇāyāmān kuryāt

original: [pratiparyāvṛtya amīmadanta pitaro yathābhāgaṃ yathālokamāvṛṣāyiṣata iti // KauśS_11,9{88}.21 //
analyzed: pratiparyāvṛtya amīmadanta pitaraḥ yathābhāgam yathālokam āvṛṣāyiṣata iti

original: amīmadanta patnyo yathābhāgaṃ yathālokamāvṛṣāyiṣata iti // KauśS_11,9{88}.22 //]
analyzed: amīmadanta patnyaḥ yathābhāgam yathālokam āvṛṣāyiṣata iti
āpaḥ agnim iti adbhiḥ agnim avasicya
āpaḥ agnim iti ṛcā adbhiḥ agnim avasicya

original: iti ācāmata mama pratatāmahāstatāmahāstatāḥ sapatnīkāstṛpyantvācāmantu iti prasavyaṃ pariṣicya // KauśS_11,9{88}.24 //]
analyzed: iti ācāmata mama pratatāmahāḥ tatāmahāḥ tatāḥ sa patnīkāḥ tṛpyantu ācāmantu iti prasavyam pariṣicya

original: 'putraṃ pautram' ityṛcā 'ācāmata mama pratatāmahāstatāmahāstatāḥ sapatnīkāstṛpyantvācāmantu' iti bhājanaṃ prakṣālya tena piṇḍopari savyaṃ pariṣicya
analyzed: putram pautram iti ṛcā ācāmata mama pratatāmahāḥ tatāmahāḥ tatāḥ sa patnīkāḥ tṛpyantu ācāmantu iti bhājanam prakṣālya tena piṇḍa upari savyam pariṣicya

original: [vīrān me pratatāmahā datta vīrān me tatāmahā datta vīrān me pitaro datta pitṝn vīrān yācati // KauśS_11,9{88}.25 //]
analyzed: vīrān me pratatāmahāḥ datta vīrān me tatāmahāḥ datta vīrān me pitaraḥ datta pitṝn vīrān yācati
vīrān me pratatāmahāḥ iti piṇḍān upatiṣṭhate
akṣan amīmadanta iti ṛcā uttara sicam avakuryāt
parā yātaḥ iti ṛcā pitṝn visarjayet

original: [ataḥ pitryupavītī yajñopavītī yanna idaṃ pitṛbhiḥ saha mano'bhūt tadupāhvayāmi iti mana upāhvayati // KauśS_11,9{88}.29 //]
analyzed: atas pitryupavītī yajña upavītī yat naḥ idam pitṛbhiḥ saha manaḥ bhūt tat upāhvayāmi iti manaḥ upāhvayati

original: ā na etu manaḥ punaḥ kratve dakṣāya jīvase /
analyzed: ā naḥ etu manaḥ punar kratve dakṣāya jīvase

original: punarnaḥ pitaro mano dadātu daivyo janaḥ /
analyzed: punar naḥ pitaraḥ manaḥ dadātu daivyaḥ janaḥ

original: vayaṃ soma vrate tava manastanūṣu bibhrataḥ /
analyzed: vayam soma vrate tava manaḥ tanūṣu bibhrataḥ

original: ye sajātāḥ sumanaso jīvā jīveṣu māmakāḥ /
analyzed: ye sajātāḥ sumanasaḥ jīvāḥ jīveṣu māmakāḥ

original: teṣāṃ śrīrmayi kalpatāmasmin goṣṭhe śataṃ samāḥ iti // KauśS_11,10{89}.1 //]
analyzed: teṣām śrīḥ mayi kalpatām asmin goṣṭhe śatam samāḥ iti

original: 'yanna idam' iti 'mano nvā hvāmahe' iti sūktaṃ hṛdayamanvālabhya japet //
analyzed: yat naḥ idam iti manaḥ nu ā hvāmahe iti sūktam hṛdayam anvālabhya japet

original: yaccarusthālyāmodanāvaśiṣṭaṃ bhavati tasyoṣmabhakṣaṃ bhakṣayitvā brāhmaṇāya dadyāt // KauśS_11,10{89}.2 //
analyzed: yat carusthālyām odana avaśiṣṭam bhavati tasya ūṣma bhakṣam bhakṣayitvā brāhmaṇāya dadyāt
yadi brāhmaṇaḥ na labhyeta apsu abhyavaharet
madhyama piṇḍam patnyai putra kāmāyai prayacchati

original: ā dhatta pitaro garbhaṃ kumāraṃ puṣkarasrajam /
analyzed: ā dhatta pitaraḥ garbham kumāram puṣkara srajam

original: ā tvārukṣadvṛṣabhaḥ pṛśniragniyo medhāvinaṃ pitaro garbhamā dadhuḥ /
analyzed: ā tvā arukṣat vṛṣabhaḥ pṛśniḥ agniyaḥ medhāvinam pitaraḥ garbham ā dadhuḥ

original: ā tvāyaṃ puruṣo gamet puruṣaḥ puruṣādadhi /
analyzed: ā tvā ayam puruṣaḥ gamet puruṣaḥ puruṣāt adhi

original: sa te śraiṣṭhyāya jāyatāṃ sa some sāma gāyatu iti // KauśS_11,10{89}.6 //]
analyzed: sa te śraiṣṭhyāya jāyatām sa some sāma gāyatu iti

original: 'ā dhatta pitaraḥ' iti sūktena madhyamapiṇḍaṃ patnyai putrakāmāyai prayacchati prāśanārtham //
analyzed: ā dhatta pitaraḥ iti sūktena madhyama piṇḍam patnyai putra kāmāyai prayacchati prāśana artham
yadī anyā dvitīyā bhavati aparam tasyai

original: pituḥ piṇḍaṃ dvitīyāpatnyai prayacchati tenaiva mantreṇa //
analyzed: pituḥ piṇḍam dvitīyā patnyai prayacchati tena eva mantreṇa

original: [atha yasya bhāryā dāsī vā pradrāviṇī bhavati ye'mī taṇḍulāḥ prasavyaṃ parikīrṇā bhavanti tāṃstasyai prayachati // KauśS_11,10{89}.9 //
analyzed: atha yasya bhāryā dāsī vā pradrāviṇī bhavati taṇḍulāḥ prasavyam parikīrṇāḥ bhavanti tān tasyai prayacchati
arvācī upasaṅkrame mā parācī upa vaḥ tathā

original: annaṃ prāṇasya bandhanaṃ tena badhnāmi tvā mayi iti // KauśS_11,10{89}.10 //]
analyzed: annam prāṇasya bandhanam tena badhnāmi tvā mayi iti
arvācī upasaṅkrame iti ṛcā paścima taṇḍulān dāsyai prayacchati
paryukṣaṇīm samidhaḥ ca ādāya mā pra gām

original: paryukṣaṇīṃ samidhaścādāya 'mā pra gāma' iti dvābhyāṃ japitvā gṛhe vrajati /
analyzed: paryukṣaṇīm samidhaḥ ca ādāya mā pra gāmaḥ iti dvābhyām japitvā gṛhe vrajati
tatas ūrjam bibhrat iti ṣaḍbhiḥ gṛhān upatiṣṭhate
ramadhvam mā bibhītana asmin goṣṭhe karīṣiṇaḥ

original: ūrjaṃ duhānāḥ śucayaḥ śucivratā gṛhā jīvanta upa vaḥ sadema //
analyzed: ūrjam duhānāḥ śucayaḥ śuci vratāḥ gṛhāḥ jīvantaḥ upa vaḥ sadema

original: ūrjaṃ me devā adadurūrjaṃ manuṣyā uta /
analyzed: ūrjam me devāḥ adaduḥ ūrjam manuṣyāḥ uta
ūrjam pitṛbhyaḥ āhārṣam ūrjasvantaḥ gṛhāḥ mama

original: payo me devā adaduḥ payo manuṣyā uta /
analyzed: payaḥ me devāḥ adaduḥ payaḥ manuṣyāḥ uta

original: payaḥ pitṛbhyaḥ āhārṣaṃ payasvanto gṛhā mama //
analyzed: payaḥ pitṛbhyaḥ āhārṣam payasvantaḥ gṛhāḥ mama

original: vīryaṃ me devā adadurvīryaṃ manuṣyā uta /
analyzed: vīryam me devāḥ adaduḥ vīryam manuṣyāḥ uta

original: vīryaṃ pitṛbhyaḥ āhārṣaṃ vīravanto gṛhā mama iti // KauśS_11,10{89}.12 //]
analyzed: vīryam pitṛbhyaḥ āhārṣam vīravantaḥ gṛhāḥ mama iti
ramadhvam mā bibhītana iti sūktena upatiṣṭhate
ayam naḥ agniḥ adhyakṣaḥ yam naḥ vasu vittamaḥ

original: asyopasadye mā riṣāmāyaṃ rakṣatu naḥ prajām //
analyzed: asya upasadye mā riṣāma ayam rakṣatu naḥ prajām
asmin sahasram puṣyāsma edhamānāḥ sve gṛhe

original: tato'gnihotraśālāyāṃ praviśya dakṣiṇāgnau samidha ādadhāti pratyṛcaṃ 'ayaṃ no agniḥ' iti dve,
analyzed: tatas agnihotra śālāyām praviśya dakṣiṇāgnau samidhaḥ ādadhāti pratyṛcam ayam naḥ agniḥ iti dve

original: 'tvamagne' ityekā 'ā tvāgne' ityekā etaiḥ samidha ādadhāti //
analyzed: tvam agne iti ekā ā tvā agne iti ekā etaiḥ samidhaḥ ādadhāti
abhūt dūtaḥ iti ṛcā agnim pratyānayati

original: yadi sarvaḥ praṇītaḥ syād dakṣiṇāgnau tvetadāhitāgneḥ // KauśS_11,10{89}.15 //
analyzed: yadi sarvaḥ praṇītaḥ syāt dakṣiṇāgnau tu etat āhitāgneḥ
idam cit me kṛtam asti idam cit śaknavāni

original: yo ha yajate taṃ devā viduryo dadāti taṃ manuṣyā yaḥ śrāddhāni kurute taṃ pitarastaṃ pitaraḥ // KauśS_11,10{89}.18 //]
analyzed: yaḥ ha yajate tam devāḥ viduḥ yaḥ dadāti tam manuṣyāḥ yaḥ śrāddhāni kurute tam pitaraḥ tam pitaraḥ
idam cit me kṛtam asti iti mantreṇa agnim upatiṣṭhate
pratipatti artham śarīrasya pitṛ medhasya karmaṇaḥ
vidhiḥ ekādaśe sārdham pitṛ yajñasya kīrtitaḥ
ācārye gahama āgate idam karma karoti

original: [sa khalvekaśākhameva prathamaṃ pādyaṃ dviśākhamāsanaṃ triśākhaṃ madhuparkāya // KauśS_12,1{90}.3 //]
analyzed: sa khalu eka śākham eva prathamam pādyam dvi śākham āsanam tri śākham madhuparkāya

original: ekaśākhaṃ dviśākhaṃ triśākhaṃ ceti viṣṭaratrayaṃ karoti //
analyzed: eka śākham dvi śākham tri śākham ca iti viṣṭara trayam karoti

original: [sa yāvato manyeta tāvata upādāya vivicya samparyāpya mūlāni ca prāntāni ca yathāvistīrṇa iva syādityupotkṛṣya madhyadeśe'bhisannahyati //
analyzed: sa yāvataḥ manyeta tāvataḥ upādāya vivicya samparyāpya mūlāni ca prāntāni ca yathā vistīrṇaḥ iva syāt iti upotkṛṣya madhyadeśebhisannahyati

original: ṛtena tvā satyena tvā tapasā tvā karmaṇā tvā iti sannahyati // KauśS_12,1{90}.5 //
analyzed: ṛtena tvā satyena tvā tapasā tvā karmaṇā tvā iti sannahyati

original: atha ha sṛjati atisṛṣṭo dveṣṭā yo'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ ca vayaṃ dviṣmaḥ // KauśS_12,1{90}.6 //]
analyzed: atha ha sṛjati atisṛṣṭaḥ dveṣṭā yaḥ asmān dveṣṭi yam ca vayam dviṣmaḥ
atisṛṣṭaḥ dveṣṭā iti mantreṇa viṣṭarān karoti
asya ca dātuḥ iti dātāram īkṣate

original: viṣṭarān kṛtvā 'asya ca dātuḥ' iti dātāramīkṣate //
analyzed: viṣṭarān kṛtvā asya ca dātuḥ iti dātāram īkṣate
atha udakam āhārayati pādyam bho iti
tatas dātā kurute pādyam bho iti

original: [hiraṇyavarṇābhiḥ pratimantrya dakṣiṇaṃ pādaṃ prathamaṃ prakarṣati mayi brahma ca tapaśca dhārayāṇi iti // KauśS_12,1{90}.9 //]
analyzed: hiraṇyavarṇābhiḥ pratimantrya dakṣiṇam pādam prathamam prakarṣati mayi brahma ca tapaḥ ca dhārayāṇi iti

original: iti sūktaṃ japitvā punaḥ ācārya udakamabhimantrayate /
analyzed: iti sūktam japitvā punar ācāryaḥ udakam abhimantrayate

original: 'mayi brahma ca' iti mantreṇa svayaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ pādaṃ prakṣālayati //
analyzed: mayi brahma ca iti mantreṇa svayam dakṣiṇam pādam prakṣālayati

original: [dakṣiṇe prakṣālite savyaṃ prakarṣati mayi kṣatraṃ ca viśaśca dhārayāṇi iti // KauśS_12,1{90}.10 //]
analyzed: dakṣiṇe prakṣālite savyam prakarṣati mayi kṣatram ca viśaḥ ca dhārayāṇi iti
mayi kṣatram ca iti savyam prakṣālayati
prakṣālitau anumantrayate imau pādau avaniktau brāhmaṇam yaśasā avatām
āpaḥ pāda avanejanīḥ dviṣantam nirdahantu me
imau pādau avaniktau iti ṛcā ācāryaḥ
asya ca dātuḥ iti dātāram īkṣate

original: ityetayā viṣṭare pādau pratiṣṭhāpya adhiṣṭhito dveṣṭā yo'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ ca vayaṃ dviṣmaḥ // KauśS_12,1{90}.15 //]
analyzed: iti etayā viṣṭare pādau pratiṣṭhāpya adhiṣṭhitaḥ dveṣṭā yaḥ asmān dveṣṭi yam ca vayam dviṣmaḥ
vimṛgvarīm iti mantreṇa dvi śākham viṣṭaram āsane nidadhāti

original: viṣṭare pādau pratiṣṭhāpya 'adhiṣṭhito dveṣṭā' iti mantreṇa //
analyzed: viṣṭare pādau pratiṣṭhāpya adhiṣṭhitaḥ dveṣṭā iti mantreṇa
asya ca dātuḥ iti dātāram īkṣate

original: [tatpratimantrayate annānāṃ mukhamasi mukhamahaṃ śreṣṭhaḥ samānānāṃ bhūyāsam /
analyzed: tat pratimantrayate annānām mukham asi mukham aham śreṣṭhaḥ samānānām bhūyāsam

original: āpo'mṛta sthāmṛtaṃ mā kṛṇuta dāsāsmākaṃ bahavo bhavantvaśvāvadgomanmayyastu puṣṭamo bhūrbhuvaḥ svar janad om iti // KauśS_12,1{90}.18 //
analyzed: āpaḥ umṛtaḥ stha amṛtam mā kṛṇuta dāsāḥ asmākam bahavaḥ bhavantu aśvāvat gomat mayyaḥ tu puṣṭamaḥ bhūḥ bhuvaḥ svar janat om iti

original: 'annānāṃ mukhamasi' iti mantreṇa puṣpākṣatodapātramabhimantrya ācāryahaste ninayati tūṣṇīm //
analyzed: annānām mukham asi iti mantreṇa puṣpa akṣata uda pātram abhimantrya ācārya haste ninayati tūṣṇīm
tejaḥ asi amṛtam asi iti lalāṭam ālabhate
dvābhyām śākhābhyām adhastāt ekayā upariṣṭāt sa apidhānam
madhu vātāḥ ṛtāyate iti etābhiḥ eva abhimantraṇam
madhu vātāḥ ṛtāyate madhu kṣaranti sindhavaḥ
madhu naktam uta uṣasaḥ madhumat pārthivam rajaḥ
madhu vātāḥ ṛtāyate iti etābhiḥ eva abhimantraṇam

original: [tat sūryasya tvā cakṣuṣā pratīkṣe iti pratīkṣate // KauśS_12,2{91}.2 //]
analyzed: tat sūryasya tvā cakṣuṣā pratīkṣe iti pratīkṣate
sūryasya tvā iti mantreṇa madhuparkam pratīkṣate

original: iti pratigṛhya puromukhaṃ prāgdaṇḍaṃ nidadhāti // KauśS_12,2{91}.3 //]
analyzed: iti pratigṛhya puras mukham prāk daṇḍam nidadhāti
ayutaḥ uham devasya tvā iti dvābhyām pratigṛhṇāti

original: [pṛthivyāstvā nābhau sādayāmyadityā upasthe iti bhūmau pratiṣṭhāpya // KauśS_12,2{91}.4 //
analyzed: pṛthivyāḥ tvā nābhau sādayāmi adityāḥ upasthe iti bhūmau pratiṣṭhāpya

original: dvābhyāmaṅgulibhyāṃ pradakṣiṇamācālyānāmikayāṅgulyāṅguṣṭhena ca saṅgṛhya prāśnāti // KauśS_12,2{91}.5 //]
analyzed: dvābhyām aṅgulibhyām pradakṣiṇam ācālya anāmikayā aṅgulyā aṅguṣṭhena ca saṅgṛhya prāśnāti

original: 'pṛthivyāstvā' iti mantreṇa bhūmau pratiṣṭhāpya tataḥ pūrvābhimukho bhūtvā madhuparkaṃ prāśnāti bhojanavat /
analyzed: pṛthivyai tvā iti mantreṇa bhūmau pratiṣṭhāpya tatas pūrva abhimukhaḥ bhūtvā madhuparkam prāśnāti bhojana vat
dvābhyām aṅgulībhyām pradakṣiṇam ācālya anāmikā aṅgulyā aṅguṣṭhena ca saṅgṛhya prāśnāti

original: [oṃ bhūstatsaviturvareṇyaṃ bhūḥ svāhā iti prathamam // KauśS_12,2{91}.6 //
analyzed: om bhūḥ tat savituḥ vareṇyam bhūḥ svāhā iti prathamam

original: bhargo devasya dhīmahi bhuvaḥ svāhā iti dvitīyam // KauśS_12,2{91}.7 //
analyzed: bhargaḥ devasya dhīmahi bhuvaḥ svāhā iti dvitīyam

original: dhiyo yo naḥ pracodayāt svaḥ svāhā iti tṛtīyam // KauśS_12,2{91}.8 //
analyzed: dhiyaḥ yaḥ naḥ pracodayāt svar svāhā iti tṛtīyam

original: vayaṃ devasya dhīmahi janat svāhā iti caturtham // KauśS_12,2{91}.9 //
analyzed: vayam devasya dhīmahi janat svāhā iti caturtham

original: turaṃ devasya bhojanaṃ vṛdhat svāhā iti pañcamam // KauśS_12,2{91}.10 //
analyzed: turam devasya bhojanam vṛdhat svāhā iti pañcamam
om bhūḥ tat savituḥ iti ekādaśa mantrāḥ

original: tasya bhūyomātramiva bhuktvā brāhmaṇāya śrotriyāya prayachet // KauśS_12,2{91}.18 //
analyzed: tasya bhūyaḥ mātram iva bhuktvā brāhmaṇāya śrotriyāya prayacchet

original: athāpyayaṃ nigamo bhavati somametat pibata yat kiṃ cāśnīta brāhmaṇāḥ /
analyzed: atha api ayam nigamaḥ bhavati somam etat pibata yat kim ca aśnīta brāhmaṇāḥ

original: mā brāhmaṇāyochiṣṭaṃ dāta māṃ somaṃ pātvasomapaḥ iti // KauśS_12,2{91}.20 //]
analyzed: mā brāhmaṇāya uchiṣṭam dāta mām somam pātu a soma paḥ iti

original: anyasya vā / dvādaśe'dhyāye dvitīyā kaṇḍikā // KKp_91 //
analyzed: anyasya vā dvādaśe adhyāye dvitīyā kaṇḍikā

original: [dadhi ca madhu ca brāhmo madhuparkaḥ // KauśS_12,3{92}.1 //
analyzed: dadhi ca madhu ca brāhmaḥ madhuparkaḥ

original: madhu cājyaṃ ca saumyo madhuparkaḥ // KauśS_12,3{92}.3 //
analyzed: madhu ca ājyam ca saumyaḥ madhuparkaḥ
manthaḥ ca ājyam ca pauṣṇaḥ madhuparkaḥ

original: kṣīraṃ cājyaṃ ca sārasvato madhuparkaḥ // KauśS_12,3{92}.5 //
analyzed: kṣīram ca ājyam ca sārasvataḥ madhuparkaḥ

original: surā cājyaṃ ca mausalo madhuparkaḥ // KauśS_12,3{92}.6 //
analyzed: surā ca ājyam ca mausalaḥ madhuparkaḥ

original: sa khalveṣa dvaye bhavati sautrāmaṇyāṃ ca rājasūye ca // KauśS_12,3{92}.7 //
analyzed: sa khalu eṣa dvaye bhavati sautrāmaṇyām ca rājasūye ca

original: udakaṃ cājyaṃ ca vāruṇo madhuparkaḥ // KauśS_12,3{92}.8 //
analyzed: udakam ca ājyam ca vāruṇaḥ madhuparkaḥ

original: tailaṃ cājyaṃ ca śrāvaṇo madhuparkaḥ // KauśS_12,3{92}.9 //
analyzed: tailam ca ājyam ca śrāvaṇaḥ madhuparkaḥ
tailaḥ ca piṇḍaḥ ca pārivrājakaḥ madhuparkaḥ

original: iti khalveṣa navavidho madhuparko bhavati // KauśS_12,3{92}.11 //]
analyzed: iti khalu eṣa navavidhaḥ madhuparkaḥ bhavati
dadhi ca ityādi navavidham madhuparkam jānīyāt
bhūtam asi bhavat asi annam prāṇaḥ bahuḥ bhava

original: jyeṣṭhaṃ yannāma nāmata oṃ bhūrbhuvaḥ svarjanadom iti // KauśS_12,3{92}.13 //]
analyzed: jyeṣṭham yat nāma nāmataḥ om bhūḥ bhuvaḥ svar janadā ūm iti
bhūtam asi bhavat asi annam iti mantreṇa

original: [atisṛjati mātādityānāṃ duhitā vasūnāṃ svasā rudrāṇāmamṛtasya nābhiḥ /
analyzed: atisṛjati mātā ādityānām duhitā vasūnām svasā rudrāṇām amṛtasya nābhiḥ

original: pra ṇo vocaṃ cikituṣe janāya mā gāmanāgāmaditiṃ vadhiṣṭa /
analyzed: pra naḥ vocam cikituṣe janāya mā gām anāgām aditim vadhiṣṭa
gām visarjayati mātā ādityānām iti mantreṇa

original: nānujñānamadhīmahe iti kuruta ityeva brūyāt // KauśS_12,3{92}.17 //
analyzed: na anujñānam adhīmahe iti kurute iti eva brūyāt

original: svadhite mainaṃ hiṃsīḥ iti śastraṃ prayachati // KauśS_12,3{92}.18 //
analyzed: svadhite mā enam hiṃsīḥ iti śastram prayacchati

original: pāṣmānameva jahi iti śastraṃ kartāramanumantrayate // KauśS_12,3{92}.19 //
analyzed: pāṣmānam eva jahi iti śastram kartāram anumantrayate
tad devatam hi tat haviḥ bhavati
atha asmai snānam anulepanam mālya abhyañjanam iti
yat atra upasamāhāryam bhavati tat upasamāhṛtya
vastra alaṅkāra ādi sarvam samāhṛtya dadāti

original: athopāsakāḥ prāpya upāsakāḥ smo bho iti vedayante // KauśS_12,3{92}.24 //
analyzed: atha upāsakāḥ prāpya upāsakāḥ smaḥ bho iti vedayante

original: [tān pratimantrayate bhūyāṃso bhūyāsma ye ca no bhūyasaḥ kārṣṭāpi ca no'nye bhūyāṃso jāyantām // KauśS_12,3{92}.25 //]
analyzed: tān pratimantrayate bhūyāṃsaḥ bhūyāsma ye ca naḥ bhūyasaḥ kārṣṭa api ca naḥ unye bhūyāṃsaḥ jāyantām

original: bhedakāra ācāryaḥ pratimantrayate 'bhūyāṃso bhūyāsma' iti mantreṇa //
analyzed: bheda kāraḥ ācāryaḥ pratimantrayate bhūyāṃsaḥ bhūyāsmaḥ iti mantreṇa

original: asya ca dātuḥ iti dātāramīkṣate // KauśS_12,3{92}.26 //
analyzed: asya ca dātuḥ iti dātāram īkṣate

original: athānnāhārāḥ prāpya annāhārāḥ smo bho iti vedayante // KauśS_12,3{92}.27 //
analyzed: atha anna āhārāḥ prāpya anna āhārāḥ smaḥ bho iti vedayante

original: [tān pratimantrayate annādā bhūyāsma ye ca no'nnādān kārṣṭāpi ca no'nye'nnādā bhūyāṃso jāyantām // KauśS_12,3{92}.28 //]
analyzed: tān pratimantrayate anna ādāḥ bhūyāsma ye ca na unnādān kārṣṭa api ca na unyennādāḥ bhūyāṃsaḥ jāyantām

original: ācāryo'numantrayate 'annādā bhūyāsma ye ca naḥ' iti mantreṇa /
analyzed: ācāryaḥ unumantrayate anna ādāḥ bhūyāsma ye ca naḥ iti mantreṇa

original: asya ca dātuḥ iti dātāramīkṣate // KauśS_12,3{92}.29 //
analyzed: asya ca dātuḥ iti dātāram īkṣate

original: [āhṛteṃ'nne juhoti yat kāma kāmayamānā ityetayā // KauśS_12,3{92}.30 //
analyzed: āhṛte iṃnne juhoti yat kāma kāmayamānāḥ iti etayā

original: yat kāma kāmāyamānā idaṃ kṛṇmasi te haviḥ /
analyzed: yat kāma kāmāyamānāḥ idam kṛṇmasi te haviḥ

original: tannaḥ sarvaṃ samṛdhyatāmathaitasya haviṣo vīhi svāhā iti // KauśS_12,3{92}.31 //]
analyzed: tat naḥ sarvam samṛdhyatām atha etasya haviṣaḥ vīhi svāhā iti

original: āhṛte'nne sati bhakte juhoti 'yat kāma kāma' ityṛcā vivāhe tantrāgnau juhoti /
analyzed: āhṛta inne sati bhakte juhoti yat kāma kāmaḥ iti ṛcā vivāhe tantra agnau juhoti
anyatra hasta homa tvāt tantra vikalpaḥ

original: [eṣa ācāryakalpa eṣa ṛtvikkalpa eṣa saṃyuktakalpa eṣa vivāhakalpa eṣo'tithikalpa eṣo'tithikalpaḥ // KauśS_12,3{92}.32 //]
analyzed: eṣaḥ ācārya kalpaḥ eṣaḥ ṛtvij kalpaḥ eṣa saṃyukta kalpaḥ eṣa vivāha kalpaḥ eṣā utithi kalpaḥ eṣā utithi kalpaḥ

original: anyebhyaḥ svadharmasthitebhyaśca cāturvarṇikebhyo dravyāḍhyebhyaścaturāśramibhyaśca gṛhāgate madhuparko deyaḥ /
analyzed: anyebhyaḥ svadharma sthitebhyaḥ ca cāturvarṇikebhyaḥ dravya āḍhyebhyaḥ catur āśramibhyaḥ ca gṛha āgate madhuparkaḥ deyaḥ
guru ādi āgate gṛhe madhuparka sūtram prayojanam
loka viruddham dṛśyate tat adbhutam iti ucyate

sva kule para kule ca kalahe utpanne

original: dāruṇasaṃvatsare durbhikṣe marake vā anāvṛṣṭirvā bhaye sati //

analyzed: rajjvoḥ tantvaḥ rajjuḥ vā sūtram valyamāne dve bhavataḥ

original: gaurvā'śvo vā'śvataro vā puruṣo vā ākāśaphenaṃ pibati //
analyzed: gauḥ vā aśvaḥ vā aśvataraḥ vā puruṣaḥ vai ākāśa phenam pibati

yat adbhute na paṭhitam tat ajñātam adbhutam
athavā laukikam jugupsitam vā adṛṣṭam vā
athavā sthale sarvatra udakam sandṛśyate mṛgatṛṣṇā vat

original: vapāṃ havīṃṣi vā vayāṃsi dvipadacatuṣpadaṃ vā gṛhītvā gaccheyuḥ //
analyzed: vapām havīṃṣi vā vayāṃsi dvipada catuṣpadam vā gṛhītvā gaccheyuḥ

original: kumārasya kumāryā vā dvāvāvartau mūrdhanyau bhavataḥ savyāvṛttau //
analyzed: kumārasya kumāryāḥ vā dvau āvartau mūrdhanyau bhavataḥ savya āvṛttau

yadi ghṛtādi sthīyate syandate vā sravati vā //
analyzed: yadi ghṛta ādi sthīyate syandate vā sravati vā

analyzed: vidyute vā sūrya prajvalite vā gṛham dahati āgantuḥ vā

original: udakumbhe svayaṃ bhagne udakadhānamaliñjare bhagne ukhādibhāṇḍe saktudhānyāṃ haṇḍikā //

original: [atha yatraitāni varṣāṇi varṣanti ghṛtaṃ māṃsaṃ madhu ca yad hiraṇyaṃ yāni cāpyanyāni ghorāṇi varṣāṇi varṣanti tat parābhavati kulaṃ vā grāmo  #
analyzed: atha yatra etāni varṣāṇi varṣanti ghṛtam māṃsam madhu ca yat hiraṇyam yāni ca api anyāni ghorāṇi varṣāṇi varṣanti tat parābhavati kulam vā
atha yatra etāni ityādi pratinimitta śāntim vakṣyāmaḥ

original: athādbhutaśāntiryatra na kriyate tatra doṣo bhavati /

original: tathā coktaṃ sṛjanti divyā devādbhutāni prāgupasargapratibodhanārtham /

original: eṣa ha vai vidvān yad bhṛgvaṅgirovit // KauśS_13,2{94}.3 //
analyzed: eṣa ha vai vidvān yat bhṛgu aṅgiraḥ vid

original: ete ha vā asya sarvasya śamayitāraḥ pālayitāro yad bhṛgvaṅgirasaḥ // KauśS_13,2{94}.4 //]
analyzed: ete ha vai asya sarvasya śamayitāraḥ pālayitāraḥ yat bhṛgu aṅgirasaḥ

original: tatra gṛhastho vā grāmapatirvā rājā vā bhūmipatiḥ /
analyzed: tatra gṛhasthaḥ vā grāma patiḥ vā rājā vā bhūmipatiḥ

original: tadupakalpayante kaṃsamahate vasane śuddhamājyaṃ śāntā oṣadhīrnavamudakumbham // KauśS_13,2{94}.6 //

original: snāto'hatavasanaḥ surabhirvratavān karmaṇya upavasatyekarātraṃ trirātraṃ ṣaḍrātraṃ dvādaśarātraṃ vā // KauśS_13,2{94}.9 //
analyzed: snātaḥ ahata vasanaḥ surabhiḥ vratavān karmaṇyaḥ upavasati eka rātram tri rātram ṣaṣ rātram dvādaśa rātram vā

original: [dvādaśyāḥ prātaryatraivādaḥ patitaṃ bhavati tata uttaramagnimupasamādhāya // KauśS_13,2{94}.10 //
analyzed: dvādaśyāḥ prātar yatra eva adaḥ patitam bhavati tatas uttaram agnim upasamādhāya

analyzed: parisamūhya paryukṣya paristīrya barhiḥ uda pātram upasādya paricaraṇena ājyam paricarya
tatas dvitīya ihani prātar karma prayogaḥ
ayuta homa lakṣa homau vā īśāna yāga graha yāga nakṣatra yāga nirṛti yāga maṇḍapa saṃskāra vāstu saṃskāra ādi

original: ghṛtasya dhārā iha yā varṣanti pakvaṃ māṃsaṃ madhu ca yaddhiraṇyam /

original: dviṣantamete anu yantu sarve parāñco yantu nivartamānāḥ //
analyzed: dviṣantam ete anu yantu sarve parāñcaḥ yantu nivartamānāḥ

original: dhenvādīni sarvatra kāṃsyādīni ca dakṣiṇā vā /

original: kīṭāni anyāścānyaṃ ca ghoraṃ varṣaṇaṃ dadhi payo tailaṃ ca pakvānnavikārāśca /

original: [atha yatraitāni yakṣāṇi dṛśyante tadyathaitanmarkaṭaḥ śvāpado vāyasaḥ puruṣarūpamiti tadevamāśaṅkyameva bhavati // KauśS_13,3{95}.1 //
analyzed: atha yatra etāni yakṣāṇi dṛśyante tat yathā etat markaṭaḥ śvāpadaḥ vāyasaḥ puruṣa rūpam iti tat evam āśaṅkyam eva bhavati

original: yanmarkaṭaḥ śvāpado vāyaso yadīdaṃ rāṣṭraṃ jātavedaḥ patāti /

analyzed: puruṣarakṣasam iṣiram yat patāti dviṣantam ete anu yantu sarve parāñcaḥ yantu nivartamānāḥ

original: śāntyudakaṃ kṛtvā kārayitācamanaṃ prokṣaṇaṃ kṛtvājyabhāgāntaṃ kṛtvā 'yanmarkaṭaḥ śvāpadaḥ' ityṛcājyaṃ juhuyāt /

original: [atha ha gomāyū nāma maṇḍūkau yatra vadatastadyanmanyante 'māṃ prati vadato māṃ prati vadataḥ' iti tadevamāśaṅkyameva bhavati // KauśS_13,4{96}.1
analyzed: atha ha gomāyū nāma maṇḍūkau yatra vadataḥ tat yat manyante mām prati vadataḥ mām prati vadataḥ iti tat evam āśaṅkyam eva bhavati  /

analyzed: śāntyudakam kṛtvā tatas ājyabhāga antam kṛtvā yat gomāyū iti dvayam mātṛnāma gaṇena ca ājyam juhuyāt

original: sate gṛhe vā bahirvā abhimukhaḥ gomāyuḥ /

analyzed: atha yatra etat kulam kalahi bhavati tat nirṛtigṛhītam iti ācakṣate

analyzed: indra agnī tvā brāhmaṇā vāvṛdhānau āyuṣmantau uttamam tvā karāthaḥ

analyzed: apeta etu nirṛtiḥ ityetena sūktena juhuyāt

analyzed: śāntyudakam cātana mātṛnāmāni anuyojitam kṛtvā ācamana ādi ājyabhāga antam kṛtvā ārāt arātim iti dve

original: kulayuddhe rājakulagrāmayuddhe jātibrāhmaṇakṣatriyavaiśyaśūdrādiyuddhe strīṇāṃ yuddhe kalahe ca puruṣāṇāṃ yuddhe kalahe ca svakule cāparasya  #
analyzed: kula yuddhe rāja kula grāma yuddhe jāti brāhmaṇa kṣatriya vaiśya śūdra ādi yuddhe strīṇām yuddhe kalahe ca puruṣāṇām yuddhe kalahe ca sva kule ca aparasya
atha yatra etat bhūmicalaḥ bhavati tatra juhuyāt

original: [atha yatraitadādityaṃ tamo gṛhṇāti tatra juhuyāt // KauśS_13,7{99}.1 //

original: rāhū rājānaṃ tsarati svarantamainamiha hanti pūrvaḥ /

original: sahasramasya tanva iha nāśyāḥ śataṃ tanvo vi naśyantu //
analyzed: sahasram asya tanvaḥ iha nāśyāḥ śatam tanvaḥ vi naśyantu

śakadhūmam iti sūktena ca ājyam juhuyāt

original: atha auṣasī na bhavati tatra śāntirucyate-
analyzed: atha auṣasī na bhavati tatra śāntiḥ ucyate
atha yatra etat auṣasī na udeti tatra juhuyāt

original: udetu śrīruṣasaḥ kalpayantī pūlyān kṛtvā palita etu cāraḥ /
analyzed: udetu śrīḥ uṣasaḥ kalpayantī pūlyān kṛtvā palitaḥ etu cāraḥ

original: ṛtūn bibhratī bahudhā virūpān mahyaṃ bhavyaṃ viduṣī kalpayāti //
analyzed: ṛtūn bibhratī bahudhā virūpān mahyam bhavyam viduṣī kalpayāti

original: śāntyudakādi ājyabhāgāntaṃ kṛtvā 'udetu śrīruṣasaḥ' ityṛcā mātṛnāmagaṇenājyaṃ juhuyāt /
analyzed: śāntyudaka ādi ājyabhāga antam kṛtvā udetu śrīḥ uṣasaḥ iti ṛcā mātṛnāma gaṇena ājyam juhuyāt

original: auṣasī dīptirna dṛśyate tadā eṣā śāntiḥ //
analyzed: auṣasī dīptiḥ na dṛśyate tadā eṣā śāntiḥ

original: [atha yatraitat samā dāruṇā bhavati tatra juhuyāt // KauśS_13,10{102}.1 //
analyzed: atha yatra etat samā dāruṇā bhavati tatra juhuyāt

original: yā samā ruśatyeti prājāpatyān vi dhūnute /
analyzed: yā samā ruśatyā iti prājāpatyān vi dhūnute

original: tṛptiṃ yāṃ devatā vidustāṃ tvā saṃ kalpayāmasi //
analyzed: tṛptim yām devatāḥ viduḥ tām tvā sam kalpayāmasi

original: yatte ghoraṃ yatte viṣaṃ tad dviṣatsu ni dadhmasyamuṣmin iti brūyāt // KauśS_13,10{102}.2 //
analyzed: yat te ghoram yat te viṣam tat dviṣatsu ni dadhmasi amuṣmin iti brūyāt

original: śivenāsmākaṃ same śāntyā sahāyuṣā samāyai svāhā iti hutvā // KauśS_13,10{102}.3 //
analyzed: śivena asmākam same śāntyā saha āyuṣā samāyai svāhā iti hutvā

original: śāntyudakādi ājyabhāgāntaṃ kṛtvā 'yā samā ruśatī' iti tisṛbhiḥ 'samāstvāgne' iti sūktenājyaṃ juhuyāt /
analyzed: śāntyudaka ādi ājyabhāga antam kṛtvā yā samā ruśatī iti tisṛbhiḥ samā astvā agne iti sūktena ājyam juhuyāt

original: saṃvatsara ugra makare samprāpte roge vā samutpanne pararāṣṭrabhaye sastene caurabhaye dāruṇe saṃvatsare śāntiḥ samāptā //
analyzed: saṃvatsare ugra makare samprāpte roge vā samutpanne para rāṣṭra bhaye sa stene caura bhaye dāruṇe saṃvatsare śāntiḥ samāptā
atha yatra etat upatārakāḥ śaṅkante tatra juhuyāt

original: revatīḥ śubhrā iṣirā madantīstvaco dhūmamanu tāḥ saṃ viśantu /
analyzed: revatīḥ śubhrāḥ iṣirāḥ madantīḥ tvacaḥ dhūmam anu tāḥ sam viśantu
pareṇa āpaḥ pṛthivīm sam viśantu āpaḥ imān lokān anusañcarantu
śāntyudaka ādi ājyabhāga antam kṛtvā revatīḥ śubhrāḥ iti ṛcā
samutpatantu pra nabhasvas iti sūktābhyām ca ājyam juhuyāt

original: kṣetre ca darśane ca śāntiḥ samāptā //
analyzed: kṣetre ca darśane ca śāntiḥ samāptā

original: [atha yatraitad brāhmaṇā āyudhino bhavanti tatra juhuyāt // KauśS_13,12{104}.1 //
analyzed: atha yatra etat brāhmaṇāḥ āyudhinaḥ bhavanti tatra juhuyāt
ye āsurāḥ manuṣyāḥ ātta dhanvaḥ puruṣa mukhāḥ carān iha

original: devā vayaṃ manuṣyāste devāḥ pra viśāmasi //
analyzed: devāḥ vayam manuṣyāḥ te devāḥ pra viśāmasi

original: indro no astu purogavaḥ sa no rakṣatu sarvataḥ /
analyzed: indraḥ naḥ astu purogavaḥ sa naḥ rakṣatu sarvatas
mā naḥ vidan namaḥ deva vadhebhyaḥ

original: śāntyudakaṃ kṛtvā mātṛnāmānuyojanaṃ kṛtvā tataḥ vedyādi ājyabhāgāntaṃ kṛtvā 'ya āsurāḥ' iti dvābhyāṃ 'mā no vidan' 'namo devavadhebhyaḥ' iti  #
analyzed: śāntyudakam kṛtvā mātṛ nāma anuyojanam kṛtvā tatas vedi ādi ājyabhāga antam kṛtvā ye āsurāḥ iti dvābhyām mā naḥ vidan namaḥ deva vadhebhyaḥ iti

original: [atha yatraitad daivatāni nṛtyanti cyotanti hasanti gāyanti vānyāni vā rūpāṇi kurvanti ya āsurā manuṣyāḥ, mā no vidan (1.19)
analyzed: atha yatra etat daivatāni nṛtyanti cyotanti hasanti gāyanti vā anyāni vā rūpāṇi kurvanti ye āsurāḥ manuṣyāḥ mā naḥ vidan

original: śāntyudakaṃ cātanādiśca tata ājyabhāgāntaṃ kṛtvā 'ya āsurāḥ' 'mā no vidan',
analyzed: śāntyudakam cātana ādiḥ ca tatas ājyabhāga antam kṛtvā ye āsurāḥ mā naḥ vidan

original: devatā nṛtyanti cyotanti hasanti gāyanti prasthijyanti pradhūpayanti unmīlayanti
analyzed: devatāḥ nṛtyanti cyotanti hasanti gāyanti prasthijyanti pradhūpayanti unmīlayanti

original: lohitaṃ sravanti prādurbhavanti gamanaṃ kurvanti sarvadevatāpratimāyāṃ pāṣāṇaprabhṛtirajatahiraṇyasphaṭikaprabhṛtiliṅgavāsudevaśaṅkarasarasvatītyādiprabhṛtayaḥ
analyzed: lohitam sravanti prādurbhavanti gamanam kurvanti sarva devatā pratimāyām pāṣāṇa prabhṛti rajata hiraṇya sphaṭika prabhṛti liṅga vāsudeva śaṅkara sarasvatī ityādi prabhṛtayaḥ

original: anyāni vā bahūni vidhānyāni rūpāṇi kurvanti devatāprabhṛtayaḥ /
analyzed: anyāni vā bahūni vidhāni anyāni rūpāṇi kurvanti devatā prabhṛtayaḥ
atha yatra etat lāṅgale saṃsṛjataḥ puroḍāśam śrapayitvā

original: parisamuhya paryukṣya paristīrya barhiḥ śamyāḥ paridhīn kṛtvā // KauśS_13,14{106}.5 //
analyzed: parisamuhya paryukṣya paristīrya barhiḥ śamyāḥ paridhīn kṛtvā

original: atha juhoti vittirasi puṣṭirasi śrīrasi prājāpatyānāṃ tāṃ tvāhaṃ mayi puṣṭikāmo juhomi svāhā // KauśS_13,14{106}.6 //
analyzed: atha juhoti vittiḥ asi puṣṭiḥ asi śrīḥ asi prājāpatyānām tām tvā aham mayi puṣṭi kāmaḥ juhomi svāhā
kṛṣiḥ sahasra prakārā pratyaṣṭā śrīḥ iyam mayi

original: urvīṃ tvāhurmanuṣyāḥ śriyaṃ tvā manaso viduḥ /
analyzed: urvīm tvā āhuḥ manuṣyāḥ śriyam tvā manasaḥ viduḥ

original: kālanetre haviṣo no juṣasva tṛptiṃ no dhehi dvipade catuṣpade //
analyzed: kāla netre haviṣaḥ naḥ juṣasva tṛptim naḥ dhehi dvipade catuṣpade

original: yābhirdevā asurānakalpayan yātūn manūn gandharvān rākṣasāṃśca /
analyzed: yābhiḥ devāḥ asurān akalpayan yātūn manūn gandharvān rākṣasān ca

original: tābhirno adya sumanā upā gahi sahasrāpoṣaṃ subhage rarāṇā //
analyzed: tābhiḥ naḥ adya sumanāḥ upa ā gahi sahasrāpoṣam subhage rarāṇā
hiraṇya sraj puṣkariṇī śyāmā sarva aṅga śobhanī
kṛṣiḥ hiraṇya prakārā pratyaṣṭā śrīḥ iyam mayi

original: aśvibhyāṃ devi saha saṃvidānā indreṇa rādhena saha puṣṭyā na ā gahi /
analyzed: aśvibhyām devi saha saṃvidānā indreṇa rādhena saha puṣṭyā naḥ ā gahi

original: viśvastvā rāsantāṃ pradiśo'nu sarvā ahorātrārdhamāsamāsā ārtavā ṛtubhiḥ saha //
analyzed: viśvastvā rāsantām pradiśaḥ nu sarvāḥ ahar rātra ardha māsa māsāḥ ārtavāḥ ṛtubhiḥ saha

original: bhartrī devānāmuta martyānāṃ bhartrī prajānāmuta mānuṣāṇām /
analyzed: bhartrī devānām uta martyānām bhartrī prajānām uta mānuṣāṇām

original: hiraṇyairaśvairā gobhiḥ pratyaṣṭā śrīriyaṃ mayi // KauśS_13,14{106}.7 //
analyzed: hiraṇyaiḥ aśvaiḥ ā gobhiḥ pratyaṣṭā śrīḥ iyam mayi

original: araṇye gatvā tatra prācīṃ sītāṃ sthāpayitvā sītāyā madhye śāntyudakādi ājyabhāgāntaṃ kṛtvā tataḥ śamyāḥ paridhīn kṛtvā tataḥ puroḍāśaṃ juhoti
analyzed: araṇye gatvā tatra prācīm sītām sthāpayitvā sītāyāḥ madhye śāntyudaka ādi ājyabhāga antam kṛtvā tatas śamyāḥ paridhīn kṛtvā tatas puroḍāśam juhoti
avadāya avadāya catur avatta homaḥ puroḍāśasya
vittiḥ asi puṣṭiḥ asi iti sūktena

original: tataḥ sarvatra śāntyudakaṃ kṛtvā sarvatra cātanānyanuyojayet /

iti sūktam yasya idam āḥ rajaḥ
sītā madhye lāṅgala saṃsarge puccha saṃsarge ca lāṅgala adbhuta śāntiḥ

original: [atha yatraitat sṛjantyorvā kṛntantyorvā nānā tantū saṃsṛjataḥ manāyai tantuṃ prathamam ityetena sūktena juhuyāt // KauśS_13,15{107}.1 //
analyzed: atha yatra etat sṛjantyoḥ vā kṛntantyoḥ vā nānā tantū saṃsṛjataḥ manāyai tantum prathamam iti etena sūktena juhuyāt
manāyai tantum prathamam paśya id anyāḥ atanvata
tat nārīḥ prabravīmi vaḥ sādhvīḥ vaḥ santu urvarīḥ
sādhuḥ vaḥ tantuḥ bhavatu sādhuḥ etu rathaḥ vṛtaḥ
atha u ha urvarīḥ yūyam prātar voḍhave dhāvata
khargalāḥ iva patvarīḥ apām ugram iva ayanam
patantu patvarīḥ iva urvarīḥ sādhunā pathā
a vācyau te totudyete todena aśvatarau iva
nārī pañca mayūkham sūtravat kṛṇute vasu

original: ariṣṭo asya vastā prendra vāsa utodira // KauśS_13,15{107}.2 //
analyzed: ariṣṭaḥ asya vastā pra indra vāsaḥ

original: ayudvaye nṛtyamānabhavati kartyamāne sūcakadvayaṃ yaddvidhā bhavati /

samāptā sūtre ca dvis sambhave śāntiḥ
atha agni saṃsarge laukike śāntiḥ ucyate

original: [atha yatraitadagnināgniḥ saṃsṛjyate bhavataṃ naḥ samanasau samokasau ityetena sūktena juhuyāt // KauśS_13,16{108}.1 //
analyzed: atha yatra etat agninā agniḥ saṃsṛjyate bhavatam naḥ samanasau samokasau iti etena sūktena juhuyāt

analyzed: mā hiṃsiṣṭam yajñapatim mā yajñam jātavedasau śivau bhavatam adya naḥ
agninā agniḥ saṃsṛjyate kaviḥ bṛhaspatiḥ yuvā havyavāṭ juhū āsyaḥ

original: tvaṃ hyagne agninā vipro vipreṇa sansatā /
analyzed: tvam hi agne agninā vipraḥ vipreṇa san satā

analyzed: samīcī mā ahanī pātām āyuṣmatyāḥ ṛcaḥ mā satsi

original: [atha yatraitadayamasūryamau janayati tāṃ śāntyudakenābhyukṣya dohayitvā // KauśS_13,17{109}.1 //

analyzed: tatas gām ca prāśayati vatsau ca uda pātrāt enān ācāmayati ca samprokṣati ca

original: tena dugdhena sthālīpākaṃ śrapayitvā 'ekaikayaiṣā sṛṣṭyā saṃ babhūva' ityetena sūktenājyaṃ juhuyāt /

iti ṛcā uttamam sampātam odane pratyānayati

original: tata odanaṃ gāṃ vatsau ca prāśayati /
analyzed: tatas odanam gām vatsau ca prāśayati

original: sarvatra kaṃsavasanaṃ gauḥ dakṣiṇā varāṃ dhenuṃ ca /

original: athāśvā vā gardabhī vā yamalajanane śāntirucyate-

uda pātrāt enān ācāmayati ca samprokṣati ca

original: śāntyudakādi ājyabhāgāntaṃ kṛtvā 'ekaikayaiṣā sṛṣṭyā saṃ babhūva' iti sūktenājyaṃ juhvannudapātre sampātānānayati /

uda pātreṇa aśva ādi ācāmayati ca samprokṣati ca

original: aśvā vā gardabhī vā yamalajanane śāntiḥ samāptā /
analyzed: aśvā vā gardabhī vā yamala janane śāntiḥ samāptā

uktā dakṣiṇā sā api tam dātavyā

original: śāntyudakādi ājyabhāgāntaṃ kṛtvā 'ekaikayaiṣā' iti sūktenājyaṃ juhvan mānuṣīputrayormūrdhni sampātānānayati /

yathāpūrvam uda pātre uttara sampātān ānayati
uda pātreṇa ācāmayati ca samprokṣati ca

original: [atha yatraitad dhenavo lohitaṃ duhate yaḥ pauruṣeyeṇa kraviṣā samaṅkte (8.3.15-18)

original: [atha yatraitadanaḍvān dhenuṃ dhayati tatra juhuyāt // KauśS_13,21{113}.1 //
analyzed: atha yatra etat anaḍvān dhenum dhayati tatra juhuyāt

original: sa me bhūtiṃ ca puṣṭiṃ ca dīrghamāyuśca dhehi naḥ /

original: śāntyudakādi ājyabhāgāntaṃ kṛtvā 'anaḍvān dhenum' ityṛcā 'mā no vidan',

original: [atha yatraitad dhenurdhenuṃ dhayati tatra juhuyāt // KauśS_13,22{114}.1 //
analyzed: atha yatra etat dhenuḥ dhenum dhayati tatra juhuyāt

original: tasmānmāmagne pari pāhi ghorāt pra no jāyantāṃ mithunāni rūpaśaḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt mām agne pari pāhi ghorāt pra naḥ jāyantām mithunāni rūpaśas

original: śāntyudakādi ājyabhāgāntaṃ kṛtvā 'yogakṣemaṃ dhenum' iti 'divyo gandharvaḥ' iti mātṛnāmagaṇena cājyaṃ juhuyāt /
