original: atha yatraitad gaurvāśvo vāśvataro vā puruṣo vā ākāśaphenaṃ bhakṣayati tatra śāntirucyate-
analyzed: atha yatra etat gauḥ vā aśvaḥ vā aśvataraḥ vā puruṣaḥ vā ākāśa phenam bhakṣayati tatra śāntiḥ ucyate

original: [atha yatraitad gaurvāśvo vāśvataro vā puruṣo vākāśaphenamavagandhayati tatra juhuyāt // KauśS_13,23{115}.1 //
analyzed: atha yatra etat gauḥ vā aśvaḥ vā aśvataraḥ vā puruṣaḥ vā ākāśa phenam avagandhayati tatra juhuyāt

original: payo deveṣu paya oṣadhīṣu paya āśāsu payo'ntarikṣe /
analyzed: payaḥ deveṣu payaḥ oṣadhīṣu payaḥ āśāsu payaḥ antarikṣe

original: tanme dhātā ca savitā ca dhattāṃ viśve taddevā abhisaṅgṛṇantu //
analyzed: tat me dhātā ca savitā ca dhattām viśve tat devāḥ abhisaṅgṛṇantu

original: payo yadapsu paya usriyāsu paya utseṣūta parvateṣu /
analyzed: payaḥ yat apsu payaḥ usriyāsu payaḥ utseṣu uta parvateṣu

original: tanme dhātā ca savitā ca dhattāṃ viśve taddevā abhisaṅgṛṇantu //
analyzed: tat me dhātā ca savitā ca dhattām viśve tat devāḥ abhisaṅgṛṇantu

original: yanmṛgeṣu paya āviṣṭamasti yadejati patati yatpatatriṣu /
analyzed: yat mṛgeṣu payaḥ āviṣṭam asti yat ejati patati yat patatriṣu

original: tanme dhātā ca savitā ca dhattāṃ viśve taddevā abhisaṅgṛṇantu //
analyzed: tat me dhātā ca savitā ca dhattām viśve tat devāḥ abhisaṅgṛṇantu

original: yāni payāṃsi divyārpitāni yānyantarikṣe bahudhā bahūni /
analyzed: yāni payāṃsi divya arpitāni yāni antarikṣe bahudhā bahūni

original: teṣāmīśānaṃ vaśinī no adya pradattā dyāvāpṛthivī ahṛṇīyamānā ityetena sūktena juhuyāt // KauśS_13,23{115}.2 //
analyzed: teṣām īśānam vaśinī naḥ adya pradattā dyāvāpṛthivī a hṛṇīyamānā iti etena sūktena juhuyāt

original: śāntyudakādi ājyabhāgāntaṃ kṛtvā 'payo deveṣu' sūktenājyaṃ juhuyāt /
analyzed: śāntyudaka ādi ājyabhāga antam kṛtvā payaḥ deveṣu sūktena ājyam juhuyāt

original: gaurvāśvo vāśvataro vā puruṣo vetyādi phenaṃ bhakṣayati tatrādbhutaśāntiḥ samāptā //
analyzed: gauḥ vā aśvaḥ vā aśvataraḥ vā puruṣaḥ vā ityādi phenam bhakṣayati tatra adbhuta śāntiḥ samāptā

original: atha yatraitat pipīlikā anācārarūpā dṛśyante tatra śāntirucyate-
analyzed: atha yatra etat pipīlikāḥ anācāra rūpāḥ dṛśyante tatra śāntiḥ ucyate

original: [atha yatraitat pipīlikā anācārarūpā dṛśyante tatra juhuyāt // KauśS_13,24{116}.1 //
analyzed: atha yatra etat pipīlikāḥ anācāra rūpāḥ dṛśyante tatra juhuyāt

original: bhuvāya svāhā bhuvanāya svāhā bhuvanapataye svāhā bhuvāṃ pataye svāhāvoṣāya svāhā vinatāya svāhā //
analyzed: bhuvāya svāhā bhuvanāya svāhā bhuvana pataye svāhā bhuvām pataye svāhā avoṣāya svāhā vinatāya svāhā

original: yaḥ prācyāṃ diśi śvetapipīlikānāṃ rājā tasmai svāhā //
analyzed: yaḥ prācyām diśi śveta pipīlikānām rājā tasmai svāhā

original: yo dakṣiṇāyāṃ diśi kṛṣṇapipīlikānāṃ rājā tasmai svāhā //
analyzed: yaḥ dakṣiṇāyām diśi kṛṣṇa pipīlikānām rājā tasmai svāhā

original: yaḥ pratīcyāṃ diśi rajatapipīlikānāṃ rājā tasmai svāhā //
analyzed: yaḥ pratīcyām diśi rajata pipīlikānām rājā tasmai svāhā

original: ya udīcyāṃ diśi rohitapipīlikānāṃ rājā tasmai svāhā //
analyzed: yaḥ udīcyām diśi rohita pipīlikānām rājā tasmai svāhā

original: yo dhruvāyāṃ diśi babhrupipīlikānāṃ rājā tasmai svāhā //
analyzed: yaḥ dhruvāyām diśi babhru pipīlikānām rājā tasmai svāhā

original: yo vyadhvāyāṃ diśi haritapipīlikānāṃ rājā tasmai svāhā //
analyzed: yaḥ vyadhvāyām diśi harita pipīlikānām rājā tasmai svāhā

original: ya ūrdhvāyāṃ diśyaruṇapipīlikānāṃ rājā tasmai svāhā // KauśS_13,24{116}.3 //]
analyzed: yaḥ ūrdhvāyām diśi aruṇa pipīlikānām rājā tasmai svāhā

original: śāntyudakādi ājyabhāgāntaṃ kṛtvā 'bhuvāya svāhā' iti sūktenājyaṃ juhuyāt /
analyzed: śāntyudaka ādi ājyabhāga antam kṛtvā bhuvāya svāhā iti sūktena ājyam juhuyāt

original: raktā kṛṣṇā pītā vā bahuśaḥ pipīlikā bhavanti tatra śāntiḥ //
analyzed: raktā kṛṣṇā pītā vā bahuśas pipīlikāḥ bhavanti tatra śāntiḥ
tāḥ ced etāvatā na śāmyeyuḥ tatas uttaram agnim upasamādhāya

original: śaramayaṃ barhirubhayataḥ parichinnaṃ prasavyaṃ paristīrya // KauśS_13,24{116}.5 //
analyzed: śara mayam barhiḥ ubhayatas parichinnam prasavyam paristīrya

original: viṣāvadhvastamiṅgiḍamājyaṃ śākapalāśenotpūtaṃ bādhakena sruveṇa juhoti // KauśS_13,24{116}.6 //
analyzed: viṣa avadhvastam iṅgiḍam ājyam śāka palāśena utpūtam bādhakena sruveṇa juhoti
uttiṣṭhata nirdravata na vaḥ iha astu iti añcanam

original: indro vaḥ sarvāsāṃ sākaṃ garbhānāṇḍāni bhetsyati //
analyzed: indraḥ vaḥ sarvāsām sākam garbhān ā aṇḍāni bhetsyati

original: indro vo yamo vo varuṇo vo'gnirvo vāyurvaḥ sūryo vaścandro vaḥ prajāpatirva īśāno vaḥ iti // KauśS_13,24{116}.8 //]
analyzed: indraḥ vaḥ yamaḥ vaḥ varuṇaḥ vaḥ agniḥ vaḥ vāyuḥ vaḥ sūryaḥ vaḥ candraḥ vaḥ prajāpatiḥ vaḥ īśānaḥ vaḥ iti

original: śāntyudakādi ājyabhāgāntaṃ kṛtvā śaramayaṃ barhirubhayataḥ paricchinnaṃ prasavyaṃ paristaraṇaṃ viṣāvadhvastamiṅgiḍamājyam /
analyzed: śāntyudaka ādi ājyabhāga antam kṛtvā śara mayam barhiḥ ubhayatas paricchinnam prasavyam paristaraṇam viṣa avadhvastam iṅgiḍam ājyam
śāka palāśena ājyasya utpavanam bādhakena sruveṇa homaḥ
uttiṣṭhata nirdravatam iti sūktena iṅgiḍam juhoti
ukta anuktasya iti pañca paṭalikāyām uktam punarukta lakṣaṇam

original: anyā yadi pipīlikā dṛṣṭvā vyādhiṃ janayati raktakṛṣṇaśvetapītanīlā anekavidhāḥ pipīlikā gṛhe bhavanti /
analyzed: anyāḥ yadi pipīlikāḥ dṛṣṭvā vyādhim janayati rakta kṛṣṇa śveta pīta nīlāḥ anekavidhāḥ pipīlikāḥ gṛhe bhavanti

original: agniśaraṇe vā kṣetre vā nagare vā grāme vā api bahuśo bhavanti /
analyzed: agni śaraṇe vā kṣetre vā nagare vā grāme vā api bahuśas bhavanti

original: annamadhye rasamadhye ghṛte vā ājātvatā dṛśyante tatrābhicāraḥ kriyate //
analyzed: anna madhye rasa madhye ghṛte vā ājātvatāḥ dṛśyante tatra abhicāraḥ kriyate

original: [atha yatraitannīlamakṣā anācārarūpā dṛśyante tatra juhuyāt // KauśS_13,25{117}.1 //
analyzed: atha yatra etat nīla makṣāḥ anācāra rūpāḥ dṛśyante tatra juhuyāt

original: yā matyaiḥ sarathaṃ yānti ghorā mṛtyordūtyaḥ kraviśaḥ saṃ babhūvuḥ /
analyzed: yāḥ matyaiḥ sa ratham yānti ghorāḥ mṛtyoḥ dūtyaḥ sam babhūvuḥ

original: śivaṃ cakṣuruta ghoṣaḥ śivānāṃ śaṃ no astu dvipade śaṃ catuṣpade //
analyzed: śivam cakṣuḥ uta ghoṣaḥ śivānām śam naḥ astu dvipade śam catuṣpade

original: śāntaṃ cakṣuruta vāyasīnāṃ yā cāsāṃ ghorā manaso visṛṣṭiḥ /
analyzed: śāntam cakṣuḥ uta vāyasīnām yā ca āsām ghorā manasaḥ visṛṣṭiḥ

original: manasaspate tanvā mā pāhi ghorānmā vi rikṣi tanvā mā prajayā mā paśubhirvāyave svāhā iti hutvā // KauśS_13,25{117}.2 //
analyzed: manasaspate tanvā mā pāhi ghorāt mā vi rikṣi tanvā mā prajayā mā paśubhiḥ vāyave svāhā iti hutvā

original: vāta ā vātu bheṣajam ityetena sūktena juhuyāt // KauśS_13,25{117}.3 //
analyzed: vātaḥ ā vātu bheṣajam iti etena sūktena juhuyāt

original: vāta ā vātu bheṣajaṃ śambhu mayobhu no hṛde /
analyzed: vātaḥ ā vātu bheṣajam śambhu mayobhu naḥ hṛde

original: uta vāta pitāsi na uta bhrātota naḥ sakhā /
analyzed: uta vāta pitā asi naḥ uta bhrātā uta naḥ sakhā

original: yadado vāta te gṛhe nihitaṃ bheṣajaṃ guhā /
analyzed: yat adaḥ vāta te gṛhe nihitam bheṣajam guhā

original: tasya no dhehi jīvase ityetena sūktena juhuyāt // KauśS_13,25{117}.4 //
analyzed: tasya naḥ dhehi jīvase iti etena sūktena juhuyāt

original: śāntyudakādi ājyabhāgāntaṃ kṛtvā 'yā matyaiḥ saratham' iti sūktena 'vāta ā vātu bheṣajam' iti sūktena ca dvābhyāmājyaṃ juhoti /
analyzed: śāntyudaka ādi ājyabhāga antam kṛtvā yā matyaiḥ sa ratham iti sūktena vātaḥ ā vātu bheṣajam iti sūktena ca dvābhyām ājyam juhoti

original: nīlamakṣikā gṛhe patati anyavarṇā vā bhavanti makṣikāśāntiḥ samāptā //
analyzed: nīla makṣikā gṛhe patati anya varṇā vā bhavanti makṣikā śāntiḥ samāptā
atha madhu jālake gṛhe lagna śāntiḥ ucyate

original: [atha yatraitanmadhumakṣikā anācārarūpā dṛśyante madhu vātā ṛtāyate (KauśS 91.1)
analyzed: atha yatra etat madhumakṣikāḥ anācāra rūpāḥ dṛśyante madhu vātāḥ ṛtāyate kauśs

original: śāntyudakamājyabhāgāntaṃ kṛtvā 'madhu vātā ṛtāyate' ityetena sūktenājyaṃ juhuyāt /
analyzed: śāntyudakam ājyabhāga antam kṛtvā madhu vātāḥ ṛtāyate iti etena sūktena ājyam juhuyāt

original: madhujālake gṛhe lagne'bhyantare bahirvā dṛṣṭadeśe vā lagne tatra śāntiḥ samāptā //
analyzed: madhu jālake gṛhe lagna ibhyantare bahis vā dṛṣṭa deśe vā lagne tatra śāntiḥ samāptā
atha yatra etat an ājñātam adbhutam dṛśyate tatra juhuyāt
yat an ājñātam an āmnātam arthasya karmaṇaḥ mithas

original: agne tvaṃ nastasmāt pāhi sa hi vettha yathāyatham //
analyzed: agne tvam naḥ tasmāt pāhi sa hi vettha yathāyatham

original: vāyo, sūrya, candra iti ca // KauśS_13,27{119}.3 //

analyzed: puruṣa sammita ūrthaḥ karma arthaḥ puruṣa sammitaḥ

original: vāyurmā tasmāt pātu sa hi vettha yathāyatham //
analyzed: vāyuḥ mā tasmāt pātu sa hi vettha yathāyatham

original: śāntyudakādi ājyabhāgāntaṃ kṛtvā 'yadājñātam' iti 'puruṣasammitaḥ' sūktābhyāmājyaṃ juhuyāt /
analyzed: śāntyudaka ādi ājyabhāga antam kṛtvā yat ājñātam iti puruṣa sammitaḥ sūktābhyām ājyam juhuyāt

original: yadapi pariśiṣṭeṣu paṭhyate sarve gṛhe praviṣṭe sarvamevālpakaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarvasammito
analyzed: yat api pariśiṣṭeṣu paṭhyate sarve gṛhe praviṣṭe sarvam eva alpakam dṛṣṭvā sarva sammitaḥ

original: vāyuṃ sambhrame udakaprādurbhāve gamaneṣu dhanuḥsandhyolkāḥ pariveṣāḥ vidyuddaṇḍāśaniparipraparighārddhe
analyzed: vāyum sambhrame udaka prādurbhāve gamaneṣu dhanuḥ sandhyā ulkāḥ pariveṣāḥ vidyut daṇḍa aśani paripra parigha arddhe
nirghāte rajaḥ varṣa aupala varṣa dakṣi madhu ghṛta varṣa majjā rudhira varṣa ti hīna gabhastī

original: dve mārge vidyut vittakṣaye somasya kṣaye pūrṇapūraṇe kṣayasyavabhāsā sadyopararātrādi
analyzed: dve mārge vidyut vitta kṣaye somasya kṣaye pūrṇa pūraṇe kṣayasya avabhāsā sadyas upararātra ādi

prāsāda toraṇa aṭṭāla dhvaja chatre ca vāyasāḥ samavāyāt vṛka śakaṭa ārohaṇam
śyenāḥ ca tāni gṛdhra ādīnām dhvaja āliṅghanam

original: vikṛtāśca mānuṣo manujā manuṣaprabhavāḥ striyo vā bālaṃ vā vṛddhaṃ vā pralāpāḥ yuvānaḥ
analyzed: vikṛtāḥ ca mānuṣaḥ manujāḥ manuṣa prabhavāḥ striyaḥ vā bālam vā vṛddham vā pralāpāḥ yuvānaḥ

original: vā yuvataraḥ pralapati pradīptendriyayaṣṭipādabhaṅge dravye dvicchāyāpraticchāyāmṛjyatamapṛktam /
analyzed: vā yuvataraḥ pralapati pradīpta indriya yaṣṭi pāda bhaṅge dravye dvi chāyā praticchāyā mṛjyatama pṛktam
atas ūrdhvam chāyām adha chāyām adhya chāyā ūrdhva chāyāḥ akasmāt caitya vṛkṣa stambha patane

original: virohaṇāt skandharohe maṣṭatyachinnaparṇa pramā vā śuṣko vā śuṣkaśākhino dhūmarajataudakaprādurbhāvagamaneṣu
analyzed: virohaṇāt skandharohe pramā vā śuṣkaḥ vā śuṣka śākhinaḥ dhūma rajata audaka prādurbhāva gamaneṣu

original: vanaspatiṣu vanataruṣu bāhuśastrabhaṅge vā indranīlagopurāṭṭālakādi dhvajachatrādīnāṃ
analyzed: vanaspatiṣu vana taruṣu bāhu śastra bhaṅge vā indranīla gopura aṭṭālaka ādi dhvaja chatra ādīnām

original: bhaṅgeṣu vā bhaṅgaḥ ucitānyabhyucchedane'nucitānāṃ pravartane dṛḍhabhaṅge vā śuṣkavirohe
analyzed: bhaṅgeṣu vā bhaṅgaḥ pravartane dṛḍha bhaṅge vā śuṣka virohe

original: gṛhe valmīke śayanadeśe garbhāstasyotpattau viparītau mitraprītau ca devatārcanayoḥ
analyzed: gṛhe valmīke śayana deśe garbhāḥ tasya utpattau viparītau mitra prītau ca devatā arcanayoḥ

original: anayoḥ chedane yatra ca rājā prasṛtyādiṣu ca bhavanti /
analyzed: anayoḥ chedane yatra ca rājā prasṛti ādiṣu ca bhavanti

original: yadā tu prakṛtiḥ somaḥ viparītaṃ hi dṛśyati.
analyzed: yadā tu prakṛtiḥ somaḥ viparītam hi dṛśyati
madhye chidram iti dṛśyet maraṇam rāja gocaram

original: yadā tu pratipatsomaḥ prakṛtyā vikṛto bhavet.
analyzed: yadā tu pratipad somaḥ prakṛtyā vikṛtaḥ bhavet
an udbhinnaḥ vilūne vā rājñaḥ maraṇam ādiśet
āyudha ākāra rūpāṇi śata varṇa ākṛtīni ca
pañca varṇāni ca abhrāṇi tathā daṇḍa nibhāni ca
yadā candra arkayoḥ madhye kṛṣṇam bhavati maṇḍalam
sam śaṅkuḥ iti vijñeyaḥ grahaḥ parama dāruṇaḥ
tatra rājā vadham vindyāt sarva bhūta bhaya āvaham

original: atha yasminneva janapade gobrāhmaṇasūtasāṃvatsaravaidyānāṃ parivrājakacāraṇavānaprasthabrahmacāriṇāṃ strīṇāṃ vāpyaparaḥ pravartante tadbhutaṃ  #
analyzed: atha yasmin eva janapade go brāhmaṇa sūta sāṃvatsara vaidyānām parivrājaka cāraṇa vānaprastha brahmacāriṇām strīṇām vā api aparaḥ pravartante tat bhutam
tat karma saṅkaram yajana vyavahāra yajña saṅkaram ca bhavataḥ

original: yatra ca dharmo'dharmeṇa pīḍyate tatra dharmo adharmeṣu tadādbhutaṃ vidyāt /
analyzed: yatra ca dharmaḥ dharmeṇa pīḍyate tatra dharmaḥ adharmeṣu tat adbhutam vidyāt

original: brāhmaṇakṣatriyavaiśyaśūdrādi parasparaṃ bādhate eteṣu yadi śāntiṃ na kuryāt tadā mahādbhutāni bhavanti /
analyzed: brāhmaṇa kṣatriya vaiśya śūdra ādi parasparam bādhate eteṣu yadi śāntim na kuryāt tadā mahā adbhutāni bhavanti

original: devatāprādurbhāvagamaneṣu paravante ca anṛte gavāṃ roge pravṛtte /
analyzed: devatā prādurbhāva gamaneṣu ca anṛte gavām roge pravṛtte

original: durbhikṣe ca janapadādivināśe ādityabhedeṣu mūṣikeṣu pravṛtteṣu kīṭapataṅge matkuṇayūkālikṣāpakṣiṇe
analyzed: durbhikṣe ca janapada ādi vināśe āditya bhedeṣu mūṣikeṣu pravṛtteṣu kīṭa pataṅge matkuṇa yūka ālikṣā pakṣiṇe
pravṛtte rāja kula vāde aśva astram śastram vā gṛha sarva gaja vāji vastra alaṅkāra pīṭhikā vyañjanāni
agninā pradaheta ariṣṭa darśane śānti bhedaḥ
pṛthivyām antarikṣe divye ca eṣā śāntiḥ

original: sevitaṃ rājamaśvānāṃ pakṣiṇāṃ mṛgāṇāṃ ṣaṇmukhānāṃ tathā rūpāṇi vikṛtāni yatrāraṇyaṃ
analyzed: sevitam rājam aśvānām pakṣiṇām mṛgāṇām ṣaṇmukhānām tathā rūpāṇi vikṛtāni yatra araṇyam

original: ca pathi ca tathā rājā darvīnāṃ kṛtatritākṣīṇāṃ grāme kule vā yadi vāpi deśe rājanyamānyeṣu
analyzed: ca pathi ca tathā rājā darvīnām kṛta trita akṣīṇām grāme kule vā yadi vā api deśe rājanyamānyeṣu

original: tathā dvijeṣu bhāvaḥ paśūnāṃ vikṛtau rūpaḥ tathā mānuṣe ca.
analyzed: tathā dvijeṣu bhāvaḥ paśūnām vikṛtau rūpaḥ tathā mānuṣe ca

original: atha svanakṣatraṃ ahopahatamulkābhihataṃ grastaṃ nirastamupadhūpitaṃ vā yadasyojjanmanakṣatraṃ
analyzed: atha sva nakṣatram aha upahatam ulkā abhihatam grastam nirastam upadhūpitam vā yat asya ujjanma nakṣatram

original: karmanakṣatramabhiṣecanīyaṃ janapadanakṣatraṃ rājaṣṭame candramasaḥ sthāne vajre'vasṛṣṭe
analyzed: karma nakṣatram abhiṣecanīyam janapada nakṣatram rājaṣṭame candramasaḥ sthāne vajra iva sṛṣṭe

original: skambhe vāvasṛṣṭe skandhe vāvasṛṣṭe nānārūpabahurūpe śṛṅgiṇi vādityena kilavati cembudani
analyzed: skambhe vā avasṛṣṭe skandhe vā avasṛṣṭe nānā rūpa bahu rūpe śṛṅgiṇi vā ādityena kilavati ca imbudani

original: colkābhihate kambu dhuvati ṣavati hasati hāse bhāse nāde śabde vāsate ca vaiśvānaraprajvalite
analyzed: ca ulkā abhihate kambu dhuvati savati hasati hāse bhāse nāde śabde vā asate ca vaiśvānara prajvalite

original: antarikṣe ca bhasma asthi aṅgārā gṛhe vā śirasi vā patanti vīdhrī cendradhanuṣi rātrau
analyzed: antarikṣe ca bhasma asthi aṅgārāḥ gṛhe vā śirasi vā patanti vīdhrī ca indradhanuṣi rātrau
vīdhre eva tu candra arka nakṣatra graha tārā ādi parikhe kāka kapota gṛdhra yakṣa rākṣasa piśāca śvāpadeṣu

original: rātrau vadatsu gāyatsu vādyatsu vāte prādurbhāvagamane cakradhvajaveśmāvasavaprasādāgrāṃ
analyzed: rātrau vadatsu gāyatsu vādyatsu vāte prādurbhāva gamane cakra dhvaja veśma avasava prasāda agrām

original: vā kūpa udadhāne codgirati nadati vidyotati rathayantrapravahaṇavāditrāṇi sūktādayodgārā
analyzed: vā kūpe uda dhāne ca udgirati nadati vidyotati ratha yantra pravahaṇa vāditrāṇi sūkta ādayaḥ udgārā

original: dhūmarci vā prādurbhāvaliṅgāṅgaviliṅge rājñaḥ prādurbhāve vā rājñī rājā kākolūkakṛkalāsagṛhagodhikāvāsenādhipatite
analyzed: dhūma ṛci vā prādurbhāva liṅga aṅga viliṅge rājñaḥ prādurbhāve vā rājñī rājā kāka ulūka kṛkalāsa gṛha godhikā vāsena adhipatite

original: rājachatre bhagne dhvaje śukrasya bhagne rājñe daṇḍasya bhagne hastinyāṃ ca mattāyāṃ
analyzed: rāja chatre bhagne dhvaje śukrasya bhagne rājñe daṇḍasya bhagne hastinyām ca mattāyām

original: grāme ca prasūtāyāṃ rājarathaśca rājādhirūḍho bhagnākṣaḥ saptarātrau rājño hanti /
analyzed: grāme ca prasūtāyām rāja rathaḥ ca rāja adhirūḍhaḥ bhagna akṣaḥ sapta rātrau rājñaḥ hanti

original: purohitavināśe vā senāpatināśe hastinaṃ mahiṣīvināśe kumāravināśe paśumānuṣe vā vikāraḥ /
analyzed: purohita vināśe vā senāpati nāśe hastinam mahiṣī vināśe kumāra vināśe paśu mānuṣe vā vikāraḥ

original: dviśīrṣā pratiśīrṣā vā pādahasti tathaiva ca dvināsikaḥ tathā hīnādhikāṅgulivināśe taistu jāyate /
analyzed: dvi śīrṣā pratiśīrṣā vā pāda hasti tathā eva ca dvi nāsikaḥ tathā hīna adhika aṅguli vināśe taiḥ tu jāyate
tathā pāda jaṅghayoḥ karṇa nāsikā vināśe śira chedaḥ tu jāyate
bījam yatra praroheta phala madhye pramādataḥ
madhu ājya dadhi dugdheṣu bhakṣamāṇe vilepane
yantra vāhana harmyeṣu bhavaneṣu āyudheṣu ca
kāka ulūka kapotānām advīḥ vā darśanam bhavet
anye ca praśnānām agame mṛga pakṣiṇām
kṛṣṇa yugmānām darśanam gṛhe vā amita tejasaḥ
sarpāṇām darśanam ca eva sarīsṛpa gaṇasya vā
vikārāḥ yatra dṛśyante kṣīra odana haviḥṣu vā
āyuḥ janānām puruṣasya tathā āyuṣyasya yuñjanāt
yānti yānāni ayuktāni vinā vātaiḥ nṛbhiḥ tathā

original: yuktāni vā na gacchanti narendrāṇāṃ mahadbhayam.
analyzed: yuktāni vā na gacchanti narendrāṇām mahat bhayam
bheryaḥ mṛdaṅgāḥ paṭahāḥ vādyante vā api anāhatāḥ

original: āhatāśca na vādyante acalāni calanti vā.
analyzed: āhatāḥ ca na vādyante acalāni calanti vā
araṇye tūrya nirghoṣaḥ yadi śrūyeta nābhasaḥ

original: goṣṭho vā nṛtyate yatra haste darvī kadācana.
analyzed: goṣṭhaḥ vā nṛtyate yatra haste darvī kadācana

original: nārī vā dhayate nārīṃ jāyate taṇḍulaṃ bhayam.
analyzed: nārī vā dhayate nārīm jāyate taṇḍulam bhayam
śakunānām payasi tathā eva mṛga pakṣiṇām
yoni vyatikare vaidhā māṃsa śoṇita varṣaṇe
anagni jvalane ca eva tathā na abhra varṣaṇe
śastra prajvalane ca eva caitya śuṣka avarohaṇe
liṅga āyatana citrāṇām rodane garjane tathā
matsya sarpa dvijātīnām rasānām ca pravarṣaṇe
gīta vāditra śabdāḥ tu yatra syuḥ animittataḥ
ye ca anye kiñcid utpātāḥ jāyante vikṛta ātmakāḥ
teṣām sarveṣām utpātānām eṣā śāntiḥ vidhīyate

original: candraprātipadike grahayuddhe grahasaṅgrahe rāhucāre ketucāre rāhuketulakṣaṇe kūmavibhāge
analyzed: candra prātipadike graha yuddhe graha saṅgrahe rāhu cāre ketu cāre rāhu ketu lakṣaṇe kūma vibhāge

original: maṇḍaleṣu digdāheṣu ulkāpataneṣu vidyutpataneṣu vidyuddarśaneṣu nirghātapataneṣu
analyzed: maṇḍaleṣu digdāheṣu ulkā pataneṣu vidyut pataneṣu vidyut darśaneṣu nirghāta pataneṣu
candra sūryayoḥ pariveṣe nakṣatra graha utpāta lakṣaṇe utpāta lakṣaṇe sadyas vṛṣṭi lakṣaṇe

original: adbhutaśāntipaṭhiteṣu svapnādhyāyapaṭhiteṣu duḥsvapneṣu sarveṣu yadājñātā śāntiḥ /
analyzed: adbhuta śānti paṭhiteṣu svapnādhyāya paṭhiteṣu duḥsvapneṣu sarveṣu yadā ājñātā śāntiḥ

original: atharvahṛdayeṣu adbhuteṣu paṭhiteṣu bhārgavīyeṣu paṭhiteṣu gārgyapaṭhiteṣu adbhuteṣu
analyzed: atharvahṛdayeṣu adbhuteṣu paṭhiteṣu bhārgavīyeṣu paṭhiteṣu gārgya paṭhiteṣu adbhuteṣu

original: bārhaspatyagrantheṣu paṭhiteṣu uśanasagrantheṣu paṭhiteṣu mahādbhuteṣu paṭhiteṣu
analyzed: bārhaspatya grantheṣu paṭhiteṣu uśanasa grantheṣu paṭhiteṣu mahā adbhuteṣu paṭhiteṣu

original: itihāsapurāṇe jyotiḥśāstre aśvavaidyake naravaidyakeṣu paṭhiteṣu adbhuteṣu sarvādbhuteṣu eṣā śāntiḥ /
analyzed: itihāsa purāṇe jyotiḥśāstre aśva vaidyake nara vaidyakeṣu paṭhiteṣu adbhuteṣu sarva adbhuteṣu eṣā śāntiḥ

original: athavā mahāśāntiramṛtā ghṛtakambalaṃ koṭihomaḥ sarvādbhuteṣu kauśikāpaṭhiteṣu eṣā śāntiḥ mahāśāntirvā vikalpāt iti bhāṣyakāraḥ //
analyzed: athavā mahāśāntiḥ amṛtā ghṛtakambalam koṭi homaḥ sarva adbhuteṣu kauśika a paṭhiteṣu eṣā śāntiḥ mahāśāntiḥ vā vikalpāt iti bhāṣyakāraḥ
agni śaraṇe vā samajyāyām vā avadaraṇe śāntiḥ ucyate

original: [atha yatraitadgrāme vāvasāne vāgniśaraṇe vā samajyāyāṃ vāvadīryeta catasro dhenava upaklṛptā bhavanti śvetā kṛṣṇā rohiṇī surūpā caturthī //
analyzed: atha yatra etat grāme vā avasāne vā agni śaraṇe vā samajyāyām vā avadīryeta catasraḥ dhenavaḥ upaklṛptāḥ bhavanti śvetā kṛṣṇā rohiṇī surūpā caturthī

original: tāsāmetad dvādaśarātraṃ sandugdhaṃ navanītaṃ nidadhāti // KauśS_13,28{120}.2 //
analyzed: tāsām etat dvādaśa rātram sandugdham navanītam nidadhāti

original: dvādaśyāḥ prātaryatraivādo'vadīrṇaṃ bhavati tata uttaramagnimupasamādhāya // KauśS_13,28{120}.3 //
analyzed: dvādaśyāḥ prātar yatra eva adaḥ vadīrṇam bhavati tatas uttaram agnim upasamādhāya

original: parisamuhya paryukṣya paristīrya barhiḥ śvetāyā ājyena sannīya // KauśS_13,28{120}.4 //
analyzed: parisamuhya paryukṣya paristīrya barhiḥ śvetāyāḥ ājyena sannīya

original: sīraṃ vaiśyo'śvaṃ prādeśiko grāmavaraṃ rājā // KauśS_13,28{120}.13 //
analyzed: sīram vaiśya uśvam prādeśikaḥ grāma varam rājā

original: catasro dhenava upaklṛptā bhavanti śvetā kṛṣṇā rohiṇī surūpā caturthī /
analyzed: catasraḥ dhenavaḥ upaklṛptāḥ bhavanti śvetā kṛṣṇā rohiṇī surūpā caturthī
tāsām etat dvādaśa rātram sandugdham navanītam nidadhāti

original: dvādaśyāḥ prātaryatraivādo'vadīrṇaṃ bhavati tata uttarataḥ śāntyudakādi ājyabhāgāntaṃ
analyzed: dvādaśyāḥ prātar yatra eva ādaḥ avadīrṇam bhavati tatas uttaratas śāntyudaka ādi ājyabhāga antam

original: kṛtvā śvetāyā ājyena odanaṃ sannīya tataḥ 'agnirbhūmyām' iti tisṛbhiranvālabhya gṛhaṃ
analyzed: kṛtvā śvetāyāḥ ājyena odanam sannīya tatas agniḥ bhūmyām iti tisṛbhiḥ anvālabhya gṛham

original: tathā kṛṣṇāyā dakṣiṇārdhe tathā rohiṇyā dakṣiṇārdhe tathā surūpāyā dakṣiṇārdhe tasminnevāgnau
analyzed: tathā kṛṣṇāyāḥ dakṣiṇa ardhe tathā rohiṇyāḥ dakṣiṇa ardhe tathā surūpāyāḥ dakṣiṇa ardhe tasmin eva agnau

original: odanamājyena sannīya tato vāstoṣpatyena gaṇenājyaṃ juhvannavadīrṇadeśaṃ sampātānānayati /
analyzed: odanam ājyena sannīya tatas vāstoṣpatyena gaṇena ājyam juhvan avadīrṇa deśam sampātān ānayati

original: gṛhe patite grāme vā śmaśāne vā agniśaraṇe vā kṣetrabhūmipātane bhūmicchidradarśane bhūmipāte gṛhapāte grāmādipatane eṣā śāntiḥ /
analyzed: gṛhe patite grāme vā śmaśāne vā agni śaraṇe vā kṣetra bhūmi pātane bhūmi chidra darśane bhūmi pāte gṛha pāte grāma ādi patane eṣā śāntiḥ

original: athavā caturdikṣu catvāri vā tantrāṇi yathāsaṅkhyam /
analyzed: athavā catur dikṣu catvāri vā tantrāṇi yathāsaṅkhyam

original: pūrvaṃ samāpya tantraṃ tato dakṣiṇataḥ paścāduttarataḥ /
analyzed: pūrvam samāpya tantram tatas dakṣiṇatas paścāt uttaratas

original: samāpya tantraṃ śāntyudakena samprokṣya tā gā brāhmaṇo dadyāt /
analyzed: samāpya tantram śāntyudakena samprokṣya tāḥ gāḥ brāhmaṇaḥ dadyāt

original: atha yatraitadanudakadeśe udakātiśayo bhavati tatra śāntirucyate-
analyzed: atha yatra etat anudaka deśe udaka atiśayaḥ bhavati tatra śāntiḥ ucyate
atha yatra etat anudakaḥ udaka unmīlaḥ bhavati hiraṇya varṇāḥ

iti apām sūktaiḥ sarvaiḥ ājyam juhoti
anudaka deśe yadi atiśayena udakam dṛśyate

original: atha tilāḥ samatalā bhavanti tatra śāntirucyate-
analyzed: atha tilāḥ sama talāḥ bhavanti tatra śāntiḥ ucyate

original: [atha yatraitat tilāḥ samatailā bhavanti tatra juhuyāt // KauśS_13,30{122}.1 //
analyzed: atha yatra etat tilāḥ sama tailāḥ bhavanti tatra juhuyāt

original: sa yaṃ dviṣyāt tasyāśāyāṃ lohitaṃ te pra siñcāmi iti dakṣiṇāmukhaḥ prasiñcet // KauśS_13,30{122}.3 //]
analyzed: sa yam dviṣyāt tasya āśāyām lohitam te pra siñcāmi iti dakṣiṇā mukhaḥ prasiñcet

original: śāntyudakādi ājyabhāgāntaṃ kṛtvā 'anūnāya svāhā' ityetaiścaturbhirājyaṃ juhoti /

analyzed: sa yam dviṣyāt iti mantreṇa dakṣiṇā mukhaḥ bhūtvā śāntyudakena tilān siñcet

original: yadā tailaṃ na bhavati tadā śāntiḥ /
analyzed: yadā tailam na bhavati tadā śāntiḥ

original: atha vapāṃ vā havīṃṣi vā vayāṃsi dvipadacatuṣpadaṃ vābhimṛśyāvagaccheyustatra śāntirucyate-
analyzed: atha vapām vā havīṃṣi vā vayāṃsi dvipada catuṣpadam vā abhimṛśya avagaccheyuḥ tatra śāntiḥ ucyate

original: [atha yatraitadvapāṃ vā havīṃṣi vā vayāṃsi dvipadacatuṣpadaṃ vābhimṛśyāvagacheyuḥ ye agnayaḥ (3.21)
analyzed: atha yatra etat vapām vā havīṃṣi vā vayāṃsi dvipada catuṣpadam vā abhimṛśya avagaccheyuḥ ye agnayaḥ
śāntyudaka ādi ājyabhāga antam kṛtvā ye agnayaḥ
namaḥ deva vadhebhyaḥ iti etābhyām sūktābhyām ājyam juhuyāt

original: atha kumārasya kumāryā vā dvāvāvartau mūrdhanyau bhavataḥ savyāvṛdeko deśāvarte śāntirucyate-
analyzed: atha kumārasya kumāryāḥ vā dvau āvartau mūrdhanyau bhavataḥ savya āvṛt ekaḥ deśa āvarte śāntiḥ ucyate

original: [atha yatraitat kumārasya kumāryā vā dvāvāvartau mūrdhanyau bhavataḥ savyāvṛdeko deśāvartastatra juhuyāt // KauśS_13,32{124}.1 //
analyzed: atha yatra etat kumārasya kumāryāḥ vā dvau āvartau mūrdhanyau bhavataḥ savya āvṛt ekaḥ deśa āvartaḥ tatra juhuyāt

original: tvaṣṭā rūpāṇi bahudhā vikurvañjanayan prajā bahudhā viśvarūpāḥ /
analyzed: tvaṣṭā rūpāṇi bahudhā vikurvan janayan prajāḥ bahudhā viśva rūpāḥ

original: antargarbheṣu bahudhā saṃ tanoti janayan prajā bahudhā viśvarūpāḥ /
analyzed: antargarbheṣu bahudhā sam tanoti janayan prajāḥ bahudhā viśva rūpāḥ
sa me karotu aviparītam asmān anupūrvam kalpayatām iha eva

original: yadyunmṛṣṭaṃ yadi vābhimṛṣṭaṃ tiraścīnartha uta marmṛjante /
analyzed: yadi unmṛṣṭam yadi vā abhimṛṣṭam uta marmṛjante

original: śivaṃ taddevaḥ savitā kṛṇotu prajāpatiḥ prajābhiḥ saṃvidānaḥ //
analyzed: śivam tat devaḥ savitā kṛṇotu prajāpatiḥ prajābhiḥ saṃvidānaḥ

original: savyāvṛttānyuta yā viśvarūpā pratyagvṛttānyuta yā te paruḥṣu /
analyzed: savya āvṛttāni uta yā viśva rūpā pratyak vṛttāni uta yā te paruḥṣu

original: tānyasya deva bahudhā bahūni syonāni śagmāni śivāni santu //
analyzed: tāni asya deva bahudhā bahūni syonāni śagmāni śivāni santu

original: śāntyudakādyājyatantraṃ kṛtvā 'tvaṣṭā rūpāṇi bahudhā' iti sūktenājyaṃ juhuyāt /
analyzed: śāntyudaka ādi ājya tantram kṛtvā tvaṣṭā rūpāṇi bahudhā iti sūktena ājyam juhuyāt

original: 'tvaṣṭā me daivyaṃ vacaḥ' ityetena sūktena juhuyāt /
analyzed: tvaṣṭā me daivyam vacaḥ iti etena sūktena juhuyāt
atha yatra etat yūpaḥ virohati tatra juhuyāt

original: yūpo virohañchataśākho adhvaraḥ samāvṛto mohayiṣyanyajamānasya lokān /
analyzed: yūpaḥ virohan śata śākhaḥ adhvaraḥ samāvṛtaḥ mohayiṣyan yajamānasya lokān

original: vedābhigupto brahmaṇā parivṛto'tharvabhiḥ śāntaḥ sukṛtāmetu lokam //
analyzed: veda abhiguptaḥ brahmaṇā parivṛtaḥ utharvabhiḥ śāntaḥ sukṛtām etu lokam

original: yūpo hyarukṣaddviṣatāṃ vadhāya na me yajño yajamānaśca riṣyāt /
analyzed: yūpaḥ hi arukṣat dviṣatām vadhāya na me yajñaḥ yajamānaḥ ca riṣyāt

original: saptarṣīṇāṃ sukṛtāṃ yatra lokastatremaṃ yajñaṃ yajamānaṃ ca dhehi //
analyzed: saptarṣīṇām sukṛtām yatra lokaḥ tatra imam yajñam yajamānam ca dhehi
śāntyudaka ādi ājyabhāga antam kṛtvā yūpaḥ virohan śata śākhaḥ iti etena ājyam juhuyāt

original: atha divolkā patati tadayogakṣemāśaṅkaṃ bhavatyavṛṣṭyāśaṅkaṃ vā śāntirucyate-
analyzed: atha divā ulkā patati tad ayogakṣema āśaṅkam bhavati avṛṣṭi āśaṅkam vā śāntiḥ ucyate

original: [atha yatraitad divolkā patati tadayogakṣemāśaṅkaṃ bhavatyavṛṣṭyāśaṅkaṃ vā // KauśS_13,34{126}.1 // tatra]
analyzed: atha yatra etat divā ulkā patati tat ayogakṣema āśaṅkam bhavati avṛṣṭi āśaṅkam vā tatra

original: sa khalu pūrvaṃ navarātramāraṇyaśākamūlaphalabhakṣaścāthottaraṃ trirātraṃ nānyadudakāt // KauśS_13,34{126}.4 //
analyzed: sa khalu pūrvam nava rātram āraṇya śāka mūla phala bhakṣaḥ ca atha uttaram tri rātram na anyat udakāt

original: śvo bhūte sapta dhenava upaklṛptā bhavanti śvetā kṛṣṇā rohiṇī nīlī pāṭalā surūpā bahurūpā saptamī // KauśS_13,34{126}.5 //
analyzed: śvas bhūte sapta dhenavaḥ upaklṛptāḥ bhavanti śvetā kṛṣṇā rohiṇī nīlī pāṭalā surūpā bahu rūpā saptamī

original: tāsāmetad dvādaśarātraṃ sandugdhaṃ navanītaṃ nidadhāti // KauśS_13,34{126}.6 //
analyzed: tāsām etat dvādaśa rātram sandugdham navanītam nidadhāti

original: [dvādaśyāḥ prātaryatraivāsau patitā bhavati tata uttaramagnimupasamādhāya // KauśS_13,34{126}.7 //
analyzed: dvādaśyāḥ prātar yatra eva asau patitā bhavati tatas uttaram agnim upasamādhāya

original: athāmuṃ navanītaṃ sauvarṇe pātre vilāpya sauvarṇena sruveṇa rakṣoghnaiśca sūktaiḥ yāmāhustārakaiṣā vikeśī (5.17.4)
analyzed: atha amum navanītam sauvarṇe pātre vilāpya sauvarṇena sruveṇa rakṣaḥ ghnaiḥ ca sūktaiḥ yām āhuḥ tārakā eṣā vikeśī

original: dvādaśyāḥ prātaryatraivāsau patitā bhavati tataḥ śāntyudakādi ājyabhāgāntaṃ kṛtvā amuṃ navanītaṃ sauvarṇe pātre vilāpya sauvarṇena sruveṇa  #
analyzed: dvādaśyāḥ prātar yatra eva asau patitā bhavati tatas śāntyudaka ādi ājyabhāga antam kṛtvā amum navanītam sauvarṇe pātre vilāpya sauvarṇena sruveṇa
iti ādi cātana gaṇena yām āhuḥ tārakā eṣā vikeśī

original: sīraṃ vaiśyo'śvaṃ prādeśiko grāmavaraṃ rājā // KauśS_13,34{126}.13 //
analyzed: sīram vaiśya uśvam prādeśikaḥ grāma varam rājā
sarvatra dhenu ādīni ca kaṃsa vasanam ca

original: ulkāpāte vā mahānakṣatrapāte ca divā ahani divā ulkāpātane śāntiḥ samāptā //
analyzed: ulkā pāte vā mahā nakṣatra pāte ca divā ahani divā ulkā pātane śāntiḥ samāptā
atha yatra etat dhūmaketuḥ saptarṣīn upadhūpayati tat a yogakṣema āśaṅkam iti uktam

original: pañca paśavastāyante vāruṇaḥ kṛṣṇo gaurvājo vāvirvā harirvāyavyo bahurūpo diśyo mārutī meṣyāgneyaḥ prājāpatyaśca kṣīraudano'pāṃ naptra udraḥ
analyzed: pañca paśavaḥ tāyante vāruṇaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ gauḥ vājaḥ vā aviḥ vā hariḥ vāyavyaḥ bahu rūpaḥ diśyaḥ mārutī meṣī āgneyaḥ prājāpatyaḥ ca kṣīraudana upām naptre udraḥ
vāyo ā rundhi naḥ mṛgān asmabhyam mṛgayadbhyaḥ

original: sa no nediṣṭhamā kṛdhi vāto hi raśanākṛtaḥ iti vāyavyasya // KauśS_13,35{127}.5 //
analyzed: sa naḥ nediṣṭham ā kṛdhi vātaḥ hi raśanā kṛtaḥ iti vāyavyasya

original: prati tyaṃ cārumadhvaraṃ gopīthāya pra hūyase /
analyzed: prati tyam cārum adhvaram gopīthāya pra hūyase

original: marudbhiragna ā gahi iti mārutasya // KauśS_13,35{127}.7 //
analyzed: marudbhiḥ agne ā gahi iti mārutasya
apām sūktaiḥ hiraṇya śakalena saha udram apsu praveśayet

original: ekatantre vā kuryāt pṛthaktantre vā kuryāt /
analyzed: eka tantre vā kuryāt pṛthak tantre vā kuryāt
dvādaśa rātra vratam śāka mūla phala bhakṣaḥ nava rātram aśnanti
evam dvādaśa rātrau bhūtvā trayodaśa ihani karma prayogaḥ

original: pākatantramājyabhāgāntaṃ kṛtvā pañca paśavastāyante vāruṇaḥ kṛṣṇo'jaḥ vāyavo harito'jaḥ
analyzed: pāka tantram ājyabhāga antam kṛtvā pañca paśavaḥ tāyante vāruṇaḥ kṛṣṇa ojaḥ vāyavaḥ harita ojaḥ

original: diśyo bahurūpo'jaḥ mārutī meṣī apāṃ naptre udraḥ jalavirālaḥ biḍālo vā āgneyaśca
analyzed: diśyaḥ bahu rūpaḥ ojaḥ mārutī meṣī apām naptre udraḥ jala virālaḥ biḍālaḥ vā āgneyaḥ ca
tatra etat sūktam anuyojayati iti uktam
mahāśāntim uccais abhinigadanti iti sakṛt evamādīni yojayitavyāni
paśu viśasana ādīni vapā grahaṇam ca sakṛt
pūrva prakṛti pakṣe ājya tantram sarvatra vartate
yad devatyaḥ paśuḥ tad devatyaḥ caruḥ śrapayitavyaḥ
vapā homa ante paśu itikartavya tā
uta iyam bhūmiḥ iti ṛcā agni prayogaḥ

original: 'apsu te rājan' iti catasṛbhiḥ vāruṇasya paśoravadānāni juhuyāt pratyṛcaṃ sthālīpākaṃ ca /
analyzed: apsu te rājan iti catasṛbhiḥ vāruṇasya paśoḥ avadānāni juhuyāt pratyṛcam sthālīpākam ca
tathā vāyo ā rundhi naḥ iti vāyavyasya

original: 'āśānām' iti sūktena pratyṛcaṃ diśyasya paśoḥ sthālīpākaṃ caiva /
analyzed: āśānām iti sūktena pratyṛcam diśyasya paśoḥ sthālīpākam ca eva

original: 'prati tyaṃ cārumadhvaram' ityṛcā mārutasya paśoravadānaṃ carośca /
analyzed: prati tyam cārum adhvaram iti ṛcā mārutasya paśoḥ avadānam caroḥ ca
apām agniḥ iti ṛcā āgneya paśoḥ āgneyam kṣīraudanam juhoti
prajāpatiḥ salila ādāḥ iti ṛcā prajāpati kṣīraudanam juhoti dvitīyām
niḥsāla abhiti ulmukena tris prasavyam pariharati kauśs iti

original: tantraṃ kṛtvā tato'pāṃ sūktaiḥ sarvairhiraṇyaśakalena sahodramapsu praveśayet /
analyzed: tantram kṛtvā tata upām sūktaiḥ sarvaiḥ hiraṇya śakalena saha udram apsu praveśayet
vyāpaka radā padārthaḥ bhedena ārāt upakāra tantreṇa bhavati
tantra pakṣe atideśaḥ viśeṣa atideśaḥ yojayitavyaḥ
ūha bādhā abhyudaya tantram maṅgala lakṣaṇāni yojayitavyāni
re vā nā anyaḥ dhūmaketuḥ vidyate

original: utthānaṃ caiva ketūnāṃ vināśāyeti hi smṛtam.
analyzed: utthānam ca eva ketūnām vināśāya iti hi smṛtam
tasmāt ātharvaṇaiḥ mantraiḥ śamanam kārayet budhaḥ
atha nakṣatrāṇi patanti tatra śāntiḥ ucyate

original: [atha yatraitannakṣatrāṇi patāpatānīva bhavanti tatra juhuyāt // KauśS_13,36{128}.1 //
analyzed: atha yatra etat nakṣatrāṇi patāpatāni iva bhavanti tatra juhuyāt

original: yannakṣatraṃ patati jātavedaḥ somena rājñeṣiraṃ purastāt /
analyzed: yat nakṣatram patati jātavedaḥ somena rājñā iṣiram purastāt

original: tasmānmāmagne pari pāhi ghorāt pra ṇo jāyantāṃ mithunāni rūpaśaḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt mām agne pari pāhi ghorāt pra naḥ jāyantām mithunāni rūpaśas

original: somo rājā savitā ca rājā ityetena sūktena juhuyāt // KauśS_13,36{128}.3 //
analyzed: somaḥ rājā savitā ca rājā iti etena sūktena juhuyāt

original: somo rājā savitā ca rājā bhuvo rājā bhuvanaṃ ca rājā /
analyzed: somaḥ rājā savitā ca rājā bhuvaḥ rājā bhuvanam ca rājā

original: śarvo rājā śarma ca rājā ta u naḥ śarma yachantu devāḥ //
analyzed: śarvaḥ rājā śarma ca rājā te u naḥ śarma yacchantu devāḥ

original: viśve devā urvantarikṣaṃ ta u naḥ śarma yachantu devāḥ // KauśS_13,36{128}.2 //
analyzed: viśve devāḥ uru antarikṣam te u naḥ śarma yacchantu devāḥ

original: mā no viśve devā maruto hetimichata // KauśS_13,36{128}.4 //
analyzed: mā naḥ viśve devāḥ marutaḥ hetim ichata
śāntyudaka ādi ājyabhāga antam kṛtvā yat nakṣatram patati jātavedaḥ iti ekā

original: nakṣatrapatane uparyuparipatane bahuśaḥpatane rātrau vā divā vā sandhyāyāṃ vā nakṣatrapatane śāntiḥ samāptā /
analyzed: nakṣatra patane upari upari patane bahuśas patane rātrau vā divā vā sandhyāyām vā nakṣatra patane śāntiḥ samāptā

original: sarvatra pūrvaṃ śāntyudakaṃ kṛtvā tata uttaravedyādi karoti /
analyzed: sarvatra pūrvam śāntyudakam kṛtvā tatas uttaravedi ādi karoti

original: kecit pradhānahomaṃ kṛtvā tataḥ śāntyudakaṃ karoti /
analyzed: kecid pradhāna homam kṛtvā tatas śāntyudakam karoti
atha māṃsa mukhaḥ nipatati tatra śāntiḥ ucyate
atha yatra etat māṃsa mukhaḥ nipatati tatra juhuyāt

original: ghoro vajro devasṛṣṭo na āgan yadvā gṛhān ghoramutā jagāma /
analyzed: ghoraḥ vajraḥ deva sṛṣṭaḥ naḥ āgan yat vā gṛhān ghoram uta ā jagāma

original: tannirjagāma haviṣā ghṛtena śaṃ no astu dvipade śaṃ catuṣpade //
analyzed: tat nirjagāma haviṣā ghṛtena śam naḥ astu dvipade śam catuṣpade

original: trayodaśe'hani śāntyudakādyājyabhāgāntaṃ kṛtvā yathāmuṃ navanītaṃ sauvarṇasthālyāṃ vilāpya sautraśāntirucyate /
analyzed: trayodaśe hani śāntyudaka ādi ājyabhāga antam kṛtvā yathā amum navanītam sauvarṇa sthālyām vilāpya sautraśāntiḥ ucyate

original: gṛdhrādiṣvāhipatati māṃsamukhaḥ māṃsaṃ cāgatagṛhe māṃsamukhe nipatanaśāntiḥ samāptā //
analyzed: gṛdhra ādiṣu āhi patati māṃsa mukhaḥ māṃsam ca āgata gṛhe māṃsa mukhe nipatana śāntiḥ samāptā

original: gṛhe grāme kṣetre vā nagare śirasi aṅge vā māṃsaṃ patati tatra śāntiḥ samāptā //
analyzed: gṛhe grāme kṣetre vā nagare śirasi aṅge vā māṃsam patati tatra śāntiḥ samāptā

original: atha yatra anagnideśe agnidarśanaṃ bhavati tatra śāntirucyate-
analyzed: atha yatra anagni deśe agni darśanam bhavati tatra śāntiḥ ucyate

original: yā te'vadīptivarūpā jātavedo'peto rakṣasāṃ bhāga eṣaḥ /
analyzed: yā jātaveda upetaḥ rakṣasām bhāgaḥ eṣaḥ

original: rakṣāṃsi tayā daha jātavedo yā naḥ prajāṃ manuṣyāṃ saṃ sṛjante //
analyzed: rakṣāṃsi tayā daha jātavedaḥ yā naḥ prajām manuṣyām sam sṛjante

original: śvetā kṛṣṇā rohiṇī jātavedo yāste tanūstiraścīnā nirdahantīḥ śvasantīḥ /

original: atha sarpirvā tailaṃ vā madhu vā viṣyandate tatra śāntirucyate-
analyzed: atha sarpiḥ vā tailam vā madhu vā viṣyandate tatra śāntiḥ ucyate

original: [atha yatraitat sarpirvā tailaṃ vā madhu vā viṣyandati yadyāmaṃ cakrurnikhanantaḥ (6.116)

original: mama tvaṣṭā ca pūṣā ca mamaiva savitā vaśe //
analyzed: mama tvaṣṭā ca pūṣā ca mama eva savitā vaśe

original: mamemāḥ sarvā oṣadhīrāpaḥ sarvā vaśe mama //
analyzed: mama imāḥ sarvāḥ oṣadhīḥ āpaḥ sarvāḥ vaśe mama

original: ita eva prathamaṃ jajñe agnirābhyo yonibhyo adhi jātavedāḥ /
analyzed: itas eva prathamam jajñe agniḥ ābhyaḥ yonibhyaḥ adhi jātavedāḥ

original: iti kalpajaṃ sūktaṃ 'mahyamāpaḥ' iti sūktaṃ dvābhyāmājyaṃ juhoti /

original: tata ājyabhāgāntaṃ kṛtvā 'bhavataṃ naḥ samanasau' ityetena sūktenājyaṃ juhuyāt /

original: atha svayamagnirutthite vidyute vā patite śāntirucyate-

original: pūrṇāñjaliṃ hutvā 'mamobhā' iti sūktaṃ 'mahyamāpaḥ' iti sūktaṃ ca dvābhyāmājyaṃ juhuyāt /

original: tata ājyabhāgāntaṃ kṛtvā 'bhavataṃ naḥ samanasau' ityetena sūktenājyaṃ juhoti /
analyzed: tatas ājyabhāga antam kṛtvā bhavatam naḥ samanasau iti etena sūktena ājyam juhoti

original: vidyute dāghe gṛhe svayaṃ prakṛtidāghe śāntiḥ samāptā //
analyzed: vidyute dāghe gṛhe svayam prakṛti dāghe śāntiḥ samāptā
atha vaṃśa bala haraṇa bhaṅge śāntiḥ ucyate

original: [atha yatraitadvaṃśaḥ sphoṭati kapāle'ṅgārā bhavantyudapātraṃ barhirājyaṃ tadādāya // KauśS_13,43{135}.1 //
analyzed: atha yatra etat vaṃśaḥ sphoṭati kapāla iṅgārāḥ bhavanti uda pātram barhiḥ ājyam tat ādāya

original: tatrāṅgārān vā kapālaṃ vopanidadhātyā santapanāt // KauśS_13,43{135}.3 //
analyzed: tatra aṅgārān vā kapālam vā upanidadhāti ā santapanāt

original: asau vai nāma te mātāsau vai nāma te pitā /
analyzed: asau vai nāma te mātā asau vai nāma te pitā

original: asau vai nāma te dūtaḥ svavaṃśamadhi tiṣṭhati //
analyzed: asau vai nāma te dūtaḥ sva vaṃśam adhi tiṣṭhati

original: uttamarātrī ṇāma mṛtyo te mātā tasya te antakaḥ pitā /
analyzed: uttamarātrī ṇāma mṛtyo te mātā tasya te antakaḥ pitā

original: bahavo'sya pāśā vitatāḥ pṛthivyāmasaṅkhyeyā aparyantā anantāḥ /

original: sa imaṃ dūtaṃ nudatu vaṃśapṛṣṭhāt sa me gachatu dviṣato niveśaṃ mṛtyave svāhā //
analyzed: saḥ imam dūtam nudatu vaṃśa pṛṣṭhāt sa me gachatu dviṣataḥ niveśam mṛtyave svāhā

original: bṛhaspatirāṅgiraso brahmaṇaḥ putro viśve devāḥ pradadurviśvamejat /
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ āṅgirasaḥ brahmaṇaḥ putraḥ viśve devāḥ pradaduḥ viśvam ejat

original: sa imaṃ dūtaṃ nudatu vaṃśapṛṣṭhāt sa me gachatu niveśaṃ bṛhaspataya āṅgirasāya svāhā //
analyzed: saḥ imam dūtam nudatu vaṃśa pṛṣṭhāt sa me gacchatu niveśam bṛhaspataye āṅgirasāya svāhā

original: yasya te'nnaṃ na kṣīyate bhūya evopajāyate /
analyzed: yasya tena nam na kṣīyate bhūyaḥ eva upajāyate

original: yasmai bhūtaṃ ca bhavyaṃ ca sarvametat pratiṣṭhitam /
analyzed: yasmai bhūtam ca bhavyam ca sarvam etat pratiṣṭhitam

original: sa imaṃ dūtaṃ nudatu vaṃśapṛṣṭhāt sa me gachatu dviṣato niveśamindrāya svāhā //
analyzed: saḥ imam dūtam nudatu vaṃśa pṛṣṭhāt sa me gachatu dviṣataḥ niveśam indrāya svāhā

original: mukhaṃ devānāmiha yo babhūva yo jānāti vayunānāṃ samīpe /
analyzed: mukham devānām iha yaḥ babhūva yaḥ jānāti vayunānām samīpe

original: yasmai hutaṃ devatā bhakṣayanti vāyunetraḥ supraṇītiḥ sunītiḥ /
analyzed: yasmai hutam devatāḥ bhakṣayanti vāyu netraḥ su praṇītiḥ su nītiḥ

original: sa imaṃ dūtaṃ nudatu vaṃśapṛṣṭhāt sa me gachatu dviṣato niveśamagnaye svāhā //
analyzed: saḥ imam dūtam nudatu vaṃśa pṛṣṭhāt sa me gachatu dviṣataḥ niveśam agnaye svāhā

original: yaḥ pṛthivyāṃ cyāvayanneti vṛkṣān prabhañjanena rathena saha saṃvidānaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ pṛthivyām cyāvayan eti vṛkṣān prabhañjanena rathena saha saṃvidānaḥ

original: rasān gandhān bhāvayanneti devo mātariśvā bhūtabhavyasya kartā /
analyzed: rasān gandhān bhāvayan eti devaḥ mātariśvā bhūta bhavyasya kartā

original: sa imaṃ dūtaṃ nudatu vaṃśapṛṣṭhāt sa me gachatu dviṣato niveśaṃ vāyave svāhā //
analyzed: saḥ imam dūtam nudatu vaṃśa pṛṣṭhāt sa me gachatu dviṣataḥ niveśam vāyave svāhā

original: brahmacārī carati brahmacaryamṛcaṃ gāthāṃ brahma paraṃ jigāṃsan /
analyzed: brahmacārī carati brahmacaryam ṛcam gāthām brahma param jigāṃsan

original: taṃ vighnā anupariyanti sarve ye antarikṣe ye ca divi śritāsaḥ /
analyzed: tam vighnāḥ anupariyanti sarve ye antarikṣe ye ca divi śritāsaḥ

original: taṃ viśo anupariyanti sarvāḥ karmāṇi loke parimohayanti /
analyzed: tam viśaḥ anupariyanti sarvāḥ karmāṇi loke parimohayanti

original: sa imaṃ dūtaṃ nudatu vaṃśapṛṣṭhāt sa me gachatu dviṣato niveśamādityāya svāhā //
analyzed: saḥ imam dūtam nudatu vaṃśa pṛṣṭhāt sa me gachatu dviṣataḥ niveśam ādityāya svāhā

original: yo nakṣatraiḥ sarathaṃ yāti devaḥ saṃsiddhena rathena saha saṃvidānaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ nakṣatraiḥ sa ratham yāti devaḥ saṃsiddhena rathena saha saṃvidānaḥ
rūpam rūpam kṛṇvānaḥ citra bhānuḥ su bhānuḥ

original: sa imaṃ dūtaṃ nudatu vaṃśapṛṣṭhāt sa me gachatu dviṣato niveśaṃ candrāya svāhā //
analyzed: saḥ imam dūtam nudatu vaṃśa pṛṣṭhāt sa me gachatu dviṣataḥ niveśam candrāya svāhā

original: tā imaṃ dūtaṃ nudantu vaṃśapṛṣṭhāt sa me gachatu dviṣato niveśamoṣadhībhyaḥ somarājñībhyaḥ svāhā //
analyzed: tāḥ imam dūtam nudantu vaṃśa pṛṣṭhāt sa me gachatu dviṣataḥ niveśam oṣadhībhyaḥ soma rājñībhyaḥ svāhā

original: tā imaṃ dūtaṃ nudantu vaṃśapṛṣṭhāt sa me gachatu dviṣato niveśamoṣadhībhyo varuṇarājñībhyaḥ svāhā //
analyzed: tāḥ imam dūtam nudantu vaṃśa pṛṣṭhāt sa me gachatu dviṣataḥ niveśam oṣadhībhyaḥ varuṇa rājñībhyaḥ svāhā
aṣṭa sthūṇaḥ daśa pakṣaḥ yadṛcha jaḥ vanaspate
putrān ca eva paśūn ca abhi rakṣa vanaspate

original: yo vanaspatīnāmupatāpo babhūva yadvā gṛhān ghoramutā jagāma /
analyzed: yaḥ vanaspatīnām upatāpaḥ babhūva yat vā gṛhān ghoram uta ā jagāma

original: tannirjagāma haviṣā ghṛtena śaṃ no astu dvipade śaṃ catuṣpade //
analyzed: tat nirjagāma haviṣā ghṛtena śam naḥ astu dvipade śam catuṣpade
yaḥ vanaspatīnām upatāpaḥ naḥ āgat yat vā yajñam

original: sarve tadagne hutamastu bhāgaśaḥ śivān vayamuttaremābhi vājān //
analyzed: sarve tat agne hutam astu bhāgaśas śivān vayam uttarema abhi vājān

original: śāntyudakaṃ kṛtvā kapāle'gniṃ kṛtvā udapātraṃ barhirājyaṃ tadādāya śālāyāmupari gūḍhakarma karoti /
analyzed: śāntyudakam kṛtvā kapāla ignim kṛtvā uda pātram barhiḥ ājyam tat ādāya śālāyām upari gūḍha karma karoti

original: śālāyāḥ pṛṣṭhe gatvā tatra kapālāni vā upanidadhāti ā santapanāt /
analyzed: śālāyāḥ pṛṣṭhe gatvā tatra kapālāni vā upanidadhāti ā santapanāt

original: prāñcamidhmamupasamādhāya parisamuhya paryukṣya paristīrya barhirityādi ājyabhāgāntaṃ kṛtvā 'asau vai nāma te mātā' iti sūktenājyaṃ juhoti
analyzed: prāñcam idhmam upasamādhāya parisamuhya paryukṣya paristīrya barhiḥ ityādi ājyabhāga antam kṛtvā asau vai nāma te mātā iti sūktena ājyam juhoti

original: 'tvaṣṭā me daivyaṃ vacaḥ' iti sūktenājyaṃ juhuyāt /
analyzed: tvaṣṭā me daivyam vacaḥ iti sūktena ājyam juhuyāt
gṛha vaṃśa bhagne gṛha vaṃśa dāghe ca śāntiḥ samāptā

original: [atha yatraitat kumbhodadhānaḥ saktudhānī vokhā vāniṅgitā vikasati tatra juhuyāt // KauśS_13,44{136}.1 //
analyzed: atha yatra etat kumbha uda dhānaḥ saktu dhānī vā ukhā vā an iṅgitā vikasati tatra juhuyāt
bhūmiḥ bhūmim agāt mātā mātaram api agāt

original: ṛdhyāsma putraiḥ paśubhiryo no dveṣṭi sa bhidyatām iti // KauśS_13,44{136}.2 //]
analyzed: ṛdhyāsma putraiḥ paśubhiḥ yaḥ naḥ dveṣṭi sa bhidyatām iti

original: atha kumbhe bhagne udadhāne saktudhānī vokhā vā vikasati tatra śāntyudakaṃ kṛtvā ājyabhāgāntaṃ kṛtvā 'bhūmirbhūmimagāt' ityṛcājyaṃ juhuyāt
analyzed: atha kumbhe bhagne uda dhāne saktu dhānī vā ukhā vā vikasati tatra śāntyudakam kṛtvā ājyabhāga antam kṛtvā bhūmiḥ bhūmim agāt iti ṛcā ājyam juhuyāt
sat asi sat me bhūyāt iti saktūn āvapet

original: 'sadasi sanme bhūyāt' iti mantreṇānyasyāṃ navatarāyāṃ saktudhānyāṃ saktūnāvapet //
analyzed: sat asi sat me bhūyāt iti mantreṇa anyasyām navatarāyām saktu dhānyām saktūn āvapet

original: [atha cedodanasya annamasyannaṃ me dehyannaṃ mā mā hiṃsīḥ iti triḥ prāśya // KauśS_13,44{136}.4 //
analyzed: atha ced odanasya annam asi annam me dehi annam mā mā hiṃsīḥ iti tris prāśya

original: atha cedodanasya 'annamasyannaṃ me dehyannaṃ mā mā hiṃsīḥ' iti mantreṇānyasyāṃ prakṣipyānumantrayate /
analyzed: atha ced odanasya annam asi annam me dehi annam mā mā hiṃsīḥ iti mantreṇa anyasyām prakṣipya anumantrayate

original: [atha cedudadhānaḥ syāt samudraṃ vaḥ pra hiṇomi (10.5.23-24)
analyzed: atha ced uda dhānaḥ syāt samudram vaḥ pra hiṇomi

original: atha cedudakakalaśaṃ bhajyate 'samudraṃ vaḥ pra hiṇomi' iti dvābhyāmṛgbhyāmabhimantryānyaṃ kṛtvā udakakalaśaṃ navaṃ kuryāt /
analyzed: atha ced udaka kalaśam bhajyate samudram vaḥ pra hiṇomi iti dvābhyām ṛgbhyām abhimantrya anyam kṛtvā udaka kalaśam navam kuryāt

original: iti sūktābhyāmabhimantrya navamudakakalaśaṃ 'hiraṇyavarṇāḥ' iti sūktena udakamabhimantrya kalaśaṃ ninayet /
analyzed: iti sūktābhyām abhimantrya navam udaka kalaśam hiraṇya varṇāḥ iti sūktena udakam abhimantrya kalaśam ninayet
atha asmin sthāne kecid śāntyudakam kurvanti

original: udakasthālyāṃ bhagnāyāṃ vrīhyādi pūlye udakadhānyāṃ saktudhānyāṃ vā kumbha ukhāgnihotrasthālyādibhāṇḍe bhinne bhagne udakapūrṇakalaśe bhagne  #
analyzed: udaka sthālyām bhagnāyām vrīhi ādi pūlye udaka dhānyām saktu dhānyām vā kumbhe ukhā agnihotra sthālī ādi bhāṇḍe bhinne bhagne udaka pūrṇa kalaśe bhagne
śāntyudakam kṛtvā vedi ādi tantram karoti rudra matam
pradhāna homa anantaram śāntyudakam kuryāt iti dārila matam

original: sa khalveteṣu karmasu sarvatra śāntyudakaṃ kṛtvā sarvatra cātanānyanuyojayanmātṛnāmāni ca // KauśS_13,44{136}.9 //
analyzed: sa khalu eteṣu karmasu sarvatra śāntyudakam kṛtvā sarvatra cātanāni anuyojayan mātṛnāmāni ca

original: sarvatra varāṃ dhenuṃ kartre dadyāt // KauśS_13,44{136}.10 //

analyzed: yathoddiṣṭam ca ādiṣṭāsu iti prāyaścittiḥ prāyaścittiḥ

original: adbhutamanteṣu yat patitaṃ tad 'agnaya indrāgnibhyām ādityāya uṣasyai svāhā' iti /
analyzed: adbhuta manteṣu yat patitam tat agnaye indra agnibhyām ādityāya uṣasyai svāhā iti
vināyaka snapana īśāna yāga abhipaśya ete paṭhitāḥ
graha nakṣatra ādi pakṣaḥ sarvatra kāryaḥ

original: yāni deśe kule vāpi adbhutaṃ yatra dṛśyate.
analyzed: yāni deśe kule vā api adbhutam yatra dṛśyate
sa vinaśyati jānīyāt tasya śāntiḥ trayodaśe

original: ubhe prāgāyate kiñcit prathīyasyau paścādudyatatare // KauśS_14,1{137}.3 //
analyzed: ubhe prāc āyate kiñcid prathīyasyau paścāt udyatatare
ṣaṣ śamīm prāc āyatām catur śamīm śroṇyām
dvis śamīm prāc āyatām ṛjvīm adhyardha śamīm śroṇyām

original: sambhāralakṣaṇe uktaṃ yathāvitānaṃ ca maṇḍapaṃ kārayet //
analyzed: sambhāra lakṣaṇe uktam yathāvitānam ca maṇḍapam kārayet

original: barhirlavanaṃ kṛtvā 'grīṣmaste bhūme' ityṛcā upasthāya 'vi mimīṣva' ityṛcā śāntavṛkṣakāṣṭhaṃ mimānamanumantrayate /
analyzed: barhiḥ lavanam kṛtvā grīṣmaḥ te bhūme iti ṛcā upasthāya vi mimīṣvaḥ iti ṛcā śānta vṛkṣa kāṣṭham mimānam anumantrayate

original: ṣaṭśamīṃ prāṅāyatāṃ caturhastān śroṇyāṃ trīn madhye ardhacaturthānagrataḥ //
analyzed: ṣaṣ śamīm prāṅ āyatām catur hastān śroṇyām trīn madhye ardha caturthān agrataḥ

original: [bṛhaspate pari gṛhāṇa vediṃ sugā vo devāḥ sadanāni santu /
analyzed: bṛhaspate pari gṛhāṇa vedim sugā vaḥ devāḥ sadanāni santu

original: asyāṃ barhiḥ prathatāṃ sādhvantarahiṃsrā ṇaḥ pṛthivī devyastu iti parigṛhṇāti // KauśS_14,1{137}.11 //]
analyzed: asyām barhiḥ prathatām sādhu antara hiṃsrā naḥ pṛthivī devī astu iti parigṛhṇāti
bṛhaspate pari gṛhāṇa iti ṛcā vedim parigṛhṇāti
yat te bhūme iti vedim khanati
yat te ūnam iti ardharcena vedim samīkaroti
tvam asi āvapanī janānām iti ardharcena vedim pāṃsunā pūrayati
dvis śamīm prāṅ āyatām ṛjvīm adhyardha śamīm śroṇyām

original: [bṛhaspate pari gṛhāṇa vedim ityuttaravedimopyamānāṃ parigṛhṇāti // KauśS_14,1{137}.15 //]
analyzed: bṛhaspate pari gṛhāṇa vedim iti uttaravedim opyamānām parigṛhṇāti
bṛhaspate pari gṛhāṇa iti uttaravedim opyamānām parigṛhṇāti
asambādham badhyataḥ mānavānām iti ṛcā prathayati

original: [devasya tvā savituḥ prasave'śvinorbāhubhyāṃ pūṣṇo hastābhyāmā dade iti lekhanamādāya yatrāgniṃ nidhāsyan
analyzed: devasya tvā savituḥ prasava aśvinoḥ bāhubhyām pūṣṇaḥ hastābhyām ā dade iti lekhanam ādāya yatra agnim nidhāsyan

original: 'devasya tvā' iti mantreṇa lekhanamādāya yatrāgniṃ nidhāsyan bhavati tatra lakṣaṇaṃ karoti //
analyzed: devasya tvā iti mantreṇa lekhanam ādāya yatra agnim nidhāsyan bhavati tatra lakṣaṇam karoti
varṣeṇa bhūmiḥ iti ardharcena adbhiḥ samprokṣya
yasyām annam vrīhi yavau iti ṛcā namaskṛtya

original: [athāgniṃ praṇayet tvāmagne bhṛgavo nayantāmaṅgirasaḥ sadanaṃ śreya ehi /
analyzed: atha agnim praṇayet tvām agne bhṛgavaḥ nayantām aṅgirasaḥ sadanam śreyaḥ ehi

original: viśvakarmā pura etu prajānan dhiṣṇyaṃ panthāmanu te diśāma iti // KauśS_14,1{137}.25 //]
analyzed: viśvakarmā puras etu prajānan dhiṣṇyam panthām anu te diśāmaḥ iti
tvām agne iti ṛcā vedyām agni praṇayanam

original: 'viśvambharā vasudhānī pratiṣṭhā' ityṛcā vedyā lakṣaṇe pratiṣṭhāpanam //
analyzed: viśvambharā vasu dhānī pratiṣṭhā iti ṛcā vedyāḥ lakṣaṇe pratiṣṭhāpanam
yatra sthaṇḍila karma prayojana artham tatra agni pratiṣṭhāpanam
ā dade kauśs ityādi agni pratiṣṭhāpana antam sa mantrakam bhavati sarvatra

original: ayutahome lakṣahome koṭihome grahayajñasamitsu anyatra vrīhiyavatilasamitpuroḍāśādi tantravikalpāt tatra sarvatrāgnipratiṣṭhāpanamanena vidhānena  #
analyzed: ayuta home lakṣa home koṭi home graha yajña samitsu anyatra vrīhi yava tila samidh puroḍāśa ādi tantra vikalpāt tatra sarvatra agni pratiṣṭhāpanam anena vidhānena
yatra agnim nidhāsyan bhavati tatra lakṣaṇam karoti kauśs
darbha avapracchinna prāntau prakṣālya pavitre kurute
viṣṇoḥ manasā pūte sthaḥ iti pavitrakaraṇam
agnaye tvā juṣṭam prokṣāmi iti pavitreṇa idhma prokṣaṇam
asmai kṣatrāṇi dhārayantam agne iti dvābhyām
etābhiḥ pañcabhiḥ ṛgbhiḥ pañca idhme ādadhāti
tvam bhūmim iti ṛcā barhiḥ prokṣaṇam

original: ṛṣīṇāṃ prastaro'si iti dakṣiṇato'gnerbrahmāsanaṃ nidadhāti // KauśS_14,1{137}.33 //
analyzed: ṛṣīṇām prastaraḥ asi iti dakṣiṇatas agneḥ brahmāsanam nidadhāti

original: pradakṣiṇaṃ barhiṣāṃ mūlāni chādayantottarasyā vediśroṇeḥ pūrvottarataḥ saṃsthāpya // KauśS_14,1{137}.36 //
analyzed: pradakṣiṇam barhiṣām mūlāni chādayantaḥ uttarasyāḥ vedi śroṇeḥ pūrva uttarataḥ saṃsthāpya

original: [ahe daidhiṣavyodatastiṣṭhānyasya sadane sīda yo'smat pākataraḥ iti brahmāsanamanvīkṣate // KauśS_14,1{137}.37 //
analyzed: ahe daidhiṣavya udataḥ tiṣṭhāni asya sadane sīda yaḥ usmat pākataraḥ iti brahmāsanam anvīkṣate

original: nirastaḥ parāgvasuḥ saha pāpmanā nirastaḥ so'stu yo'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ ca vayaṃ dviṣmaḥ iti dakṣiṇā tṛṇaṃ nirasyati // KauśS_14,1{137}.38 //
analyzed: nirastaḥ parāc vasuḥ saha pāpmanā nirastaḥ saḥ astu yaḥ asmān dveṣṭi yam ca vayam dviṣmaḥ iti dakṣiṇā tṛṇam nirasyati

original: tadanvālabhya japati idamahamarvāgvasoḥ sadane sīdāmyṛtasya sadane sīdāmi satyasya
analyzed: tat anvālabhya japati idam aham arvāk vasoḥ sadane sīdāmi ṛtasya sadane sīdāmi satyasya

original: sadane sīdāmīṣṭasya sadane sīdāmi pūrtasya sadane sīdāmi māmṛṣa deva barhiḥ svāsasthaṃ
analyzed: sadane sīdāmi iṣṭasya sadane sīdāmi pūrtasya sadane sīdāmi mā amṛṣa deva barhiḥ svāsastham
tvā adhyāsa deyam ūrṇamradam an abhiśokam

original: ityupaviśyāsanīyaṃ brahmajapaṃ japati bṛhaspatirbrahmā brahmasadana āsiṣyate bṛhaspate yajñaṃ gopāya yadududvata unnivataḥ śakeyam // KauśS_14,1{137}.40
analyzed: iti upaviśya āsanīyam brahmajapam japati bṛhaspatiḥ brahmā brahma sadane āsiṣyate bṛhaspate yajñam gopāya yat ududvataḥ unnivataḥ śakeyam  /

original: pātaṃ mā dyāvāpṛthivī adyāhnaḥ iti dyāvāpṛthivyau samīkṣate // KauśS_14,1{137}.41 //]
analyzed: pātam mā dyāvāpṛthivī adya ahnaḥ iti dyāvāpṛthivyau samīkṣate
ahe daidhiṣavyaḥ ityādi ātma āsana saṃskāraḥ
iti karmaṇi karmaṇi abhitas bhyātānaiḥ ājyam juhuyāt

original: purastāddhoma ājyabhāgau ca etat sarvaṃ pākayajñe uktam /
analyzed: purastāddhomaḥ ājyabhāgau ca etat sarvam pākayajñe uktam

original: yatra kutracit ājyatantreṇa prayojanaṃ tatra sarvatratat pūrvatantram /
analyzed: yatra kutracid ājya tantreṇa prayojanam tatra sarvatra tat pūrva tantram

original: yatra bahūni pradhānakarmāṇi ekasmin tatra kriyante tatra antarā antarā abhyātānāni hutvā kriyante /
analyzed: yatra bahūni pradhānakarmāṇi ekasmin tatra kriyante tatra antarā antarā abhyātānāni hutvā kriyante

original: pākatantre'pi ājyatantrasya pradhānaṃ yadi kriyate ekatantre tadā tasmin tantre pradhānaṃ kṛtvā abhyātānāni hutvā ājyatantrapradhānaṃ kuryāditi
analyzed: pāka tantre api ājya tantrasya pradhānam yadi kriyate eka tantre tadā tasmin tantre pradhānam kṛtvā abhyātānāni hutvā ājya tantra pradhānam kuryāt iti

original: na darvihome na hastahome na pūrṇahome tantraṃ kuryāt /
analyzed: na darvi home na hasta home na pūrṇahome tantram kuryāt

original: yatra ājyaṃ juhoti tatra tantraṃ kuryāt etat sarvatra boddhavyam /
analyzed: yatra ājyam juhoti tatra tantram kuryāt etat sarvatra boddhavyam

original: tasyā havīṃṣi dhānāḥ karambhaḥ śaṣkulyaḥ puroḍāśa udaudanaḥ kṣīraudanastilaudano yathopapādipaśuḥ // KauśS_14,2{138}.2 //]
analyzed: tasyāḥ havīṃṣi dhānāḥ karambhaḥ śaṣkulyaḥ puroḍāśaḥ udaudanaḥ kṣīraudanaḥ tila odanaḥ yathopapādi paśuḥ
māgha kṛṣṇa aṣṭakāḥ ekāṣṭakāḥ iti vacanāt

original: ājyatantramājyabhāgāntaṃ kṛtvā paścādagneḥ rohitaṃ carmāstīrya pavitre antardhāya havīṃṣi nirvapati tūṣṇīm /
analyzed: ājya tantram ājyabhāga antam kṛtvā paścāt agneḥ rohitam carma āstīrya pavitre antardhāya havīṃṣi nirvapati tūṣṇīm

original: dhānāḥ karambhaḥ śaṣkulyaḥ puroḍāśa udaudanaḥ kṣīraudanastilaudano yathopapādipaśuḥ /
analyzed: dhānāḥ karambhaḥ śaṣkulyaḥ puroḍāśaḥ udaudanaḥ kṣīraudanaḥ tila odanaḥ yathopapādi paśuḥ

original: dakṣiṇaṃ bāhuṃ nirlomaṃ sacarmaṃ sukharaṃ prakṣālyāsādya devasya tvā prabhṛti aṣṭakāyai juṣṭaṃ nirvapāmi /
analyzed: dakṣiṇam bāhum nirlomam sa carmam su kharam prakṣālya āsādya devasya tvā prabhṛti aṣṭakāyai juṣṭam nirvapāmi

original: dhānādīni ekatra kṛtvā tato'dhiśrayaṇaparyagnikaraṇābhighāraṇodvāsanālaṅkaraṇotpavanaiḥ saṃskṛtya tataḥ ekatra kṛtvā viṃśatipiṇḍān kṛtvā ekaṃ  #
analyzed: dhānā ādīni ekatra kṛtvā tatas adhiśrayaṇa paryagnikaraṇa abhighāraṇa udvāsana alaṅkaraṇa utpavanaiḥ saṃskṛtya tatas ekatra kṛtvā viṃśati piṇḍān kṛtvā ekam
darvyā juhuyāt prathamā ha vyuvāsa sā
darvī nekṣaṇam āplavanam ca yajña pātra lakṣaṇe uktāni
ā ayam agan saṃvatsaraḥ iti catasṛbhiḥ vijñāyate

original: bhūtasya pataye tvā yaje svāhā.' etābhiraṣṭābhiraṣṭau //
analyzed: bhūtasya pataye tvā yaje svāhā etābhiḥ aṣṭābhiḥ aṣṭau
indra putre iti ṛcā aṣṭādaśīm piṇḍikām juhoti

original: 'ahorātrābhyāṃ tvā yaje svāhā' iti mantreṇa ūnaviṃśīmāhutim //
analyzed: ahar rātrābhyām tvā yaje svāhā iti mantreṇa ūnaviṃśīm āhutim

original: [paśāvupapadyamāne dakṣiṇaṃ bāhuṃ nirlomaṃ sacarmaṃ sakhuraṃ prakṣālya // KauśS_14,2{138}.9 //
analyzed: paśau upapadyamāne dakṣiṇam bāhum nirlomam sa carmam sa khuram prakṣālya

original: yadi paśubāhuṃ sampadyate tadā bāhuṃ 'iḍāyāspadam' ityṛcā 'ā mā puṣṭe ca' ityekāvasānā dvābhyāmṛgbhyāṃ bāhuṃ viṃśīmāhutiṃ juhoti /
analyzed: yadi paśu bāhum sampadyate tadā bāhum iḍāya āspadam iti ṛcā ā mā puṣṭe ca iti eka avasānā dvābhyām ṛgbhyām bāhum viṃśīm āhutim juhoti

original: 'pūrṇā darve' ityavasānābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ sadarvīṃ pūrṇāmekaviṃśīṃ juhoti //
analyzed: pūrṇā darve iti avasānābhyām dvābhyām sa darvīm pūrṇām ekaviṃśīm juhoti

original: sarvā eva yajñatanūravarundhe sarvā evāsya yajñatanūḥ pitaramupajīvanti ya evamaṣṭakāmupaiti // KauśS_14,2{138}.14 //
analyzed: sarvāḥ eva yajña tanūḥ avarundhe sarvāḥ eva asya yajña tanūḥ pitaram upajīvanti yaḥ evam aṣṭakām upaiti

original: na darvihome na hastahome na pūrṇahome tantraṃ kriyetetyeke // KauśS_14,2{138}.15 //
analyzed: na darvi home na hasta home na pūrṇahome tantram kriyeta iti eke
ājyena sviṣṭakṛt pitṛ śrāddham ca kuryāt
hasta homaḥ hasta lakṣaṇa vidhāne uktaḥ

original: [abhijiti śiṣyānupanīya śvo bhūte sambhārān sambharati // KauśS_14,3{139}.1 //]
analyzed: abhijiti śiṣyān upanīya śvas bhūte sambhārān sambharati

original: śrāvaṇyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ vā proṣṭhapadyāṃ vā abhijiti nakṣatre śiṣyānupanīya ācāryasamīpa āgacchanti //
analyzed: śrāvaṇyām paurṇamāsyām vā proṣṭhapadyām vā abhijiti nakṣatre śiṣyān upanīya ācārya samīpe āgacchanti

original: [dadhisaktūn pālāśaṃ daṇḍamahate vasane śuddhamājyaṃ śāntā oṣadhīrnavamudakumbham // KauśS_14,3{139}.2 //
analyzed: dadhi saktūn pālāśam daṇḍam ahate vasane śuddham ājyam śāntāḥ oṣadhīḥ navam uda kumbham

original: parisamuhya paryukṣya paristīrya barhirudapātramupasādya paricaraṇenājyaṃ paricarya // KauśS_14,3{139}.4 //
analyzed: parisamuhya paryukṣya paristīrya barhiḥ uda pātram upasādya paricaraṇena ājyam paricarya

original: śāntyudakaṃ kṛtvā tato'bhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā tataḥ paścādagnerdadhisaktūn juhoti /
analyzed: śāntyudakam kṛtvā tatobhyātāna antam kṛtvā tatas paścāt agneḥ dadhi saktūn juhoti
tatas ubhayaiḥ aparājitaiḥ gaṇa karmabhiḥ viśva karmabhiḥ āyuṣyaiḥ svastyayanaiḥ ājyam juhuyāt
tatas uttaraiḥ gaṇaiḥ ājyam juhvan dadhi saktuṣu sampātān ānayati
yaḥ te sarpaḥ vṛścikaḥ tṛṣṭa daṃśmā
mā naḥ devāḥ ahiḥ vadhīt arasasya śarkoṭasya
yaḥ te sarpaḥ vṛścikaḥ tṛṣṭa daṃśmā
yaḥ te pṛthuḥ stanayitnuḥ iti upākarma gaṇaḥ
pratiṣṭhāpya sruvam dadhi saktūn prāśya ācamya udakam upasamārabhante

original: sruvapratiṣṭhāpanāntaṃ kṛtvā dadhisaktūn prāśya upādhyāyasahitāḥ śiṣyāḥ /
analyzed: sruva pratiṣṭhāpana antam kṛtvā dadhi saktūn prāśya upādhyāya sahitāḥ śiṣyāḥ
tatas ācamya tris ācamanam vihitam śāntyudakena ācamanam
avyasaḥ ca iti japitvā sāvitrīm brahma jajñānam

original: ityekāṃ triṣaptīyaṃ ca paccho vācayet // KauśS_14,3{139}.10 //]
analyzed: iti ekām triṣaptīyam ca pacchas vācayet

original: atha 'avyasaśca' iti japitvā sāvitrīṃ 'brahma jajñānam' ityekāṃ japitvā 'ye triṣaptāḥ' (1.1)
analyzed: atha avyasaḥ ca iti japitvā sāvitrīm brahma jajñānam iti ekām japitvā ye triṣaptāḥ

original: iti sūktaṃ pādaṃ pādaṃ vācayati upādhyāyaḥ śiṣyān //
analyzed: iti sūktam pādam pādam vācayati upādhyāyaḥ śiṣyān

original: yoyo bhogaḥ kartavyo bhavati tantaṃ kurvate // KauśS_14,3{139}.12 //
analyzed: yaḥ yaḥ bhogaḥ kartavyaḥ bhavati tantam kurvate

original: [sa khalvetaṃ pakṣamapakṣīyamāṇaḥ pakṣamanadhīyāna upaśrāmyetā darśāt // KauśS_14,3{139}.13 //
analyzed: sa khalu etam pakṣam apakṣīyamāṇaḥ pakṣam an adhīyānaḥ upaśrāmyeta ā darśāt

original: dṛṣṭe candramasi phalgunīṣu dvayān rasānupasādayati // KauśS_14,3{139}.14 //]
analyzed: dṛṣṭe candramasi phalgunīṣu dvayān rasān upasādayati
abhyātāna antam kṛtvā dvayān rasān upasādayati

original: 'yacca varco akṣeṣu' 'yena mahānaghnyā jaghanaṃ' ityetena gaṇenājyaṃ juhvan raseṣu sampātānānayati prathamaṃ madhusahiteṣu tato madhuvarjiteṣu
analyzed: yat ca varcaḥ akṣeṣu yena mahān aghnyāḥ jaghanam iti etena gaṇena ājyam juhvan raseṣu sampātān ānayati prathamam madhu sahiteṣu tatas madhu varjiteṣu

original: yoyo bhogaḥ kartavyo bhavati tantaṃ kurvate // KauśS_14,3{139}.18 //
analyzed: yaḥ yaḥ bhogaḥ kartavyaḥ bhavati tantam kurvate

original: adhītamiṣṭaṃ brahmaṇo vīryeṇa tena mā devāstapasāvateha iti // KauśS_14,3{139}.26 //

original: yoyo bhogaḥ kartavyo bhavati tantaṃ kurvate // KauśS_14,3{139}.27 //]
analyzed: yaḥ yaḥ bhogaḥ kartavyaḥ bhavati tantam kurvate

original: sambhṛteṣu sambhāreṣu brahmā rājā cobhau snātāvahatavasanau surabhiṇau vratavantau karmaṇyāvupavasataḥ // KauśS_14,4{140}.4 //

original: śvo bhūte abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'śaṃ no devīḥ' (1.6.1)

original: tataḥ 'ā tvāhārṣam' 'dhruvā dyauḥ' iti sūktābhyāṃ 'viśastvā sarvā vāñchantu' ityetairindramutthāpayati /

original: [śvaḥ śvo'sya rāṣṭraṃ jyāyo bhavatyeko'syāṃ pṛthivyāṃ rājā bhavati na purā jarasaḥ pramīyate ya evaṃ veda yaścaivaṃ vidvānindramaheṇa carati

ṛtau adhyāya chāndasaḥ kālpyaḥ āpartukaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: ṛtāvūrdhvaṃ prātarāśādyastu kaścidanadhyāyaḥ sandhyāṃ prāpnoti paścimām // KauśS_14,5{141}.34 //
analyzed: ṛtau ūrdhvam prātarāśāt yaḥ tu kaścid anadhyāyaḥ sandhyām prāpnoti paścimām

original: niśi nigadāyāṃ ca vidyuti śiṣṭaṃ nādhīyīta // KauśS_14,5{141}.36 //
analyzed: niśi ca vidyuti śiṣṭam na adhīyīta
astamite dvi sattāyām tri sattāyām ca pāṭavaḥ

original: atha tāvatkālaṃ bhuktvā pradoṣa ubhe sandhye // KauśS_14,5{141}.37 //
analyzed: atha tāvatkālam bhuktvā pradoṣe ubhe sandhye
apsu śmaśāne śayyāyām abhiśaste khileṣu ca
antar śave rathyāyām grāme cāṇḍāla saṃyute

original: durgandhe śūdrasaṃśrāve paiṅge śabde bhaye rute /
analyzed: durgandhe śūdra saṃśrāve paiṅge śabde bhaye rute

original: aniktena ca vāsasā caritaṃ yena maithunam /
analyzed: a niktena ca vāsasā caritam yena maithunam
śayānaḥ ca agra tā upastha antike guroḥ

original: sarveṇāpararātreṇa viramya pratyārambho na vidyate // KauśS_14,5{141}.41 //]
analyzed: sarveṇa apararātreṇa viramya pratyārambhaḥ na vidyate
nirghāta bhūmikampa aulkā ketu darśana nakṣatra pāta digdāha varṣakṛt lohita aindradhanuḥ pratisūrya gomāyu ulūka kalaha ādīni adbhuteṣu sarveṣu tri rātram na adhīyīta
rātrau garjite ca rātri śeṣe na adhīyīta
atha tāvatkālam bhuktvā pradoṣa madhyarātre na adhīyīta
abhiśaste pātakinaḥ saṃsarge sannidhāne na adhīyīta
gṛhe śava patite catuṣpāda dvipadeṣu patite na adhīyīta
grāma madhye nagara madhye na adhīyīta
cāṇḍāla sannidhāne śabda śravaṇe na adhīyīta
durgandha purīṣa ādi gandhe na adhīyīta

original: yatra bahavaḥ śūdrā militvā śṛṇvanti tatra nādhīyīta /
analyzed: yatra bahavaḥ śūdrāḥ militvā śṛṇvanti tatra na adhīyīta

original: paiṅgaśabde yatra cāturvedyādiṣu ekarātraṃ militvā śabdaṃ kurvanti tatra nādhīyīta /
analyzed: paiṅga śabde yatra cāturvedya ādiṣu eka rātram militvā śabdam kurvanti tatra na adhīyīta
athavā dravya ādi nāśe vā vaidhṛtya nagara grāma ādi caura rāja ādi nara ādi upadrave brāhmaṇa ādi upadrave
na adhīyīta malina vāsasā parihitaḥ na adhīyīta

original: yena vastreṇa parihitena maithunamācarati tena vastreṇa parihito nādhīyīta /
analyzed: yena vastreṇa parihitena maithunam ācarati tena vastreṇa parihitaḥ na adhīyīta
prauḍha pādau pāda upari pādam kṛtvā na adhīyīta

original: agre guroḥ prasārya pādaṃ śuktikāṃ vā baddhvā nādhīyīta /
analyzed: agre guroḥ prasārya pādam śuktikām vā baddhvā na adhīyīta
eteṣu anadhyāyeṣu apararātri viramya na adhīyīta
pauṣī pramāṇam abhreṣu āpartu ced adhīyānām
varṣam vidyut stanayitnuḥ vā na adhīyīta
tri rātram sthāna āsanam brahmacaryam a rasa āśam ca upeyuḥ

original: sā tatra prāyaścittiḥ sā tatra prāyaścittiḥ // KauśS_14,5{141}.45 //]
analyzed: sā tatra prāyaścittiḥ sā tatra prāyaścittiḥ

original: trirātraṃ divā ūrdhvastiṣṭhet rātrau upaviśedetadeva prāyaścittam /
analyzed: tri rātram divā ūrdhvaḥ tiṣṭhet rātrau upaviśet etat eva prāyaścittam
brahmacārī rasa bhakṣaṇe etat eva prāyaścittam

original: sā tatra prāyaścittiḥ sā tatra prāyaścittiḥ //
analyzed: sā tatra prāyaścittiḥ sā tatra prāyaścittiḥ
atha kauśikasya pramāṇāni mīmāṃsā vat yojayitavyāni

original: yathā mīmāṃsāyāḥ prathame'dhyāye vedasya pramāṇamuktam evaṃ saṃhitāvidhāvapi ādau prathamasūtraiḥ pramāṇamuktam /
analyzed: yathā mīmāṃsāyāḥ prathama adhyāye vedasya pramāṇam uktam evam saṃhitā vidhau api ādau prathama sūtraiḥ pramāṇam uktam
asmin śāstre dvādaśa lakṣaṇā mīmāṃsā yojayitavyā
caturtha idhyāye kratu artha puruṣa artha lakṣaṇam

original: mantrabrāhmaṇakalpeṣu pariśiṣṭeṣu ca bhāṣyeṣu ca dvādaśalakṣaṇā mīmāṃsā sarvanyāyeṣu yojayet.
analyzed: mantra brāhmaṇa kalpeṣu pariśiṣṭeṣu ca bhāṣyeṣu ca dvādaśa lakṣaṇā mīmāṃsā sarva nyāyeṣu yojayet

original: tathā ca mahābhāṣye- “kāni punaḥ śabdānuśāsanasya prayojanāni /
analyzed: tathā ca mahābhāṣye kāni punar śabda anuśāsanasya prayojanāni
rakṣaḥ hā gamala dhva sandehāḥ prayojanāni vyākaraṇasya vyākaraṇena arthaḥ niścīyate
sarveṣu mantra brāhmaṇa kalpeṣu vyākaraṇena arthaḥ niścīyate

original: lokeṣu ca vedavyākaraṇādvinā śabdo vāśabdo nāsti yataḥ /
analyzed: lokeṣu ca veda vyākaraṇāt vinā śabdaḥ vā aśabdaḥ nā asti yatas
tasmāt mīmāṃsā vyākaraṇāt ca sampradāyaḥ viśeṣyate
sampradāyena yaḥ arthaḥ tat tathā iti na anyathā
krama brahmacarya vidyā grahaṇe kṛte tatas grāma sāmpada karma adhikāraḥ
sarva sāmpadā dravya ādi samāpte sati sāmmanasya adhikāraḥ

original: cāturvarṇyaṃ cāturāśramaṃ ca rājā vṛṣṭitvā dharmasyeti /
analyzed: cāturvarṇyam cāturāśramam ca rājā vṛṣṭi tvā dharmasya iti
atharvavede bhavet dharmaḥ dharmaḥ rakṣati rakṣataḥ

original: tathā coktaṃ pūrvabrāhmaṇeprajāpatiḥ prajāḥ sṛṣṭvā pālayasveti tadatharvābhavaditi.
analyzed: tathā ca uktam pūrva brāhmaṇe prajāpatiḥ prajāḥ sṛṣṭvā pālayasva iti tat atharvā abhavat iti

original: kauśiko vatsaśarmā ca tasya putro'tha dārilaḥ.

analyzed: śāstra vijñānam eṣām hi caturthaḥ na upapadyate
tat ayuktam hi yat vaktum boddhāraḥ santi anekaśas
tathā yat eṣām anvaye kauśikaḥ jñātavān
vāhasāt keśava utpannaḥ keśavāt anantaḥ ucyate
anantāt someśvaraḥ jātaḥ someśvarāt keśavaḥ tathā
sarve te tharvavedinaḥ sarve agnihotriṇaḥ tathā
sarve agniṣṭoma ādibhiḥ yajñaiḥ yajamānāḥ yathāvidhi
sarve te sava yajñaiḥ ca yathā vihita dakṣiṇaiḥ
mahā śāntibhiḥ bahubhiḥ anekābhiḥ ca kāritāḥ
sarve śrotriya dharmiṣṭhāḥ sarve tapa parāyaṇāḥ
sarve śāpa anugraha samarthāḥ sarve śāntāḥ suhṛdaḥ ca

original: brahmatvaṃ tu kṛtaṃ teṣāṃ svaśākhāvihitaṃ tathā //
analyzed: brahmatvam tu kṛtam teṣām sva śākhā vihitam tathā
caturṇām api vedānām atharva vihitam tathā

original: bahuguṇe cātra vaṃśe guṇākhyānaṃ na śakyate //
analyzed: bahuguṇe ca atra vaṃśe guṇa ākhyānam na śakyate
trayāṇām api bhāṣyāṇām sāram jagrāha keśavaḥ
tena śiṣya āhita arthāya kṛtā kauśikapaddhatiḥ
sarve vyākaraṇa vettāraḥ sarve bhaṭṭa prabhākarāḥ
itihāsa purāṇa jñāḥ sarve smṛti parāyaṇāḥ
gaṅgā tīre vasantaḥ ca bāla tve muni vṛttayaḥ
ahaṅkāra vinirmuktāḥ sarve te dharma paṇḍitāḥ
a pratigrahakāḥ sarve japa homa parāyaṇāḥ
śrīmat bhojapure vidvān āsīt someśvaraḥ dvijaḥ
tad putra keśavena eṣā kṛtā kauśikapaddhatiḥ
pūrva ācāryaiḥ kṛtā hi eṣā dṛśā dṛṣṭvā anukalpitā
jñātvā bhāṣyāṇām anusāreṇa atharva aṅgirasa anumate naraḥ

original: sūtrācca bhāṣyāccārthaṃ tu jagāda tu kalpitam.
analyzed: sūtrāt ca bhāṣyāt ca artham tu jagāda tu kalpitam
kauśikam tu na budhyanti śabda mīmāṃsa bodhakāḥ
tathā upanayanam kṛtvā hita arthāya kalpayet budhaḥ
sarve atharva ācārāḥ cāturvarṇāḥ ca gotriṇaḥ
tathā ca āha tat matam bhaṭṭa prabhākara vettāraḥ

original: tasyāpi śataṃ jñātvā kṛtā paddhatiriyaṃ tadā //
analyzed: tasya api śatam jñātvā kṛtā paddhatiḥ iyam tadā

original: ātharvaṇā sarveṣāṃ bhavatu svasti pippalādagotraṃ teṣāṃ āmuṣyāyaṇa sañjñitam /
analyzed: ātharvaṇā sarveṣām bhavatu svasti pippalāda gotram teṣām āmuṣyāyaṇa sañjñitam

original: pravaratrayasamākhyātaṃ kāśyapa-asita-devalabrahmādi brāhmaṇā ānandapure puruṣā viśuddhāḥ /
analyzed: pravara traya samākhyātam kāśyapa asita devala brahma ādi brāhmaṇāḥ ānanda pure puruṣāḥ viśuddhāḥ

original: sarve ānandapurasamākhyātā ānandapuraviniśrutā ca ānandapuraṃ vadantyanye kalpagrāmaṃ ca paridhiḥ /
analyzed: sarve ānanda pura samākhyātāḥ ānanda pura viniśrutā ca ānanda puram vadanti anye kalpa grāmam ca paridhiḥ
nagari tu vadanti anye oṃkāra nagaram tathā

original: samudramadhye yathā dvīpaṃ mānuṣāṇāṃ tu pārthivaḥ.
analyzed: samudra madhye yathā dvīpam mānuṣāṇām tu pārthivaḥ

original: devānāṃ tu yathā svarga pṛthivyāṃ nagaraṃ tathā //
analyzed: devānām tu yathā svarga pṛthivyām nagaram tathā
dharmeṇa satya vācā ca varṇa āśrama niratā sadā
caturthe pi varṇe pi asatyam na eva ca dṛśyate
ācāreṇa smṛti dharmeṇa yatnataḥ brāhmaṇa rakṣaṇam
ānanda pura guṇa ākhyātam varṇayitum na śakyā uham kvacid
yad darśane tu dṛśyate maitrī bhāva parasparam
brāhmaṇāḥ sūtra pradhānāḥ ṛk yajuḥ sāma ātharvaṇāḥ
ācāra rakṣaṇa arthāya pauṣyām mahā śāntiḥ kriyate
kauśikam cintayitvā tu kṛtā paddhatiḥ tathā
ātharvaṇa śaunaka śākhīyānām saṃhitā vidhiḥ samāptaḥ
śāntikam pauṣṭikam ca eva abhicārakam tathā eva ca

original: paurohityaṃ brahmatvaṃ ca rājavidyā tathaiva ca //
analyzed: paurohityam brahma tvam ca rāja vidyā tathā eva ca

original: ṛtvijāṃ ca vināśāya rājño janapadasya ca.
analyzed: ṛtvijām ca vināśāya rājñaḥ janapadasya ca
saṃvatsara viriṣṭam tat yatra yajñaḥ viriṣyate

original: catuṣpāt sakalo yajña ityādi niṣedhaṃ darśayati /
analyzed: catuṣpād sakalaḥ yajñaḥ ityādi niṣedham darśayati

original: caturṣvapi vedeṣu atharvavihitaṃ brahmatvaṃ tathā paurohityaṃ ca /
analyzed: caturṣu api vedeṣu atharva vihitam brahmatvam tathā paurohityam ca
bahvṛcaḥ hanti vai rāṣṭram adhvaryuḥ nāśayet sutān
chandogaḥ dhana nāśāya tasmāt ātharvaṇaḥ guruḥ
paurohityam ca kurvīta daiva jña mudita uditam

original: tathā viṣṇupurāṇe - paurohityaṃ śāntikapauṣṭikāni rājñāmatharvavedena kārayet brahmatvaṃ ca //
analyzed: tathā viṣṇupurāṇe paurohityam śāntika pauṣṭikāni rājñām atharvavedena kārayet brahmatvam ca

original: tathā ca brahmāṇḍapurāṇe - atharvāṅgirasaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ rājapurohite niyujyate /
analyzed: tathā ca brahmāṇḍapurāṇe atharva aṅgirasam brāhmaṇam rāja purohite niyujyate

original: tathā ca matsyapurāṇe - atharvamantrapāṭhakaṃ sarvaśarīrapūrṇayuktaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ purohitam //
analyzed: tathā ca matsyapurāṇe atharva mantra pāṭhakam sarva śarīra pūrṇa yuktam brāhmaṇam purohitam
tathā ca vārāhapurāṇe purohita lakṣaṇe atharva mantra brāhmaṇa pāṭhakam
yaḥ tu anyam bhojayet śrāddhe vidyamāne pi atharvaṇe
nirāśāḥ tasya gacchanti devatāḥ pitṛbhiḥ saha

original: tathā ca daṇḍanītyāṃ ca kuśalaḥ syāt purohitaḥ.
analyzed: tathā ca daṇḍanītyām ca kuśalaḥ syāt purohitaḥ
atharva vihitam karma kuryāt śāntika pauṣṭikam
tathā cāṇakye śāntika pauṣṭika ābhicārika adbhuta śānti ādīni

original: tathā bhārate - 'paurohityaṃ pautro atharvavidyāṃ śāntiṃ kārayet' iti /
analyzed: tathā bhārate paurohityam pautraḥ atharva vidyām śāntim kārayet iti

original: indreṇa bṛhaspatiratharvāṅgirasaṃ suśrāva svargo me'surairgṛhīta iti /
analyzed: indreṇa bṛhaspatiḥ atharva aṅgirasam suśrāva svargaḥ mesuraiḥ gṛhītaḥ iti

original: sa śāntikarmādīni jayakarmāṇi kṛtvā punaḥ svargo abhavat //
analyzed: sa śānti karma ādīni jaya karmāṇi kṛtvā punar svargaḥ abhavat

original: tathā bhārate - drupadena sarvakulakṣayārthamatharvāṅgirasau yājopayājau dvau bhrātarau staḥ /
analyzed: tathā bhārate drupadena sarva kula kṣaya artham atharva aṅgirasau yāja upayājau dvau bhrātarau staḥ

original: na haviḥ pratigṛhṇanti devatāḥ pitaro dvijāḥ.
analyzed: na haviḥ pratigṛhṇanti devatāḥ pitaraḥ dvijāḥ
tasya bhūmipateḥ yasya gṛhe na atharva vid guruḥ
athā atharva nidheḥ tasya vijita ari purassaraḥ
arthyām arthapatiḥ vācam ādade vadatām varaḥ
tathā ca manuḥ śrutiḥ atharva aṅgirasī kuryāt abhicārakam
ṛgveda ekaguṇam dānam dviguṇam ca yajurvede
triguṇam sāmavede proktam anantam syāt atharvaṇe

original: tathā ca vārāhajyotiṣe - atharvāṅgirasamahāśāntibhiḥ koṭihomāccādbhutānāṃ ca śamanaṃ bhavati //
analyzed: tathā ca vārāhajyotiṣe atharva aṅgirasa mahāśāntibhiḥ koṭi homāt ca adbhutānām ca śamanam bhavati

original: tathāriputrake ca vāyulakṣaṇe khaṇḍakhādye atharvamahāśāntiḥ paṭhitāḥ śamanārthāḥ /
analyzed: tathā ariputrake ca vāyulakṣaṇe khaṇḍa khādye atharva mahāśāntiḥ paṭhitāḥ śamana arthāḥ
tathā puṇya abhiṣeka ādi atharva vida uktāni rāja karmāṇi ca

original: tathā purāṇe - ayutalakṣakoṭihomādiṣu agnisthāpanaṃ gṛhasthāpanaṃ pūrṇāhutivasordhārādi atharvavede.
analyzed: tathā purāṇe ayuta lakṣa koṭi homa ādiṣu agni sthāpanam gṛha sthāpanam pūrṇāhuti vasordhārā ādi atharvavede
tathā ca gautamaḥ śāntika pauṣṭika abhicāraka vaśīkaraṇa ādi karmāṇi kārayet

original: tathā mīmāṃsāyāṃ bhaṭṭaḥ - śāntipuṣṭyabhicārā ekabrahmartvigāśrayāḥ kriyā atharvavede kriyante //
analyzed: tathā mīmāṃsāyām bhaṭṭaḥ śānti puṣṭi abhicārāḥ eka brahma ṛtvij āśrayāḥ kriyāḥ atharvavede kriyante

original: tathā mārkaṇḍeyapurāṇe - atharvamantrairabhiṣikastu pṛthivīṃ bhuṅkte sasāgarām //
analyzed: tathā mārkaṇḍeyapurāṇe atharva mantraiḥ abhiṣikaḥ tu pṛthivīm bhuṅkte sa sāgarām
yasya rājñaḥ janapade atharvā śānti pāragaḥ
nivasati api tat rāṣṭram vardhate nirupadravam
tasmāt rājā viśeṣeṇa atharvāṇam jita indriyam
dāna sat māna saṃskāraiḥ nityam samabhipūjayet
nityam ca kārayet śāntim graha ṛkṣāṇi pūjayet

original: tathā mīmāṃsāyāṃ ṣaṣṭhe'dhyāye purohitādhikaraṇe ekavacanam atharvavede śrūyate /
analyzed: tathā mīmāṃsāyām ṣaṣṭha idhyāye purohita adhikaraṇe eka vacanam atharvavede śrūyate

original: tathā purāṇe - brāhmaṇāni dānāni vā'tharvavedavihitāni kārayet //
analyzed: tathā purāṇe brāhmaṇāni dānāni vā atharvaveda vihitāni kārayet
etaiḥ ca anekaiḥ ca vākyaiḥ vihitam atharvaveda śāntikam
sarveṣām matena sa vivaraṇaḥ sarva śāstreṣu samastakeṣu
tathā gṛhya ṭīkāyām mahāśāntyā sarva rāṣṭra vṛddhiḥ bhavati vṛddhiḥ ca

original: tathā vāyupurāṇe - catvāro vedā vyāsena vibhajya hotradhvaryurudgātraṃ brahmatvamiti /
analyzed: tathā vāyupurāṇe catvāraḥ vedāḥ vyāsena vibhajya hotṛ adhvaryuḥ udgātṛ am brahma tvam iti
śāntim ca brahmatvam ca atharvaveda vihitam

original: tathā aṣṭādaśapurāṇeṣu - brahmatvaṃ ca śāntim atharvavede /
analyzed: tathā aṣṭādaśa purāṇeṣu brahmatvam ca śāntim atharvavede

original: tathā aṣṭādaśapurāṇeṣu rājā atharvavedena sarvakarmāṇi kārayet /
analyzed: tathā aṣṭādaśa purāṇeṣu rājā atharvavedena sarva karmāṇi kārayet

original: tathā brāhmaṇe - 'atharvāṇaśca ha vā āṅgirasaśca' ityādi yajñe śrāddhādi karmasu /
analyzed: tathā brāhmaṇe atharvāṇaḥ ca ha vā āṅgirasaḥ ca ityādi yajñe śrāddha ādi karmasu
prāṇe tṛpte vāyuḥ tṛpyati ādi praśaṃsa vidhiḥ atharvavedasya

original: tathā bhārate - bhṛgvaṅgireṇa viśvāmitro rājā brāhmaṇaḥ kṛtaḥ.
analyzed: tathā bhārate bhṛgvaṅgireṇa viśvāmitraḥ rājā brāhmaṇaḥ kṛtaḥ

original: tathā bhārate - bhṛguṇā pratardano rājā brāhmaṇaḥ kṛtaḥ.
analyzed: tathā bhārate bhṛguṇā pratardanaḥ rājā brāhmaṇaḥ kṛtaḥ

original: tathāṅgirasena kāśirājasya naṣṭarājyasya putraśāntiṃ kṛtvā pṛthivīṃ bhuṅkte /
analyzed: tathā āṅgirasena kāśi rājasya naṣṭa rājyasya putra śāntim kṛtvā pṛthivīm bhuṅkte

original: indramarutvatīye ākhyāne marutve varte purohitaṃ kṛtvā indrapratimo bhavasyāhave indreṇa tasya vajraṃ prakṣiptam /
analyzed: indramarutvatīye ākhyāne marutve varte purohitam kṛtvā indra pratimaḥ bhavasya āhave indreṇa tasya vajram prakṣiptam

original: tathā bhṛgūṇāṃ śāpena nahuṣo rājā sarpo ajagaro bhavati /
analyzed: tathā bhṛgūṇām śāpena nahuṣaḥ rājā sarpaḥ ajagaraḥ bhavati

original: tathā bhārgaveṇa ṛcīkena sukanyāvivāhaṃ kṛtvā aśvinīkumārābhyāṃ vedābhyāsaḥ yuvā kṛtaḥ tena tau devamadhyasthāpitau yajñabhāgaṃ ca prāpitau
analyzed: tathā bhārgaveṇa ṛcīkena sukanyā vivāham kṛtvā aśvinī kumārābhyām veda abhyāsaḥ yuvā kṛtaḥ tena tau deva madhya sthāpitau yajña bhāgam ca prāpitau

original: tathā janamejayasya rājñaḥ purohitena bhārgaveṇa śaunakena sarpasatraṃ prārabdham /
analyzed: tathā janamejayasya rājñaḥ purohitena bhārgaveṇa śaunakena sarpa satram prārabdham

original: tathā rākṣasaśastreṇa bhārgaveṇa vasiṣṭhapautreṇa pārāśareṇa rākṣasā nipātitāḥ /
analyzed: tathā rākṣasaśastreṇa bhārgaveṇa vasiṣṭha pautreṇa pārāśareṇa rākṣasāḥ nipātitāḥ

original: tathā pūrvabrāhmaṇe - tasmādya eva sarvavit syāt taṃ brahmāṇaṃ kurvīta /
analyzed: tathā pūrva brāhmaṇe tasmāt yaḥ eva sarva vid syāt tam brahmāṇam kurvīta

original: eṣa ha vai vidvān sarvavid brahmā yad bhṛgvaṅgirovit /
analyzed: eṣa ha vai vidvān sarva vid brahmā yat bhṛgu aṅgiraḥ vid

original: ete ha vā asya sarvasya śamayitāraḥ pālayitāra iti.
analyzed: ete ha vai asya sarvasya śamayitāraḥ pālayitāraḥ iti

original: tathā saṃhitāvidhau - “tatra rājā bhūmipatirvidvāṃsaṃ brāhmaṇamicchedeṣa ha vai vidvān
analyzed: tathā saṃhitā vidhau tatra rājā bhūmipatiḥ vidvāṃsam brāhmaṇam icchet eṣa ha vai vidvān

original: yad bhṛgvaṅgirovidete ha vā asya sarvasya śamayitāraḥ pālayitāro yad bhṛgvaṅgirasaḥ” (KauśS 94.2-4) iti.
analyzed: yat bhṛgu aṅgiraḥ videte ha vai asya sarvasya śamayitāraḥ pālayitāraḥ yat bhṛgu aṅgirasaḥ iti
tathā svastyayaneṣu śakadhūma kim adya ahar iti pṛcchati

original: tathā ca nakṣatrakalpe - kariṣyamāṇasaṅgrāmaṃ pratipadyate tena kṣatriyaḥ atharvāṅgirasaṃ purohitamicched vidvāṃsaṃ śāstravittamam.
analyzed: tathā ca nakṣatra kalpe kariṣyamāṇa saṅgrāmam pratipadyate tena kṣatriyaḥ atharva aṅgirasam purohitam icchet vidvāṃsam śāstra vittamam

original: tathā atharvāṅgiraso brāhmaṇo vā ahorātrayoḥ puṇyāhaṃ pṛcchet /
analyzed: tathā atharva aṅgirasaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ vai ahar rātrayoḥ puṇyāham pṛcchet

original: puṇyāhaṃ bhavati puṇyāha eva kurute prasthāne /
analyzed: puṇya aham bhavati puṇya ahe eva kurute prasthāne

original: anyatra vā vyāso bhārgavaḥ mārkaṇḍeyo bhārgavo durvāsā bhārgavaḥ śukrabṛhaspatibhṛgvaṅgiraḥ.
analyzed: anyatra vā vyāsaḥ bhārgavaḥ mārkaṇḍeyaḥ bhārgavaḥ durvāsāḥ bhārgavaḥ śukra bṛhaspati bhṛgu aṅgiraḥ

original: tathā yajurvede pratijñā nāma pariśiṣṭam - 'hastiśalyāṃ aśvalakṣaṇaṃ āyudhāyurvedavidyā
analyzed: tathā yajurvede pratijñā nāma pariśiṣṭam hasti śalyām aśva lakṣaṇam āyudha āyurveda vidyā
dātavya āntarikṣa bhūmi autpāta praśamanaḥ śānti svastyayana maṅgala arthāḥ para abhicāra uccāṭana vaśīkaraṇa sammohana arthāḥ ca

original: atha mahābhāṣye prathame pāde śrūyate - ṛgvedo yajurvedaḥ sāmavedo atharvaveda iti catvāro vedāḥ /
analyzed: atha mahābhāṣye prathame pāde śrūyate  ṛgvedaḥ yajurvedaḥ sāmavedaḥ atharvavedaḥ iti catvāraḥ vedāḥ

original: tathā 'catvāri śaṅgā iti catvāro vedā iti vyākhyātam' //
analyzed: tathā catvāri śaṅgāḥ iti catvāraḥ vedāḥ iti vyākhyātam

original: tathā mahābhāṣye dvitīye pāde vibhāṣā chandasīti sūtre 'śaṃ no devīḥ',
analyzed: tathā mahābhāṣye dvitīye pāde vibhāṣā chandasi iti sūtre śam naḥ devīḥ
agnimīīe iṣe tvā agne ā yāhi iti

original: tathā nirukte catvāri śṛṅgā iti vyākhyātam.
analyzed: tathā nirukte catvāri śṛṅgā iti vyākhyātam

original: tathā atharvavede brāhmaṇe catvāri śṛṅgā ityṛcā catvāro vedāḥ iti vyākhyātam.
analyzed: tathā atharvavede brāhmaṇe catvāri śṛṅgā iti ṛcā catvāraḥ vedāḥ iti vyākhyātam

original: tathā mīmāṃsāyāṃ prathamapāde vedādhikaraṇe atharvavedasya śākhādvayamudāhṛtaṃ paippalādaṃ maudakamiti /
analyzed: tathā mīmāṃsāyām prathama pāde veda adhikaraṇe atharvavedasya śākhā dvayam udāhṛtam paippalādam maudakam iti

original: akṛtakā nityāḥ pramāṇaṃ vedā iti sthāpitam //
analyzed: akṛtakāḥ nityāḥ pramāṇam vedāḥ iti sthāpitam

original: tathā mīmāṃsāyāṃ dvitīye'dhyāye sarvaśākhādhikaraṇe paippalādaṃ maudakamiti atharvavedasya śākhādvayamudāhṛtya sarvaśākhāpratyayakrame sthāpitam
analyzed: tathā mīmāṃsāyām dvitīya idhyāye sarva śākhā adhikaraṇe paippalādam maudakam iti atharvavedasya śākhā dvayam udāhṛtya sarva śākhā pratyaya krame sthāpitam

original: tathā tṛtīye'dhyāye pravargyādhikaraṇe caturṣvapi vedeṣu na prathamayajño nāma yajño'sti caturvedagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam /
analyzed: tathā tṛtīya idhyāye pravargya adhikaraṇe caturṣu api vedeṣu na prathama yajñaḥ nāma catur veda grahaṇam kṛtam

original: bhāṣyakāreṇa tathā atharvavedādhikaraṇe catvāri śṛṅgeti catvāro hotrakāḥ prativedamiti vyākhyātam.
analyzed: bhāṣyakāreṇa tathā atharvaveda adhikaraṇe catvāri śṛṅgā iti catvāraḥ hotrakāḥ prativedam iti vyākhyātam
pūrva brāhmaṇe atharvavedena trayaḥ vedāḥ kṛtāḥ
atha u lokāḥ veda ādayaḥ ca

original: tathā atharvavede brāhmaṇe - atha ha prajāpatiḥ somena yakṣyamāṇo vedānuvācakaṃ vā hotāraṃ vṛṇīyāt /
analyzed: tathā atharvavede brāhmaṇe atha ha prajāpatiḥ somena yakṣyamāṇaḥ veda anuvācakam vā hotāram vṛṇīyāt
kam adhvaryum kam udgātāram kam brāhmaṇam iti

original: ta ūcurṛgvidameva hotāraṃ vṛṇīṣva yajurvidamadhvaryuṃ sāmavidamudgātāramatharvāṅgirovidaṃ brahmāṇam /
analyzed: te ūcuḥ ṛk vidam eva hotāram vṛṇīṣva yajuḥ vidam adhvaryum sāma vidam udgātāram atharva aṅgiraḥ vidam brahmāṇam

original: tathā hāsya yajñaścaturṣu lokeṣu caturṣu deveṣu caturṣu vedeṣu catasrāsu hotrāsu catuṣpādyajñaḥ pratitiṣṭhati /
analyzed: tathā ha asya yajñaḥ caturṣu lokeṣu caturṣu deveṣu caturṣu vedeṣu catasrāsu hotrāsu catuṣpād yajñaḥ pratitiṣṭhati
pratitiṣṭhati prajayā paśubhiḥ yaḥ evam veda
tathā anucarā api tad vidaḥ bhavanti

original: bhārate sabhāparvaṇi brahmasabhāyāṃ catvāro vai brahmapārśve tiṣṭhanti mūrtimantāḥ //
analyzed: bhārate sabhāparvaṇi brahma sabhāyām catvāraḥ vai brahma pārśve tiṣṭhanti mūrtimantāḥ

original: pūrvabrāhmaṇe triviṣṭapaṃ tridivaṃ nākamuttamaṃ tametayā trayyā vidyayeti /
analyzed: pūrva brāhmaṇe triviṣṭapam tridivam nākam uttamam tam etayā trayyā vidyayā iti

original: mahānto'tharvaṇāmaṅgirasāṃ ca sā gatiratharvaṇāmaṅgirasa ca sā gatiriti brāhmaṇam //
analyzed: mahāntaḥ atharvaṇām aṅgirasām ca sā gatiḥ atharvaṇām aṅgirasām ca sā gatiḥ iti brāhmaṇam
